Matthew: Yesus
hohos na to mfi fefo: Yesus
tait ybam raa mana ro Daud, tna Daud ybam raa mana ro Abraham.
Masmair rau to Abraham yabe Ishak, tna Ishak yabe Yakub, tna Yakub yabe Yehuda ysya yao na.
Tna Yehuda yasen yabe Peres ysya Zerah mbam fai Tamar. Tna Peres yabe Hezron.
Tna Hezron yasen yabe Ram, tna Ram yabe Aminadab, tna Aminadab yabe Nahason, tna Nahason yabe Salmon.
Tna Salmon yabe Boas ybam fai Rahab, tna Boas yabe Obed ybam fai Rut. Tna Obed yabe Isai.
Tna Isai yabe
Daud, tna Daud yoo Uria yfain tna yabe Salomo.
Tna Salomo yabe Rehabeam, tna Rehabeam yabe Abia, tna Abia yabe Asa.
Tna Asa yabe Yosafat, tna Yosafat yabe Yoram, tna Yoram yabe Uzia.
Tna Uzia yabe Yotam, tna Yotam yabe Ahas, tna Ahas yabe Hizkia.
Tna Hizkia yabe Manasye, tna Manasye yabe Amon, tna Amon yabe Yosia.
Tna wore wo raa mfot raa ro Yahudi makah mamoʼt Babel to, Yosia yabe Yekhonya ysya yao na.
Raa ro Yahudi mamoʼt oo ro Babel to, Yekhonya yabe Sealtiel, tna Sealtiel yabe Zerubabel.
Tna Zerubabel yabe Abihud, tna Abihud yabe Elyakim, tna Elyakim yabe Azor.
Tna Azor yabe Zadok, tna Zadok yabe Akhim, tna Akhim yabe Eliud.
Tna Eliud yabe Eleazar, tna Eleazar yabe Matan, tna Matan yabe Yakub.
Tna Yakub yabe Yusuf ro yoo fai Maria, tna au mabe Yesus ro raa mtu
tait.

Maban Abraham raa mabe mamo snok Daud raa mabe to, biin beta trion 14 firwas wa. Tna maban Daud raa mabe mamo snok raa ro Yahudi raa mfot tna makah mamoʼt oo ro Babel to, biin trion 14 firwas ye. Tna maban
reto snok mam
raa fnya mabe to biin 14 firwas wa ye.
Masmair rau ro Yesus
fai Maria mabe to fefo: Maria msya Yusuf mbewok mkir anya sai fares, menohe Maria mrok mhaf. Maria mhaf reto to, mbam Har ro
Maria msya Yusuf mbewok mjin su fefares.
Tna Yusuf ynaut bait mam srau mato yawe yitsre Maria makus. Yusuf fi ait raa ro ja yno bo ro moof, tna ait ynaut yawe yno Maria masom mkair ma.
Yusuf ynaut bo reto kri-kri to, tna ait yjin smi. Ait smi ymat
sau mbrah nenat kʼait tna mawe, “Yusuf, ku ro Daud yare: Waa ma. Noo Maria mamo nfain. Ku ro yhau kʼau mhaf retait tait ybam Har ro
meto.
Meen Maria mabe Ku ro sme sait. Nafan Ku retait yasom Yesus. Ait oh mi meen yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa wAit. Tna re Allah yyon iro wana to.”
yno bo weto beta mamo mnan si bo ro tiwya ykyas kʼanu raa wia. Tiwya ybis
rAit sait yama ykyas bo weto matim. Ait yawe,
“Ku sau ro ja mjin msya raa su fefares to, kbe mhaf tna mabe Ku sme sait. Tna kbe raa mtu Ku retait yasom Imanuel.”
Yesaya 7:14
Imanuel mam mai ranu to 'Allah yatam anu'.
Yusuf yrok yasen. Tna yno bo ro
riwai mawe kʼait: Ait yoo Maria mamo yfain.
Menohe Yusuf yjin su ysya au fee mamo snok mam ati ro au mabe Ku sme retait. Tna Yusuf yafan Ku retait ytu yasom Yesus.
Yesus fnya mabe mam remo ro Betlehem. Mam ti weto to Herodes yamo
mam
ro Yudea reto. Tna raa
mama. Ana weto raa ro ja mhar bo. Ana mbam ati ro ayõ maut mama snok mam
ro Yerusalem.
Ana mtu sas mawe, “Fnya mabe Ku sait ro meen yamo
raa mana ro Yahudi. Ait yhau mam woyõ? Amu nmat sken rAit snok mam ati ro ayõ maut. Tna amu nwe nma nbaut Ait fo.”
Raa ro Yerusalem mari feto tna mrok ktak sai. Tna fo
Herodes yari feto tna yrok ktak ye.
Ait ytu raa manes ro Yahudi mama siret beta: Ait ytu
manes wana msya
wana beta mama mo kʼait. Ana beta mama. Tna Herodes ytu sas kʼana yawe,
, ro Allah ysok re kbe yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa tait, kbe fnya mabe mam wore woyõ?”
Tna ana mawe, “Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe kbe fnya mabe Ait mam remo ro Betlehem,
ro Yudea. Reto mamyot bokom ro
ranu sait tiwya ykom:
‘Remo ro Betlehem mam

ro Yehuda to remo ro maku sau. Remo roto taro to maku ye. Menohe remo ro Betlehem to remo ro ati: Kbe mamo remo ro masom. Meen Raa sait fnya mabe mam Betlehem. Tna Ait yamo aban mana ro yase ybo raa ro Allah wAit. Meen Ait kmot raa ro Israel.’”
Mikha 5:1
Raa manes weto siret mkak. Tna fo Herodes yamo wai ytu raa
weto mama mo kʼait. Tna ait ytu sas kʼana yawe, “Tija oh mi anu nmat sken reto frok to?”
Tna fo Herodes ybis ana yawe, “Nsen nmoʼt Betlehem. Nmo ntu sas bo ro Ku retait kaket. Tna soh nkai Ait to, hah ne nma nwe kʼjõ iti afo re jõ tamo tna tbaut Ait ye.”
Ana mari bo ro

Herodes yawe kʼana tna masen mamo. Ana mamo tna mmat sken ro tiwya ana mmat mam ati ro ayõ maut. Sken reto mamo matim, tna ana kro mamo tis. Sken reto mamo mamo snok mam uu abyõ wore ro akut retait yhau.
Ati ro ana mmat sken reto to, ana simaut mase.
Ana mamoʼt amah reto tna twok mam mato. Ana mmat ku retait ysya yme Maria, tna ana maka mbaut Ait. Tna ana trah surah wiak wana beta tna moo bofan wana mafan Ku retait. Bo ro ana mafan to
msya
Tna Allah yinyam bo kʼana mkah bosmi yawe, “Hah ne nmo no
Herodes ma!” Tna ana mari feto tibyo hah me mamo iso roto mamo bana.
Raa ro
weto hah me mamo oh. Tna Yusuf yjin smi. Ait smi ymat
ro
sau mawe, “Nasen fooh! Tubat Ku retait nsam nsya yme nmoʼt
ro Mesir.
Herodes srau kair yawe yama saso ku retait yame. Namoʼt Mesir tna ste wea. Nhau mam beto mamo snok mam wore wo Jõ tbis anu nhah ne nma.”
Tibyo mti reto to, Yusuf yasen fooh, teta ku retait tna ysya yme msam mamoʼt Mesir.
Ana mamoʼt Mesir to, mhau mam beto mamo snok mam ti ro Herodes yhai. Ana mhar mawe Herodes yhai, tna ana hah me mamoʼt tabam rana. Ana mbam Mesir hah mama mnan si bo ro tiwya
ybis
rAit sait ykyas wia yawe,
“Jõ ttu Ku aJõ yama ybam Mesir.”
Hosea 11:1
Ati ro Herodes yhar he raa
weto sioh ait to, ait kmo toni. Tna ait ybis raa wait mamo mame ku mkek ro sme. Ybis ana mame ku sme ro mhau mam Betlehem msya remo ro mhau kait mam beto sor to, majat beta. Ait ynaut yawe tiwya raa
mama saso ku mkek sait ro
ewok mamo ti te fares. Feto Herodes ybis raa mame ku sme weto beta.
Bo reto mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yeremia ykyas wia yawe,
“Ku mkek mam rabin ro Rama to marak beta. Tibyo fnya ro mhau mam beto sraujin tna mawia. Rahel mawia ku mkek wau. Tna au hawe raa mama mkyas bokyas moof msya au afo re kbe au sorni sraujin rau reto.”
Yeremia 31:15
Yusuf ysya Maria mhau mam
Mesir fares tna
Herodes yhai. Ti sau Yusuf yjin smi ymat
ro
sau mama mawe kʼait mawe,
“Nasen oh! Tubat Ku retait tna ysya yme hah ne nmoʼt
ro Israel. Tiwya Herodes yawe yame Ku retait. Menohe Herodes yhai oh.”
Yusuf yrok yasen tubat Ku retait tna ysya yme hah me mamoʼt Israel.
Tna Yusuf yari he Arkhelaus yamo
mam
ro Yudea shauk yuk ro yaja Herodes. Feto tibyo Yusuf waa yamoʼt Yudea fee. Menohe
yerif bo kʼait mkah bosmi, tna ybis ait yamoʼt
ro Galilea.
Ait yamo yhau mam remo ro Nasaret. Yhau mam Nasaret to, mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mama mkyas wia mawe,
“Ait tait, kbe raa mtu mawe, ‘Ait raa ro Nasaret’ to.”
Yohanes ro ja
raa tait yamo ykyas bo ro Allah. Yamo yhau mam tabam ro riamo sau mam
ro Yudea. Ait ykyas yawe,
“Nashana fooh! Allah siwyan yamo
ytu raa wAit mama ybo fo.”
Yohanes oh mi tiwya
Yesaya ykyas wia yawe,
“Meen raa sait kbe yama ykyas bo woJõ mam yuk ro riamo sau. Ykyas yawe, ‘Mbetrot iso mkah
yama! Nisoh iso kʼAit!’”
Yesaya 40:3
Yohanes yyum ratan ro ja raa sne mbam
mawyan. Tna ykyar hotom ro mbam kak marak ye. Ja ait yabo mo msya yata kum maya ro mbam safom sai.
Tna raa mbam
ro Yerusalem, raa mbam remo makin mam
ro Yudea reto ye, msya raa makin ro mhau mam aya maam ro Yordan to, ana weto sor mama mo kʼYohanes.
Ana mama mo kʼAit tna mras iro wana. Tibyo Yohanes
ana mam aya ro Yordan reto.
Raa ro
msya raa ro
mawat mama mo kʼYohanes ye. Ana mawe ait
ana ye. Menohe ait yastako ana yawe, “Anu to, raa ro nmo wan-wan nfi aban kume!
Awya ykyas bo kʼanu yawe Allah kmo tna meen yno bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼanu? Awya ykyas feto tna re anu nhar nwe nsam nma saso riof kʼanu?
Nashana! Nno bo moof. Tna kbe raa mhar mawe anu nashana oh.

Soh anu nno feto to, anu nfi kake mara ro mros make mawat tna moof. Allah yatem ybo baam oh. Ait siwyan yfat ara. Kake mara ro make rau mkair to, kbe Ait yfat tna yoo beak mam tafoh makus mait. Anu ja nnaut nwe, ‘Amu fo kube ro Abraham wait renti. Feto to kbe Allah yno riof kʼamu fea!’ Menohe mfe; nnaut feto ma! Allah yatak haberek fraa wefo mamo kube renti ro Abraham wait ye!

Soh anu nno feto to, anu nfi kake mara ro mros make mawat tna moof. Allah yatem ybo baam oh. Ait siwyan yfat ara. Kake mara ro make rau mkair to, kbe Ait yfat tna yoo beak mam tafoh makus mait. Anu ja nnaut nwe, ‘Amu fo kube ro Abraham wait renti. Feto to kbe Allah yno riof kʼamu fea!’ Menohe mfe; nnaut feto ma! Allah yatak haberek fraa wefo mamo kube renti ro Abraham wait ye!
Jõ
anu mkah aya sai. ⌞Reto mawe anu nashana oh.⌟ Jõ tama wia tatim. Tna Ait ro yase yiwer jõ sait kbe yama yrof jõ. Jõ fi raa ro taku sai. Kbe tbo
ro yse yaa rAit to fee. Jõ toof mnan si fee. Ait yama to, meen
anu mkah Har ro
Tna Ait
anu mkah tafoh ye.”
Tna Yohanes yawe, “Ati ro raa sait ygi
rait to, ja ait yoo
makan rau yse hayah tna yoo marak rau to yse hayah ye. Tna
makan reto ybu mam
sau. Tna marak rau to, kbe yko mam tafoh. Tafoh reto raa mtai mikabuk fee.
tait siwyan re kbe yno bo mfi feto kʼraa ye.”
Yohanes yhau mam aya Yordan fares to, Yesus ybam
ro Galilea yama. Yesus yama yawe Yohanes
Ait ye.
Menohe Yohanes yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Jõ hawe
Nyõ. Nyõ raa ro nase. Jõ fi raa kinyah sai. Maami Nyõ
jõ menohe Nyõ nawe jõ te
Nyõ fyi?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Nnaut bo myum-yam ma. Nama sai
Jõ. Anu bno bo wefo mamo mnan si bo ro Allah ksoh beta oh meto.” Yohanes yari feto, tibyo
Yesus.
Yohanes
Yesus, tna Yesus frok ybam aya yaut. Frok si fo, ayoh twat. Tna Yesus ymat Har ro
haberek mnan fi ruu
sau. Ruu reto fru mama mroh abyõ kʼAit.
Tna raa mari mai sau mbam ayoh mawe, “Ait tait akut aJõ ro Jõ thafri. Ait tait, Jõ thaf mnan!”
Tna Har ro
yakah Yesus yamoʼt yuk ro riamo sau. Yamo re kbe kabes yabi (Iblis) yama sanet Ait.
Tna Yesus yhau bo yait ti trion 40 msya ayõ trion 40 ye. Tibyo yhai sre.
Tna kabes yabi ro ja sanet raa to yama sanet Ait yawe, “Soh Nyõ Ku ro Allah yare meto mi, sik nno fraa wefo haberek mamo
re Nyõ nait.”
Menohe Yesus yisboh kʼAit yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Raa taro mhau to, mnaut boit ro mait sai yoyo. Menohe ro moof to, raa mhau mnaut Watum ro Allah yoyo tna mbo mno.’”
Ulangan 8:3
Tna fo kabes yabi yakah Yesus yamoʼt
Yerusalem. (Ja raa mawe
reto to,
ro Allah rAit.) Ana mamoʼt Samu ro Allah tna kabes yabe yse Yesus yros abyõ mam timanaf rau, ro miyõ toni.
Tna yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Soh Nyõ fi Ku ro Allah yare meto mi, sik nitsre Nyõ mbtek namo nai mam tabam mte. Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Kbe Allah ybis
wAit swiõ wea huwya mfot Nyõ abyõ sai. Ana kbe mfot Nyõ abyõ sai mkah matem wana re naa mai mam fraa fee.’”
Mazmur 91:11-12
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe ye mawe,
Allah ro ja anu smot to, sanet Ait ma.’
Ulangan 6:16
Feto ye Jõ hawe kro bo ro nyõ nawe weto be kbe Jõ sanet Allah.”
Tna fo kabes yabi yakah Yesus yaut atu mana ro miyõ wer. Tna yerif
ro arin aso beta fo kʼAit. Tna yerif bo mase ro
weto kʼAit ymat ye.
Tna yawe, “Soh Nyõ naka mte nbaut jõ to, kbe too bo wefo beta tsan kʼNyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yisboh kabes yabi yawe, “Bo ro nyõ nawe reto to, Jõ hawe bo tno ye. Nasen namo! Bokom ro Allah mawe yum mawe:
‘Nbaut
Allah yesait aran, tna bo ro Ait yesait aran yawe to, nbo nno.’”
Ulangan 6:13
Tna kabes yabi yasen sikba Yesus akus yamo. Tna fo
baro mama matam Ait.
Yohanes, raa mfot mamo mbu mam
oh. Yesus yari feto, tibyo hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea.
Ait sikba remo ro Nasaret tna yamo yhau mam remo ro Kapernaum. Kapernaum mhau mam aya maam ro Galilea. Tiwya tinyi rabin reto tabam ro Zebulon ysya Naftali rana.
Yesus yhau mam rabin reto to, afo re yno mnan si bokyas ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya yama ykyas wia yawe,

“Tabam ro Zebulon ysya Naftali rana to, kene mam aya maam. Rabin reto to, mamo snok mam aya ro Yordan majoh to, ja raa mtu mawe rabin ro Galilea ye. Ana ro mhau mam rabin reto to, raa mana ro Yahudi fee.
Tiwya ana wase Allah. Ana mfi raa ro mhau mam amur yoyo sai. Tna ana mmat kek ro mase. Tna kek reto merif iso kʼraa ro mhau mam wore mamur to, re kbe ana masu mmat bo ye.”
Yesaya 8:23–9:1
Tna mam wore wo Yesus yamo yhau mam Kapernaum to, Ait yasen wosa yawe, “Nma fooh! Nashana! Allah siwyan yamo
tna re ybo anu. Ait ytu raa wAit mama fooh.”
Ati sau fo, Yesus yamo mam maru ro Galilea maam. Yamo tna ymat raa mabo ewok mse
rana mam maru mfot syoh. Ana mbewok ja makam maru. Sait yasom Simon-Petrus tna ysya yao Andreas.
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana mbewok yawe, “Nma kro Jõ. Kbe Jõ tbis anu nmo nfot raa.”
Ana mbewok mari feto, tibyo masen fooh sikba
wana makus. Tna mbewok kro Ait mamo.
Ana mamo tna mmat Yakobus ysya yao Yohanes. Ana bewok weto to ku ro bi Zebedeus wait. Ana mbewok msya maja rana hre mam wiak tna misoh
wana. Tna Yesus ytu ana mbewok mama kro Ait.
Ana mari si to, mbewok masen sikba maja rana ysya wiak rana akus tna kro Yesus mamo ye.
Tna Yesus yamo yur mam
ro Galilea beta. Yamo ykyas bo mam samu watum makin ro Yahudi. Ait wosa Bokyas ro Moof kʼana. Bokyas moof reto to, mkyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Tna Yesus yisoh raa ro kiyam moof beta ye. Tna ana ro ssafo fee; Ait yisoh tibyo ana metsu matak ye.
Bo ro Ait yno weto to, hahah mamo mur mtan mam

ro Siria beta. Tibyo raa makah raa ro mafa bo ro knik-knak sor mama mo kʼAit. Ana weto taro to kabes mbo, tna taro to kiyam ro ruu mber, taro to maa msya matem mhai ye. Ana ro kiyam wofo fo Ait yisoh tibyo mrok moof beta.
Ait yno bo weto tibyo raa mawat kro Ait. Raa weto sor to, taro mbam
ro Galilea, taro mbam rabin ro Dekapolis, taro mbam
ro Yerusalem, taro mbam
ro Yudea, tna taro ye mbam aya ro Yordan maam jaro ye.
Yesus ymat raa mawat. Feto tibyo Ait yaut yamoʼt faut mana sau. Ait hre tna kuber wAit
mama mo kʼAit.
Tna Yesus huwya watum ana yawe,
“Raa taro mhar mawe ana raa ro soso sai tna ana msam wai kʼAllah. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase. Ana oh mi raa mana ro Ait yamo
ybo.
Raa taro mnaut iro ro ana mno, tibyo sraujin toni. Kbe Allah yisoh ana mhaf tibyo mhau simaut mase.
Raa taro to mhaf sneh. Ana oh mi kbe mhau simaut mase. Kbe Allah ysan tabam refo kʼana.
Raa taro mhai sre msya mhai sbit mno bo ro Ait ksoh. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase ye. Kbe Ait yno ana mhaf mnan.
Raa taro ja matmof raa anya. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase ye. Kbe Allah yatmof ana.
Raa taro to mato mboh tna srau sau mno bo ro Ait ksoh yoyo. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase ye. Ana weto oh mi meen mmat Ait mam rabin rAit.
Raa taro ja makah iranya mama. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase ye. Kbe Allah ytu ana yawe ku wAit.
Raa taro ja mbo Watum rAit mno; tibyo raa roto sikowah ana. Ana kbe mhau simaut mase ye. Ana weto raa ro kbe Allah yamo
ybo to. Tna kbe mhau msya Ait mam sawro rAit ye.
Anu taro smot Jõ. Feto oh mi kbe raa mamus anu, tna mawe kair anu tna mno bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu bo to. Kbe anu weto nhau simaut mase ye.
Nnaut
na ro tiwya Allah ybis mkyas bo wAit to, nnaut nwe tiwya raa sikowah ana feto ye. Feto to, simaut mase sai. Meen Allah yoo boren ro mase mam sawro rAit tna yaren anu weto ye.”

Tna Yesus fret bo yawe, “Anu nfi haa kʼraa ro tabam refo beta. Haa to, ja mafah moof. Menohe mfi bo haa reto mafah fee; kbe raa mno fyi re kbe haberek mafah u? Mafer rau aro u fee. Haa reto raa moo mbeak mam iso. Tibyo raa ro mamo-me sor to, mber kait-kat sai.
Anu nfi kek ro mram raa ro tabam refo beta.
ro mhau abyõ mam faut mana to, ja raa mne mmat kek reto. Kbe raa beta mmat tu oh!
Feto ye, ja raa mbet tafoh
afo re ntara raa ro twok mam amah mato. Raa moo tafoh mse mte tna moo
burut wa fee. Tafoh reto to, ja raa hero abyõ afo re kbe kek ntara tna raa ro mama twok mam amah mato reto mmat bo.
Nno bo ro moof kʼraa. Nno feto afo re raa mmat bo moof ro anu nno tibyo ana mbaut Bja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tiwya Allah ybis Musa ysya
wAit mama mkom watum rAit. Tna Jõ tama re tbo tno bo ro Watum reto mbis. Tawe tno beta mnan si. Nnaut nwe Jõ tama re kbe beak Watum reto makus to ma.
Nri kaket: Mam wore wo ayoh msya tabam refo makyon rau sboh fefares to, Watum ro Musa reto kbe mabo beta tu oh. Watum reto to, maja rau sau ro maku to, kbe susre fee.
Feto to, niwana Watum reto maja ro maku sau to ma. Nkyas kʼraa roto to, nbis ana miwana Watum reto msya anu to ma. Awya ro yiwana Watum ro Musa feto kbe mamo raa ro mase mam wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to fee. Meen ait retait tait yaku kosion sai. Nbo Watum reto nno kaket. Tna nkyas kʼraa re ana mno kaket ye. Awya ro ybo Watum ro Musa matak feto, meen yase mam wore Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit.
Nri oh! Nnaut oh:
ro Yahudi msya raa ro
to, ana mno bo ro Allah ksoh kaket fee. Soh anu nno bo mamyot bo ana ja mno to, meen anu nmo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee. Soh anu nwe nmo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, nno bo ro Ait ksoh kaket.
Nri oh: Tiwya hohos na wanu mkyas Watum ro Musa kʼanu mawe:
‘Nme ajat ma.’
Keluaran 20:13
Awya ro yame ajat to, kbe raa mfot tna makah mamo mbu mam

Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Awya ro kmo raa roto to, kbe Allah ytu safo reto yari tu oh. Feto ye awya ro yawe kair raa roto yawe, ‘Namboi!’ to, kbe raa manes ro ja mtu srah ro Yahudi to, mtu srah reto mari ye. Tna awya ro yamus raa taro yawe, ‘Nyõ wase bo!’ to, kbe Allah yfot Ait beak yamo yait mam tafoh ro rabin kair ye.
Feto to, soh anu nbo bosan sau tna nmoʼt wohat
nwe nsan bo reto kʼAllah to, nnaut wia. Nmo tna anu nnaut bo ro tii anu nno mkair mai kʼraa roto to,
noo bosan reto nse bris agus wia. Tna fo nmo nisoh niranya nsya raa retait wia. Tna ne hah ne nmo noo bosan ranu riwai reto nsan kʼAllah.

Mfi bo anu sait nsya raa sait kmo anya. Tna anu mbewok kbe nmoʼt amah ro raa mtu srah. Rau ro moof to, anu mbewok nisoh niranya fooh, tna nfot ntem anya mam iso maka. Soh mfe to, kbe sait yamo ysan sait kʼraa manes re mkyas safo reto. Tna fo raa manes mbis anu nmo no kʼait ro ytu srah yari. Tna fo bi ait ysan anu renti kʼait ro ja ybu raa mam
mato.
Nri kaket: Kbe anu sait raa mbu mam
mato mamo snok mam ayõ ro ait hrat bo raa ska wia. Tna fo ait frok ybam
mato reto.
Anu nhar watum ro tiwya Musa ykyas kʼanu hohos na. Ait yawe:
‘Nwyah ma.’
Keluaran 20:14
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Awya sai ro ymat sas fnya re srau oot-oot to, ait retait ywyah ysya au reto mam yhaf mato oh meto.

Soh anu nsu makan ati ro tem ati misti re anu nno iro to, bo mkair. Ro moof to, tufrok nsu makan reto beak makus to. Soh anu nhau nkah nsu makan jaro mesait aran sai to, moof baro ye. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah nsu ro misti re anu nno iro to, kbe tis rau to anu fri kair sai. Kbe Allah tubat anu nkah netsu wanu, beak mam rabin ro arin kair reto

Tna soh anu ntem ati misti re anu nno iro to, mkair meto. Ro moof to, sbi ntem reto beak war makus. Soh anu nhau nkah ntem jaro mesait aran sai to, moof baro ye. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah ntem ro misti re nno iro to, kbe Allah ybis anu netsu beta nmoʼt rabin ro arin kair reto.
Anu nhar watum ro tiwya Musa ykyas kʼanu hohos na. Ait yawe:
‘Awya ro yako yfain makus to, yako hawe sai ait ykom aam sau yee kʼau mbo. Ykom yawe ait yako yfain.’
Ulangan 24:1-4

Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: ‘Soh fai sau mwyahte fee; yako hawe sai raa yako fai au makus to ma. Soh ait bitsre au makus to, ait retait mi yisti re au mwyahte ye. Tna raa ro yoo fai reto riryõn to, ait ywyahte ye.’
Anu nhar watum ro tiwya Musa ykyas kʼanu hohos na. Ait yawe:
‘Soh anu sait ytom Allah yasom afo re raa mhar mawe bo ro ait ykyas to, ait ykyas yaja bait oh, ykyas sioh fee; tna soh ait
bo ytom Allah yasom feto; yako hawe sai kbe ait yno bo reto tu oh.’
Imamat 19:12
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Soh anu
bo to, ntom Allah yasom ma! Allah hre abyõ mam sawro rAit tna ybo raa wAit. Feto to masi mawe anu
bo ntom sawro rAit ye. Allah hre ybo raa wAit mbam tno.
Feto ye
bo ntom tabam refo masom to ma: Allah tait ybo tabam refo ye. Tna
bo ntom
ro Yerusalem masom to ma: Yerusalem to
ro Yase ybo ye meto.
Tna
bo ntom nna to ma: Mfi bo anu nna mboh to, anu aro ntai ntak nno nna mawyan sau haberek mamo safe fee. Tna anu ntai nno ro safe sau haberek mamo mboh bo fee ye.
Ati ro anu nkyas bo to, nwe ‘Ae’ sai. Tna nwe ‘Mfe’ sai. Soh anu nkyas bo niwer to, reto mbam kabes yabi (Iblis) oh meto.
Anu nhar watum ro tiwya Musa ykyas kʼanu hohos na. Ait yawe:
‘Nsu ska nsu, tna nbait ska nbait ye.’
Keluaran 21:24
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Raa ro mawe mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to, nno wa ma. Soh raa miban natni ranu jaro to, haberek noo natni ro ati jaro nee kʼana miban ye.
Mfi raa sait yawe bomhaam wait mhau kʼnyõ. Soh ait yawe ytak ratan anyõ sau to, nee sai. Tna noo ratan anyõ roto taro ye niryõ nee kʼait.
Tna soh raa yama tna ybis anu nsom bo wait nmo iso
mara sau to, nno sai. Tna fo ne nsom soro nmo
mara sau naut.
Tna soh raa mayoh bo kʼanu to, noo nee sai. Feto ye soh raa mayoh bo kʼanu tna mawe kbe me misroh to, nee sai. Nbe ma.
Anu nhar watum ro tiwya Musa ykyas kʼanu hohos na. Ait yawe:
‘Nksoh raa ro mno bo moof kʼanu. Tna knait raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu to.’
Imamat 19:18
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Natmof raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu. Skabuk raa ro sikowah anu ye.

Nno feto afo re kbe anu nno bo mfi anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit to. Allah yno ayõ moo maut to, yno mkah raa ro ja mno bo mkair ye tna raa ro ja mno bo moof ye. Tna Allah yno oom mais to, yno mkah raa ro mno bo ro Ait ksoh ye tna mkah raa ro mno bo ro Ait knait ye.
Soh anu natmof raa ro ja matmof anu sai aran to, kbe Allah ymat tibyo yoo boren yaren anu aro fee. Raa ro ja moo namabyoh
to, ana ja matmof raa ro matmof ana feto ye.
Tna soh anu nmah meen kʼraa wanu mesait aran to, raa beta ja mno feto ye. Nno feto to, nyõ nno bo ro moof miwer ana oh meto fee. Ja raa ro wase Allah to, ana ja mno bo ro anu nno weto ye oh.
Feto to, nno bo ro moof mnan si, mfi anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit ja yno to.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Nno bo skabuk ranu mam wore wo raa mamo-me ma. Nno bo weto afo re raa mmat anu to ma. Soh anu nno bo moof afo re raa mmat anu sai, anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, kbe yoo bo aro yaren anu fee.

Feto to, soh anu nsan bo kʼraa ro suawe to, tawyõ anu kʼraa afo re ana mmat nyõ to ma. Raa ro sioh ana sai ja mno feto. Ana ja mno feto mam samu watum tna mam iso mabi afo re raa mmat ana tna bibi ana. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ana weto mkai boren wana beta oh.
Menohe anu fo, ati ro anu noo bo nee kʼraa to, nee shait banu sai afo re raa roto mhar to ma.
Natmof raa nfi feto afo re raa roto mhar bo ye ma. Nno feto tna anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit yesait aran yhar. Ait yesait aran yhar bo ro nyõ nno wai reto tna kbe Ait yisroh riryõn kʼanu.

Anu skabuk to, skabuk kaket. Raa ro ja sioh ana sai to, ja skabuk ye. Ana ja ksoh skabuk mam samu watum wanu. Tna ana skabuk mam iso mabi mbra ye. Ana mno feto afo re kbe raa mmat ana, tna bibi ana. Ana weto mkai boren wana oh. Meen Allah yoo boren rouu yaren ana aro fee. Anu to, skabuk mfi feto ma.
Soh anu nwe skabuk to, twok nmoʼt amah mato, tna nuut mato wa. Tna skabuk Nja ranu ro ja yhau wai. Tna kbe anu Nja ranu ymat bo anu skabuk wai feto, kbe yari anu ye.
Soh anu skabuk to, skabuk ntru nmo ne nfi raa ro wase Allah sai to ma. Bo skabuk rana to miyõ wer. Ana skabuk miyõ wer feto tna mnaut mawe reto oh mi kbe Allah yari.
Nno bo nnan fi ana mno feto ma. Anu nyoh bo fefares to, Nja ranu yhar bo ro anu nyoh weto oh.
Feto skabuk fefo:
Nyõ fi amu Nja ramu ro nhau mam sawro aNyõ. Nno re kbe raa mari tibyo bibi Nyõ nasom aNyõ.
Nasen namo
tna nama nbo raa woNyõ. Bo ro Nyõ ksoh to, ja raa mbo mno mam sawro aNyõ oh. Nno re raa ro mhau mam tabam refo mbo mno bo ro Nyõ ksoh mfi feto ye.
Ifo to, amu nyoh boit mbam kʼNyõ natem aNyõ re boit wamu to mabut fee.
Nyon iro wamu sor. Nyon iro wamu mnan fi amu nesait ne nhaf moof nsya raa anya ro mno bo ro mkair mai kʼamu ye.

Tna nakah amu namo mam wore wo bosanet aro besruf amu to ma. Nama nitsnok amu frok nbam wore wo mkair-kar. [Nyõ Allah ro nase. Nyõ natak nbo ayoh msya tabam refo. Kbe raa bibi Nyõ maban mfo refo mamo snok mam hame wajin ye.
: Mabo oh.]
Soh raa mno iro mai kʼanu to, nhau nhaf kair ma. Sorni bo mkair ro ana mno mai kʼanu weto sai. Ne nhaf moof u, tna kbe anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit tait, yatmof anu tna yyon iro wanu ye.
Menohe soh anu nhaf kair tna knait raa ro mno iro mai kʼanu to, kbe Nja yyon iro wanu fee ye.”

“Ti aro raa mhau bo mait afo re ana skabuk kaket. Soh anu nhau bo niit feto to, nno nsu wanu mkair nfi raa ro ja sioh ana sai mno to ma. Ana mno masu mkair afo re raa mhar mawe ana mhau bo mait. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe ana mkai boren wana beta oh. Kbe Allah yoo bo aro yaren ana fee.
Menohe soh anu nhau bo niit afo re skabuk to, nyon nsu wanu, tna shat nna
wanu ye.
Afo re raa aro wase bo anu nno nhau bo niit. Soh anu nno feto kbe anu Nja ranu ro yhau wai tait yesait aran yhar bo ro anu nno wai reto tna kbe Ait yoo boren yaren anu ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nme kta mam tabam refo ma, kbe bo mabat, hesik mait, tna raa mama mitrah amah msyõf kta wanu weto, makah mamo ye.
Menohe nme kta wanu mam sawro ro Allah rAit wea. Mam sawro reto kbe bo mabat fee, hesik mait fee, tna raa ro mama msyõf bo to marak ye.
Soh anu nme kta wanu mam tabam refo fo, kbe nhaf wanu mnaut kta weto sai. Menohe soh anu nme kta wanu mam sawro ro Allah to, kbe anu nhaf nnaut sawro rAit yoyo ye.
Anu nsu wanu to, mfi
ro ntara anu oh meto. Soh nsu moof to, mno netsu wanu mram. Tibyo nsu maah ye. Soh anu nri watum tna nbo nno to, anu nmo mam kek reto yoyo oh meto.
Menohe soh anu nri tna nbo nno fee; kbe anu nfi raa ro masu mti. Kbe anu nhau mam mamur sai. Tna soh anu nmo mam wore wo mamur to, feto kbe mamur reto to, mrok mamur htoh toni.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Ja sryan sait yno bo ro bobot sait aran sai. Ait yno bo ro bobot mabo ewok brio-brio to fee. Kbe ait knait bi ait sait tna ksoh bi ait sait. Kbe ait yari bo ro bobot sait yawe, tna yiwana bo ro bobot sait yawe. Feto to tawe kʼanu tawe: Nno bo ro Allah wAit sai aran. Saso kta ro tabam refo ye ma. Anu raa ntai nkro iso ewok weto su fee.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto to, Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Nnaut yyi bo ro tabam refo toni to ma. Nnaut nfos wanu to, nnaut nwe nfos wanu to bo ro ati. Tna nnaut yyi boit ro kbe anu niit to ma. Nnaut netsu wanu to, nwe bo ro ati to ma. Tna nnaut yyi ratan ro kbe anu nyum to ma.
Sik nmat ruu ro mfru mam ayoh to. Ruu to ja wase bo mkah. Tna wase bo siwyan boit ye. Tna wase sgi
ro moo boit mse ye. Menohe anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit tait, Ait siwyan boit kʼana mait. Tna anu raa fo, Ait ymat anu kaket miwer ruu to.

Awya ro ytai yirenti yamos rait kebet naut? Anu nkin wefo fo, soh anu naut yyi bo ro tabam refo yoyo to, reto mafer marak. Allah oh mi Raa ro ybo anu nmos wanu. Allah yesait aran ytai yirenti raa mamos wana.

Tna bawya mno re anu nnaut yyi ratan ro nyum to. Sik nmat sas bosafom ro moo mam smok. Tafuf wau weto mesait moo sai. Tafuf weto mur-mur saso boit fee. Bosafom ja msui mfen ratan ro myum to fee. Menohe Allah yno bo weto moof toni.
Tiwya
Salomo yyum ratan ro moof wer. Menohe Allah yno tafuf weto moof toni miwer.
Salomo, ratan rait moof mfi bosafom tafuf wau to fee.

Allah yno re bosafom ro moo mam smok ifo moo boti waor sai. Menrabu to, raa mama mkah mkak. Mhau boti waor sai, menohe Allah fayir bosafom reto. Ait yno tafuf rau moof toni. Tawe, Allah ymat anu tna ksoh anu toni miwer bosafom reto. Feto to nnaut yyi ratan ro anu nyum to ma. Anu ja smot Allah matak fee!
Nnaut yyi bombra weto ma! Ja raa mawe: Bo ro anu niit msya aya ro nta bo to au miyo? Tna msya ratan bo ro anu nyum bo to au miyo? Nnaut yyi feto ma.

Raa ro wase Allah mam tabam refo to, ana weto msui saso bo weto beta. Menohe anu fo, Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit yhar yoo boit yee kʼanu. Tna yhar bo yoo ratan yee kʼraa wAit ye. Yhar bombra weto beta.
Feto to, ntomer re nmo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo. Ntomer nno bo ro Ait ksoh. Saso bi Ait wia matim feto, tibyo kbe Allah yoo bo weto beta ysan kʼanu.
Feto to, nnaut yyi bo ro menrabu btek mai kʼanu to ma. Bo ro menrabu to, Allah yhar oh. Bo ro samyoh mam ti sau to maum oh mam ti reto.”
“Nmat sas raa roto ma. Nnaut nwe raa roto mno bo ro mkair ma. Nhau nnaut feto ma be kbe Allah haberek ymat sas anu si, yawe anu weto nno bo mkair ye meto.

Bo maja ro anu nbo nwe raa roto mno bo mkair to, kbe Allah haberek bo maja reto yawe anu to nno bo mkair ye. Tna bo maja ro anu nbo nnit bo ro raa roto mno to, kbe Allah haberek ybo bo maja reto ynit bo ro anu nno to ye.

Soh raa wanu sait yno bo ro mkair kebet baro sai to, reto mnan fi knuf ro maku mhau kʼait yasu. Anu nmat sas ait. Menohe knuf ro maboh mhau kʼanu nsu. Feto to anu nahni bo ro mkair-kar mase ja anu nesait nno.
Fyi re anu nwe kʼait nwe, ‘Nama, jõ tmen knuf ro maku kʼnyo nasu mato to.’ Ja anu nesait nmat knuf ro mhau kʼanu nsu mato wanu fee!
Sioh anu to ma! Nisoh anu wia. Tna kbe nsu maah re kbe nmen knuf kʼait yasu mato to.”
“Bo ro moof toni to, noo beak mtah mait to ma; be kbe haberek mafit anu. Noo haban
ro mabyoh maut toni to, beak fane mait to ma; kbe fane mau maut mber kait-kat makus.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nyoh bo tna kbe Allah yoo bo yee. Saso bo tna kbe anu ntru bo reto. Nii mato tna kbe mato reto Allah yitrah.
Awya sai ro yayoh bo kʼAllah to, kbe Allah yoo yee. Awya sai ro saso bo to, kbe tru tu oh. Tna ro yai mato to, kbe Allah yitrah mato reto ye oh.
Mfi bo ku wanu sait yhai sre yawia boit yait to, kbe yaja yasen yoo fraa yee ku rait yait fee.
Mfi bo ku sait yawia yabo syoh to, kbe yaja yoo aban yee fee.

Anu raa to nimara mboh. Menohe anu nksoh noo bo ro moof nee ku wanu. Tna Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, ksoh yoo bo ro moof toni yee kʼanu ye. Soh raa mayoh bo kʼAit to, kbe Ait ksoh yoo bo reto yee kʼana ye fea!”
“Bo bawya sai ro anu ksoh nwe raa mno kʼanu to, nno mfi feto kʼana ye. Watum ro tiwya Musa ysya
na mkom to, mabo rau oh meto.
Mato sau ro mtit mhau. Ntomer ntwok mam mato ro mtit reto. Ntwok mam mato ro meya ma. Nmo mam iso mabi ma. Iso ro mabi reto to, iso ro rabin kair. Tna raa msis-sas kro iso reto.
Menohe iso ro mamos mae to mtit. Tna mato rau to maku toni ye. Raa ro bito kro iso tna ntwok mam mato reto to kebet baro sai.”
“Kaket anu: Kbe raa mama sioh mawe, ‘Amu fo, Allah ybis nmo
wAit. Amu ja nkyas bo wAit.’ He mfe. Ana weto, wan-wan mno bo moof mfi
Menohe ana ja safo mfi mtah
ye meto.
Nmat sas bo ro ana weto ja mno. Tna kbe anu nmat he ana mno bo ro mkair-kar. Feto kbe anu nhar nwe raa weto mbam kʼAllah fee. Raa taro mfi ara ro moof. Tna raa taro to, mfi abumun sai. Ja raa mryoh
make mbam abumun mara fee. Tna ja raa mryoh kake ro moof mbam hyoh muuf bo fee ye.
Ara ro mara moof to, kbe make rau to moof yum. Tna kake mara ro moo kaket fee, kbe make rau to mkair ye.
Ara ro mara moof to, ja make rau to mkair fee. Feto ye ara ro mara mkair to, kbe make rau to moof fee ye.
Tna kake mara ro mse make moof kaket fee, kbe raa mfat mkah war to.
Feto ye mkah ana ro sioh mawe ana
ro Allah. Ana mawe Allah ybis ana makah watum rAit mama mkyas. He mfe, soh anu nmat sas bo mafer ro ana mno to, kbe anu nhar nwe ana mbam Allah mama fe mfe a.
Raa ja mkyas bo kʼJõ tna mtom Jõ tasom mawe Jõ fi
rana. Menohe ana weto taro mamo raa woJõ fee. Ana kbe mamo raa ro Allah ybo yfi
fee. Jõ Taja yhau mam sawro rAit. Tna raa ro ja mno bo ro Ait ksoh sai oh mi kbe mamo raa wAit to.
Meen mam ati ro Allah ysok raa ro mamo raa mana rAit to, kbe raa msis-sas mama mtu kʼJõ mawe,
tiwya amu oh mi nkah natak aNyõ nkah soo ro Allah nmo nkyas kʼraa sor. Tna amu nkah natak aNyõ ye nikyak kabes sor. Tna amu nno bo ro msai mawat taro sor mkah Nyõ natak aNyõ ye.’
Menohe ati reto to, Jõ titbat tawe kʼana abyõ tawe, ‘Jõ wase anu saut! Anu raa ro ja nno bo kbik-kbak sai meto. Nmo fari tno!’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa taro mari bo ro Jõ tkyas refo tna kbe mbo mno kaket. Ana weto mfi raa sait ro ja yhar bo sgi amah rait abyõ mam fraa to.
Ait sgi abyõ mam fraa to, tibyo amah rait matu fee. Oom mais mos, syar miyi mama, tna oof ye frok mama mfi to, menohe amah rait reto mros matak; matu fee.
Raa taro mari bo ro Jõ tkyas refo tna mbo mno fee. Ana weto mfi raa sait ro ja wase bo. Ait retait sgi amah rait abyõ mam snyik mana.
Oom mais mos, syar miyi mama, tna oof ye frok mama mfi amah reto to, tibyo amah reto matu mai tabam.”
Yesus ykyas watum reto matak toni. Menohe
ro Yahudi to, ja bokyas wana matak kaket fee. Yesus watum bo mkak. Tibyo raa ro mari bokyas rAit reto mrok ktak beta.
Yesus ykyas watum reto matak toni. Menohe
ro Yahudi to, ja bokyas wana matak kaket fee. Yesus watum bo mkak. Tibyo raa ro mari bokyas rAit reto mrok ktak beta.
Yesus yroh ybam faut mana si fo, tibyo raa makin mjor mama kro Ait.
Mam weto ye ait ro yafa
sait yama. Yama tna yjit yimna soh-soh kʼAit yawe, “Bobot, soh Nyõ ksoh meto mi, nisoh jõ re
refo marak.”
Tna Yesus yatem ybo ait tna yawe, “Jõ ksoh, tawe nyõ mbros oh!” Ayõ reto si fo,
reto mrok marak.
Tna Yesus yawe wa kʼait yawe, “Namo to, nkyas bo refo kʼraa ma. Namo nerif narak anyõ
ro Yahudi sait re ait ymat sas nyõ. Nyõ noof u tibyo noo bo nee
. Tna kbe ait ysan bo reto kʼAllah mamyot Watum ro Musa ykom yawe. Nno bo weto re kbe raa mhar mawe nyõ netsu moof u.”
Tna Yesus yamo snok mam remo ro Kapernaum. Tna raa sbe ro yase sait yama yo kʼAit. Raa sbe retait yamo aban mana ro ja ybo raa sbe ro Roma majin sau. Ait soh-soh Yesus yawe,
“Bobot; sryan ajõ kiyam msai yhau mam amah. Tna kiyam reto mno tibyo ait yaa msya yatem yhai. Tibyo yakus yjin sai mam aam meu.”
Yesus yari feto tna yawe, “Jõ kbe tama tisoh ait re yoof.”

Menohe aban mana ro sbe retait yawe, “Bobot, jõ fi raa ro ati fee tna Nyõ fi raa ro nase toni. Feto to tawe namo twok mam amah ajõ to ma. Naban nawe sai mam wefo tna kbe sryan ajõ retait kiyam rait marak.

Jõ thar tawe raa kinyah ja mari bo kʼraa mase ro mbo ana. Jõ tesait ja tari bo kʼraa ro mase woJõ ye. Tna raa sbe ro kinyah ja mari bo ro jõ tawe ye. Soh jõ tbis bo kʼraa sbe sait to, kbe ait yari tna yasen yamo tu oh. Tna soh jõ ttu raa sbe taro sait tawe yama to, kbe ait yasen yama ye. Tna soh jõ tbis bo kʼsryan ajõ tawe, ‘Nno bo reto.’ Kbe ait yari ybo yno tu oh! Tna Nyõ to nase toni niwrek jõ ye. Soh Nyõ nawe kiyam marak to, kiyam reto mari tibyo marak tu oh.”
Yesus yari bokyas rait reto tna yrok ktak. Raa mawat kro Ait mamo to, tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Ja raa ro mhau mam tabam ro Israel fo, bosmot wana matak fee. Menohe Ait refi bosmot rait matak toni!”
Tna Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, meen raa srim msis-sas mama mbam arin aso beta. Mama hre su msya Abraham, Ishak, ysya Yakub ye. Hre sohmaam bo su mam wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa wAit to.

Tiwya tinyi Allah ymen raa ro Yahudi mawat mamo raa mana ro Ait ybo reto. He mfe, ana hawe bo mama. Meen Allah yikyak ana mhau bana mne mam wore wo mamur htoh toni. Mam wore reto to, kbe ana sraujin ana toni. Tibyo ana kbe mawia tna kakyah toni ye.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼbi yabi ro sbe retait yawe, “Hah ne namo oh, kbe sryan anyõ yoof mnan si bosmot anyõ ye oh.” Weto si oh to, sryan retait yrok yoof.
Tna Yesus yamo twok mam samu ro Petrus. Twok tna ymat Petrus snyim ro ano mjin sai. Au metsu mbe.
Yesus yamo ybo fai au matem. Tibyo kiyam reto mrok marak. Tna fai au masen saruk boit mee kʼana mait.

Tna mam wore arin knu-knu fo, raa mawat mama mo kʼYesus. Mama to, makah raa ro kabes mbo mawat ye. Tna Yesus yikyak kabes weto mkah ymai sau sai fo, tibyo kabes weto frok mamo. Tna raa ro kiyam weto beta to, kiyam wana marak ye.
Yesus yisoh raa feto to, afo re yno mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya yama ykyas wia. Yesaya ykyas yawe,
“Anu ro ssafo fee, Ait yisoh re boof. Tna anu ro kiyam bo to, Ait yisoh re boof ye.”
Yesaya 53:4
Tna Yesus ymat he raa msis-sas mama mros mur mtan kʼAit. Tibyo Ait ybis kuber wAit maut wiak msya Ait afo re ana frit mamoʼt maru reto ati tino.
Tna
ro Yahudi sait yama yo kʼAit. Yama tna ytu yawe, “Bi
woyõ-woya sai Nyõ namo to, jõ ksoh kro Nyõ bmo ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait retait yawe, “Mtah
to, ja mabum mam wafyoh rau. Tna ruu to, ja mabum mam tafat wana ye. Menohe Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna samu ro Jõ tjin aro fee. ⌞Soh nyõ nawe kro Jõ to, kbe wore nyõ njin aro fee ye.⌟”
Tna kuber wAit sait yawe kʼAit yawe,
nbis jõ tamo wia sama hai ro taja tna fo tama kro Nyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yawe si yawe, “Namo ma. Ana ro wase Allah to, kbe mesait sama hai wana rof. Menohe nyõ to, kro Jõ bmo.”
Yesus yaut wiak sau, tna kuber wAit kro maut ye.
Ana mamo mamo tna foos ro msai frok tubor mama mai wiak rana. Tna figyõm mase mai maut mam wiak mato ye tna mabo kait ana beta. Menohe Yesus yjin tu bait mam wiak mato.
Tibyo kuber wAit mti Ait mawe,
natmof anu be kbe anu bsu fo.”
Yesus yrok yasen tna yastako ana yawe, “Bosmot wanu matak fee! Anu waa bo bawya mefo?” Feto tibyo Ait yifau foos msya figyõm weto. Tibyo maru reto mrok mnem.
Yesus yno feto tibyo ana weto mrok ktak sai, tna mawe kʼanya mawe, “Bi Ait refi yatak yifau foos msya figyõm wefo mari. Bi Ait refi fi raa fe bawya mefi?”

Yesus ysya kuber wAit frit maru reto snok mam rabin ro Gadara. Mam weto to, raa mabo ewok ro kabes mbo fo mama mo kʼYesus. Ana mbewok mama mbam isra mato ro ja raa mse hai to, mama. Mbewok reto ja safo toni. Tibyo raa sait bo ter-ter yamo kait mam iso ro ana mhau reto fee ye.
Mbewok mama tna kakyah mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Ku ro Allah yare fi; Nyõ nama nno bawya kʼamu fo? Nyõ nama sikowah amu a? Makyon ro Nyõ sikowah amu to, mama fefares!”
Kene msya yuk reto ye fane mawat mau bana.
Tna kabes weto soh-soh kʼYesus mawe, “Soh Nyõ nbis amu nawe frok nmo meto mi, nbis amu nmo twok mam fane wore wono!”
Tna Yesus ybis yawe, “Nmo oh!” Tna kabes weto mari tna frok mamo twok mam fane weto. Tna fane weto mrok mker tna mhoh tbat mam rakak reto btek mam maru. Tna fane weto msu tibyo mhai beta mkak.
Raa ro kmot fane weto mmat bo ro Yesus yno. Feto tibyo ana masen fooh mhoh mamo mkyas kʼraa mam remo rana. Tna mkyas ana mbewok ro kabes mbo to ye.
Raa ro mhau mam remo reto mari bo weto, tibyo ana beta mama mo kʼYesus. Mama tna misobu Ait mawe Ait yasen yamo fooh sikba rabin rana.
Yesus yno bo weto mkak tna fo ye yaut wiak frit yamoʼt remo rAit.

Mam weto to, ait ro yaa mhai sait yjin mam sesa sai. Yjin mam sesa tna raa nkatar ait makah mama mo kʼYesus. Yesus ymat ana tna yhar yawe ana smot Ait matak. Tibyo Yesus yawe kʼait ro yaa mhai retait yawe, “Tao, sraujin ma! Iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.”
Yahudi baro hre mam weto ye. Ana mari bo ro Yesus yawe feto tna mnaut mawe, “Bo ro Ait yawe to berasi Allah! Ja Allah yesait aran ytai yyon iro.”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mnaut mam srau mato wana. Tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu nnaut bo ro mkair weto mam srau mato wanu?

Soh Jõ tawe kʼait refi tawe ‘Iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.’ Bo ro msai fee: Kbe raa mahni bo reto mabo fe mfe a. Menohe tawe, ‘Nasen namo oh!’ Tawe feto afo re kbe raa mmat bo reto mabo. Mmat tna mhar mawe Jõ ttai tno bo ewok ye to. Ewok ye mnan-nan kʼJõ.

Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna bo ro Jõ tno fo, Jõ tno re kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ tatak tyon iro raa mam tabam refo.” Tna Yesus yawe kʼAit ro yaa mhai retait yawe, “Nasen, tubat sese anyõ, tna nasom namo bonyõ!”
Tibyo ait yasen yros kaket tna yamo bait amah rait.
Raa makin ro mmat bo ro Yesus yno reto to, mrok miskawowo. Tibyo ana mbaut Allah ro yoo yatak rAit yee kʼraa to.
Yesus sikba yuk reto yamo. Yamo to, ymat raa ro ja yoo namabyoh
yee
ro Roma sait. Yasom Matius. Bi ait hre mam
ro namabyoh rait. Tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nama kro Jõ bmo!” Matius yari feto, tibyo ait yasen kro Yesus mamo.
Ti sau Yesus ysya kuber wAit mait boit mam amah ro bi Matius. Tna raa ro ja moo namabyoh msya raa ro ja mno iro bo mawat mama mait boit su msya ana ye.
Raa ro
mmat ana mait bo su feto, tibyo mtu bo kuber ro Yesus wAit. Ana mtu mawe, “Fyi re
ranu yait boit su ysya raa ro moo namabyoh tna msya raa ro ja mno iro weto?”
Yesus yari bo ro ana mawe feto, tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro metsu moof ja mamo saso
fee. Ja raa ro kiyam oh mi mamo saso
to.
Nsen nmo nmat sas bo ro Allah yawe mam bokom rAit yawe,
‘Anu noo bo wanu taro nsan kʼJõ to, reto moof. Menohe jõ ksoh tawe anu natmof raa anya; reto moof toni.’
Hosea 6:6
Jõ tama ttu raa ro mhaf moof to fee. Tama fo ttu raa ro mno iro.”
Kuber ro Yohanes mama mo kʼYesus tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Fyi re amu nsya raa ro
ja nhau bo niit. Menohe kuber woNyõ mhau bo mait to fee?”

Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Ati ro raa sait ymen fnya to, ja raa mno bo bawya? Ana mhau bo ro mait fe mfe a? Mfe! Ana makyõ bokyõ fea! Ana makyõ bokyõ wia. Tna fo raa moo ait makah mamo. Tna kbe mafoh wana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait. Kuber woJõ mfi feto ye. Jõ thau tsya ana fares fo, ana sraujin fee. Menohe ati ro Jõ sikba ana to, kbe ana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait ye.”

Tna Yesus ykyas bofret ewok naut kʼana yawe, “Mfi bo ratan matah ro hri-hra sau. Ja fnya maru ratan reto mkah hawee ftah mabuf ro tna to fee. Soh au mtin feto to, kbe tis mkair. Kbe hawee ftah mabuf reto mno tibyo ratan reto mrok mhah renti. Feto ye iso bose raa mabi ro Yahudi ja mamo to hayah. Tna iso tna ro Jõ terif refo fo hayah ye. Tna iso ewok reto srioh anya ye fee.
Feto ye, Ja raa mror
maya ro tna mam baah marak ro matah fee. Kbe
maya reto mno baah marak reto matu mbua. Tna kbe
maya reto maus miyi mroh mamo mkak.
maya ro tna to, ja raa moo mror mam baah marak ro tna sai. Tna re
maya reto msya baah reto bewok kbe mhau moof to.”
Yesus ykyas bo fares tna bi yabi sait yama yo kʼYesus. Ait yaka hartu Yesus, tna yawe, “Ku ajõ ro ano sau tna sai mhai oh. Nama noo natem niir ku au afo re au mrok masen.”
Yesus yari feto, tibyo yasen ysya kuber wAit kro bi ait retait mamo.
Ana mamo kri-kri fo, fai sau mama. Fai au mafa mees ro fnya yoyo
trion 12 oh. Fai au mnaut bau mam srau mato mawe, “Soh jõ trof tiir ratan rAit baro sai to, kbe kiyam ajõ refo marak.” Feto tibyo au nto miir ratan ro Yesus rAit makit.
Ana mamo kri-kri fo, fai sau mama. Fai au mafa mees ro fnya yoyo
trion 12 oh. Fai au mnaut bau mam srau mato mawe, “Soh jõ trof tiir ratan rAit baro sai to, kbe kiyam ajõ refo marak.” Feto tibyo au nto miir ratan ro Yesus rAit makit.
Yesus haberek ymat fai au. Tna yawe kʼau yawe, “Ku aJõ, sraujin ma; nyõ smot Jõ tibyo kiyam anyõ reto marak.” Feto si fo, kiyam rau marak.
Tna Yesus yamo snok mam amah ro bi yabi retait. Ait ymat raa ro mfi oor msya raa msis-sas ro mawia tna mmai wer mam beto.
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Frok nmo oh. Ku au reto mhai fee. Au mjin sai meto.” Menohe raa weto masah Ait sai.
Raa weto frok tna Yesus twok yamoʼt amah hawar ro ku au refo mriyor. Ait ybo ku au matem, tibyo ku au masen mros.
Bo ro Yesus yno reto raa mkyas hahah mamo snok mam rabin reto beta.
Yesus yasen yamo renti naut. Tna raa ro masu mboh mabo ewok kro Ait mam tis. Ana mtu mawe, “Yesus; Ku ro Daud
, natmof amu!”

Yesus yamo twok mam amah sau tna ana mbewok ro masu mboh reto mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu mbewok nnaut nwe Jõ tatak tno anu nsu maah fe mfe a?” Tna ana mawe kʼAit mawe, “Ae, bi Yabi, amu smot Nyõ. Amu nhar nwe Nyõ fi Raa ro natak.”
Tna Yesus yiir ana mbewok masu, tna yawe, “Anu nsu maah mamo mamyot si bosmot ranu oh.”
Tibyo ana mbewok reto mrok masu maah. Tna Yesus yawe wa kʼana yawe, “Nmo nkyas bo ro Jõ tno kʼanu reto kʼraa roto ma!”
Menohe ana mbewok frok mamo mkyas Ait yasom faram mam rabin reto beta ye.
Ana mbewok ro masu mboh reto frok mamo. Tna raa makah ait ro kabes mbo sait mama mo kʼYesus. Kabes mbo ait retait tibyo ymai marak sai.
Yesus yikyak kabes reto. Tibyo ait retait yrok ymai. Raa makin ro mmat bo ro Yesus yno reto mrok ktak tna mawe kʼanya mawe, “Anu ja bmat bo ro mnan fefo aro mam Israel fee.”
Menohe raa ro
baro mawe, “Kabes yabi (Iblis) oh mi yoo yatak rait yee kʼYesus re Ait yatak yikyak kabes sor to.”
Tna Yesus yamo yur mam
makin msya remo makin beta ye. Ait yamo iti to, Ait watum raa ro Yahudi mam samu watum wana ro mhau mam beto sor. Tna Ait wosa Bokyas ro Moof
kʼana ye. Bokyas moof reto to, mkyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Tna Yesus yisoh raa ro kiyam tibyo kiyam rana marak beta ye. Tna ana ro ssafo fee beta to, Ait yisoh tibyo ana matak ye.
Tna Yesus ymat raa makin weto yawe bo msuweni-wana mfi
ro mhau akus. Raa ro kmot ana aro fee. Tibyo Ait yatmof ana.
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Raa makin weto mfi bo armato ro manes oh. Menohe raa ro matu bo to, mabo kebet baro sai; mnan fee.
Feto to, nyoh kʼAllah ro armato rAit afo re Ait ybis raa mama matu bo mam armato reto.”

Ati sau to, Yesus ytu kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait yoo yatak rAit yee kʼana re kbe ana mikyak kabes sor, tna misoh raa ro kiyam tna mafa bo sor, re kbe mrok moof ye, tna misoh raa ro ssafo fee to, mrok matak beta ye.
Raabis
mabo 12 reto masom wana sor to mefo: Ait ro tinyi tait yasom Simon-Petrus, ysya yao Andreas. Tna Yakobus ysya yao Yohanes. Ana mbewok to ku ro bi Zebedeus yare.
Tna Filipus, Bartolomeus, Tomas, tna Matius ro ja yoo namabyoh
Yakobus ro Alfeus yare ysya Tadeus.
Tna Simon raa ro
. Tna Yudas ro besruf Yesus.
Yesus ybis kuber wAit mabo 12 reto yawe, “Nmo no kʼraa mana ro Israel
sai. Nmoʼt
raa ro Samaria ma. Nmo nkyas kʼraa mana roto ma.
Nmo no kʼraa ro Israel mesait aran sai. Ana to, raa ro mamo tit mfi
ro mamo tit tna raa ro kmot ana marak.
Nkyas kʼana nwe, ‘Allah siwyan yamo
. Ait ytu raa wAit mama tna Ait ybo ana.’
Tna nisoh kiyam rana. Nno re raa ro mhai mrok masen ye. Nisoh raa ro mafa
afo re ana moof ye. Tna nikyak kabes frok mbam raa ro kabes mbo to ye. Jõ too tatak aJõ tee sai kʼanu. Nayoh nwe raa moo bo mee si kʼanu ma. Nmo nno bo weto mkah nhaf ro ase sai.
Nmo to, nfau pitis msya ratan mam yu wanu ma. Tna nse
bo to ma ye. Tna nbo armuk trion ewok ma. Nnaut: Raa ro mkah kahren raa to, kbe raa moo boren maren ana tu oh.
Nmo to, nfau pitis msya ratan mam yu wanu ma. Tna nse
bo to ma ye. Tna nbo armuk trion ewok ma. Nnaut: Raa ro mkah kahren raa to, kbe raa moo boren maren ana tu oh.
Nmo snok mam
msya remo. Tna saso raa ro yhaf moof sait, re ait yse anu njin mam amah rait. Tna nhau nsya ait mamo snok mam wore anu nsen sikba remo reto.
Anu nmo twok mam amah raa to, nmah meen kʼana wia.
Tna soh raa ro amah reto mhaf moof tna re huwya moo anu mse mam amah rana to, skabuk raa weto nwe Allah yno bo moof kʼana. Soh ana mikyak anu to, skabuk feto ma.

Soh anu twok mam remo taro tna raa mitrah amah wana kʼanu fee; tna soh raa hawe mari bokyas ro anu nkyas to, ati ro anu sikba amah reto msya remo reto nmo to, bes-bas bohasyaf ro mhau mam naa to akus sai.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Meen ati ro tabam refo haberek to, kbe Allah ymat raa ro tiwya mhau mam
ro Sodom msya Gomora tna yno bo ro maku sai mbtek mai kʼana. Menohe raa ro remo taro tii mikyak anu. Ana hawe bo mari bokyas aJõ. Tibyo bo ro meen mbtek mai kʼana weto to, kbe samyoh toni.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri oh. Anu fo raa ro nhaf sneh. Tna Jõ tbis anu nmo mam remo aro sor. Tna kbe anu nkai raa ro mkair-kar. Anu nfi
ro mamo mam wore wo mtah
ja mhau. Nmo to, kaket anu nfi aban. Tna nhau nhaf moof yoyo ye, mfi ruu
Siwyan anu be kbe raa mno anu. Kbe raa wanu ro
Yahudi mfot anu makah mamo msan kʼraa manes wana. Tna kbe ana sikowah anu mam samu watum wana ye.
Anu fo kuber woJõ. Au oh mi kbe raa mfot anu makah mamo msan
taro msya
na taro sor ye. Bo mkair weto meen mai kʼanu. Menohe mafer rau ro tis to moof. Jõ bitsre bo reto mai kʼanu afo re kbe anu nkyas Jõ tasom kʼraa ro mase weto ye, msya raa wana makin ro wase Allah ye.

Meen raa mfot anu, makah mamo msan kʼraa weto. Tna kbe raa manes mtu srah wanu. Menohe wa ma. Nnaut yyi bo ro kbe anu nkyas to ma. Kbe Allah besi bokyas moof kʼanu. Kbe Ait besi bokyas rAit tna anu ne nawe si bokyas reto kʼana.
Anu nesait kar oh mi nkyas bo mam weto fee. Kbe Har ro Nja Allah oh mi besi bo ro anu nkyas to.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu to, meen raa msan anu kʼraa mame. Tna raa msan mao na kʼraa mame. Tna bi sait kbe ysan kukek wait ye. Kukek na kbe masen mafa msya maja wana ye. Tna msan maja wana kʼraa mame ye.
Anu ro kro Jõ fo, kbe raa beta knait anu. Menohe awya ro bito kro Jõ snok mam tis rau to, kbe ait retait ykai riof ro mase.
Ati ro raa sikowah anu mam remo sau to, nsam nmoʼt remo roto taro. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Jõ fi “Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai”.’ Kbe anu nmo nur ntan mam
makin ro Israel. Nmo mkak fefares to, kbe Jõ tama.
Kuber sait ja yase yiwer
rait fee. Tna sryan sait ja yase yiwer bobot rait fee ye.
Soh kuber sait yawe yasen ynan

rait to, mnan oh. Feto ye soh sryan sait yawe yasen ynan bobot rait to, mnan ye oh. Jõ tfi raa yabi ro yno bo moof sait. Tna Jõ tase tbo raa ro mhau mam amah aJõ. Menohe raa baro sioh mawe Jõ tasom Beelzebul.
Raa sioh mawe Jõ tfi kabes yabi (Iblis). Anu nfi ku woJõ. Feto kbe meen raa sioh mawe anu nfi kabes yabi ye.

Waa raa weto ma. Soh raa mno bo ro mkair aro, ja ana mmyõt bo reto. Ana mmyõt bo reto afo re raa mmat fee tna mhar fee. Menohe bo weto beta meen raa masbrer tu oh. Kbe raa mmat tna mhar. Bo ro raa mmyõt to, meen raa masbrah kʼraa tu oh.
Tna bokyas ro Jõ tkyas kʼanu kar to, nmo nkyas abyõ afo re raa beta mari ye.

Soh raa mama mame anu to, waa ma. Raa matak mame anu netsu wanu sai. Ana matak re kbe mame anu nmos wanu fee. Menohe waa Allah. Ait Raa ro yatak yame raa metsu wana ye msya raa mamos wana ye mam tafoh ro mait mam rabin kair to.
Ruu mbas to, mabyoh rau mroh sai. Ruu mbas mana ewok to, raa moo mkah pitis mauf sau aran sai. Menohe Allah ja kmot ana kaket. Ait bitsre sau btek ni-nan bo fee ye.
Anu nbyoh ranu to, maut toni miwer ruu mbas mabyoh rau. Feto to waa ma. Nna mawyan wanu to, Ait ntuu beta mnan oh. Ait ymat anu kaket. Feto to waa ana ro mawe mame anu to ma.
Anu nbyoh ranu to, maut toni miwer ruu mbas mabyoh rau. Feto to waa ma. Nna mawyan wanu to, Ait ntuu beta mnan oh. Ait ymat anu kaket. Feto to waa ana ro mawe mame anu to ma.
Hrenaut Jõ ma. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Awya ro ykyas abyõ kʼraa roto yawe, ‘Jõ smot Yesus’ to, kbe meen Jõ tkyas ait abyõ kʼTaja ye. Tawe, ‘Ait retait raa aJõ oh metait.’
Menohe awya ro ywaar Jõ kʼraa roto yawe, ‘Jõ smot Yesus fee’, Meen Jõ twaar ait ye. Tkyas kʼTaja tawe, ‘Raa retait tait raa aJõ metait fee.’”
“Nnaut nwe Jõ tamaʼt tabam refo re tisoh iranya raa msya raa anya to fee. Jõ tama tibyo raa taro mawe ana mban Jõ. Tna raa taro mamo byoh kʼJõ. Tisti raa mafa meto.
Jõ tama fo,
‘betwat ku sait ybam yaja. Tna kbe ku sau ntwat mbam mme. Tna fai sau ntwat mbam snyim ro ano.
Ana ro mhau su mam amah ranu taro to, kbe masen mamo byoh kʼanu.’
Mikha 7:6

Tna awya ro yawyan marak yaja to, tna yawyan marak yme to, menohe ait yawyan marak Jõ toni fee; ait retait yatak yamo raa aJõ metait fee. Feto ye soh awya ro yawyan marak ku ro sme rait msya ku ro ano rait bo toni miwrek Jõ to; ait retait yatak yamo raa aJõ metait fee ye.

Awya ro yawe kro Jõ to, menohe hawe bo yasom bo fanes ro mama mai kʼait to fee ye; ait retait yatak yamo raa aJõ metait fee. Soh ait yasom ara warok rait reto ye tna ait kro Jõ ye; ait retait yamo raa aJõ.

Raa taro mawe misoh metsu rana ai mam tabam refo. Ana saso riof rana mam tabam refo sai ai menohe ana mnaut mamos rana fee. Meen ana weto mhau hame wajin fee. Menohe raa taro mawe mhau saso riof rana ai mam tabam refo fee. Ana mawe mno bo woJõ. Ana saso Jõ tasom aJõ mam tabam refo. Ana weto oh mi kbe mkai riof kʼana. Ana kbe meen raa mame majat oto, menohe meen mkai riof ro hame wajin.
Feto ye, awya ro yitrah yhaf rait kʼanu to, ait retait yitrah yhaf kʼJõ oh meto. Tna awya ro yitrah yhaf rait kʼJõ to, ait retait yitrah yhaf kʼAit ro ybis Jõ tama ye oh meto.
Awya ro huwya yiranya ysya
ro Allah wAit sait to, kbe boren rait mase, mfi boren ro
ye. Tna awya ro huwya yiranya ysya raa ro ja yno bo moof to, kbe boren rait mase ye mfi boren raa ro ja mno bo moof weto ye.

Tna awya ro ymat raa woJõ tibyo yatmof ana to, kbe Allah yoo boren yaren ait tu oh. Nnaut oh; Allah ymat bo bawya ro anu nno sai: Mfi bo raa kinyah aJõ sait yhai sbit to, awya ro ywyan aya yee kʼait yata to, kbe Allah yaren ait ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mkak oh. Tna Ait yasen sikba yuk reto yamoʼt remo makin ro kene mam weto ye. Yamo ykyas Watum ro Allah tna wosa Bokyas Moof kʼraa makin ro mhau mam beto sor ye.
Yohanes ro ja
raa tait yhau mam
fares. Ait yari bo ro
yno feto, tibyo Yohanes ybis kuber wait mamo mo
tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe,
“Nyõ fi
ro tiwya Allah ysi yawe kbe yama oh mefi, fe mfe a? Soh mfe, kbe amu ste raa roto sait hayah a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Hah ne nmo no kʼYohanes tna nkyas bo ro anu nmat tna nri kʼait. Nwe:
‘Raa ro masu mboh to, mfo refo ana mmat bo. Raa ro maa mhai to, mfo refo ana masen mamo. Raa ro mafa
to, mfo refo ana mrok moof. Raa ro mimara mtuk to, mfo refo ana mari bo. Raa ro mhai to, ana mrok masen. Tna raa ro masu awe to, mari Bokyas Moof ro mbam kʼAllah.’
Raa taro mmat bo ro Jõ tno tna beroh smot Jõ. Ana mwaar Jõ fee. Kbe ana weto simaut mase.”

Kuber ro Yohanes wait hah mamo. Tna Yesus yasen ykyas Yohanes kʼraa msis-sas weto. Ykyas yawe, “Tiwya anu nmoʼt yuk ro riamo nwe nmat Yohanes. Nmo to, anu nnaut nwe nmat bawya meto? Anu nmo nmat nkrum ro foos mfi matu wewe mamo-me a? ⌞Mfe, Yohanes retait raa ro yros yatak. Ait raa ro sneh sai fee.⌟
Tiwya anu nmo nmat ait mkah bawya? Anu nmo nmat bobot sait ro yyum ratan ro fyan-fyan fe mfe a? Mfe ye, bobot ro yyum ratan ro moof to, ja yhau bait mam amah ro moof mfi
na ja mhau.
Tawe kʼanu u tawe; anu nmo saso bawya mam tabam ro riamo reto to? Anu nmo saso
ro Allah ybis yama fe mfe a? Ae! Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Ait yase yiwer
na roto ye.
Yohanes retait oh mi tiwya Allah ykyas mam Bokom rAit sau. Bokom reto mawe,
‘Meen Jõ tbis raa sait yama ykyas bo woJõ yatim wia tna Nyõ nrof. Kbe ait siwyan iso kʼNyõ.’
Maleakhi 3:1
Nnaut oh: Raa ro tabam refo aro mase miwrek Yohanes
fee. Menohe raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, ana ro kinyah to, ana beta mase miwer Yohanes.
Maban ti tinyi rau wore wo Yohanes yama
raa, mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, raa byoh srau kair kʼraa mana ro Allah ybo. Raa byoh mawe masen mfot raa mana ro Allah rAit. He mfe, raa mana rAit mo mase renti.
Tiwya Watum ro Musa msya
sor ro Allah ybis mama oh mi mkyas bo ro Allah mawe kʼraa. Ana oh mi mkyas bo rAit mama snok mam mfo refo. Tna Yohanes yama.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Yohanes tait Elia
oh metait.’ Anu nri fe mfe a? Jõ sioh fee.
Anu ro nri bokyas refo fo; nnaut kaket!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa ro mhau mfo refo to, mfi awya? Jõ fret bo tawe anu fo nfi kukek: Anu nnan kukek ro hre mam
. Ana baro mawe kʼanya mawe,

‘Riwai anu bsom-sam mnan fi anu bkyõ bokyõ: Amu nfi oor, tna nji howes ye, afo re kbe anu nsyoh bosyoh. Menohe anu nsyoh fee! Tna fo anu sioh bsom bfi raa ro mhai, menohe anu taro hawe bo nwia hai reto! Nsom nno fyi!’
Yohanes yama to, ait yhau bo yait msya bo yata ye. Tibyo raa mawe, ‘Kabes mbo ait’.
Tna jõ tama. Jõ fi, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tama tna tno bo tfi Yohanes fee. Jõ tama to, ja thau bo tait fee. Tna tata
maya ye. Menohe anu nwe kair Jõ nwe, ‘Ait retait yait boit yasmamo! Ait retait raa ro ja yata
maya bisir yoyo! Tna yafoh wAit to, raa ro ja mno iro msya raa ro ja mno bo ro mkair sor: Raa ro moo namabyoh
mee
bo ye!’ Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Nnaut bo moof ro Yohanes ysya Jõ nno to, tna kbe anu nhar nwe Allah oh mi ybis amu bewok nma to.’”
Yesus yno bo ro msai mawat mam remo ro Khorazim msya remo ro Betsaida. Raa ro mhau mam remo weto mmat bo ro Ait yno. Menohe ana mashana fee. Feto to Ait kmo.

Ait yastako ana yawe, “Anu raa ro Khorazim nsya raa ro Betsaida: Meen ayoh mroh kʼanu! Tiwya Jõ tno bo ro msai mam remo wanu weto, menohe anu nashana fee. Soh tiwya Jõ tno bo ro msai weto mam remo ro Tirus msya Sidon, maami raa ro mhau mam beto mashana iro wana bose oh. Soh ana mmat bo ro Jõ tno weto to, ana sraujin tibyo myum ratan ro mkair tna mse boh ro tafoh mam mana wana abyõ.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, kbe Ait ymat raa ro mhau mam remo weto tna yawe yno bo maku sai mbtek mai kʼana. Menohe anu niwana Ait tibyo bo ro kbe meen mbtek mai kʼanu to samyoh toni!
Tna anu ro nhau mam remo ro Kapernaum nnaut nwe meen anu beta nmoʼt sawro ro Allah rAit. He mfe, kbe meen anu nmoʼt sawro ro kabes! Tiwya Jõ tno bo ro msai mam
ranu ro Kapernaum. Mfi bo tno bo ro msai weto mam
ro Sodom, maami raa weto mmat tna mashana fea! Tna
reto mhau fares ye.
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe; ati ro Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, bo ro meen mai kʼraa ro Sodom to, mnan-an baro ye. Menohe bo ro meen btek mai kʼanu to samyoh toni.”
Tna Yesus skabuk yawe, “Taja, Nyõ fi

ro nase. Nyõ to, nbo sawro aNyõ msya tabam refo ye. Tna Nyõ nmyõt bo aro re raa wase maja wau weto. Bo weto to, raa ro ja mhar bo to, ro mkom bo to, ana srau fee. Ana mfot fee. Menohe bo weto to, nyõ nerif kʼraa kinyah re ana mfot tna mhar. Feto to, tayoh asik mase kʼNyõ.
Taja; Nyõ nhar bo Nyõ oh. Tna ja nno bo ro Nyõ nhaf mnan sai.”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa wAit weto yawe, “Bombra beta to, Taja ysan kʼJõ tatem tbo oh. Raa wase Jõ. Taja yesait aran yhar Jõ. Tna raa wase Taja ye. Menohe Jõ tesait thar Ait. Tna raa ro Jõ tsok to, tkyas Ait kʼana weto re kbe ana mhar bi Ait ye.
Anu taro nsom bo fanes tna hrowyõ nhai. Nma kro Jõ tna Jõ smyoh bo ro samyoh ro anu nsom weto sor.
Nmat sas bo ro Jõ tno tna nbo nno ye. Jõ fi Raa ro thaf moof tna thaf sneh ye. Feto to, kbe nmos wanu mhau tnok ye.
Bo ro Jõ tbis kʼanu nno to mnan-nan sai. Tna bo ro Jõ tse kʼanu nsom to samyoh fee ye.”
Ayõ ro
to, ja raa ro
Yahudi ntmoh. Tna ayõ ro
sau to, Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo mfrit iti mam armato ro
sau. Kuber wAit mhai sre, tibyo mryoh
make baro mait.
Menohe raa ro
mmat feto, tibyo mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Yesus! Nmat kuber woNyõ mno bo toto sai meto a? Ana mryoh
make mam ayõ ro raa wanu ntmoh to. Ana mno fyi meto? Mno bo reto to, ana miwer Watum ro
ranu oh meto!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nsorni Bokom ro Allah fe mfe a? Bokom reto mkyas bo ro tiwya
Daud yno. Tiwya ait ysya raa wait mhai awyah.
Tna ait twok mam Samu ro Allah mato. Tna yoo
ro raa msan kʼAllah.
reto mbau. Menohe ait yoo yait.
reto ja
na mesait aran mait. Menohe ait yoo tna yee kʼraa wait mait ye.
Ja anu nmat Watum ro Musa fefares a? Watum reto mawe ye mawe, ‘Nno bo mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to ma.’ Menohe
ro Allah to, ana beroh mno bo mam Samu ro Allah, menohe Allah ymat bo ro ana mno reto to, tna yawe bo reto mkair fee ye.
Anu nhar nwe Samu ro Allah to moof tna yase ye. Menohe anu wase Ait sait ro yama yhau ysya anu. Ait retait yase toni yiwrek Samu ro Allah.
Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Noo bo wanu taro nsan kʼJõ to, reto moof. Menohe jõ ksoh tawe anu natmof raa anya; reto to moof toni.’
Hosea 6:6
Allah ymat kuber woJõ to yawe bo ro ana mno reto mkair fee. Soh anu nhar Bokom reto kaket to, maami anu nkyas bo mkair mai kuber woJõ fee ye.
Jõ fi ‘Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai.’
Jõ tatak tbo ayõ ro raa ntmoh ye. Feto to, nwe kuber woJõ wefo mno bo ro mkair to ma.”
Tna Yesus sikba wore weto tna yasen yamoʼt samu watum rana.
Tna raa sait ro yatem jaro mhai huwya mam beto ye. Ana ro
baro mmat sas Yesus tna saso bo mkair ro Ait yno. Tibyo ana mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Soh raa misoh raa kiyam moof mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, ana miwer Watum ro Musa ykom oh meto, fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe si yawe, “Mfi bo anu nkin wefo sait ymat
rait sau btek kayah. Mbtek kayah mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, kbe raa retait sna ykuk maut fee mfe a?
Raa to ati, tna
to bo ro ati fee sai. Feto to, soh raa mno bo ro moof kʼraa roto mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, ait yiwer Watum ro
ranu fee.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait ro yatem mhai retait yawe, “Betrot natem anyõ!” Raa retait betrot yatem rait. Tna yatem mrok moof mfi yatem jaro to ye.
Raa ro
mmat feto tibyo masen frok mamo. Mamo saim bo mawe saso iso re kbe mame Yesus yajat.
Menohe Yesus yhar raa ro
mhaf wana, tibyo Ait yirenti yamoʼt rabin roto sau.
Raa msis-sas kro Ait tna Ait yisoh ana ro kiyam. Tibyo kiyam wana marak beta ye.
Tna fo Ait yawe wa kʼana yawe ana masbrah Ait kʼraa roto ma.
Ait yno bo weto to, afo re yno mnan si bokyas ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykyas tinyi wia yawe:
“Raabis aJõ oh mefi. Jõ thafri Ait. Ait tait Jõ thaf mnan. Kbe too Har aJõ tse kʼAit. Tna bo ro Jõ ksoh to, kbe Ait wosa kʼraa makin ro wase Jõ fares ye.
Kbe Ait ymak ysya raa fee. Kbe Ait safuk tawyõ Ait bo fee ye.
Kbe Ait yhaf sneh kʼraa ro ssafo fee. Ana mfi krum ro foos mfi matu wewe. Kbe Ait yno feto mamo snok mam ati ro Ait yno bo ro Jõ ksoh mkak beta.
Mkah Ait yasom rAit to, raa ro
sor kbe mhau mhaf minaut kʼAit mawe meen Ait yoo riof yee kʼana.”
Yesaya 42:1-4
Tna raa makah ait ro kabes mbo sait mama mo kʼYesus. Ait retait ymai marak tna yasu mboh ye. Tna Yesus yisoh ait yoof. Tibyo yrok ymai ye tna yasu maah ymat bo ye.
Tibyo raa makin ro mros sor mam weto to, mrok ktak sai tna mawe, “Yesus fi Ku ro Daud fe mfe a? Ait ro tiwya Allah ysi rene mefi fe mfe a?”
Menohe raa ro
mari feto. Tna ana mawe kʼanya mawe, “Aha! Yesus yatak yikyak kabes sor mkah tak ro kabes Beelzebul
rait. Kabes Beelzebul retait ja yase ybo kabes taro sor.”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mnaut reto tna yawe, “Soh

ro rabin sait ybo raa wait, menohe ana mafa anya ai to, kbe rabin mros matak fee. Tna raa ro mhau su mam remo sau to, soh ana mafa anya ai to, kbe ana mros matak fee ye. Tna raa ro mhau mam amah sau su to, soh ana mafa anya ai to, kbe ana mros matak fee ye.
Tna soh kabes yabi yikyak kabes wait taro to, kbe rabin ro kabes yabi yamo
ybo to, kbe mros matak fee ye.

Anu sioh nwe, kabes Beelzebul (Iblis) yoo yatak rait yee kʼJõ oh mi Jõ tatak tikyak kabes weto sor. Menohe raa wonyõ taro ja mikyak kabes ye. Awya oh mi yoo yatak rait yee kʼana to? Anu nwe kair raa wanu meto ye! Kbe ana kmo anu mawe, ‘Mfe, Har ro
moo matak rAu mee kʼanu mefo!’ Feto to, bo ro anu nwe kʼJõ reto to, mkair sai meto.
Har ro
oh mi moo matak rAu mee kʼJõ. Tibyo Jõ tatak tikyak kabes frok to. Allah ybis Jõ tama tbo raa mana rAit to. Feto to, Ait ro yase ybo raa wait yhau ysya anu oh.”

“Jõ fret bo reto u tawe, Kabes yabi yfi raa ro yatak sait. Ja raa ter-ter twok mam amah rait fee tibyo ytak bo wait fee ye. Menohe soh raa make ait yaa yatem wia saah. Tna fo raa retait ytak bo ro mhau mam amah mato reto.
Awya ro yhaf sau ysya Jõ fee; ait retait yamo byoh tna yno bo ro mkair mai kʼJõ. Awya ro ysya Jõ yno bo woJõ su fee; ait retait sbi hri bo ro Jõ tno ye oh meto.

Feto Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, soh raa mno iro bawya sai to, kbe Allah yyon iro wana weto. Soh raa mamus Allah to, kbe Allah yyon iro wana weto ye. Menohe soh raa mamus Har ro Allah to, kbe Allah yyon iro wana fee yum.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Soh raa sait yawe kair Jõ to, kbe Allah yyon iro rait reto. Menohe soh raa sait yawe kair Har ro
to, kbe Allah yyon iro rait reto fee yum. Kbe Allah yyon iro reto mam makyon refo fee, tna mam makyon ro meen mama fee ye.”
Tna Yesus ykyas kʼraa ro
weto u yawe, “Kake mara ro moof to, kbe make rau to moof ye. Tna kake mara ro mkair to, kbe make rau to mkair ye. Ja make oh mi raa mhar mara rau to.
Anu fo raa ro ja mno bo mkair mfi aban ro mafit raa majat! Anu nhaf mato wanu to mkair. Feto fyi re kbe anu nkyas bo ro moof to? Ja raa mkyas bo mamyot si mhaf wana.

Raa ro yhaf moof to, ja bo ro moof mbam yhaf mato rait frok. Tibyo bo ro yno to moof. Tna bo ro ykyas to moof ye. Tna awya ro yhaf mkair to, ja bo ro mkair mbam yhaf mato rait frok ye. Ait yhaf mato mkair sai. Tibyo ja yno bo ro mkair tna ykyas bo ro mkair ye.
Tna Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Ati ro Allah ytu srah to, kbe raa sait sait yros betoo bo ro tiwya ait ykyas-kas to beta.
Ati reto to, anu ro tiwya nkyas bo ro mkair-kar to, kbe safo makan reto btek mai kʼanu. Feto ye anu ro tiwya nkyas bo ro moof to, kbe safo makan reto btek mai kʼanu fee.”
Ati reto raa ro
baro msya
Yahudi baro mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Amu ksoh Nyõ nno bo ro msai sau re amu nmat.”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu raa mana ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo fo, anu ja nber safo tna kro Allah kaket fee wofo! Anu nwe Jõ tno bo ro msai aro re kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ tbam kʼAllah tama fe mfe a. Menohe Jõ kbe tno bo ro msai sau aran sai re anu nmat tna nhar: Kbe anu nmat bo msai ro mnan fi tiwya Allah yno mkah
Yunus sai.
Tiwya Yunus yhau mam syoh ro mase sau mhaf rau ti trion tuuf. Feto ye mkah Jõ. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ thau mam yuk ro hai ja mhau to ti trion tuuf ye.
Ati ro meen Allah ytu srah to, raa ro tiwya tinyi mhau mam

ro Niniwe to, kbe mrok masen ye msya anu raa mana ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo. Tna kbe ana weto mkyas bo mai kʼanu. Tiwya raa ro Niniwe mari bo ro Yunus ykyas reto. Tna ana mashana. Ait ro yhau mam befo fo, yase toni yiwrek Yunus ye. Menohe anu sor nashana fee!
Tiwya fnya manes
sau mhau mam rabin ro ati ti wayir sau.
Tna au mbam rabin ro fari reto masen mamo mo
Salomo mawe mari bokyas rait.

retait tait raa ro yhar bo toni. Mfo refo, Raa sait ro yase yiwer Salomo retait yhau ysya anu. Menohe anu hawe bo nri bokyas rAit. Feto to meen fai au reto kbe masen mmit safo kʼanu raa ro nhau mfo wefo.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ati ro raa mikyak kabes sau frok mbam raa sait mamo to, kabes reto mamo ninya. Mamo ninya mam wore wo aya aro fee. Mawe sne hoh menohe kabes reto fri yuk ro moof aro fee.

Tibyo kabes reto mnaut mawe, ‘Jõ tawe thah te tamoʼt yuk ajõ ro wia rof, ro tiwya jõ sikba akus.’ Tna kabes hah me snok mam yuk reto u. Tna mmat he ‘amah’ reto raa misoh moof, tna raa aro satoh mama mhau mam beto wea fee.

Feto tna kabes reto mawe hah mamo mhau. Tna mmen mafoh na mabo trion krema mama mhau msya au ye. Kabes trion krema weto to ja mno bo ro mkair-kar toni miwer kabes ro tinyi reto. Tna ana mama twok raa retait beta ye. Tna kbe ana mno ait retait ykair toni yiwrek kair ro ait ykai tinyi wia ye. Anu raa ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo tna nno safo to, kbe anu nfi feto ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo kʼraa makin taro kri-kri fo, yme msya yao na mama mros mne. Ana mawe mkyas bo msya Ait.
Tna raa sait yama yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Nme msya nao na mros ste Nyõ mne meu. Ana mawe mkyas bo msya Nyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yawe si kʼait retait yawe, “Jõ tme to awya? Jõ tao na to awya?”
Tna Yesus yerif kuber wAit yawe, “Ana oh mi Jõ tme msya tao na mefo.
Taja yhau mam sawro rAit. Tna awya ro ja yno bo ro Taja ksoh to, Jõ ttu tawe tao, tano, msya tme oh meto.”
Tna fo Yesus sikba amah reto tna yamoʼt maru maam.
Raa msis-sas mama hre mur mtan kʼAit. Ait ymat feto, tibyo yasen yamo yaut hre mam wiak mato. Tna raa msis-sas weto ana mros sai mam aya maam.
Tna Yesus ykyas bo mawat kʼana mkah bofret yawe, “Raa sait yno armato rait sau. Tna ait yamo furere bobat manaf
Ait furere bo to, bo manaf taro mbtek mam iso. Tibyo bo manaf weto to, ruu mama mame mkak.
Tna taro to, mbtek abyõ mam tabam ro fraa mhau wa mte. Tna mtis mame tabam kaket fee. Tibyo bobat weto moo fooh sai.
Menohe wore wo ayõ mo maut mafit to, bobat weto hroyoh. Mtis mo mame tabam kaket fee, tibyo samer.
Tna taro naut mbtek ye mam wore hyoh mana. Tna hyoh mana weto mo betru kait.
Tna taro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos. Tna mo maut. Tibyo make sarer toni: Bo manaf sau-sau to, make rau trion 30. Taro to, make rau trion 60 ye. Tna taro to, make rau trion 100 ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu ro nri bokyas refo fo; nnaut kaket!”
Tibyo kuber wAit mama mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ nkyas bo mkah bofret kʼana nno fyi?”
Tna Yesus yawe si kʼana yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, maja wau baro to, raa wase fares. Raa ro ja hawe mari Jõ to, ja Jõ tkyas mkah bofret sai kʼana. Menohe Allah ksoh re anu nsrau nfot maja wau weto.

Awya ro yawe yari tna ybo yno bo ro Allah yawe to, kbe Allah yoo bohar taro naut yiryõ kʼait ye. Kbe Allah yno re ait retait yasu maah. Tibyo kbe ait yhar bo ro Allah mawat. Menohe awya ro yari tna hawe yse mam yhaf kaket to, kbe Allah yno re bohar rait to mabuf sai.
Ana ro hawe mari Jõ to, ja Jõ tkyas bofret kʼana sai. Ana to raa ro Allah tiwya ybis
Yesaya ykyas tna ykom matim yawe,
‘Raa kbe mmat sas bo refo. Ana mmat sas menohe wase bo reto fares. Ana kbe mari bo refo. Ana mari, menohe srau fee ye. Ana mari yoyo, he mfe. Ana mmat sas bo yoyo, he mfe ye.
Ana ro hawe mari Jõ to, ja Jõ tkyas bofret kʼana sai. Ana to raa ro Allah tiwya ybis
Yesaya ykyas tna ykom matim yawe,
‘Raa kbe mmat sas bo refo. Ana mmat sas menohe wase bo reto fares. Ana kbe mari bo refo. Ana mari, menohe srau fee ye. Ana mari yoyo, he mfe. Ana mmat sas bo yoyo, he mfe ye.

Ana mhaf matak. Tna mimara mtuk sai. Ana masu mboh tibyo mmat bo fee. Ana hawe bo mashana hah me mama mo kʼJõ afo re tisoh ana tno ana masu mmat bo, re kbe mimara mari bo, tna re ana moo Watum aJõ mse mam mhaf wana.’”
Yesaya 6:9-10
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe,
yno re anu nsu maah nmat bo. Tna Ait yno nimara wanu moof nri bo kaket ye. Feto to kbe anu nhau simaut mase.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Tiwya

na mama mkyas bo ro Allah. Ana weto msya raa ro ja mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, ana mawat ksoh mawe mhar bo refo. Ana ksoh toni mawe kbe mmat bo ro anu nmat wefo ye, he mfe. Tna ana mhaf miyoh mari bo ro anu nri wefo ye, he mfe ye.
Nri; Jõ betoo bofret raa ro furere bo manaf
mam armato rait to, tkyas mabo rau mefo:
‘Bo manaf’ reto to bokyas ro mkyas wore wo Allah yamo

tna ybo raa wAit. Tna ‘bokyas’ reto ro btek mam iso to, mabo rau mefo. Bokyas reto raa taro mari, he mfe. Ana weto mfot bokyas reto kaket fee. Mari menohe kabes yabi (Iblis) yama tna safto bokyas mbam kʼana mhaf wana.
Tna tkyas bo manaf ro mbtek abyõ mam tabam ro fraa mhau wa mte: ‘Bo manaf’ weto to, mkyas raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah si fo, simaut mase.
Menohe Bokyas reto ana moo mse mhau mam mhaf mato wana waor sai. Ana mbo matak fee. Raa roto mmat bosmot wana tna sikowah ana. Feto tibyo ana mbtek mawe, tna smot
u fee. Ana weto taro to, bo ro samyoh mama mai kʼana to, tibyo ana mbtek mawe, tna smot
u fee ye.

‘Bo manaf’ ro mbtek mam wore hyoh mana to, mkyas raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah ye. Menohe ana mhau to, mnaut yyi. Tna ana mnaut bosatoh ro moof mam tabam refo sai. Tna ana nksoh mhau moof bana mam tabam refo sai. Bo weto moo ana mhaf re ana mnaut Bokyas ro Allah fee. Tibyo bosmot wana matak fee. Ana tufrok make aro fee ye.

Tna tkyas bo manaf ro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos. Ana weto mari Bokyas ro Allah reto, tna mse kʼana mhaf. Tna tis rau to, kbe make mawat: Taro make rau trion 100. Tna taro make rau trion 60. Tna taro make rau trion 30.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret sau naut u yawe, “Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to. Ait yfi bi sait yamo furere
ro moof mam armato rait.
Tna ti sau raa mjin beta fares to, ait ro yamo byoh sait yama. Ait yama furere
bosafom srioh
ro riwai bi ait ro armato rait furere wia. Ait ro byoh retait furere
bosafom tna ysam yamo bait yarak.
reto mo tna mse saker. Tna sryan bi yabi retait, baro mamo mmat armato rait reto. Ana mmat he
reto bosafom mo srioh ye.
Tna ana mama mawe kʼait mawe, ‘Bi yabi; tiwya nyõ furere
ro moof mesait aran no? Menohe bosafom mo ye! Bosafom ro mo srioh ye reu mbam hayo meu?’
Bi ait yawe, ‘Byoh sait yama yno meto!’ Tna sryan wait mtu kʼait mawe, ‘Fyi, amu nmo nfit bosafom weu beak fe mfe a?’
Menohe bi ait yawe wa yawe, ‘Mfe, nmo nfit ma! Kbe anu nfit sre mkah
taro u srot kro ye.
Betau bosafom reto mhau moo srioh
su. Tna ati ro
manes tna raa saraf to, kbe jõ tawe kʼraa ro saraf to tawe, “Nakrao bosafom kehamit nse mam wo sau ngkaat wia afo kbe raa mkah. Tna fo nsok
nse hayah. Tna nwia
nmo nbu mam amah ro jõ siwyan mkah bo tbu bo mafer sor to.”’”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana u yawe, “Kbe Allah yamo
tna ybo raa mana rait. Reto mnan fi bo manaf
ro maku sau. Bi sait yoo bo manaf reto yamo furere mam armato rait.

Bo manaf reto, maku koweh syok. Bo manaf roto taro to, makan rau to mase baro ye. Menohe bo manaf ro maku reto mo tna mrok mase miwrek bosafom roto taro sor. Tna mo maut mfi ara bo feto ye. Tibyo ruu mama tafat abyõ mam ara reto kre ye.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret roto sau kʼana naut yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, mnan
Tna fai sau moo
kebet baro, sryoh msya
mawat. Feto kbe
reto mrok mtar mase beta.”
Yesus ykyas bo weto beta kʼraa msis-sas weto mkah bofret sai. Ja ykyas bo roto kʼana fee.
Ait yno feto afo re yno bo mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
sait yama ykyas tinyi wia yawe,
“Kbe Jõ tkyas bo mkah bofret. Bo refo ja raa wase. Tii oh oh, mam wore wo Allah yfen tabam refo, mamo snok mam mfo refo to, ja raa wase. Menohe Jõ tama tasbrer bo weto.”
Mazmur 78:2
Yesus sikba raa msis-sas weto tna yamo twok mam amah. Tna kuber wAit mama mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Sik betoo bofret ro
riwai Nyõ nkyas kʼamu.”
Tna Ait yawe si kʼana yawe, “Raa ro furere
ro moof tait 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ fi Ait oh mefi.
Tna armato reto mkyas tabam refo. Tna
weto, mkyas mawe raa mana ro Allah rait, mam wore wo Ait yamo
ybo ana. Tna
ro bosafom weto mkyas mawe raa ro kabes yabi (Iblis) ybo mamo raa wAit.
Tna ait ro furere
ro bosafom tait mkyas mawe kabes yabi (Iblis). Tna ati ro raa saraf to, mkyas mawe tabam refo makyon sboh rau. Tna ana ro saraf to, mkyas mawe
Tna bosafom ro raa khamit mkah mait tafoh to, mkyas mawe raa ro kro kabes yabi. Meen ati ro tabam refo sboh rau to, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' kbe ybis
wAit mama. Jõ oh mi Ait ro ybis
weto mama mefi. Ana mama tna moo raa ro mno bo mkair-kar msya raa ro misti re raa roto mno iro ye to.
weto kbe tufrok raa ro mkair weto mbam raa mana rAit. Moo ana weto mse hayah.
Tna bosafom ro raa khamit mkah mait tafoh to, mkyas mawe raa ro kro kabes yabi. Meen ati ro tabam refo sboh rau to, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' kbe ybis
wAit mama. Jõ oh mi Ait ro ybis
weto mama mefi. Ana mama tna moo raa ro mno bo mkair-kar msya raa ro misti re raa roto mno iro ye to.
weto kbe tufrok raa ro mkair weto mbam raa mana rAit. Moo ana weto mse hayah.
Kbe
mawah ana weto beta beak mamo mait mam tafoh ro mait warah toni. Tna mam beto to, meen ana mkai bo ro mkair-kar tibyo mawia kanasyah ye.
Tna raa ro mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, Ait yamo ana Maja rana. Kbe ana mhau mam raa mana ro Ait yamo
ybo. Kbe Allah fayir ana moof kaket. Fayir ana mfi bo ja Ait fayir ayõ ro moo maut rabu to. Anu ro nri bokyas reto to; nnaut kaket!”
“Raa baro tomer mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo

ybo to. Bo moof ati meto. Reto mfi kta ro mabyoh maut. Tiwya raa mabah saa kta reto mam armato sau te. Kta reto mhau makus mmyõt bau sai. Tna raa sait ykah armato reto tna ykai kta reto. Menohe ait ye yabah saa mam kya u. Tibyo simaut mase yamo tna yasim bo manhai wait beta. Ait yoo mabyoh rau to, tna yate tabam reto. Tibyo yoo kta ro mabyoh maut reto kʼait.
Raa mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, bo moof ati. Reto mfi raa ro ja yasim bo yoyo sait. Ait yamo saso haban
ro moof baro.
Tna ait ykai haban
ro mabyoh maut toni sau. Tibyo ait hah ye yamo yasim bo manhai wait beta ska. Tna ait yoo mabyoh rau tna fo hah ye yama yoo haban
reto.”
“Tkyas oon ro Allah meen yamo
ybo raa mana rAit mabu rau. Mabu rau to, mfi
sau ro maboh. Raa beak
mam maru tna mfot syoh aro rau-rau.
Syoh mami
reto matot tna raa tubat
makah maut mamoʼt mne. Tna hre skur syoh weto tna mse aro hayah-hayah. Ro ja raa mabo to, ana msok mse mam
Tna ro ja raa mabo fee, ana beak mam aya makus.
Meen makyon ro tabam refo sboh rau to,
kbe mno feto ye. Meen
msok raa ro ja mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, mse hayah. Feto ye raa ro ja mno bo mkair-kar to,
msok tna mse hayah ye.
Tna fo
mawah ana weto beak mam tafoh ro mait warah toni. Ana weto kbe mkai bo ro mkair-kar tibyo mawia kanasyah mam beto.”
Yesus betoo maja rau kuber wAit mkak tna ytu kʼana yawe, “Anu srau nnaut tna nhar bo ro Jõ tkyas weto oh fe mfefares a?” Tna ana mawe, “Ae, amu nhar oh.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bokyas ro mkyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, soh
mfot to, ana weto mfi bobot ro ja srak mse kta ro tna msya ro bose ye.”
Yesus ykyas bofret weto mkak tna Ait yasen sikba yuk reto.

Ait hah ye yamoʼt remo rAit. Tna Ait watum bo mam samu watum rana. Raa ro mari bo ro Ait ykyas weto mrok ktak mawe, “Ait tait raa sei sai yfi anu ye mefo. Awya ro oh mi ykyas watum weu kʼAit u ee? Tna awya yoo yatak rait yee re Ait yno bo ro msai weto?
Ait yaja tait raa ro ja yfen ara a? Tna yme fai Maria, tna yao na sor: Yakobus, Yusuf, Simon, tna msya Yudas fe mfe a?
Tna Ait yano na beta mhau mam remo ranu refo ye. Ait fri bo yase reu mbam kʼawya yatak meu?”
Ana hawe mari bo ro Ait ykyas. Tna Yesus yawe,
ro Allah ybis yama to, ja raa mari ait mam woyõ-woya yamo sai. Menohe mam remo rait yesait to, ja raa hawe mari ait. Tna raa ro amah rait to, hawe bo mari ye.”
Ana smot Ait fee. Feto tibyo Ait yno bo ro msai mawat mam remo rAit fee.
Ati reto to,
Herodes ro ybo
ro Galilea tait, yari bo msai ro Yesus yno.
Tibyo Herodes yawe kʼraa wait yawe, “Yesus fi Yohanes
ro tiwya yhai tna yrok yasen oh! Reto oh mi Yesus yatak yno bo ro msai weto to.”
Tiwya
Herodes ytak fnya ro yao Filipus rait. Fai au masom Herodias. Yohanes yari feto, tibyo yastako
Herodes yawe yber safo oh meto. Tibyo
Herodes kmo Yohanes tna ybis raa wait mamo mfot Yohanes make. Mfot ait tna makah mamo mbu mam
mato.
Tiwya
Herodes ytak fnya ro yao Filipus rait. Fai au masom Herodias. Yohanes yari feto, tibyo yastako
Herodes yawe yber safo oh meto. Tibyo
Herodes kmo Yohanes tna ybis raa wait mamo mfot Yohanes make. Mfot ait tna makah mamo mbu mam
mato.
Tna
Herodes yawe yame Yohanes yajat, menohe raa makin mhar mawe Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Tibyo Herodes waa yame Yohanes yajat.
Tna ati reto to,
Herodes yakyõ hwiat rait ro tiwya yme mabe ait. Ana makyõ bokyõ reto to, ku ano ro fai Herodias rau masen smar. Ymat feto tibyo ksoh.
Tibyo ait yasen yawe, “Ayoh, bo bawya sai ro nyõ nayoh to, kbe jõ too tee kʼnyõ tu oh.”
Tibyo fai Herodias, masen misbyõ ku rau tna ku rau mawe, “Jõ tayoh raa mamo mame Yohanes
yajat. Sbi yana tna masyõ ait yana abyõ mam
sau, moo mama mee kʼjõ.”
Herodes yari feto, tibyo ynaut yyi. Menohe riwai ait ysi bo kawi oh. Yafoh na mari wia oh no, tibyo ait ye yabe u fee. Tna ait yno bo ro ku au mawe sai.
Ait ybis raa sbe sait yamo mam
tna ktan Yohanes yana.
Tna raa sbe retait yoo Yohanes yana yse abyõ mam
yasyõ yakah yama yee ku au reto. Tna ku au reto makah mamo mee kʼmme mmat ye.
Tna kuber ro Yohanes wait mama moo ajat ro Yohanes makah mamo sama. Tna ana mamo mkyas bo reto kʼYesus.
Yesus yari feto, tibyo Ait yaut wiak yamoʼt oo ro mimon. Menohe raa makin msis-sas mari bo Ait yamo feto. Tibyo ana mbam remo wana sor to, mamo iso mne twat maryõt Ait ye.
Yesus yamo snok mam maru maam jaro, tna Ait ymat he raa msis-sas mros wea. Tibyo Ait yatmof ana tna yisoh ana ro kiyam sor afo re kiyam wana marak.
Hreha reto kuber wAit mama mo kʼAit mawe, “Yuk refo fo riamo. Mti oh. Nbis raa wefo masen mamo rof re kbe ana saso boit ro mait aro. Kbe ana mamo saso mam remo ro mhau kene mam wefo sor.”
Menohe Yesus yawe si kʼana yawe, “Ana mhau sai, mamo ma. Anu nesait noo boit aro nee kʼana mait.”
Tna ana mawe, “Amu nse
trion maat msya syoh mana ewok aran sai fo.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nkah bo weto nma nee kʼJõ.”
Tna Yesus ybis raa msis-sas weto hre mte beta. Tna Yesus yoo
trion maat msya syoh mana ewok reto ybo. Tna heyut mam ayoh yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
weto tna yee kuber wAit yawe ana saim kʼraa ro hre weto.
Raa weto moo mait tna mhaf matu beta. Menohe
mabuf taro to msis mhau fares. Kuber ro Yesus wAit soo
weto tna mfau mam
trion 12 matot.
Ana ro mait boit mam ayõ reto to, raa sme mabo trion 5000. Raa ntuu fnya msya kukek ro mait to ye fee.
Ana mno bo weto mkak si fo, Yesus ybis kuber wAit maut wiak matim wea maru maam ati jaro. Ait yawe yesait yhau tna ybis raa msis-sas weto mamo bana.
Ait ybis ana mamo, tna mti knu-knu fo, Ait yesait aran yaut faut mana sau yamo skabuk.
Wiak ro kuber wAit maut fo, mamo susai mam aya masuf oh. Tna foos mfi mam ati ro ana miin mamo fo mama. Tibyo figyõm mai wiak rana.
Tna mam wore ayõ ro tuuf bo feto, Yesus yata abyõ mam aya mata yama yo kʼana.
Kuber wAit mmat feto, tibyo mrok waa. Tna ana mwohrarar mawe, “Bo mnat anu!”
Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Knar oh, waa ma! Jõ mefi!”
Tna Petrus yawe kʼAit yawe, “Soh Nyõ Yesus metait mi, nbis jõ tata abyõ mam aya mata tama to kʼNyõ ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Ae, nama oh.” Tibyo Petrus yroh ybam wiak, tna yata abyõ mam aya mata yamo yo kʼYesus.
Petrus yata mam aya mata abyõ yamo, menohe yari foos mfi tna yrok waa. Ait waa yawe yno sruf mam aya oh. Tna ytu kʼYesus yawe,
natmof jõ, fe kbe jõ tsu fo.”
Tibyo Yesus ybo Petrus yatem yayõ. Tna fo yastako Petrus yawe, “Nyõ smot Jõ kaket fee! Smot Jõ kaket!”
Ana mbewok maut mam wiak rana si fo, foos mrok mnem.
Tna kuber wAit ro mhau mam wiak mato sor maka smot Ait tna mawe, “Nyõ Ku ro Allah yare tu oh!”
Ana mamo snok mam aya maam jaro to, mroh mam rabin ro Genesaret.
Tna raa ro mhau mam rabin reto mmat he Yesus yama feto. Tibyo ana frok mamo mabah kʼraa makin beta. Tibyo raa makah raa ro kiyam sor to, mama mo kʼAit ye.
Tna ana soh-soh Ait mawe, “Amu niir ratan aNyõ makit sai mbau a?” Tna ana ro miir ratan rAit makit to, kiyam wana marak beta.
Tna raa ro
msya
Yahudi baro mbam Yerusalem mama mo kʼYesus. Tna ana mtu kʼAit mawe,
“Kuber woNyõ mno bo mkair berhasyoh bo mafa ro ja hohos wanu tii mno to, mkah bawya! Soh kuber woNyõ mait boit to, ana myon matem wia fee!”
