Menohe Yesus yawe si kʼana yawe, “Anu nesait nno bo mkair toni: Anu ja nno bo mafa ro hohos wanu, menohe anu niwana watum ro Allah oh meto. Nno fyi meto!
Tiwya Allah yawe mam bokom rAit yawe,
‘Nmat nja msya nme na to kaket. Tna awya ro yawe kair yaja, yme bo to, kbe ait raa mame yajat tu oh.’
Ulangan 5:16

Menohe anu nno bo mkair: Anu nbis raa nwe matmof maja msya mme na to ma. Anu nwe, ‘Pitis ro anu nwe noo nee kʼana to, noo nee kʼAllah shauk ana oh.’ Feto to anu kro bo mafa ro hohos na wanu kaket tibyo berhasyoh Watum ro Allah oh meto.
Ulangan 5:16

Menohe anu nno bo mkair: Anu nbis raa nwe matmof maja msya mme na to ma. Anu nwe, ‘Pitis ro anu nwe noo nee kʼana to, noo nee kʼAllah shauk ana oh.’ Feto to anu kro bo mafa ro hohos na wanu kaket tibyo berhasyoh Watum ro Allah oh meto.
Anu fo raa ro sioh anu sai! Tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykyas anu ykom yawe anu nmo wan-wan sai. Mabo oh! Bokom reto mawe,
‘Raa mana refo mbaut Jõ mkah masoh mabyõ sai. Menohe ana mhaf wana to hayah sai.
Ana maka smot Jõ mati sai. Tna watum ro ana mbo reto to watum ro mbam raa sai meto, mbam kʼJõ fee.’”
Yesaya 29:13
Yesus ytu raa msis-sas mama, tna ykyas bo kʼana yawe, “Nri bo ro Jõ tkyas kʼanu tna srau nnaut kaket:
Raa ro

ja mmat sas bo ro raa mait. Menohe boit ro ana mait reto mamoʼt mhaf mato wana sai. Boit aro mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to fee. Menohe Allah ymat sas bokyas mkair ro frok mbam raa mhaf mato. Bokyas weto oh mi mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to.”
Tna fo kuber wAit mama kʼAit mawe, “Bi yabi, bo ro Nyõ nkyas to, raa ro
mari tna ana kmo meu.”

Menohe Yesus yawe si kʼana yawe, “Jõ Taja yhau mam sawro rAit. Tna ja yso bo ro moof mam armato rAit sai. Mfi bo Ait ykah bo mam armato rAit to, kbe Ait yatu bosafom ro mkair to beak. Yatu mkah mtis ye. ⌞Tna raa ro
mnan fi bosafom ro mkair reto.⌟
Nri bo raa ro
mkyas to ma. Ana to mfi
ro ja masu mboh. Mfi bo
ro yasu mboh sait, yawe yerif iso kʼait ro yasu mboh roto sait. Kbe ana mbewok mamo sre tna btek mam kayah mato.”
Tna Petrus ytu si kʼYesus yawe, “Sik ne betoo bo ro Nyõ nkyas mkah fret reto kʼamu wia.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu wase bofret reto maja rau fares a?
Bo ro raa mait mam masoh to, kbe mroh beta mamoʼt mhaf. Tna kbe haberek mamo syõ. Tna raa mamo msyõ mam sutet makus agus.
Menohe soh raa mhaf mkair to, kbe bokyas mkair frok mbam raa masoh. Tna bokyas reto oh mi mno raa weto mkair.

Raa ro mhaf mato mkair to, ja mnaut-nat bo ro mkair-kar, mame ajat, wyahte raa, mjah bo kbik-kbak, tna msyõf bo. Ana sioh raa anya, tna mamus raa anya ye. Bo weto beta to, frok mbam kʼraa mhaf mato ro mkair oh meto.
Bo weto oh mi mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to. Menohe soh raa myon matem kaket fee tna mait bo to, Allah yawe bo reto to bo ati fee. Allah yawe raa ro mno bo feto to raa ro mkair to fee.”
Tna Yesus sikba yuk reto yamoʼt rabin ro Tirus msya Sidon.
Tna fai au ro Kanaan sau mbam rabin reto mama mo kʼYesus. Fai au mtu kʼAit mawe, “Yesus; Ku ro Daud yare, natmof jõ. Ku ano ajõ kabes mbo tibyo ku au mafa kiyam ro msai toni.”
Menohe Yesus shait bait sai. Tna kuber wAit mawe kʼAit mawe, “Fai au mmai wer sai. Nbis fai au reto frok mamo.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼfai au yawe, “Soh raa ro kmot
marak to, kbe
mamo tit. Raa ro Israel
mfi
ro mamo tit. Jõ Taja ybis Jõ tama to kʼraa ro Israel mesait aran sai. Tna nyõ fo, fnya ro Israel fee.”
Menohe fai au reto mama kene kʼAit tna maka smot Ait. Tna soh-soh mawe,
natmof jõ.”
Menohe Yesus yisboh si kʼfai au yawe, “Ja raa moo boit mee kukek wana mait mhaf matu. Raa moo boit ro kukek mait reto to, beak mtah mait fee!”
Tibyo fai au mawe,
feto saah oh. Menohe makyõ-aka ro btek mbam ambar ro
mait to, ja mtah mait ye oh.”
Feto tibyo Yesus yawe kʼfai au yawe, “Bosmot anyõ matak toni. Bo ro nyõ nayoh to, mabo mamyot bo ro nyõ nhaf ksoh oh.” Mam weto si fo, ku ro ano rau mrok moof.
Yesus sikba yuk reto, tna yamoʼt maru maam ro Galilea. Tna Ait yaut yamoʼt faut sau tna susu hre.

Tna raa msis-sas mama mo kʼAit. Ana makah raa ro maa maka, raa ro maa ssafo fee, raa ro masu mboh, raa ro mmai marak tna msya raa ro mafa bo roto taro sor to, mawat mama ye. Tna Yesus yisoh ana tibyo mrok moof beta.

Ana ro mmai marak to mrok mmai. Ana ro maa maka to maa wana mrok ntrot. Ana ro maa ssafo fee, maa wana mrok matak tibyo mber mamo ye. Tna ana ro masu mboh to, masu mrok maah tna mmat bo ye. Raa msis-sas mmat bo ro Yesus yno feto, tibyo mrok ktak sai, tna mbaut Allah ro Israel ye.

Tna Yesus ytu kuber wAit mama tna yawe, “Jõ tatmof raa msis-sas wefo. Ana mama mhau msya Jõ ti trion tuuf oh. Tna mfo wefo boit wana mkak ye oh. Soh Jõ tbis ana mkah hai sre hah me mamo to, kbe ana mhai awyah sne fefa mam iso maka.”
Tibyo kuber ro Yesus wAit mawe, “Fyi re anu bkai boit mnan mam yuk ro mimon refo? Raa ro mawe mait bo fo msis.”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana yawe, “Anu nse
jya meto?” Tna ana mawe, “Amu nse
trion krema msya syoh kinyah baro sai mefo.”
Tna Ait ybis raa msis-sas weto hre mte beta.
Tna fo Yesus yoo
krema reto msya syoh kinyah weto to, ybo tna yayoh asik mawat kʼAllah. Tna fo Ait haber
weto ftah aro rau yee kuber wAit mbo saim kʼraa msis-sas weto beta.
Raa msis-sas weto mait tna mhaf matu beta. Tna
msya syoh ro mhau fares to, kuber ro Yesus wAit soo mawah mfau mam
trion krema matot.
Raa sme ro mait bo to mabo 4000. Tna raa ntuu fnya msya kukek ro mait boit weto ye fee.
Yesus ybis raa msis-sas reto masen mamo bana, tna ait yaut wiak sau yamoʼt rabin ro Magadan.
Tna raa ro
msya raa ro
baro mama mo kʼYesus. Tna ana sanet Ait: Ana mayoh mawe Ait yno bo msai aro re kbe ana mmat. Mmat tibyo ana mhar mawe Ait ybam kʼAllah yama fe mfe a.
Menohe Yesus yisboh si kʼana yawe, “Soh anu nmat ayõ twok hreha tna nmat iri majit to, anu nhar nwe, ‘Kbe menrabu arin moof.’

Tna rabu momo to, soh anu nmat ayoh ngknu tna mkek ye to, anu nhar nwe, ‘Rere arin mkair.’ Anu ja nmat sas ayoh to, tna nhar nwe kbe oom mais. Tna nhar nwe kbe hwyõm. Anu nmat sas bombra ro Jõ tno sor ye. Menohe anu srau nnaut fee.

Anu raa mana ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo fo, anu ja nber safo tna kro Allah kaket fee! Anu nwe Jõ tno bo ro msai aro re kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ tbam kʼAllah tama fe mfe a. Menohe Jõ kbe tno bo msai sau aran sai re anu nmat tna nhar: Meen anu nmat bo msai sau ro mnan fi tiwya Allah yno mkah
Yunus sai.” Yesus ykyas bo weto mkak si fo, yasen sikba ana yamo.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo snok mam maru maam jaro. Kuber wAit sorni
ro kbe ana mait to akus.
Tna Yesus yawe wa kuber wAit yawe, “Kaket anu mkah
raa ro
msya
Kuber wAit mari feto, tibyo mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Anu sorni
ro kbe biit, au oh mi Yesus ykyas feto to.”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mkyas kʼanya feto. Tibyo Ait yastako ana yawe, “Anu smot Jõ kaket fee!
wanu marak to, nnaut nkyas nno fyi?
Anu wase Jõ tatak aJõ fares a? Anu sorni bo ro anu nmat oh fe mfe a? Tiwya anu nmat
maat ro Jõ too saim kʼraa mabo trion 5000 mait to fe mfe a? Tna anu soo ro ntari mhau to, nfau
ja meto?
Tna taa anu nmat bo Jõ too
krema tee kʼraa mabo 4000 mait to, tna ro ntari mhau to, anu soo nfau
ja ye meto?
Riwai Jõ tawe, ‘Kaket anu mkah
raa ro
msya
Reto to Jõ tawe bofret sai meto.
ro raa mait oh mi Jõ tawe meto fee.”
Yesus yawe bo feto, tibyo ana mfot mawe Ait yawe wa ana afo re ana kaket ana mkah
ro
meto fee. Menohe Ait yawe wa ana yawe kaket ana mkah bo watum raa ro
msya
Ana mamo snok mam rabin ro kene mam
ro Kaisarea Filipi. Tna Ait ytu bo kuber wAit yawe, “Raa mkyas mawe 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, awya?”
Kuber wAit mawe, “Ana taro mawe kʼamu mawe, Nyõ fi Yohanes ro ja
raa. Tna taro mawe, Nyõ fi
Elia. Tna taro mawe, Nyõ fi
Yeremia soh mfe to,
ro Allah ybis roto sait.”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana yawe, “Bonaut ranu nesait nwe to Jõ fi awya?”
Simon Petrus yasen yawe, “Allah ro yaam tait, Nyõ fi Ku ro Ait yare. Nyõ fi
Tna Yesus yawe, “Simon, ku ro Yunus yare: Raa oh mi besi kʼnyõ re nkyas meto fee. Taja oh mi besi kʼnyõ re nkyas feto. Kbe nyõ nhau simaut mase.

Nyõ nfi fraa nes ro mros yum. Bosmot anyõ matak to. Kbe Jõ sgi raa mana woJõ abyõ kʼnyõ. Feto kbe nyõ nkyas watum aJõ kʼana. Tna kbe ana smot Jõ tibyo mamo raa mana woJõ ye. Kbe ana matak toni tibyo Kabes Yabi ytai yno ana btek bo fee ye.
Kbe Jõ tbis nyõ nitrah mato re kbe raa mama truk mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo ye. Tna kbe bo ro Allah yawe mkair to, kbe nyõ nawe bo weto mkair mam tabam refo ye. Tna kbe bo ro Allah yawe moof to, kbe nyõ nawe bo weto moof mam tabam refo ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe wa kuber wAit yawe, “Nkyas kʼraa nwe Jõ fi
to ma.”

Tna maban ati reto ⌞mamo snok mam mabo rau⌟ to, Yesus ykyas bo kuber wAit yawe, “Tako hawe sai, kbe Jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna mam beto to, kbe Jõ tkai bo ro samyoh mawat btek mai kʼJõ. Bo ro samyoh weto to, mbam kʼraa manes ro
Yahudi: Raa mabi wana msya
manes wana, tna msya
wana ye. Jõ kbe raa mame tajat. Tna ti ro tuuf to, Taja yno Jõ trok tasen.”
Petrus yari bo ro Yesus ykyas feto, tibyo ykuk Yesus yamo kait kʼait yajoh jaro. Tna Petrus yastako Yesus yawe,
kbe Allah yatmof Nyõ tu oh. Bo samyoh reto kbe btek mai kʼNyõ fee saut.”

Menohe Yesus haberek bhah Petrus yawe, “Petrus, namo fari tno. Nyõ nkyas bo ro kabes yabi (Iblis) ykyas meto! Nyõ nno wa Jõ to ma. Bo ro nyõ nkyas reto to, bonaut ro mbam kʼAllah fee. Bonaut reto to, mbam kʼraa sai meto.”

Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Awya sai ro ksoh kro Jõ to, yako hawe sai kbe yno mfi fefo: Kbe yno bo rait u ma. Tna kbe ait yasom ara warok rait ye: Au oh mi yako hawe sai ait beroh yasom bo mase ro kbe mama mai kʼait. Tna beroh kro iso ro Jõ terif kʼait.

Raa taro mawe misoh metsu rana ai mam tabam refo. Ana saso riof rana mam tabam refo sai ai, menohe mnaut mamos rana fee. Meen ana weto mhau hame wajin fee. Menohe raa taro ja saso riof rana ai mam tabam refo fee. Ana mawe mno bo woJõ. Ana saso Jõ tasom aJõ mam tabam refo. Ana weto oh mi kbe mkai riof. Ana kbe meen raa mame majat oto, menohe meen ana mkai riof ro hame wajin.
Mfi bo raa sait ykai kta mam tabam refo to beta, menohe ykai riof ro mase fee. Meen mafer rau to bawya? Ait ynaut yawe riof ro mase to, ja raa kwiyat mkah kta wana weto a?
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ tama u to, Jõ takah bo yase ro Taja ye. Tna
wAit sor tayun Jõ mama ye. Tna kbe Jõ too boren raa sait-sait tna taren ana. Taren raa to, tno mamyot bo ro ana mno beta. Oon reto to kene oh.
Nri oh! Meen ‘Ait Ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai’ ye yama u. Yama u to, kbe yamo
ybo raa wAit. Ati ro Ait yama u to, anu wore siret mam wefo fo, meen anu baro nhau fares nmat Ait yama to. Ati reto to, nhai beta marak fefares.”
Ti trion ntamam firwas tna Yesus yakah Petrus, Yakobus ysya Yohanes ro Yakobus yao to, yamo. Ana maut mamoʼt atu ro miyõ sau. Ana mesait mamo kar mam yuk reto.
Tibyo Yesus yetsu haberek mam wore ana mros weto. Yasu ynaif to, mrok mawyah mfi ayõ. Tna ratan ro yyum to, mamo mboh fyok ye.
Tna ana mmat raa mabo ewok frok tubor mros msya Yesus. Ana mbewok weto to Musa ysya Elia.
Tna Petrus yawe kʼYesus yawe,
amu ye nhau mam yuk refo to moof toni. Soh Nyõ ksoh meto mi, kbe jõ ttor sbyah trion tuuf mam yuk refo: Sau kʼNyõ, sau kʼMusa, tna sau kʼElia ye.”
Petrus ykyas bo kri-kri fares fo, byõ ro mboh fyok mama mroh sro-sro ana kait. Tna ana mari Raa sait ymai mam byõ mato yawe, “Ait refi Ku aJõ ro Jõ tksoh. Ait tait Jõ thaf mnan. Nri bo kʼAit!”
Kuber wAit mabo tuuf reto mari feto tibyo ana mrok waa toni tna maka mabum mam tabam.
Menohe Yesus yama yatem yiir ana, tna yawe, “Waa ma. Nsen nros oh.”
Ana mari tna misbat mana mmat menohe Yesus yesait aran sai. Musa ysya Elia marak.
Ana mroh mbam atu reto to, Yesus ysi bo kʼana. Ysi yawe, “Bo ro riwai anu nmat to, nkyas kʼraa roto to ma. Nhau sai mamo snok mam wore wo Jõ trok tasen wia. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'.”
Tna ana mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Fyi re
wanu ro Yahudi mawe, ‘Meen Elia yama wia tna fo
yama yrof to?’”
Yesus yawe, “Ae, Elia meen yama yisoh bombra sor wia.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Elia tiwya yama oh. Menohe raa mhar ait fee. Tna raa sikowah ait mamyot ksoh rana sai. Tna meen ana mno bo mkair feto mai kʼJõ ye. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'.”
Tibyo kuber wAit srau mawe, “Ait ykyas Elia to, Ait ykyas Yohanes ro ja
raa oh meto.”
Wore wo Yesus ysya kuber wAit mabo tuuf hah me mama to, ana mkai raa msis-sas ro siret wea mam yuk reto. Tna bi sait yama yo kʼYesus, tna yjit yimna mam tabam tna soh-soh Ait yawe,
natmof ku ajõ! Ait tait, kiyam ro ruu mber reu msai toni. Ti aro to, kiyam reto mno ait ytek ybe mam tafoh. Tna ti taro to, btek mam aya ye.
Jõ takah ait tamo tee kuber woNyõ. Menohe ana matak misoh ait yoof fee.”

Yesus yawe, “Anu wefo mfe saut! Anu wefo raa ro wyahte Allah, tna smot Jõ fee! Kbe thau tsya anu kait fares a? Jõ thaf sneh tsya anu kait ye fee oh!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼbi retait yawe, “Nbo ku retait nakah nama!”
Ana makah ku retait mama tna Yesus yikyak kabes ro mbo ku refi frok mamo. Tna mam weto si fo, ku retait yrok yoof.
Yesus yno bo weto mkak tna kuber wAit mama mo kʼAit yesait. Tna ana mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Bo bawya mno re amu ntak nikyak kabes reto frok fee?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bosmot wanu matak fee. Soh bosmot wanu maku sai, mnan fi makan
ro maku sai to, kbe anu nwe kʼatu rno nwe susu mamoʼt tno. Nwe feto tna kbe atu reto susu mamo tu oh. Tna soh bosmot wanu mase mfi feto to, kbe anu ntak nno bo bawya sai ye. [
Menohe kiyam ro kabes mnan feto to, ja raa mikyak sai fee. Raa skabuk tna mhau bo mait wia, re kbe mikyak kabes reto frok.”]
Ati sau to, Yesus ysya kuber wAit mhau su mam
ro Galilea. Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna kbe raa mfot Jõ tna msan kʼraa roto mbo.
Tna ana mame Jõ tajat. Tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Taja yno Jõ trok tasen.” Ait ykyas bo weto, tibyo kuber wAit sraujin toni.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo snok mam remo ro Kapernaum. Tna raa ro ja moo namabyoh
mkah misoh Samu ro Allah mama mo kʼPetrus. Ana mtu kʼait mawe, “Bi
ranu ja yoo pitis ro namabyoh Samu ro Allah yee, fee mfe a?”

Tna Petrus yawe, “Ae, bi Ait yoo yee.” Tna Petrus yamoʼt amah. Ait twok mam amah si fo, Yesus huwya yawe kʼait wia yawe, “Simon; raa ro mase mam tabam refo ja yoo pitis ro namabyoh. Nyõ nnaut fyi? Ja ana moo pitis reto mbam kʼawya? Mbam raa kinyah ro rabin rana tna msya raa ro srim ye fe mfe a?”

Tna Petrus yawe, “Ana moo pitis raa ro srim.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto to, raa kinyah ro ana mbo to, moo pitis ro namabyoh mee fee. Feto to, anu ro Allah ybo fo, anu boo namabyoh ro samu rAit to bee fyi?

Menohe Jõ hawe bo ana kmo anu. Feto to, nasen namoʼt aya tna tawer syoh. Tna syoh ro nyõ nayo tinyi to, kbe nyõ nkai pitis mauf mam syoh reto masoh. Tna noo pitis weto namo nee mkah namabyoh wanu mbewok.”
Ati reto kuber ro Yesus wAit mama mo kʼAit tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Awya ro oh mi yase mam raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to?”
Tibyo Yesus ytu ku maku sau mama mros susai tna yawe,
“Haberek nmo nfi ku maku refo. Soh mfe to, kbe anu nmo raa ro Allah ybo mam raa mana rAit to fee ye.
Awya ro yhaf sneh tna bonaut rait haberek yfi ku maku refo to, ait kbe yase mam raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo ye.

Jõ ksoh anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼraa ro mhaf sneh. Awya ro yitrah yhaf rait ku refo, ro yno feto mam Jõ tasom aJõ to, ait yno bo moof oh meto. Au oh mi; awya ro mmat raa ro mhaf sneh to, yno feto to mnan anya mfi ait yno bo ro moof reto kʼJõ ye oh meto.”

“Mam tabam refo fo, bo aro rau tko re raa mno iro. Bo weto mhau bau oh. Tibyo meen Allah yno bo ro samyoh btek mai tabam refo to. Menohe raa ro yisti re ku maku ro smot Jõ sau mno iro to, soh ait ysu mam aya yhai to, moof miwer bo ro meen Allah yno mai kʼait retait! Mfi bo raa moo fraa ro mase sau tna make mam yamyum rait tna mbeak ait mam aya sawan, tibyo ysu to, bo reto to moof miwer bo samyoh toni ro meen ait ykai.
kmo toni raa ro misti re raa roto mno iro to.

“Mam tabam refo fo, bo aro rau tko re raa mno iro. Bo weto mhau bau oh. Tibyo meen Allah yno bo ro samyoh btek mai tabam refo to. Menohe raa ro yisti re ku maku ro smot Jõ sau mno iro to, soh ait ysu mam aya yhai to, moof miwer bo ro meen Allah yno mai kʼait retait! Mfi bo raa moo fraa ro mase sau tna make mam yamyum rait tna mbeak ait mam aya sawan, tibyo ysu to, bo reto to moof miwer bo samyoh toni ro meen ait ykai.
kmo toni raa ro misti re raa roto mno iro to.

Tna soh anu ntem soh mfe naa jaro misti re anu nno iro to, sbi ntem msya naa reto noo beak makus. Anu nhau nsya Allah nkah ntem msya naa jaro sai to, reto bo ro moof. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah ntem ewok soh mfe naa ewok ro misti re nno iro to, bo ro mkair. Meen Allah yoo anu beak niit mam tafoh ro roon reto.

Feto ye soh anu nsu jaro misti re anu nno iro to, tufrok nsu makan reto beak makus. Anu nhau nsya Allah nkah nsu jaro mesait aran sai to, reto bo moof. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah nsu ewok ro misti re nno iro to, bo ro mkair. Meen Allah yoo anu beak niit mam tafoh ro rabin kair reto.
Feto ye, niwana ku kinyah wefi sait ma.
ro ja mhau msya Allah sor to, ja kmot ana ye. [
Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa sai yama mkah bo yoo riof yee kʼraa ro mamo tit.]”
“Anu nnaut fyi? Mfi bo raa sait ysia
wait mana trion 100. Tna
weto mana sau marak. Kbe bi ait retait yno bawya? Kbe ait yasen yamo saso
ro marak reto fe mfe a? Kbe ait sikba
mana trion 99 reto agus mam faut mana. Tna ait yamo saso
ro marak reto fea!
Soh ait ykai
ro marak reto to, kbe ait simaut mase. Menohe
mana 99 ro mhau mam faut mana to, ait simaut mase fee.
Anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, Ait hawe bo raa kinyah wAit sait yarak feto ye.”

Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Soh raa wanu sait yno iro to, namo no kʼait tna betoo iro reto kʼait. Nkyas mam wore anu mbewok aran sai. Nkyas mam wore raa makin mmat ma. Tna soh ait yari bo ro nyõ nkyas reto to, ait retait ye yiranya u oh meto.
Menohe soh ait yari bo ro nyõ nkyas fee; namo nmen raa mabo sait
ewok bo feto msya nyõ nmo no kʼait. Tna hre nkyas bo reto su. Watum ro
mawe,

‘Nko hawe sai raa mabo ewok, soh mfe tuuf mama tna hre su: Raa mabo ewok, soh mfe tuuf ro mesait mmat bo reto to, ntu ana mama. Tna ana weto kbe hre mkyas bo ro ana mmat. Soh ana beta mmat bo mnan anya, mawe raa retait yno bo ro mkair reto, feto tna fo raa moo srah mmit kʼraa retait.’
Ulangan 19:15
Tna soh ait hawe yari bo ro anu nwe to, nmo nkyas bo reto nsya

Nkyas bo reto nsya raa ro ja msya anu skabuk su. Tna soh ait hawe yari bo ro anu beta nkyas to, niranya nsya ait ma. Nmat ait yfi raa ro wase Allah. Nmat ait yfi raa ro ja mno bo mkair-kar mnan fi ana ro ja moo namabyoh
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Bo ro Allah yawe mkair to, nwe mkair mam tabam refo ye. Tna bo ro Allah yawe moof to, nwe moof mam tabam refo ye.
Tna Jõ tawe kʼanu ye tawe: Soh anu ro smot Jõ nbo ewok ntu srah bawya sai su, tna anu nrok srau sau nwe srah reto mabo tna nkyas kʼTaja ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, kbe Ait yawe srah reto mabo ye.
Wore raa woJõ mabo ewok
tuuf siret su re mtu srah mari to, kbe Jõ siret tsya ana mam weto ye.”
Tna Petrus yama yo kʼYesus tna ytu bo kʼAit yawe,
soh raa wanu sait yno bo ro mkair mai kʼjõ mun aro rau-rau to, kbe jõ te tfot yatem u muhrin jya bo feto? Muhrin krema fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Mfe; muhrin krema sai fee, muhrin trion 490 bo feto.
Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, mnan fi
sait.
retait yawe ykyas pitis ro tiwya sryan wait mhe kʼait.
retait ykyas bomhaam ysya sryan wait kri-kri to, raa wait makah sryan ro bomhaam wait sait naut mama. Sryan retait tiwya yhe pitis ro bofyah mase toni.
Menohe ait ytai yisroh bofyah wefo fee. Tibyo
retait ybis raa mfot sryan retait ysya yfain, kukek wait, tna moo kta wait beta mamo masim afo re moo mabyoh rau to misroh bofyah wait.
Menohe sryan retait yabum soh-soh
retait yawe, ‘Bi yabi, natmof jõ! Nhau rere baro wia tna kbe tisroh pitis wonyõ beta.’
retait yari feto, tibyo yatmof sryan retait tna yawe bofyah weto makus rof. Tna
retait bitsre sryan retait yamo bait ye.
Menohe sryan retait frok yamo tna ykai sryan roto sait ro tiwya yhe pitis bofyah kebet baro kʼait. Tna sryan ro riwai
bitsre retait, yfot sryan roto refi bekon tna yastako yawe, ‘Nisroh pitis ro tiwya nyõ nhe kʼjõ to, fooh!’
Menohe sryan roto refi yabum soh-soh ait yawe, ‘Nhau rere baro wia tna kbe jõ tisroh tu oh!’
Menohe sryan retait hawe bo yari bo ro sryan roto refi yawe. Tibyo yfot sryan refi yamo ybu mam
mamo snok mam wore meen ait yisroh bofyah wait wia tna fo frok.
Sryan roto taro mmat feto, mnaut mawe mkair toni. Tibyo ana mamo mkyas bo ro sryan retait yno reto
rana.
retait yari feto to, yrok kmo. Tibyo ait ytu sryan retait yama tna yawe, ‘Nyõ nno bo mkair toni! Taa nyõ soh-soh jõ, tibyo jõ tawe nyõ nisroh bofyah wojõ fee, makus sai rof.
Rau ro moof to, nyõ natmof raa retait mfi bo tii jõ tatmof nyõ!’
Tna
retait kmo sryan retait, tibyo ybis raa wait mfot ait makah mamo mbu mam
Yhau mam beto tna raa sikowah ait mamo snok mam wore meen ait yisroh bomhaam wait beta wia tna fo frok.”

Feto tna Yesus yawe, “Soh raa mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to, kmo ait ma. Nhaf mkair ma. Ne nhaf moof u. Soh anu nno feto fee, meen Taja ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, kbe yno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu sait-sait mfi
retait yno to ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo weto mkak. Tna Ait sikba
ro Galilea. Tna yasen yamoʼt
ro Yudea. Yamoʼt aya ro Yordan maam jaro.
Raa msis-sas mama kro Ait. Tna Ait yisoh raa wana ro kiyam ye.
Tna raa ro
baro mama mo kʼAit. Tna mtu bo sanet Ait mawe, “Mfi bo fnya sau mno bo ro mkair aro fee; menohe au maa yako au makus sai. Soh ait yno feto to, ait yiwrek Watum ro Musa ykom oh meto fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Anu wase Bokom ro Allah. Bokom rAit reto mkyas mawe:
‘Maban tiwya tinyi to, Allah yfen raa sme tna yfen fnya ye.
Feto to, ku ro sme kbe sikba yaja ysya yme na tna yamo ysya yfain rait mhau su. Kbe ana mbewok mjin su, bonaut rana sau, mhaf rana sau, tna bewok mno bo wana su ye.’
Kejadian 2:24
Feto ana to, raa mabo ewok u fee. Ana haberek mfi raa sait aran sai. Tna raa sme msya fnya ro Allah yse mrat su to, raa sait bo ye betwat ma.”
Menohe raa ro

me mtu kʼAit mawe, “Musa ybis yawe, soh raa sait yako yfain rait makus to, ait ykom aam ro mako au makus. Ykom tna yee kʼau wia, tna ait yako au. Bokyas aNyõ hayah tna Watum ro Musa to hayah ye. Nyõ nawe fyi meto?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Allah hawe raa sait yako yfain rait. Menohe anu ja hawe nri Watum ro Allah. Tibyo Musa ykom watum reto.
Nri bo refo wia: Awya ro yfain wyahte ait fee, menohe ait yako au makus sai, tna yoo fnya ro mabyõ to, ait retait ywyahte oh meto.”
Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mawe, “Soh feto to, ro moof to raa moo fnya ma.”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bo ro anu nwe reto, Raa beta srau fee. Allah ykyas feto kʼraa taro re ana mse bokyas reto mam ana mhaf wana.

Raa sme taro moo fnya fee. Ana taro to, tiwya fnya mabe to, metsu rana mkair. Ana kbe mjin msya fnya matak fee. Tna taro to, raa roto taro misti ana tibyo moo fnya fee. Tna taro to, mesait mawe mhau bana sai. Allah yamo
ybo ana oh. Tibyo ana mawe mhau bana sai afo re mrero mari bo ro Allah ybis ana. Mari tna kbe masen mamo mno sai. Awya ro yatak yari watum refo to yari oh.”
Tna raa baro makah kukek wana mama mo kʼYesus. Ana mama re kbe Ait yse yatem abyõ kukek wana tna skabuk ana. Kuber ro Yesus wAit mmat feto, tna ana mastako raa weto.

Menohe Yesus ymat feto, tibyo bhah kuber wAit. Bhah ana yawe, “Nitsre ku kinyah weto mama mo kʼJõ. Nwe wa ana to ma! Raa ro mama mo kʼJõ mfi kukek wefo fo, mhaf wana to, Allah ksoh. Ana oh mi mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to.”
Tna Yesus yse yatem abyõ kukek wana weto tna yasen yamo renti naut.
Ati sau to, bi sait yama yo kʼYesus tna ytu yawe,
kbe jõ tno bawya ro moof re kbe meen Allah yno jõ thau hame wajin?”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Fyi re nyõ ntu bo bawya ro moof kʼJõ to? Ja Raa sait aran yoof. Soh nyõ nawe nhau hame wajin to, nari watum ntraa ro tiwya Allah ybis Musa ykom to, nbo nno.”
Menohe bi retait ytu bo kʼAit yawe, “Watum ryo meto?” Tna Yesus yawe,
“‘Nme ajat ma! Nwyah ma! Nsyõf bo to ma! Siroyõ ma!
Nmat nja msya nme na to kaket! Tna nhafri raa ro mhau kene msya anu to ye. Nhafri ana mnan fi anu nhafri netsu wanu nesait ai to.’”
Ulangan 5:16-20; Imamat 19:18
Tna bi ait refi yawe, “Bo weto ja jõ tno beta oh. Bawya sai ro mhau fares?”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh nyõ nawe nno bo ro moof toni to, nno bo sau naut. Namo nasim kta wonyõ beta. Tna nsaim pitis weto kʼraa ro bo marak. Soh nno bo reto to, nyõ name kta mam sawro ro Allah oh meto. Tna fo nama nkro Jõ.”
Bobot retait yari bo ro Yesus yawe feto, tibyo hah ye yamo to sraujin toni.
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Raa ro bobot masen mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, min toni.
Kak
maboh sau kbe mamo twok mam sii hren soo to, mnan-nan baro ye. Menohe raa ro bobot yamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to bo ro min toni.”
Kuber wAit mari feto, tibyo mrok ktak mawe, “Soh feto to, raa awya meen ykai riof?”
Yesus yasu ymat ana tna yawe, “Anu raa to, nesait ntai nno riof kʼanu fee. Menohe Allah yno riof kʼanu saah. Ait ytai yno bo bawya sai.”
Tna Petrus yawe, “Amu wefo nsen sikba bombra wanu beta afo re nma kro Nyõ oh. Tna kbe amu nkai bo bawya?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri oh! Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen tabam refo kbe haberek mamo bo ro tna. Ati reto to, kbe Jõ hre mam ambar
ro mase toni. Kbe Jõ hre abyõ tbo raa woJõ. Tna mam weto ye to, anu nbo 12 fo, kbe hre mam ambar ro mase trion 12 ye. Kbe anu ntu srah kʼraa mana 12 ro Israel to, nri ye.

Tna Jõ tisti re raa taro sikba amah wana afo re kro Jõ. Taro to sikba mao na, mano na, maja msya mme na, kukek wana afo re kbe ana kro Jõ. Taro sikba armato wana bo to makus ye. Kbe ana beta mkai bo weto u muhrin trion 100. Tna meen ana mkai roon ro hame ye.
Menohe raa mawat ro mfo refo masom wana matim wia to, meen masom haberek mee mamo tis. Tna ana ro mfo refo masom mhau tis to, meen masom haberek matim wia.”
“Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, mfi bi yabi sait frok rabu momo yamo saso raa baro. Yawe raa mama misoh armato ro
rait. Ana mkah bo rait tna ait yoo boren yaren ana.
Ait ykai raa baro tna ykyas boren mabyoh jya kbe ait yaren ana. Ana mkyas bo su. Tna ait yawe kbe ana mno bo wait mamo snok hreha tna ait yaren pitis
mauf sau kʼana. Tna ybis ana mamo mkah bo mam armato rait.
Tna baas ayõ moo maa matak bo feto to, bi ait retait frok yamo tna fri raa mabo baro mhau baas sai mam
Tibyo ait yawe kʼana yawe, ‘Nmo nisoh armato ro
ajõ. Tna kbe jõ too boren mnan si taren anu.’ Ana mari feto, masen mamo misoh ye.

Tna mam wore baas ayõ mros susai bo feto, ait frok yamo u. Ait fri raa baro mhau baas sai. Tna ykyas bo ysya ana, yawe mnan anya sai. Tna mam wore hreha ayõ hawer bo feto, ait frok yamo yno bo feto naut u ye.
Tna mam wore ayõ frut bo feto ye, ait frok yamo fri raa roto taro naut. Tna ytu kʼana yawe, ‘Riwai anu nhau baas sai nno fyi?’
Menohe ana mawe kʼait mawe, ‘Raa aro mbis amu nkah bo rait fee.’ Tibyo bi ait yawe, ‘Feto to, nmo nkah bo mam armato
ajõ.’

Kene mam wore arin mti bo feto, tna bi yabi ro armato rait ybis aban mana ro ybo raa ro misoh armato rait yawe, ‘Namo ntu raa ro mkah bo mam armato ajõ to. Nawe ana mama re nyõ naren ana sait-sait. Naren raa ro mama mtis wia. Tna naren raa ro mama hreha. Tna naren ana ro matim rabu.’
Ana ro mkah bo weto mama tna ait yaren ana ro mama mrof wore ayõ mfrut fo wia. Ait yaren ana sait-sait mkah pitis
mauf sau.
Raa ro matim rabu mkah bo to, mmat feto tna mnaut mawe kbe ana raa maren boren mase miwrek ana ro mama mam tis to. Menohe mfe. Aban mana retait yaren ana mkah pitis
mauf sau aran sai ye.
Ana moo boren wana tna ntbur mawe, ‘Bi ro armato
retait yaren bo kaket fee sai a?
Amu ro ntim rabu nkah bo wia ayõ mafit nhai to. Menohe boren ro ait yaren amu mnan anya sai mfi boren ro ait yaren kʼana ro mama mam tis! Yno fyi meto? Ana weto mkah bo ayõ sau aran sai!’
Menohe bi yabi retait yawe kʼana wetait sait yawe, ‘Tao; kmo ma. Jõ tno bo ro mkair aro mai kʼnyõ fee. Riwai anu bkyas bo su bwe anu nkah bo ti ro miyõ sau to, kbe jõ taren anu pitis
mauf sau no?
Noo boren wonyõ tna namo oh. Jõ ksoh taren ana ro mama mam tis ye mnan anya mfi boren ro jõ taren kʼnyõ to ye.
Nyõ nawe jõ tno bo manhai wojõ mkah jõ ksoh ajõ sai to ma fe mfe a? Soh jõ thaf ase tna tatmof raa anya to, kbe nyõ nhaf mkair a?’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto ye, raa ro masom makus mtis to, meen masom haberek matim mana wia. Tna ana ro masom matim mana wia to, meen haberek masom mamo mtis mrof.”
Yesus yawe yamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna Ait ytu kuber wAit mesait aran mama. Tna Ait ykyas bo kʼana yawe,
“Jõ fi ‘Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai.’ Anu bmoʼt Yerusalem mefo. Mam beto to, kbe raa moo Jõ msan
manes msya
ro Yahudi. Tna kbe ana mtu srah mari tibyo mawe safo makan btek mai kʼJõ. Tna mawe raa mame Jõ tajat.
Tibyo ana ro
Yahudi to, kbe moo Jõ msan kʼraa ro wase Allah. Kbe ana mamus Jõ, moo too mmok-mak Jõ, tna kbe ana mame Jõ tajat mam ara warok. Tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Taja yno Jõ trok tasen.”
Bi Zebedeus yfain msya ku wau mabo ewok mama mo kʼYesus. Tna fai au mjit mimna ntmi mam tabam, tna soh-soh Ait.
Yesus ytu kʼfai au yawe, “Bo ro nyõ nayoh kʼJõ to bawya?” Tna fai au mawe, “Meen Nyõ namo
nbo raa mana aNyõ. Jõ tayoh kʼNyõ tawe, noo ku wojõ mabo ewok, nse mbewok hre msya Nyõ re ana mamo mase msya Nyõ ye. Nbis sait hre kʼNyõ mam ati ro natem ati. Tna nbis sait hre mam ati ro natem ta.”
Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu wase bo ro anu nyoh: Fyi, kbe anu ntai nsom kair ro kbe mama mai kʼJõ fe mfe a?” Tna ana mawe, “Amu ntak ye.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Bo ro mai kʼJõ to, saah meen anu nsom ye oh. Menohe awya ro hre mam ati ro tatem ati msya temta to, Jõ oh mi tsok to fee. Raa ro hre mam yuk reto to, meen Taja yesait ysok bo rAit oh.”
Kuber wAit mabo nsaa taro mari bo reto, tibyo ana mrok kmo ana mbewok ro mao kʼanya reto.

Feto tibyo Ait ytu ana mama tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro wase Allah mam tabam refo to, anu nhar nwe raa ro mamo aban mana wana to, ja mberasi raa kinyah ro ana mbo. Tna raa mase ro mhre abyõ mam uu to, mberasi ana ro mamo aban mana weto ye.
Menohe anu to, nno bo feto ma. Awya sai ro yawe yase kʼanu wefo to, ait yamo raabis ranu tna ait yno bo wanu ye tu oh.
Tna awya ro yawe yatim yamo aban mana kʼanu to, ait yamo sryan tna yno bo wanu wia.

Ynan fi Jõ fo. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tama fo, tawe tbis raa mno bo woJõ fee. Menohe Jõ tama fo re tno bo kʼraa. Tna tama re too tetsu ajõ tfes raa mawat. Tibyo kbe ana mkai riof ro mase”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit frok mbam Yerikho fo, raa msis-sas kro Ait.
Tna raa ro masu mboh mabo ewok hre wea mam iso maam weto. Ana mari mawe Yesus yamo frit iti feto, tibyo ana masen mtu kʼAit mawe, “
; Ku ro Daud
, natmof amu!”
Raa msis-sas sor weto kmo bhah ana mbewok mawe, “Shait!” Menohe ana mbewok reto beroh mtu fari renti mawe, “Ku ro Daud, natmof amu!”
Tna Yesus yari feto, tibyo susu yros. Yros tna ytu bo kʼana mbewok yawe, “Anu ksoh nwe Jõ tno bawya kʼanu?”
Ana mawe si kʼAit mawe,
amu nksoh nmat bo ye!”
Yesus yatmof ana tna yiir ana mbewok masu. Tibyo ana masu maah. Tna ana kro Ait mamo ye.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo mam iso ro Yerusalem fares. Tna ana snok remo ro Betfage mam Faut ro
Tna Ait ybis kuber wAit mabo ewok matim wia. Ait yawe,
“Ntim wia, nmoʼt remo reto. Tna twok nmo to, kbe anu nkai
ro ano sau msya maku rau, raa mii mros wea mam weto. Nmo skur mana ewok ye nkuk nma nee kʼJõ.
Soh raa mtu bo kʼanu mawe, ‘Anu skur
weto mkah bawya?’ Nwe kʼana nwe,
ybis yawe amu nma skur fo.’ Tibyo kbe raa retait bitsre anu skur nkah nma.”
Bo reto mabo mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
sait yama ykyas wia yawe,
“Nwe kʼraa ro Yerusalem mam faut ro Sion nwe, ‘Nmat
ranu yama yo kʼanu. Ait yhaf sneh tna Ait yaut
ro tna sau ye.’”
Zakharia 9:9
Tna kuber wAit mabo ewok reto mamo mno bo mfi bo Yesus ysi kʼana feto.
Ana skur
reto mkah maku rau ye mkuk makah mama. Tna raa mrus
wana ro myum ntom mam
kbor abyõ tna Yesus yaut hre abyõ.
Raa mawat mmat he Yesus yama. Tibyo ana mrus
wana ro myum tna tom tar-tar anya mam iso. Tna raa taro msot ara mawyan tom mam iso iti ye.
Raa msis-sas ro matim msya raa ro kro mamo mtis sor to simaut mawe,
Nyõ nase toni! Nyõ fi Ku ro Daud yare.
ybis Nyõ nama to. Anu ro nhau mam sawro ro Allah to; nbaut Ait ye.”
Mazmur 118:26
Yesus twok mam Yerusalem tna raa ro mhau mam
reto mrok mnin-nin. Ana mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bi awya meit ee?”
Raa mawe, “Yasom rAit Yesus. Ait
ro Allah ybis sait. Ait ybam remo ro Nasaret,
ro Galilea.”
Yesus twok mam Samu ro Allah. Ait ymat raa masim bo msya raa ro moo bo mam samu ro Allah mato reto. Ymat feto tna kmo yikyak-yak ana frok mamo. Raa taro hre masim pitis
Masim pitis Samu ro Allah kʼraa ro sriem. Tna raa mhre masim ruu
bo ye. Tna Yesus haberek-barak ambar wana ro masim bo weto.
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Amah aJõ to amah ro mkah bo raa skabuk. Menohe anu nma nno amah reto haberek mfi amah ro raa ro msyõf bo ja mhau sai!’”
Yesaya 56:7; Yeremia 7:11
Tna fo raa ro masu mti msya raa ro maa maka taro sor mama mo kʼYesus mam Samu ro Allah reto. Tna Ait yisoh ana tibyo mrok moof.
manes ro
Yahudi msya

wana mros mmat bo reto ye. Ana mmat bo msai ro Ait yno ye tna mari bo kukek mbaut Ait ye mawe, “Hosana kʼNyõ, Ku ro bi Daud yare. Nyõ fi nase toni!” Raa manes ro Yahudi mmat feto, tibyo ana srau kair.
Ana mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Nyõ nari bo ro ana mawe to, fe mfe a?” Ait yawe, “Ae, Jõ tari to. Ja anu nmat Bokom ro Allah far-far refo fefares a?
‘Kbe Nyõ nno tibyo ku mkek msya ku mees ro mait sis mbaut Nyõ ye.’”
Mazmur 8:3
Yesus ykyas bo weto mkak tna frok sikba
reto yamoʼt remo ro Betania tna yjin mam beto ye.
Rabu ti ana hah me mamoʼt
Ana mamo mam iso maka iti to, Yesus yhai sre.
Tna Ait ymat ara mara sau mros mam iso maam. Ait yamo ymat sas he make aro fee, mata rioh sai. Tibyo Yesus kmo yawe kake reto yawe, “Nyõ meen ne nake u bo fee yum!” Tibyo kake reto mrok samer.
Kuber wAit mmat bo ro Ait yno feto, tibyo ana mrok ktak toni mawe, “Fyi sai oh mi kake reu mrok samer fooh sai u?”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Soh bosmot wanu matak tna anu nnaut maut-mroh fee; kbe anu nno bawya sai mfi Jõ tno feto ye. Tna mfi bo anu nwe kʼatu rno nwe, ‘Atu rno; natu namo nsya mam aya sawan!’ Soh anu tane fee; kbe bo reto mabo tu oh.
Tna bo bawya sai ro anu skabuk nyoh mkah bosmot ro matak to, kbe anu nkai tu oh.”
Yesus hah ye yamo twok mam Samu ro Allah. Ait watum bo mam beto to,
manes msya raa mabi ro Yahudi mama. Ana mama tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Awya oh mi ybis Nyõ, re Nyõ nama nno bo wefo fo? Tna awya oh mi yoo yatak rait yee kʼNyõ fo?”
Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ttu si bo sau kʼanu ye, tawe: ‘Yohanes

tait, ait retait raabis ro Allah fe mfe a?’ Nkyas si kʼJõ wia. Tna fo kbe Jõ tkyas awya ro yoo yatak yee kʼJõ afo re Jõ tno bombra weto sor fo.” Raa manes weto mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Soh bwe Allah oh mi ybis ait to, kbe Yesus yawe, ‘Feto tna fyi re anu ntu sioh bo ro Yohanes yawe?’
Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ttu si bo sau kʼanu ye, tawe: ‘Yohanes

tait, ait retait raabis ro Allah fe mfe a?’ Nkyas si kʼJõ wia. Tna fo kbe Jõ tkyas awya ro yoo yatak yee kʼJõ afo re Jõ tno bombra weto sor fo.” Raa manes weto mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Soh bwe Allah oh mi ybis ait to, kbe Yesus yawe, ‘Feto tna fyi re anu ntu sioh bo ro Yohanes yawe?’
Raa wefo mnaut mawe Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Feto soh anu bwe raa sai ybis ait to, kbe raa kmo anu.”
Feto to ana mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Amu wase ye.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ye te tkyas tatak aJõ ro tno bombra wefo kʼanu fee ye.”
Yesus yawe, “Bonaut ranu to nwe fyi? Bi sait yabe ku sme wait mabo ewok. Bi retait yamo yo ku rait ro yabi tna ybis yawe, ‘Ku ajõ; namo nkah bo mam armato
ranu.’
Tna ku retait yawe, ‘Jõ hawe.’ Menohe tis rau ait ynaut myum-yam tibyo yasen yamo ykah bo mam armato reto.
Tna fo bi ait yamo ybis ku sme rait ro tis feto ye. Ku retait yawe, ‘Ae, kbe jõ tamo tisoh.’ Menohe ait yamo fee. Ait yhau sai.
Feto sik anu nwe: Ku sme mabo ewok reto to, awya ro oh mi yno bo ro yaja ybis to?” Ana mawe, “Ait ro yabi.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto ye, anu meen nkus mtis agus. Tna raa ro ja moo namabyoh
msya fnya ro mwyah bo to, meen ana matim wia mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo.
Yohanes yama yerif iso ro moof kʼanu menohe anu smot ait fee. Raa ro ja moo namabyoh to, msya fnya ro mwyah bo to, ana smot
oh tna haberek mno bo ro moof ye. Anu ye nmat iso ro moof reto menohe anu nashana tna smot Ait fee.”
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nri bofret sau refo naut: ‘Bobot sait yyum
mara mawat mam tabam rait. Tna ait yame tok yur ytan. Tna ait yabah kayah sau mkah kbe raa moo
make mse maut mberkait tna moo maya rau to. Tna ait sgi harit sau mkah kbe raa mjin kmot armato reto ye. Ait yno bo weto mkak tna fo ybis raa baro yawe ana mkah tna kmot armato
rait reto wea, kwiyat kʼana. Ait yawe kbe ana moo make rau to, saim taro hayah kʼait. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto.
Ait yhau mam oo reto kait. Tna soo ro
mara wait weto make manes to, bobot retait ybis sryan wait hah mamoʼt tabam rait, mamo mo kʼraa ro kmot armato reto. Bobot retait ybis sryan wait yawe, “Nkyas kʼana ro kmot armato ajõ nwe ana mryoh
make aro moo mee kʼanu. Tna noo
make weto nkah nma nee kʼjõ.”

Tna sryan weto masen mamo. Ana mamo snok mam tabam ro bobot rait reto. Menohe raa ro kmot armato reto to huwya mfot sryan weto. Ana mmuk-mak sait, tna mame sait yajat ye, tna moo fraa mai sait naut ye.
Feto tna bobot retait ybis sryan wait roto taro mawat mamo. Menohe raa huwya sikowah ana mfi sryan ro ait ybis matim wia to ye.
Mamo snok mam tis rau to, bobot retait ybis ku rait yesait ykah yabo yamo. Ait ynaut yawe, “Kbe ana waa ait tibyo mno bo moof kʼait to.” Tna ku ait yasen yamo.
Menohe raa ro kmot armato
reto mmat he ku ait yama. Tna ana mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Ait ro meen shauk armato refo yama mefi! Ait refi yhau ma! Nma, anu bme ait yajat to, afo re meen armato refo mhau kʼanu!”
Tibyo ana mfot ait mkuk makah mamoʼt armato mne rau tna mame ait yajat.’”
Tna Yesus ytu yawe, “Ati ro Bobot ro armato rait retait hah yama to, kbe yno bo bawya kʼana ro kmot armato reto?”
Ana mawe, “Ait kbe yame raa ro mno bo mkair-kar weto. Tna ysan armato
reto kʼraa roto taro. Tna ati ro soo ro
make mama to, kbe raa weto mryoh to, tna moo taro mee kʼait.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ja anu nmat Bokom ro Allah to fe mfe fares a? Bokom reto mawe,
‘Raa saso fraa mawe sgi samu sau. Ana mmat fraa sau mawe mkair. Fraa reto to, ana hawe. Tibyo moo mbeak makus. Menohe ana wase bo fraa reto oh mi fraa ro ati.
oh mi yno bo reto mabo. Tna anu bnaut bwe bo reto moof toni.’
Mazmur 118:22-23
Tna feto Jõ tawe kʼanu nbi ro Yahudi fo tawe, kbe anu ne kmot raa mana ro Allah rAit u fee. Kbe Ait yoo raa wAit ysan kʼraa roto kmot afo re kbe ana mno bo ro moof ye.
Awya ro btek yai abyõ mam fraa reto to, kbe sasyoh-sasah. Tna awya ro fraa reto btek mai to, kbe sari ye.]”
Tna
manes ro Yahudi msya raa ro
mari bofret ro Yesus ykyas weto. Mari to, ana mhar mawe Ait ykyas bo weto mai kʼana.
Tibyo ana saim bo mawe mfot Ait. Menohe raa makin ro mhau mam weto mnaut mawe Yesus tait
ro Allah ybis yama sait. Tibyo raa manes ro Yahudi weto waa bo mfot Ait mam wore raa makin mmat. Ana mnaut mawe kbe raa weto kmo ana.
Tna Yesus fret bo u kʼana yawe,
“Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Reto mfi bawya?
sait yakyõ bokyõ ro ku sme rait ymen fnya tna to.
retait ybis sryan wait mbo taah mamo mmen raa mama makyõ bokyõ rait. Menohe raa weto hawe. Ana mama fee.
Feto tna
retait ybis sryan wait roto taro yawe, ‘Nmo nwe kʼana nwe, “Bo sohmaam ro bokyõ refo jõ siwyan wea oh. Jõ ktan
maboh wojõ ro moof sor. Tna msya bo sohmaam roto taro to, jõ siwyan bo ye oh. Ku sme ajõ yoo fnya, feto nma anu bkyõ bokyõ tna sohmaam bo su.”’
Menohe raa ro ait yoo taah yee sor to, ana mama fee ye. Sait yamoʼt armato rait. Tna ana taro msui mno bo wana sai.
Tna ana taro mfot sryan ro
wait weto, sikowah tna mame ana majat ye.
refi yari sryan wait bo raa mame feto, tibyo ait yrok kmo toni. Tna ait ybis raa ro sbe wait mamo mame raa ro taa mame sryan wait. Tna mbis ana mkah
rana mait ye.
Ana mno bo weto mkak oh, tna
retait ytu sryan wait mama. Tna yawe, ‘Bo sohmaam ro bokyõ reto amu siwyan oh, menohe raa ro taa jõ too taah tee to, mama fee. Ana weto mkair tibyo kbe ana sohmaam bo su msya jõ fee ye.
Feto to, nsen frok nmoʼt iso krewe makin-akan sor. Tna awya sai ro anu nkai to, nmen ana beta mama sohmaam bo ro bokyõ refo.’
Tibyo sryan weto mamo tna mmen raa makin-akan ro ana fri mam iso sor to mama beta. Raa ro ana mmen mama to, taro raa ro moof tna taro raa ro mkair ye. Raa msis-sas weto mama tna sohmaam bo su.
Tna
retait yama ymat sas raa ro hre sohmaam bo su mam bokyõ reto. Ait ymat he raa sait yyum ratan rait ro mkair. Ait yyum ratan ro bokyõ fee.
ymat feto tna ytu bo kʼait retait yawe, ‘Nyõ namaʼt bokyõ ajõ menohe nyum ratan ro bokyõ to fee! Nno fyi meto?’ Ait retait yari feto menohe shait bait sai.
Tna fo
ybis sryan wait yawe, ‘Nmo nfot ait retait nke yaa msya yatem tna nkah beak fari mne mam wore wo mamur hto toni to. Meen raa mkai bo ro mkair-kar tibyo mawia kanasyah bo ye mam beto.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Allah Ait ytu raa msis-sas mama. Menohe Ait ysok raa mabo kebet baro sai mamo raa wAit.”
Raa ro
frok mbam yuk reto tna mamo siret su. Tna saim bo mawe kbe ana mtu bo kʼYesus tna sanet Ait feto.
Tibyo ana mbis kuber wana msya raa ro
Herodes wait baro mamo mtu bo kʼYesus. Ana masen mamo mtu mawe, “Bi
amu nhar nwe Nyõ ja sioh fee. Tna Nyõ waa raa ro manes fee ye. Nyõ beroh nkyas bokyas ro Allah kʼawya sai. Tna iso ro Allah to, ja Nyõ nerif abyõ kʼraa to, nmyõt bo fee ye.
Feto to amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Allah ksoh yawe anu mbero namabyoh
fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yhar yawe ana mhaf mkair. Tna yawe, “Anu nmo wan-wan tibyo sioh ntu bo sne mate kʼJõ to, nno fyi meto?
Noo pitis mauf ro ja raa moo mee mkah namabyoh reto. Nee kʼJõ tmat wia.” Tna ana moo pitis
mauf sau mama mee kʼAit ymat.
Tna Ait yawe, “Nmat
refo: Raa mkom awya yasom rait mefo?”
Ana mawe,
msya bokom rait meto.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh feto, bo bawya ro Kaisar rait to, noo nee Kaisar. Tna bo bawya ro Allah rait to, noo nee kʼAllah ye.”
Ana mari bo ro Ait yawe feto, tibyo mrok ktak sai, tna masen sikba Ait mamo ye.
Rere to, raa ro
baro mama mo kʼYesus. (Raa ro
to raa ro
Yahudi ye, menohe ana ja mnaut mawe raa ro mhai to, meen me mrok masen fee.) Ana mtu kʼAit mawe,
“Bi
tiwya Musa ykom yawe, ‘Soh raa sait yhai tna ait sano. Semit reto kbe yao kro mkah yabe ku aro mkah shauk biin ait ro yhai retait.’
Tna amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Mfi bo raa sme mabo ngkrema mao kʼanya mhau. Tna ro bum ymen fai sau, he ait sano tna yhai kba. Tibyo yao sait yama kro semit rana.
Ait kro menohe yabe ku aro fee ye. Feto ye yao ro tuuf yama kro semit rana naut menohe yabe ku aro fee ye. Feto ye mnan anya sai mamo snok ro ngkrema beta.
Ana ro mao na kʼanya mhai beta mkak. Tna fai au mhai mrof ye.”
Tna raa ro
weto mamo ti te mtu Yesus mawe, “Meen ati ro hai mrok masen to, awya yfain fai reto? Tiwya ana mabo ngkrema ye mfain fai au reto ye fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bonaut ranu mkair meto. Anu wase Bokom ro Allah msya Ait yatak rAit ye.
Meen ati ro raa mrok masen to, raa moo fnya u fee tna fnya msya raa u fee ye.
sor ja moo fnya fee. Meen raa mhau sai mfi
mam sawro ro Allah.
Nnaut nwe Allah ykyas raa ro mhai tna meen mrok masen to yawe,
‘Jõ fi Allah ro Abraham, Ishak msya Yakub ja smot.’
Keluaran 3:6
Anu bhar bwe hohos wanu weto ro mhai ooh oh. Menohe Allah yawe feto tibyo anu bhar bwe ana mhai tibyo fee. Allah yawe ana mhau mam sawro rAit smot Ait fares to.”
Nnaut nwe Allah ykyas raa ro mhai tna meen mrok masen to yawe,
‘Jõ fi Allah ro Abraham, Ishak msya Yakub ja smot.’
Keluaran 3:6
Anu bhar bwe hohos wanu weto ro mhai ooh oh. Menohe Allah yawe feto tibyo anu bhar bwe ana mhai tibyo fee. Allah yawe ana mhau mam sawro rAit smot Ait fares to.”
Raa msis-sas weto mari feto, tibyo ana mrok ktak bokyas ro Ait ykyas reto sai.
Raa ro
mari he Yesus ykyas bo kʼraa ro
tna yno re ana mmai u fee. Feto to ana ro
mamo mtu bo kʼYesus ye.
Ana sait yamo
Yahudi. Ait yawe sanet ytu bo kʼYesus yawe,
watum ryo oh mi mase toni mam Watum ro Musa to?”
Yesus yawe,
“Nhafri
Allah ranu mkah nhaf, srau wanu beta, tna mkah bohar ranu beta ye.
Ulangan 6:5
Watum ro tinyi msya watum ro mase ye oh meto.
Tna watum ro ewok mnan reto ye:
‘Nhafri raa ro mhau kene msya anu to ye. Nhafri ana mnan fi anu nhafri netsu wanu nesait ai to.’
Imamat 19:18
Watum ro tiwya Musa ysya
na mkom to, masmair rau to mbam watum ewok refo ye.”
Raa ro
mkyas bo su wea, tna Yesus yama ytu kʼana yawe,
“Anu nnaut
tait nwe fyi? Ait tait Ku ro bi awya yare?” Menohe ana mawe,
tait Kube ro Daud.”
Yesus yawe, “Tiwya Har ro
misbyõ bi Daud ybis ait ykyas
to, menohe ytu Ait yawe,
ajõ’. Tiwya Daud yawe,
yawe

ajõ yawe, “Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam ati ro tatem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Hre wea. Tna raa ro byoh, raa ro srau kair kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe Nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ, nbo ana.”’”
Mazmur 110:1
Yesus yawe u yawe, “Tiwya Daud ytu
rait’ to, fyi re anu nkyas nwe
tait Kube ro Daud?”
Feto tibyo raa sait bo yatak ykyas bo si kʼAit fee. Tna raa aro ter-ter mtu bo kʼYesus u fee.
Yesus ykyas kʼraa makin msya kuber wAit sor yawe,
Yahudi msya raa ro
to, ana shauk hroh ro Musa.
Feto to nri oh; Jõ ksoh anu nri watum rana. Tna nno bo bawya sai ro ana mbis kʼanu to. Menohe nno nfi ana ma: Ja ana mno bo ro ana mesait mkyas weto fee!
Ana mbis anu nno bo ro samyoh. Watum rana mfi bo samyoh ro ana make tubat tna mse kʼraa roto masom. Menohe ana mesait mbet raa weto msya ana masom su fee.
Raa ro
ana mkom Watum ro Allah baro mam ratan ro ana myum. Tna ratan ro ana myum to, betau mafyan miyõ kro mamo snok mte ye. Bo ro ana mno weto beta to, ana mawe mno afo re raa mmat tna bibi ana ye.
Soh ana mamoʼt bokyõ to, ja ana msok ambar ro moof tna hre. Tna soh mamoʼt samu watum to, ana ksoh hre mam ambar raa ro mase ja hre.
Ana ksoh bo raa hartu ana, mmah meen kʼana mam
tna mtu ana mawe, ‘Bi
to.
Nno feto ma.
ranu sait aran sai. Tna anu beta to nnan anya sai. Feto to, nwe raa mtu anu
rana’ to ma.
Tna Bja ranu tait sait aran. Ait yhau mam sawro rAit. Feto to, nwe raa ro yhau mam tabam ‘anu bja ranu’ to ma.
yesait aran oh mi yamo aban mana ranu to. Feto to, nwe anu aro nmo aban mana bo to ma.
Awya ro yase ybo anu to, kbe ait yamo raabis ranu tna yno bo wanu wia.
Tna awya ro yawe, ‘Jõ fi raa ro tase.’ kbe Allah yno ait haberek yamo raabis ranu tna yno bo wanu ye. Tna awya ro kbor sneh yamo raabis ranu to, kbe Allah yno ait haberek yamo raa ro yase ye.
Anu
Yahudi nsya raa ro
: Anu fo raa ro ja sioh-sah sai! Anu nmo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, fee. Tna soh raa roto mawe tomer mamo raa wAit to, anu ja nno wa. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu
nsya raa ro

: Anu fo raa ro ja sioh-sah anu sai! Anu skabuk miyõ wer afo re raa mmat anu. Ana mmat feto tna mnaut mawe anu raa ro ja nno bo moof sai. Semit mnaut mawe anu raa ro ja nno bo ro moof ye menohe anu haberek sifuut ana, tna soyak amah wana no kʼanu. Feto to, meen bo ro mkair toni mama mai kʼanu tu oh.]
Anu
nsya raa ro

: Anu fo raa ro sioh-sah anu sai! Anu safo triar nmo fari; anu frit sawan ye tna nmo iso mne ro miyõ mbra sor ye. Anu nmo to, nwe nno raa sait beak bosmot rait tna haberek kro bosmot ranu. Soh ait haberek tna kro

ranu to, yamo kuber ranu to, kbe anu nber ait kaket fee. Anu nkyas watum ro mkair tibyo ait yamo yfi anu. Kbe ait raa ro sioh ait sai ye. Tis rau ykair-kar. Meen Allah yoo ait yse mam tafoh ro arin kair reto ye. Anu ja nber ait, nerif iso ro sre kʼait. Feto to meen bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu fo raa ro nerif iso kʼraa roto menohe anu nesait nsu mboh! Anu nesait wase iso nmo. Anu nwe, ‘Soh raa
mtom Samu ro Allah to, kbe bo
reto matak fee.’ Menohe anu nwe, ‘Soh raa
mtom
ro mhau mam Samu ro Allah to, kbe bo
reto matak ye.’ Anu nkyas feto tibyo meen bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu fo raa ro wase bo tna nsu mboh! Bo ro moof to, au myo?
reto to, bo ro ati meto fee. Samu ro Allah oh mi mno re
reto moof toni mnan si bo ro Allah rAit to.
Tna anu nwe, ‘Awya ro
ytom wohat
ro raa msan bo kʼAllah to, bo
reto matak fee. Menohe soh raa
ytom kak ro raa msan abyõ mam wohat reto to, kbe kak reto make bo
reto matak ye.’

Anu fo raa ro nsu mboh! Bo ro moof to, au miyo? Kak mesait reto bo ro ati meto fee. Menohe soh raa moo kak reto mse abyõ mam wohat tna msan kʼAllah to, wohat oh mi mno re kak reto moof mnan si re Allah ksoh to.
Feto to, awya ro
ytom wohat reto to, ait
mkah bombra ro raa msan kʼAllah mam wohat abyõ ye oh meto.
Tna awya ro
ytom Samu ro Allah to, ait
ytom samu reto, tna msya Allah ro yhau mam samu mato reto ye.
Tna awya ro
ytom sawro ro Allah to, ait
ytom Allah ro hre abyõ tna yhau mam sawro reto ye oh.”
“Anu
Yahudi nsya raa ro

to: Anu fo raa ro ja sioh-sah anu sai! Anu nwe ja anu nbo Watum ro Musa kaket. Tna re ja bombra bawya sai anu noo baro nsan kʼAllah. Feto tna bo saryoh kinyah ro ja anu nyum mam armato wanu mkah bo nfiat bo ro anu sohmaam to, anu noo baro nsan kʼAllah ye: Mfi
msya
bo to, ja anu noo baro nsan kʼAllah ye

Bo ro maku reto anu nno. Menohe ja anu niwana bo ro ati: Anu nno bo moof kʼraa fee. Anu natmof raa fee. Tna anu smot Allah kaket fee ye. Bo ro ati weto to, anu nbo nno fee! Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu fo nnaut nwe anu nhar iso ro Allah kaket re nerif kʼraa roto ye. He mfe. Anu fo raa ro nsu mboh! Soh anu nmat bubaa mam hawereh mato to, anu noo beak. Menohe
maboh ro mhau mam hawereh mato to, anu nta niya u mamoʼt nhaf mato!
Anu
nsya raa ro
: Anu fo raa ro ja sioh-sah anu sai! Hawereh msya

to, anu nyon mne rau moof kaket. Menohe mato rau to, mkair fares. Anu nesait nfi feto ye. Anu to noof mne sai. Menohe nhaf mato wanu to, mkair: Ja anu nasmamo tna ntak bo raa ye. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu raa
to, raa ro nsu mboh! Nyon hawereh marak msya
ro anu nsyõ boit to, nyon mato moof wia. Nno feto afo re kbe mne to, moof ye.
Anu
nsya raa ro
: Anu fo raa ro sioh-sah anu sai! Ja raa moo hai sama mam isra mato. Tna mawah

mate isra mne rau. Mno feto tna kbe raa mmat moof toni. Menohe mato rau to, mkair: raa mtai msya afan bo mrek-rek yiis ye. Anu nesait nfi isra weto. Anu ja nno bo re kbe raa mmat tna mawe anu raa ro moof. Menohe anu nhaf mato ranu to, mkair. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu
nsya raa ro
: Anu fo raa ro sioh-sah anu sai! Ja raa moo hai sama mam isra mato. Tna mawah

mate isra mne rau. Mno feto tna kbe raa mmat moof toni. Menohe mato rau to, mkair: raa mtai msya afan bo mrek-rek yiis ye. Anu nesait nfi isra weto. Anu ja nno bo re kbe raa mmat tna mawe anu raa ro moof. Menohe anu nhaf mato ranu to, mkair. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.
Anu
nsya raa ro
: Anu raa ro ja sioh-sah anu sai! Meen bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu! ⌞Tiwya Allah ybis
na mama. Tna hohos ranu mame
weto majat.⌟ Mfo refo anu ja nisoh isra ro tiwya tinyi raa sama
weto. Tna raa ro tiwya mno bo ro Allah ksoh to,
wana to, ja anu fayir moof ye. Anu nno feto to, nnaut nwe anu nno bo moof miwrek hohos wanu.
Anu sioh anu nwe, ‘Mfi bo tiwya tinyi amu nhau ye mam wore amu hohos na mhau weto to, maami amu aro nno bo nfi ana fee. Amu nme
weto fee.’
Menohe anu nesait nwe bo ranu ai oh nwe anu fo nbam raa mana ro tiwya mame
na sor to.
Feto ye, kbe anu nme raabis ro Allah wAit mnan fi anu hohos na wanu tiwya tinyi mno wia to.
Anu fo raa ro ja nno safo yoyo! Anu nfi abboh ro ja mafit raa majat to! Fyi re anu nwe nsam nmo sikba bo mkair-kar ro meen btek mai kʼanu mam rabin ro arin kair to?
Nri kaket: Kbe Jõ tbis
na woJõ, msya raa ro ja mhar bo kaket, msya

taro ye mama mo kʼanu. Ana taro to, meen anu nme majat. Tna ana taro to, kbe anu nme majat mam ara warok ye. Tna taro to, kbe anu sikowah ana ye. Tna kbe anu nbo too nmok-mak ana mam samu watum wanu to. Meen anu nikyak raa woJõ taro nbam
ranu tna anu saka ana msam mamo snok mam
roto taro ye.

Tiwya raa ro ja mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, hohos na wanu nfot ana mame. Ana oh mi maban Habel mamo snok bi Zakharia (ro bi Berekhya yare tait. Anu hohos na mame Zakharia yajat susai mam Samu ro Allah jaro tna mam wohat
jaro si masuf.) Safo weto beta to meen anu nsom isti tu oh.
Nri kaket; safo weto meen anu beta nsom tu oh.”
“Raa ro Yerusalem
mame

ro Allah sor majat. Tna raa ro Allah ybis mamo mkyas bokyas rAit to, ja raa ro Yerusalem mame ana majat ye. Ana moo fraa mai raa weto tibyo majat. Muhrin aro rau-rau Jõ srau kero ana. Tawe tatmof ana tna takrao ana tse mam wo sau re kmot ana. Mfi kook mabi ro makrao maku tna maut mabum kait to ye. Menohe anu hawe ye. Feto to Jõ sraujin raa ro Yerusalem, bo ro meen mama mai kʼana:
Allah kbe meen yatam ana ro mhau mam Yerusalem u fee. Ait sikba ana agus.
Kbe Jõ sikba tabam refo tna anu nmat Jõ u fee. Anu nmat Jõ fee mamo snok mam ati ro tabam refo haberek. Tna ati reto meen anu nanwaruk nwe,
‘Ait yase toni!
ybis Ait yama tu oh.’”
Mazmur 118:26
Yesus sikba Samu ro Allah yamo. Tna kuber wAit mama mo kʼAit tna merif koot ro Samu ro Allah mros to kʼAit.
Tna Yesus haberek yawe, “Nmat samu weto beta. Meen raa mitrah samu weto. Tna kbe
msya fraa sau bo mhau matak ntar-tar anya u fee. Kbe fraa weto sgik mbtek mai tabam beta.”
Yesus yaut yamo hre mam Faut ro

. Tna kuber wAit mama mkyas bo msya Ait yesait kar. Ana mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Tija re bo ro Nyõ nkyas weto mabo to? Kbe amu nmat bo bawya re nhar nwe oon mabu ro Nyõ nama to? Tna amu nmat bo bawya re nhar nwe tabam refo kene sboh rau ye to?”
Yesus yawe, “Kaket anu! Nno be raa mama sioh besruf anu.
Jõ fi
sait aran. Menohe meen raa mawat mama tna sruf bo mawe ana
ybam kʼAllah. Kbe raa mawat mari feto tna smot raa weto.
Kbe anu nri he raa rabin taro meanya tna mafa mnin-nin. Bo weto kbe mabo tu oh. Menohe waa ma: Bo weto kbe frok matim wia. Bo weto frok mama tna tabam refo ayõ rau ro haberek tetara fee.
Tna raa ro
sau kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro
roto taro. Tna raa ro
sait ybo kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro
roto taro mbo ye. Tna kbe hai awyah btek mai kʼraa, tna kbe iin frok mam wore aro rau-rau ye.
Menohe bo ro samyoh weto beta to makit rau sai fares meto. Wore wo anu nmat bo weto to, kbe anu nhar nwe oon reto mabo oh. Reto mfi fnya ro mhaf ja kborham wia, tna kbe mabe ku to.
Anu nkro Jõ to, tibyo kbe raa mfot anu msan kʼraa sikowah tna mame anu njat ye. Tna raa
ro tabam refo beta kbe knait anu.
Ati reto to, raa mawat ro tiwya smot Jõ wia to, kbe haberek. Tna kbe ana hren ksuk kʼanya ye tna knait anya ye.
Tna kbe raa mawat mama sioh raa mawe, ana to
ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe. Bo ro ana mkyas to, kbe raa mawat mari tna kro ye.
Bo mkair-kar ro mfo wefo raa mno sor to, mrok msai renti. Tibyo raa mawat kbe miranya kaket u fee.
Tna awya ro bito smot Jõ matak mamo snok mam oon sboh rau to, meen ait ykai riof ro mase.
Tna bokyas moof ro mkyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, kbe raa mkyas. Mkyas kʼraa ro
makin mam arin aso refo beta mari. Mari wia tna fo oon rau sboh oh meto.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nmat bokom refo tna kbe anu nfot bo ro Jõ tawe kʼanu: Tiwya Allah ybis
Daniel ykyas yawe,
‘Meen bo sau ro mkair toni mama sikowah yuk ro mbau to.’
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ati ro anu nmat bo reto mabo to, anu nhar nwe kene mam wore wo tabam refo haberek. Ati ro anu nmat bo reto to,
anu ro nhau mam
ro Yudea to; nsen nsam nmo nuut atu mana.
Anu ro hre abyõ mam samu wanu kri-kri to; kbe nroh satoh bo wanu mbam amah mato nbo frok to ma! Bo weto makus rof.
Anu ro nkah bo mam armato to; hah ne nmo noo ratan wanu ma. Nsam fooh nmo sai.
Wore weto to, fnya ro mhaf tna msya fnya ro mee sis ku mees wana fares to, ana mmof toni. Ana kbe matak msam fooh fee.
Skabuk nyoh
afo re meen ati ro anu nsam to, nsam mam snyi ro ja oom maah mais to ma. Tna re meen anu nsam mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
bo to ma ye.

Meen wore weto to, arin mkair toni. Maban tiwya tinyi Allah sair tabam refo mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, raa mkai bo ro mfi feto aro fee. Tna bo ro mkair-kar mfi feto to, aro meen me btek mai kʼraa u fee.
Oon ro samyoh reto to, oos mawe Allah yatmof raa sok wAit. Feto to yawe yisusu oon reto mabuf baro. Soh mfe to, raa sait bo meen ye yhau fee. Soh mfe to, raa beta mhai.
Meen, ati reto to, raa ro mawe besruf anu to, kbe frok mama. Taro mawe ana to
he mfe. Tna taro mawe ana to

ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe ye. Wore weto to ana sair bo ro hnah. Tna mno bo ro msai mawat ye. Ana mawe besruf raa beta. Ana tomer besruf raa sok ro Allah wAit ye he mfe. Feto to, soh raa sait yawe kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rno mno!’ Soh yawe feto to, nri ait ma! Tna soh sait yawe kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rau mau.’ Nri bo ro yawe to ma!
Meen, ati reto to, raa ro mawe besruf anu to, kbe frok mama. Taro mawe ana to
he mfe. Tna taro mawe ana to

ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe ye. Wore weto to ana sair bo ro hnah. Tna mno bo ro msai mawat ye. Ana mawe besruf raa beta. Ana tomer besruf raa sok ro Allah wAit ye he mfe. Feto to, soh raa sait yawe kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rno mno!’ Soh yawe feto to, nri ait ma! Tna soh sait yawe kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rau mau.’ Nri bo ro yawe to ma!
Nnaut bo ro tawe kʼanu fo. Jõ tkyas bo refo kʼanu wia wore wo bo weto frok mama fefares to.
Soh raa mawe kʼanu mawe, ‘Nmat,
yama oh mam tabam ro riamo yama oh!’ Soh raa mawe feto to, nri ana ma. Nmo teto ma. Tna soh raa mawe,
yama yhau mam amah rno hawar jaro oh!’ Soh raa mawe feto to, nri ana ma ye.

Ati ro 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' yama to, kbe raa beta mmat tna mhar mawe Ait yama. Soh rir mrir mbukak abyõ mam ayoh to, ja raa mmat rir reto maban ati ro ayõ maut mamo snok mam ati ro ayõ twok to. Jõ te tama u to, kbe raa beta mmat tna mhar Jõ feto ye.
Tna wore bo ro mhai mhau akus to, hofyoh yiis mhar ye oh. Tna ana mawat mama fru-fra mamo-me mam yuk reto ye.”

“Oon ro samyoh reto mkak wia, tna ayõ mrok mti mamur ye, tna snyi mrok mawyah fee ye, tna sken ro mhau abyõ mam ayoh to btek-tak ye, tna bombra ro mhau abyõ mam ayoh to mrok mnah-nah mamo mai jaro-jaro ye.
Mam ayõ reto to, raa mmat ayoh.
Ana mmat bo tna mhar mawe, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' yama mefo. Raa

beta mam tabam refo to, mmat bo reto. Mmat tibyo mrok mawyan surut ana mkak. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen ati reto to, raa mmat Jõ tbam ayoh mboh abyõ troh tama. Tama to, raa mmat tatak aJõ msya tase aJõ ro msai ye.
Tna saa buk-buk mawia. Feto tna Ait ybis
wAit mama msok raa sok wAit moo mbam arin aso wofo beta.
Bofret ro kake mara reto to, nnaut maja rau kaket: Soh nkre ro mo safom tna sne-sne moof to, feto to anu nhar nwe kene wore snyi ro hwyõm oh meto.
Feto ye, soh anu nmat bo weto beta mama to, anu nhar nwe oon ro Jõ tama u to, kene oh meto.
Nnaut: Ati ro bo wefo beta mama to, tawe biin reto to, kbe raa taro mhau fares.
Ayoh msya tabam refo kbe saef marak. Menohe bokyas aJõ kbe meen mhau mawyõs mamo snok mam hame wajin.
Ayõ ro Jõ tama u to, raa sait bo yhar fee.
ana wase ye. Jõ, Ku ro Allah yare fi twase ye. Taja yesait aran yhar bo rAit.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' meen hah ye yama. Ait hah ye yama to, kbe raa mhau mno bo wana mnan wore wo tiwya Nuh yhau:
Tiwya mam wore aya mabo betru tabam refo fefares to, ja raa mnaut mamos wana fee. Raa mait bo sai. Tna raa msya fnya moo anya sai. Raa mno bo weto mamo snok mam ati ro Nuh twok mam wiak aken rait to.
Ati reto raa mhau ninya sai. Tna aya mabo frok mama betru ana msu beta. Meen ati ro 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' yama to, arin to, mfi feto ye.
Ati reto to, raa mabo ewok mkah bo mam armato rana. Kbe
woJõ mroh tubat sait tna sait yhau agus.
Tna fnya mabo ewok hre mmuk
make to ye. Kbe
woJõ mroh tubat sau tna sau mhau agus ye.
Anu ye wase oon ro
ranu yama. Feto to, hre byõ-abyõ sai.

Nnaut bofret refo kaket wia: Bi sait yhar yawe, ‘Mti fo, kbe raa ro ja ysyõf bo yama yitrah amah ajõ tna ysyõf bo wojõ.’ Soh ait yhar ayõ raa ro ysyõf bo retait ysaim to, kbe ait yjin fee. Yhau wan afo re raa ysyõf bo wait fee.
'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' kbe meen yama u. Kbe hah yama u mam ayõ ro anu wase tna kbe nwof Ait fee. Feto to nhau siwyan Ait yoyo.”

Yesus yawe, “Bobot sait ysok sryan wait sait yamo aban mana ybo sryan wait roto taro. Tna ybis sryan retait yoo boit saim kʼsrian anya wait roto taro ye. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto. Soh sryan retait mur-mur yno bo ro Bobot ybis to, ait tait sryan ro yhar bo. Tna ati ro bobot retait yhah ye yama to, soh ait ymat aban mana retait ja yno bo rait ro ybis kaket to, feto moof.

Yesus yawe, “Bobot sait ysok sryan wait sait yamo aban mana ybo sryan wait roto taro. Tna ybis sryan retait yoo boit saim kʼsrian anya wait roto taro ye. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto. Soh sryan retait mur-mur yno bo ro Bobot ybis to, ait tait sryan ro yhar bo. Tna ati ro bobot retait yhah ye yama to, soh ait ymat aban mana retait ja yno bo rait ro ybis kaket to, feto moof.
Nri kaket: Kbe bobot ysok sryan ro yari bo ro ait yawe retait yse kmot bombra wait beta.
Menohe mfi bo sryan ro yamo aban mana retait tait yhaf rait mkair. Tna ynaut yawe, ‘Bobot ajõ yarak, kbe yhah yama fooh fee.’
Feto tna ait yno bo ro mkair: Ait yai sryan ro kinyah taro. Tna yasmamo yait boit, yata aya ysya raa ro ja bisir-basar sai.
Kbe bobot rait snok yama. Yama mam ayõ ro sryan ro yamo aban mana retait siwyan fee. Bobot rait snok yama tna ymat bo mkair ro sryan retait yno.

Tibyo bobot retait kmo. Kbe ait simoyot-mayat sryan retait. Tna ybis ait yamo yhau mam yuk ro kair. Tibyo yamo yhau mam weto su ysya raa ro ja sioh ana ai to. Mam weto to, kbe raa mawia tna kanasyah ye.”
⌞Yesus ksoh re raa siwyan ana mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to.⌟ Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, ⌞raa taro siwyan fee, kbe ntwok fee.⌟ Reto mfi ku ano mabo nsaa mbo
wana mamo mawe mtar ku sme ro siwyan yoo fnya ro tna.
Ana ro ano mabo nsaa reto to, mabo maat mhar bo, tna mabo maat wase bo.
Ana ro wase bo to, mbo
wana marak sai,
aro fee.
Tna ana ro mhar bo to, mbo
wana, tna mbo
wana mkah kusia ye.
Tna ku sme ro ana ste retait yama fee kait sai. Tibyo ana mjin maka, tna mjin tu ye.
Tna mam wore arin masuf raa sait ytu yawe, ‘Ait ro yoo fnya retait yama oh! Nsen ntar-tar ait!’
Tna ku ano wefo mrok masen misoh
wana.
Ku ano ro wase bo, ana mayoh kʼana ro mhar bo mawe,
wanu
marak, tna kene wore mhai! Noo
wanu baro nee kʼamu.’
Menohe ku ano ro mhar bo mawe,
wamu mnan amu oh. Fyi re amu noo baro nee kʼanu? Nmo no kʼraa ro masim
tna noo aro kʼanu!’
Ku ano ro wase bo weto masen mamo saso
Ana marak tna ku sme ro yoo fnya retait yama. Tna ana ro siwyan wea kro ait mamo twok mam amah ro raa makyõ bokyõ. Tna raa muut mato matak wa.
Tna ku ano mabo maat ro wase bo weto mama tna mtu mawe, ‘Bobot
nitrah mato kʼamu.’
Menohe ait yawe, ‘Jõ wase anu ye.’”
Yesus ykyas bofret reto maum oh meto tna yawe, “Anu ye wase ayõ ro
ranu yama. Feto to, hre byõ-abyõ wea kaket.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to. Reto mfi bobot sait ro yawe yamoʼt rabin ro fari-fara sau. Tna ait ytu sryan wait mama tna ait ysan kta wait taro kʼana somya ha-hayah ye.
Ait saim kta weto kʼana mamyot ana matak rana ro kbe ntho. Sryan sait to ait fyah pitis
trion maat. Tna ait sait naut fyah pitis
ewok ye. Tna sryan sait naut fyah pitis
sau sai. Bobot retait saim bo weto kʼana agus tna fo yasen yamo.
Sryan ro bofyah pitis maat retait yakah wait yamo somya renti, tna raa ntho. Tibyo maru amot maat naut miryõ.
Tna sryan ro bofyah pitis ewok yakah wait yamo somya renti tna raa ntho. Tibyo maru amot ewok naut miryõ ye.
Menohe ait ro bofyah pitis sau sai fi yakah wait yamo yabah tabam saa.
Ti mase firwas oh, tna bobot ro ysan kta wait hah ye yama. Tna ait ytu sryan ro bofyah wait weto to mama. Tna yawe kʼana yawe, ‘Tho bo wojõ oh!’

Tibyo sryan ro ait fyah pitis wait maat reto yama tho pitis wait tna yaru amot maat naut yiryõ. Tna yawe, ‘Bobot, tiwya nyõ noo pitis wonyõ trion maat fyah jõ. Tna jõ te tho tibyo taru amot maat naut tiryõ. Tna pitis wonyõ fo nsaa beta oh mefo.’

Tna bobot yawe, ‘Nyõ nno bo ro moof to. Tiwya jõ too bo kebet sai tsan kʼnyõ. Menohe nyõ nisoh nbo nno kaket tibyo mrok mafer mawat ye. Nyõ mur-mur nno bo wojõ. Feto kbe jõ te tsan bo mase taro renti naut kʼnyõ nbo nno ye. Nama nhau nsya jõ. Bo yase wojõ anu bhaf bse su. Kbe anu simaut mase su.’

Tna fo sryan ro bobot fyah pitis wait trion ewok retait yama. Ait tho pitis bobot rait tna yaru amot ewok naut yiryõ. Tna sryan retait yawe, ‘Bobot, tiwya nyõ noo pitis wonyõ trion ewok fyah jõ. Tna jõ te tho tibyo taru amot ewok naut tiryõ. Tna pitis wonyõ trion jiit beta oh mefo.’

Tna bobot retait yawe, ‘Nyõ nno bo ro moof meto. Nyõ mur-mur nno bo wojõ. Feto kbe jõ te tsan bo mase taro renti naut kʼnyõ nbo nno ye. Nama nhau nsya jõ. Bo yase wojõ anu bhaf bse su. Kbe anu simaut mase su.’

Tna fo sryan ro tiwya bobot yoo pitis sau aran sai fyah tait yama. Tna ait yawe, ‘Bobot; Jõ thar tawe nyõ tait raa ro ja naya ma toni. Nyõ raa ro ja nryoh kake mam armato ro nyõ nyum fee. Tna nyõ soo bomafer mbam armato ro nyõ furere manaf to fee ye. Tiwya nyõ noo pitis wonyõ fyah kʼamu nawe amu nmo somya renti re makit mase kʼnyõ.
Menohe jõ waa. Tibyo too pitis ro nyõ noo nee sau reto tamo tabah tabam saa sai. Pitis wonyõ oh mefo.’
Menohe bobot retait yawe, ‘Nyõ nno bo mkair. Nyõ haweboh ye. Nyõ nhar nawe jõ raa ro tryoh kake mam armato ro jõ tyum fee. Tna jõ soo bomafer mbam armato ro jõ furere manaf to fee ye.
Feto to, rau ro moof to, tiwya nyõ nakah pitis wojõ namo nse mam
sai. Afo re kbe jõ tama tna too mabo msya mabyoh rau ye fea!’
Tna bobot yawe kʼraa wait yawe, ‘Tiwya ait ybo pitis weto yamo somya fee. Feto to, noo pitis weto namo niryõ kʼait ro ybo pitis trion nsaa tait.
Awya ro yisoh bo wait kaket moof, kbe raa moo bo taro naut miryõ kʼait ye. Menohe awya ro hawe yisoh bo rait kaket to, kbe raa mrof moo bo rait ro yse weto.
Nfot sryan ro yno bo mkair retait nwah beak fari yamoʼt wore wo mamur htoh toni. Mam yuk reto to, meen raa mkai bo ro mkair-kar tna mawia, kanasyah ye.’”
“Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ tama to, tama tkah tase aJõ. Tna
woJõ beta kro Jõ ntayun mama ye. Tna Jõ kbe tamo
hre abyõ mam yuk ro msai tbo raa beta ye.
Tna
weto kbe makrao raa ro
beta makah mama mo kʼJõ. Tna Jõ kbe tsok ana betwat tse mam mkbair ewok hayah-hayah mfi raa ro ja msia
to. Ana ja msok
mse mkbair sau hayah tna
mse mkbair sau hayah.
to, Jõ tsok tse hayah mam ati ro tatem ati. Tna
to, tse hayah mam ati ro tem ta ye.
Tna fo Jõ tamo
tna tawe kʼana ro mhau mam tatem ati aJõ to, tawe, ‘Taja yno bo moof kʼanu. Nma nkai sawro ro Jõ tamo
tbo. Tiwya tinyi
sair tabam refo to, Ait ysok anu yawe meen nkai sawro rAit reto ye.

Anu nno bo ro moof tibyo nkai sawro rAit to. Tiwya Jõ thai sre to, anu noo boit nee kʼJõ tait. Tna Jõ thai sbit to, anu nwyan aya nee kʼJõ tata. Tna Jõ tsu srim ye mam remo ranu to, anu noo Jõ nse tjin mam amah ye.
Tna ratan ro Jõ tyum marak to, anu noo ratan nee kʼJõ tyum ye. Tna Jõ kiyam to, anu nma kmot Jõ ye. Tna raa mbu Jõ mam
to, anu nma nmat Jõ ye.’
Tna raa ro ja mno bo ro Allah ksoh weto meen mawe kʼAit mawe,
; tiwya Nyõ nhai sre mam woyõ re amu noo boit nee kʼNyõ nait to? Tna mam woyõ oh mi amu nmat Nyõ nhai sbit re nwyan aya nee kʼNyõ nata to?
Tiwya amu nmat Nyõ nsu srim mam woyõ re amu noo Nyõ nse mam amah to? Tiwya amu nmat Nyõ ratan marak mam woyõ re amu noo ratan nee kʼNyõ nyum to?
Tiwya Nyõ kiyam mam woyõ re amu nma nmat Nyõ to? Tiwya Nyõ raa mfot mbu mam
woyõ re amu nma nmat Nyõ to?’
Jõ fi
retait. Meen Jõ tawe kʼana tawe, ‘Nri kaket: Bo bawya sai ro anu nno kʼraa kinyah wanu to, ro suawe sor to, bo weto anu nno kʼJõ oh meto.’
Tna Jõ tawe kʼana ro mhau mam tatem ta to tawe, ‘Nsen frok nbam wefo nmo oh! Kbe bo ro msai btek mai kʼanu. Anu kbe nmo niit mam tafoh roon ro Allah siwyan mkah bo ykah kabes yabi (Iblis) ysya
wait sor.

Tiwya anu nno bo ro mkair, tibyo anu nmo niit mam tafoh reto. Tiwya Jõ thai sre to, menohe anu noo boit aro nee kʼJõ tait fee. Tna tiwya Jõ thai sbit to, menohe anu nwyan aya aro nee kʼJõ tata fee ye.
Tna Jõ tsu srim to, anu noo Jõ nse mam amah wanu fee ye. Ratan ro Jõ tyum marak to, anu noo ratan aro nee kʼJõ tyum fee ye. Tna Jõ kiyam to, anu nma nmat Jõ fee ye. Tna raa mfot Jõ mbu mam
to, anu nma nmat Jõ fee ye.’
Menohe ana mawe si kʼJõ mawe,
tiwya Nyõ nhai sre, nhai sbit, nsu srim, ratan ro Nyõ nyum marak, Nyõ kiyam, tna Nyõ nhau mam
mam woyõ re amu nmat Nyõ fee tna natmof Nyõ fee ye to?’

Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, ‘Nri kaket: Soh anu nmat raa woJõ to, tna anu nnaut nwe ana raa ati fee; tibyo anu natmof ana bo fee ye to: Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Bo bawya sai ro anu hawe nno kʼraa woJõ weto sait, bo weto anu hawe nno kʼJõ ye oh meto. Feto to anu natmof Jõ fee oh meto.”
Tna raa ro matmof raa anya fee; kbe raa mawah ana beak mam wore wo arin kair. Meen tafoh mait sikowah ana mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tna raa ro mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, meen mkai mamos mae ye.’”
Yesus ykyas bo weto kuber wAit mkak tna yawe,
“Nnaut nwe, ti ewok naut tna raa makyõ korat ro
Raa makyõ korat reto to, tna kbe raa mfot Jõ msan kʼraa. Tna raa weto kbe mame Jõ tajat mam ara warok. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'.”
Ati reto
manes msya raa mabi ro
Yahudi to, ana siret su mam samu maboh
ro Kayafas. Kayafas tait
Yahudi ro yase.
Ana saim mawe mamo mfot Yesus wai mamo mame mam wore raa mahni.
Menohe ana mawe kʼanya mawe, “Bo reto anu bno mam ati ro korat
refo ma, be kbe bo reto mno raa makin mafa.”
Ati sau to, Yesus hre yait boit mam amah ro Simon mam remo ro Betania. Bi Simon tait, tiwya yafa
Yesus hre yait bo kri-kri fo, tna fai sau twok mama. Mama mbo
kusia sau.
to mabyoh maut toni. Mama mtu abyõ mam Yesus yana.
Kuber wAit mmat feto, tibyo mrok kmo mawe, “Au mno bawya meto ee? Fyi re
reto sikowah sai a?
Rau ro moof to, raa masim tna moo mabyoh rau. Tna mabyoh ro mase reto kbe raa msan kʼraa kinyah ro mse bo fee.
Menohe Yesus yhar bonaut rana oh tna yawe, ‘Nno wa au to ma. Fai au mno bo ro moof kʼJõ.
Raa kinyah to, ja mhau su msya anu yoyo. Menohe Jõ fo, kbe thau tsya anu yoyo fee.
Fai au mtu
kʼjõ tetsu refo fo, siwyan hai aJõ wia oh meto. Kebet baro naut kbe raa mame Jõ tajat tna sama hai aJõ to.
Nri kaket wia: Bokyas Moof ro mbam Allah refo, meen raa wosa mamo snok mam arin aso beta. Woyõ-woya raa mkyas to, bo moof ro fai au refo mno fo, kbe raa mnaut mkyas ye.’”
Tna Yudas Iskariot yasen yamo yo
manes ro Yahudi. Yudas tait, kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 12 weto sait ye.
Yamo yo kʼana yawe, “Kbe anu noo bawya nee kʼjõ afo re jõ tsan Yesus kʼanu to?” Ana moo pitis mauf trion 30 maren Yudas wia.
Tna Yudas ywof ati ro moof re kbe besruf Yesus.
Ti ro tinyi mam korat '
ro
Marak' to, kuber wAit mama mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Nyõ nksoh nawe amu siwyan bo sohmaam mam woyõ?”
Yesus yawe, “Nmoʼt
no kʼraa sait ro Jõ tawe kʼanu tna nwe, ‘Bi
yawe ayõ ro raa mame Ait to kene oh. Ait yawe kbe yakyõ bokyõ ro
su ysya kuber wAit mam samu anyõ.’”
Feto tibyo kuber wAit masen mamo mno bo ro Yesus yawe reto. Tna ana siwyan bo sohmaam mkah makyõ bokyõ ro
reto.
Mti reto Yesus yamoʼt amah reto tna hre sohmaam bo su ysya kuber wAit mabo 12 weto.
Ana hre sohmaam bo tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nkin wefo sait kbe hren ksuk Jõ.”
Ana mari feto, tibyo mrok sraujin toni. Tna ana wefo sait-sait saak ana mawe,
jõ fee!”
Yesus yawe, “Raa ro beru
mam hawereh sau su ysya Jõ to, ait ro kbe hren ksuk kʼJõ oh metait.

Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe raa mame Jõ tajat tu oh. Mame Jõ to, mnan si mkah Watum ro Allah tiwya mawe wia yum oh. Menohe ait ro hren ksuk Jõ tait, meen safo maboh mai kʼait ye tu oh. Ro moof to, tiwya yme mabe ait fee sai.”
Tna Yudas ro kbe hren ksuk Yesus yawe, “Bi
jõ oh mi Nyõ nawe meto a?” Yesus yawe, “Eno, au oh nyõ nawe meto.”
Ana sohmaam bo nkri-kri fo, Yesus yoo
sau. Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
reto yee kʼana beta mait. Tna yawe, “Nmat
refo. Tetsu aJõ oh mefo. Noo niit oh.”
Tna Ait yoo hawereh sau. Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna yee kʼana beta mata. Tna yawe, “Noo nta
maya refo.
maya refo to, mees aJõ ro kbe miyi mkah riof kʼanu. Kbe raa mame Jõ tna Allah ysair bosi ro tna kʼanu oh meto. Tibyo Allah yyon iro ro raa mno to.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Jõ kbe tata
maya mam tabam refo u fee. Thau meen snok mam wore wo anu bhau su mam wore Allah yamo
ybo raa wAit. Wore weto kbe anu bta
maya ro tna su.”
Ana mji howes mkak, tna masen mamoʼt Faut ro
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Mti refo fo anu beta kbe nmat kair mai kʼJõ tibyo nsen nsam sikba Jõ nmo. Watum ro Allah mkyas feto mawe:
‘Jõ kbe tame raa ro kmot
sait, tibyo
wAit weto masen msam brir-brar mamo ye.’
Zakharia 13:7
Menohe kbe Taja yti Jõ trok tasen. Tna kbe Jõ tatim ste anu wea mam
ro Galilea.”
Petrus yawe, “Soh kair mai kʼNyõ to, ana taro saah to, kbe masen msam sikba Nyõ to. Menohe Jõ kbe tasen tsam sikba Nyõ bo fee yum!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Petrus, nari: Mti refo to, kook mara fefares to, kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ wia muhrin tuuf oh, nawe nyõ wase Jõ.”
Tna Petrus yawe, “Fyi feya sai, Jõ kbe twaar Nyõ fee! Raa mawe mame jõ tsya Nyõ bjat su to mi bewok bjat rof!” Tna kuber wAit taro mawe feto beta ye.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit masen mamoʼt yuk sau ro masom Getsemani. Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Hre ste Jõ wea wefo tna Jõ tamo skabuk wia.”
Tna Ait yawe Petrus ysya ku ro Zebedeus yare mabo ewok kro Ait mamo ye. Mam weto to Yesus yhaf yyi tna ynaut srau mtit mjah toni.
Ait yawe, “Thaf fo nroon msai mfi bo tawe tno thai sai oh. Hre nwan nsya Jõ wefo.”
Yesus serar yamo baro naut, tna yabum skabuk yawe, “Taja; tubat bo fanes ro btek mai kʼJõ refo fo, beak fari. Jõ tawe sai. Nno bo ro Jõ ksoh to ma. Nno bo mamyot Nyõ ksoh aNyõ sai.”
Yesus skabuk mkak tna hah ye yama yo kʼana mabo tuuf weto. Tna ymat he ana beta mjin tu sai. Tna Ait yawe kʼPetrus yawe, “Anu bito hre nwan nsya Jõ ayõ sau sai fee!
Hre nwan tna skabuk re kbe bo ro tabam refo tko anu nno iro to ma. Anu nwe nno bo ro moof. Menohe anu netsu wanu matak mno to fee.”
Tna Yesus hah ye yamo skabuk naut u yawe, “Taja, soh Nyõ nawe bo ro samyoh refo Jõ tasom meto mi, Jõ tasom oh mamo mamyot si bo ro Nyõ ksoh sai.”
Ait skabuk mkak tna hah ye yama yo kʼana mabo tuuf reto u. Tna ymat he ana mjin maka toni, tibyo mjin tu bana sai.
Ait yawe bitsre ana mjin rof, tna hah ye yamo skabuk u. Bo skabuk ro muhrin tuuf reto mnan anya sai mfi bo riwai Ait skabuk wia to.

Yesus skabuk mkak tna hah ye yama yo kuber wAit. Tna yawe, “Anu njin fares a? Nsen oh! Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Ayõ ro raa yama besruf Jõ to, kene oh. Kbe ait besruf Jõ tna yoo Jõ ysan kʼraa ro ja mno iro mfot.
Nsen nma bmo oh! Ait ro besruf Jõ tait yama oh mefi!”
Wore Yesus yros ykyas bo reto, Yudas frok yama. Yudas tait, ait ybam kuber wAit mabo 12. Ait yama yatim tna raa sbe mawat nkro ye. Ana masom
wana msya hbat wana sor. Ana raa sbe weto to, raa mabi ro
Yahudi mbis. Raa mabi weto to,
manes wana, msya raa mabi wana ye.
(Ait ro besruf Yesus riwai yawe yerif Yesus kʼana yawe, “Kbe Jõ tamo hana raa sait to. Ait oh metait. Nfot Ait.”)
Tna mkah tetara Yudas yamo yo kʼYesus tna yawe, “Bi
meen oh kʼNyõ!” Tna ait hana Yesus.
Yesus sesaban yawe, “Tafoh aJõ, reto oh mi nyõ nnaut nama fo a?” Feto tibyo raa majin reto sokraria mamo mbo Yesus tna mfot.
Kuber wAit sait ymat feto tibyo yayõ
rait. Yayõ
rait tna ysot sryan ro
yase rait sait yimara. Tibyo ktos btek mai mam tabam.
Menohe Yesus yastako kuber rAit retait yawe, “Nsuf
anyõ oh! Awya ro yame raa mkah
yajat to, kbe raa mame ait mkah
ye.
Nyõ nhar bo fe mfe a?
ro Taja wAit to msis toni syok. Jõ tatak tayoh kʼTaja ybis ana mama mame anya msya raa weto ye.
Menohe Jõ hawe bo tayoh Taja ye. Bo ro Ait yawe mam Watum rAit to, kbe mabo tu oh.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana ro mama mfot Ait yawe, “Anu nbo
msya hbat nma nfot Jõ mfi bo Jõ raa ro syõf bo sai a? Ja rabu ti wawa Jõ hre betoo Watum ro Allah kʼanu mam Samu rAit to. Menohe anu nfot Jõ mam beto fee.
Menohe bo wefo beta mabo, afo re mamo mnan si bokom ro tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mkom matim wia to.” Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit masen msam brir-brar beta sikba Ait akus.
Raa mfot Yesus tna makah mamoʼt samu ro Kayafas. Kayafas tait
Yahudi ro yase. Tna mam samu mato to,
wana msya raa mabi wana hre siret wea.
Tna Petrus ybo rof-rof ana mtis. Yamo snok mam bohra ro
yase. Tna ait fuu ye truk hre su ysya raa sbe ro ja kmot samu reto ye. Ait yawe hre ymat rof bo ro raa mno mai kʼYesus mamo snok sboh rau to.
Tna mam samu mato to,
manes msya raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi to, hre mkyas bo. Ana makin beta to, mawe mkyas bo mbesus mai kʼYesus afo re kbe ana mfot Ait mame.
Ana makin weto aro yasen yros sioh ykyas bo besus Yesus. Menohe bokyas ro ana mkyas to aro ykyas hayah-hayah sai. Tibyo ana mabo ewok masen mros tna mawe,
“Amu nri Yesus yawe, ‘Jõ fi tatak tihabah Samu ro Allah rAit tna Jõ tatak te sgi u mam ti trion tuuf sai.’”
Tna
ro yase retait yasen yros. Ait yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Boun ro raa mawe maun Nyõ weto to, Nyõ nasen betoo fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus shait bait sai. Tibyo
ro yase yawe, “Feto sik
ntom Allah ro yaam tait yasom, nawe Nyõ fi
Ku ro Allah yare fe mfe a?”

Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Au oh nawe meto. Nri oh: Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen anu nmat Jõ hre tsya Allah ro yase. Kbe Jõ hre mam ati ro yatem ati; mam hroh ro mase reto. Tna kbe anu nmat Jõ troh tama abyõ mam ayoh mboh tama ye.”

ro yase yari feto, tibyo kmo ybo ratan rait yesait yhah-hah. Tna yawe, “Yesus yamus Allah meto! Yawe Ait Ku ro Allah yare. Bo mbau! Tna anu besait bri oh. Kbe anu saso raa roto mama maun Ait mkah bawya! Mfo refo anu besait bmit safo reto kʼAit!
Bonaut wanu to fyi?” Tna ana mawe, “Safo makan btek mai kʼAit oh. Raa mame yajat tu oh!”
Tibyo ana masen ntfeh oot kʼYesus, mmuk Ait, tna raa taro masen mai Ait ye.
Tna mtu kʼait mawe, “
fi! Soh Nyõ to, Raa ro yhar bo meto mi, nawe kʼamu nawe, raa woyõ sor oh mi yai Nyõ meto?”
Petrus hre mne mam bohra reto. Tna sryan ro ano sau mama tna mtu bo kʼPetrus mawe, “Nyõ ja nsya Yesus ro ybam
ro Galilea fe mfe a?”
Menohe Petrus ywaar kʼraa makin weto yawe, “Jõ wase, jõ thar bo ro fai au mtu reto fee.”
Tna Petrus yasen yirenti yamoʼt masa ro bohra reto, tna sryan ro ano roto sau mmat ait tna mawe kʼraa ro mhau ye mam weto mawe, “Bi ait retait taa ysya Yesus ro ybam Nazaret ye.”
Menohe Petrus ywaar matak naut u. Tna yto bo yawe, “Jõ wase Ait ye.”
Feto tibyo raa makin taro mama mawe kʼait mawe, “Nwaar ma! Nyõ fi nsya ana nbam Galilea ye! Amu nhar nyõ nmai sai.”
Petrus yari feto tibyo ywaar yawe matak tna yto bo yawe, “Ayoh, jõ thar bi Ait retait fee!” Weto si fo kook mara.
Tna Petrus ynaut bo ro riwai Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ muhrin tuuf wia tna kook mara.” Tna ait frok yamoʼt mne yawia sut-sut.
Rabu momo to,
manes sor msya raa mabi ro Yahudi mawe safo btek mai kʼYesus. Tna mawe Yesus, kbe raa mame yum oh.
Ana make Yesus yatem, tna makah mamo msan Ait kʼPilatus ro yamo
tait.
Yudas hren ksuk Yesus. Tna yari he safo mana raa mmit kʼYesus. Tna kbe raa mame Ait yajat. Yudas yari feto tna ait sraujin msai. Tibyo yoo pitis mauf 30 reto yamo yisya
manes msya raa mabi ro Yahudi.
Tna yawe, “Jõ fi tno iro kawi oh. Jõ besruf Yesus ro wase safo aro fee, tsan tibyo Ait raa mame.” Menohe ana mawe, “Bo reto bo ramu fee. Nyõ nesait nasom bo anyõ oh.”
Tibyo Yudas yawah pitis mauf weto yai mamoʼt Samu ro Allah mato tna yamo yi kro ait yajat.
Tna
manes sor fo masen soo pitis mauf wefo. Tna mawe, “Pitis ro misti re raa mame ajat wefo to, Allah ybau. Feto to, noo pitis wefo betruk mam surah wiak Samu ro Allah to ma.”
Ana saim su tna moo pitis weto mate tabam. (Tabam reto ja raa mabah koh mfen kusia msya bo ro raa saruk bo sohmaam
.) Ana mate tabam reto mkah bo meen sama hai raa ro srim.
Feto oh mi maban ati reto mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, tabam reto raa mtu masom mawe 'Tabam Mees Ajat'.
Bo ro raa mno weto mamo mnan si bo ro tiwya
Yeremia ykyas wia yawe,
“Meen raa mana ro Israel ntho Ait mkah pitis mabyoh 30 sai. Tna fo raa manes weto moo pitis weto
mate tabam. Tabam reto ja raa mabah koh mfen bo ro saruk bo sohmaam. Ana mno bo weto mnan si bosi ro tiwya
ysi kʼjõ.”
Zakharia 11:12-13
Ana msan Yesus tna yros sayõ
ro ybo
reto. Tna
ytu kʼAit yawe, “Nyõ fi
ro Yahudi fe mfe a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Au oh nyõ nawe meto.”
Tna
manes msya raa mabi ro Yahudi maun Yesus, menohe Ait yawe bo aro si kʼana fee.
Tibyo Pilatus yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ nari boun rana ro maun Nyõ to fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus shait bait sai, tibyo
yrok ktak sai.
Ti reto raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro
aro rau-rau wore wo ana makyõ korat reto to, ja ana baro mamo mo kʼPilatus mayoh kʼait mawe ait tufrok raa ro ana mawe sait ybam
(Ati reto to, raa sait ro yasom Yesus-Barabas yhau mam bui. Raa beta mhar mawe ait raa ro ja yno safo.)
Raa makin sor mama siret su oh. Feto tna
Pilatus ytu kʼana yawe, “Anu ksoh nwe jõ tufrok Yesus-Barabas soh mfe kbe tufrok Yesus ro raa mtu mawe
(Pilatus yhar yawe raa manes ro Yahudi sor mhaf kair Yesus. Reto oh mi ana msan Yesus kʼait to. Yhar oh mi yawe feto.)
