Pilatus hre kri-kri mam ambar tna ytu srah reto yari. Tna yfain ntim soo mama mawe kʼait mawe, “Raa retait wase yber safo. Nsya srioh nkyas safo rAit ma. Ti sai jõ smi tmat tawe kbe bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu fo.”
Menohe
manes msya raa mabi ro Yahudi bo msu bokyas kʼraa makin weto afo re ana mayoh Pilatus mawe ait tufrok Barabas tna mame Yesus yajat to.
Pilatus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Ana mbewok refo fo, anu ksoh nwe jõ tufrok awya?” Tibyo ana mawe, “Tufrok Barabas!”
Pilatus ye ytu kʼana yawe, “Soh feto to, kbe jõ tno bo bawya mai kʼYesus ro raa mtu mawe
tait?” Menohe ana beta mawe, “Name Ait yajat mam ara warok!”
Menohe Pilatus ytu kʼana u yawe, “Fyi, Ait yber safo bawya?” Menohe ana bito mkah mmai ro mase mawe, “Name Ait yajat yum!”

Pilatus ymat he bo ro ait yawe weto nsoso sai. Kbe raa mrok mnin-nin mawe mno mafa. Ymat feto tibyo ait yasen yoo aya yyon yatem. Yyon yatem mam wore raa masu makin mmat tna yawe, “Jõ fi tsya anu nsom safo ajat ro anu nber refo fee.”
Tna raa makin weto beta mawe, “Mbau a, safo ajat refo meen amu nsya kukek wamu nsom oh.”
Tna fo ait yitsre Barabas yamo yo kʼana, tna ysan Yesus kʼraa ro sbe wait yawe ana moo too mmok-mak Ait, tna mame Ait yajat mam ara warok.
Tibyo raa sbe ro Pilatus wait makah Yesus twok mamoʼt samu ro bi
Tna ana mtu raa sbe majin rana beta mama mros mur mtan kʼait.
Ana mrus ratan ro Ait yyum, tna moo ratan roto ro mkek sau mse kʼait yyum riryõn.

Ana moo abumun baro mhas mnan watau sau mfi watau ro ja bobot na sbyõ to mse kʼAit sbyõ ye. Tna ana moo tbyor sau mee ybo mam yatem ati ye, tna ana sioh mbaut Yesus: Ana mjit mimna ntmi tabam tna sret Ait masah mawe, “Meen oh kʼNyõ,
ro Yahudi fi!”
Ana tfeh oot kʼAit, tna mtak tbyor ro Ait ybo to, mai abyõ mam yana.
Ana sret Ait masah tna me mrus ratan ro mkek riwai ana mse kʼAit yyum. Tna me moo ratan rAit mse yyum u. Tna ana makah Ait frok mamo mawe mame Ait yajat mam ara warok.
Raa makah Yesus mamo mam iso ro frok
ro Yerusalem. Ana mbam
frok mamo to, tna ana fri raa srim sait yama. Ait ybam
ro Kirene. Yasom Simon. Ait yawe yiwrek menohe raa sbe mfot ait, mkuk ait mawe yasom ara warok ro Yesus.
Ana mamo snok mam faut sau ro masom 'Yuk ro Hamana'. Mkah mai rana to, raa mawe 'Golgota'.
Tna ana moo
maya srioh mkah
mee kʼYesus yata.
Ait sanet baro menohe Ait hawe bo yata ye.
Raa sbe mse Yesus mam ara warok. Tna ana moo
tane re kbe mhar awya ro yoo ratan ro Yesus rAit. Tna saim kʼanya.
Tna ana hre mam weto kmot Ait ye.
Mam ara warok Yesus yana abyõ to, raa hero bokom sau. Bokom reto mawe bo ro Yesus yno re raa mame Ait to mefo: “Yesus fi,
raa ro Yahudi.”
Ati reto raa mame raa ro ja msyõf bo mabo ewok mam ara warok ye. Ait sait raa mse mam ati ro Yesus yatem ati, tna sait mam ati ro yatem ta ye.
Raa ro mamo frit iti sor mam weto to, mmat Yesus raa mame mam ara warok. Tna ana mana mnah sai mamus Ait ye mawe,
“Ti taa, Nyõ nawe nyõ natak nihabah Samu ro Allah tna sgi u mam ti ro tuuf sai no! Soh Nyõ Ku ro Allah meto mi, Nroh nbam ara warok reto oh afo re riof kʼNyõ.”
Tna raa manes ro
Yahudi mros mmat ye:
manes,
msya raa mabi wana ye. Tna ana sret Ait feto ye masah mawe,
“Raa roto saah Ait yno riof kʼana oh. Menohe Ait yesait yatak yno riof kʼAit ai fee! Soh Ait
ro Israel tu oh, meto mi sik yroh ybam ara warok reto tna fo kbe amu nmat tna smot Ait ye.”
Tna ana mawe,
“Ait ja smot Allah tna yawe Ait tait Ku ro Allah yare. Feto to nma, anu bros ti bmat sai, kbe Allah yatmof skur Ait fee mfe a?”
Mazmur 22:9
Raa ro ja msyõf bo weto to, ro raa mame mam ara warok su msya Ait ye mam weto to, ana mawe kair Ait feto ye.
Maban baas ayõ ro 12 to, oo reto beta mrok mamur mamo snok hreha ayõ ro tuuf to.
Ayõ ro tuuf bo feto, Yesus ytu mkah ymai ro mase yawe,
Mazmur 22:2
reto to yawe, “Allah aJõ, Allah aJõ; Nyõ sikba Jõ toni sai a?”
Ana makin ro mros weto sor to, baro mawe kʼanya mawe, “Ait ytu Elia oh meto!”
Tna ana sait yamo fooh yoo bo ro aya msuf sau tna beru mam
maya ro mano. Ait beru, tna yayõ tmi mam tbyor makit sau tna ytu maut kʼYesus yata.
Menohe raa makin taro mawe, “Aha, nno feto ma, bhau bmat sai kbe Elia yama yno riof kʼAit fe mfe a?”
Yesus kakyah mkah ymai ro mase, tna yitsre yafos rAit tna yhai.
Tna
ro raa hero mam Samu ro Allah mato to, Allah yhah ftah ewok maban mam uu mamo snok mte. Tna iin frok sin tibyo fraa smut habah-habah ye.
Tna isra ro tiwya raa sama hai to mrok masoh maa. Tna raa makin sor ro tiwya smot Allah tna mhai wia to, taro me mrok masen ye.
(Ti ro tuuf to Yesus yrok yasen wia, tna fo ana frok mbam isra wana ye. Tna mamoʼt
Yerusalem,
ro Allah rAit to. Tna raa makin mmat ana.)
Bi yabi ro sbe ysya raa sbe wait ro kmot Yesus to mmat iin msya bo yase ro riwai frok mama to, ana mrok waa mawe, “Ae, bo mabo oh! Ait retait, Ku ro Allah yare tu oh.”
Fnya taro mawat mros fari mmat bo weto beta ye. Ana weto to fnya ro kro Ait mbam
ro Galilea. Ana weto ja kro Ait yno bo wAit ye.
Fnya makin weto to ana mabo tuuf oh mi, sau masom Maria Magdalena, tna ro ewok masom Maria ro Yakobus ysya Yusuf mme, tna ro tuuf to ku ro Zebedeus wait mme.
Ayõ ro hreha tna bobot sait ybam remo ro Arimatea yama. Ait yasom Yusuf. Ait ja kro Yesus bait soo ye oh.
Ait yamo yo kʼPilatus tna yayoh yawe Pilatus ybis ait yesait yoo ajat ro Yesus tna sama.
Pilatus ybis. Tibyo Yusuf yoo ajat reto, tna sro mkah hawee mabuf ro mfyan-fyan moof sau.

Yusuf tait, tiwya yabah isra ro tna sau mam fraa mana sau mkah bo meen raa moo hai mse. Feto tna ait tubat ajat ro Yesus yamo yse mam isra reto. Ait yoo ajat reto yse, tna fo bririk fraa maboh sau burut wa isra reto mato tna yamo.
Maria Magdalena msya Maria roto sau to, ana hre kene mam mato ro isra reto ye.
Ti ro
raa
Yahudi siwyan bo mkah ayõ ro ana tmoh to. Tna rabu ti fo,
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa ro
mamo mo kʼPilatus mawe,
“Bi yabi, Yesus retait raa ro ja siroyõ. Amu nnaut nwe tiwya wore Ait yhau fares to, yawe Ait yhai tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Ait ye yrok yasen.

Feto to, nbis raa mamo kmot isra reto matak wa mamo snok mam ti ro tuuf to. Soh mfe to, kuber wAit kbe tbat mamo msyõf ajat rAit masom mamo. Msyõf ajat rAit tna sioh mawe kʼraa makin mawe Ait yhai menohe yrok yasen oh. Soh ana mno bo reto to, kbe arin mrok mkair renti.”
Pilatus yawe, “Ae; noo raa sbe wefo nkah nmo oh! Jõ tbis ana kmot isra reto masa to kaket wa.”
Tna ana masen mamoʼt isra reto. Tna ana mse
ro Roma mam isra reto masa wa ye. Tna raa sbe weto hre kmot isra reto masa wa.
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
mkak. Tna
rabu momo Maria Magdalena msya Maria roto sau, mamo mmat isra ro raa moo ajat ro Yesus mse fo.
ro
sau mbam ayoh mroh mama tna bririk fraa ro raa burut wa isra mato reto. Tibyo iin ro msai frok mama sin.
reto maut hre mam fraa reto abyõ.
reto metsu rau mfi rir tna ratan ro myum to mboh fyok ye.
Tna raa sbe ro kmot isra reto to, waa tibyo tetet mhai. Tna smut mfi raa ro mhai.
Tna
reto mawe kʼfnya weto mawe, “Waa ma. Jõ thar anu nma saso Yesus ro taa raa mame yajat mam ara warok.
Ait yhau mam wefo fee. Riwai Allah yno Ait yrok yasen oh, mfi tiwya Yesus yawe wia to. Nma nmat yuk ro taa raa moo Ait mse bris to yarak meu.
Hah ne nmo fooh nwe kuber wAit nwe, ‘Yesus yrok yasen oh. Ait yatim wea oh mam
ro Galilea. Nmoʼt Galilea tna kbe anu nmat Ait mam beto.’”
Ana frok mbam isra reto mkah waa. Tna ana simaut mase ye mamo. Ana mhoh fooh mamo mawe mabah bo reto kuber wAit ye.
Menohe Yesus yrok brah nenat kʼfnya weto tna yawe, “Meen oh kʼanu.” Tibyo ana mamo kait mo kʼYesus tna maka mabum mbo Ait yaa tna mbaut Ait.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Waa ma! Nmo oh tna nwe kʼraa woJõ makin nwe, ana maryõt oh mam Galilea tna kbe ana mmat Jõ ye oh mam beto.”
Wore wo fnya weto mamo kri-kri fo, raa ro kmot isra ro ajat reto baro hah mamoʼt
Mamoʼt
tna mamo mo
manes sor. Tna mabah bombra ro riwai ana mmat reto beta.
manes hre siret msya raa mabi ro Yahudi. Tna ana saim iso ro kbe mberkait bokyas reto. Ana saim bo su. Tna mawe moo pitis baro mee kʼraa ro sbe weto.
Raa manes mawe kʼana mawe, “Nwe kʼraa nwe tisai anu njin tu tna kuber ro Yesus mama msyõf ajat rAit makah msam mamo.
Tna soh
yari bo reto, kbe amu nkyas bo nsya ait, afo re ait yno bo aro mai kʼanu fee.”
Raa sbe moo pitis reto. Tna ana mkyas bo mamyot riwai raa manes weto msi kʼana to. Bokyas reto raa mkyas hahah kʼraa ro Yahudi mamo snok mam mfo refo fo.
Kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 11 masen mamoʼt
ro Galilea. Ana maut mamoʼt faut ro Yesus ykyas kʼana wia.
Ati ro ana mmat Ait, ana maka mbaut Ait. Menohe ana baro mhaf mko-ako smot Ait kaket fee ye.
Yesus yama kait yo kʼana tna yawe, “Allah ysan bombra ro ayoh msya ro tabam refo beta kʼJõ tbo.
Feto to, nsen nmoʼt
mam tabam arin aso refo beta. Nmo to, nno ana haberek mamo raa mana woJõ ye. Tna
ana mkah Taja yasom, mkah Ku rAit yasom, tna mkah Har rAit masom ye.
Tna nkyas kʼraa nwe, ‘Nri bo ro Yesus yawe to. Tna nbo nno ye.’ Nnaut nwe Jõ tatam anu yoyo mamo snok mam oon sboh rau.”
Mark: Bokyas Moof
ro mkyas Yesus
Ku ro Allah yare to, tinyi rau oh mefo:
Tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya yama ykom bo ro Allah ykyas kʼYesus. Bokom reto to, Allah yawe kʼYesus yawe:
“Meen Jõ tbis raa sait yama ykyas bo woJõ yatim wia tna Nyõ nrof. Kbe ait siwyan iso kʼNyõ.
Meen ait yama ykyas bo woJõ mam yuk ro riamo sau. Ykyas yawe, ‘Mbetrot iso mkah
yama! Nisoh iso kʼAit!’”
Yesaya 40:3
Tna Yohanes ro ja
raa yama. Ait yhau mam yuk ro riamo sau, tna raa mama mari bokyas rait. Ait ykyas kʼana yawe, “Nashana fooh! Tna jõ
anu. Nashana tna Allah yyon iro wanu.”
Tna raa mbam
ro Yerusalem, msya raa mbam remo makin
ro Yudea reto to, ana weto sor mama mo kʼYohanes. Ana mama mo kʼAit tna mras iro wana. Tna Yohanes
ana mam aya ro Yordan.
Yohanes ja yyum ratan ro raa sne mbam
mawyan. Tna ykyar hotom ro mbam kak marak ye. Ja ait yabo mo msya yata kum maya ro mbam safom sai.
Tna ait yawe, “Jõ fi tatim wia. Tna Ait ro yase yiwer jõ sait kbe yama yrof. Tna jõ toof mkah bo taka skur
rAit to fee.
Jõ
anu mkah aya sai. Menohe kbe Ait
anu mkah Har ro
Yohanes yhau mam aya ro Yordan fares to, Yesus ybam remo ro Nasaret mam
ro Galilea yama. Yesus yama tna Yohanes
Ait ye.
Yesus frok ybam aya yaut si fo, Ait heyut ymat he ayoh ftah. Tna Har ro
haberek mnan fi ruu
sau. Tna fru mama mroh abyõ kʼAit..
Tna raa mari mai sau mbam ayoh mawe, “Nyõ fi akut aJõ ro Jõ thafri. Nyõ fi Jõ thaf mnan!”
Tna si fo Har ro
mbis Yesus yasen yamoʼt yuk ro riamo sau.
Ait yamo yhau mam teto ti trion 40. Kak rbyoh ja mhau mam teto ye. Tna kabes yabi (Iblis) yama yawe sanet besruf Yesus. He mfe, Yesus yatak sai. Tna fo
baro mama matam Ait.
Yohanes, raa mfot mamo mbu mam
oh. Tna Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Yamo ykyas Bokyas Moof ro Allah
Ait yawe, “Nma fooh! Allah siwyan yamo
ybo raa wAit. Feto to nashana. Bokyas Moof reto bo mabo. Ntu sioh bokyas rAit reto ma!”
Ati sau fo, Yesus yamo mam maru ro Galilea maam. Yamo tna ymat raa mabo ewok mse
rana mam maru mfot syoh. Ana mbewok ja makam maru. Sait yasom Simon ysya yao Andreas.
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana mbewok yawe, “Nma kro Jõ. Kbe Jõ tbis anu nmo nfot raa.”
Ana mbewok mari feto, tibyo masen fooh sikba
wana makus. Tna kro Ait mamo.
Ana mamo tna mmat Yakobus ysya yao Yohanes. Ana bewok weto to, ku ro bi Zebedeus wait. Ana mbewok hre mam wiak tna misoh
wana.
Tna Yesus ytu ana mama kro Ait. Tna ana masen fooh sikba maja Zebedeus yhau akus mam wiak ysya sryan wait. Tna ana mbewok kro Yesus mamo ye.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit weto mamoʼt remo ro Kapernaum. Ayõ ro
to, ja raa ro
Yahudi ntmoh. Tna ayõ ro
reto, Yesus twok mam samu watum rana tna ykyas Watum ro Allah.
Allah yno re bokyas rAit matak toni. Menohe
wana ro Yahudi to, ja bokyas wana matak kaket fee. Tibyo raa ro mari bokyas rAit reto mrok ktak.
Ati reto raa ro kabes mbo sait hre mam samu watum reto ysya raa taro ye. Tna kabes sor ro mbo raa refi mawe,
“Yesus; raa ro Nasaret; kbe Nyõ nno bawya kʼamu wefo! Nyõ nama name amu njat a? Jõ thar Nyõ; Nyõ fi Ait ro Allah Ybis Yama!”
Tna Yesus bhah kabes reto yawe, “Shait! Nfrok nbam kʼait!”
Kabes reto mbo raa retait simoyot tna wohrarar frok mbam kʼait.
Raa beta mrok ktak tna mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bo bawya sai mefo? Watum refo matak toni! Ait ybis kabes frok, tna kabes sor mari Ait ye! Bo ro tna sau mefo!”
Tna raa mkyas Yesus yasom syohor fooh mam
ro Galilea beta.
Yesus; Yohanes ysya Yakub frok mbam samu watum reto. Tna ana kro Simon ysya Andreas mamoʼt amah rana mbewok.
Ana snok mam amah reto tna raa mkyas Simon snyim ro ano kʼYesus. Au mjin amah sai tna metsu mbe toni.
Yesus yamo yo kʼfai au reto tna ybo matem teta masen. Tibyo kiyam rau marak. Tna fai au masen saruk boit mee kʼana mait.
Mti reto to, raa ro kiyam msya raa ro kabes mbo beta to, raa makah mama mo kʼYesus.
Raa ro mbam
reto beta mamaʼt bohra ro amah reto.

Ait yisoh raa mawat ro mafa bo knik-knak weto re moof. Tna yikyak kabes mawat frok ye. Kabes weto mhar mawe Ait tait Ku ro Allah yare. Menohe Yesus hawe kabes weto mkyas Ait. Tibyo yno wa kabes weto re shait bana sai.
Ana mjin tna rabu momo, ti mwamu fares, Yesus yrok yasen yamoʼt yuk ro riamo tna skabuk.
Menohe Simon ysya yafoh na taro mama mrof saso Ait.
Ana fri Ait tna mawe, “Raa beta saso Nyõ.”
Tna Ait yawe, “Nma bmoʼt remo roto ro kene taro naut. Re kbe Jõ tkyas Watum ro Allah kʼraa ro mhau mam remo weto ana mari ye. Tkyas watum rAit reto kʼraa oh mi Jõ tama fo.”
Tna Ait yasen yamo yur mam
ro Galilea beta. Yamo ykyas bo mam samu watum makin ro Yahudi. Tna Ait yikyak kabes frok mbam kʼraa ye.
Raa ro yafa
sait yama yo kʼYesus. Yama tna yjit yimna soh-soh kʼAit yawe, “Soh Nyõ ksoh meto mi, nisoh jõ re
refo marak.”
Yesus yatmof raa retait tibyo Yesus yatem ybo ait tna yawe, “Jõ ksoh, nyõ mbros oh!”
Mkah wore weto si fo kiyam rait marak.
Yesus yawe wa kʼait yawe,
“Namo to, nkyas bo refo kʼraa ma. Namo nerif narak anyõ
ro Yahudi sait re ait ymat sas nyõ. Nyõ noof u, feto to noo bo nee
re ysan kʼAllah mamyot Watum ro Musa ykom yawe. Nno feto re kbe raa mhar mawe nyõ netsu to moof u.”

Menohe raa retait yamo tna ykyas bo reto kʼawya sai ro ait fri mam iso. Tibyo raa msis-sas mbeak-ak anya mama mo kʼYesus mam woyõ-woya sai Ait yamo. Tibyo Ait twok yamoʼt remo mam wore raa mmat fee. Ait yhau wore mnem, menohe raa mbam tyo-teya sai mama mo kʼAit mam wore weto ye.
Ti baro firwas tna Yesus hah ye yamoʼt Kapernaum. Raa mkyas mawe Ait yhau mam samu mato.
Tna raa msis-sas mama mros mur mtan samu reto: Taro mros tabam, taro mros mam isit, tna amah mato matot mkah raa ye. Yesus ykyas bokyas ro Allah kʼana beta.
Mam weto to, raa baro naut mama. Tna ana mabo jiit nkatar ait ro yaa mhai sait mama. Mama mawe makah ait mama mo kʼYesus.
He raa mawat burut wa Yesus. Feto to ana makah ait maut abyõ mam ti manaf. Tna ana mitrah ti manaf reto baro mno hroh mam wore Yesus yros mte. Tna mruk ait mkah sese rait ye. Mruk mam ti samu mato.
Yesus ymat ana tna yhar yawe ana smot Ait matak. Tibyo Yesus yawe kʼait ro yaa mhai retait yawe, “Ku aJõ, iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.”
Yahudi baro hre mam weto ye. Ana mari bo ro Yesus yawe feto tna mnaut mawe,
“Ait refi ykyas bo bawya meto? Bo ro Ait yawe to berasi Allah! Awya ytai yyon iro? Allah yesait aran sai!”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mnaut mam srau mato wana. Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu nnaut bo weto mam srau mato wanu to?

Soh Jõ tawe kʼait refi tawe ‘Iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.’ Bo ro msai fee: Kbe raa mahni bo reto mabo fe mfe a. Menohe tawe, ‘Nasen, beah aam anyõ, tna namo bonyõ oh!’ Tawe feto afo re kbe raa mmat bo reto mabo. Mmat tna mhar mawe Jõ ttai tno bo ewok ye. Ewok ye mnan-nan kʼJõ sai.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna bo ro kbe Jõ tno fo, Jõ tno re kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ tatak tyon iro raa mam tabam refo.” Tna Yesus yawe kʼAit ro yaa mhai retait yawe,
“Nasen, tubat sese anyõ, tna nasom namo bonyõ oh!”
Tna ait yasen, tubat sese rait fooh, tna frok yamo. Raa beta mmat bo msai ro Yesus yno reto. Tibyo mrok ktak tna mbaut Allah mawe, “Anu ja bmat bo ro mfi fefo aro fefares sai!”
Yesus ybam Kapernaum hah ye yamoʼt maru maam ro Galilea u. Raa msis-sas mama mo kʼAit tna Ait ykyas bo kʼana.
Ait ykyas bo mkak, tna fo yamo. Ait yamo nkri-kri fo, ymat raa sait ro ja yoo namabyoh
yee
ro Roma. Yasom Lewi, ku ro bi Alfeus yare.
Bi ait hre mam
ro namabyoh rait. Tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nama kro Jõ bmo!” Lewi yari feto, tibyo ait yasen kro Yesus mamo.
Ti sau fo, Yesus ysya kuber wAit mait boit mam amah ro bi Lewi. Tna raa ro ja moo namabyoh msya raa ro ja mno iro bo mawat to mama mait boit su msya ana ye. Ana weto mawat masen kro Yesus oh.
Raa
ro mamo
baro mmat Yesus yait boit su ysya raa weto. Tna ana mtu kuber wAit mawe, “Fyi re Yesus yait boit su ysya raa ro moo namabyoh tna msya raa ro ja mno iro bo weto?”
Yesus yari bo ro ana mawe feto tibyo yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro metsu moof to, ja mamo saso
fee. Ja raa ro kiyam oh mi mamo saso
to. Jõ tama ttu raa ro mhaf moof to fee. Menohe Jõ tama ttu raa ro mno iro.”
Ati sau fo, kuber ro Yohanes
wait msya raa ro
mhau bo ro mait re skabuk kʼAllah kaket. Tna raa mama mo kʼYesus tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Fyi re kuber ro Yohanes msya kuber ro
mhau bo ro mait. Menohe kuber wonyõ mhau bo ro mait to fee?”
Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Ati ro raa sait ymen fnya to, ja raa mno bo bawya? Anu nwe kʼait yafoh wait ro mama to, nwe ana mhau bo ro mait sai a? Mfe! Ana makyõ bokyõ fea! Ana makyõ bokyõ wia.

Tna fo raa moo ait makah mamo. Ati reto to, kbe mafoh wana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait. Kuber woJõ mfi feto ye. Jõ thau tsya ana fares fo, ana sraujin fee. Menohe ati ro Jõ sikba ana tamo to, kbe ana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait ye.”

Tna Yesus ykyas bofret ewok naut kʼana yawe, “Mfi bo ratan matah ro hri-hra sau. Ja fnya moo hawee ftah mabuf ro tna to, maru ratan ro matah to fee. Soh au mtin feto to, kbe tis mkair. Kbe hawee ftah mabuf reto mno tibyo ratan reto mrok mhah renti. ⌞Feto ye iso bose raa mabi ro Yahudi ja mamo to, hayah. Tna iso tna ro Jõ terif refo fo hayah ye. Tna iso ewok reto srioh anya ye fee.⌟
Feto ye, Ja raa mror
maya ro tna mam baah marak ro matah fee.
maya reto mno baah marak reto matu mbua. Tna kbe
maya reto maus miyi mroh mamo mkak.
maya ro tna to, ja raa moo mror mam baah marak ro tna sai.”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
sau to, Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo frit iti mam armato ro
sau. Kuber wAit mhai sre, tibyo mryoh
make baro mait.
Menohe raa ro
mmat feto, tibyo mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Yesus fi, nmat kuber woNyõ mno bo toto sai meto a? Ana mryoh
make mam ayõ ro raa wanu ntmoh to. Ana mno fyi meto? Mno bo reto to, ana miwer Watum ro
ranu oh meto!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nnaut Bokom ro Allah fe mfe a? Bokom reto mkyas bo ro tiwya
Daud yno. Tiwya ait ysya raa wait mhai awyah tna mnaut bo ro mait.
Mam wore weto to bi Abyatar yamo
Yahudi ro yase to. Ati sau to, Daud ysya raa wait hai sre. Tna ait twok mam Samu ro Allah mato. Tna yoo
ro raa msan kʼAllah.
reto mbau. Menohe ait yoo yait.
reto to, ja
na mesait aran mait. Tna ait yoo tna yee kʼraa wait mait ye.

Menohe Allah yawe Daud yno bo mkair fee. Allah yatmof raa. Au oh mi yno ayõ ro raa ntmoh to. Yawe raa mhau baas kebet baro afo re mno ana metsu me mrok matak ye. Ait yawe ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, bo ro samyoh fee.
Feto to, Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tatak tbo ayõ ro raa ntmoh ye.”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh roto sau to, Yesus yamo ykyas bo mam samu watum ro Yahudi. Tna raa ro yatem jaro mhai sait huwya mam beto ye.
Tna raa ro
baro huwya mam beto ye. Ana mros mmat rof bo ro Yesus yno. Tna ana saim bo mawe soh Yesus yisoh raa mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, kbe ana maun baun kʼAit mawe Ait yiwer Watum ro Musa oh meto.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait ro yatem mhai retait yawe, “Nasen, nama nros susai mam wefo.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa ro
weto yawe, “Ja Watum ro
ranu mawe anu bno bo bawya mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh? Ja bno bo ro moof, soh mfe bno bo ro mkair a? Bisoh raa, fe bme raa majat a?” Tna raa ro
mhre shait sai.

Yesus ymat raa weto, yhar yawe ana mana mase. Tna yhar ana hawe smot Ait fee ye, tibyo Ait sraujin tna kmo ana ye. Tna Yesus yawe kʼait ro yatem mhai refi yawe, “Betrot natem anyõ oh!” Raa retait betrot yatem rait. Tna yatem mrok moof.
Raa ro
mmat bo ro Yesus yno tna frok sikba samu ro watum reto. Tna ana mamo siret su msya raa ro
Herodes. Ana hre su saim bo mawe saso iso re kbe mame Yesus yajat.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mayõ anya mamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Tna raa msis mbam
ro Galilea, masen kro Yesus. Ana taro mawat mbam
ro Yudea,
mbam
ro Yerusalem, mbam rabin ro Idumea, tna mbam aya maam ro Yordan jaro ati ro ayõ maut, tna mbam
ro Tirus msya
ro Sidon ye. Ana mari bo Yesus yno bo ro msai, tibyo ana mama mmat Ait.
Raa ro mama weto to mawat tna Yesus ynaut yawe kbe ana beak-ak anya mama weto mber Ait. Tibyo Ait ybis kuber wAit mayõ wiak sau moo mse wea kait mkah Ait yaut.
Ait yisoh raa mawat ro mafa bo oh. Tibyo raa ro kiyam mawat mama mberkait-kat anya mama kait wore Ait yros tna mawe miir kʼAit.
Tna raa ro kabes mbo baro hre mam wore weto ye. Ati ro ana mmat Yesus to, kabes ro mbo ana mrok mhar Ait. Tibyo waa maka tna mbibi Ait ye, tna wahrarar mawe, “Nyõ Ku ro Allah yare oh!”
Menohe Yesus yawe wa kabes yawe, “Anu nwe kʼraa roto nwe Jõ fi Ku ro Allah yare wia ma!”
Yesus yaut yamoʼt atu sau. Tna ytu raa ro Ait yhaf mnan mama kro Ait.
Ait ysok ana mabo 12 weto yawe, “Jõ tsok anu nmo raabis
woJõ. Re kbe anu ntam Jõ. Tna re Jõ tbis anu nmo nkyas Bokyas ro Moof
Jõ too tatak tee kʼanu afo re anu ntak nikyak kabes frok.”
Raabis mabo 12 weto oh mefo: Simon ro kbe Yesus yafan yasom Petrus,
Yakobus ysya yao Yohanes ku ro bi Zebedeus yare. Yesus yafan ana mbewok ytu masom Boanerges, feto to 'ku ro ayoh mji'.
Andreas, Filipus, Bartolomeus, Matius, Tomas, Yakobus ku ro bi Alfeus yare, Tadeus, Simon raa ro
msya Yudas Iskariot ro meen yoo Yesus ysan kʼraa ro Roma kbe mame Ait yajat.
Tna Yesus hah ye yamoʼt samu sau. Menohe raa mawat mamoʼt samu reto ye. Mno Yesus ysya kuber wAit msui tibyo mait boit fee.
Yesus yme msya yao na mari bo reto tna mawe kʼanya mawe, “Ait yker oh!” Tibyo ana mamo mawe makah Ait hah mamoʼt remo rana.
Tna
Yahudi baro mama mbam Yerusalem mros mam weto ye. Ana mmat bo ro Ait yno tna mawe, “Kabes Beelzebul
ybo Yesus. Yesus yatak re yikyak kabes sor mkah tak ro kabes Beelzebul rait. Kabes Beelzebul retait ja ybo kabes sor.”

Tna Yesus ytu raa mawat weto mama yawe, “Bonaut rana reto to mkair! Ja kabes yabi yikyak kabes anya fee.” Tna Ait ykyas bofret baro kʼana re kbe ana mhar mawe kabes aro ja mikyak kabes roto fee. Ait yawe,
ro rabin sau ybo raa wait. Menohe soh raa wait mafa anya ai to, kbe rabin reto mros matak fee.
Tna raa ro mhau mam amah sau su to, soh ana mafa anya ai to, kbe ana matak fee ye.
Feto ye soh kabes yabi (Iblis) ysya kabes roto sor mafa anya to, kbe kabes yabi yros yatak fee ye. Yhau akus sai.

Jõ fret bo reto u tawe, Kabes yabi yfi raa ro yatak sait. Fyi re raa sait twok mam amah raa ro yatak sait tna ytak bo wait to? Soh raa make ait yaa msya yatem wia saah. Tna fo ait twok ytak bo ro mhau mam amah mato reto.”
“Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Raa mno iro bawya sai to, Allah yyon iro wana weto saah. Raa mamus Allah to, Allah yyon iro wana reto saah to ye.
Menohe soh raa mamus Har ro Allah to, kbe Allah yyon iro wana bo fee yum. Meen raa weto mhau mkair sai mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
(Riwai raa mawe Yesus tait kabes mbo to. Reto oh mi Ait yawe bo kʼana feto to.)
Yesus yme msya yao na mama. Ana ste mne tna mbis raa ntwok mamo mmen Yesus.
Raa msis-sas hre mur mtan Yesus mam amah reto. Ana mawe kʼAit mawe, “Yesus; nme msya nao na ste Nyõ mne meu. Ana saso Nyõ!”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Jõ tme to awya? Jõ tao na to awya?”
Tna Ait ymat raa ro hre mur mtan wefo yawe, “Raa wefo oh mi Jõ tme msya tao na mefo.
Awya ro ja yno bo ro Allah ksoh to, Jõ ttu tawe tao, tano, msya tme woJõ oh meto.”
Yesus ykyas bo mam maru ro Galilea u. Raa msis-sas mama mros mur mtan kʼait. Ymat feto, tibyo yaut hre mam wiak mato. Tna raa msis-sas weto mros mam maru maam mari bo ro Yesus ykyas.
Tna Ait ykyas bo mawat kʼana mkah bofret yawe,
“Nri! Raa sait yno armato rait sau. Tna ait yamo furere bobat manaf
Ait furere bo to, bo manaf taro mbtek mam iso. Tibyo bo manaf weto to, ruu mama mame mkak.
Tna taro to, mbtek abyõ mam tabam ro fraa mhau wa mte. Tna mtis mame tabam kaket fee. Tibyo bobat weto moo fooh sai.
Menohe ayõ mo maut mafit to, mrok hroyoh. Mtis moo mame tabam kaket fee, tibyo mrok samer.
Tna taro naut btek ye mam wore wo hyoh muuf. Tna hyoh muuf weto mo betru kait. Tibyo make fee.
Tna taro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos. Tna mo maut. Tibyo make sarer toni: Bo manaf sau-sau rau to, make trion 30 bo feto. Taro to, make rau trion 60 bo feto. Tna taro to, make rau trion 100 bo feto.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu ro nri bokyas reto oh to, nnaut kaket!”
Yesus yasen yamo. Tna raa ro ja kro Ait msya kuber wAit mabo 12 to, ana mama mo kʼAit. Tna mawe, “Bawya oh mi nyõ nkyas bofret reto to? Sik betoo maja rau.”
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu to ja Jõ tkyas bo abyõ kʼanu. Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, maja rau baro to, raa wase fares. Maja rau weto, Allah ksoh re anu nhar kaket. Menohe raa ro mne ja hawe mari Jõ. Jõ tkyas bofret kʼana tna ana mfot bo ro tawe fee.
Jõ tkyas bo kʼraa makin mkah bofret sai afo re bo ro tiwya Allah yawe mai kʼana kbe mabo.
Yesaya tiwya ykyas raa wefo ykom yawe:
‘Raa kbe mmat bo yoyo menohe ana wase bo ro ana mmat reto. Ana mari bo yoyo menohe ana mfot bo ro ana mari reto fee. Tibyo ana mashana fee, tna re Allah yyon iro wana fee ye.’”
Yesaya 6:9-10
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu nfot bofret reto fefares a? Fyi re kbe anu nsrau bofret roto to? Nri oh; Jõ betoo bofret maja rau kʼanu:
Bofret bi ro furere bo manaf
to, mkyas Bokyas ro Allah.
Bo manaf ro mbtek mam iso to, mkyas mawe raa ro mama mari Bokyas ro Allah. Mari menohe kabes yabi (Iblis) yama tna safto bokyas mbam kʼana mhaf wana.
Tna tkyas bo manaf ro mbtek abyõ mam tabam ro fraa mhau wa mte: Bo manaf weto to, mkyas mawe raa ro mari Watum ro Allah si fo, simaut mase.
Menohe Bokyas reto ana moo mse mhau mam mhaf mato wana waor sai. Ana mbo matak fee. Raa roto mmat bosmot wana tibyo sikowah ana. Feto tibyo ana mbtek mawe, tna smot
u fee. Ana weto taro to, bo ro samyoh mama mai kʼana to, tibyo ana mbtek mawe, tna smot
u fee ye.
Bo manaf ro mbtek mam hyoh muuf to, mkyas raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah ye.

Menohe ana mhau to, mnaut yyi. Tna ana mnaut bosatoh ro moof mam tabam refo sai. Tna ana nksoh mhau moof bana mam tabam refo sai. Bo weto moo ana mhaf re ana mnaut Bokyas ro Allah fee. Tibyo bosmot wana mrok matak fee. Ana tufrok make aro fee ye.

Tna tkyas bo manaf ro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos: Ana weto to, raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah reto tna mse kʼana mhaf. Tna tis rau to, kbe make mawat. Tna taro to, make rau trion 30. Tna taro to, make rau trion 60. Tna taro to, make rau trion 100.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Ja raa mbet tafoh
afo re ntara raa mam amah mato. Raa moo mse mte tna moo
burut wa fee. Tna raa mmyõt wai mam ambar ro mjin mte to fee ye. Menohe tafoh reto to, ja raa hero abyõ afo re kbe kek ntara raa mam amah mato reto.
Bo bawya ro raa mmyõt to, meen raa masbrah. Tna soh raa mber bo ro mkair aro to, meen raa masbrer ye.
Awya ro yari bo ro Jõ tkyas refo, rau ro moof to, kbe srau ynaut ye.
Nri oh! Soh anu nri bo wefo kaket to, kbe Allah yno anu srau nnaut bo kaket ye. Tna soh anu nri Jõ kaket fee, kbe Allah yno anu srau nnaut bo wefo kaket fee ye.
Awya ro yari tna ybo yno to, kbe Allah yno re ait retait yasu maah. Menohe awya ro yari tna hawe yse mam yhaf mato kaket to, kbe Allah yno re bohar rait to mabuf sai.”
Yesus yawe u yawe, “Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, yfi raa ro furere bo manaf
mam armato rait.

Ait furere, tna mti to ait yjin, tna reen to ait yrok yasen. Ait kmot bo manaf weto yoyo fee. Kbe bo weto mesait mo ai sai tibyo mrok mase ye. Menohe raa retait wase maja ro bo manaf mo mesait tna mrok mase weto ye.
Tabam mesait oh mi mno re bo make to. Tinyi rau to kmoh mo maut tna mse mata msya kre tna mse make.
Ati ro bo make weto manes to raa retait yryoh sai. Feto mnan fi Allah yama ybo raa wAit ati ro Ait ksoh sai.”
Tna Yesus yawe u yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, kbe mnan fi bo bawya? Tkyas bofret bawya naut re kbe anu nhar bo maja rau?
Raa mana ro Allah rAit to, mfi bo manaf
ro maku sau. Tna bo manaf roto taro to, makan rau to mase baro ye. Tna raa sait yoo bo manaf ro maku reto tna furere mam armato rait.
Menohe ati ro bo manaf reto mo to, mrok mase miwrek bosafom roto taro ye. Tibyo ruu ro mfru mam ayoh to, mama mbo mam ara reto kre ye.”
Yesus ykyas Watum ro Allah kʼana mkah bofret mawat. Ait yhar ana mtai mfot watum rAit beta fee. Feto to Ait ykyas bo kʼana mamo snok mam wore ana mari tna srau mnaut sai, tna fo Ait bitsre mam weto.
Ait ja ykyas kʼana mkah bofret sai. Tna Ait betoo bofret maja weto kuber wAit mesait kar mam yuk roto hayah.
Mam ayõ ro hreha reto to, Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nma anu buut wiak frit bmoʼt maru refo ati tino.”
Tibyo ana msya Yesus maut wiak sau sikba raa makin weto mamo. Tna raa roto taro maut wiak roto baro to, kro mamo ye.
Ana mamo, mamo tna foos ro msai frok tubor mama mai wiak rana. Tna figyõm mase mai maut mam wiak mato ye, tna mabo kait ana beta.
Yesus Ait yjin tu mam wiak tis. Tna kuber wAit mti Ait mawe,
fyi kbe Nyõ sayõ anu bsu a?”
Yesus yrok yasen tna yifah foos msya figyõm weto yawe, “Nnem oh!” Tibyo foos reto mrok mnem. Tna maru reto mrok snef u.
Yesus ytu kuber wAit yawe, “Fyi re anu waa to? Anu smot Jõ fe mfefares a?”
Ana mrok waa toni tna mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bi Ait refi yatak yifah foos msya figyõm wefo mari. Bi Ait refi fi awya mefi ee?”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit frit maru reto snok mam rabin ro Gerasa.
Ana frok tna Yesus yaut mne. Tna raa ro kabes mbo sait yama yo kʼYesus. Raa retait yama ybam isra mato ro ja raa mse hai to, yama.
Ja ait yhau mam isra mato weto. Tiwya raa make ait yatem msya yaa mkah too. Menohe ait skur beak sai. Tna fo raa moo
msya
make ait kaket. Menohe ait skur beak ye. Ait safo tibyo raa sait bo ytai ybo ait fee. Tna raa sait yros ter-ter yake ait u ye fee.
Ja ait yhau mam isra mato weto. Tiwya raa make ait yatem msya yaa mkah too. Menohe ait skur beak sai. Tna fo raa moo
msya
make ait kaket. Menohe ait skur beak ye. Ait safo tibyo raa sait bo ytai ybo ait fee. Tna raa sait yros ter-ter yake ait u ye fee.
Rabu-reha to ait ysom yur bait mam wore ja raa sama hai. Tna ait ysom bait mam faut rno ye. Ait yisyah tna yoo fraa ywais ait yetsu ye.
Ait yhau fari ymat Yesus yama. Tibyo ait yhoh yama yo kʼYesus kait tna yaka tmi yimna tna heyut Yesus.

Tna Yesus yawe, “Kabes; nfrok nbam kʼait!” Kabes weto soh-soh kʼAit mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Yesus, Ku ro Allah yare fi; Nyõ Naja yase toni! Kbe Nyõ nno bawya kʼamu mefo? Amu nyoh kʼNyõ nwe, ‘Nyõ nawe mkah Allah yasom nawe kbe Nyõ sikowah amu ma!’”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Kabes; nfrok nbam kʼait!” Kabes weto soh-soh kʼAit mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Yesus, Ku ro Allah yare fi; Nyõ Naja yase toni! Kbe Nyõ nno bawya kʼamu mefo? Amu nyoh kʼNyõ nwe, ‘Nyõ nawe mkah Allah yasom nawe kbe Nyõ sikowah amu ma!’”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nasom awya?” Tna raa retait yawe, “Amu ro nbo ait refi fi kabes nwat. Tibyo jõ tasom ‘Legion.’”
Tna ait soh-soh kʼYesus hri mun aro rau mawe, “Nbis amu frok nbam rabin refo ma!”
Kene msya yuk reto ye fane mawat mau bana mam faut sau.
Tna kabes weto soh-soh kʼYesus mawe, “Nbis amu frok nmo twok mam fane wore wono!”

Tna Yesus ybis yawe, “Nmo oh!” Tna kabes weto mari tna frok mamo twok mam fane weto. Tna fane weto mrok mker tna mhoh-hah tbat mam rakak reto tna mbtek mam maru. Tna fane weto msu tibyo mhai beta mkak. Fane weto mana 2000 bo feto saah.
Raa ro kmot fane weto mmat bo ro Yesus yno. Feto tibyo ana masen fooh mhoh mamo mkyas kʼraa mam
reto tna mkyas kʼraa ro mhau kene ye. Raa mawat mari bo ro ana mkyas weto tibyo ana mama mmat bo reto.
Mama mo kʼYesus, tna mmat he ait ro tiwya kabes mawat mbo retait hre mte. Ait yyum ratan. Tna srau yakit rait moof oh. Ana mmat feto tibyo mrok waa.
Raa ro riwai mmat bo ro Yesus yno weto mkyas ait ro kabes mbo retait tna mkyas fane weto ye.
Tibyo raa weto makin misobu Ait mawe Ait yasen yamo fooh sikba oo rana.
Yesus yawe yaut mam wiak to, raa ro riwai yker retait soh-soh kʼAit yawe, “Jõ kro Nyõ bmo ye!”
Menohe Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nyõ kro ma. Namo no kʼraa wonyõ. Tna nkyas bo msai ro
yno kʼnyõ. Tna nkyas boatmof rAit, nawe Ait yatmof nyõ.”
Tibyo raa retait yasen yamoʼt oo ro Dekapolis. Tna ykyas bo msai ro riwai Yesus yno kʼait. Tibyo raa beta mrok ktak.
Yesus yaut mam wiak hah ye yamo snok maru maam jaro. Tna raa msis-sas mama mros mur mtan kʼAit mam wore aya maam weto ye.
Tna bi yabi ro ybo samu watum raa ro Yahudi sait yama. Ait retait yasom Yairus. Ait yama yaka heyut Yesus tna soh-soh kʼAit yawe,
“Yesus; ku ajõ ro ano sau kiyam, kerit wo mhai! Nama noo natem niir ku au afo re kiyam marak tna kbe au mhai fee.”
Tibyo Yesus ysya bi Yairus mamo. Tna raa msis-sas beak-ak anya kro Ait mamo ye.
Raa msis-sas weto to, fai au sau mama ye. Fai au fo mafa mees ro fnya yoyo
trion 12 oh.
Tiwya raa mawat mama tkif fai au oh. Menohe raa ro mtai misoh au aro fee. Feto mamo snok tis rau to, pitis wau marak. Tna kiyam rau msai renti.

Fai au mari he Yesus ja yno bo ro msai. Tibyo au mnaut mawe, “Soh jõ tiir ratan rAit sai to, kbe kiyam ajõ marak.” Tna mam wore raa mawat weto to, fai au mbito twok mamo mo kʼYesus mam ati ro ait kbor tna miir ratan rAit.

Fai au mari he Yesus ja yno bo ro msai. Tibyo au mnaut mawe, “Soh jõ tiir ratan rAit sai to, kbe kiyam ajõ marak.” Tna mam wore raa mawat weto to, fai au mbito twok mamo mo kʼYesus mam ati ro ait kbor tna miir ratan rAit.
Au miir ratan rAit si fo, tna mees rau reto mrok mnem. Au mari he kiyam rau marak oh.
Au miir ratan rait si fo, Yesus yari he Ait yatak rAit baro frok mbam kʼAit. Tibyo Ait haberek ymat raa wefo tna ytu kʼana yawe, “Awya yatem miir ratan aJõ fo?”
Kuber wait mawe kʼAit mawe, “Yesus; nmat: Raa mawat beak-ak anya sai fo. Fyi re Nyõ ntu nawe awya yiir Nyõ a?”
Menohe Yesus haberek saso raa ro miir Ait sai fares.
Fai au refo mhar bo metsu rau mbros. Au mrok waa tna tetet mhai ye. Tna au maka hartu Yesus, tna mbetoo bo ro au mno beta.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ku aJõ; nyõ smot Jõ tibyo kiyam anyõ reto marak. Riof kʼnyõ oh. Nasen namo oh. Kbe nyõ nafa kiyam reto u fee.”
Yesus ykyas bo fares tna raa baro mama mbam samu bi Yairus mama. Tna mawe kʼYairus mawe, “Ku anyõ reto mhai oh. Nno bi
ysui aro u ma.”
Yesus yari bo ro raa weto mawe. Tibyo Ait yawe kʼYairus yawe, “Waa ma, smot Jõ sai. Smot Jõ nawe Jõ tatak tisoh au.”
Petrus, Yakobus, ysya Yohanes ro Yakobus yao kro Yesus mamoʼt amah ro Yairus. Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa roto yawe ana kro Ait ye ma.
Ana mamo snok amah ro Yairus. Tna Yesus ymat he raa sraujin beta. Ana mawia mnin-nin.
Yesus twok tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu nwia mnin-nin fo? Ku au reto mhai fee. Au mjin sai meto!”
Ana masah Yesus.
Ait yawe ana frok. Tna Ait yakah ku ro mhai refo maja, mme, msya kuber wait mabo tuuf aran tna twok mam amah hawar ro hai raa mse.
Yesus ybo ku refo matem yawe,
(Mkah mai rana reto mawe, ‘Ku ro ano, Jõ tawe kʼnyõ, nrok nasen!’)
Yawe mai weto si fo, ku au masen mros tna mamo ye. (Ku au reto
Raa ro mmat bo msai reto to mrok miskawowo.
Menohe Yesus yawe wa kʼana yawe, “Nmo nkyas bo msai ro tno reto renti kʼraa wia ma!” Tna yawe, “Noo boit nee ku au mait oh.”
Yesus sikba amah ro Yairus tna Ait ysya kuber wAit hah me mamoʼt remo rAit.
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh

to, Ait yamoʼt samu watum raa ro Yahudi. Tna Ait yasen ykyas bo kʼana. Raa ro mari bo ro Ait ykyas to, mrok ktak. Ana mawe, “Bi refi fi, raa ro ja yfen ara sai. Ait yoo watum refo mbam woyõ? Tna Ait yno bo ro msai fyi? Bi Ait refi fai Maria makut. Tna Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas, ysya Simon mao rana fe mfe a? Tna ja yano na mhau msya anu mam remo ranu ye!” Ana mhar Yesus yme, yano na tibyo ana smot Ait fee. Ana mnaut mawe Ait
fee. Mawe ait besruf ana sai feto. Tibyo ana kmo Ait.
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh

to, Ait yamoʼt samu watum raa ro Yahudi. Tna Ait yasen ykyas bo kʼana. Raa ro mari bo ro Ait ykyas to, mrok ktak. Ana mawe, “Bi refi fi, raa ro ja yfen ara sai. Ait yoo watum refo mbam woyõ? Tna Ait yno bo ro msai fyi? Bi Ait refi fai Maria makut. Tna Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas, ysya Simon mao rana fe mfe a? Tna ja yano na mhau msya anu mam remo ranu ye!” Ana mhar Yesus yme, yano na tibyo ana smot Ait fee. Ana mnaut mawe Ait
fee. Mawe ait besruf ana sai feto. Tibyo ana kmo Ait.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe,
ro Allah ybis yama to, ja raa mari ait mam woyõ-woya yamo sai. Menohe mam remo rait yesait to, ja raa hawe mari ait. Tna yaja, yme, yao, msya yano na ja hawe ye. Tna raa ro amah rait to, hawe ye.”
Raa ro remo reto smot Ait to fee. Tibyo Ait yrok ktak. Tna Ait yno bo ro msai aro kaket mam remo rAit fee. Ait yatem ytor yisoh raa ro kiyam mabo baro sai.
Tna Yesus yamo ykyas bo yamo yur mam remo roto taro naut.
Raa ro remo reto smot Ait to fee. Tibyo Ait yrok ktak. Tna Ait yno bo ro msai aro kaket mam remo rAit fee. Ait yatem ytor yisoh raa ro kiyam mabo baro sai.
Tna Yesus yamo ykyas bo yamo yur mam remo roto taro naut.
Ati sau to, Yesus ytu kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait yoo yatak rAit yee kʼana re kbe ana mikyak kabes ro mbo raa to sor. Tna Ait ybis ana mabo ewok-ewok masen mamo hayah-hayah.
Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Nmo ntem marak sai, nbo yu mkah boit, msya pitis ye ma. Nbo armuk mesait aran sai.
Nse
mam naa sai, tna nbo ratan roto taro ro kbe nyum to ma.
Ati ro anu twok mam remo to, soh raa sait yoo anu yse mam amah rait to, nhau oh nsya ait mam beto mamo snok mam wore anu nsen sikba remo reto.

Ati ro anu twok mam remo taro to, soh raa mitrah amah wana kʼanu fee, tna hawe mari bokyas ro anu nkyas to, sikba remo reto nmo. Sikba remo reto nmo to, bes-baas bohasyaf ro mhau mam naa to akus sai. Nno feto afo re ana weto mhar mawe anu bitsre ana akus. Ana hawe bo mari bo ro anu nkyas. Feto tibyo ana mesait oh mi misti kair ro meen mama mai kʼana.”
Kuber ro Yesus wait mabo 12 weto masen mamo. Ana mamo wosa Watum ro Allah kʼraa mawe, “Nashana tna bitsre iro wanu.”
Ana mikyak kabes mawat frok mbam raa. Tna ana moo
maya ngkaru kʼraa ro kiyam mawat ye, tna kiyam rana marak.
Yesus yno bo ro msai mawat tibyo raa mkyas Ait yasom faram mamo snok mam arin aso beta. Tna
Herodes yari Yesus yasom ye. Raa mnaut mawe, “Ait refi fi Yohanes
, Ait yrok yasen. Reto oh mi Ait yatak yno bo msai weto to!”
Menohe raa taro mawe, “Ait tait Yohanes
fee. Ait tait
Elia.” Tna raa taro mawe, “Ait tait Elia fee. Ait tait
ro Allah ybis sait mfi bo
na ro tiwya tinyi Ait ybis ye.”
Herodes yari feto tibyo yawe, “Raa refi yatak yno bo ro msai. Tiwya jõ tbis raa ktan Yohanes yana yajat ne. Ait yrok yasen oh metait!”
Tiwya
Herodes ytak fnya ro yao Filipus rait. Masom rau to fai Herodias. Yohanes yari feto, tibyo yastako
Herodes yawe yber safo oh meto. Tibyo
Herodes kmo Yohanes tna ybis raa mamo mfot Yohanes make. Ana mfot ait tna makah mamo mbu mam
Tiwya
Herodes ytak fnya ro yao Filipus rait. Masom rau to fai Herodias. Yohanes yari feto, tibyo yastako
Herodes yawe yber safo oh meto. Tibyo
Herodes kmo Yohanes tna ybis raa mamo mfot Yohanes make. Ana mfot ait tna makah mamo mbu mam
Bo ro Yohanes yawe reto mno re fai Herodias mhaf mkair. Tibyo au saso iso re kbe raa mame Yohanes yajat. He mfe.

Herodes kmot ait wa wea. Ait yhar yawe Yohanes ja yno bo ro Allah ksoh sai. Tna yhar yawe Yohanes tait raa ro Allah rAit ye. Tibyo Herodes waa, tna hawe yno bo ro mkair mai kʼYohanes. Ait ynaut yawe kbe Allah yno bo ro mkair mai kʼait riryõn. Tna
Herodes ksoh yari Yohanes ykyas Watum ro Allah ye. Ait beroh hre yari, menohe bokyas weto mno ait miskawowo ye.
Fai Herodias mhau ste ati ro
Herodes yakyõ hwiat rait ro tiwya yme mabe ait.
Herodes yoo taah yee kʼraa mase sor mama. Ait ymen raa ro ja mbo
ro Galilea, raa mase ro mbo raa sbe ye, tna msya raa manes ro mhau mam rabin reto taro ye. Ana mama sohmaam bo su mam bokyõ reto.

Ana makyõ bokyõ reto to, ku ano ro fai Herodias rau masen smar. Herodes ysya raa ro mamaʼt bokyõ fo, ana hre horit ku au reto bo smar. Herodes ksoh bo ymat ku au. Tibyo ait ytu ku au reto yawe, “Nyõ ksoh bo bawya? Nayoh sai. Kbe jõ too tee kʼnyõ tu oh!
Jõ tsioh fee; bawya sai ro nyõ nayoh to, kbe jõ too tee kʼnyõ. Soh nyõ nayoh rabin ajõ refo hariyah sau to, kbe jõ too tsan kʼnyõ sai!”
Ku au mari feto, tibyo frok mamo mtu kʼmme mawe, “Tme, kbe jõ tayoh bawya ee?” Mme mawe kʼau mawe, “Nayoh Yohanes
yana!”
Ku au reto hah me mamo mo kʼbi Herodes mawe, “Jõ tayoh raa mame Yohanes
yajat! Nno fooh tna sbi yana nasyõ ait yana abyõ mam
sau, noo nama nee kʼjõ.”
Herodes yari feto, tibyo ynaut yyi. Menohe riwai ait ysi bo kawi oh. Yafoh na mari wia oh no, tibyo ait ye yabe u fee.
Feto mam weto si fo, ait ybis raa sait yawe, “Namo sbi Yohanes yana nakah nama!” Tna raa ro ja yno feto yari tna yamoʼt
ktan Yohanes yana.
Ait yoo Yohanes yana yse abyõ mam
yasyõ yakah yama yee ku au reto. Tna ku au reto makah mamo mee kʼmme mmat ye.
Kuber ro Yohanes wait mari feto, tibyo ana mama moo ajat ro Yohanes. Moo ajat tna makah mamo sama mam isra mato.
Raabis ro tiwya Yesus ybis weto, ana hah me mama siret su msya Yesus. Ana hah mama tna mkyas kʼAit bo bawya ro ana mno msya bo ro ana mkyas kʼraa ye.
Ati reto raa msis-sas mamo-me mmat Yesus tibyo ana msui, hre mait boit fee. Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nma, anu bmo saso wore mimon aro afo re anu sne hoh, biit boit, tna bjin baro rere bo ye.”
Tibyo ana masen maut wiak mamoʼt yuk ro mimon sau.

Menohe raa msis-sas weto mmat ana bo masen sikba yuk reto mamo. Tna ana weto mhar wore ana masen mamo ye. Tibyo raa ro mbam remo kene mam weto sor, ana mawat masen mamo iso snok wia mam yuk ro ana mamo reto.
Tna Yesus ysya kuber wait snok mam maru maam jaro. Ait ymat he raa msis-sas mros wea. Tna ynaut yawe, “Raa ro mkyas Watum ro Allah kʼraa wefo aro fee. Ana mfi
ro mhau akus sai. Raa ro kmot ana aro fee.” Tibyo Ait yatmof ana tna ykyas bo mawat kʼana ye.
Hreha oh tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mama mo kʼAit mawe, “Mti oh. Tna yuk refo fo riamo.
Nbis raa wefo masen mamo rof, re kbe ana saso boit ro mait aro. Kbe ana saso mam remo msya
ro mhau kene mam wefo sor.”

Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu nesait noo boit aro nee kʼana mait.” Tna kuber wAit weto mawe kʼAit mawe, “Amu ntai fee! Soh amu noo boit mkah nee kʼraa msis-sas refo mait to, kbe pitis mabyoh maut toni! Pitis 200
bo feto!”
Menohe Ait yawe, “Anu nse
jya meto? Sik nmo nmat wia.” Ana mamo mmat tna hah me mama mawe kʼYesus mawe,
maat msya syoh mana ewok aran sai fo.”
Tna Yesus ybis re raa hre mam bosafom ro moof weto. Tna ana taro mabo 50 hre kbair sau hayah-hayah. Tna taro mabo 100 hre kbair sau hayah-hayah ye.
Tna Yesus ybis re raa hre mam bosafom ro moof weto. Tna ana taro mabo 50 hre kbair sau hayah-hayah. Tna taro mabo 100 hre kbair sau hayah-hayah ye.
Tna Yesus yoo
trion maat msya syoh mana ewok reto ybo. Tna heyut mam ayoh yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
weto tna yee kuber wAit yawe ana saim kʼraa ro hre weto sor. Tna yiti syoh mana ewok reto saim kʼana beta ye.
Raa weto mait tna mhaf matu beta.
Menohe
mabuf taro msya syoh to msis mhau fares. Kuber ro Yesus wAit soo boit weto tna mfau mam
trion 12 matot.
Raa sme ro mait bo weto mabo trion 5000 bo feto.
Ana mno bo weto mkak si fo, Yesus ybis kuber wAit maut wiak matim wea mamoʼt remo ro Betsaida. Yesait yhau yawe ybis raa msis-sas wefo mamo bana.
Ait bitsre raa mamo bana tna Ait yaut yamo skabuk mam faut mana sau.
Arin mti oh. Wiak ro kuber wAit maut fo mamo oh mam maru masuf. Tna Yesus yhau akus fares mam maru maam.

Foos mfi mama mbam ati ro kuber weto miin wiak mamo, tibyo ana miin wiak reto hrowyõ mhai. Mam wore ayõ ro tuuf bo feto, Yesus yata abyõ mam aya mata yama yo kʼana. Ana mmat Ait yama, yfi bo yama yiwrek ana iti yamo bo feto.
Kuber wAit mmat he Ait yamo abyõ mam aya mata yama tibyo ana miskawowo, mwohrarar mawe, “Nmat, bo mnat anu!” Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Knar oh, waa ma! Jõ mefi!”
Kuber wAit mmat he Ait yamo abyõ mam aya mata yama tibyo ana miskawowo, mwohrarar mawe, “Nmat, bo mnat anu!” Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Knar oh, waa ma! Jõ mefi!”
Ait yaut mam wiak rana si fo, foos mrok mnem. Kuber wAit mrok mtak mmat bo msai ro Yesus yno reto.
Ana mmat bo msai ro Yesus riwai yno msya
weto. Menohe ana srau mnaut yatak rAit fefares.
Ana mamo snok mam aya maam jaro to, ana miti wiak rana mam oo ro Genesaret.
Ana mroh mbam wiak mato mam weto si fo, raa mmat he Yesus yama.

Tibyo raa beak-ak anya mhoh mamoʼt remo ro kene mam weto mbra. Tna katar raa ro kiyam sor fo mama mo kʼYesus. Soh raa mari Yesus yhau mam yuk sau to, kbe ana katar raa ro kiyam weto mama mo kʼAit mam yuk reto ye.
Woyõ-woya sai Yesus yamo to; mam
ye, mam remo ye, kbe raa msis-sas makah raa ro kiyam mama mo kʼAit ye. Ana mama mse raa ro kiyam weto mam
rana. Tna ana soh-soh kʼAit mawe, “Amu niir ratan aNyõ makit sai mbau a?” Tna ana ro miir ratan rAit makit fo, kiyam rana marak beta.
Ti sau fo, raa ro
msya
Yahudi baro mbam Yerusalem mama mo kʼYesus.
Ana mmat he kuber ro Yesus wAit mait boit to, ana myon matem wana wia fee.

(Raa mabi ro Yahudi mbis raa myon matem wana kaket wia mamyot bo mafa rana, tna kbe mait boit. Soh raa mait boit menohe hawe myon matem wana kaket wia to, raa mabi ro Yahudi mnaut mawe kbe Allah kmo ana weto.
Bo mafa wana roto taro mawat ye: Ati ro ana mbam

mama to, kbe ana hre mait boit fee. Ana mate aya myon metsu wana beta wia matim mamyot bo mafa wana. Tna kbe ana hre mait boit. Tna raa ro Yahudi ja myon hawereh msya bo ro saruk boit moof kaket feto ye.)

Raa mabi ro Yahudi weto mmat he kuber ro Yesus wAit mno bo mafa wana weto fee. Tibyo ana kmo mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Yesus; fyi re kuber woNyõ mno bo mafa wamu fee? Ro moof to, ana myon matem kaket wia tna fo mait bo to!”
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykyas anu. Ait ykom yawe anu nmo wan-wan sai. Mabo oh! Bokom reto mawe,
‘Raa mana refo mbaut Jõ mkah masoh mabyõ sai. Menohe ana mhaf wana to hayah sai. Ana maka smot Jõ mati sai. Tna bo ro ana mkyas mam samu watum rana to taro watum raa sai, mbam kʼJõ fee.’”
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykyas anu. Ait ykom yawe anu nmo wan-wan sai. Mabo oh! Bokom reto mawe,
‘Raa mana refo mbaut Jõ mkah masoh mabyõ sai. Menohe ana mhaf wana to hayah sai. Ana maka smot Jõ mati sai. Tna bo ro ana mkyas mam samu watum rana to taro watum raa sai, mbam kʼJõ fee.’”
Yesaya 29:13
Yesus yawe u yawe “Anu nno bo mkair! Watum ro Allah to, anu nsorni, beak. Tna anu nno bo mafa ro mbam kʼraa sai to matak.
Yesaya 29:13
Yesus yawe u yawe “Anu nno bo mkair! Watum ro Allah to, anu nsorni, beak. Tna anu nno bo mafa ro mbam kʼraa sai to matak.
Tiwya Allah ybis Musa ykom yawe,
‘Natmof nja msya nme na.
Keluaran 20:12
Awya ro yawe kair yaja yme bo to, kbe ait raa mame yajat tu oh.’
Keluaran 21:17

Menohe anu nno bo mkair nwe raa matmof maja msya mme na to ma. Anu nwe kʼana nwe, ‘Thar tawe bo ro anu bewok nse to mabuf. Tii tawe tatmof anu mbewok tawe too pitis tee kʼanu, he mfe. Pitis weto beta tsan kʼAllah oh.’
Anu nwe feto tna natmof nja, nme na fee.
Anu nno bo mafa ro hohos wanu fares menohe miwer Watum ro Allah oh meto. Tna anu ja nno bo mkair mnan feto taro ye.”
Tna Yesus ytu raa msis-sas mama. Tna ykyas bo kʼana yawe, “Nri oh, nnaut oh:
Bo aro mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to. Bo aro ro twok mam raa mhaf mno feto fee. Menohe bo ro frok mbam raa mhaf mato oh mi mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to. [
Anu ro nri bokyas reto oh to, nnaut kaket!”]
Yesus sikba raa mawat weto tna yamo twok mam amah mato. Tna kuber wAit mayoh kʼAit mawe, “Nbetoo bofret reto maja rau kʼamu.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu fo nfot fee ye? Boit ro raa mait tna aya ro raa mata to mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to fee. Bo sohmaam ro twok mam raa mhaf mato to bo ati fee.

Bo weto twok mam raa masoh to, tna mroh beta mamoʼt raa mhaf. Tna kbe haberek mamo syõ. Tibyo raa mamo msyõ mam sutet makus akus. Feto to, boit mesait ja mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to fee.” (Mkah bokyas reto to, Yesus yawe boit aro mbau to fee.)
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh raa mhaf mkair to, kbe ait yno bo ro mkair ye.
Raa ro mhaf mkair to, ja mnaut-nat bo ro mkair-kar. Ana mjah bo kbik-kbak, tna msyõf bo raa. Ana mame ajat,
mno bo wyahte, ana masmamo, tna mhaf mkair-kar kʼraa anya. Ana sioh raa anya, tna mno bo ro mti hrenaut. Ana mawe kair raa anya, tna tawyõ ana ai, tna mno bo ninya sai, mnaut tis fee.
Bo ro mkair weto beta frok mbam kʼraa mhaf mato ro mkair. Bo weto oh mi mno wa iranya raa msya Allah to.”
Yesus sikba remo reto tna yamoʼt rabin ro Tirus. Ait twok mam amah sau yawe ymyõt Ait wai. Menohe mfe; raa mhar Ait yama oh.

Tna fai sau mari he Yesus yama si fo, au mama mo kʼYesus. Fai au reto to, fnya mana ro Yahudi fee. Fai au fnya mana ro Siro-Fenisia. Au mama maka soh-soh kʼAit mawe, “Nikyak kabes ro mbo ku ajõ ro ano, mbau a!”

Tna fai sau mari he Yesus yama si fo, au mama mo kʼYesus. Fai au reto to, fnya mana ro Yahudi fee. Fai au fnya mana ro Siro-Fenisia. Au mama maka soh-soh kʼAit mawe, “Nikyak kabes ro mbo ku ajõ ro ano, mbau a!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ja raa moo boit mee kukek wana mait mhaf matu wia matim. Raa moo boit ro kukek mait reto to, beak mtah mait fee!”
Menohe fai au reto mawe, “Ae; menohe makyõ-aka ro btek mbam ambar to, ja mtah mait.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼfai au yawe, “Bokyas anyõ reto moof toni. Feto to, hah ne namo bonyõ oh. Kabes ro mbo ku anyõ to, frok mamo oh.”
Fai au reto hah mamo snok mam amah rau. Tna mmat he ku rau reto mjin maam knar sai wea. Kabes frok mbam ku au reto mamo marak oh.
Yesus sikba rabin ro Tirus, tna yasen yamo iti
ro Sidon yamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Ait truk mam rabin ro Dekapolis.
Tna raa makah raa sait mama mo kʼYesus. Ait retait yimara mtuk msya ymai kair ye. Ana soh-soh kʼAit mawe, “Yesus; noo natem ntor abyõ kʼraa refi, mbau a.”
Yesus yakah raa retait yamo wore ana mbewok mros kar. Tna Yesus yoo yatem krem ysu kʼait yimara ewok. Tna Yesus tfeh oot yatem yiir kʼraa retait hrea ye.
Mam weto Yesus heyut ayoh yayõ yafos fari-fara yawe,
to mai ro Aram mawe, 'maah oh'.)
Raa retait yimara mrok moof yari bo, tna ymai mrok moof ykyas bo yasoh mnan-an ye.
Tna Yesus yawe wa kʼana yawe, “Nmo nkyas bo wefo kʼraa renti ma!” Menohe ana mrok mamo mkyas kʼraa renti sai.
Raa mari he Yesus yno bo msai reto to, mrok ktak. Ana mawe, “Ait yno bombra beta moof sai! Raa ro mimara mtuk sai, msya raa ro mai kair fyi sai, Ait yisoh mrok moof beta.”
Wore weto raa msis-sas mama mo kʼAit u. Tna boit wana marak. Tibyo Yesus ytu kuber wAit mama tna yawe,
“Jõ tatmof raa msis-sas wefo. Ana mama mhau msya Jõ ti trion tuuf oh. Tna mfo wefo boit wana mkak ye oh.
Raa weto taro mama mbam tabam wana ro fari-fara ye. Soh Jõ tbis ana mkah hai sre hah me mamo to, kbe ana mhai awyah sne fefa mam iso maka.”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit mawe, “Fyi re anu bkai boit mnan mam yuk ro mimon refo?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nse
jya meto?” Tna ana mawe, “Amu nse
krema.”
Tna Ait ybis raa msis-sas wefo hre mte beta. Ait yoo
krema weto yayoh asik mawat kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
weto kinyah ftah aro hayah-hayah, yee kuber wAit saim kʼraa msis-sas weto beta mait.
Tna fo Yesus yoo syoh maku baro ro mse ye. Ait ybo yayoh asik mawat kʼAllah tna yoo yee kuber wAit saim kʼraa msis-sas weto beta mabo.
Tna raa msis-sas weto mait tna mhaf matu. Tna
msya syoh ro mhau fares to, kuber ro Yesus wAit soo mawah mfau
trion krema matot.
Raa sme weto mabo trion 4000 bo feto. Raa mait bo mkak tna Yesus ybis ana masen mamo bana.
Tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit maut wiak mamoʼt rabin ro Dalmanuta.
Raa ro
mabo baro mama mtu bo kʼYesus mawe sanet Ait. Ana mawe Ait yno bo msai aro re kbe ana mmat tna mhar mawe Ait ybam kʼAllah yama fe mfe a.
Yesus ynifasa tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu raa mana ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo fo, fyi re anu nyoh kʼJõ nawe tno bo msai re anu nmat? Kbe Jõ tno fee.”
Tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit maut wiak mawe mamoʼt maru maam jaro.
Kuber ro Yesus wAit sorni
ro kbe ana mait to akus.
rana sau aran sai mhau mam wiak.
Yesus yawe wa kuber wAit yawe, “Kaket anu mkah
raa ro
msya bi Herodes.”
Kuber wAit mari feto, tibyo mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Anu sorni
ro kbe biit, tibyo Yesus yawe bo feto to.”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mkyas kʼanya feto. Tibyo Ait yawe,
wanu kebet reto to, nnaut nkyas nno fyi? Anu wase Jõ tatak aJõ fares a? Anu nfot fefares a?
Anu nsu mti. Anu raa ro nimara mtuk. Anu sorni bo to!
Tiwya anu nmat
maat ro Jõ too saim kʼraa mabo trion 5000 mait. Tna ati reto to, anu soo ro ntari mhau to, nfau
jya meto?” Ana mawe,
trion 12.”
“Tna feto ye, riwai Jõ too
krema tee kʼraa mabo 4000 mait to, tna ro ntari mhau to, anu soo nfau
jya ye meto?” Ana mawe,
trion krema matot.”
Ait yawe, “Anu wefo wase tatak aJõ fares a?”

Yesus ysya kuber wAit snok mam aya maam jaro, tna mroh wiak mam remo ro Betsaida. Tna raa makah raa ro yasu mboh sait mama mo kʼYesus tna mayoh kʼAit mawe, “Natem niir raa ro yasu mboh refi afo re yasu moof.”

Tna Yesus ybo raa ro yasu mboh retait yatem, befatu ait yamo frok ybam remo reto. Ait tfeh oot bi retait yasu tna Yesus yoo yatem yse kʼait yasu ye. Tna ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nmat bo aro oh, fe mfefares a?”
Raa retait heyut ymat tna yawe, “Jõ tmat bo kaket fefares. Tmat raa mfi ara ro mamo me bo feto sai.”
Yesus yoo yatem yse kʼraa retait yasu naut u. Tna ait yasu maah. Ait ymat bo kaket.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Namo bonyõ oh. Namoʼt remo reto nkyas iti ma!”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit masen mamoʼt remo sor ro mhau kene mam
Kaisarea Filipi. Ana mamo kri-kri fo, tna Yesus ytu bo kuber wAit yawe, “Raa mnaut mawe Jõ fi awya?”
Kuber wAit mawe, “Ana taro mnaut mawe, Nyõ fi Yohanes ro ja
raa. Tna taro mawe, Nyõ fi
Elia soh mfe to,
ro Allah ybis nama roto sait.”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana yawe, “Bonaut ranu nesait nwe Jõ fi awya?” Tna Petrus yasen yawe, “Nyõ fi
Tna Yesus yawe wa yawe, “Nkyas bo refo renti kʼraa ma!”
Tna Yesus betoo kuber wAit yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe meen kair mawat mama mai kʼJõ. Raa manes ro
Yahudi kbe mikyak Jõ: Raa mabi wana ye,
manes wana ye, tna msya
wana ye. Jõ kbe raa mame tajat. Tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Jõ trok tasen.”
Ait ykyas bo ro meen mai kʼAit, yawe bo reto meen mabo tu. Tna Petrus ykuk Yesus yamo kait kʼait yajoh jaro. Tna Petrus yastako Yesus yawe, “Nawe bo feto ma!”

Menohe Yesus haberek ymat kuber wAit tna bhah Petrus yawe, “Petrus, namo fari tno. Nyõ nkyas bo ro kabes yabi (Iblis) ykyas meto! Bo ro nyõ nkyas reto to, bonaut ro mbam kʼAllah fee. Bonaut reto to mbam kʼraa sai meto.”

Raa msis-sas huwya mawe mari bokyas rAit. Tna Yesus ytu ana msya kuber wAit mama beta. Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu awya sai ro ksoh kro Jõ to, nko hawe sai kbe nno mfi fefo: Nno bo wanu u ma. Menohe nsom ara warok wanu sait-sait: Au oh mi nko hawe sai beroh nsom bo samyoh ro kbe mama mai kʼanu. Tna beroh kro iso ro Jõ terif kʼanu.

Raa taro mawe misoh metsu rana ai mam tabam refo. Ana saso riof rana mam tabam refo sai ai menohe mnaut mamos rana fee. Meen ana weto mhau hame wajin fee. Menohe raa taro mawe mhau saso riof rana ai mam tabam refo fee. Ana mawe kro Bokyas Moof aJõ
tna mno bo woJõ ye. Ana saso Jõ tasom aJõ mam tabam refo. Ana weto oh mi kbe mkai riof kʼana. Ana kbe meen raa mame majat oto, menohe meen mkai riof ro hame wajin.
Mfi bo raa sait ykai kta mam tabam refo beta menohe ykai riof mase to fee; meen mafer rau to bawya?
Meen anu nhai beta, tna bo satoh wanu meen kwiyat namos wanu me u fee.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ hah tama u. Tama tkah bo yase ro Allah rAit. Tama tsya

wAit ye. Menohe mfo refo, wore wo raa mhau mam tabam refo fares to, raa mawat mno iro woyõ-woya sai. Ana mfi raa ro wyahte Jõ. Raa mawat hawe kro Jõ. Ana hrenaut mkyas Jõ tasom. Ana ro harenaut Jõ feto to, meen ati ro Jõ hah tama u to, kbe Jõ harenaut ana ye.”
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Nri oh! Meen anu baro nmat raa mana ro Allah yamo

ybo to, mama frok tubor. Frok to, anu ro nros nsya Jõ mam befo to, meen anu baro nhau fares nmat to. Ati reto to, anu nhai beta marak fefares. Anu nmat Allah ybo raa wAit feto to, kbe anu nmat Allah yatak rAit ye.”
Ti trion ntamam firwas tna Yesus yakah Petrus, Yakobus ysya Yohanes ro Yakobus yao yamo. Ana maut mamoʼt atu ro miyõ sau. Ana mesait mamo kar mam yuk reto. Tna ana mmat Yesus yetsu haberek.
Ratan rAit mamo mboh fyok. Raa sait bo ja yyon ratan moof fyok mfi feto fee ye.
Tna ana mmat raa mabo ewok frok tubor mros msya Yesus. Ana mbewok weto to, Elia ysya Musa.
Tna Petrus yawe kʼYesus yawe,
amu ye nhau mam yuk refo to moof toni. Kbe amu sgi sbyah trion tuuf mam yuk refo: Sau kʼNyõ, sau kʼMusa, tna sau ye kʼElia.”
(Ana waa, tibyo Petrus ykyas feto sai tna ait wase bokyas rait reto.)
Tna byõ mama sro-sro ana kait. Tna ana mari Raa sait ymai mam byõ mato yawe, “Ait refi Ku aJõ ro Jõ tksoh. Nri bo kʼAit!”
Mai reto mkak si fo, ana mmat mur mtan wore ana mros weto. Mmat he Yesus yesait aran sai. Tna Elia ysya Musa marak.

Ana mroh mbam atu reto mamo, tna Yesus ysi bo kʼana. Ysi yawe, “Bo ro riwai anu nmat to, nkyas kʼraa roto to ma. Nkyas ma wia, mamo snok mam wore meen Jõ trok tasen wia. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'.”
Ana mari bo ro Ait ykyas reto tna mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bawya ro mi Ait yawe ‘Meen yrok yasen’ meto?”
Tna ana mtu kʼAit mawe, “Fyi re
wanu ro Yahudi mawe, ‘Meen Elia
yama wia tna fo
yama yrof to?’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ae, Elia yatim yisoh bombra sor wia. Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Elia hah ye yama oh. Tiwya raa sikowah ait mamyot ksoh rana sai. Bo reto mabo oh mnan si bokom ro
sait tiwya ykom ykyas Elia. Tna
sait tiwya ykyas Jõ ye. Ait ykom yawe, ‘'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, kbe Ait yasom bo ro samyoh mawat. Tna raa makin kbe hawe smot Ait ye.’ Anu nnaut nwe bokom reto mkyas Jõ fe mfe a?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ae, Elia yatim yisoh bombra sor wia. Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Elia hah ye yama oh. Tiwya raa sikowah ait mamyot ksoh rana sai. Bo reto mabo oh mnan si bokom ro
sait tiwya ykom ykyas Elia. Tna
sait tiwya ykyas Jõ ye. Ait ykom yawe, ‘'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, kbe Ait yasom bo ro samyoh mawat. Tna raa makin kbe hawe smot Ait ye.’ Anu nnaut nwe bokom reto mkyas Jõ fe mfe a?”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit taro mhau akus. Ana santri bo msya
Yahudi mabo baro. Raa msis-sas mros horit ana. Tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit mabo tuuf hah me mama mo kuber ro mhau akus weto.
Raa weto mmat Yesus yama tna ana simaut mase. Tibyo mhoh mamo mtar Ait.
Yesus ytu bo kuber wAit yawe, “Anu santri bawya nsya
weto?”
Ati reto raa sait yama yawe, “Bi
jõ takah ku ajõ tama to kʼNyõ. Kabes mbo ait tibyo ymai marak!
Ati ro ruu mber ait to, kabes ntubat yetsu rait mabyõ tabam. Yafyat myoh, ybait rkit kʼanya, tna yetsu marktor-ktar ye. Jõ tayoh kuber woNyõ re ana mikyak kabes frok. Menohe ana matak fee.”
Yesus yawe, “Anu wefo mfe saut! Anu wefo raa ro smot Jõ fee! Kbe thau tsya anu kait fares a? Jõ thaf sneh tsya anu kait ye fee oh!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼbi retait yawe, “Nbo ku retait nakah nama!”
Tna ana makah ku retait mama mo kʼYesus. Kabes reto mmat Yesus si fo, mbo ku retait simoyot. Tibyo btek yai tabam tna beririk-rarak ait, yafyat matot yasoh ye.
Yesus ytu bo ku retait yaja yawe, “Ait kiyam fefo tija ooh-oh fe mfe a?” Yaja yawe, “Maban tii ykek mamo snok mfo refo oh.
Kabes reto msuk ntubat ku retait mbeak mam tafoh. Tna msuk ntubat ait mbeak mam aya ye, mawe mame ait yajat. Soh Nyõ ntai nisoh ku ajõ to, natmof amu!”
Yesus yawe, “Nyõ nnaut nawe Jõ ttai tisoh ait fe mfe a? Jõ ttai tno bombra beta soh raa smot Jõ matak.”
Yesus yawe feto si fo, bi refi soh-soh ymai mase yawe,
jõ smot Nyõ. Menohe bosmot ajõ fo kebet sai fares. Natmof jõ re bosmot ajõ matak.”
Yesus ymat he raa msis-sas mama fooh mros mur mtan kʼAit. Tna Ait yawe kabes reto yawe, “Kabes ro mno raa mimara mtuk tna mai marak; Jõ tikyak nyõ nfrok nbam ku refi! Nhah ne nama nbo ait u ma!”
Kabes reto wahrarar mbo ku refi yetsu simoyot tna frok mamo. Tna raa mmat ku ait yjin yfi raa ro mhai. Ana mawe, “Ait yhai oh!”
Menohe Yesus ybo ait yatem tubat yasen. Tna ait yasen yros.
Rere baro naut Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo twok mam amah mato. Ana mesait hre su tna mtu bo kʼYesus mawe, “Bo bawya mno re amu ntak nikyak kabes reto frok fee?”
Yesus yawe, “Kabes ro mfi feto to, soh raa skabuk Allah wia, kbe ana mbis kabes reto mikyak frok to saah.”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit sikba yuk reto masen mamo frit
ro Galilea. Mamo to, Ait hawe raa makin mmat Ait ye.
Ait ykyas bo kuber wAit mesait sai tna yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna kbe raa mfot Jõ msan kʼraa roto mbo. Kbe ana mame Jõ tajat. Tna ti ro tuuf to, Jõ trok tasen.”
Kuber wAit mari bokyas reto menohe ana wase bawya ro Ait ykyas reto. Tna ana waa bo mtu kʼAit ye.
Ana snok mam remo ro Kapernaum tna truk mam amah sau. Tna Yesus ytu bo kuber wAit yawe, “Riwai anu santri bawya mam iso to?”
Riwai mam iso to, ana santri anya. Ana mawe ana to, awya ro yase. Ana hrenaut mkyas bo reto tibyo mhre shait sai.
Yesus hre tna ytu ana mabo 12 reto mama. Tna yawe, “Awya ro yawe kbe yamo raa ro yase meto to, ait ye yamo yfi raa kinyah wia. Tna yno bo raa makin. Tna meen Allah yno re raa retait yamo yase.”
Tna Ait yoo ku maku sau yse mros msya ana weto. Tna Ait saku ku refo ybaut tna yawe kuber wAit yawe,

“Jõ ksoh anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼraa ro mhaf sneh mfi ku kinyah. Awya ro yitrah yhaf rait ku kinyah sau tna yno feto mam Jõ tasom aJõ to, ait yno bo moof oh meto. Reto mnan anya mfi ait yno bo ro moof reto kʼJõ ye oh meto. Allah oh mi tiwya ybis jõ tama fo. Tibyo awya ro yitrah yhaf rait kʼJõ tait, ait yitrah yhaf rait kʼbi Allah ye oh meto.”
Yohanes yawe kʼYesus yawe,
; amu nmat bi sait yikyak kabes frok tna yawe ait yno feto mkah natak aNyõ. Menohe amu wase raa retait. Tibyo amu nwe wa kʼait nwe, ‘Nno feto ma!’”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Nwe wa kʼait ma. Awya ro yno bo ro msai mkah tak ro Jõ tasom to, kbe ait yno Jõ tasom mkair fee.
Nwe wa kʼait ma. Awya ro beswan anu fee, ait yhau mam ati ranu ye.
Nnaut oh: Soh raa sait yhar yawe anu smot Jõ, nwe Jõ fi
tibyo yatmof anu to; meen Allah yoo boren rait yaren kʼait retait tu oh. Tna soh raa sait yari Jõ, tna yatmof anu tibyo ywyan aya yee kʼanu aro nta to, kbe Allah yaren ait tu oh.”
“Raa ro yisti re ku maku ro smot Jõ sau mno iro to, soh ait ysu mam aya yhai to, moof miwer bo ro meen Allah yno mai kʼait retait!
kmo raa ro misti re raa roto mno iro to. Feto to mfi bo raa mawah fraa ro mase sau make mam yamyum, tna mbeak ait mam aya sawan to, bo reto to moof miwer bo samyoh toni ro meen ait ykai.

Soh anu ntem jaro misti re anu sait nno iro to, nsbi natem anyõ reto beak war makus. Anu nhau nkah ntem sau aran sai tna nmo twok mam sawro ro Allah to, bo ro moof. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah ntem ewok tna re nno iro to, bo ro mkair meto. Meen Allah yoo anu beak niit mam tafoh ro roon. Meen Allah yoo anu beak mam sawro ro kair reto
Tafoh ro roon reto mhai fee, meen mait yoyo sai mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tna afan ro mhreh-reh raa mhau mam tafoh reto to, mhai fee ye.]

Soh anu naa sau misti re anu sait nber nmo nno iro to, nsbi naa reto beak war makus. Anu nhau nkah naa sau aran sai tna nmo twok mam sawro ro Allah to, bo ro moof. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah naa ewok tna re nno iro to, bo ro mkair meto. Meen Allah yoo anu beak mam sawro ro kair. [
Tafoh ro roon reto meen mhai fee, mait yoyo sai mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tna afan ro mhreh-reh raa mhau mam tafoh reto to, mhai fee ye.]

Feto ye soh anu nsu jaro misti re anu sait nno iro to, tufrok nasu makan reto. Anu nhau nsya Allah nkah nsu sau aran sai to, reto bo moof. Menohe soh anu nhau nkah nsu ewok tna re nno iro to, bo ro mkair. Meen Allah yoo anu beak mam sawro ro kair.
Tafoh ro roon reto meen mhai fee, mait yoyo sai hame wajin. Tna afan ro mhreh-reh raa mhau mam tafoh reto to mhai fee ye.”

Tna Yesus ykyas bofret sau yawe, “Bo samyoh ro mnan fi tafoh kbe mai kʼraa beta. Tna bo ro samyoh reto kbe mno raa mrok moof. Reto mnan fi haa ye. Soh raa yoo haa ybyat mam boit rait to, kbe boit reto mafah moof.

Haa to, ja mafer moof. Menohe soh haa mafah fee; reto mkair, kbe raa mtai mno haa reto maser u fee. Feto ye, nhau to, nno bo ro mafer mawat kʼraa roto ye. Tna nhau niranya nsya raa anya. Reto moof ye. Soh anu ja nno bo ro moof fee; kbe anu raa ro mafer marak.”
Yesus sikba remo ro Kapernaum tna yaut wiak frit aya ro Yordan. Tna yamoʼt
ro Yudea. Raa msis-sas mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait ykyas bo kʼana mnan fi ja Ait yno.
Tna raa ro
baro mama mo kʼAit. Ana mawe mtu bo sanet Ait mawe, “Fyi; mfi bo raa sait yako yfain makus sai. Ait yiwer Watum ro Musa ykom oh meto, fe mfe a?”
Yesus ye ytu kʼana yawe, “Watum ro Musa reto mkyas mawe bawya?”
Tna ana mawe, “Musa yawe,
‘Soh raa sait yako yfain rait makus to, kbe ait ykom aam ro mako au makus. Ykom tna yee kʼau wia, tna ait yako au.’”
Ulangan 24:1-4
Tna Yesus yawe, “Allah hawe raa sait yako yfain rait. Menohe anu ja nna matak sai; anu hawe nri Watum ro Allah. Au oh meto Musa ykom watum reto.
Menohe Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Maban tiwya tinyi to, Allah yfen raa sme ye tna yfen fnya ye.’
Kejadian 5:2
‘Feto oh mi kbe ku ro sme sikba yaja ysya yme na tna yamo ysya yfain rait mhau su.
Kbe ana mbewok mjin su tna mhaf sau su ye.’
Kejadian 2:24
Feto to, Ana mnan fi raa mabo ewok u fee. Ana haberek mfi raa sait aran sai.
Tna raa sme msya fnya ro Allah yse mrat su to, raa sait bo ye betwat ma.”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo truk mam amah mato tna kuber wAit mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Nkyas bo ro riwai reno u kʼamu.”
Tna Ait yawe, “Awya sai ro yako fnya rait makus tna yamo ymen fnya ro u to, ait retait raa ro ywyah oh meto.
Mfi bo fai sau mako maa tna msya raa roto to, fai au reto fnya ro mwyah ye meto.”
Tna raa baro makah kukek wana mama mo kʼYesus. Ana mama re kbe Ait yse yatem abyõ kukek wana. Kuber ro Yesus mmat feto, tna ana mastako raa weto.

Menohe Yesus ymat feto, tna bhah kuber wAit. Bhah ana yawe, “Nitsre ku kinyah weto mama mo kʼJõ. Nwe wa ana ma! Raa ro mama mo kʼJõ mnan fi kukek wefo fo, mhaf wana to, Allah ksoh. Ana oh mi mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to.
Menohe, Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Awya ro hawe mama mo kʼJõ mfi kukek wefo fo, kbe ana mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee.”
Yesus yawe bo weto, tna Ait tubat kukek weto yse yatem abyõ kʼana tna skabuk re Allah yno bo ro moof kʼana.
Yesus yasen yamo, tna raa sait yhoh yama tna yjit yimna hartu Yesus. Tna ait yawe,
Nyõ fi raa ro nhaf moof! Jõ kbe tno bo bawya re kbe meen Allah yno jõ thau hame wajin?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Fyi re nyõ nawe Jõ fi raa ro thaf moof? Raa aro mhaf moof fee. Allah yesait aran sai yhaf rAit moof.
Nyõ nhar watum ntraa wefo:
‘Nme ajat ma! Nwyah ma! Nsyõf bo to ma! Siroyõ ma! Besruf raa ma! Nmat nja msya nme na to kaket!’”
Ulangan 5:16-20
Bi retait yawe,
tiwya taban tkek fares to, tiwer bo weto aro fee.”

Yesus ymat bi retait tna yatmof ait yawe, “Bo sau nyõ nno fefares: Namo nasim kta wonyõ beta. Tna nsaim pitis weto kʼraa ro bo marak. Soh nno bo reto to, nyõ name kta mam sawro ro Allah oh meto. Tna fo nama nkro Jõ.”
Ait retait bobot toni. Tibyo yari bokyas ro Yesus reto to, ait srau hri yamo bait.
Yesus ymat kuber wAit tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro bobot masen mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, min toni.”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit mrok ktak mari bo ro Yesus yawe reto. Tna Yesus yawe u yawe, “Ku woJõ sor fo, raa mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, min toni.
maboh sau twok mam sii hroh to, mnan-nan baro ye. Menohe raa ro bobot yamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to min toni.”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit mari feto tibyo mrok ktak. Tna ana mtu kʼanya mawe, “Soh feto to, raa awya meen ykai riof?”
Yesus yasu ymat ana tna yawe, “Anu raa to, nesait ntai nno riof kʼanu fee. Menohe Allah yno riof kʼanu saah. Ait ytai yno bo bawya sai.”
Tna Petrus yawe, “Amu wefo nsen sikba bombra wanu beta afo re nma kro Nyõ oh.”
Yesus yawe, “Raa ro smot Jõ tna mamo mkyas Bokyas Moof ro Allah
to, taro to, sikba amah rana. Tna taro to, sikba mao msya mano na, maja msya mme na, kukek wana, tna armato wana bo sor to.

Kbe ana beta mkai bo weto beta aro naut u. Kbe ana mkai amah aro u, mao msya mano na, maja msya mme na, kukek wana, tna armato muhrin trion 100 naut u mam tabam refo. Menohe kbe raa sikowah ana weto ye. Tna meen raa weto kbe mkai roon ro hame ye. Bo wefo beta kbe mabo tu oh.
Menohe raa mawat ro mfo refo matim wia to, meen mamo tis. Tna ana ro mfo refo mhau tis to, meen matim wia.”

Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo mam iso maka kri-kri mamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna Yesus yatim wia. Kuber wAit mnaut yyi. Tna raa taro ro kro Ait mamo fo, ana waa ye. Yesus ytu kuber wAit mesait aran mama tna Ait ykyas bo ro kbe mai kʼAit yawe,
“Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Anu bmoʼt Yerusalem mefo. Mam beto to, kbe raa mfot Jõ msan
manes msya
ro Yahudi. Tna kbe ana mbis raa mame Jõ tajat. Tna ana ro
Yahudi weto, kbe moo Jõ msan kʼraa ro wase Allah.
Kbe ana mamus Jõ, tfeh oot kʼJõ, moo too mmok-mak Jõ, tna kbe ana mame Jõ tajat. Tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Jõ trok tasen.”
Tna Yakobus ysya Yohanes mama mo kʼYesus. Ana mbewok ku ro bi Zebedeus wait. Tna ana mayoh kʼAit mawe,
amu nyoh re Nyõ nno bo bawya sai ro amu nyoh kʼNyõ fo.”
Yesus ytu si kʼana yawe, “Bo ro anu nyoh kʼJõ to bawya?”
Ana mawe kʼAit mawe, “Meen Nyõ namo nase nbo raa woNyõ to; amu nyoh kʼNyõ re amu bewok nmo nse nsya Nyõ ye. Nbis amu sait hre kʼNyõ mam ati ro natem ati. Tna nbis sait hre mam ati ro natem ta.”
Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu wase bo ro anu nyoh: Meen bo ro samyoh mai kʼJõ. Fyi; kbe anu mbewok ntai nsom bo ro samyoh mnan Jõ feto ye, fe mfe a?”
Tna ana mawe, “Amu ntak ye.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Bo ro mama mai kʼJõ to, meen anu nsom ye to.
Menohe awya ro hre mam ati ro tatem ati msya tatem ta to, Jõ oh mi tsok ana weto fee. Raa ro hre mam yuk reto to, meen Allah yesait ysok bo rAit oh.”
Kuber wAit mabo nsaa taro mari bo reto, tibyo ana kmo Yakobus ysya Yohanes.
Feto tibyo Yesus ytu ana mama tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Nnaut nwe raa ro wase Allah mam tabam refo to: Raa ro mamo aban mana wana ja mberasi raa kinyah ro ana mbo. Tna raa ro mamo
tna hre abyõ mam uu to, ja mbis-bas raa sai.
Menohe anu to, nno bo feto ma. Awya sai ro yawe yase kʼanu wefo to, ait yamo raabis ranu tna ait yno bo wanu ye to.
Tna awya ro yawe yatim yamo aban mana kʼanu to, kbe ait yamo sryan kʼraa beta wia.
Ynan fi Jõ fo. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tama fo, tawe tbis raa mno bo woJõ fee. Menohe Jõ tama fo re tno bo kʼraa. Tna tama re too tetsu ajõ tfes raa mawat.
Tibyo kbe ana mkai riof ro mase.”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo snok mam
ro Yerikho. Ana mhau ti baro firwas tna masen mamo. Tna ati ro ana sikba
reto to, raa msis-sas kro ana mamo ye. Mam weto to, raa ro yasu mboh sait hre mam iso maam jaro yayoh bo. Ait yasom Bartimeus, ku ro bi Timeus yare.
Ait yari raa mawe, “Yesus, ro ybam Nazaret tait yama!” Tibyo ait ro yasu mboh retait ytu yawe, “Yesus, Ku ro Daud;
natmof jõ!”
Raa mawat kmo bhah ait mawe, “Shait!” Menohe ait beroh ytu fari renti yawe, “Ku ro Daud, natmof jõ!”
Yesus susu yros tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Ntu ait yama!” Tna ana mtu bi ro yasu mboh retait mawe, “Yesus ytu nyõ, yawe nasen nama!”
Raa ro yasu mboh retait bitsre ratan rait ro mne mhau akus. Tna yasen fooh yamo yo kʼYesus.
Yesus ytu bo kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nksoh nawe Jõ tno bo bawya kʼnyõ?” Ait yawe, “Bi
; jõ ksoh tmat bo ye!”
Yesus yawe, “Bosmot anyõ misoh nyõ nasu maah meto. Namo oh.” Mam weto si fo, raa retait yasu mmat bo tna ait kro Yesus mamo ye.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo mam iso ro Yerusalem fares. Tna ana snok remo ro Betfage msya remo ro Betania. Remo weto mhau mam Faut ro

maku sau raa mii mros wea mam weto.

ybis yawe nee kʼAit wia. Kbe baro fooh sai raa moo misya hah me.’”
