Mazmur 118:26
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mabo 12 snok mam Yerusalem tna ntwok mam Samu ro Allah. Ait ymat bombra mam weto beta, menohe arin kene wo mti oh, tibyo ana masen hah mamoʼt remo ro Betania.
Menrabu Yesus ysya kuber wAit frok mbam remo ro Betania mamo. Mamo iti mam iso ro Yerusalem to, Yesus yhai sre.

Ait ybam fari ymat ara mara sau ro mata ntin toni. Ait yamo kait mam ara mair reto yawe ymat make aro fe mfe a. Ait yamo snok kait ymat menohe make aro fee, mata rioh sai. Reto soo ro kake make fefares.
Tna Yesus kmo ara mara reto nto yawe, “Kbe raa sait ye yait kake make anyõ u fee!” Kuber ro Yesus wAit ana mari bo ro Ait ykyas reto.

Ana mamo snok mam Yerusalem tna Yesus yamo twok mam bohra Samu ro Allah rAit. Ait ymat he raa miwana Samu ro Allah. Tibyo Ait kmo yikyak raa ro masim bo msya raa ro moo bo sor mam beto. Raa taro hre masim pitis
Masim pitis Samu ro Allah kʼraa ro sriem. Tna raa mhre masim ruu
bo ye. Tna Yesus haberek-barak ambar wana ro masim bo weto.
Tna yno wa raa ro frit iti mam Samu ro Allah. Yawe, “Niwana Samu ro Allah ma! Refo fo iso fee! Nsom bo wanu mam befo ma! Nmo-nma frit Samu ro Allah fo ma! Nmo twaat tno soh!
Bokom ro Allah mawe:
‘Amah aJõ fo, mkah awya sai ro ybam arin aso beta yama skabuk.’
Yesaya 56:7; Yeremia 7:11
Menohe anu niwana amah refo fo. Anu hre nno bo mfi raa ro ja msyõf bo mefo!”
manes ro
Yahudi msya

wana mari bo ro Yesus yno mam Samu ro Allah. Ana mhar mawe raa mari watum ro Yesus ykyas tna mrok ktak beta. Yesus yasom mase mam rabin reto tna raa manes weto ana mrok waa. Ana mhaf mkair tna saim iso re kbe mame Yesus yajat.
Kene wore mti oh tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit frok mamo sikba
reto.
Menrabu rabu fo Yesus ysya kuber wAit mhah me mamo frit u ara mara ro iis reto iti. Tna ana mmat he ara reto samer beta.
Tna Petrus ye ynaut bo ro iis Yesus yawe. Ait yawe kʼYesus yawe,
sik nmat! Ara mara rno iis Nyõ nbis nawe nsamer to, mabo oh!”
Yesus yawe si yawe, “Smot Allah!

Bo bawya sai ro anu skabuk nyoh kʼAllah to, nhar nwe kbe anu fri bo reto. Nnaut mamo-me ma. Feto kbe anu fri bo ro anu nyoh kʼAit reto. Mfi bo raa sait yawe, ‘Atu rno matu mamo mai mam aya sawan!’ Soh ait ynaut mamo-me fee; kbe Allah yno bo ro ait yawe reto mabo tu oh.”

Bo bawya sai ro anu skabuk nyoh kʼAllah to, nhar nwe kbe anu fri bo reto. Nnaut mamo-me ma. Feto kbe anu fri bo ro anu nyoh kʼAit reto. Mfi bo raa sait yawe, ‘Atu rno matu mamo mai mam aya sawan!’ Soh ait ynaut mamo-me fee; kbe Allah yno bo ro ait yawe reto mabo tu oh.”

Ati ro anu nros skabuk nkyas bo kʼAllah to, nmat sas anu nhaf wanu wia. Soh anu aro nhaf mkair to, nisoh nhaf moof wia. Au oh mi; sorni bo mkair ro tiwya raa mno mai kʼanu to. Kmo ana ma. Tna re anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit tait, kbe yatmof anu tna yyon iro wanu ye. [
Menohe soh anu hawe nisoh iranya ranu nsya raa ro mno iro mai kʼanu to, anu Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit tait, kbe yyon iro wanu fee ye.]
Yesus ysya kuber wAit hah me mamoʼt Yerusalem. Ait yamo mam bohra Samu ro Allah to, raa manes ro
Yahudi mama:
manes,
msya raa mabi wana ye.
Ana mama tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Awya oh mi ybis Nyõ, re Nyõ nama nno bo wefo fo?”
Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ttu si bo sau kʼanu ye, tawe: ‘Yohanes
: Ait retait raabis ro Allah fe mfe a?’ Nkyas si kʼJõ wia. Tna fo kbe Jõ tkyas awya ro ybis Jõ tama tno bombra wefo sor.”
Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ttu si bo sau kʼanu ye, tawe: ‘Yohanes
: Ait retait raabis ro Allah fe mfe a?’ Nkyas si kʼJõ wia. Tna fo kbe Jõ tkyas awya ro ybis Jõ tama tno bombra wefo sor.”
Raa manes weto mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Soh bwe Allah oh mi ybis Yohanes to, kbe Yesus yawe, ‘Feto tna fyi re anu ntu sioh bo ro Yohanes yawe?’
Raa mnaut mawe Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Feto soh anu bwe raa sai ybis ait to, kbe raa kmo anu.”
Feto to ana mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Amu wase ye.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ye te tkyas tatak aJõ ro tno bombra wefo kʼanu fee ye.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret baro kʼraa manes ro
Yahudi weto yawe, “Bobot sait yyum
mara mawat mam tabam rait. Tna ait ywas ana yur ytan mam armato rait. Tna ait yabah kayah sau mkah bo kbe mbokait
make tna yoo maya rau to. Tna ait sgi harit sau mkah ait hre kmot wa. Ait yno bo weto mkak tna fo ybis raa baro yawe ana mkah tna kmot armato
rait reto weya, kwiyat kʼana. Ait yawe kbe ana moo make rau to, saim taro hayah kʼait. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto.
Ait yhau mam teto kait. Yhau mamo snok soo ro

mara wait weto make manes. Tna bobot retait ybis sryan rait sait hah yamoʼt tabam rait, yamo yo kʼraa ro kmot armato reto. Bobot retait ybis sryan retait yawe, ‘Nkyas kʼana ro kmot armato ajõ nawe ana mryoh
make aro moo mee kʼnyõ. Tna noo
make weto nakah nama nee kʼjõ.’
Tna sryan retait yasen yamo. Yamo snok mam tabam ro bobot rait reto. Menohe raa ro kmot armato weto to raa ro mhaf kair. Ana huwya mai sryan retait. Ana mikyak ait. Tibyo ait hah ye ybo
aro fee.

Feto tna bobot retait ybis sryan rait roto sait u yamo. Sryan ro ewok retait yamo. Yamo snok mam tabam ro bobot rait reto tna raa ro kmot armato reto huwya mamus sryan refi ye tna mai ait yana rait ye.

Tna bobot retait ybis sryan rait roto sait yama naut. Menohe raa weno huwya mame ait yajat. Feto ye bobot retait ybis sryan wait taro mama naut. Menohe raa ro mhaf kair weto, ana huwya mai sryan weto taro, tna mame taro majat ye.
Bobot ynaut yawe, ‘Kbe tbis awya naut u fo? Kbe ana mari ku ajõ tu oh!’ Tibyo ait ybis ku rait sait aran tum ro ait yawyan marak to yamo. Tna ku retait yasen yamo.
Menohe raa ro kmot armato
weto mmat he ku ait yama. Tna ana mkyas kʼanya mawe, ‘Ait ro meen shauk armato refo yama mefi! Ait refi yhau ma! Nma, anu bme ait yajat to, afo re meen armato refo mhau kʼanu!’
Feto to ana mame ait yajat tna tubat ajat rait mbeak mam armato reto mne.”
Tna Yesus ytu yawe, “Bobot ro armato rait retait kbe yno bawya kʼana ro kmot armato reto? Kbe ait yama yame raa weto tu. Tna ysan armato
reto kʼraa roto taro.
Nsorni ma Bokom ro Allah far-far refo:
‘Raa saso fraa mawe sgi samu sau. Ana mmat fraa sau mawe mkair. Fraa reto to, ana hawe. Tibyo moo mbeak makus. Menohe ana wase bo fraa reto oh mi fraa ro ati.
oh mi yno bo reto mabo. Tna anu bnaut bwe bo reto moof toni.’”
Mazmur 118:22-23
Raa manes ro

Yahudi weto mhar mawe Yesus ykyas bofret weto mai kʼana. Tibyo ana kmo saim mawe mfot Yesus. Menohe ana waa mfot Ait mam wore raa makin mmat. Ana mnaut mawe kbe raa weto kmo ana. Tibyo ana sikba yuk reto mamo.
Tna fo raa manes ro
Yahudi mbis raa ro
msya raa ro kro Herodes baro mamo mo kʼYesus. Mbis ana weto mawe ana mamo ti te kro Yesus tna mari bo ro yawe.
Tibyo raa weto mama mo kʼAit tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Bi

amu nhar nwe Nyõ ja sioh fee. Tna Nyõ waa raa ro manes fee. Nyõ beroh nkyas bokyas ro Allah kʼawya sai. Tna iso ro Allah to, ja Nyõ nerif abyõ kʼraa to, nmyõt bo fee ye. Feto to amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Allah ksoh yawe anu mbero namabyoh
fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yhar yawe ana mamo wan-wan sai. Tna yawe, “Anu syoh ntu bo sanet Jõ mkah bawya? Noo pitis mauf sau nee kʼJõ tmat wia.”
Ana moo pitis mauf sau mee kʼAit. Tna Ait ytu kʼana yawe,
refo fo msya awya yasom rait mefo?” Ana mawe,
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh feto, bo bawya ro Kaisar rait to, noo nee Kaisar. Tna bo bawya ro Allah rait to, noo nee kʼAllah.” Ana mari bo ro yawe feto tna mrok ktak.
Ati sau to, raa ro
baro mama mo kʼYesus. (Raa ro
to raa ro
Yahudi ye. Menohe ana ja mnaut mawe raa ro mhai to, meen me mrok masen fee.) Ana mtu kʼAit mawe,
“Bi
tiwya Musa ykom yawe, ‘Soh raa sait yhai tna ait sano to, kbe yao kro semit reto mkah yabe ku aro mkah shauk biin ait ro yhai retait.’
Tna amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Mfi bo raa sme mabo ngkrema mao kʼanya mhau. Tna ro bum ymen fai sau, he ait sano tna yhai kba.
Ait ro ytan yao ro yabi fi yasen kro semit rana menohe yabe ku aro fee. Tna ait yhai ye. Feto ye yao ro tuuf yama kro semit rana naut. Menohe yabe ku aro fee ye.
Feto ye mnan anya sai mamo snok ro ngkrema beta. Tna fo fai au reto mhai ye.”
Tna raa ro
weto nti te mtu Yesus mawe, “Meen ati ro hai mrok masen to, awya yfain fai reto? Tiwya ana mabo ngkrema ye mfain fai au reto ye fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bonaut ranu mkair meto. Anu wase Bokom ro Allah msya Ait yatak rAit to ye.
Meen, ati ro raa mrok masen to, raa moo fnya u fee. Tna fnya mamo msya raa fee ye.
ja moo fnya fee. Meen raa mhau sai mfi
sor mam sawro ro Allah.
Bokom ro Musa mkyas raa ro mhai meen mrok masen to. Nnaut nwe tiwya Allah ykyas bo kʼMusa ybam tafoh ro mait ara sau. Tafoh mait ara reto sohabyoh fee, menohe mait mbane sai. Tna Allah yawe,
‘Jõ fi Allah ro Abraham, Ishak msya Yakub ja mbaut.’
Keluaran 3:6
Allah yawe feto tibyo anu bhar bwe hohos wanu weto ro mhai ooh oh, ana mhai tibyo fee. Menohe Allah yawe ana mhau mam sawro rAit mbaut Ait fares. Feto to tawe kʼanu raa ro
to, anu susre: Maja sau riwai anu nkyas to mkair. Mabo fee.”
Yesus santri bo ysya raa ro
nkri-kri fo. Tna
rana sait yama yros ymat rof. Ymat he Yesus yakit maan betoo bo raa ro
mtu kʼAit. Tna ait ytu kʼYesus yawe, “Watum ro tiwya Musa ykom beta to, watum ryo oh mi moof miwrek watum taro beta to?”
Yesus yawe si yawe, “Watum ro moof ati oh mefo:
‘Raa mana ro Israel, nri;
Allah ranu tait,
ro sait yum.
Nhafri
Allah ranu mkah nhaf, srau ranu beta, mkah bohar ranu beta, tna mkah ntak ranu beta ye.’
Ulangan 6:4,5
Watum ro ewok oh mi,
‘Nhafri raa ro mhau kene msya anu to ye. Nhafri ana mnan fi anu nhafri netsu wanu nesait ai.’”
Imamat 19:18
Tna
retait yawe si kʼYesus yawe,
bokyas aNyõ to moof ati. Mbris oh:
Allah tait, Ait sait yum oh. Allah roto aro mhau fee ye.

Anu raa ro Yahudi ja bnaut bwe, ‘Raa moo bo msan kʼAllah to, bo ro ati syok.’ He mfe. Mfo refo Jõ tsrau tnaut tawe, anu bhafri Ait mkah bhaf, srau ranu beta, mkah bohar ranu beta, tna mkah btak ranu beta ye. Au oh mi bo ro ati syok meto.”
Yesus ymat he bi ait retait yakit maan. Tibyo yawe, “Mbris oh, nyõ kene wo namo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo.” Tna raa aro ter-ter mtu bo kʼYesus u fee.
Yesus ykyas bo nkri-kri mam bohra Samu ro Allah to, tna Ait ytu bo kʼraa yawe, “Fyi re
wanu ro Yahudi mawe,
tait Kube ro bi Daud to?’
Tiwya Har ro
mbesi bi Daud ybis ait ykom yawe:
yawe

ajõ yawe, “Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam ati ro tatem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Hre wea. Tna raa ro byoh, raa ro srau kair kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe Nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ ana, nbo ana.”’”
Yesus yawe u yawe, “Tiwya Daud ytu
rait’ to, fyi re anu nkyas nwe
tait Kube ro Daud?” Raa msis-sas ro hre weto ana mari bo ro Ait ykyas to nksoh toni.
Yesus yawe wa ana yawe,
wanu ro Yahudi to, kaket ana: Ana ksoh myum ratan ro moof tna mamo-me afo re raa mmat ana tna bibi ana. Tna ana ksoh mawe raa mmah meen kʼana mam wore wo mamo mam
bo.
Ati ro ana mamoʼt samu watum to, tna ati ro ana mamo makyõ bokyõ to, ja ana msok ambar ro moof tna mhre mam weto ye.

Ana skabuk miyõ wer afo re raa mmat ana. Raa mmat feto tna mnaut mawe ana raa ro ja mno bo moof sai. Semit mnaut mawe ana raa ro ja mno bo ro moof, tna ana miwro semit weto tna mtak amah wana ye. Feto to, meen bo ro mkair toni mama mai kʼana tu oh.”
Ati sau Yesus hre mam Samu ro Allah. Ait ymat rof raa ro masen mama moo pitis msan
Raa ro bobot mawat makah pitis mase mama mbero ye.
Menohe semit sau moo pitis mauf wau ewok mbero ye. Pitis ro mabyoh mroh sai meto.
Yesus ytu kuber wAit mama tna yerif fai au reto kʼana yawe, “Bris oh, fai au ro semit rno moo pitis wau mabyoh mroh sai. Feto tna mfo refo pitis wau ro mse mam amah rau fares to marak. Feto to
ynaut yawe bo ro au mbero to, mawat miwer raa ofo beta.
Pitis raa taro mbero to, baro sai mbam kta wana ro mase. Menohe semit refo, moo pitis wau ewok ro mse mkah boit mait weno oh mi bero beta mefo, tibyo mtai marak.”
Yesus frok sikba Samu ro Allah, tna kuber wAit sait yawe, “Bi yabi, sik nmat Samu wore wono wia: Fraa maboh wore raa sgi amah wono to moof toni!”
Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nmat Samu ro mase wono sor wia: Meen raa mitrah Samu weto beta. Tna kbe
msya fraa sau bo mhau ntar-tar anya feto fee. Meen fraa weto skik mbtek mai tabam beta.”
Tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit maut mamo hre mam Faut ro
ro mros msyok si Samu ro Allah. Tna Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes msya Andreas mtu bo kʼYesus yesait kar mawe,
“Sik nyõ beto kʼamu bo ro riwai Nyõ nkyas to. Tija re bo ro Nyõ nkyas weto mabo to? Kbe amu nmat bo bawya re nhar nwe bo ro Nyõ nawe weto kene wo mabo?”
Yesus yawe, “Kaket anu! Nno be raa mama sioh besruf anu.
Jõ fi
sait aran, menohe meen raa mawat mama to, sruf bo mawe ana
ybam kʼAllah. Kbe raa mawat mari feto tna smot raa weto.
Kbe anu nri he raa rabin taro mame anya tna mafa mnin-nin. Bo weto kbe mabo tu oh. Menohe waa ma: Bo weto kbe frok matim wia. Bo weto frok mama tna tabam refo haberek fefares.
Tna raa ro
sau kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro
roto taro. Tna raa ro
sait ybo to, kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro

roto taro mbo ye. Tna iin frok mam wore aro rau-rau. Tna kbe hai awyah btek mai kʼraa ye. Ti ro bo samyoh weto mama to, tinyi rau sai fares meto. Wore wo anu nmat bo weto to, kbe anu nhar oon reto mama. Reto mfi fnya ro mhaf ja kborham wia, tna kbe mabe to.

Kaket anu: Anu ro smot Jõ to, meen raa mfot anu tna makah mamoʼt samu ro raa mtu safo. Tna kbe raa mai-a anu mam samu watum ro Yahudi ye. Anu smot Jõ tibyo raa mfot anu makah mamo msan kʼaban mana sor. Feto tna kbe anu nkyas Jõ tasom
bo ye.
Wore tabam haberek fefares to, Bokyas Moof ro Allah
meen raa wosa mam
beta. Snok
beta maka wia tna tabam haberek.
Tna ati ro raa mfot anu, makah mamoʼt samu ro ja raa mtu safo to, nnaut yyi ma. Nnaut yyi bokyas ro kbe anu nkyas si kʼraa to ma: Kbe Har ro
mbesi bokyas moof kʼanu, mti bonaut kʼanu. Feto kbe bo ro anu betoo kʼraa ro mhau susai reto to, bokyas ro mbam Har ro Moof sai.
Meen raa ro tabam refo hren ksuk anya, kbe ana mame anya majat: Raa msya mao na kʼanya, tna raa msya kukek wana ye. Tna kbe kukek mari maja, mme na fee, menohe moo ana msan kʼraa mame ana majat.
Anu fo nkro Jõ to, tibyo kbe raa beta knait anu. Awya ro beroh yari Jõ mamo snok mam tabam haberek to, meen Allah yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa retait.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nmat bokom refo tna kbe anu nfot bo ro Jõ tawe kʼanu: Tiwya Allah ybis
Daniel ykyas yawe:
‘Meen bo sau ro mkair toni mama sikowah yuk ro mbau to.’
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ati ro anu nmat bo reto mabo to, kbe anu nhar nwe kene mam wore wo tabam refo haberek. Ati ro anu nmat bo reto to, anu ro nhau mam
ro Yudea beta to; nsen nsam nmo nuut atu mana.
Anu ro hre abyõ mam samu wanu kri-kri to; kbe nroh satoh bo wonyõ mbam amah mato nbo frok to ma! Nsam fooh nmo ntem marak sai.
Anu ro nkah bo mam armato to; hah ne nmo noo ratan wanu ma. Nsam fooh nmo sai.
Wore weto to, fnya ro mhaf tna msya fnya ro mee sis ku mees wana to, ana mmof toni. ⌞Ana kbe matak msam fooh fee.⌟

Meen wore weto to, arin mkair toni. Maban tiwya tinyi Allah sair tabam refo mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, raa mkai bo ro mfi feto aro fefares. Tna bo ro mkair-kar mfi feto to aro meen me btek mai kʼraa u fee. Feto to skabuk nyoh
afo re meen bo reto mabo mam ati ro oom maah to ma.

Meen wore weto to, arin mkair toni. Maban tiwya tinyi Allah sair tabam refo mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, raa mkai bo ro mfi feto aro fefares. Tna bo ro mkair-kar mfi feto to aro meen me btek mai kʼraa u fee. Feto to skabuk nyoh
afo re meen bo reto mabo mam ati ro oom maah to ma.
Oon ro samyoh reto to, oos mawe Allah yatmof raa sok wAit. Feto to yawe yisusu oon reto mabuf baro. Soh mfe to, raa sait bo meen ye yhau fee. Soh mfe to, raa beta mhai.
Ati reto to, raa ro mawe besruf anu to, kbe frok mama. Taro mawe ana to
he mfe. Tna taro mawe ana to

ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe ye. Meen ana mama tna sair bo ro hnah msya bo ro msai taro mawat. Ana mno bo ro msai re kbe besruf anu. Ana tomer besruf raa sok ro Allah wAit ye he mfe. Feto to, soh raa sait yawe bo kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rno mno!’ Soh raa yawe feto, nri ait ma! Tna soh sait yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rau mau.’ Nri bokyas rait reto ma!
Ati reto to, raa ro mawe besruf anu to, kbe frok mama. Taro mawe ana to
he mfe. Tna taro mawe ana to

ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe ye. Meen ana mama tna sair bo ro hnah msya bo ro msai taro mawat. Ana mno bo ro msai re kbe besruf anu. Ana tomer besruf raa sok ro Allah wAit ye he mfe. Feto to, soh raa sait yawe bo kʼanu yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rno mno!’ Soh raa yawe feto, nri ait ma! Tna soh sait yawe, ‘Nmat,
yama mam ati rau mau.’ Nri bokyas rait reto ma!
Feto kaket anu sai. Bo weto beta Jõ tawe kʼanu wia matim tna meen bo reto mabo.
Oon ro samyoh reto mkak wia, tna ayõ ro ja mafit to, me mamur. Tna snyi ro mboh to, me mboh u fee.
Kbe sken btek-tak mbam ayoh. Tna bombra ro mhau mam ayoh beta to, mrok mbrir-brar.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Ati reto to, raa mmat Jõ tbam ayoh mboh troh tama. Tama to, raa mmat tatak aJõ ro msai msya tase aJõ ye.
Jõ kbe tbis
woJõ mama mtu raa sok woJõ mbam arin aso beta mama mo kʼJõ.
Tawe tkyas bofret sau kʼanu nri: Soh anu nmat ara mara sau, tna nmat ngkre ro sne-sne moof to, feto to anu nhar oh nwe kene wore snyi ro hwyõm oh meto. Nfot bofret refo maja rau:
Feto ye, soh anu nmat bo ro riwai tkyas weto mama to, anu nhar nwe oon ro Jõ tama u reto to, kene oh meto.
Nnaut: Ati ro bo weto beta mama to, tawe biin refo to, kbe raa taro mhau fares.
Ayoh msya tabam refo kbe saef marak. Menohe bokyas aJõ kbe meen mhau mawyõs mamo snok mam hame wajin.
Ayõ ro Jõ tama u to, raa sait bo yhar fee.
ana wase ye. Jõ, Ku ro Allah yare fi, wase ye. Taja yesait aran yhar bo rAit.
Anu wase ayõ reto ye. Feto to siwyan anu kaket yoyo sai.

Jõ tkyas bofret kʼanu u: Bi sait sikba amah rait yamoʼt rabin ro fari. Ait ybis sryan wait kmot amah rait wea. Tna ybis bo ro ana kbe mno to kʼana sait-sait hayah ye. Tna ybis sryan sait yros mam ati ro masa. Hre byõ abyõ.
Tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Hre byõ abyõ ye. Anu wase ayõ ro bi retait hah yamaʼt amah rait ye: Kbe yama hreha, arin masuf, fe yama rabu momo a? Anu wase ye.
Kaket anu! Meen
yama tubor. Nno be kbe Ait ymat bo anu njin fares!’
Bo ro Jõ tawe kʼanu wefo fo, kbe Jõ tawe kʼraa beta afo re ana siwyan wea ye.”
Ti ewok naut tna raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro
. Tna kbe ana makyõ korat
ro
Marak' to ye.
manes wana msya
wana to, ana saim wai mawe mamo mfot Yesus tna mame Ait yajat.
Menohe ana mawe kʼanya mawe, “Bo reto anu bno mam ati ro korat
refo ma, be kbe bo reto mno raa makin mafa.”
Ati sau to, Yesus hre yait boit mam amah ro Simon mam remo ro Betania. (Bi Simon tait, tiwya yafa
) Yesus hre yait bo kri-kri fo, tna fai sau twok mama. Mama mbo
kusia sau.
to mabyoh maut toni. Au mama mihabah kusia reto tna mtu abyõ mam Yesus yana.
Raa taro hre mam weto ye. Ana baro mmat feto, tibyo mrok kmo mawe kʼanya mawe, “Au mno bawya meto ee? Fyi re
reto sikowah sai a?
Rau ro moof to, au masim kʼraa tna moo mabyoh rau 300
Tna mabyoh ro mase reto kbe raa msan kʼraa kinyah ro mse bo fee.” Tna ana bhah fai au reto wa.
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bhah au ma! Nno wa au to ma. Fai au mno bo ro moof kʼJõ.
Raa kinyah to, ja mhau su msya anu yoyo. Meen ti tija sai to, nno bo moof kʼana. Menohe Jõ fo, kbe thau tsya anu yoyo fee.
Fai au mtu
kʼJõ tetsu refo fo, siwyan hai aJõ wia oh meto. Kebet baro naut kbe raa mame Jõ tajat tna sama hai aJõ to. Au mno bo ro moof kʼJõ oh meto.
Nri kaket wia: Bokyas Moof ro mbam kʼAllah to, meen raa wosa mamo snok mam arin aso beta. Woyõ-woya raa mkyas to, bo ro fai au reto mno fo, kbe raa mnaut tna mkyas ye.”
Tna Yudas Iskariot yasen yamo yo
manes ro Yahudi. Yudas tait, kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 12 weto sait ye. Yamo saso iso ro kbe ait ysan Yesus kʼana.
Yudas yama yo kʼana to, ana weto nksoh toni. Tna ana mawe kʼYudas mawe kbe maren pitis kʼait. Tibyo ait yasen yamo. Tna ywof ati ro moof re kbe besruf Yesus.
Ti ro tinyi korat
ro
Marak to, ja raa ktan
sau, ro kbe mabo mam bokyõ ro
Ti reto kuber ro Yesus wAit mama mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ ksoh nawe amu siwyan bo sohmaam mam woyõ?”
Tna Yesus ybis raa mabo ewok mbam kʼana weto yawe, “Nmoʼt
Tna kbe anu fri raa sme ro yasom baah mkah aya sait. Kro ait nmoʼt
amah ro ait twok to. Tna nmo ntu kʼbi ro amah rait retait nwe,
ranu ytu bo yawe, “Yuk ro kuber woJõ msya Jõ kbe nkyõ bokyõ ro
mam woyõ?”’
Kbe ait yerif amah hawar ro uu sau kʼanu. Amah hawar reto mase. Tna ambar bo mhau wea oh. Siwyan bombra mam beto.”
Tna ana masen mamo. Ana mmat he bo beta huwya mfi bo bawya ro Yesus riwai yawe kʼana. Tna ana siwyan bo sohmaam mkah makyõ bokyõ ro
reto.
Tna mti reto Yesus ysya kuber wAit beta mamoʼt amah reto.
Ana hre sohmaam bo tna Yesus yawe, “Anu wore hre niit bo su nsya Jõ wefo fo, sait kbe hren ksuk yno bo ro mkair mai kʼJõ.”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit mari bo ro Ait yawe reto, tibyo ana mrok sraujin tna ana wefo sait saak-saak Ait wa mawe,
jõ fee!”
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu nbo 12 ro niit boit nsya Jõ su fo, sait hren ksuk kʼJõ.

Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe raa mame Jõ tajat tu oh. Mame Jõ to, mnan si mkah Watum ro Allah tiwya mawe wia yum oh. Menohe ait ro hren ksuk kʼJõ to, meen safo maboh mai kʼait ye tu oh. Ro moof to, tiwya yme mabe ait fee sai.”
Ana sohmaam bo kri-kri fo, Yesus yoo
sau. Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
reto yee kʼana beta mait. Tna yawe, “Nmat
refo. Tetsu aJõ oh mefo. Noo oh.”
Tna Ait yoo hawereh sau. Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna yee kʼana beta mata.
Tna yawe,
maya refo to, mees aJõ ro kbe miyi mkah riof kʼraa mawat. Kbe raa mame Jõ tna Allah ysair bosi ro tna kʼanu oh meto.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, Jõ kbe tata
maya mam tabam refo u fee. Thau meen snok mam wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa wait. Wore weto kbe Jõ tata
maya ro tna.”
Ana mji howes mkak tna masen mamoʼt Faut ro
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu beta kbe nsen nsam sikba Jõ nmo. Watum ro Allah mkyas feto mawe:
‘Jõ kbe tame raa ro kmot
sait, tibyo
wAit to, masen msam brir-brar mamo ye.’
Zakharia 13:7
Menohe kbe Taja yno Jõ trok tasen. Tna kbe Jõ tatim ste anu wea mam
ro Galilea.”
Menohe Petrus yawe, “Mfe; ana taro saah to, kbe masen msam sikba Nyõ to. Menohe Jõ kbe tasen tsam sikba Nyõ bo fee yum.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Petrus, nari: Mti refo to, kook mara muhrin ewok fefares to, kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ wia muhrin tuuf oh, nawe nyõ wase Jõ.”
Menohe Petrus yatak yawe u yawe, “Fyi-fya sai, Jõ kbe twaar Nyõ fee! Raa mawe mame jõ tsya Nyõ bjat su to mi bewok bjat rof!” Tna kuber wAit taro mawe feto beta ye.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit masen mamoʼt yuk sau ro masom Getsemani. Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Hre ste Jõ wea wefo tna Jõ tamo skabuk wia.”
Tna Ait yawe Petrus, Yakobus ysya Yohanes mama nkro Ait mamo. Ait ynaut yyi tna srau mham toni.
Ait yawe, “Jõ sraujin toni mfi bo tawe thai sai oh! Nhau mam befo tna siwyan kaket ye.”
Yesus serar yamo baro naut, tna yabum skabuk. Yhar yawe ayõ ro mkair toni mama. Ait yawe yayoh Yaja re Ait tru bo ro kbe mama mai kʼAit to fee.
Ait yawe,
Taja: Jõ thar tawe Nyõ ntai natak nno bombra beta. Feto Jõ ksoh Nyõ tubat bo ro samyoh tna nno wa re kbe bo weto mai kʼJõ ma. Menohe Jõ ksoh tno bo ro Nyõ nawe sai.”
Yesus skabuk mkak tna hah ye yamo ymat he kuber wAit mabo tuuf weto mjin tu. Ait yti ana ytu Petrus yawe, “Simon, nyõ njin tu sai a? Nyõ bito hre nwan nsya Jõ ayõ sau sai fee!
Hre nwan tna skabuk re kbe bo ro tabam refo tko anu nno iro to ma. Anu nwe nno bo ro moof. Menohe anu netsu to matak fee.”
Tna Yesus hah ye yamo skabuk mun sau naut yayoh bo ro riwai Ait yayoh weto u.
Ait skabuk mkak tna hah ye yama yo kʼana mabo tuuf reto u. Tna ymat he ana mjin maka toni, tibyo mjin tu bana sai. Ait yti ana mrok masen. Tna ana hrenaut tibyo mnaut bo ro mawe si kʼAit aro fee ye.

Ait yamo skabuk muhrin ro tuuf naut. Tna hah ye yama u yawe, “Anu njin fares a? Nsen oh! Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Ayõ ro raa sait yama besruf Jõ fo, kene oh. Kbe ait besruf Jõ tna yoo Jõ ysan kʼraa ro ja mno iro mfot.
Nsen nma bmo oh! Ait ro besruf Jõ yama oh mefi!”
Yesus yros ykyas bo refo tna Yudas frok yama. Yudas ybam kuber wAit mabo 12. Ait yama yatim tna raa sbe mawat nkro ait mama ye. Ana masom
wana msya hbat. Riwai raa manes ro
Yahudi mbis ana msya
manes,
msya raa mabi wana mamo mfot Yesus.
(Yudas ro besruf Yesus fi, riwai yawe yerif Yesus kʼana yawe, “Kbe Jõ tamo hana raa sait to. Ait oh metait. Nfot Ait tna nbo Ait kaket tna nkah nmo.”)
Feto tna mkah tetara Yudas yamo yo kʼYesus tna yawe, “Bi
meen oh kʼNyõ!” Tna ait hana Yesus.
Tna raa ro kro Yudas mfot Yesus.
Kuber rAit sait ymat feto tibyo yayõ
rait. Yayõ tna ysot sryan ro
yase rait yimara nktos.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana ro mama mfot Ait yawe, “Anu nbo
msya hbat nma nfot Jõ mfi bo Jõ raa ro tsyõf bo sai a?
Rabu wawa Jõ betoo Watum ro Allah kʼanu mam Samu rAit to. Menohe anu nfot Jõ mam beto fee. Bris oh bo ro anu nno refo mabo oh mnan Bokom ro Allah oh.”
Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit masen msam brir-brar beta sikba Ait akus.
Ati reto mere sait ro yyan hawee ftah sai wamu ait wa to kro Yesus ye. Raa mawe mfot ait ye,
menohe mfe; raa mbo sre hawee ftah rait mhau akus kʼana matem tibyo ait ysam sro raa yamo.
Raa mfot Yesus tna makah mamoʼt samu
Yahudi ro yase rait to. Tna
manes beta, msya raa mabi ro
Yahudi, tna
wana ye, hre siret mam beto.
Tna Petrus ybo rof-rof ana mtis. Ait yamo snok mam bohra ro
yase. Tna ait fuu twok hre ye yni foos su ysya raa sbe ro ja kmot samu reto ye.
Tna mam samu mato to,

manes msya raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi to, hre mkyas bo. Ana makin beta to, mtu kʼanya mawe “Anu buun Yesus bwe Ait yno bo bawya afo kbe anu bme Ait yajat?” Menohe ana fri safo mana aro fee.
Raa mawat mkyas bo mbesus kʼYesus. Menohe ana sioh sai tibyo bo ro ana mkyas to hayah-hayah sai, mnan anya fee.
Tna raa mabo baro masen mros mkyas bo mbesus mai kʼYesus. Ana sioh mawe,

“Amu nri Ait yawe, ‘Samu ro Allah to, tiwya raa sgi mkah matak rana sai. Kbe Jõ tihabah Samu reto. Tna kbe Jõ sgi Samu ro tna sau mam ti trion tuuf sai. Samu ro Allah ro tna reto, raa sgi mkah matak rana fee.’”
Menohe bo ro ana mkyas sioh reto aro ykyas rait hayah-hayah sai.
Tna
ro yase yasen yros sayõ raa weto. Tna ait ytu kʼYesus yawe, “Boun ro raa mawe maun Nyõ reto to, Nyõ nasen betoo fe mfe a?”
Yesus yari bokyas wana menohe Ait shait si bait sai.
ro yase retait ytu kʼYesus naut u yawe, “Nyõ fi
Ku ro Allah yare a?”

Yesus yawe si yawe, “Jõ oh mefi. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen anu nmat Jõ hre tsya Allah ro yase. Kbe Jõ hre mam ati ro yatem ati; hroh ro mase toni reto. Tna kbe anu nmat Jõ troh tama abyõ mam ayoh mboh tama ye.”
ro yase yari feto, tibyo kmo ybo ratan rait yesait yhah-hah. Tna yawe, “Anu besait bri oh. Ait yawe Ait

Ait yamus Allah oh meto! Kbe anu saso raa roto mama maun Ait mkah bawya! Tna anu nnaut nwe fyi? Kbe anu bno bo bawya mai kʼAit?” Menohe ana beta mawe, “Safo makan btek mai kʼAit oh. Raa mame yajat tu oh!”
ro yase yari feto, tibyo kmo ybo ratan rait yesait yhah-hah. Tna yawe, “Anu besait bri oh. Ait yawe Ait

Ait yamus Allah oh meto! Kbe anu saso raa roto mama maun Ait mkah bawya! Tna anu nnaut nwe fyi? Kbe anu bno bo bawya mai kʼAit?” Menohe ana beta mawe, “Safo makan btek mai kʼAit oh. Raa mame yajat tu oh!”
Tna raa baro ntfeh oot kʼYesus. Ana moo hawe make Ait yasu tna mmuk Ait. Mmuk tna mawe, “Sgi nawe awya ymuk Nyõ metait?” Tna raa sbe mama makah Ait mamo mai ye.
Petrus yhau mam bohra reto tna sryan ro
yase rait sau mama.
Au mama mmat Petrus bo hre yni foos mam tafoh. Au mmat kaket mhar Petrus yasu tna mtu kʼait mawe, “Nyõ ye oh ja nkro Yesus, raa ro Nasaret retait to a?”
Menohe Petrus ywaar yawe, “Jõ twase. Jõ thar bo ro nyõ nawe reto fee!” Tna ait yasen yamo yros mam ana mato. [Si fo kook mara.]
Sryan reto mmat Petrus yros mam weto tna mawe kʼraa ro mhau sor weto mawe, “Bi ait retait raa wana sait meit!”
Menohe Petrus ywaar naut u. Mhau baro tna raa ro mros weto sor mawe kʼPetrus mawe, “Nyõ fi raa ro Galilea ye; feto amu nhar nwe nyõ fi kuber wAit sait to! Ne nwaar ma!”
Tna Petrus ywaar matak tna yto bo yawe, “Ayoh mjah wa, jõ twase Raa ro anu nwe retait ye!”
Mam weto si fo kook mara muhrin ro ewok. Petrus yari feto tna ynaut bo ro riwai Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Kbe kook mara muhrin ro ewok to, nyõ nwaar Jõ muhrin tuuf oh.” Tibyo Petrus yawia sut-sut.
Rabu momo to, raa ro ja mtu safo kʼraa ro Yahudi to, hre mkyas bo reto fares:
manes wana, raa mabi wana msya
wana ye. Ana saim mawe kbe ana mame Yesus yajat. Ana make Yesus yatem tna makah mamo msan
rabin reto ro ja mtu safo. Ait yasom Pilatus.
Pilatus ytu kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ fi
raa ro Yahudi a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Au oh nyõ nawe meto!”
manes mbra mkyas bo mawat taro mbesus mai kʼYesus.
Tibyo Pilatus ytu kʼYesus u yawe, “Nari a? Raa mkyas bo mawat mbesus mai kʼNyõ. Nyõ nnaut fyi re hawe nkyas bo si kʼana fee?”
Menohe Yesus yawe bo aro si ye fee. Tibyo Pilatus yrok ktak bait sai.
Ti reto raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro
aro rau-rau wore wo ana makyõ korat reto to, ja ana baro mamo mo kʼPilatus mayoh kʼait mawe ait tufrok raa ro ana mawe sait ybam
(Ati reto to raa sait ro yasom Barabas yhau mam
Ait ysya yafoh wait to raa ro marmtuk. Ana weto hawe
rabin ro Roma mbo ana raa ro Yahudi. Tiwya ana mno raa mrok kmo tna mnin-nin. Tna mame raa majat. Feto tna raa mfot ait mbu mam
Raa mawat siret su tna mayoh Pilatus re kbe ait tufrok raa sait ybam
mfi ja yno soo to.
Pilatus yhar yawe
manes weto mhaf kair Yesus. Feto tna ait yawe, “Fyi; anu ksoh jõ tufrok
raa ro Yahudi yamo bait fe mfe a?”
Pilatus yhar yawe
manes weto mhaf kair Yesus. Feto tna ait yawe, “Fyi; anu ksoh jõ tufrok
raa ro Yahudi yamo bait fe mfe a?”
Menohe
manes wefo mkyas bo wai wia kʼraa makin wefo sor mawe, “Nkyas kʼPilatus nwe amu ksoh bo kbe ait tufrok Barabas.” Feto to raa makin mawe si mawe, “Tufrok Barabas, Yesus ma!”
Menohe Pilatus ye ytu kʼraa mawat wefo u yawe, “Feto kbe jõ tno bawya mai kʼAit ro anu ntu nwe
raa ro Yahudi’ retait?”
Ana masen mtu mawe, “Name Ait yajat mam ara warok!”
Menohe Pilatus yawe, “Ait yber safo tna yiwana watum rabin ro Roma to miyo?” Menohe ana mari bo ro Pilatus yawe feto fee. Ana masen mtu mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Name Ait yajat! Name Ait yajat oh!”
Pilatus beroh yari bo ro raa weto mawe sai afo re kbe ana ksoh ait. Tibyo ait tufrok Barabas yamo yo kʼana. Tna Pilatus ybis raa moo too mmok Yesus tna msan Ait kʼraa mame yajat mam ara warok.
Raa ro sbe mbo Yesus mamo ntruk amah ro
Pilatus, makah mamoʼt amah hawar ro ja raa mtu safo. Tna ana mtu raa ro sbe majin beta mama siret wo sau mam weto ye.
Tna ana moo ratan ro mkek mfi ja
yyum sau mse kʼYesus yyum. Tna fo ana mse watau kʼAit yana sbyõ ye. (Watau reto mfi watau ro ja
sbyõ abyõ mam yana, menohe ana mfen watau Yesus rAit mbam abumun. Mno feto mkah bo nsie Ait.)
Ana mno bo weto mkak tna ana sioh mbaut Yesus. Ana sret Ait masah mawe, “Meen oh kʼNyõ
ro Yahudi fi!”
Ana moo ara nkrem mai Yesus yana, tfeh oot kʼAit tna maka bibi Ait mati sai ye.
Ana sret Ait masah, tna ana mrus ratan ro mkek riwai mse kʼAit yyum. Tna me moo ratan wAit mse yyum u. Tna fo ana makah Ait mamo mkah bo mame mam ara warok.
Raa makah Yesus mamo mam iso ro frok
ro Yerusalem. Ana mbam
frok mamo to, tna ana fri raa sait ybam safom yama. Ait raa ro srim, ybam
ro Kirene. Yasom Simon. (Aleksander ysya Rufus maja rana.) Ait yawe yiwrek menohe raa sbe mfot ait, mkuk ait mbis yasom ara warok ro Yesus.
Yesus raa makah mamoʼt faut sau ro masom 'Yuk ro Hamana'. Mkah mai rana to, raa mawe 'Golgota'.
Tna ana moo
maya srioh mkah
mee kʼYesus yata. Menohe Ait hawe bo yata.
Raa sbe mse Yesus mam ara warok. Tna ana moo
tane re kbe mhar awya ro yoo ratan ro Yesus rAit. Tna saim kʼanya.
Yesus raa make mam ara warok rabu ayõ ro krenjiit.
Riwai raa mkom bokom sau mkyas bo ro Yesus yno re mno raa mame Ait. Raa mkom tna mse mam ara warok reto abyõ. Bokom reto mkom mawe: “Raa refi
raa ro Yahudi.”
Ara warok reto ati jaro-jaro raa mame raa ro ja msyõf bo mabo ewok msya Yesus ye. Ait sait raa mse mam ati ro Yesus yatem ati tna sait mam ati ro yatem ta ye. [
Ait raa sikowah feto mnan bokom ro Allah tiwya
Yesaya ykom yawe, “Raa mnaut mawe Ait raa ro yber safo ye.
Raa ro mamo frit iti sor mam weto to, mmat Yesus raa mame mam ara warok. Tna ana mana mnah sai mamus Ait ye mawe, “Ti taa, Nyõ nawe nyõ natak nitrah Samu ro Allah tna sgi u mam ti ro tuuf sai no!
Sik ma nroh nbam ara warok reto tna nno riof kʼNyõ nesait!”
Feto ye
manes ro
Yahudi msya
wana to, ana sret Ait masah mawe kʼanya mawe, “Ait yatak yno riof kʼraa roto sai. Menohe Ait ytai yno riof kʼAit yesait fee!”
Tna mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Soh Nyõ fi
raa ro Israel meto mi, sik ma nroh nbam ara warok reto. Nroh nbam ara warok afo re amu nmat. Tna kbe amu smot Nyõ!” Raa ro ja msyõf bo mabo ewok ro raa mame su msya Ait to, ana mamus Ait ye.
Baas ayõ ro 12 to, arin mrok mamur betru rabin reto beta, mamo snok ayõ ro tuuf.
Ayõ ro tuuf bo feto, Yesus ytu mkah mai ro fari yawe,
Mazmur 22:2
(Mai reto mawe, “Allah aJõ, Allah aJõ; fyi re Nyõ sikba Jõ toni fefo fo?”)
Ana makin ro mros weto to, baro mawe kʼanya mawe, “Sik nri, Ait ytu Elia!”
Tna ana sait yamo fooh yoo bo mabat ro aya msuf sau, beru mam
maya ro mano. Ait yoo tmi mam ara maku makit tna yyum maut yse kʼYesus yata. Tna ait yawe, “Anu bhau bmat kbe Elia yama smyoh Ait yroh ybam ara warok abyõ fe mfe a.”
Yesus ysiah ymai fari, tna fo yrok yajat.
(Yesus yhai si fo
ro raa hero mam Samu ro Allah mburut wa yuk ro mbau to, Allah yhah susai ftah ewok maban uu mamo snok mam te.)
Raa sbe yase ro yros kene mam ara warok weto ymat Yesus bo yhai tna yrok yawe, “Mabo oh, Ait refi fi Allah yare!”
Fnya baro mros fari mmat bo weto ye. Maria Magdalena, msya Maria ro Yoses ysya yao Yakobus ana mme (Yakobus retait, ait ro yaku), tna msya Salome mros su msya fnya weto sor ye.
Fnya weto beta tiwya kro Yesus mam
ro Galilea. Tna fnya roto taro mamoʼt Yerusalem msya Yesus ye.
Hreha ayõ ro jiit bo feto tna Yusuf yamo yo kʼPilatus. Yusuf tait raa ro Arimatea. Ait yamo raa manes ro ytu safo raa ro Yahudi sait. Ait raa ro waa Allah. Tna ait ja ste oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Yusuf yamo yo kʼPilatus mam ayõ ro

(Feto to raa ro Yahudi siwyan bo wana ti sau wia mkah kbe ayõ ro raa tmoh to.) Kene wo ayõ mbtek to, Yusuf yamo fooh yo kʼPilatus. Ait waa fee. Yayoh yawe Pilatus ybis ait yesait yoo ajat ro Yesus tna sama.
Hreha ayõ ro jiit bo feto tna Yusuf yamo yo kʼPilatus. Yusuf tait raa ro Arimatea. Ait yamo raa manes ro ytu safo raa ro Yahudi sait. Ait raa ro waa Allah. Tna ait ja ste oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Yusuf yamo yo kʼPilatus mam ayõ ro

(Feto to raa ro Yahudi siwyan bo wana ti sau wia mkah kbe ayõ ro raa tmoh to.) Kene wo ayõ mbtek to, Yusuf yamo fooh yo kʼPilatus. Ait waa fee. Yayoh yawe Pilatus ybis ait yesait yoo ajat ro Yesus tna sama.
Yusuf yawe kʼPilatus yawe, “Yesus yajat oh.” Tibyo Pilatus yrok ktak yawe, “Yesus yhai fooh sai a?” Tna ait ytu raa sbe ro yabi yama tna ytu kʼait yawe, “Fyi, Yesus yajat oh a?”
Raa ro sbe refi yawe, “Ae, yajat oh.” Tibyo Pilatus ybis yawe Yusuf yoo ajat ro Yesus tna sama.

Yusuf yasen yamo yoo hawee ro fyan-fyan sne moof sau. Tna yamo smyoh ajat ro Yesus mbam ara warok. Ait yoo hawee reto sro ajat rAit wa yakah yamo yse mam isra rait. Isra reto tiwya raa mabah mam atu mtkah. Ajat ro Yesus raa moo mse mam isra mato tna bririk fraa maboh sau mburut isra mato wa.
Maria Magdalena msya Maria ro Yoses yme ana mamo mmat yuk ro raa mse ajat ro Yesus.
ayõ ntwok. Ati reto ayõ ro raa
Yahudi ja ntmoh to, mkak oh. Feto tna Maria Magdalena, Maria ro Yakobus yme msya Salome masen mamo moo
ro sawer msya bombra taro ye. Ana mawe menrabu ana mamoʼt isra ro Yesus raa mse. Tna ayõ ro
rabu momo isi ntara to, ana mrok masen mbo bombra ro sawer wefo sor mamoʼt isra. Ana mawe ngkaru ajat ro Yesus mkah bombra wefo mamyot bo raa ro Ibrani ja mno.
ayõ ntwok. Ati reto ayõ ro raa
Yahudi ja ntmoh to, mkak oh. Feto tna Maria Magdalena, Maria ro Yakobus yme msya Salome masen mamo moo
ro sawer msya bombra taro ye. Ana mawe menrabu ana mamoʼt isra ro Yesus raa mse. Tna ayõ ro
rabu momo isi ntara to, ana mrok masen mbo bombra ro sawer wefo sor mamoʼt isra. Ana mawe ngkaru ajat ro Yesus mkah bombra wefo mamyot bo raa ro Ibrani ja mno.
Mam iso iti ana mtu kʼanya mawe, “Kbe awya serar fraa ro mhau wa isra mato reto re anu twok to?”
Ana mamo baro kait tna mmat he fraa maboh reto raa serar mhau mne oh.
Ana twok mamoʼt isra reto mmat he mere sait ro yyum ratan ro mboh moof toni hre wea mam ati ro tem ati. Ana mmat feto tibyo mrok waa.
Ait retait yawe, “Waa ma. Anu saso Yesus, Raa ro Nasaret, ro taa raa mame yajat. Ait yrok yasen oh! Ait aro yhau mam wefo fee. Nma nmat yuk wore taa Ait raa mse oh mefo.
Hah ne nmo nwe kuber wAit msya Petrus ye nwe, ‘Yesus yrok yasen yatim ste anu wea mam
ro Galilea. Nmoʼt Galilea tna kbe anu nmat Ait mam weto mfi tiwya Ait yawe kʼanu to.’”
Ana mabo tuuf mari bo reto mrok mamboi tna frok msam mamo sikba isra reto. Ana waa tna mhoh hah me to, mkyas bo reto kʼraa fee ye.
Rabu momo ayõ ro
reto Yesus yrok yasen oh. Tna tinyi rau to yerif Ait wia kʼMaria Magdalena. (Tiwya Yesus yikyak kabes mabo krema frok mbam fai au.)
Ati reto kuber ro Yesus wAit ana hre mawia sor fo. Tna Maria Magdalena mama mawe kʼana mawe, “Nwia ma! Jõ tmat Yesus yrok yasen oh!”
Menohe raa weto mtu sioh kʼau sai, mawe bo ro au mawe reto mabo fee.
Tna Yesus yerif Ait ye mkah yetsu roto baro kuber wAit mabo ewok ro mamo iso nkri-kri mbam Yerusalem mamoʼt rabin roto.
Ana mbewok hah me mamo mkyas bo ro riwai reto kuber wAit taro. Menohe ana mtu sioh sai kʼana mbewok ye mawe bo reto mabo fee ye.

Ti baro firwas tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 11 hre mait bo nkri-kri. Tna Yesus frok tubor. Ait bhah ana yawe, “Fyi re bosmot wanu matak fefares to? Raa mmat Jõ tna mama mkyas kʼanu oh, menohe anu nri fee. Anu nna mase sai ntu sioh kʼana to.”
“Nsen nmoʼt arin aso beta tna wosa Bokyas Moof ro Allah
kʼraa beta.
Raa ro smot Jõ to, tna mawe raa
ana to, ana weto meen mkai riof ro mase. Menohe raa ro smot Jõ fee, meen Allah yno safo mana ymit kʼraa weto beta.
Raa ro smot Jõ to, kbe ana mno bo msai sor afo re raa mmat tna mhar Jõ tatak aJõ: Ana weto kbe mikyak kabes frok mkah tak ro Jõ tasom aJõ. Tna ana kbe mkyas mkah mai roto ro ana wase fares ye.
Soh ana mbo aban to, tna aban mafit ana matem to, kbe ana majat fee. Soh raa mse bombau re swa ana to, kbe ana majat fee ye. Soh ana skabuk tna matem mtor raa ro kiyam to, kbe kiyam rait marak ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo kʼana mkak, tna Allah tubat Ait yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit. Tna Ait hre su ysya bi Allah mam ati ro yatem ati; hroh ro mase reto.

Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit masen mamo mkyas Watum ro Allah mam woyõ-woya sai. Tna Allah yatam ana. Tna yoo yatak rAit yee; tibyo ana mno bo ro msai mawat. Feto to raa mhar mawe watum ro ana mkyas to mbam kʼAllah.]
Luke: Teofilus ro yoof,
Raa mawat mkom bombra beta ro Yesus yno mam rabin ranu refo.

Bo ro Yesus yno weto, raa taro mmat mkah masu wana. Amu taro nesait nmat Ait fee, menohe amu nri bokyas rana ro tinyi weto. Tna amu nkyas bokyas reto renti. Tna raa mkom bo ro ana mari mbam kʼanu weto.
Jõ ttu sas bo weto beta maban tinyi rau. Feto to tawe tesait tkom bo ro Yesus yno weto. Tkom kaket
afo re nyõ nhaf smot bo ro nyõ nari weto to, nhar nawe bo mabo.
Tiwya tinyi bi sait yasom Zakharia yamo
ro Yahudi. Hohos rait tiwya mamo
ye. Ana mbam
mkbair ro masom Abia. Ait yfain to, masom Elisabet. Tna hohos wau to, tiwya mamo
ye. (Ati ro ana mbewok mhau to, Herodes
yamo
mam
ro Yudea.)
Allah ymat ana mbewok yawe ana mbewok to, raa ro mhaf moof. Mbewok mari tna mbo mno bo beta ro Allah ybis kʼraa wAit to beta. Bo ro raa mkyas mai kʼana aro fee.
Elisabet siban tibyo ana mbewok mabe ku aro fee. Tna bewok mabi ye oh.
sau fo, mabu rau snok oh, tna Zakharia ysya
ro mbair wait to, mkah bo ro Allah rAit. Tibyo yamoʼt Samu ro Allah mam Yerusalem.
Bo sau ro ana mno to, ana moo bo msan kʼAllah. Reto oh mi ana mko bo ro mfi aku. Mko bo reto tna wasi rau to, sawer moof. Ja
sait aran sai twok mam yuk ro mbau reto mato tna yko bo reto. Ati reto to,
weto hre tane bo, mfi bo ja ana mno soo. Feto ana msok
awya ro kbe twok mam yuk ro mbau reto mato. Ana hre tane he maut Zakharia.
Ayõ ro
yko bo ro sawer reto mama to, raa makin mama mam Samu ro Allah tna skabuk. Raa beta siret skabuk mam yuk ro mbau reto mam mne wea.
Tna bi Zakharia yko bo sawer reto kri-kri mam amah mato. Tibyo
ro
sau frok tubor. Mama mros tubor mros mam ati ro tem ati wohat ro mko bo sawer reto.
Ait ymat
reto to, yhaf miyõ tna waa.
He
reto mawe, “Waa ma! Tama tawe kʼnyõ tawe: Allah yari boyoh wonyõ oh. Tna nfain, Elisabet to, kbe mabe ku ro sme sait. Tna ku retait kbe nyõ nafan yasom Yohanes.
Kbe nyõ nawyan marak ku retait tna simaut toni. Nfain mabe ku tait, tibyo raa makin-akan yok-yok ye.
Kbe Allah ymat ait yawe ait raa ro yase. Tna kbe ait yata jyõ
fee. Yata jyõ roto aro fee ye. Tna kbe Har ro
matam ait, mhau mam yhaf rait maban mam ti ro yme mabe ait.
Tna bokyas rait kbe mno raa mhaf moof re kbe raa ro Israel msis haberek tna kro
fi Allah ro kbe ana smot.
Kbe Har ro
mjin mam Yohanes yhaf rait tna Har moo matak rAu mee kʼait. Mno mnan fi tiwya Har ro
reto mjin mam
Elia
yhaf rait ye, tna moo matak rAu mee
retait ye to. Meen
yama. Tna Yohanes kbe siwyan raa mhaf wana wia afo re kbe ana mari watum ro
Bokyas rait mno re raa sme haberek me miranya msya kukek wana u. Tna raa ro srau mkair to, yno re ana ksoh mamo raa ro moof.”
Tna Zakharia fi yawe
refo yawe, “Fyi re jõ thar tawe bo reto meen mabo tu oh? Jõ fi tabi oh tna tfain to mabi ye oh.”
Tna
reto mawe kʼait mawe, “Jõ tasom Gabriel. Jõ thau tmat Allah. Tna bi Ait yesait ybis jõ tama tkyas bokyas ro moof refo kʼnyõ.
Menohe nyõ ntu sioh bo ro jõ tkyas reto. Feto tibyo kbe nmai marak tna nkyas bo fee mamo snok mam ati ro bo wefo mabo. Bo ro riwai tkyas to, meen snok mam makyon rau to.”
reto mkyas bo msya Zakharia fares, tna raa ro mros mam mne to, sne ait kait. Ana miskawowo mawe fyi re ait yhau kait mam yuk ro mbau reto mato.
Tna ait frok yama to, ymai marak. Ytai ykyas bo kʼraa ro mros mwof ait wea mne to, fee. Ait yerif bo mkah yatem sai. Tibyo ana mhar mawe riwai ait ymat bo ro
yno aro.
Tna Zakharia yhau mam Yerusalem mamo snok ayõ rait ro yno bo ro riwai yno mam Samu ro Allah reto mkak. Tna fo ait yhah ye yamo bait.
Tna fo Zakharia yfain Elisabet fo, mrok mhaf. Tna au mhau mam amah rau mato snyi marak trion maat.
Tna au mnaut mawe,
yatmof jõ: Tiwya jõ siban. Tna saban ye. Menohe Ait yno tibyo jõ trok thaf. Raa ro mkyas kair jõ to, kbe aro me mkyas-kas jõ u fee.”
Elisabet mhaf snyi trion ntamam oh. Tna Allah ybis
ro masom Gabriel reto mamoʼt remo sau ro masom Nazaret, mam
ro Galilea.
Ybis yawe mamo mo ku ro ano sau masom Maria. Au fo wase bo mjin msya raa sme fares. Tna raa sait yasom Yusuf yawe kbe yoo au. Ait retait kube ro
Daud.
refo twok mam samu ro Maria tna mawe, “Meen oh kʼnyõ.
yno bo moof toni kʼnyõ. Bi Ait yatam nyõ.”
Maria mari bokyas reto mrok mnaut bo reto myum-yam. Tna mnaut berun bau sai mawe, “Bo bawya oh mi
reu mama tna mmah meen kʼjõ u?”
Tna
refo mawe kʼMaria mawe, “Waa ma. Allah yno bo ro moof kʼnyõ.
Yawe nyõ kbe nhaf tna nabe Ku sme sait. Kbe nafan Ku Ait yasom Yesus.
Ku anyõ retait kbe yamo Raa ro yase. Meen raa mkyas Ait mawe Ait tait Ku ro Allah yare. Allah tait yase toni.
Allah kbe yno re meen Yesus yase ybo raa wAit yfi
Kbe yase ybo raa wAit yfi hohos rAit
Daud tii hre mam ambar
tna ybo raa wait mnan feto ye.
Yesus kbe yamo
ybo raa mana ro Yakub
. Yamo
ybo raa wAit mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Maria mawe
refo mawe, “Bo refo kbe mabo fyi? Jõ fo tsya raa fefares.”
refo mawe, “Har ro
msya tak rAu kbe mama mo kʼnyõ. Tna Allah yatak rAit kbe matam nyõ ye. Tibyo kbe nyõ nabe Ku sait. Ku retait Allah yse hayah mkah bo yno bo rAit. Tna kbe raa mawe Ait tait Ku ro Allah yare.
Tna raa mana wonyõ sau to, nyõ ntmo anyõ Elisabet au mabi oh tna au mhaf ye. Tiwya raa mawe au fo siban. Menohe au mfo mhaf snyi trion ntamam oh.
Allah ytai yno bo bawya sai. Bo ro samyoh aro mhau kʼAit fee.”
Tna Maria mawe, “Jõ fi sryan ro
oh. Bo ro Ait yawe yno kʼjõ reto to, yno rof oh fea!” Tna
reto mamo sikba au mamo.
Tna fo Maria masen mamo fooh mo kʼntmo rau, Elisabet, mam remo rau. (Elisabet mhau mam atu far-far mam
ro Yudea.) Maria ntwok mam remo reto tna mamoʼt samu ro Zakharia ysya yfain Elisabet. Tna au mmah meen kʼElisabet.
Tna fo Maria masen mamo fooh mo kʼntmo rau, Elisabet, mam remo rau. (Elisabet mhau mam atu far-far mam
ro Yudea.) Maria ntwok mam remo reto tna mamoʼt samu ro Zakharia ysya yfain Elisabet. Tna au mmah meen kʼElisabet.
Ati ro Elisabet mari meen reto si fo, ku ro yhau kʼau mhaf yrok sio. Tna Har ro
msuf au.
Har ro
msuf au tibyo au mkyas fari mawe kʼMaria mawe, “Fnya to mawat, menohe Allah ysok nyõ tna yno bo ro moof kʼnyõ nesait aran miwer. Tna bi Ait yno bo ro moof ku ro yhau kʼnyõ nhaf retait ye!
Jõ fi awya oh mi
yme mama mmat jõ fo?
Jõ tari meen anyõ si fo, ku ro yhau mam thaf refi simaut tna yrok sio mam jõ thaf.
Tii nyõ smot
tna nawe bawya ro Ait ykyas reto to, kbe mabo. Ja nyõ nnaut maut-mroh fee. Tibyo Ait yno bo moof toni kʼnyõ re nyõ simaut toni.”
Tna Maria mawe,
“Jõ tbaut
yase rait ro yno bo moof kʼjõ.
Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo riof mase yee kʼjõ tibyo jõ simaut!
Jõ fi raa kinyah sai. Menohe Ait ymat jõ. Jõ fi sryan rAit. Tna maban mam ati refo fo, kbe raa arin aso beta mawe
yno bo moof kʼjõ.
Allah tait Raa ro yatak. Yno bosair ro moof kʼjõ. Yasom rAit hayah. Raa roto mnan Ait fee.
Tna Allah yatmof raa beta ro waa Ait: Maban raa ro tinyi msya hohos wanu mamo snok ku renti ro meen anu bbe ye.
Bi Ait yatak tna yno bo mawat. Tna Ait sibrir-brar raa ro mnaut mawe ana weto raa ro mase.
Raa ro mase ja mbo raa ro kinyah. Menohe Allah soyak ana mroh mbam yuk rana ro hre. Tna Ait tubat raa kinyah ro ja mhar mawe ana to, raa kinyah sai, maut hre mam uu riryõn.
Ait ysan bo ro moof kʼraa kinyah ro haisre. Menohe raa ro bobot to, Allah yno ana haberek ybis mamo raa sai.
Ait yatmof anu, sryan wAit ro bno bo wAit. Yatmof anu raa ro Israel mnan fi tiwya Ait yawe. Ait sorni anu fee.
Tiwya Ait yawe yno bo moof kʼAbraham ysya ku renti wait mamo snok mam hame wajin. Ana to, hohos ranu oh meto.”
Maria mhau msya Elisabet mam amah rau snyi trion tuuf bo feto, tna mhah me mamoʼt remo rau.
Elisabet mhaf mase oh, ayõ rau ro mabe to kene oh. Tna au mabe ku sme sait.
Raa wana weto beta msya au mafoh na mari he
yatmof au toni. Tibyo ana beta msya au simaut.
Ku retait yhau masno ro krentuuf to, tna ana makah ait mamo mkom
tna mafan yasom. (Mno mnan fi bo mafa raa ro Yahudi ja mno.) Tna raa mama mmat Zakharia ysya Elisabet msya ku mees refi. Raa mawe mafan ku refi yasom Zakharia, kro som ro yaja.
Menohe yme mawe, “Mfe! Ait yasom rait Yohanes.”
Ana mawe, “Fyi? Raa wonyõ aro masom Yohanes fee!”
Tna ana mtu bo reto kʼZakharia. Ana merif bo mkah matem sai tna mtu mawe mafan ku retait yasom awya.
Zakharia yayoh bokom sau tna ykom yawe, “Ait yasom rait Yohanes.” Tibyo raa weto mrok ktak beta.
Ati reto fo Zakharia ymai snok u tna ait bibi Allah.
Tna ana mafoh na mrok waa. Tna raa ro mhau mam atu far-far ro Yudea to, beta mari bo reto.
Tna raa beta ro mari bo reto to, hre mnaut mawe,
yatam ku retait to. Meen ku retait yasen yno bo bawya?”
Tna Har ro
msuf Yohanes yaja, Zakharia. Tibyo Zakharia ykyas bo ro mbam Allah. Ait yawe,
“Nma bbaut
Ait yama ymat raa ro Israel. Ait yama yfes raa wAit.
Ait tait Allah ro anu smot.
Ait ybis Raa sait yama yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu. Ait tait kube ro
Daud. Tiwya
Daud yamo sryan ro
rAit ye.
ro Allah ybis mamo mkyas bo wAit to, tiwya tinyi ana makin mhaf sau mkyas mawe:
Raa taro mamo byoh kʼanu tna taro knait anu ye. Menohe Allah yatak re yno riof kʼanu.
Tiwya Ait ykyas Bosi rAit kʼhohos wanu to. Ait ynaut Bosi reto tibyo Ait yatmof ana.
Bosi ro Moof reto tiwya Ait ykyas kʼhohos ranu Abraham.
Allah yno riof kʼanu re kbe anu bno bo rAit to, waa fee. Raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu to, Ait yno re ana matak mno amu fee.
Anu boo anu bsan kʼAit re bno bo wAit sai. Tna bmo raa ro mhaf moof mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Tna Zakharia watum ku rait Yohanes yawe,
“Nyõ to, kbe natim siwyan iso mkah
ranu ro kbe yama. Allah ro yase hre abyõ ybo bombra beta tait, kbe ybis nyõ namo nkyas bo wAit. Tibyo kbe raa mtu nasom,
ro bi Yase ybis’.
Kbe nyõ nerif bo kʼraa wAit re kbe ana mhar iso ro mamo re mkai riof ro mase.
yyon iro wana.
Allah tait yatmof raa. Tibyo ybis
yama yno riof kʼanu. Ait retait kbe ybam Allah yama. Yama yfi ayõ ro ntara maut mam rabu momo.
Yama tna kek rAit mram raa ro wase Allah tna mhau mam amur hto. Yama yram raa ro waa bo mhai. Ait kbe sana anu bisoh iranya ranu bsya
Tna Yohanes yabi. Tna bosmot rait matak. Ait yamo yhau mam yuk ro riamo sau mam Yudea. Yhau mamo snok mam ayõ rau ro ait snok. Tna fo ait yamo ykyas bo kʼraa ro Israel.
Wore wo tiwya Yohanes yme mabe to,
Agustus yamo
ro yase. Ait yase ybo
na sor mam rabin ro Roma beta. Tna ait ybis yawe raa beta ro mhau mam rabin weto sor to, mamo
masom wana.
masom re kbe ana beta moo pitis mee namabyoh

Yno
reto, ybis raa beta ro mhau mam rabin rait reto hah mamoʼt remo wana ha-hayah tna mkom masom.
Tna bi sait yasom Yusuf yhau mam remo ro Nazaret mam
ro Galilea.
Daud tait hohos rait sait. Yusuf yari bobis reto tibyo yasen sikba Nazaret yawe yaut yamoʼt remo ro Betlehem mam
ro Yudea. (Remo reto tiwya tinyi
Daud yhau. Tibyo raa mkyas mawe remo reto to, “Remo ro Daud Yhau.”)
Tna Yusuf yasen yamo ysya fnya rait ro meen yoo. Yawe mamo
masom wana. Au masom Maria. Au fo mhaf.
Ana mbewok mamo, mamo, snok mam Betlehem. Tna Maria kborham.
Kbor ham tna mabe ku bum ro sme sait. Tna au moo hawe tna sro Ku retait. Yuk ro moof wore ana mjin to marak. Feto to ana mhau mam sbyah ro
Tna Maria moo ku rau mirya Ait yjin mam ambar sau; mam ambar ro ja raa mse bosafom re
mabat.
Mti reto to, raa baro mhau mam smok kene wo Betlehem. Ana hre mwan tok tna kmot
wana.
Tna
ro
sau frok tubor kʼana susai. Tna ana mmat
yase rAit ro skentrat. Tibyo ana mrok waa toni.
Menohe
reto mawe kʼana mawe, “Waa ma. Jõ tama tkyas bokyas ro moof. Tna raa beta ro mari bokyas refo kbe simaut mase:
Tawe, ‘Riwai fo, fnya mabe Ku sait mam Betlehem, remo ro
Daud. Meen Ait sotak iro wanu tna yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu to. Ait tait
tna yamo
Feto to, kbe raa simaut mase.’
Kbe anu nhar ku mees retait fefo: Saso ku sait ro yjin mam ambar sau; yuk ro ja raa mse bosafom re
mabat. Yme sro Ait mkah hawe tna mirya ait yjin mam beto.”
Tna
mawat taro naut mbam sawro ro Allah mama frok tubor ye. Ana bibi Allah mawe,
“Amu nbaut Allah ro yase toni; Allah ro yhau mam sawro rAit! Tna raa ro tabam refo to, ana ro Ait yhaf mnan to, kbe bi Ait yisoh iranya ro raa weto to, msya anya.”
weto sikba ana hah mamoʼt sawro ro Allah. Tna raa weto masen mawe kʼanya mawe, “Nma bmoʼt Betlehem re bmat bo mase ro
ybis
mama mawe kʼanu reu!”
Ana masen fooh mamoʼt remo reto mawe saso ku mees retait. Tna fri Maria, Yusuf msya Ku mees retait ro yjin mam ambar sau; yuk ro ja raa mse bosafom re
mabat.
Mama mmat Ku retait. Tna ana masen mamo mkyas bo weto kʼraa: Mkyas bo ro riwai
reto mkyas Ku mees retait.
Tna raa beta ro mari bo ro raa wefo mkyas to, mrok ktak.
Menohe Maria mari bokyas wana weto tna kbo srau tna mnaut berun sai mam mhaf mato.
Tna raa ro ja kmot
weto hah me mamoʼt smok riwai to. Mamo tna mbaut Allah: Bo ro riwai ana mmat reto to, mabo mnan bo ro
mawe kʼana. Tibyo ana bibi Allah.
Yasno ro krentuuf tna Ku retait raa mkom
. Tna ana mafan ait yasom Yesus, mamyot som ro tiwya,
mawe kʼMaria oh to, ati ro au mhaf fefares.

ro teta mana ewok to, msan
Ti weto bi sait yasom Simeon yhau mam Yerusalem. Ait tait raa ro yhaf moof. Ait ja mur-mur skabuk Allah. Tna yhau ste

Har ro

Riwai ayõ reto Har ro
mbis ait yamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Ait yamo tna ati reto Yesus yme msya Yusuf makah Ku Ait mamoʼt Samu ro Allah ye. Ana mamo ntwok mam mato mawe mno mamyot Watum ro Musa mbis.
Tna Simeon yoo Ku retait taam. Tna ybaut Allah yawe,

mfo refo Nyõ nno mnan si bosi aNyõ oh. Jõ tasu tmat Ku refi. Ait ybam kʼNyõ yama yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa. Jõ tmat Ait tibyo mfo refo jõ siwyan tamo oh. Jõ fi sryan aNyõ. Nbis jõ thai tna trof raa wojõ ro tiwya mhai wia matim sor to.

mfo refo Nyõ nno mnan si bosi aNyõ oh. Jõ tasu tmat Ku refi. Ait ybam kʼNyõ yama yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa. Jõ tmat Ait tibyo mfo refo jõ siwyan tamo oh. Jõ fi sryan aNyõ. Nbis jõ thai tna trof raa wojõ ro tiwya mhai wia matim sor to.
Nyõ nbis Ku refi yama re kbe raa beta mmat Ait tna mhar mawe Ait yama sotak iro wana.
Ait tait raa mana ro Israel sait. Kbe Ait yno anu bmo raa mana ro masom. Kbe raa mawe anu raa ro Israel to, raa mana ro Nyõ nsok. Tna Ait ynan kek ro mram iso mkah raa mana roto beta ye.”
Yesus yaja ysya yme miskawowo mari bokyas ro Simeon ykyas Ku mees rana retait.
Tna Simeon skabuk

yawe bi Ait yno bo ro moof kʼana mbewok. Tna yawe kʼMaria yawe, “Ku anyõ refi Allah ysok. Kbe raa mari bokyas rAit tna mmat bo ro Ait yno. Feto tna ana mhar mawe Ait oh mi Allah ysok. Bo ro yawe tna yno weto to, mno re raa ro Israel mawat mikyak Ait ye. Tibyo ana weto mbtek. Menohe raa mawat taro kbe mari bokyas rAit. Tibyo ana weto mros matak.
Raa mmat Ait tna kbe bonaut wana to, mrok msasi. Tna meen nyõ srau mham toni mnan fi bo raa moo tfo takoh nyõ.”
Mam beto to, fai mabi sau masom Hana mros ye. Tiwya au msya raa
trion ngkrema, menohe maa yhai tibyo au mhau semit sai. Fai au to, bi Fanuel yare ye, mbam raa mana ro Asyer. Au to, mamo
ro ja Allah ybis mkyas bo wAit ye.
Tna mefo refo au 84
Au mamo skabuk mam Samu ro Allah yoyo; rabu reha to, mhau skabuk tna mhau bo ro mait ye
Bi Simeon ykyas bo mkak si fo, fai Hana mama tna mbaut Allah. Au masen faram Ku retait yasom kʼraa beta ro ste
kʼraa ro minaut mawe
kbe yama. Au mawe Ku retait oh mi Raa ro yama yfes raa ro Yahudi.
Yusuf ysya Maria mno bo mamyot Watum ro Musa mkak. Tna ana hah me mamoʼt remo rana, Nazaret mam
ro Galilea.
Mhau tna Ku retait yabi renti tna yrok yatak renti. Ait yhar bo tna Allah yoo bouum yee kʼAit ye.
Ja
sau-sau firwas to, raa mabi ro Yesus mamoʼt Yerusalem makyõ korat ro
Yesus tait 12
oh, tna Ait ysya ana masen mamoʼt Yerusalem mfi bo ja ana mno soo oh.
Ana makyõ korat ro
reto mkak. Tna ana masen mawe hah me mamoʼt remo rana ro Nazaret. Yusuf ysya Maria mamo, mamo menohe Yesus yhau akus fares mam Yerusalem. Tna ana wase ye.
Ana mnaut mawe ait kro raa wana makin ro mamo su msya ana. Tibyo ana mbewok mamo ti sau tna ana saso mtu Yesus kʼmao, mano wana msya mafoh wana ro msya ana mamo su.
He ana mkai Ait fee. Tibyo ana masen mhah mamoʼt Yerusalem u mawe saso Ait.
Ti trion tuuf ana saso, saso Ait. Tna mamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Ana twok mam Samu ro Allah tna fri Ait mam mato. Ait hre yari
mkyas bo tna ytu bo kʼana ye.
Yesus tait srau bo ro ana mkyas weto. Tna raa beta mari bo ro Ait ykyas to, mrok miskawowo.
Tna raa mabi wAit ntwok tna mmat Ait hre susai ykyas bo ysya raa ro mase weto. Ana mnaut mawe, “Bawya meto?” Yme mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ nno bawya meto? Amu mbewok saso nyõ nhai rowyõ nhai mefo!”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Anu nma saso Jõ a? Jõ tama thau mam samu ro Taja fo fea! Anu mbewok srau fea?”
He ana mfot bo ro Ait ykyas reto fefares.
Tna fo Ait yasen ysya ana mamoʼt Nazaret. Yesus tait ja yari bo ro ana mawe. Bo ro Ait yno weto to, Maria mnaut mam mhaf mato bau sai.
Yesus yabi tna yetsu matak renti, tna yhar bo ro ati ybo yno renti ye. Allah hasu Ait tna raa hasu ye.

Yahudi.
Mam wore weto Zakharia yare, Yohanes, yhau mam yuk ro riamo. Tna Allah ykyas bo kʼait.
Tibyo ait yasen yamo ykyas bokyas ro mbam Allah reto. Ait yawe, “Nashana fooh! Tna jõ
anu. Jõ
anu re kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe anu nashana oh tna nmo no kʼAllah. Tibyo bi Ait yyon iro wanu.” Yohanes yamo tyo-teya mam rabin aya Yordan yur beta ykyas bo reto.
Yohanes yamo ykyas bo feto to, yno mnan si bokyas ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya yama ykom mam aam rait. Aam reto mawe:
“Meen raa sait kbe yama ykyas bo woJõ mam yuk ro riamo sau. Ykyas yawe, ‘Mbetrot iso mkah
yama! Nisoh iso kʼAit!
Naru mbetnen atu msya faut. Tna noo tabam nruk wo mbair beta matot! Tna iso ro mwak to nisoh mbetrot! Tna iso ro maut-mroh to, nisoh maru sneh!
Kbe raa ro arin aso beta mmat tna mhar mawe Allah yatak yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa.’”
Yesaya 40:3-5
Raa mawat mama mo kʼYohanes afo re ait
ana. Menohe ait ykyas kʼana yawe, “Anu to, raa ro nmo wan-wan nfi aban kume!
Awya ykyas bo kʼanu yawe Allah kmo tna meen yno bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼanu? Awya ykyas feto tna re anu nhar nwe nsam nma saso riof kʼanu?

Nashana! Nno bo moof. Tna kbe raa mhar mawe anu nashana oh. Soh anu nno feto to, anu nfi kake mara ro mros make mawat tna moof. Allah yatem ybo baam oh. Ait siwyan yfat ara. Kake mara ro make rau moof fee, kbe Ait yfat tna yoo beak mam tafoh yko makus mait. Anu ja nnaut nwe, ‘Anu fo kube ro Abraham wait renti. Feto to kbe Allah yno riof kʼanu fea!’ Mfe, nnaut feto ma! Allah yatak haberek fraa wefo mamo kube renti ro Abraham wait ye!”

Nashana! Nno bo moof. Tna kbe raa mhar mawe anu nashana oh. Soh anu nno feto to, anu nfi kake mara ro mros make mawat tna moof. Allah yatem ybo baam oh. Ait siwyan yfat ara. Kake mara ro make rau moof fee, kbe Ait yfat tna yoo beak mam tafoh yko makus mait. Anu ja nnaut nwe, ‘Anu fo kube ro Abraham wait renti. Feto to kbe Allah yno riof kʼanu fea!’ Mfe, nnaut feto ma! Allah yatak haberek fraa wefo mamo kube renti ro Abraham wait ye!”
Tna ana mawe, “Soh feto to, nawe kbe amu nno fyi?”
Tna Yohanes yawe, “Rau ro moof to, nno fefo: Awya ro yse ratan ewok to, ait yoo sau yee kʼana ro mse aro fee. Tna raa ro mse boit wana mawat to, ana moo boit aro saim kʼana ro boit marak.”

Roma taro mama mo kʼYohanes ye. Ana weto to, raa ro moo pitis ro namabyoh
mbam kʼraa. Ana mawe Yohanes
ana ye. Tna mtu kʼait mawe,
amu kbe nno bo bawya?”

mawe sai to. Norot ma.”

Roma taro mama ye. ⌞Ja ana mno bo ro mkair mai kʼraa afo re raa moo pitis mee kʼana.⌟ Ana mtu kʼYohanes mawe,
fyi, amu kbe nno bo bawya?” Tna ait yawe, “Ntak bo raa ma. Sioh nuun boun kʼraa to ma. Tna ati ro
maren boren wanu to, nmai tis ma. Nbo pitis wanu sai nhaf mnan.”

Tna Ait

rait to, ja yoo

Yohanes ykyas watum roto aro kʼraa ye. Ait ykyas Bokyas ro Moof kʼana feto.
Tna Yohanes ykyas
Herodes ro ybo rabin reto to ye.
Herodes ytak fnya ro yao Filipus rait. Au masom Herodias. Yohanes yari feto, tibyo yastako Herodes yawe yber safo meto. Tna safo beta ro Herodes yber oh to, Yohanes ykyas tna yastako Herodes ye.
Tibyo Herodes kmo Yohanes. Tna yfot ait betruk mam
mato. (Yno bo reto to, safo sau naut ye oh meto.)
Wore wo Herodes yfot Yohanes ybu mam
fefares to, Yohanes
raa mawat. Tna ait
Yesus ye. Ati ro ait
Yesus to, Yesus skabuk kri-kri fo, tna ayoh twat.

haberek mnan fi ruu
sau. Tna fru mama mroh abyõ kʼAit. Tna raa mari mai sau mbam ayoh mawe, “Nyõ fi akut aJõ ro Jõ thafri. Nyõ fi Jõ thaf mnan!”

bo feto tna yaban yamo ykah bo ro

Wore weto to raa mnaut mawe Yesus tait Yusuf yare. Yusuf tait ku ro Eli.
Eli tait ku ro Matat. Tna Matat tait ku ro Lewi. Tna Lewi tait ku ro Malkhi. Tna Malkhi tait ku ro Yanai. Tna Yanai tait ku ro Yusuf.
Tna Yusuf tait ku ro Matica. Tna Matica tait ku ro Amos. Tna Amos tait ku ro Nahum. Tna Nahum tait ku ro Hesli. Tna Hesli tait ku ro Nagai.
Tna Nagai tait ku ro Maat. Tna Maat tait ku ro Matica. Tna Matica tait ku ro Simei. Tna Simei tait ku ro Yosekh. Tna Yosekh tait ku ro Yoda.
Tna Yoda tait ku ro Yohanan. Tna Yohanan tait ku ro Resa. Tna Resa tait ku ro Zerubabel. Tna Zerubabel tait ku ro Sealtiel. Tna Sealtiel tait ku ro Neri.
Tna Neri tait ku ro Malkhi. Tna Malkhi tait ku ro Adi. Tna Adi tait ku ro Kosam. Tna Kosam tait ku ro Elmadam. Tna Elmadam tait ku ro Er.
Tna Er tait ku ro Yesua. Tna Yesua tait ku ro Eleazer. Tna Eleazer tait ku ro Yorim. Tna Yorim tait ku ro Matat. Tna Matat tait ku ro Lewi.
Tna Lewi tait ku ro Simeon. Tna Simeon tait ku ro Yehuda. Tna Yehuda tait ku ro Yusuf. Tna Yusuf tait ku ro Yonam. Tna Yonam tait ku ro Elyakim.
Tna Elyakim tait ku ro Melea. Tna Melea tait ku ro Mina. Tna Mina tait ku ro Matata. Tna Matata tait ku ro Natan. Tna Natan tait ku ro Daud.
Tna Daud tait ku ro Isai. Tna Isai tait ku ro Obed. Tna Obed tait ku ro Boas. Tna Boas tait ku ro Salmon. Tna Salmon tait ku ro Nahason.
Tna Nahason tait ku ro Aminadab. Tna Aminadab tait ku ro Admin. Tna Admin tait ku ro Arni. Tna Arni tait ku ro Hezron. Tna Hezron tait ku ro Peres. Tna Peres tait ku ro Yehuda.
Tna Yehuda tait ku ro Yakub. Tna Yakub tait ku ro Ishak. Tna Ishak tait ku ro Abraham. Tna Abraham tait ku ro Terah. Tna Terah tait ku ro Nahor.
Tna Nahor tait ku ro Serug. Tna Serug tait ku ro Rehu. Tna Rehu tait ku ro Peleg. Tna Peleg tait ku ro Eber. Tna Eber tait ku ro Salmon.
Tna Salmon tait ku ro Kenan. Tna Kenan tait ku ro Arpakhsad. Tna Arpakhsad tait ku ro Sem. Tna Sem tait ku ro Nuh. Tna Nuh tait ku ro Lamekh.
Tna Lamekh tait ku ro Metusalah. Tna Metusalah tait ku ro Henokh. Tna Henokh tait ku ro Yared. Tna Yared tait ku ro Mahalaleel. Tna Mahalaleel tait ku ro Kenan.
Tna Kenan tait ku ro Enos. Tna Enos tait ku ro Set. Tna Set tait ku ro Adam. Tna Adam tait ku ro Allah yare.
Yesus raa
mam aya ro Yordan to, tna hah ye yamo. Tna Har ro
mroh mama mbo Yesus matak. Tna Har reto makah Ait mamoʼt yuk ro riamo sau.
Yhau mam teto tna kabes yabi (Iblis) yama yawe sanet besruf Ait. Sanet Ait ti trion 40. Tna wore weto to, Yesus yhau bo yait. Tibyo yhai sre.
Kabes yabi yama sanet Ait yawe, “Soh Nyõ Ku ro Allah yare meto mi, sik nno fraa refo haberek mamo
re Nyõ nait.”
Menohe Yesus yisboh kʼait yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Boit mesait sai au oh mi mno re raa mhau to fee!’”
Ulangan 8:3
Tna fo kabes yabi yakah Yesus yaut mam atu mana ro miyõ sau. Tna fooh sai to, ait yerif
ro arin aso beta fo kʼAit.
Tna kabes yabi yawe kʼAit yawe, “Jõ tase tbo
wefo beta. Tna kta wana beta to, bo wojõ ye. Tna jõ tsan bo wefo beta kʼawya sai ro jõ ksoh tait. Nyõ nawe kbe too bo wefo beta tsan kʼNyõ fe mfe a?
Soh Nyõ naka mte nbaut jõ to, kbe too bo wefo beta tsan kʼNyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yisboh kabes yabi refi yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe yum mawe:
‘Nbaut
Allah yesait aran, tna bo ro Ait yesait aran yawe to, nbo nno.’”
Ulangan 6:13

Tna fo kabes yabi yakah Yesus yamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna yoo Yesus yse yros abyõ mam timanaf Samu Allah ro miyõ toni. Tna yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Soh Nyõ fi Ku ro Allah yare meto mi, sik nitsre Nyõ mbtek namo nai mam tabam mte.
Bokom ro Allah mawe:
‘Kbe Allah ybis
wAit kmot Nyõ. Ana swiõ wea huwya mfot Nyõ abyõ sai.
Ana kbe mfot Nyõ abyõ sai mkah matem wana re naa mai mam fraa fee.’”

Feto ye Jõ hawe kro bo ro nyõ nawe weto be kbe Jõ sanet Allah.”

Yesaya ykom to, mee kʼAit ymat. Ait betrat aam reto tna saso far-far sau. Ykai, tna

ysok Jõ ybis yawe tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof kʼraa ro masu awe. Feto to yoo Har rAit yse kʼJõ.
Tna ybis yawe Jõ tisoh raa ro masu mti to, tno re masu wana to maah ye. Tna raa ro mberasi raa taro sor to, Jõ tno re kbe ana bitsre raa ro ana sikowah weto. Tna tama tkyas tawe,
Ait siwyan oh yawe yno riof kʼraa.’”
Yesaya 61:1-2
Yesus
mkak tna bemut aam reto ye, yee yisia kʼraa retait. Tna Ait hre. Hre tna raa beta masu wana mberoh haberek mmat Ait ye.
Tna Yesus betoo yawe, “Mam ayõ refo fo, bokom far-far wefo mabo rau oh.”
Bokyas rAit moof ati. Tna raa beta mrok ktak mawe, “Ait retait Ku ro Yusuf, fe mfe a?”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Kbe anu nkyas bofret refo mai kʼJõ fea! Nwe:
nesait nisoh tkif Nyõ ai!’ Anu nri he taa Jõ tno bo ro msai mam Kapernaum. Tibyo anu nkyas bofret reto to, nwe Jõ tno mnan anya mfi feto mam remo aJõ feto ye.
Menohe tkyas kʼanu tawe, ‘Nnaut:
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit to, soh yamoʼt remo rait yesait to, ja raa wait hawe mari ait.’
Nnaut ayõ ro tiwya
Elia yhau. Wore weto to,
trion tuuf hariyah tna hwyõm mase: Oom aro mais fee mam rabin ro Israel. Tibyo raa beta mhai sre. Semit mawat mhai sre ye.
Menohe Allah ybis
Elia yamo yo kʼsemit ro mhau mam Israel aro fee. Ait yamoʼt rabin roto yhau ysya semit sau aran mam rabin ro Sidon. Au fo mhau mam remo ro Sarfat.
Tna ti wore weto to, raa mawat mafa
mam rabin ro Israel. Menohe ait yisoh raa aro ro mhau mam rabin ro Israel fee. Ait yamoʼt tabam ro Siria tna yisoh raa sait ro yasom Naaman. Yisoh ait yesait aran.”
Raa beta ro siret mam samu watum reto mari bokyas rAit reto tna mrok kmo toni.
Ana beta masen mikyak Yesus frok ybam remo rana. Ana mbo Ait mamoʼt howai rakak ro miyõ sau kene mam wore remo rana. Ana mawe mamo beak Yesus mam howai rakak reto.
Menohe Yesus yamo fot wai mam raa mawat weto yamo bait.
Tna Yesus yroh yamo sia mam
ro Galilea, yamoʼt remo ro Kapernaum. Ayõ ro raa
Yahudi ja ntmoh
to, Ait yamoʼt samu watum rana tna ykyas bo kʼana.
Allah yno re bokyas rAit to matak toni. Tibyo raa ro mari bokyas rAit reto mrok ktak.
Tna raa ro kabes mbo sait hre mam samu watum reto ye. Tna raa retait ytu fari-fara yawe,
“Yesus ro nbam Nazaret; Nyõ nama nno fyi kʼamu mefo? Nama sikowah amu ma! Jõ thar Nyõ: Nyõ fi Ait ro Allah Ybis Yama!”

Yesus yastako kabes reto yawe, “Shait! Nfrok nbam kʼait!” Tna raa beta hre mmat he kabes refo safo toni tna mabyõ raa retait beak mte. Tna kabes reto frok mbam raa retait. Tna raa retait ykai yaaf aro fee.
Raa beta mrok miskawowo tna mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Bokyas rAit to, msai toni. Ait yatak re ybis kabes frok. Kabes sor mari mai rAit tibyo frok sai!”
Tna raa faram Yesus yasom mam rabin reto beta.
Yesus sikba samu watum reto tna yamoʼt amah ro Simon. Ati reto to, Simon snyim ro ano au kiyam. Au to, metsu mbe toni. Tna raa soh-soh kʼYesus mawe, “Nama nmat fai au refo!”
Yesus yamo ymat he fai au refo mjin. Ait skabuk yikyak kiyam reto. Tibyo kiyam rau marak. Tna fai au masen saruk boit mee kʼana mait.
Ati ro ayõ hawer to, raa mawat mama mo kʼYesus. Mama mbo raa wana ro mafa kiyam aro rau-rau. Tna Ait yatem yse kʼana aro sait-sait. Tibyo ana mrok moof.
Tna kabes frok mbam raa mawat ye. Kabes weto mhar mawe Ait tait
Kabes weto frok to, mtu mawe, “Nyõ fi Ku ro Allah yare!” He Yesus yastako kabes weto yawe, “Shait!”
Nyah msan tna Yesus yasen sikba remo reto. Yamoʼt yuk ro riamo sau. Raa masen saso Ait tna mamo fri Ait u. Ana soh-soh kʼAit mawe “Sikba amu ma!”
Menohe Ait yawe, “Tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof reto mam remo roto taro ye. Tkyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Tkyas raa mana reto kʼraa oh mi Allah ybis Jõ tama to.”
Tna Yesus yasen sikba ana weto yamo renti mam
ro Yudea. Yamo ykyas bo mam samu watum makin ro Yahudi.
Ti sau to, Yesus yros ykyas bo mam maru ro Genesaret. Tna raa mawat myar mama mawe mari bokyas rAit ro ykyas mbam kʼAllah.
Tna Ait ymat wiak trion ewok raa miti mam weto. (Raa ro wiak wana weto hre myon
wana.)
Wiak sau to Simon rait. Tna Yesus yamo yaut hre mam wiak reto, tna ybis Simon yyum wiak reto kebet baro sai. Tna Yesus hre ykyas bo kʼraa.
Yesus ykyas bo mkak tna yawe kʼSimon yawe, “Miin baro namoʼt wore wo uun wono. Tna mbeak
re nfot syoh aro.”
Simon yawe,
riwai ti ro miyõ refo amu nsafo beak
saso syoh he nfot aro fee! Menohe Nyõ nbis feto to, jõ te beak
refo u oh.”
Ana beak
refo tna fo mkuk
reto maut tna mmat menohe syoh mawat toni. Tna
reto maja taro hri.
Tna ana mtu mafoh wana taro mama. Ana mama tna msya ana mkuk
refo mkah syoh mawat toni, mbeak mam wiak wana weto mato. Tibyo wiak ewok reto matot toni maami wiak hoh.
Simon yafoh na weto, sait yasom Yakobus tna sait yasom Yohanes. Ana mbewok to Zebedeus yare. Ana msya Simon-Petrus mmat syoh mawat tibyo mrok ktak. Tna Simon yamo yo kʼYesus yjit yimna. Tna yawe,
sikba jõ namo rof: Jõ fi raa kair!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼSimon yawe, “Waa ma! Maban wore wefo nyõ nfot syoh u fee. Kbe nyõ nfot raa.”
Simon yafoh na weto, sait yasom Yakobus tna sait yasom Yohanes. Ana mbewok to Zebedeus yare. Ana msya Simon-Petrus mmat syoh mawat tibyo mrok ktak. Tna Simon yamo yo kʼYesus yjit yimna. Tna yawe,
sikba jõ namo rof: Jõ fi raa kair!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼSimon yawe, “Waa ma! Maban wore wefo nyõ nfot syoh u fee. Kbe nyõ nfot raa.”
Simon yafoh na weto, sait yasom Yakobus tna sait yasom Yohanes. Ana mbewok to Zebedeus yare. Ana msya Simon-Petrus mmat syoh mawat tibyo mrok ktak. Tna Simon yamo yo kʼYesus yjit yimna. Tna yawe,
sikba jõ namo rof: Jõ fi raa kair!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼSimon yawe, “Waa ma! Maban wore wefo nyõ nfot syoh u fee. Kbe nyõ nfot raa.”
Ana mabo tuuf weto mkuk wiak wana mamoʼt mne. Tna sikba bo wana beta makus masen kro Yesus.
Ti sau Yesus yhau mam remo sau tna ymat raa ro yafa
ro mkair-kar toni sait. Raa retait ymat Yesus tna yjit yimna soh-soh kʼAit yawe, “Bobot, soh Nyõ ksoh meto mi, nisoh jõ re
refo marak.”
Tna Yesus yatem ybo ait tna yawe, “Jõ ksoh, tawe nyõ mbros oh!” Ayõ reto si fo,
reto mrok marak.
Tna Yesus yawe wa kʼait yawe, “Namo to, nkyas bo refo kʼraa ma. Namo nerif narak anyõ
ro
Yahudi sait re ait ymat sas nyõ. Nyõ noof u tibyo noo bo nee. Nee
re ysan kʼAllah mamyot Watum ro Musa ykom yawe. Nno bo weto re kbe raa mhar mawe netsu anyõ to moof u.”
Menohe Yesus yasom to, raa mkyas renti mam woyõ-woya sai. Tibyo raa myar mama mari bokyas rAit tna soh-soh kʼAit re yisoh ana re kiyam wana marak ye.
Tna mun aro to, Yesus yamo skabuk mam yuk ro mimon.
Ti sau Yesus ykyas bo kʼraa mam samu sau. Tna raa manes ro
Yahudi baro hre mari ye: Raa ro
msya
ye. Ana mama mbam
msya remo aro rau-rau mam
ro Galilea, tna mbam
Yerusalem msya remo roto taro sor mam
ro Yudea.
yatak rAit yatam Yesus. Feto to Ait yisoh raa ro mafa kiyam.
Tna raa baro mama nkatar ait ro yaa mhai sait mam sese. Tna yafoh wait weto mawe makah raa retait twok mam samu reto mse re Yesus ymat.

He raa mawat burut wa Yesus. Feto to ana makah ait maut abyõ ti manaf. Tna ana mitrah ti manaf reto baro mno hroh tna mruk ait mkah sese rait ye. Mruk mam samu mato mam wore wo Yesus yros ysya raa mawat weto susai.
Yesus ymat ana tna yhar yawe ana smot Ait matak. Tibyo Yesus yawe kʼraa retait yawe, “Tao, iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.”
Raa ro
msya
weto mari bo ro Yesus yawe feto tibyo kmo. Tna mnaut mawe, “Bi Ait refi yrok yawe Ait awya, re yawe yyon iro ro raa! Bo ro Ait yawe to berasi Allah! Awya ytai yyon iro? Allah yesait aran sai!”
Menohe Yesus yhar bo ro ana mnaut weto oh. Tna ytu kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu nnaut bo weto mam nsrau mato wanu to?

Soh Jõ tawe kʼait refi tawe, ‘Iro wonyõ to, Jõ tyon oh.’ Bo ro msai fee: Kbe raa mahni bo reto mabo fe mfe a. Menohe tawe, ‘Nasen namo oh!’ Tawe feto afo re kbe raa mmat bo reto mabo. Mmat tna mhar mawe Jõ ttai tno bo ewok ye to. Ewok ye mnan-nan kʼJõ.

Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna bo ro kbe Jõ tno fo, Jõ tno re kbe anu nhar Jõ tatak tyon iro raa mam tabam refo.” Tna Yesus yawe kʼAit ro yaa mhai retait yawe, “Nasen, tubat sese anyõ, tna nasom namo bonyõ oh!”
Tna raa beta mmat he raa retait yasen yros fooh. Tna ait tubat sese rait yasom yamo. Yamo bait ybaut Allah yamo.
Ana beta miskawowo tna mbaut Allah. Ana mawe kʼanya mawe, “Ayõ refo anu bmat bo msai ro mase toni!”
Yesus frok ybam amah reto yamo. Yamo tna ymat raa ro ja yoo namabyoh
yee
ro Roma sait. Yasom Lewi.
Bi ait hre mam
ro namabyoh rait. Tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nama kro Jõ bmo!”
Lewi yari feto, tibyo ait yasen sikba bo beta, yamo kro Yesus mamo.
Ti sau fo, Lewi yakyõ bokyõ sau re yafoh wait mama fri anya msya Yesus. Tna raa msis mama hre mait boit su. Lewi yafoh weto taro mamo raa ro moo namabyoh ye.
Raa
ro mamo
msya raa
roto mmat he Yesus ysya raa wAit makyõ bokyõ su msya raa weto. Tna ana santri bo mawe kʼYesus kuber wAit
mawe, “Fyi re anu hre niit boit su nsya raa ro moo namabyoh tna msya raa ro ja mno iro bo weto?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa ro metsu moof to, ja mamo saso
fee. Ja raa ro kiyam oh mi mamo saso
to.
Jõ tama ttu raa ro mhaf moof to fee. Tama fo ttu raa ro mno iro afo re kbe ana mashana.”
Raa ro
msya raa taro mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Kuber ro Yohanes msya kuber raa ro
ja mhau bo mait ye tna skabuk ye. Menohe kuber woNyõ ja mhau bo mait to fee.”
Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Ati ro raa sait ymen fnya to, ja raa mno bo bawya? Anu nwe kʼait yafoh wait ro mama to, nwe ana mhau bo ro mait sai a? Mfe! Ana makyõ bokyõ fea!

Ana makyõ bokyõ wia. Tna fo raa moo ait makah mamo. Ati reto to, kbe mafoh wana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait. Kuber woJõ mfi feto ye. Jõ thau tsya ana fares fo, ana sraujin fee. Menohe ati ro Jõ sikba ana to, kbe ana sraujin tibyo mhau bo ro mait ye.”

Tna Yesus ykyas bofret sau naut kʼana yawe, “Mfi bo ratan matah ro hri-hra sau. Ja fnya moo ratan ro ntfia tna ktan fee. Au moo ratan mabuf ro ntfia reto tna mtin kait mkah ratan rau ro matah fe mfe a? Soh au mno feto to, kbe mno ratan rau ro ntfia reto mkair. Tna raa mmat mawe ratan mabuf ro moof msya ro matah to, mmat mawe ewok reto mnan anya fee.
Feto ye, Ja raa mror
maya ro tna mam baah marak ro matah fee.
maya reto mno baah marak reto matu mbua. Tna kbe
maya reto maus miyi mroh mamo mkak.
maya ro tna to, ja raa moo mror mam baah marak ro tna sai.
Raa ro mhar
maya to, ana nksoh rana ro matah to mata. Tna ana hawe mata
maya ro tna.”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh sau to, Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo mfrit iti mam armato ro
sau. Kuber wAit mhai sre, tibyo mryoh
make baro. Ana msirori
weto mam matem wana tna mait.
Menohe raa ro
baro mmat ana tna mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Anu nryoh
make mam ayõ ro raa wanu ntmoh to. Anu nno fyi meto? Nno bo reto to, anu niwer Watum ro
ranu oh meto!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nsorni Bokom ro Allah? Bokom reto mkyas bo ro tiwya
Daud yno: Tiwya ait ysya raa wait mhai awyah.
Tna ait twok mam Samu ro Allah mato. Tna yoo
ro raa msan kʼAllah.
reto mbau. Menohe ait yoo yait.
reto ja
na mesait aran mait. Tna ait yoo tna yee kʼraa wait mait ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tatak tbo ayõ ro raa ntmoh to ye.”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh roto sau to, Yesus yamo ykyas bo mam samu watum ro Yahudi. Tna raa ro yatem ati mhai sait huwya mam beto ye.
Tna
na msya raa ro
baro huwya mam beto ye. Ana mros mmat rof bo ro Yesus yno. Tna ana saim bo mawe soh Yesus yisoh raa mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, kbe ana maun baun kʼAit mawe Ait yiwer Watum ro Musa oh meto.
Menohe Yesus yhar bonaut wana wia oh. Tna yawe kʼait ro yatem mhai retait yawe, “Nasen, nama nros susai mam wefo!” Tna raa retait yasen yama yros.
Tna Yesus ytu yawe, “Ja Watum ro
ranu mawe anu bno bo bawya mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh? Ja bno bo ro moof, soh mfe bno bo ro mkair a? Bisoh raa fe sikowah raa anya a?”
Yesus yros yasu ymat ana beta yur. Tna yawe kʼait ro yatem mhai retait yawe, “Betrot natem anyõ oh!” Raa retait betrot yatem rait. Tna yatem mrok moof.
na msya raa ro
to, ana kmo toni. Tna ana saim bo ro mkair kbe ana mno mai kʼYesus.
Ti sau to Yesus yamo yaut mam faut sau tna yawe yamo skabuk. Tna hre skabuk Allah mam ti ro miyõ reto
mamo snok mam niah msan. Tna Ait ytu kuber wAit beta mama. Tna Ait ysok ana mabo trion 12 aran kbe ana mamo raabis
wAit.
Ana weto sait yasom Simon (ro kbe Yesus ytu yawe yasom Petrus ye), Andreas ro Simon yao, Yakobus ysya yao Yohanes, Filipus, Bartolomeus,
Matius, Tomas, Yakobus ro Alfeus yare, Simon (ro raa mtu mawe
Yudas ro Yakobus yare, tna Yudas Iskariot ro kbe hren serek Yesus.
Yesus ysya raabis wAit mroh mbam faut reto. Tna Ait yamo yros mam tabam sneh. Tna raa mawat ro ja nkro Ait to, mama mawe mari bokyas rAit ye. Tna raa msis-sas mbam jaro-jaro sor mama ye: Raa mbam
ro Yudea, mbam
ro Yerusalem ye, tna raa ro mbam
ro Tirus msya
ro Sidon ye.
ewok refo mhau mam sawan maam ye.
Taro mama mawe mari bokyas ro Yesus. Tna ana taro ro kiyam mama mawe Yesus yisoh ana re kiyam rana marak ye. Ana ro kabes mbo to, mama tna Yesus yikyak kabes mbam kʼana weto ye.
Yesus yatak rAit yisoh ana beta moof. Tibyo raa mawat tomer mama miir Ait.
Yesus ymat kuber wAit tna yawe, “Anu ro mfo refo nsu awe to: Anu kbe nhau simaut mase. Anu oh mi raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo.
Anu ro mfo refo nhai sre to: Anu kbe nhau simaut mase. Meen anu nhaf matu tna nhai sre u fee. Anu ro mfo refo nwia to: Anu kbe nhau simaut mase. Meen anu nsen nsah.
Tiwya tinyi Allah ybis
wAit mama mkyas bo wAit. Tna raa mno bo mkair mai kʼana. Menohe Allah siwyan boren ro mase meen yoo yaren

wAit weto mam sawro rAit. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna soh anu smot Jõ, tibyo kbe raa mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to: Anu kbe nhau simaut mase. Soh raa knait anu, tna raa mikyak anu, tna raa mamus mawe sie anu to, simaut mase. Meen Allah yoo boren ro mase mam sawro rAit yaren anu fo ye. Feto to nyok-yok, tna simaut mase ye oh.”
Tiwya tinyi Allah ybis
wAit mama mkyas bo wAit. Tna raa mno bo mkair mai kʼana. Menohe Allah siwyan boren ro mase meen yoo yaren

wAit weto mam sawro rAit. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna soh anu smot Jõ, tibyo kbe raa mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to: Anu kbe nhau simaut mase. Soh raa knait anu, tna raa mikyak anu, tna raa mamus mawe sie anu to, simaut mase. Meen Allah yoo boren ro mase mam sawro rAit yaren anu fo ye. Feto to nyok-yok, tna simaut mase ye oh.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu raa ro bobot to: Mfo refo anu nhau moof to. Menohe bo ro mkair-kar kbe mama mai kʼanu. Tibyo kbe meen anu nhau noof fee.

Anu ro mfo refo nhaf matu tna nhai sre fee to: Bo ro mkair-kar kbe mama mai kʼanu. Tibyo kbe meen nhaf matu fee, anu nhai sre. Anu ro mfo refo nsah to: Bo ro mkair-kar kbe mai kʼanu ye. Meen anu nwia tna sraujin toni ye.
Tiwya tinyi to, raa baro sioh mawe ana to,
ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit. He mfe, sioh meto. Menohe anu hohos na makin tawyõ raa ro sioh raa weto. Feto to, soh raa beta tawyõ anu mfo refo to, kbe meen anu nkai bo ro mkair-kar.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu ro nri bokyas ro Jõ tkyas fo, tawe kʼanu tawe: ‘Natmof raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu. Tna nno bo moof kʼraa ro knait anu to ye.
Raa ro mamus anu to, nno bo ro moof kʼana sai. Tna raa ro mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to, skabuk ana ye.
Soh raa miban natni ranu to, noo natni ro ati jaro nee kʼana miban ye. Soh raa mtak ratan anyõ sau to, tna mawe mtak ratan roto taro ye to, nno wa ma. Noo ratan reto nee ye.
Awya sai mama mayoh bo kʼanu to, noo nee sai. Tna soh raa msyõf bo wanu to, nwe ana misya bo weto ma.
Bo ro anu ksoh nwe raa mno kʼanu to, nno mfi feto kʼana ye.
Soh anu natmof raa ro matmof anu sai aran to, kbe Allah ymat tibyo yoo boren yaren anu aro fee. Raa ro mno iro sai ja matmof raa ro matmof ana mfi feto ye.
Tna soh anu nno bo moof kʼraa ro ja mno bo moof kʼanu to, kbe Allah ymat tibyo yoo boren yaren anu aro fee. Raa ro mno iro sai ja mno bo moof kʼraa ro mno bo moof kʼana mfi feto ye.

Tna soh anu noo bo nee kʼraa ro mayoh bo kʼanu to, tna anu nhar nwe kbe ana moo bo aro mee kʼanu riryõn to, boren ro meen Allah yaren kʼanu to bo bawya? Raa ro mno iro sai ja moo bo mee kʼraa ro ana mnaut mawe kbe misya bo mnan anya feto ye.’

Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Natmof raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu sai. Tna nno bo moof kʼana sai. Noo bo nee kʼraa ro mayoh bo kʼanu to. Ninaut nwe kbe ana misya bo aro kʼanu riryõn to ma. Soh anu nno feto to, meen boren ro Allah yaren kʼanu to mase toni. Tna kbe anu nmo ku ro Allah wAit. Ait fi Raa ro yase. Tna Ait yhaf ase, ja yno bo moof kʼraa ro wase bo yawe asik mase kʼAit. Tna Allah yno bo moof kʼraa ro ja mno bo mkair ye.
Tna tawe natmof raa mnan fi Bja ranu ja yatmof raa feto ye.

Nuun boun kʼraa ma. Tna meen raa maun boun kʼanu feto ye fee. Nmit srah kʼraa to ma. Tna meen raa mmit srah kʼanu feto ye fee. Tna soh raa mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu to, kmo ana ma. Feto tna soh anu nno bo ro mkair mai kʼraa to, kbe ana kmo anu fee ye.

Noo bo nee kʼraa. Tna meen raa moo bo mee kʼanu ye. Kbe moo bo mninon mee kʼanu. Soh anu noo bo mase nee kʼraa to, meen ana moo bo mase mee kʼanu ye. Tna soh anu noo bo kebet sai nee kʼraa to, meen ana moo bo kebet sai mee kʼanu mfi feto ye.’”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Raa ro yasu mboh sait ja yamo yatim tna ybo raa yasu mboh anya sait fee. Soh mamo su feto to, kbe ana mbewok mbtek mawe mam kayah mato ye.
Kuber sait ja yase yiwer
rait fee.
rait kbe yber ait mkak wia to. Tna fo ait yhar bo mnan anya yfi
rait ye.
Soh knuf ro maboh sau mhau kʼnyõ nasu mato to, fyi re nyõ ksoh nmat knuf maku ro mhau kʼnafoh anyõ yasu mato rait? Menohe nyõ nwase knuf sau mhau kʼnyõ nasu anu ye.

Fyi re nyõ nawe kʼnafoh anyõ nwe, ‘Nama, jõ tmen knuf ro mhau kʼnyõ nasu mato to.’ Ja nyõ nesait nmat knuf ro mhau kʼnyõ nasu mato to fee. Sioh nyõ ma! Nmen knuf maboh ro mhau kʼnyõ nasu to wia. Tna fo nyõ nasu nmat bo kaket re kbe nmen knuf maku ro mhau kʼnafoh anyõ yasu rait to.”
Tna Yesus ykyas yawe, “Ara ro mara moof to, kbe make rau to mkair fee. Tna ara ro mara mkair to, kbe make rau to moof fee.
Ara ro mros sau. Mfi bo raa wase ara reto masom to, kbe yamo ymat make rau. Tna yhar. Ja raa saso kake make mbam abumun mara to fee. Tna saso
make mbam hyoh to fee.

Tna awya ro yhaf moof to, ja bo ro moof mbam yhaf mato rait frok. Tibyo bo ro yno to moof. Tna bo ro ykyas to moof ye. Tna awya ro yhaf mkair to, ja bo ro mkair mbam yhaf mato rait frok ye. Ait yhaf mato mkair sai. Tibyo ja yno bo ro mkair tna ykyas bo ro mkair ye.”
“Anu ja ntu Jõ nwe Jõ
