ranu, menohe anu nri bo ro Jõ tawe kʼanu to fee.
Awya ro yama yo kʼJõ tna yari bo ro Jõ tkyas re ybo yno to, ait ynan fi raa ro yhar bo.
Ait ro yhar bo to, soh ait retait sgi amah to, ait yno
wia matak kaket. Yabah kayah to miyõ mamo snok mam fraa, tna yno
abyõ mam fraa reto. Tna fo ait sgi amah rait. Sgi mkak tna oom mais tibyo imabo mama. Menohe
rau reto to, raa sgi abyõ mam fraa tibyo amah reto mros matak, matu fee.
Raa taro mari bo ro Jõ tkyas menohe ana mbo mno fee. Ana weto mfi ait ro sgi amah rait tna yse
wia mte fee. Ait retait sgi mkak tna oom mais tna imabo mama mayõ. Tibyo amah rait reto matu fooh tna sasi-sasa.”
Raa makin mari Yesus ykyas bo weto beta to, mkak. Tna fo yasen yamo snok mam remo ro Kapernaum.
Tna raa sbe ro yase sait yhau mam Kapernaum. Ait retait yamo aban mana ro ja ybo raa sbe ro Roma majin sau.
Ti reto to, sryan ro ja yisoh bo rait sait kiyam, kene wo yhai oh. Bi ait hasu sryan rait retait.
Ati ro aban mana retait yari raa mkyas Yesus, ait ytu raa manes ro
Yahudi baro mama. Tna ybis ana yawe, “Nmo saso Yesus. Tna nwe Ait yama yisoh sryan ajõ ye!”
Raa weto mari feto tna mamo mo kʼYesus. Ana soh-soh kʼAit mawe, “Aban mana retait tait, raa ro yhaf moof toni. Tna mfo refo sryan rait kiyam msai. Tna bi ait yawe Nyõ namo nisoh ait.
Anu, raa mana ro Yahudi to, Ait hasu. Bi ait yatmof anu. Tii ait yoo pitis tna re sgi samu watum ranu to.”

Yesus yari feto tna yasen ysya ana mamo. Ana mamo kene mam samu ro aban mana rait to, tna bi ait yafoh na baro mama fri ana. Yafoh wait weto mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Aban mana retait yawe Nyõ namo ma! Mbau a. Yawe ait fi raa ro ati fee tna Nyõ fi raa ro nase toni. Feto to yawe Nyõ namo twok mam amah rait to ma.
Feto oh mi aban mana retait yawe, ‘Jõ takah tabo tama to kʼNyõ fee.’ Yawe, ‘Nyõ nhau tore teto sai tna nawe sai. Nawe sai afo re sryan ajõ retait kiyam mrok marak.’

Aban mana retait yawe, ‘Jõ thar tawe raa kinyah ja mari bo kʼraa mase ro mbo ana. Jõ tesait ja tari bobis ro mbam kʼraa ro mase woJõ ye. Tna raa sbe ro kinyah ja mari bo ro jõ tawe ye. Soh jõ tbis bo kʼraa sbe sait, ait kbe yari tna yasen yamo tu oh. Tna soh jõ ttu raa sbe taro sait tawe yama to, kbe ait yasen yama ye oh. Tna soh jõ tbis bo kʼsryan ajõ tawe, “Nno bo reto.” Kbe ait yari ybo yno tu oh! Tna Nyõ to nase toni niwrek jõ ye. Soh Nyõ nawe kiyam marak to, kiyam reto mari tibyo marak tu oh.’”
Yesus yari bokyas reto tna yrok ktak. Ait siur tna ymat raa mawat ro kro Ait yawe, “Ja raa ro mhau mam tabam ro Israel fo, bosmot wana matak fee. Menohe ait refi bosmot rait matak toni!”
Tna raa manes ro riwai aban mana rana ybis weto hah mamoʼt amah rait. Ana ntwok mamoʼt amah mato tna mmat he sryan retait kiyam rait marak oh tna yrok yoof oh.
Tna Yesus yasen yamoʼt remo sau ro masom Nain. Kuber wAit msya raa mawat taro mamo su kro Ait.
Ana mamo snok mam remo makit reto si fo tna raa ngkatar hai sau frok mama. Hai reto fai ro semit sau, ku sme rau sait aran yum sai. Raa ro remo reto mawat msya fai au ro semit reto mtar hai reto.
Yesus ymat fai au ro semit reto tna yatmof au. Ait sraujin toni ye tna yawe, “Tme, nawia ma.”
Ait yamo kait yo kʼana tna ybo sese reto. Tibyo raa ro ngkatar sese reto mros. Tna Yesus yawe, “Akut, nasen oh!”
Mere retait yrok yasen hre ykyas bo. Tna Yesus ysan ait kʼyme.
Raa beta mmat feto tna waa, tetet. Tibyo ana mbaut Allah mawe, “Allah ybis
ro yase sait frok yama yo kʼanu oh! Allah yama ybet raa wAit oh!”
Bo msai ro Ait yno reto to, raa mkyas faram mamo snok mam
ro Yudea beta msya rabin roto taro ye.
Kuber ro Yohanes mari bokyas reto ye tna mamo mkyas bo weto beta kʼYohanes.
Tna Yohanes ybis ana mabo ewok yawe, “Nmo no kʼYesus, tna ntu bo kʼAit nwe, ‘Nyõ fi
ro tiwya Allah ysi yawe kbe yama oh mefi, fe mfe a? Kbe amu ne ste raa roto sait hayah a?’”
Kuber mabo ewok reto mamo mo kʼYesus tna mawe, “Yohanes ro ja
raa tait ybis amu nma fo. Ybis amu nma ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe, ‘Nyõ fi
ro tiwya Allah ysi yawe kbe yama oh mefi, fe mfe a? Kbe amu ne ste raa roto sait hayah a?’”
Mam ati reto ana mmat Yesus yisoh raa ro kiyam mawat, tna yikyak kabes mawat, tna yatmof raa ro masu mboh tna yisoh ana re mmat bo.

Tna Ait yawe kʼana mbewok yawe, “Hah ne nmo no kʼYohanes tna nkyas bo ro anu nmat ye tna nri ye: Nwe, ‘Raa ro masu mboh to, mfo refo ana mmat bo. Raa ro maa mhai to, mfo refo ana masen mamo. Raa ro mafa
to, mfo refo ana mrok moof. Raa ro mimara mtuk to, mfo refo ana mari bo oh. Raa ro mhai to, Ait yawe sai to, tibyo ana mrok masen. Tna raa ro masu awe to, mari Bokyas Moof ro mbam kʼAllah.’
Tawe kbe
yno bo ro moof kʼraa ro mmat bo ro Jõ tno tna beroh smot Jõ fares to.”

Kuber ro Yohanes wait hah mamo, tna Yesus yasen ykyas Yohanes kʼraa msis-sas weto. Ykyas yawe, “Tiwya anu nmoʼt yuk ro riamo nwe nmat Yohanes. Nmo to, anu nnaut nwe nmat bo bawya meto? Anu nmo nmat nkrum ro foos mfi matu wewe mamo-me to a? Mfe, Yohanes tait raa ro yros yatak. Ait raa ro sneh sai fee.
Tiwya anu nmo nmat ait re nmat bawya? Anu nmo nmat bobot sait ro yyum ratan ro sne rauk? Mfe ye, bobot ro myum ratan ro moof to, ja mhau bana mam amah ro moof sai.
Tawe kʼanu u tawe, anu nmo saso bawya mam tabam ro riamo reto to? Anu nmo saso
ro Allah ybis yama rauk? Ae! Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis sait yama. Yama to, yase yiwer
na roto ye.
Yohanes retait oh mi tiwya Allah ykyas mam Bokom rAit sau. Bokom reto mawe,
‘Meen Jõ tbis raa sait yama ykyas bo woJõ yatim wia tna Nyõ nrof. Kbe ait siwyan iso kʼNyõ.’”
Maleakhi 3:1
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nnaut oh: Raa ro tabam refo aro mase miwrek Yohanes fee. Menohe mam raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, raa ro kinyah to, ana mase miwer Yohanes ye.”
Raa makin ro mros mari Yesus ykyas bo to, ana taro raa ro moo namabyoh
ye. Ana weto tiwya mari bokyas ro Yohanes ykyas ye. Tna Yohanes
ana ye. Tibyo ana weto waa Allah tna mari bo ro Yesus yawe. Mawe, “Esre.”
Menohe raa ro
msya
ro Yahudi mawe Yohanes
ana ma. Tibyo ana hawe bo mari watum mbam Allah ro Yesus ykyas reto ye.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa ro mhau mfo refo to, mfi awya? Jõ fret bo tawe anu fo raa ro haberek nfi kukek: Anu nnan kukek ro hre mam
msom. Tna ana baro mawe kʼanya mawe,

‘Riwai anu sioh bsom-sam mnan fi anu bkyõ bokyõ: Amu nfi oor, tna nji howes ye, afo re kbe anu bsyoh, menohe anu nsyoh fee! Tna fo anu sioh bsom bfi raa ro mhai, menohe anu taro hawe bo nwia hai reto! Nsom nno fyi!’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tiwya Yohanes ro ja
raa yama. Anu nmat ait tibyo nkyas nwe, ‘Ait yhau bo yait tna yata
maya fee. Ait kabes mama mbo.’
Tna Jõ fi, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tama to, tfi Yohanes fee. Jõ tama to, ja thau bo tait fee. Tna tata
maya ye. Menohe anu nwe kair Jõ nwe, ‘Ait retait yait boit yasmamo! Ait retait raa ro ja yata
maya bisir yoyo! Tna yafoh wAit to, raa ro ja mno iro msya raa ro ja moo namabyoh mee
bo ye!’
Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, bo moof ro Yohanes ysya Jõ nno to, merif kʼanu mawe Allah oh mi ybis amu nbewok nma to.”
Bi ro
sait yasom Simon. Ait ymen Yesus yamo yait bo mam amah rait. Tna Yesus yamo hre yait boit ysya ait su.
Menohe fai ro ja mno iro sau mhau mam remo reto ye. Au mari he Yesus yamo yait boit su ysya Simon. Tibyo fai au masen moo
kusia sau ro au mse to, moo tna makah mamoʼt amah reto.
Au mros manwaruk mam ati ro Yesus kbor tna mawia sut-sut. Mukan rau to mbtek mam Yesus yaa tna au skur mana mawyan rau moo ngkaru Ait yaa ye. Tna au maka hana Yesus yaa tna moo
ro au mbo to, maas Ait yaa ye.
Tna Simon ymat sas bo ro au mno feto. Tibyo ait ynaut bait yawe, “Soh Ait refi
sait ro Allah ybis yama feto to, kbe Ait yhar yawe fai au ro mbo Ait reto ja mno iro.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼbi ait, yawe, “Jõ tawe tkyas bo baro kʼnyõ.” Tna Simon yawe,
nkyas oh.”
Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo raa mabo ewok mamo mhe pitis kʼbi sait. Tna ait sait yhe pitis 500
Tna ait sait yhe 50

Snyi firwas snyi tna raa mbewok reto mtai misya pitis reto fee. Tna bi ro yoo pitis wait yee kʼana to yawe, ‘Pitis reto mhau oh.’” Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼSimon yawe, “Nnaut anyõ fyi? Raa mabo ewok reto to: Awya ro mi ksoh bi ait retait toni?”
Simon yawe si yawe, “Tnaut tawe ait ro yhe pitis mase to ksoh bi ait miwer.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Ae, bokyas ro nyõ nkyas reto mabo oh.”

Ait haberek ymat fai au reto tna yawe kʼSimon yawe, “Nmat fai au reto. Riwai Jõ twok mam amah anyõ to, nyõ noo aya aro nee kʼJõ tyon taa fee. Menohe fai au mesait myon Jõ taa mkah mukan tna ngkaru mkah mana mawyan rau ye.
Tna nyõ aro hana Jõ fee. Menohe maban riwai Jõ twok si hre mam befo to, au hana Jõ taa to mswior fee.
Nyõ aro naas
mam Jõ tana fee. Menohe fai refo maas
mam Jõ taa aJõ.

Feto to Jõ tawe kʼnyõ tawe, ‘Fai au refo mhafri Jõ. Feto tibyo: Iro mawat ro au mno to, Jõ tyon beta oh. Menohe awya ro yno iro kebet sai to, tna raa yyon to, kbe ait ksoh raa ro yyon retait kebet sai.’”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼfai au refo yawe, “Iro wonyõ, Jõ tyon oh.”
Tna ana ro hre mait bo su msya Ait to mtu kʼanya mawe, “Ait fi awya oh mi yawe yyon iro raa anya to?”
Tna Ait yawe kʼfai au yawe, “Nyõ smot Jõ tibyo tawe riof kʼnyõ oh. Feto namo oh.”
Tna Yesus yasen yamoʼt
msya remo roto taro sor. Yamo ykyas Bokyas ro Moof: Ykyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Tna kuber wAit mabo 12 weto msya Ait mamo ye.

Tna fnya baro kro Ait mamo ye. Tiwya ana weto baro kiyam tna Yesus yisoh ana moof. Tna fnya weto taro to tii kabes mbo. Tna Ait yisoh ana moof ye. Sau masom Maria Magdalena. Tii Yesus yikyak kabes mabo ngkrema ro mbo au to, frok mamo.
Ana weto sau masom Yohana. (Au fo bi Khuza yfain. Ait yamo
ro
Herodes.) Tna sau masom Susana. Tna fnya roto taro naut mros mban Yesus ysya kuber wAit mam tis ye.
Raa mbam remo tyo-teya sai myar mama mo kʼYesus. Raa mawat mama tna Ait ykyas bofret sau yawe:
“Raa sait yno armato rait sau. Tna ait yamo furere bobat manaf. Ait furere bo to, bo manaf taro mbtek mam iso. Tibyo bo manaf weto to, taro raa mber makus. Tna taro to, ruu mama mame mkak.
Tna bo manaf taro to, mbtek mam fraa abyõ. Bobat weto mo maut fooh. Menohe tabam ro mka mamos aro fee. Tibyo mtis rau samer tna mata hroyoh.
Tna taro naut btek mam wore hyoh muuf ye. Tna hyoh muuf weto mo betru kait.

Tna taro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos. Tna mo maut. Tibyo make sarer toni: Bo manaf sau-sau to, make rau trion 100 bo feto.” Yesus ykyas bofret reto mkak tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu ro nri bokyas reto oh to, nnaut kaket!”
Kuber wAit mtu mawe, “Bawya oh mi nyõ nkyas bofret reto to? Sik betoo maja rau.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, maja wau baro to, raa wase fares. Maja wau weto to, Allah ksoh re anu nsrau nnaut kaket. Menohe raa taro to, ja Jõ tkyas bofret kʼana sai.
‘Raa kbe mmat sas bo refo. Ana mmat sas menohe wase bo reto fares. Ana kbe mari bo refo. Ana mari, menohe srau fee ye.’”
Yesaya 6:9-10
Tna Yesus betoo bofret reto kʼana yawe, “Bo manaf reto to, Bokyas ro Allah oh meto.

Bo manaf ro mbtek mam iso to, mkyas mawe raa ro mama mari Bokyas ro Allah. Mari menohe kabes yabi (Iblis) yama tna safto bokyas mbam kʼana mhaf wana. Tibyo ana smot Allah fee. Feto tibyo ana mkai riof ro mase fee ye.

Bo manaf ro mbtek mam fraa abyõ to, mkyas mawe raa ro mama ksoh mari Bokyas ro Allah. Menohe Bokyas reto ana moo mse mhau mam mhaf mato wana waor sai. Ana mbo matak fee. Bo ro samyoh mama mai kʼana to, ana mbtek mawe, tna smot
u fee.

Bo manaf ro mbtek mam wore hyoh muuf to, mkyas raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah ye. Menohe ana mhau to, mnaut yyi. Tna ana mnaut bosatoh ro moof mam tabam refo sai. Tna ana nksoh mhau moof bana mam tabam refo sai. Bo weto moo ana mhaf re ana mnaut Bokyas ro Allah fee. Tibyo bosmot wana matak fee. Ana tufrok make ro maku sai, tna bo make wana weto manes fee.
Bo manaf ro mbtek mam tabam ro mamos to, mkyas mawe raa ro mhaf reo mari Bokyas ro Allah. Mari tna mbo mse kaket mam mhaf mato wana. Tibyo ana weto kbe mberoh mros matak, tna tufrok make ro moof.”
Yesus yawe, “Ja raa mbet tafoh

afo re ntara raa ro twok mam amah mato. Raa moo mse mte tna moo bo burut wa fee. Tna mmyõt wai mam ambar ro mjin mte to fee ye. Menohe tafoh reto to, ja raa hero abyõ afo re kbe kek ntara tna raa ro mama twok mam amah mato reto mmat.
Bo bawya ro raa mmyõt to, meen raa masbrer. Tna bo bawya raa mkyas kmun-kmun to, meen raa beta mari.

Reto oh mi tawe nri tna nnaut bokyas aJõ kaket! Awya ro yari tna ybo yno to, kbe Allah yno re ait retait yasu maah. Menohe awya ro yari tna hawe yse mam yhaf kaket to, kbe Allah yno re bohar rait to mabuf sai.”
Yesus yme msya yao na mama mo kʼAit. Menohe raa mawat tibyo ana mamo kene msya Ait fee.
Tna raa sait yama yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Nme msya nao na mros ste mne meu. Ana ksoh fri Nyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Raa ro mari Bokyas ro Allah, tna mbo mno kaket to, ana weto Jõ ttu tme msya tao na woJõ oh meto.”
Ti sau to, Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nma anu buut wiak frit bmoʼt maru refo ati tino.” Tibyo ana maut wiak mamo.
Ana mamo mamo tna Yesus yjin tu mam wiak mato. Yjin tna foos frok tubor mama mai wiak rana. Tna figyõm mase mai maut mam wiak mato ye tna mabo kait ana beta. Wiak wana kene wo hoh.
Tna kuber wAit mti Yesus mawe,
kbe anu bsu!” Yesus yrok yasen tna yifau foos msya figyõm ro safo weto yawe, “Nnem oh!” Tibyo foos msya figyõm reto mrok mnem. Tna maru reto mrok snef u.
Tna Ait ytu kuber wAit yawe, “Fyi re anu smot Jõ fee?” Ana mrok miskawowo tna waa. Tna mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Bi Ait refi yatak yifau foos msya figyõm wefo mari. Bi Ait refi fi awya mefi?”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit frit maru reto snok mam ati jaro. Ana riwai mbam
ro Galilea tna frit mamoʼt rabin ro Gerasa.
Ana frok tna Yesus yaut mne. Tna raa ro
reto sait yama tru Ait. Raa retait kabes mbo tibyo yyum ratan fee ti ooh oh. Tna ait yhau mam amah fee, ait ja yhau mam isra mato ro raa mse hai sai.
Tiwya kabes mama mbo raa retait ti aro rau-rau. Tibyo raa moo
make ait yatem msya yaa, tna kmot ait ye. Menohe kabes mno ait yatak tibyo yahri
beta hri. Yahri

reto tna ysam yamoʼt yuk ro riamo. Tna he Yesus yama. Ait ro yker ymat Yesus tibyo kakyah tna yama yo kʼAit kait tna yaka tmi yimna tna heyut Yesus. Tna Yesus yikyak kabes frok mbam ait yawe, “Snok oh!” Tna raa retait yawe, “Yesus; Nyõ fi Allah yare. Allah tait yase toni. Kbe Nyõ nno bawya kʼjõ? Jõ soh-soh kʼNyõ tawe sikowah jõ ma!”
Tiwya kabes mama mbo raa retait ti aro rau-rau. Tibyo raa moo
make ait yatem msya yaa, tna kmot ait ye. Menohe kabes mno ait yatak tibyo yahri
beta hri. Yahri

reto tna ysam yamoʼt yuk ro riamo. Tna he Yesus yama. Ait ro yker ymat Yesus tibyo kakyah tna yama yo kʼAit kait tna yaka tmi yimna tna heyut Yesus. Tna Yesus yikyak kabes frok mbam ait yawe, “Snok oh!” Tna raa retait yawe, “Yesus; Nyõ fi Allah yare. Allah tait yase toni. Kbe Nyõ nno bawya kʼjõ? Jõ soh-soh kʼNyõ tawe sikowah jõ ma!”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nasom awya?” Tna raa retait yawe, “Kabes mawat mbo jõ. Tibyo jõ tasom ‘Legion.’”
Tna kabes weto soh-soh kʼYesus hri mun aro rau mawe, “Nbis amu frok nmoʼt sawro wore wo kabes ja mhau to ma!”
Kene msya yuk reto ye fane mawat mau bana mam faut sau. Tna kabes weto soh-soh kʼYesus mawe, “Nbis amu frok nmo twok mam fane wore wono!” Tna Yesus ybis yawe, “Nmo oh!”
Tna kabes weto mari tna frok mamo twok mam fane weto. Tna fane weto mrok mker tna mhoh tbat mam rakak reto btek mam maru. Tna fane weto msu tibyo mhai beta mkak.
Raa ro kmot fane weto mmat bo ro Yesus yno. Feto tibyo ana masen fooh mhoh mamo mkyas kʼraa mam
reto tna mkyas kʼraa ro mhau kene ye.

Tibyo raa masen myum mamo mmat. Ana mroh sia mamoʼt maru mne mo kʼYesus. Mamo tna mmat he raa ro yker retait hre mte ysya Yesus. Kabes frok marak oh. Ait yyum ratan. Tna srau yakit rait moof oh. Ana mmat feto tibyo mrok waa.
Raa ro riwai mmat bo ro Yesus yno weto mkyas betoo kʼraa mawe Yesus yisoh raa ro kabes mbo retait yoof oh.
Raa weto mari tna mrok waa. Tibyo ana ro mbam rabin ro Gerasa beta to, soh-soh mawe Yesus frok sikba rabin rana reto yamo. Tna Yesus yawe yaut wiak yamo.
Tna raa ro riwai yker retait soh-soh kʼYesus yawe, “Jõ kro Nyõ bmo ye!” Menohe Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nyõ kro ma.
Namo no kʼraa wonyõ. Tna nkyas bo msai ro Allah yno kʼnyõ.” Tibyo raa retait yamo ykyas bo msai ro Yesus yno kʼait reto. Ait yamo ykyas bo reto kʼraa ro mhau mam remo rait reto beta.
Yesus ybam maru maam tino hah ye yama tna raa beta ste Ait wea. Ana ksoh myum mama mtar Ait.
Tna bi yabi ro ybo samu watum raa ro Yahudi sait yama. Ait retait yasom Yairus. Ait yama yaka heyut Yesus tna soh-soh kʼAit yawe,
namaʼt amah ajõ.
Nama nisoh ku ajõ ye! Au fo ku ajõ tomu sai.
rau to
12. Tna au kiyam, kerit wo mhai.” Yesus yari bo ro bi ait yawe feto tna yamo. Yamo mam iso maka menohe raa msis-sas beak-ak anya kro Ait mamo ye.
Tna fai sau mama miir ratan ro Yesus rAit. Fai au fo mafa mees ro fnya yoyo

trion 12 oh. Tiwya raa mawat mama tkif fai au oh. Menohe raa ro mtai misoh au aro fee. [Feto mamo snok tis rau to, pitis wau marak. Tna mees rau reto miyõ sai fares.] Fai au mama kait mo kʼYesus mam tis tna miir ratan rAit makit sai. Au miir ratan rAit si fo, tna mees rau reto mrok mnem.
Tna fai sau mama miir ratan ro Yesus rAit. Fai au fo mafa mees ro fnya yoyo

trion 12 oh. Tiwya raa mawat mama tkif fai au oh. Menohe raa ro mtai misoh au aro fee. [Feto mamo snok tis rau to, pitis wau marak. Tna mees rau reto miyõ sai fares.] Fai au mama kait mo kʼYesus mam tis tna miir ratan rAit makit sai. Au miir ratan rAit si fo, tna mees rau reto mrok mnem.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Awya oh mi miir Jõ fo?” Raa saak ana. Tna Petrus yawe,
nmat raa mawat beak-ak anya fefo! Fyi re Nyõ ntu feto?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Tna sai Jõ tari he tatak aJõ frok mbam kʼJõ. Tibyo thar tawe raa miir Jõ.”

Fai reto mhar mawe bo ro au mno reto raa mhar oh. Tna au tetet mhai mama mo kʼYesus. Au maka hartu Ait tna mkyas kiyam rau reto tna mawe, “Jõ au oh mi riwai tama tiir ratan aNyõ to. Tibyo kiyam ajõ mrok mnem buu.” Mkyas bo reto tna raa beta mari.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ku aJõ, nyõ smot Jõ tibyo kiyam anyõ reto marak. Riof kʼnyõ oh. Nasen namo oh.”
Yesus ykyas bo fares tna raa sait ybam samu bi Yairus yama. Tna yawe kʼYairus yawe, “Ku anyõ reto mhai oh. Nno bi
ysui aro u ma.”
Menohe Yesus yari bokyas reto to, yawe kʼYairus yawe, “Waa ma, smot Jõ sai. Smot Jõ nawe Jõ tatak tisoh au. Tna ku anyõ kbe mrok moof u.”

Ana mamo tna snok mam amah ro Yairus. Tna Yesus yawe kʼPetrus, Yohanes ysya Yakobus yawe, “Anu nbo tuuf sai kro Jõ twok mam amah mato. Anu nbo tuuf nsya ku au maja, mme sai twok mam amah. Raa taro beta mhau mne sai.”
Raa beta ro mhau mne to, sraujin tna mawia hai reto. Menohe Yesus yawe, “Nwia ma! Ku reto mhai fee. Au mjin sai meto!”
Menohe ana masah Yesus. Ana mhar mawe ku reto mhai tibyo oh.
Yesus yamo yo ku au tna ybo matem sau yawe, “Ku aJõ, nasen oh!”
Ku reto mafos rau hah me si fo, tna au masen mros. Tna Yesus ybis raa moo boit mee kʼau mait.
Yairus ysya yfain ana mrok miskawowo toni. Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nkyas bo refo renti kʼraa ma!”
Ati sau to, Yesus ytu kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait yoo yatak rAit yee kʼana re kbe ana mikyak kabes beta ro mbo raa, tna misoh raa ro kiyam ye.
Tna Ait ybis ana mamo misoh raa ro kiyam tna mkyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nmo ntem marak sai, nbo armuk ma, krek yume ma, nbo boit ma, nbo pitis ma, tna nbo ratan roto taro ro kbe nyum to ye ma.
Ati ro anu twok mam remo to, soh raa sait yoo anu yse mam amah rait to, nhau oh nsya ait mam beto mamo snok mam wore anu nsen sikba remo reto.

Ati ro anu twok mam remo taro to, soh raa mitrah amah wana kʼanu fee, tna hawe bo mari bo ro anu nkyas to, feto ati ro anu sikba remo reto nmo to, bes-baas bohasyaf ro mhau mam naa to akus sai. Nno feto afo re ana weto mhar mawe anu bitsre ana akus. Ana hawe bo mari bo ro anu nkyas. Feto tibyo ana mesait oh mi misti kair ro meen mama mai kʼana reto.”
Tna ana mabo 12 weto masen mamo mno bo ro Yesus ybis kʼana. Ana mamo tiyo-teya sai mkyas Bokyas Moof reto tna misoh raa ro kiyam ye.
Herodes tii ybis raa mame Yohanes yajat. Tna ait yari bo ro Yesus ysya kuber wAit na mabo 12 mno to. Raa taro mkyas mawe Yesus tait, Yohanes ro tii yajat tna yrok yasen. Tibyo
Herodes ynaut yyi ait.
Tna yari he raa taro mkyas mawe Yesus tait
Elia frok yama u. Tna taro mawe Yesus tait
roto sait ro tii yhai tna yrok yasen.
Tna
Herodes yawe, “Ait retait Yohanes fee: Tiwya jõ tbis raa ktan Yohanes yana yajat oh. Ait ro raa mkyas retait tait awya?” Tna
Herodes yawe yamo ymat Yesus.
Ti baro firwas tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 12 weto hah me. Tna ana mkyas kʼAit mawe bo ro ana mno beta. Tna Yesus ymen ana mesait kar mamoʼt
ro Betsaida.
Menohe raa mari he ana mamoʼt Betsaida. Tibyo ana mawat masen mamo mo kʼAit mam beto. Ait yawe ana mama rof oh tna yasen ykyas bo kʼana ye. Ait ykyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Tna yisoh raa ro kiyam to ye.

Ayõ kene hawer oh tna raa mawat mhau mari bo ro Yesus ykyas fares. (Raa sme mabo trion 5000 bo feto.) Tna kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼYesus mawe, “Yuk refo fo riamo. Nbis raa wefo masen mamo rof re kbe ana saso boit ro mait aro msya yuk ro mjin. Kbe ana saso mam remo msya
ro mhau kene mam wefo sor.” Yesus yawe, “Anu nesait noo boit aro nee kʼana mait.” Menohe kuber wAit mawe, “Amu nse
maat msya syoh mana ewok aran sai fo. Nyõ nawe amu nmo saso boit mkah nee kʼraa mawat wefo mait a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfe. Nbis raa beta hre mte. Nwe ana mabo 50 bo feto hre kbair sau hayah-hayah.”

Ayõ kene hawer oh tna raa mawat mhau mari bo ro Yesus ykyas fares. (Raa sme mabo trion 5000 bo feto.) Tna kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼYesus mawe, “Yuk refo fo riamo. Nbis raa wefo masen mamo rof re kbe ana saso boit ro mait aro msya yuk ro mjin. Kbe ana saso mam remo msya
ro mhau kene mam wefo sor.” Yesus yawe, “Anu nesait noo boit aro nee kʼana mait.” Menohe kuber wAit mawe, “Amu nse
maat msya syoh mana ewok aran sai fo. Nyõ nawe amu nmo saso boit mkah nee kʼraa mawat wefo mait a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfe. Nbis raa beta hre mte. Nwe ana mabo 50 bo feto hre kbair sau hayah-hayah.”

Ayõ kene hawer oh tna raa mawat mhau mari bo ro Yesus ykyas fares. (Raa sme mabo trion 5000 bo feto.) Tna kuber wAit mabo 12 weto mama mo kʼYesus mawe, “Yuk refo fo riamo. Nbis raa wefo masen mamo rof re kbe ana saso boit ro mait aro msya yuk ro mjin. Kbe ana saso mam remo msya
ro mhau kene mam wefo sor.” Yesus yawe, “Anu nesait noo boit aro nee kʼana mait.” Menohe kuber wAit mawe, “Amu nse
maat msya syoh mana ewok aran sai fo. Nyõ nawe amu nmo saso boit mkah nee kʼraa mawat wefo mait a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfe. Nbis raa beta hre mte. Nwe ana mabo 50 bo feto hre kbair sau hayah-hayah.”
Kuber wAit mari tna mbis raa msis-sas weto hre mte.
Tna Yesus yoo
maat msya syoh mana ewok reto ybo. Tna heyut mam ayoh yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
weto tna yiti syoh mana reto tna yee kuber wAit yawe ana saim kʼraa ro hre weto.
Raa weto mait tna mhaf matu beta. Menohe
mabuf taro to msis mhau fares. Kuber ro Yesus wAit soo
weto tna mfau mam
trion 12 matot.
Ti sau to, Yesus yesait skabuk kar. Tna kuber wAit mama mo kʼAit. Tna Ait ytu kʼana yawe, “Raa makin mnaut mawe Jõ fi awya?”
Kuber wAit mawe, “Ana taro mawe, Nyõ fi Yohanes ro ja
raa. Tna taro mawe, Nyõ fi
Elia. Tna taro mawe Nyõ fi
roto sait ro tii yhai tna yrok yasen fo.”
Tna Yesus ytu kʼana yawe, “Bonaut ranu nesait nwe Jõ fi awya?” Tna Petrus yasen yawe, “Nyõ fi
ro nbam Allah nama.”
Tna Yesus yawe wa ana yawe, “Nkyas bo refo renti kʼraa to ma.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe meen Jõ tkai bo ro samyoh mawat btek mai kʼJõ. Raa ro
Yahudi kbe mikyak Jõ: Raa mabi wana ye,
manes wana ye, tna msya
wana ye. Jõ kbe raa mame tajat, tna ti ro tuuf to, Taja yno tibyo Jõ trok tasen.

Anu awya sai ro ksoh kro Jõ to, nko hawe sai kbe nno mfi fefo: Nno bo wanu u ma. Tna rabu wawa nwe nsom ara warok wanu sait-sait: Au oh mi nko hawe sai beroh nsom bo mase ro kbe mama mai kʼanu. Tna beroh nkro iso ro Jõ terif kʼanu.

Raa taro mawe misoh metsu rana ai mam tabam refo. Ana saso riof rana mam tabam refo sai ai menohe mnaut mamos rana fee. Meen ana weto mhau hame wajin fee. Menohe raa taro mawe mhau saso riof rana ai mam tabam refo fee. Ana mawe mno bo woJõ. Ana saso Jõ tasom aJõ mam tabam refo. Ana weto oh mi kbe mkai riof kʼana. Ana kbe meen raa mame majat oto, menohe meen mkai riof ro hame wajin.
Mfi bo raa sait ykai kta mam tabam refo to beta menohe ykai riof mase fee. Meen mafer rau to bawya?
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ hah tama u. Tna raa mmat tase aJõ. Tna raa mmat bo yase ro Allah rAit msya
wAit ye. Menohe mfo refo, wore wo raa mhau mam tabam refo fares to, raa taro to hawe kro Jõ. Mawe ana saban mkyas Jõ tasom. Ana ro hawe Jõ feto to, meen ati ro Jõ hah tama u to, kbe Jõ hawe ana ye.
Nri oh! Meen anu baro nmat raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, mama frok tubor. Frok to, anu ro nros nsya Jõ mam befo to, meen anu baro nhau fares nmat to. Ati reto to, anu beta nhai marak fefares.”
Ti trion krentuuf firwas tna Yesus yamo yaut mam atu sau yawe skabuk. Ait ymen Petrus, Yohanes ysya Yakobus ana msya Ait mamo.
Ana mamo maut mam atu reto tna Yesus skabuk. Ait skabuk kri-kri fares to, yetsu rAit to haberek: Yasu ynaif roto, tna ratan rAit mrok ngkren toni. Ngkren mboh toni mnan fi rir ro mrir.
Tna ana mmat raa mabo ewok frok tubor mros msya Yesus. Ana mbewok weto to Musa ysya Elia.
Ana mbewok ngkren toni ye. Mbewok mkyas bo kʼYesus. Mkyas mawe ati ro kbe mame Yesus yajat mam Yerusalem to kene oh.
Riwai Petrus ysya yafoh wait mjin maka, tibyo ana mjin tu. Tna fo ana mrok masen mmat Yesus yase rAit; yetsu rAit mawyah. Tna raa mabo ewok reto mros msya Ait mam wore weto ye.
Musa ysya Elia masen mawe mikba yuk reto mamo. Tna Petrus yawe kʼYesus yawe,
amu ye nhau mam yuk refo to moof toni. Kbe amu sgi sbyah trion tuuf mam yuk refo: Sau kʼNyõ, sau kʼMusa, tna sau ye kʼElia.” (Petrus ykyas sai tna ait wase bokyas rait reto.)
Petrus ykyas fares tna byõ mama sro-sro ana kait. Tibyo ana waa.
Tna ana mari Raa sait ymai mam byõ mato yawe, “Ait refi Ku aJõ, ro Jõ tsok oh. Nri bo kʼAit!”
Mai reto marak, tna ana mmat Yesus yesait kar yros mam weto. Ti mawat firwas tna kuber wAit weto mkyas bo ro ana mmat reto kʼraa wia fee.
Rabu ti fo Yesus ysya kuber wAit mroh mbam atu reto. Tna raa mawat myar mama mo kʼYesus.
Tna raa ro myar mama weto, sait yasen soh-soh Yesus ytu yawe,
nama nmat ku ajõ. Ait fi ku sme ajõ tomu sai!
Rabu wawa kabes mbo senteta ait. Tna ait wohrarar tna yrok ktor. Tna yafyat frok mam yasoh rait. Kabes reto simoyot-mayat ait, tna au hawe bo frok mbam kʼait ye!
Jõ soh-soh kuber woNyõ afo re mikyak kabes frok. Menohe ana matak fee.”

Yesus yawe, “Anu wefo mfe saut! Anu wefo raa ro wyahte Allah, tna smot Jõ fee! Kbe thau tsya anu kait fares a? Jõ thaf sneh tsya anu kait ye fee!” Tna Yesus yawe kʼbi retait yawe, “Nbo ku anyõ retait nakah nama!”
Raa retait yakah ku rait yama fares to, menohe kabes mabyõ ku retait tna yetsu mrok ktor. Tna Yesus yikyak kabes reto, tna yisoh ku retait yoof. Tna fo yoo ku retait yee kʼyaja u.
Raa beta mrok ktak mmat Allah yatak rAit ro mase reto.
Raa ktak tna mkyas bo ro Yesus yno fares, tna Ait ykyas bo kuber wAit yawe,
Nri oh! Tna nnaut oh: “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna kbe raa moo Jõ msan kʼraa roto mbo.”
Bokyas ro Yesus reto, Allah ymyõt maja rau afo re kuber wAit srau mnaut bokyas rAit reto wia fee. Tibyo kuber wAit wase bawya ro Ait ykyas reto. Tna ana waa bo mtu kʼAit ye.
Ti sau fo, kuber ro Yesus wAit santri bo kʼanya. Ana mkyas mawe kbe ana to, awya ro yase toni.
Yesus yhar bonaut wana wia oh. Tibyo Ait yoo ku maku sau yse ysya Ait mros mam ati jaro.

Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Jõ ksoh anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼraa ro mhaf sneh. Awya ro yitrah yhaf rait ku refo, ro yno feto mam Jõ tasom aJõ to, ait yno bo moof oh meto. Au oh mi; awya ro ymat raa ro mhaf sneh to, yno feto to mnan anya mfi ait yno bo ro moof reto kʼJõ ye oh meto. Allah oh mi tiwya ybis jõ tama fo. Tibyo awya ro yitrah yhaf rait kʼJõ tait, yitrah yhaf rait kʼbi Allah ye oh meto.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu fo, awya ro yaku toni? Jõ tnaut tawe ait retait oh mi raa ro yase to.”
Yohanes yawe,
amu nmat raa sait yikyak kabes mkah tak ro Nyõ nasom aNyõ. Ait tait ja ysya anu bmo su fee. Tibyo amu nwe wa kʼait nwe, ‘Nno feto ma!’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nwe wa kʼait ma. Awya ro beswan anu fee, ait yhau mam ati ranu.”
Tna kene mam wore wo Allah tubat Yesus yamoʼt sawro rAit oh. Feto tna Yesus beroh yawe yamoʼt Yerusalem.
Ait ybis raa baro matim wia mamoʼt remo sau mam iso maka. Yawe, “Nmo siwyan bombra wanu beta re kbe amu nma.” Remo reto mhau mam rabin ro Samaria.
Menohe raa ro remo reto mhar mawe Yesus tait raa ro
Yahudi tna yawe yamoʼt Yerusalem. Ja raa ro Samaria miranya msya raa ro Yahudi fee. Feto tibyo ana ro Samaria hawe bo Ait yhau mam remo rana reto.
Kuber wAit Yakobus ysya Yohanes mari bo weto to tibyo ana kmo mawe,
Nyõ nawe amu nbis tafoh mbam ayoh mroh mait raa weto fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus siur ymat ana tna yastako ana yawe, “Nno feto ma!”
Tna ana masen mamoʼt remo roto.
Yesus ysya kuber wAit kro iso sau mamo. Tna raa sait yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Wore Nyõ namo woyõ-woya sai to, jõ ksoh kro Nyõ bmo ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait retait yawe, “Mtah
to, ja mabum mam wafyoh rau. Tna ruu to, ja mabum mam tafat rau ye. Menohe Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ fi, wore tjin aro fee. Soh nyõ nawe kro Jõ to, kbe wore nyõ njin aro fee ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa roto sait yawe, “Nasen nama kro Jõ.” Menohe raa retait yawe,
nbis jõ tamo wia sama hai ro taja tna fo tama kro Nyõ.”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Namo ma. Ana ro wase Allah to, kbe mesait sama hai wana rof. Jõ ksoh nyõ nasen namo nkyas bo kʼraa. Nkyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit.”
Raa roto sait yawe, “Jõ tawe tama kro Nyõ menohe nbis jõ tamo tmah meen kʼraa wojõ wia.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret sau yawe, “Raa sait yasen yabah tabam mam ora rait mkah
Yamo, yamo betruk

reto, menohe ymat matim fee, haberek ye ymat mam tis. Tibyo yabah tabam reto kaket fee. Feto ye, raa baro mawe masen mkah bo mam armato ro Allah rAit. Mkah bo menohe haberek me mmat tis. Ana weto to, siwyan mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee.”
Tna fo Yesus ysok raa mabo 70 naut. Ait ybis ana mamoʼt
msya remo wore kbe Ait yamo. Yawe ana mabo ewok-ewok matim wia.

Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa makin weto mfi armato ro manes oh. Menohe raa ro matu bo to, mabo kebet baro sai; mnan fee. Feto to, nyoh kʼAllah ro armato rAit afo re Ait ybis raa mama matu bo mam armato reto.
Nsen nmo. Tna nnaut oh: Anu fo raa ro nhaf sneh. Tna Jõ tbis anu nmo mam wore wo raa ro mimara mboh mhau. Anu nfi
maku ro mamo mam wore wo mtah
ja mhau.
Nmo to nbo surah wiak ma. Tna krek yume ro nfau bo to ma. Nbo
roto to ma ye. Tna ati ro anu nmo to, nros iti-iti to ma.”
“Ati ro anu twok mam samu sau to, nmah meen kʼraa ro mhau mam samu reto nwe, ‘Riof oh kʼanu beta.’
Soh raa ro amah rait reto to, yawe yari riof ro anu nmah to, kbe Allah yno riof kʼait. Soh mfe to, kbe Allah yno riof reto mhau kʼait fee, riof reto hah me mama mhau kʼanu u.

Tna nhau mam amah reto sai aran. Nsen satoh nmoʼt amah roto ma. Nnaut: Raa ro mkah kahren raa to, kbe raa moo boren maren ana tu oh. Wore wo anu nhau mam samu reto tna nkah bo ro Allah rAit to, bo sohmaam ro anu sohmaam to mfi boren ro raa maren anu to. Feto to nsohmaam oh.

Ati ro anu ntwok mam remo sau to, soh raa ro remo reto masen mitrah amah wana kʼanu to, tna moo boit mee kʼanu niit to, tawe niit boit bawya ro ana moo mee kʼanu niit to. Tna nta aya ro ana moo mee kʼanu nta.
Tna nisoh kiyam wana moof mam remo reto ye. Tna nwe kʼana nwe, ‘Allah siwyan yamo
ytu raa wAit mama ybo fo.’
Menohe ati ro anu twok mam remo sau to, tna soh raa ro remo reto mikyak anu to, hah ne nmo mam iso tna nisbas bohasyaf ro mbam remo rana to akus. Tna nwe,

‘Amu bes-baas koh ro mhau mrat kʼamu naa. Amu nno feto afo re anu nhar nwe amu nbes-baas anu akus. Anu hawe bo nri bo ro amu nkyas fee. Feto tibyo anu nesait oh mi nisti kair ro meen mama mai kʼanu.’ Nnaut: ‘Allah siwyan yama yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. He mfe, anu nhawe Ait ybo anu.’”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa wAit weto yawe, “Meen ati ro tabam refo haberek to, kbe Allah ymat raa ro tiwya mhau mam
ro Sodom tna yno bo ro maku sai mbtek mai kʼana. Menohe raa ro remo refo tii mikyak anu. Ana hawe bo mari bokyas aJõ. Tibyo bo ro meen mbtek mai kʼana weto to, kbe samyoh toni.”

Tna Ait yastako ana yawe, “Anu raa ro Khorazim nsya raa ro Betsaida: Meen ayoh mroh kʼanu! Tiwya Jõ tno bo ro msai mam remo wanu weto, menohe anu nashana fee. Soh tiwya Jõ tno bo msai weto mam remo ro Tirus msya Sidon maami, raa ro beto mashana mbam iro wana to, bose oh. Tna sraujin tibyo myum ratan ro mjif hai tna mate boh ro tafoh mam mana wana abyõ.
Ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, kbe Ait ymat raa ro mhau mam remo weto tna yawe yno bo maku sai mbtek mai kʼana. Menohe anu nikyak Ait tibyo bo ro kbe meen mbtek mai kʼanu to samyoh toni!
Tna anu ro nhau mam remo ro Kapernaum nnaut nwe meen anu beta nmoʼt sawro ro Allah rAit. He mfe, kbe meen anu nmoʼt sawro ro kabes!”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa wAit weto yawe, “Soh raa mari bo ro anu nwe to, ana weto mari Jõ ye oh meto. Tna raa ro mikyak anu to, ana mikyak Jõ ye oh meto. Tna raa ro mikyak Jõ to, ana mikyak bi Ait ro ybis Jõ tama ye oh meto.”
Ana mabo 70 weto mamoʼt
msya remo sor tna hah mamo mo kʼYesus. Ana simaut toni tna mawe,
soh amu nikyak kabes mkah nyõ nasom anyõ, mkah tak aNyõ to, kabes weto beta mari oh ye tna msam!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ae, Jõ tmat kabes yabi (Iblis) ybam ayoh uu mbtek mnan fi rir ro mrir mbam ayoh uu!
Nnaut oh: Jõ tsan tatak aJõ kʼanu afo re anu ntak nber aban msya taitbai ye. Tna bo weto aro kbe sikowah anu fee. Tna kbe anu nros ntak abyõ kabes yabi (Iblis) ye. Tna ana aro kbe sikowah anu fee.
Anu ntak nikyak kabes weto, menohe simaut bo weto toni to ma. Tawe nsom wanu to Allah ykom mam sawro rAit oh. Kbe anu nhau nsya Ait su mam beto. Au oh meto nsimaut toni oh!”
Tna ati reto ye to, Har ro
mno re Yesus yesait simaut mase. Tna Ait skabuk kʼAllah yawe, “Taja, Nyõ fi

ro nase. Nyõ to, nbo sawro aNyõ msya tabam refo ye. Tna Nyõ nmyõt bo aro re raa wase maja wau weto. Bo wefo fo, raa ro ja mhar bo to, ro mkom bo to, ana srau fee. Menohe bo wefo to, nyõ nerif kʼraa kinyah re ana mhar tna srau ye. Feto to, tayoh asik mase kʼNyõ. Taja; Nyõ nhar bo Nyõ oh. Tna ja nno bo ro Nyõ nhaf mnan sai.”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa wAit weto yawe, “Bombra beta to, Taja ysan kʼJõ tatem tbo oh. Raa wase Jõ. Taja yesait aran yhar Jõ. Tna raa wase Taja ye. Jõ tesait thar Ait. Tna raa ro Jõ tsok to, tkyas kʼana weto re kbe mhar bi Ait ye.”
Tna Yesus ymat kuber wAit tna yawe kʼana mesait aran yawe,
yno bo ro moof kʼanu to. Ait yno re anu nmat bombra wefo to.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: Tiwya
ro Allah ybis mama msya
to, mawat mhaf miyoh bo. Mhaf miyoh bo mawe mmat bo ro anu nmat wefo ye, he mfe. Tna ana mhaf miyoh mari bo ro anu nri wefo ye, he mfe ye.”
Ti sau to,
sait yasen yros tna sanet Yesus yawe, “Kbe jõ tno bo bawya re kbe thau hame wajin?”
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼait yawe, “Watum ro Musa mkyas mawe bawya? Nyõ nmat bokom reto to, nnaut nawe fyi?”
retait yawe,
“Nhafri
Allah ranu mkah nhaf, srau ranu beta, mkah ntak ranu beta, tna mkah bohar ranu beta ye.
Ulangan 6:5
Tna nhafri raa ro mhau kene msya anu to ye. Nhafri ana mnan fi anu nhafri netsu wanu nesait ai to.”
Imamat 19:18
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bokyas anyõ to moof mnan si! Soh nyõ nno bo weto kaket to, kbe meen nyõ nhau hame wajin.”
Menohe
retait ksoh yawe raa mmat ait. Tibyo beroh ytu u yawe, “Raa ro mhau kene msya anu to; awya sor meto?”

Tna Yesus betoo yawe, “Raa sait ybam Yerusalem yroh yamoʼt Yerikho. Yamo mam iso maka kri-kri fo, raa ro marmtuk mfot ait mai. Tna ana mtak ratan msya bo wait beta. Tna ana sikba ait akus. Tibyo ait ykah yaaf bris akus kene wo yajat.
Yhau baro tna
ro
Yahudi sait yama mam iso reto ye. Tna ait ymat ait ro riwai raa mai retait bris. Menohe
refi yatmof raa retait fee. Ait beroh yiwrek yamo sai tna sikba raa retait akus.
Tna raa Yahudi roto sait ybam raa mana ro Lewi yama ye mam iso reto. Yama tna ymat raa retait. Menohe yatmof raa retait ye fee. Ait beroh yiwrek sikba raa retait akus ye.
Tna fo raa roto ro ybam Samaria sait yama mam iso reto ye. Ait ymat raa retait, tibyo ait yrok sraujin tna yatmof raa retait.
Ait yama ymat sas raa refi yetsu o yaaf bo. Tna yoo
msya
maya karu yaaf wait weto. Tna yoo bo sro tna yake yaaf wait ye. Tna raa ro Samaria retait tubat raa ro ykai bo retait yse abyõ mam
rait tna yasyõ yamoʼt
sau. Tna yisoh ait kaket mam beto.
Tna rabu ti fo ait yoo pitis
trion ewok, tna yaren bi ro
retait tna yawe, ‘Nisoh kmot ait ro ykai bo refi kaket. Soh pitis weto mkak to, kbe jõ thah tama tisroh mabyoh wonyõ u.’”
Tna Yesus ytu bo
retait yawe, “Bonaut anyõ to nawe fyi? Ana mabo tuuf refo to, awya ro oh mi yno bo moof kʼraa ro tiwya raa mtak bo wait retait?”
yawe, “Ait ro yatmof raa retait, tna yisoh raa retait ye. Ait oh mi yhafri raa anya ye.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Namo tna nno mnan anya mfi ait yno feto ye.”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit mamo renti tna snok mam remo sau. Tna fai sau masom Marta mmen Yesus ysya kuber wAit mama mhau mam amah rau.
Marta to mao sau masom Maria. Maria au hre mte kait msya Yesus mawe mari bokyas rAit.
Menohe Marta to msui toni siwyan boit ro kʼana. Srau rau to makin-akan. Tna au mamo mo kʼYesus mawe,
Nyõ sayõ jõ tesait sui tno bo beta a? Tna Maria mabo hre sai a? Nbis au mama mbet jõ ye re!”
Yesus yawe, “Marta, nyõ nnaut yyi bo aro rau-rau sai.
Menohe bo ro ati to sau aran. Nao Maria, au fo msok bo ro ati mefo: Au ksoh hre mari bokyas aJõ. Jõ aro tawe wa kʼau fee.”
Mun sau Yesus skabuk. Ait skabuk mkak tna kuber rAit sait yawe,
tiwya Yohanes yerif kuber wait re ana mhar bo skabuk. Sgi nerif iso ro skabuk kʼamu ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh anu skabuk to, nwe fefo:
‘Taja, nno re kbe raa mari tibyo bibi Nyõ nasom aNyõ. Nasen nama namo
tna nbo raa woNyõ.
Ifo yoyo to, amu nyoh boit mbam kʼNyõ natem aNyõ re boit wamu to mabut fee.
Amu ja ne nhaf moof nsya raa anya ro mno bo ro mkair mai kʼamu. Feto to nyon iro wamu sor ye. Tna nitsre amu re bosanet aro besruf amu to ma.’”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Mti arin masuf tna bi sait ro ybam remo ro fari yama snok mam remo sau. Tna bi ait yamo yo kʼyafoh rait sait ro yhau mam remo reto yawe, ‘Tao, mti refo jõ tjin tsya nyõ.’ Yafoh retait yawe, ‘Jõ ksoh nyõ njin mam befo fea!’ Menohe ait ynaut yyi, yhar yawe boit marak. Tibyo ait yasen yamo yo kʼyafoh rait ro yhau kene mam amah rait. Yamo yayoh
mabuf tuuf.
Yamo menohe yafoh rait yjin oh. Tibyo raa retait yawe, ‘Nasen natmof jõ oh: Riwai tafoh ajõ sait ybam fari yama yjin ysya jõ, menohe boit ro jõ tee kʼait yait aro fee!’
Yayoh feto menohe yafoh rait yasen yitrah mato rait fee. Yawe, ‘Namo oh! Amah mato ajõ tuut oh, tna jõ tsya kukek wojõ beta njin oh! Jõ tasen too bo weto tee kʼnyõ fee!’”

Tna Yesus yawe kuber wait yawe, “Yafoh ro yama yti raa retait mam arin masuf tait yafoh rait fea. Menohe ait ro yjin oh hawe bo yasen yoo bo yee. Tna tis rau ait yasen tna yoo bo ye. Yafoh retait beroh sai yayoh. Au oh mi raa retait yasen yoo bawya ro yayoh to yee.
Reto oh mi Jõ tawe, ‘Nyoh bo kʼAllah tna kbe Ait yoo bo yee. Saso bo tna kbe ntru bo reto. Nii mato tna kbe mato reto Allah yitrah.
Awya sai ro yayoh bo kʼAllah to, kbe Allah yoo yee. Awya sai ro saso bo to, kbe tru tu oh. Tna ro yai mato to, kbe Allah yitrah mato reto ye oh.’
Mfi bo ku sait yawia yabo syoh to, kbe yaja yoo aban yee fee.
Mfi bo ku retait yawia ruu mauf yait to, kbe yaja yoo taitbai yee fee.

Anu raa fo nimara mboh. Menohe anu nksoh noo bo ro moof nee ku wanu. Tna Nja ranu ro yhau mam sawro rAit to, ksoh yoo bo ro moof toni yee kʼanu ye. Soh raa mayoh kʼAit to, kbe Ait ksoh yoo Har rAit yee kʼana ye fea!”
Ati sau to, Yesus yikyak kabes frok mbam raa ro ymai marak. Kabes reto frok tna raa retait yrok ymai. Raa mawat mmat tibyo mrok ktak.
Menohe raa taro mawe, “Aha! Yesus yatak yikyak kabes sor fo, mkah tak ro kabes Beelzebul
rait. Kabes Beelzebul retait ja ybo kabes sor.”
Raa taro sanet Yesus mawe yno bo msai aro re kbe ana mmat. Mmat tibyo ana mhar mawe Ait ybam kʼAllah yama fe mfe a.
Menohe Yesus yhar bonaut wana weto, tna Ait yawe, “Soh
ro rabin sait ybo raa wait menohe mafa anya ai to, kbe rabin reto mnah. Tna raa ro mhau mam amah sau su to, soh ana mafa anya ai to, kbe ana matak fee ye.
Anu taro nwe Jõ tikyak kabes sor mkah tak ro kabes Beelzebul. Fyi? Kabes yabi (Iblis) yamo
ybo kabes taro sor. Tna soh kabes weto mafa anya ai to, kbe rabin ro kabes yabi yamo
ybo to mros matak fee.

Anu nwe Jõ tikyak kabes sor mkah tak ro kabes Beelzebul. Menohe kuber wanu ja mikyak kabes ye. Tibyo anu nnaut nwe ja kuber wanu mikyak kabes mkah matak ro awya rait? Tnaut tawe kuber wanu mesait kbe mawe bonaut ranu reto to sre.
Allah oh mi yoo yatak rAit yee kʼJõ. Tibyo Jõ tikyak kabes frok to. Feto to, Allah ybis Jõ tama tbo raa mana rAit to.
Jõ fret bo tawe, ‘Soh raa ro yatak sait ybo sbe wait tna yhau kmot amah rait to, kbe raa aro ter-ter mama mtak kta wait to fee.
Menohe mfi bo raa ro byoh yama to, soh byoh retait yatak toni to, kbe ytak sbe raa retait wait msya kta wait saah. Yoo kta weto tna ysaim kʼawya ro ait ksoh.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Awya sai ro hawe ysya Jõ nkah bo su to, ait retait ytoh Jõ. Tna awya sai ro hawe ysya Jõ ymen raa mama mo kʼAllah to, ait retait yfi raa ro yikyak raa somya ha-hayah.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Ati ro raa mikyak kabes frok mbam raa sait mamo to, kabes reto mamo ninya. Mamo ninya mam wore wo aya aro fee. Mawe sne hoh menohe kabes reto fri yuk ro moof aro fee. Tibyo kabes reto mnaut mawe, ‘Jõ thah te tamoʼt yuk ajõ ro wia rof, ro tiwya jõ sikba akus.’
Tna kabes hah me snok mam yuk reto. Tna mmat he yuk reto raa misoh moof ati.

Feto tna kabes reto mawe hah mamo mhau. Tna mmen mafoh na mabo trion krema mama mhau msya au ye. Kabes trion krema weto to ja mno bo ro mkair-kar toni miwer kabes ro tinyi reto. Tna ana mama twok raa retait beta ye. Tna kbe ana mno ait refi ykair toni yiwrek bo ro tiwya ait ykai wia ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo reto to si fo, tna fai sau mtu mkah mai ro fari mawe, “Allah yno bo moof kʼfai au ro mabe Nyõ tna moo sis mee kʼNyõ nait!”
Menohe Yesus yawe si yawe, “Allah yno bo moof toni kʼraa ro mari bokyas rAit tna mbo mno kaket to.”

Raa mawat mama sifut kʼYesus. Tna Ait ykyas bo renti yawe, “Anu raa mana ro mfo nhau mam tabam refo fo, anu ja nber safo wofo. Anu nwe Jõ tno bo msai aro re kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ tbam kʼAllah tama fe mfe a. Menohe Jõ kbe tno bo myoh sau aran sai re anu nmat tna nhar: Kbe anu nmat bo msai sau ro mnan fi tiwya Allah yno mkah
Yunus sai.
Nnaut: Tiwya

Yunus yamoʼt Niniwe. Tna Allah yno bo msai re raa ro Niniwe mhar mawe Allah oh mi ybis Yunus yama. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna kbe Allah yno bo msai ro mnan anya afo re anu nhar nwe Allah oh mi ybis Jõ tama ye.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, tii ana ro mhau mam
ro Niniwe weto to, mari bo ro
Yunus ykyas. Mari tibyo mashana. Mfo refo Raa ro yase yiwer Yunus tait yros susai ysya anu. Menohe anu fo hawe bo nashana. Meen, ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, kbe raa ro tiwya mhau mam
ro Niniwe to, msya anu ye mrok masen. Tna ana kbe masen mmit safo kʼanu raa ro nhau mfo wefo. Tiwya fnya manes
sau mhau mam rabin ro ati ti wayir sau.
Tna au mbam rabin ro fari reto masen mamo mo
Salomo mawe mari bokyas rait.

retait tait raa ro yhar bo toni. Mfo refo Raa sait ro yase yiwer Salomo retait yros susai ysya anu. Menohe anu hawe bo nri bokyas rAit. Feto to meen fai au reto kbe masen mmit safo kʼanu raa ro nhau mfo wefo. Meen ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, fai au msya anu ye kbe mrok masen. Tna fai au mmit safo kʼanu.”
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, tii ana ro mhau mam
ro Niniwe weto to, mari bo ro
Yunus ykyas. Mari tibyo mashana. Mfo refo Raa ro yase yiwer Yunus tait yros susai ysya anu. Menohe anu fo hawe bo nashana. Meen, ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, kbe raa ro tiwya mhau mam
ro Niniwe to, msya anu ye mrok masen. Tna ana kbe masen mmit safo kʼanu raa ro nhau mfo wefo. Tiwya fnya manes
sau mhau mam rabin ro ati ti wayir sau.
Tna au mbam rabin ro fari reto masen mamo mo
Salomo mawe mari bokyas rait.

retait tait raa ro yhar bo toni. Mfo refo Raa sait ro yase yiwer Salomo retait yros susai ysya anu. Menohe anu hawe bo nri bokyas rAit. Feto to meen fai au reto kbe masen mmit safo kʼanu raa ro nhau mfo wefo. Meen ati ro
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, fai au msya anu ye kbe mrok masen. Tna fai au mmit safo kʼanu.”
“Ja raa mbet tafoh
afo re ntara raa ro twok mam amah mato. Ja raa mmyõt tafoh fee. Raa moo mse mte tna moo
burut wa fee ye. Menohe tafoh reto to, ja raa hero abyõ afo re kbe kek ntara tna raa ro mama twok mam amah mato reto mmat.
Anu nsu wanu to, mfi tafoh ro ntara anu oh meto. Soh nsu moof to, mno netsu wanu mram. Tibyo nsu maah ye. Tna soh nsu wanu mti to, anu nhau mam mamur sai.
Feto to, kaket anu re kek ro mhau mam kʼanu to mait mram kaket. Mram kaket afo re anu nmo mam mamur to ma.
Soh anu netsu wanu mamur aro fee, tna anu nsu maah to, kbe anu nmat kek ro ati, tibyo mno anu nhau mam wore wo maah.”
Yesus ykyas bo reto mkak tna raa ro
sait ymen Ait yamo yait boit mam amah rait. Tna Yesus yamo yait boit mam beto.
Raa ro
retait ymat he Yesus yno bo mafa raa ro
Yahudi to wia fee; mi yyon yatem wia fee menohe hre yait boit sai. Mmat tibyo ana mrok ktak mawe, “Yesus; Nyõ nait boit to, nyon natem wia fea!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Hawereh msya
to, anu raa ro
ja nyon moof mne sai kaket. Menohe mato rau to mkair fares. Anu nwe anu nhaf wanu moof oh, menohe ja anu safto bo raa tna nno bo mkair-kar toni fares.
Anu wase bo! Allah yfen raa msya
to, mne sai fee! Allah yfen mato wau weto ye!
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe natmof raa kinyah ro suawe. Tna nsan boit mam
wanu kʼana ye. Nno feto tna bo bawya ro anu nno to, kbe mrok moof mnan si bo ro Allah oh meto ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa ro
weto yawe, “anu fo raa ro sioh anu sai. Anu ja ksoh noo bouum ro tinyi
ro mbam armato wanu to, nsan kʼAllah. Ja anu noo bo knik-knak mnan fi

msya bo taro sor ro maku nsan ye to. Menohe anu niwana bo ro ati sor ro Allah yawe: Ja anu nno bo ro moof kʼraa kaket fee. Tna anu hafri Allah kaket fee ye! Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh. Rau ro moof to, anu nsan bouum ro tinyi wanu kʼAllah ye tna nno bo ro moof kʼraa ye, tna nhafri Allah kaket ye.
Ati ro anu nmoʼt samu watum to, ja anu ksoh hre mam ambar raa ro mase ja hre. Tna ati ro anu nmoʼt
to anu ksoh raa roto mmat anu tna mmah meen kʼanu tna hartu anu ye. Feto to meen bo ro mkair mama mai kʼanu.
Soh raa mno
moof fee, kbe raa mber kait-kat sai. Ana wase yuk reto to, hai mhau mam tabam. Tna anu raa ro
fo nfi feto ye. Anu nhaf mato wanu mkair. Menohe raa mmat anu to, ana wase anu nhaf wanu to mkair. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.”
Tna
sait yawe,
nyõ nkyas bokyas weto to, nyõ namus amu wefo ye oh meto!”
Tna Yesus yawe
weto yawe, “Anu ja nbis raa wanu ro Yahudi bno bo ro samyoh toni. Anu bsom bo ro samyoh. Menohe anu ntubat bo weto mati fee. Feto to, meen Allah yno bo ro mkair mama mai kʼanu ye.
Hohos wanu tii mame
na ro Allah ybis mama. Tna raa sama hai ro
weto mam isra mato. Tna anu, ku renti wana ro mame
na weto, ja anu nisoh isra weto. Anu nmo wan-wan oh meto! Nno feto mkyas mawe bo ro hohos wanu mno reto, anu nhaf mnan. Feto to meen Allah yno bo ro mkair mama mai kʼanu.
Hohos wanu tii mame
na ro Allah ybis mama. Tna raa sama hai ro
weto mam isra mato. Tna anu, ku renti wana ro mame
na weto, ja anu nisoh isra weto. Anu nmo wan-wan oh meto! Nno feto mkyas mawe bo ro hohos wanu mno reto, anu nhaf mnan. Feto to meen Allah yno bo ro mkair mama mai kʼanu.
Allah yhar bo rAit. Reto oh mi tiwya ykyas anu yawe, ‘Jõ kbe tbis
woJõ msya raabis
woJõ mamo mo kʼraa ro tabam refo. Tna ana ro Jõ tbis weto to, taro kbe raa mame tna taro kbe raa sikowah ye.’
Allah yno feto afo re anu nsom safo weto.
na ro tiwya Allah ybis mamaʼt tabam refo to, raa mame majat beta. Raa mame menohe meen ymit safo reto kʼanu ro mfo wefo nhau mam tabam refo. Maban tiwya tinyi raa mame
na ro Allah ybis mama: Mbam tinyi wore wo
Habel yhau mamo snok mam ti ro
Zakharia yhau. (Tiwya bi Zakharia retait ykah bo ro Allah kri-kri mam Samu ro Allah jaro msya wohat ro bosan jaro
masuf susai tna raa mame.)
Allah yno feto afo re anu nsom safo weto.
na ro tiwya Allah ybis mamaʼt tabam refo to, raa mame majat beta. Raa mame menohe meen ymit safo reto kʼanu ro mfo wefo nhau mam tabam refo. Maban tiwya tinyi raa mame
na ro Allah ybis mama: Mbam tinyi wore wo
Habel yhau mamo snok mam ti ro
Zakharia yhau. (Tiwya bi Zakharia retait ykah bo ro Allah kri-kri mam Samu ro Allah jaro msya wohat ro bosan jaro
masuf susai tna raa mame.)
Anu
Yahudi: Raa ro tomer mamo mam iso ro moof to, anu, ja nno wa ana weto. Tna anu nesait nmo mam iso ro ati reto ye fee. Feto to, meen kair mama mai kʼanu tu oh.”
Yesus yasen sikba amah reto.
Tna
msya raa ro

weto to, kmo wer. Ana mkyas kair Yesus tna hre su saim bo re kbe ana mtu bo aro rau mamo mam tite re sanet Ait. Ati ro ana mmat Ait u to, ana mtu bo bawya ro samyoh aro kʼAit. Ana mnaut mawe kbe Yesus ytu si bo ro mkair aro tibyo, mno re kbe raa kmo Ait.
Yesus yasen sikba amah reto.
Tna
msya raa ro

weto to, kmo wer. Ana mkyas kair Yesus tna hre su saim bo re kbe ana mtu bo aro rau mamo mam tite re sanet Ait. Ati ro ana mmat Ait u to, ana mtu bo bawya ro samyoh aro kʼAit. Ana mnaut mawe kbe Yesus ytu si bo ro mkair aro tibyo, mno re kbe raa kmo Ait.
Raa msis-sas toni mama mmat Yesus. Ana myar mama sikait-kat anya. Tna Yesus ykyas bo kuber wAit wia yawe, “Anu kaket anu mkah
raa ro
Ana to, ja sioh-nat ana sai. Ana ja mawe ana mari bokyas ro Allah tna mbo mno, he mfe. Bo ro ana mno reto to, mnan
Ja raa moo
kebet tna srioh msya
Srioh tibyo raa mahni
reto. Tna raa ro
mnaut mawe raa aro wase bo ana mari Allah kaket fee. Mnaut mawe kbe raa wase tna mawe ana raa ro ja sioh-nat to fee.

Soh raa mno bo ro mkair aro, ja ana mber bo reto. Mber afo re raa anya mmat fee tna mhar fee. Menohe bo weto beta meen raa masbrer tu oh. Kbe raa mmat tna mhar. Bo ro raa mmyõt to, meen raa masbrah kʼraa tu oh.
Tna bo ro anu nkyas wore mti wai to, meen hahah baas tu oh. Tna bawya ro anu samoh wai kʼraa to, kbe raa mkyas abyõ kʼraa beta mari ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tafoh woJõ: Soh raa mama mame anu to, waa ma. Raa matak mame anu netsu wanu sai. Tna fo ana matak mno bo aro naut mai kʼanu u fee.
Menohe waa bi Allah. Ait oh mi yatak yame raa. Yatak yame raa tna fo yko mam tafoh ro meen mhau mait hame wajin ye. Feto to waa Ait yesait aran!
Ruu mbas mana maat, raa masim tna mabyoh rau to, pitis mauf ewok aran sai. Ruu mbas to, mabyoh mroh sai menohe Allah Ait sorni mana sau bo fee.
Anu nbyoh ranu to, maut toni miwer ruu mbas mabyoh rau. Feto to waa ma. Tna nna mawyan wanu to, Ait ntuu beta mnan oh. Ait ymat anu kaket. Feto to waa ma.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, hrenaut Jõ ma. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Awya ro ykyas abyõ kʼraa roto yawe, ‘Jõ smot Yesus’ to, kbe meen Jõ tkyas ait abyõ
ro Allah wAit weto. Tawe, ‘Ait retait raa aJõ oh metait.’
Menohe awya ro ywaar Jõ kʼraa roto yawe, ‘Jõ smot Yesus fee’, meen Jõ twaar ait ye. Kbe tkyas
sor tawe, ‘Raa retait tait raa aJõ metait fee.’
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Awya ro yamus Jõ to, Allah yyon iro rait reto saah. Menohe awya ro yamus Har ro Allah to, kbe Allah yyon iro rait reto fee yum.
Anu smot nwe Jõ tbam Allah tama. Smot feto tibyo meen raa kmo anu, mawe anu nber safo oh meto. Kbe raa makah anu mamoʼt samu watum ro
mo kʼraa manes mam beto. Soh mfe ana makah anu mamo mo kʼraa ro
Kbe ana mkyas bo maun anu to. Tna ati ro anu saak wa anu to, anu waa ma.
Mam ati reto to, Har ro
mesait kbe mbesi bokyas ro anu nkyas reto.”
Raa makin mros mari bokyas ro Yesus mam beto. Tna raa sait yawe kʼYesus yawe,
: Amu nja yhai kba amu. Nbis tao ajõ saim kta baro kʼjõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Jõ raa ro tros susai anu mbewok to fee. Jõ tamo
ro tmat sas bo ranu mbewok to fee ye.”
Tna yawe kʼraa makin yawe, “Nasmamo nme kta ma. Pitis msya bo bawya sor ro raa mse to, bo ro ati meto fee. Nnaut namos anyõ. Bo ro ati oh meto.”
Tna Yesus fret bo yawe, “Bobot sait ruf wait bombra mninon.
Bo wait mninon oh tna ynaut yawe,
ro tse bo mawat refo mnan fee. Kbe tno fyi mefo?’
Bobot retait hre ynaut. Tna yawe, ‘Kbe tno fefo: Tbis raa mama mitrah
wojõ ro maku, tna sgi
sau ro mase renti. Tna kbe tbu
msya bo satoh wojõ beta mam
reto.
Tna
ro meen mama to, jõ thau baas sai. Jõ tse bo beta ro moof mninon oh. Kbe mhau bau masno snyi. Mfo refo thau tjin tna tasen sai. Thau sohmaam bo sai bojõ. Tna thau simaut mase sai!’
Menohe Allah ymat bobot retait yawe, ‘Nyõ wase bo! Mti refo Jõ too namos anyõ. Tna kta ro name reto to, kbe nyõ nuumto kʼawya yhaf yse riryõn?’
Raa ro ja tomer mame kta mam tabam refo, menohe ana tomer miranya msya Allah fee; raa weto to wase bo.”

Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Reto oh mi tawe kʼanu tawe: ‘Nnaut yyi bo ro tabam refo toni to ma. Nnaut nwe nfos wanu to bo ro ati. Tna nnaut yyi boit ro kbe anu niit to ma. Feto ye, nnaut netsu wanu to, nwe bo ro ati miwer ratan ro anu nyum. Feto tna nnaut yyi ratan ro kbe anu nyum to ma.

Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Reto oh mi tawe kʼanu tawe: ‘Nnaut yyi bo ro tabam refo toni to ma. Nnaut nwe nfos wanu to bo ro ati. Tna nnaut yyi boit ro kbe anu niit to ma. Feto ye, nnaut netsu wanu to, nwe bo ro ati miwer ratan ro anu nyum. Feto tna nnaut yyi ratan ro kbe anu nyum to ma.
Nmat sas ruu ro fru to: Ruu to ja wase bo mkah. Tna wase bo siwyan boit ye. Tna wase sgi
ro moo boit mse ye. Menohe Allah siwyan boit kʼana. Tna anu raa fo, Ait ymat anu kaket miwer ruu to.
Anu nkin wefo fo, awya ro ytai yirenti yamos rait kebet naut? Nnaut yyi bo ro tabam refo yoyo, he mfe. Allah oh mi Raa ro ybo anu nmos wanu. Allah yesait aran ytai yirenti mamos raa to.
Raa mnaut yyi mamos wana mam tabam refo to, tna tis rau bonaut yyi mirenti mamos rana fee. Feto to nnaut yyi boit ro kbe anu niit msya ratan ro anu nyum to ma: Mafer marak.
Nmat sas bosafom ro moo mam smok. Tafuf wau weto mesait moo sai. Tafuf weto mur-mur saso boit fee. Bosafom to ja msui mfen ratan ro myum to fee. Menohe Allah yno bo weto moof toni. Tiwya
Salomo yyum ratan ro moof wer. Menohe Allah yno ara tafuf weto moof toni miwer.
Salomo, ratan rait moof mfi bosafom tafuf wau to fee.

Allah yno re bosafom ro moo mam smok ifo moo boti waor sai. Menrabu to, raa mama mkah mkak. Mhau boti waor sai, menohe Allah fayir bosafom reto. Ait yno tafuf rau moof toni. Tawe, Allah ymat anu tna ksoh anu toni miwer bosafom reto. Feto to nnaut yyi ratan ro anu nyum to ma. Anu ja smot Allah kaket fee!
Nnaut yyi boit ro niit ma! Nnaut yyi aya ro nta ma! Nnaut yyi bombra weto ma!
Raa ro wase Allah mam tabam refo to, msui saso bo weto beta. Menohe anu fo ku ro Allah yare oh. Ait yhar bombra beta ro anu nnaut weto.
Feto to, ntomer re Allah yamo
ybo anu to. Saso bi Ait wia matim feto, tibyo bo ro anu nnaut weto to, kbe Allah yoo ysan kʼanu.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu fo nfi
woJõ ro tira. Anu nbo kebet sai; nwat to fee. Menohe waa ma. Nja ranu ksoh yoo anu yse mam sawro ro Ait yamo
ybo.

Nsim kta wanu tna noo mabyoh rau to, nsaim kʼraa kinyah ro suawe. Kta ro tabam refo kbe msaef marak. Soh anu nmat raa ro mse bo mabut to, tna natmof ana to, anu nme kta ro ati oh meto. Anu nme kta ro ati mam sawro ro Allah oh meto. Nno feto to, mnan fi anu nfau kta wanu mam surah wiak ro matak. Mam surah wiak reto kta wanu weto meen mkak fee, mhau mawyõs. Kta weto kbe raa msyõf fee, kbe bo mabat fee.
Soh anu nme kta wanu mam tabam refo fo, kbe nhaf wanu mnaut kta weto sai. Menohe soh anu nme kta wanu mam sawro ro Allah to, kbe anu nhaf nnaut sawro rAit yoyo ye.”
Tna Yesus fret bo yawe, “Bobot sait yamo yayõ boyõ mam tabam ro fari. Tna sryan wait mhau siwyan bobot retait hah yama: Ana mhau mwan, myum ratan wana fares, tna mbet

oh. Mhau tna bobot retait hah yamaʼt amah rait. Yama tna ymat he sryan weto, ana siwyan ana wea tna huwya mitrah mato re ait twok.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Kbe meen Jõ hah tama u. Feto to rabu wawa nhau siwyan anu nfi sryan weto.
Tna Yesus fret bo yawe, “Bobot sait yamo yayõ boyõ mam tabam ro fari. Tna sryan wait mhau siwyan bobot retait hah yama: Ana mhau mwan, myum ratan wana fares, tna mbet

oh. Mhau tna bobot retait hah yamaʼt amah rait. Yama tna ymat he sryan weto, ana siwyan ana wea tna huwya mitrah mato re ait twok.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Kbe meen Jõ hah tama u. Feto to rabu wawa nhau siwyan anu nfi sryan weto.

Nnaut: Soh Bobot sait yama tna ymat he sryan wAit mros wea ste Ait yama; feto moof. Kbe ana simaut. Meen Bobot retait yesait yawe ana hre wia. Tna siwyan Ait, tna yesait yasyõ boit yama saim kʼana mait.
Mfi bo Bobot hah yama arin masuf, soh mfe kene wo reen to, tna soh ait ymat he sryan wAit mhau mwan fares; feto moof.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Nnaut bofret refo kaket wia: Bi sait yhar yawe, ‘Mti fo, kbe ait ro ysyõf bo yama yitrah amah ajõ tna ysyõf bo.’ Soh ait yhar ayõ ro ait ro ysyõf bo retait ysaim yama to, kbe ait yjin fee. Yhau wan afo re raa msyõf bo wait fee.
'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' kbe meen yama u. Kbe hah yama u mam ayõ ro anu nhar wia nwof Ait to fee. Feto to nhau siwyan yoyo.”
Tna Petrus ytu bo yawe,
bokyas refo, Nyõ nkyas kʼamu nesait aran sai fe nkyas kʼraa beta a?”

yawe, “Bo refo tkyas kʼawya sai ro yamo sryan ro mur-mur yno bo ro Allah yawe, tna ro yhar bo ye. Mfi bo bobot sait yawe yamoʼt oo roto. Ait ysok sryan wait sait yhau tna yno bo rait mam wore wo ait yarak wia. Ybis sryan retait yamo aban mana ybo sryan wait roto taro. Tna ybis sryan retait yoo boit saim kʼsrian anya wait roto taro ye. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto.
Tna ati ro bobot retait yhah ye yama to, soh ait ymat aban mana retait ja yno bo rait ro ybis kaket to, feto moof.
Nri kaket: Kbe bobot ysok sryan ro yari bo ro ait yawe retait yse kmot bombra wait beta.

Menohe mfi bo sryan ro yamo aban mana retait tait yhaf rait mkair. Tna ynaut yawe, ‘Bobot ajõ yarak, kbe yhah yama fooh fee.’ Tibyo ait yno bo ro mkair: Ait yai sryan ro kinyah taro. Yai ro ano msya ro sme ye. Tna yasmamo yait boit, yata aya, tibyo bisir yoyo.

Kbe bobot rait snok yama. Yama mam ayõ ro sryan ro yamo aban mana retait siwyan fee. Bobot rait snok yama tna ymat bo mkair ro sryan retait yno. Tibyo bobot retait kmo. Kbe ait simoyot-mayat sryan retait. Tna ybis ait yamo yhau mam yuk ro kair ysya raa ro ja hawe mari Allah.
Tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Sryan ro yhar bonaut ro bobot rAit, he beswan yno fee, tna siwyan fee, kbe bobot retait kmo yahoh ait.

Menohe sryan ro wase bonaut ro bobot rAit, tibyo yno bo rait kaket fee, tna siwyan fee; kbe bobot retait mok-mak ait kebet sai. Soh Allah yoo bo kebet sai yee kʼraa sait to, Ait ybis yawe raa retait yisoh bo weto tna mno bo kebet sai ye. Tna soh Allah yoo bo bombra mawat yee kʼraa taro, ybis raa retait yisoh bo weto tna yno bo mawat miwer ait ro yse bo kebet sai.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ tama tawe too tafoh beak mroh mam tabam refo mait mawyah. Moof ati soh tafoh reto mait mawyah oh!
Menohe tako hawe sai, meen raa mame Jõ tajat mam ara warok wia. Tna Jõ thaf aya mamo snok bo reto mkak oh!
Anu nnaut nwe Jõ tama re tisoh iranya raa msya raa anya fe mfe a? Mfe, Jõ tama tibyo raa taro mawe ana mban Jõ. Tna raa taro mamo byoh kʼJõ. Tisti fa meto.
Tama tibyo raa mabo maat ro mhau mam samu su to, mabo tuuf mban Jõ tna mabo ewok mamo byoh kʼJõ. Tibyo mafa anya. Soh mfe; mabo ewok mban Jõ tna mabo tuuf mamo byoh kʼJõ.

Kbe raa mafa anya: Ku ro sme yasen yafa ysya yaja. Tna yaja yasen yafa ysya ku ro sme rait retait. Tna ro ano mafa msya mme. Tna mme masen mafa msya ku rau reto. Tna fnya mafa msya snyim ro ano, tna fnya snyim ro ano mafa msya fnya ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa msis fo yawe, “Anu nmat barmabyõ safe mam ati ro habeh to, ja anu nhar nwe, ‘Kbe oom mais.’ Tna kbe oom mais tu oh.
Tna soh foos mfi mama mbam ti wayir to, anu nwe, ‘Ifo fo hwyõm.’ Tna kbe hwyõm tu oh.
Anu nwe anu raa ro nhar bo. Menohe anu fo raa ro nmo wan-wan sai! Anu nhar bo ro tabam msya bo ro mhau mam ayoh. Menohe bo ro Allah yno mam oon refo to, fyi re anu wase fares.
Ja anu nmat sas tna nnaut bo mam nhaf mato. Fyi oh mi anu nesait nnaut nwe bo reto moof soh mfe mkair a?

Mfi bo anu sait nsya raa sait kmo anya. Tna anu mbewok nmoʼt amah ro raa mtu srah to, rau ro moof to, anu mbewok nisoh niranya tna nfot ntem anya mam iso maka. Soh mfe to, kbe sait yamo ysan sait kʼraa manes re mkyas safo reto. Tna fo raa manes mbis anu nmo no kʼait ro ytu srah yari. Tna fo bi ait ysan anu renti kʼait ro ja ybu raa mam
mato.
Tna anu sait raa mbu mam
mato mamo snok mam ayõ ro ait hrat bo raa ska wia. Tna fo ait frok ybam
mato reto.”
⌞Tiwya raa ro
Yahudi baro mbam
ro Galilea mamoʼt Yerusalem skabuk Allah. Ana moo
wana ro kbe msan to, mbo mamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Mamoʼt Samu ro Allah ktan
weto msan kʼAllah. Ana msan bosan wana weto kʼAllah kri-kri fo menohe raa sbe mama mame ana.
Pilatus
ybis tibyo raa sbe wait weto masen mamo mame ana.⌟ Raa mabo baro mari bokyas reto tna mkyas kʼYesus.
Yesus yari feto tna ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Anu nnaut nwe fyi? Ana weto to, raa mame majat, tna Allah ymat sayõ rof sai, fyi? Iro wana mawat miwer raa roto mbam Galilea oh mi ana raa mame meto a?
Mfe. Iro ro ana mno oh mi misti kair reto mai kʼana to fee. Menohe soh anu nashana fee tna nhai to, kbe
yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu mfi ymit kʼana weto ye.
Tiwya
ro miyõ mam koot
ro Siloam matu mai raa mabo 18 majat. Anu nnaut nwe fyi? Ana weto to, mno iro mawat miwer raa roto beta ro mhau mam Yerusalem a?
Mfe. Iro wana oh mi misti kair reto mai kʼana to fee. Menohe soh anu nashana fee tna nhai to, kbe
yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu ye.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret yawe, “Ara mara sau
moo mam tain
ro bi sait rait yno. Tna mun sau ait yamo saso make rau mam mara. Menohe ait ykai kake reto make aro fee.
Tibyo yawe kʼait ro kmot tain reto yawe,
tuuf oh mi jõ tama saso ara refo make. Menohe jõ fri make aro fee! Feto to jõ tawe nyõ nfat makus sai. Mhau mros mati sai mam tain refo mkah bawya?’
Menohe ait ro kmot tain reto yawe, ‘Mhau ruman
sau naut wia. Kbe jõ tabah koh aro tber mair tna too boh aro bo beak ye.
Tna kbe
rouu make ye. Soh
rouu mawe make fee, feto to nyõ nbis jõ tfat makus rof.’”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
sau to, Yesus watum bo mam samu watum ro
Yahudi sau.
Fai sau ro kabes sariya re kiyam
trion 18 oh to mama ye. Kabes reto mno tibyo fai reto kbor maka. Tna mros trot fee.
Yesus ymat fai au refo tna ytu au mama. Tna yawe, “Tme, kiyam anyõ reto tno marak oh.”
Tna yoo yatem yse kʼfai au abyõ si fo au mrok mros trot ye. Tna au masen mbaut Allah.
Bi yabi ro ybo samu watum reto ymat bo ro Yesus yno. Ynaut yawe Yesus yisoh raa ro kiyam mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh

to, yawe Yesus yno iro oh meto. Tibyo ait kmo. Tna yawe kʼraa msis reto yawe, “Ti trion ntamam mkah anu nno bo wanu weto beta. Feto to soh anu aro nksoh nwe raa misoh anu to, nma mam ti makin weto sau. Nma mam ayõ ro raa wanu ntmoh to ma!”
Menohe
yawe kʼbi retait yawe, “Anu fo raa ro sioh-sah sai. Bo ro anu nwe wa to, bo weto anu nesait ja nno! Anu nkin ja skur
wanu ro nsia mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh. Tna anu nkuk nmo nse mata aya fe mfe a!
Tnaut tawe kbe raa mno bo moof kʼfai au refo mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to ye fea! Fai au fo, ku renti ro Abraham ye.
trion 18 oh to, kabes yabi yno au tibyo kiyam to. Fyi, ja raa mikyak kabes frok ye mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, fe mfe a!”
Yesus ykyas bo reto tna raa ro kmo Ait to, mrok hrenaut tibyo saban beta. Menohe raa msis-sas nksoh bo ro Ait yno reto. Mnaut mawe bo ro Ait yno to bo ro msai.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to mnan fi bo bawya?

Mfi bo manaf ro maku sau. Bi sait yoo bo manaf ro maku reto yamo furere mam armato rait reto. Menohe ati ro bo manaf reto moo to, moo maut mfi ara bo feto ye. Tibyo ruu ro mfru mam ayoh to, mama tafat abyõ mam ara reto kre ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to mfi bo bawya?
Reto mnan
Ja fai sau moo
kebet baro, sryoh mam
mawat. Mhau tna kbe
reto mrok mtar mase beta ye.”
Tna Yesus yamo renti mam iso maka, kbe yamoʼt Yerusalem. Yamo mam iso maka to, Ait ykyas bo kʼraa iti mam
msya remo roto taro.
Mam remo sau to, raa sait ytu kʼAit yawe, “Raa kebet sai aran meen mkai riof ro mase fe mfe a?”
Yesus yawe, “Mato sau ro mtit mhau. Ntomer ntwok mam mato ro mtit reto.
Kbe raa msis tomer twok mam mato reto menohe ana mama rere. Tibyo mtai twok fee.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ati ro bi ro amah rait yasen tna yuut mato reto to, meen anu ro nros mam ati ro mato mne to ntu nwe, ‘Bobot
nitrah mato kʼamu!’ Menohe kbe bi ait yawe, ‘Mfe. Jõ wase anu. Anu awya metait?’
Tna anu nwe kʼait nwe, ‘Tiwya amu niit nta nsya nyõ oh. Tna nyõ tiwya nhau iti-iti nkyas bo mam remo wamu ye oh!’
Menohe bi ro amah rait retait kbe haberek yikyak anu yawe, ‘Jõ wase anu. Anu awya metait? Anu fo raa ro nber safo. Nsen fooh, nmo fari tno!’
Kbe anu nmat Abraham, Ishak, Yakub msya
na ro Allah ybis mama beta. Ana weto hre mam sawro ro Allah yamo
ybo raa wAit. Menohe anu fo, Allah yikyak mne nhau banu. Kbe anu sraujin anu toni. Tibyo anu kbe nwia tna kanasyah toni ye.
Kbe raa mama mbam arin aso beta. Mama hre sohmaam bo su mam wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa wAit to.
Tawe: Raa ro mfo refo mamo mtis to meen ana matim wia. Tna raa ro mfo refo matim wia to,
meen ana hah me mamo mam tis.”
Tna raa ro
baro mama mo kʼYesus tna mawe, “Nasen namo oh, be
Herodes saim yawe yame Nyõ!”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Ait tait ynan fi
⌞Ait ja hren ksuk tna yame raa.⌟ Nmo nwe kʼait nwe, ‘Yesus yawe ifo msya menrabu to, Ait yhau fares re yikyak kabes sor tna yisoh raa ro kiyam to. Tna ti ro tuuf to yno bo wAit mkak oh.’
Tako hawe sai Jõ tamo iso aJõ refo renti. Ifo fo, menrabu tna fjah tamo renti tamoʼt Yerusalem.
ro Allah sor to, soh raa mame ana majat to, ja raa mame mam Yerusalem.
Raa ro Yerusalem, tiwya ana ja mame

ro Allah majat. Tna raa ro Allah ybis mamo mkyas bokyas rAit to, ja raa ro Yerusalem mame ana majat ye. Moo fraa mai raa weto tibyo majat. Muhrin aro rau-rau Jõ srau kero ana. Tawe tatmof ana tna takrao ana tse mam wo sau. Mfi kook mabi ro makrao maku tna maut mabum kait to ye. Menohe ana to hawe ye. Feto to Jõ sraujin raa ro Yerusalem, bo ro meen mama mai kʼana:

Ana hawe Jõ oh mi Allah kbe meen yatam ana ro mhau mam Yerusalem to u fee. Ait sikba ana akus. Kbe Jõ sikba tabam refo tna ana mmat Jõ u fee. Ana mmat Jõ fee mamo snok mam ati ro tabam refo haberek. Tna ati reto ana manwaruk mawe,
‘Ait yase toni!
ybis Ait yama to.’”
Mazmur 118:26
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
sau to Yesus yamo yait bo mam samu raa ro
sait. Ait retait raa ro yase. Tna raa ro
roto baro msya
baro hre mait boit su msya ana ye. Tna raa ro yafa kiyam sait twok yama. Kiyam reto mno tibyo ait yetsu beta mtun. Raa manes ro
Yahudi weto mmat sas Yesus.
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Watum ro
ranu mbis mawe raa misoh kiyam mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, fe mfe a?”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
sau to Yesus yamo yait bo mam samu raa ro
sait. Ait retait raa ro yase. Tna raa ro
roto baro msya
baro hre mait boit su msya ana ye. Tna raa ro yafa kiyam sait twok yama. Kiyam reto mno tibyo ait yetsu beta mtun. Raa manes ro
Yahudi weto mmat sas Yesus.
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Watum ro
ranu mbis mawe raa misoh kiyam mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, fe mfe a?”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
sau to Yesus yamo yait bo mam samu raa ro
sait. Ait retait raa ro yase. Tna raa ro
roto baro msya
baro hre mait boit su msya ana ye. Tna raa ro yafa kiyam sait twok yama. Kiyam reto mno tibyo ait yetsu beta mtun. Raa manes ro
Yahudi weto mmat sas Yesus.
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Watum ro
ranu mbis mawe raa misoh kiyam mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, fe mfe a?”
Menohe ana shait sai beta. Tibyo Yesus ybo ait ro kiyam retait tna yisoh ait. Yisoh yoof tna ybis ait yawe yamo bait.
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Fyi, mfi bo anu nkin wefo sait, ymat ku rait, soh mfe
rait mbtek kayah
Mbtek kayah mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, kbe ait yamo fooh tubat fe mfe a?”
Menohe ana weto sait ykyas bo si fee ye.
Tna ana beta mamo hre mait boit. Tna Yesus ymat he ana msok yuk ro moof wia hre. Tibyo yawe bofret kʼana yawe,

“Soh raa sait ymen fnya tna yawe anu sait yamoʼt bokyõ rait reto to, kbe nno bawya? Nyõ namo tna kbe hre mam woyõ? Ja nyõ nksoh hre mam ambar ro moof fe mfe a? Jõ tawe anu nmo hre mam ambar ro moof wia ma. Kbe raa manes sait yama bo to fyi?
Nno kbe ait ro yakyõ bokyõ rait to yama yawe, ‘Kmo ma, nasen namo hre mam yuk roto. Yuk refo mhau kʼraa ro ati ro yama refi.’ Tibyo nyõ saban tna nasen namo hre mam tis.

Rau ro moof to, soh raa mawe anu sait yamoʼt bokyõ rait to, nno fefo: Nmo to, hre mam tis. Tna kbe ait ro yakyõ bokyõ rait reto to, yama yawe, ‘Tafoh ajõ, nasen namo hre mam ambar ro moof rno.’ Tibyo raa taro mmat tna mawe nyõ raa ro nase.
Tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Awya ro bibi ait yesait to, kbe hah ye yfi bo raa ro maku. Tna awya ro susu hah ye yaku to, ait kbe yrok yase mam uu.’”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼait ro yakyõ bokyõ rait yawe, “Soh nakyõ bokyõ to, noo taah nee kʼnafoh wonyõ ma. Noo taah nee kʼnao wonyõ, nano wonyõ, tmo wonyõ, msya raa mana wonyõ ro bobot to ma. Kbe ana weto makyõ bokyõ to moo taah mee kʼnyõ riryõn.
Soh nyõ nakyõ bokyõ to, nmen awe, nmen raa ro kinyah, raa kair, raa ro maa msya matem bo mhai, msya raa ro masu mboh bo to.
Ana weto kbe ska bo moof ro nyõ no kʼana reto fee. Menohe Allah kbe yno bo moof kʼnyõ to. Meen Ait yno re raa ro mhaf moof mrok masen. Tna mam wore weto to, kbe Allah yaren nyõ tu oh.”
Raa sait sohmaam bo su ysya ana weto. Ait yari bokyas ro Yesus reto tna yawe, “Wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, raa meen hre sohmaam bo mam beto ye. Awya sai ro meen hre sohmaam bo mam beto to, kbe mhau simaut mase.”
Tna Yesus yawe bofret yawe, “Bobot sait ymah korat ro mase sau. Tna ait yoo taah yee kʼraa mawat.
Bo sohmaam beta raa saruk mkak. Tna bobot retait ybis sryan sait yamo yawe kʼraa weto, yawe, ‘Nma twok oh. Raa siwyan bo beta ye oh!’
Menohe ana mama fee. Sait yawe, ‘Kmo ma: Jõ tsui tna tama fee. Jõ kwiyat tabam baro tna fares, tna tawe mfo refo tamo tmat.’
Tna sait yawe, ‘Kmo ma: Tna sai jõ too
mana nsaa. Tna tawe tamo tse kuk sanet tno
weto mkuk
wia. Feto to kbe jõ tama fee.’
Tna raa sait yawe, ‘Jõ tmen fnya ajõ tna fares, kbe jõ tama fee.’

Tna sryan retait hah yamo yawe bo weto kʼbobot rait. Tibyo bobot retait kmo yawe, ‘Feto to namo fooh namoʼt remo tna saso raa mam iso sai: raa ro suawe, raa ro kinyah, raa ro kair, raa ro maa msya matem wana mhai, maka, msya raa ro masu mboh to. Namo nmen ana nakah nama.’
Sryan retait yno bo reto tna hah yama yawe, ‘Tno oh. Menohe ambar ro raa kbe mama hre mawat marak sai fares.’
Tna bobot retait ybis u yawe, ‘Namo fari tna saso raa mam remo ro maku ye, mam iso krewe ye. Nawe kʼraa nawe mamaʼt samu ajõ refo afo re matot.
Tawe raa ro jõ too taah tee to, kbe mama mam korat ajõ fee saut tna sohmaam bo wojõ aro fee ye!’”
Raa mawat mama kro msya Yesus mam iso ro Ait yamo to. Yesus ymat ana tna ykyas kʼana yawe,

“Raa mawat mawe kro Jõ. Ana mawat mhafri maja msya mme, mfain msya ku wana, mao na, mano na toni. Menohe mhafri Jõ kaket fee. Feto ana weto to, raa woJõ fee. Tna awya ro hasu ait yesait toni menohe hasu Jõ kaket fee, ait tait raa aJõ fee ye.
Awya ro yawe kro Jõ to, menohe kro fee, tna yasom bo fanes ro mama mai kʼait to fee ye, ait yamo raa aJõ fee ye. Soh ait yasom ara warok rait reto ye tna ait kro Jõ ye; ait retait yamo raa aJõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo anu nkin sait ksoh yawe sgi amah
to; ait hre ntuu mabyoh rau to wia fea! Tna ymat pitis ro ait yse to wia afo re yhar yawe kbe sgi mkak fe mfe a?
Soh yno bo reto wia fee, kbe ait ysair yno
sai menohe sgi amah ska fee. Tibyo raa mmat tna sret ait masah tna mawe,
‘Raa refi yawe sgi amah rait reto menohe ytai sgi mkak fee!’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo
sait yawe yafa ysya
roto sait to; ait hre ntuu raa sbe wait kaket wia. Tna ynaut mnan wia yawe, ‘Raa sbe wojõ mabo trion 10.000 sai. Tna
roto tait raa sbe wait mabo trion 20.000. Kbe fyi? Raa wojõ mnan fe mfe a?’
Soh ynaut yawe matak to fee, kbe mam wore wo byoh mhau fari fares to, ait ybis raa mamo mo
ro yafa ysya ait. Ybis ana mamo mkyas bo su kʼait. Tna ati ewok weto mtu mari iso ro moof fyi re kbe ana miranya sai moof.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Au oh meto: Soh raa mawe kro Jõ to, ana weto kbe mnaut bo mnan wia, tna fo kro. Awya ro hawe, ysan bo wait beta kʼAllah yatem to fee, ait retait yamo raa woJõ to fee ye.
Jõ fret bo tawe, ‘Haa to ja mafah moof. Menohe mfi bo haa reto mafah fee, kbe raa mno fyi re kbe haberek mafah u? Mafer rau to aro uu fee. Haa reto mno armato moo kaket mfi
ja mno to fee. Mafer ro haa reto to, marak sai. Haa reto raa moo mbeak sai.’ Anu ro nri bokyas reto to, nnaut kaket!”
Jõ fret bo tawe, ‘Haa to ja mafah moof. Menohe mfi bo haa reto mafah fee, kbe raa mno fyi re kbe haberek mafah u? Mafer rau to aro uu fee. Haa reto mno armato moo kaket mfi
ja mno to fee. Mafer ro haa reto to, marak sai. Haa reto raa moo mbeak sai.’ Anu ro nri bokyas reto to, nnaut kaket!”
Raa ro mno iro ye msya raa ro moo namabyoh
bo ye ja mama mo kʼYesus mari bokyas rAit.
Tibyo raa manes ro Yahudi mmai kinya. Raa ro
msya
mmai kinya mawe, “Ait yiranya ysya raa ro mno iro tna hre mait bo msya ana su ee?”
Tibyo Ait ykyas bofret kʼana yawe,
“Mfi bo anu sait ysia
mana 100. Tna
weto mana sau marak. Kbe ait yno bawya? Kbe ait sikba
mana trion 99 refo akus wia, tna hah yamo saso mana sau ro marak reto tibyo ait tru.
Tru tna simaut toni. Yasen tubat
reto yasom abyõ mam kbek.
Tna hah yamoʼt amah. Snok si mam samu to, ait ymen yafoh na msya raa ro mhau kene msya ait tna yawe kʼana yawe, ‘Nma, bkyõ bokyõ!
ajõ ro marak reno no, jõ tru oh. Nma, anu simaut mase oh!’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh raa sait ro ja yno iro yashana to,
sor kbe simaut mase feto ye. Menohe mfi bo raa mabo 99 mnaut mawe, ‘Ja amu nhaf moof sai, kbe amu nashana fyi!’ Kbe
sor ro mhau mam sawro ro Allah weto to, simaut raa weto fee.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh fai sau mse pitis
trion nsaa. Tna soh sau mbtek marak to, kbe au mait tafoh mbo tna saso fea! Tna au moo
sabos kaket mam amah tibyo mkai pitis rau reto.
Tna au masen mawe kʼmafoh na msya raa ro mhau kene msya au mawe, ‘Pitis ajõ ro riwai marak reto to, jõ fri oh! Tibyo jõ simaut mase toni! Nma, anu bkyõ bokyõ!’
Taja, tme na tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Raa sait ro ja yno iro to, soh ait yashana, kbe
ro Allah sor simaut toni feto ye.’”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret sau u yawe, “Raa sait tait yabe ku sme mabo ewok.
Tna ait ro tis fi yawe kʼyaja yawe, ‘Taja, saim kta wanu ro meen nyõ shauk to, noo baro nee kʼjõ mam wore wefo.’ Tna yaja yoo kta rait saim yee ku wait mabo ewok reto.

Ti baro firwas tna ku ro tis fi yoo bo wait msya kta ro yaja saim kʼait beta fo yasim. Yasim yoo pitis tna yasen yamoʼt oo ro fari sau. Ait yamo snok mam teto tna fo ait yno bo kbik-kbak sai. Tibyo sikowah pitis rait. Mrok marak.
Pitis rait reto marak beta tna fo haiawyah frok mama mai mam oo reto beta. Tibyo kair mama mai kʼait.
Tibyo yasen yamo yo kʼraa sait ro yhau mam oo reto. Yamo sryan yno bo rait. Tna bi ait ybis yawe yamo kmot fane bi wait.
Menohe raa aro moo boit aro mee kʼait yesait yait fee. Tibyo ku ait retait hai sre tna yawe yait boit ro fane mait ye.
Ait hre ynaut bait tna yawe, ‘Sryan ro ja mhau msya taja to, ana mhau to boit mninon. Menohe Jõ thau mam befo thai awyah thai sai!
Feto kbe tasen tamo to kʼtaja tna tawe kʼait tawe, “Taja, jõ tno iro mai kʼAllah tna mai kʼnyõ ye.
Jõ fi tno-na bo. Feto to nyõ ntu nawe jõ fi ku anyõ u fee. Tawe tamo sryan boh ro tno bo wonyõ sai.”’
Tna ait yasen hah yamoʼt oo rait. Yamo yo kʼyaja. Ait yama fari fares to, yaja ymat ait yama oh. Tna yatmof ait. Tna yhoh yamo yo ku rait tibyo yake tna hana.
Tna ku retait yawe, ‘Taja, jõ fi tno iro mai kʼAllah ysya nyõ oh. Feto to ntu jõ nawe nare to ma.’
Menohe yaja yawe kʼsryan wait yawe, ‘Nmo noo ratan ro moof toni to, nkah nama fooh nse kʼait yyum. Tna noo
nse mam yatem. Tna noo
nse mam yaa.
Tna ktan
ro moof sau. Anu kbe bno bokyõ, tna anu sohmaam tna simaut mase!
Tnaut tawe kbe tmat ku ajõ refi u fee! Tiwya ait yarak menohe jõ tkai ait yama u!’ Feto to ana makyõ bokyõ.
Ku rait ro bum yhau fares mam armato. Tna hah ye yamaʼt amah. Yama kene oh mam samu tna ait yari he raa simaut tna msyoh.
Tna ku ro yabi refi ytu sryan sait yama tna ytu kʼait yawe, ‘Raa mno bawya re samu mnin-nin meto ee?’
Menohe sryan retait yawe, ‘Nao ro tiwya yamo tait, hah ye yama oh! Hah ye yama mkah riof. Tibyo naja ktan
ro moof sau.’
Yari feto to, ku yabi fi, kmo tna hawe bo twok mam amah. Tibyo yaja frok mne tna soh-soh kʼait yawe, ‘Ntruk oh!’
Menohe ait yawe si kʼyaja yawe, ‘Ja jõ thau tsya nyõ
aro rau-rau tno bo wonyõ to. Tna jõ tiwana bo ro nyõ nawe to aro fee. Tna nyõ noo bo aro naren jõ fee. Nyõ nbis
sau kʼjõ fee ye re ktan takyõ bokyõ tsya tafoh wojõ na ye.
Tna nare ro tis retait tait yakah kta anyõ to, yamo. Yamo sikowah-kawah ysya fnya ro mwyah to, tna hah yama. Menohe nyõ ktan
sau nakyõ bokyõ ro mase naut kʼait u a!’
Menohe yaja yawe, ‘Tare, nyõ to ja nhau nsya jõ. Bombra ro jõ tse weto beta to, bo wonyõ oh meto.
Nyõ nao retait, tnaut tawe kbe tmat ait u fee! Tiwya yarak menohe anu be bkai u. Tibyo anu to simaut bkyõ bokyõ kʼait fea!’”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Tkyas raa ro bobot sait. Ait ysok raa sait yamo
mkah ybo pitis wait tna yisoh bo wait beta. Ti baro firwas tna raa ro bobot retait yari he
retait yisoh bo wait kaket fee, saka sikowah pitis rait.
Tibyo bi ro bobot retait ytu ait yama tna yawe, ‘Bo ro raa mkyas mai kʼnyõ fo mabo fe mfe a? Tawe tusnok nyõ. Jõ hawe bo nyõ nbo pitis wojõ u. Nasen namo nkom
sau. Tna nkom pitis ro tii jõ tsan kʼnyõ to mnan si. Tna nkom bo bawya ro nyõ noo mkah pitis wojõ weto beta. Tna fo
reto nakah nama nee kʼjõ tmat.’
refi yamo tna ynaut yyi yawe, ‘Bobot ro ybis jõ yawe jõ frok tno bo wait u fee. Kbe tno fyi? Raa taro ja mkah bo, menohe jõ fi ja ttai tkah bo fee. Tna jõ hawe bo tayoh pitis kʼraa. Kbe jõ hrenaut.
Jõ thar iso oh! Tafoh wojõ mawat. Tamo tno bo moof kʼana afo re kbe ati ro bobot ybis jõ tufrok to, kbe ana weto mitrah amah wana kʼjõ!’
Raa mawat mno taman kʼbobot retait. Tna
retait ynaut yawe iso ro moof to, kbe ait yno bo ro moof kʼraa weto. Tibyo yno fefo: Ait ytu ana sait-sait yama. Tna yawe, ‘Taman ro bobot retait trion ja fares mhau kʼnyõ to?’
Raa ro yama tinyi tait yawe, ‘Taa jõ tayoh
.’ Menohe
refi yawe, ‘Noo aam ro taman refo tna hre nkom roto ro tna sau. Nkom
sai.’
Tna
retait ytu kʼait ro ewok yawe, ‘Taman ro bobot retait to trion jya fares mhau kʼnyõ?’ Tna ait ro ewok yawe,
’ Menohe
retait yawe, ‘Aam ro taman refo, nkom 80
sai.’
retait yno feto kʼraa beta ro mno taman kʼbobot retait. Yno afo re kbe ana weto ksoh ait tna kbe mse ait mam amah mato wana. Tna fo
retait yoo
ro ykom reto yakah yamo yee kʼbobot retait ymat. Bobot retait ymat
reto tna yhar yawe
retait sioh ait. Menohe bobot retait bibi
retait yawe, ‘Nyõ nhar bo toni sai ee!’”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro wase Allah to, mhar mno bo ro tabam refo su msya raa anya. Menohe raa ro mhau mam kek to, taro wase bo siwyan ana afo re meen mamo mhau mam sawro ro Allah.

Jõ tkyas kʼanu tawe: ‘Pitis msya kta ro tabam refo to, noo nee kʼraa. Noo pitis msya kta wanu to, nno bo moof kʼraa re kbe ana ksoh anu. Bombra wanu weto mkak rof mam tabam refo. Mkak tna meen Allah yitrah amah rAit kʼanu tna kbe anu nhau nsya Ait mam sawro rAit mamo snok mam hame wajin.’”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa sait yoo bo wait kebet baro yee kʼyafoh sait. Tna yasen yamo. Yhau tna hah ye. Hah ye tna ymat he yafoh retait yisoh bo weto, kaket moof. Feto tibyo raa retait yhar yawe soh yoo bombra mawat yee kʼyafoh rait reto kmot, kbe yafoh retait yisoh bo mawat weto kaket moof ye. Feto ye; mfi bo raa sait yoo bo wait kebet baro yee kʼyafoh sait. Tna yasen yamo. Yhau tna hah ye. Hah ye, menohe ymat he yafoh retait yisoh bo weto kaket fee. Ait yno-na sai. Feto tibyo raa retait yhar yawe nno be ait yoo bombra mawat yee kʼyafoh rait reto, kbe yafoh retait yisoh bo mawat weto kaket fee ye.
Soh anu nse kta aro mam tabam refo, menohe nno-na kta wanu to, kbe meen raa moo kta ro moof ati aro mee kʼanu fee ye.
Soh anu nno-na bosatoh ro raa, kbe raa hawe bo msan bosatoh kʼanu nesait nse.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Ja sryan sait yno bo ro bobot sait aran sai. Ait yno bo ro bobot mabo ewok brio-brio to fee. Kbe ait knait bi ait sait tna ksoh bi ait sait. Kbe ait yari bo kʼbobot sait kaket, tna yiwana bo ro bobot sait yawe ye. Feto to tawe kʼanu tawe: Awya ybah yno bo ro Allah wAit ye tna saso kta ro tabam refo ye. Anu raa ntai nkro iso ewok weto su fee.”
Raa ro
to ja masu mase mkah pitis. Ana mari bo ro Yesus ykyas weto beta tna ana sret Ait masah.
