Tibyo Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu nksoh nwe raa mmat bo moof ro anu nno. Mmat bo weto tna mnaut mawe anu raa ro nhaf moof. Menohe Allah yhar yawe anu nhaf mato wanu to mkair. Bo ro raa mbibi tna mnaut mawe moof to, Allah ynaut yawe bo weto mkair.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tiwya Allah ybis Musa ysya
na mama mkom Watum wAit. Mam oon ro tiwya reto mamo snok mam ati ro Yohanes yama to, raa mari Watum weto to, moof. Tna fo Yohanes yama ykyas yawe Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Tna Jõ tsya kuber woJõ mamo wosa Bokyas ro Moof reto. Tna raa mawat mari tibyo ntomer mamo raa ro Allah ybo yfi
rana.
Ja raa mnaut mawe ayoh msya tabam refo mhau yum. He mfe: Meen ayoh msya tabam refo saef marak sai. Menohe Watum weto oh mi mhau matak yum. Watum weto to, maja rau sau ro maku to, kbe susre fee.
Awya sai ro yako fnya rait makus tna yamo ymen fnya rouu to, ait retait raa ro ywyah oh meto. Tna awya ro ymen fai ro raa roto sait yako oh to, ait retait raa ro ywyah ye.”
Tna Yesus ykyas yawe, “Bi ro bobot sait yhau yoof. Ja ait yyum ratan ro mabyoh maut toni. Ratan wait to ro ngknu msya sneh. Ayõ yoyo ait yhau to, ait simaut mkah bo ro ait yse mninon.
Tna raa ro kinyah sait yasom Lazarus yhau ye. Tna raa mse ait hre kene mam amah masa ro bobot refi. Lazarus tait yetsu mbra mabet sor. Tna ait hre yayoh bo sohmaam kʼraa ro mama.
Tna Lazarus haisre toni tibyo ynaut yawe ksoh yait boit makyõ ro mbtek mbam ambar ro bobot retait. Tna mtah mama mkas Lazarus yarak ro mabet ye.
Ti baro firwas tna Lazarus yhai. Tna
sor makah ait mamo mse hre mam yuk ro moof ysya Abraham su.

Tna bobot retait yhai ye. Tna raa sama ait. Bobot retait tait yamoʼt sawro ro kair. Tna mam weto ykai bo ro samyoh. Ait heyut abyõ tna ymat fari, ymat he Lazarus hre ysya Abraham su mam yuk ro moof tno.
Tna bobot retait yawe kʼAbraham yawe, ‘Taja, natmof jõ! Tafoh refo fo, mafit jõ toni oh! Tna srau fo ngkaat oh. Nbis Lazarus beru yatem mam aya tna yama yse mam hrea ajõ!’

Menohe Abraham yawe kʼait yawe, ‘Tare, nnaut sai oh: Tiwya naam fares to, nyõ bobot tna nse bombra beta. Tna Lazarus fi ykai bo ro mkair. Reto oh mi mfo refo ait ye yhau moof, tna nyõ ne nhau mam wo mkair riryõn.

Tna bo weto mesait sai fee: Nyõ nhau mam yuk sau hayah tna amu nhau mam yuk sau hayah ye. Hwai mboh sau firwas wa anu. Tibyo raa ro mbam ati reto frit mamaʼt ati refo si fee. Tna raa ro mbam ati refo frit mamoʼt ati reto si fee ye.’
Tna bobot refi soh-soh kʼAbraham yawe, ‘Feto to nbis Lazarus hah yamoʼt tabam. Nbis yamoʼt amah ro taja.
Tao na wojõ mabo maat mhau fares to. Nbis Lazarus yamo yo kʼana mabo maat weto tna yawe wa kʼana. Ykyas afo re ana misoh ana tna meen ana mamaʼt befo fee. Tna tru kair refo fee ye!’
Menohe Abraham yawe, ‘Watum ro tiwya Allah ybis Musa ysya
na mkom to mhau fares kʼana. Soh ana mari bo weto to, mnan sai oh.’
Menohe bobot retait yawe, ‘Taja, weto mnan fefares! Soh raa ro ja mhai aro mrok masen tna hah me mo kʼana to, tna mawe wa kʼana to, kbe ana mnaut iro wana tna mashana.’
Menohe Abraham yawe, ‘Soh ana hawe mari Watum ro tiwya Allah ybis Musa ysya
na mkom to, kbe ana mari bo ro raa mkyas to fee ye. Mfi bo ana mmat raa ro mhai mrok masen aro bo to, kbe ana mari raa reto fee ye.’”
Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Mam tabam refo fo, bo aro rau tko re raa mno iro. Menohe awya ro yisti re raa mno iro to, meen Allah yno bo ro mkair mama mai kʼait ro yisti retait.

Meen ait ykai bo ro samyoh toni. Ait ro yisti re raa woJõ sait yno iro to, soh ait ysu mam aya yhai to, moof miwer bo ro meen Allah yno mai kʼait retait! Mfi bo raa mawah fraa ro maboh sau, tna make mam yamyum, tna mbeak ait mam sawan, tibyo ysu to, bo reto to, moof miwer bo samyoh toni ro meen ait ykai.
Feto to kaket anu!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh nafoh sait yno iro to, nastako ait. Tna soh ait yashana to, nhaf ase tna kmo ait ma.

Tna soh yno iro mawat mai kʼnyõ to, tna fo hah ye yama yawe, ‘Riwai tno mkair. Tna tashana.’ Tna ait yfot yatem ysya nyõ to; kmo ait ma, nhaf kair kʼait ma. Soh ait yno iro mai kʼnyõ muhrin krema mam ti sau to, tna yama yawe, ‘Riwai tno mkair. Tna tashana.’ Soh yno feto muhrin krema ye to, kbe ne kmo ait ma.”
Tna kuber ro
Yesus wAit mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nisoh bosmot wamu re kbe matak.”
Tna
yawe, “Soh bosmot wanu maku sai, mfi bo makan ro maku sai, anu ntai nno bo ro msai. Kbe anu nwe kʼara sau nwe mamo mros mam sawan to, kbe mabo oh: Kbe ara reto mari tna mamo tu oh.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo bobot sait ysya sryan sait. Tna sryan retait ja ykah bo mam armato ro bobot rait, soh mfe ysia
ro bobot wait mam smok. Hreha tna sryan retait hah yamaʼt amah to, kbe bobot yawe bawya kʼait? Kbe yawe, ‘Nama fooh, noo boit nait!’ fe mfe a?
Mfe. Kbe ybis yawe, ‘Saruk boit wojõ ro tait to wia, tna nyum ratan ro moof, tna noo boit ro jõ tait, nakah nama! Tait skak wia. Tna fo nyõ saruk boit ro nyõ nait to riryõn.’
Sryan yno bo ro bobot ybis sai. Tibyo ja bobot yayoh asik mase fee tna ybaut ait fee!
Tawe anu nmo nno bo nfi sryan retait ye. Nri tna nno bo beta ro Allah ybis kʼanu. Tna nwe fefo sai, nwe, ‘Amu fo sryan boh ro
wAit. Amu nno bo ro Ait ybis kʼamu sai. ⌞Feto to bibi anu ai to ma, shait sai oh.⌟’”
Yesus yamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna iso ro yamo to, mamo mam rabin ro Samaria msya
ro Galilea masuf.
Ait twok mam remo sau fo, raa sme mabo nsaa ro mafa
to masen mama mo kʼAit. Ana mama kene msya Ait fee. Ana mros fari
tna mkah mai ro mase ana soh-soh kʼYesus mawe,
natmof amu!”
Yesus ymat ana tna yawe, “Nmo nerif netsu wanu
na re ana mha ninin anu netsu wanu wia. Ana mha ninin netsu wanu afo re ana mhar mawe anu nrok noof oh.” Tna ana mamo. Mamo sai mam iso fares fo,
wana mrok marak. Ana mrok moof beta.
Ana wefo sait, ati ro ymat he ait yoof to, ait hah ye yamo yo kʼYesus tna ybaut Allah mkah ymai ro mase.
Ait yama snok Yesus tna yaka mte hartu Ait. Tna yasu heyut yawe, “Asik mase kʼNyõ oh!” Ait retait raa ro ybam rabin ro Samaria.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Riwai Jõ tisoh raa mabo nsaa, fe mfe a? Ro mabo krenjiit taro to miyo?
Fyi re raa ro srim refi yesait aran hah yama tna ybaut Allah? Ana mabo ngkrenjiit to miyo?”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait refi yawe, “Bosmot anyõ misoh nyõ. Nasen nros tna namo oh. Riof kʼnyõ.”
Raa ro
baro masen mtu bo kʼYesus. Ana mtu bo oon ro meen Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Ana mtu fyi re kbe ana mhar oon reto mama oh meto. Tna Yesus yawe, “Raa baro mnaut mawe, kbe raa masu mmat bo ro msai toni aro frok mam ati ro oon reto mama. He mfe.

Tna kbe raa sioh mawe, ‘Oon rAit mama mefo!’, fee ye. Tna kbe raa sioh mawe, ‘Au mno!’, to, fee ye. Menohe nri oh! Jõ tama thau tsya anu raa oh mefo. Jõ oh mi siwyan iso re raa mamo mo kʼAllah tna Ait yamo
ybo ana to.”

Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen kair mama mai kʼanu. Feto to, mam oon ro mama to, kbe anu ninaut nwe, ‘Tija oh mi Ait hah ye yama fo?’ Menohe kbe anu nmat Jõ mam ati reto fee.
Ati ro raa mawe kʼanu mawe, ‘Nmat, Ait mefi!’ Soh mfe, ‘Ait mne!’ Nri ana ma! Nhoh nmo nmat ma!
Ati ro 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' hah yama to, hah yama yfi rir ro mrir mam ayoh. Kbe raa beta mmat, mnan mfi bo rir ro mrir skentrat mamo mai jaro-jaro.
Jõ fi meen hah tama u. Hah te tama mun ro ewok fefares to, Jõ thau mam tabam refo wia. Tna raa mno bo ro mkair-kar mawat mai kʼJõ. Tna raa ro mfo refo mhau to mikyak Jõ wia.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' meen hah ye yama. Ye yama to, kbe raa mhau mno bo wana mnan si wore wo tiwya Nuh yhau:
Ati reto to, raa sohmaam bo tna mmen fnya bo to, snok mam ati ro Nuh twok mam wiak aken rait to. Tna bo maboh mama tubor: Aya mabo mbetru ana msu beta.
Wore wo Jo hah tama to, kbe raa mhau mno bo wana to mnan si wore tiwya Lot yhau: Raa sohmaam bo, moo bo tna masim bo wana, mhais maso tna sawyah samu bo to.
Ati ro Lot frok ybam Sodom to, bo maboh mama tubor: Tafoh msya
mroh mbam ayoh, tna mait ana beta mam beto.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ hah tama to, kbe raa mhau mno bo wana mfi feto ye.

Tawe: Ati ro Jõ hah tama to, soh anu sait hre abyõ mam samu anyõ kri-kri to, kbe nroh satoh bo wonyõ mbam amah mato nbo frok to ma! Tna soh anu sait nkah bo mam armato kri-kri to, hah ne namoʼt samu anyõ to ma.
Nnaut bo ro Lot yfain mno!

Tawe kʼanu tawe: Raa taro tomer mawe mhau bana moof mam tabam refo. Tna ana kro Jõ fee. Ana weto meen mhau hame wajin fee. Menohe raa taro mhau bana moof fee. Ana kro Jõ. Ana kro Jõ ebokfi raa sikowah ana. Ana weto oh mi meen mhau hame wajin.
Meen Jõ hah tama tabam refo to, mti reto to, raa mabo ewok mjin mam ambar sau. Kbe
woJõ mroh tubat sait tna sait yhau akus.
Tna fnya mabo ewok hre mmuk
make su to ye. Kbe
woJõ mroh tubat sau tna sau mhau akus ye. [
Raa mabo ewok mhais bo to, kbe Ait tubat sait, tna sait yakus.]”

Tna kuber wAit mawe, “Bo weto kbe mabo mam woyõ?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Yuk ro bo mhai tna mhau akus to, kbe ruu hofyoh fru mama hre mam weto ye. ⌞Tna mam wore wo raa mno bo mkair-kar toni to, kbe meen Allah ymit safo kʼana weto mam yuk reto ye.⌟”
Yesus ykyas bofret sau. Ykyas afo re ana mur-mur skabuk yoyo, yawe ana bitsre skabuk ma.
Ait yawe, “Bi yabi sait yhau mam remo sau. Ait yamo raa ro ja ytu srah. Bi ait retait wase Allah. Tna ait ymat raa anya to kaket fee ye.
Tna semit sau mhau mam remo reto ye. Tna rabu wawa au mamo mo kʼait mawe, ‘Raa sait yno bo mkair mai kʼjõ. Nama nros nsya jõ tna saak safo ajõ.’
Menohe bi yabi retait yikyak au. Ti baro kait ait hawe bo yari au. Tna ti sau ait ynaut yawe, ‘Jõ waa Allah fee, tna ja tari bo kʼraa anya fee ye.
Menohe semit refo ja mama mkyas srah rau kʼjõ yoyo. Feto to jõ saak safo rau rof. Be kbe au mama mrit jõ yoyo to ma, tna mno jõ hrowyõ to ma.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ait ro ytu srah retait ja yhaf moof fee. Menohe nri bo ro yawe: Yawe kbe ait saak safo rau.

Nnaut oh: Kbe Allah yros ysya raa wAit, tna saak safo rana ye. Anu nnaut nwe kbe bi Ait hre kait tna hawe bo yari boyoh raa wAit fe mfe a? Mfe, ana mayoh bo kʼAit yoyo to, Ait ja yari boyoh wana weto fooh. Tna ttu bo kʼanu tawe, Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe Jõ hah tama tabam refo u. Tama u to, kbe Jõ tkai raa ro beroh smot Jõ fares aro to fe mfe a?”

Nnaut oh: Kbe Allah yros ysya raa wAit, tna saak safo rana ye. Anu nnaut nwe kbe bi Ait hre kait tna hawe bo yari boyoh raa wAit fe mfe a? Mfe, ana mayoh bo kʼAit yoyo to, Ait ja yari boyoh wana weto fooh. Tna ttu bo kʼanu tawe, Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe Jõ hah tama tabam refo u. Tama u to, kbe Jõ tkai raa ro beroh smot Jõ fares aro to fe mfe a?”

Raa ro mros mari Yesus ykyas bo to, ana taro raa ro safuk mnaut mawe ana mesait aran mno bo ro moof. Ana ja miwana raa roto mnaut mawe, “Ana weto mno bo ro moof mnan si amu to fee.” Yesus ykyas bofret kʼraa weto yawe,
“Raa mabo ewok mamoʼt Samu ro Allah mawe skabuk. Ait sait raa ro
tna sait raa ro yoo namabyoh
Tna ait ro

fi yros tna skabuk ait yesait yawe, ‘Jõ tayoh asik mawat kʼNyõ tawe jõ tnan fi raa ro mno bo mkair fee: Jõ tsyõf bo fee, jõ tno bo ro mkair fee, jõ raa ro twyah fee, tna jõ tfi ait ro yoo namabyoh refi fee ye.
sau jõ tiyas boit ro tait muhrin ewok. Tna bombra ro jõ too to, tsan
kʼNyõ.’
Menohe ait ro ja yoo namabyoh retait yros bait fari tna yanwaruk, tna yai yatmato skabuk yawe, ‘Allah natmof jõ ye, jõ fi raa ro tno iro.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ait ro ja yoo namabyoh retait skabuk mkak tna yasen yamo bait. Tna ait ro
retait skabuk mkak tna yasen yamo bait ye. Tkyas kʼanu tawe: Allah ymat ait ro yoo namabyoh retait tna yawe ait raa ro yhaf moof. Menohe Allah ymat raa ro

retait tna yawe ait raa ro yhaf moof to fee. Awya ro safuk yawe ait u kar to, kbe Allah yno ait haberek yamo raa kinyah. Tna awya ro yamo raa kinyah to, kbe Allah yno ait haberek yamo raa ro mase riryõn.”
Tna raa mbo kukek wana mama mo kʼYesus. Ana mama re kbe Ait yse yatem abyõ kukek wana tna skabuk re Allah yno bo ro moof kʼana. Kuber ro Yesus mmat feto, tna ana mastako raa weto.

Menohe Yesus ytu kukek weto mama. Tna yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nitsre ku kinyah weto mama mo kʼJõ. Nwe wa ana to ma! Raa ro mama mo kʼJõ mfi kukek wefo fo, mhaf wana to, Allah ksoh. Ana oh mi mamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to.
Menohe, Jõ tawe, Awya ro hawe mama mo kʼJõ mfi kukek wefo fo, kbe ana masen mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee.”
Bobot sait yamo raa manes, ja ybo raa mam remo rait. Tna ait ytu kʼYesus yawe,
Nyõ fi raa ro nhaf moof! Jõ kbe tno bo bawya re kbe meen Allah yno jõ thau hame wajin?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Fyi re nyõ nawe Jõ fi raa ro thaf moof? Raa aro mhaf moof fee. Allah yesait aran sai yhaf rAit moof.
Nyõ nhar watum ntraa ro tiwya Allah ybis Musa ykom yawe raa wAit mari tna mno. Au oh mefo:
‘Nwyah ma! Name ajat ma! Nsyõf bo to ma! Siroyõ ma! Nmat nja msya nme na to kaket!’”
Ulangan 5:16-20
Raa manes retait yawe, “Bosi weto tiwya taban tkek fares to, tno beta oh.”

Yesus yari feto tna yawe, “Bo sau nyõ nno fefares to: Namo nasim kta wonyõ beta. Tna nsaim pitis weto kʼraa ro bo marak. Soh nno bo reto to, nyõ name kta mam sawro ro Allah oh meto. Tna fo nama nkro Jõ.”
Ait retait bobot toni. Tibyo yari bokyas ro Yesus reto to, ait srau hri.
Yesus ymat ait tna yhar yawe ait sraujin. Tna yawe, “Raa ro bobot masen mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to, min toni syok.
Kak
maboh sau tomer twok mam sii hren soo to, mnan-nan baro ye. Menohe raa ro bobot tomer yamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo to min toni.”
Tna raa ro mros mari bokyas ro Yesus ykyas reto mtu kʼAit mawe, “Soh feto to, raa awya meen ykai riof?”
Yesus yawe, “Anu raa nesait ntai nno riof kʼanu fee. Menohe Allah yno riof kʼanu saah. Ait ytai yno bo bawya sai.”
Tna Petrus yawe, “Amu wefo nsen sikba bombra wanu beta afo re nma kro Nyõ oh.”
Yesus yawe, “Ae, nnaut: Raa baro ntomer masen mamo raa ro Allah yamo
ybo. Ana mawe bo ro ati toni meto. Tna Allah ybis ana mamo mno bo wAit to, tibyo sikba samu rana, sikba mfain, mao, maja, mme, kukek wana bo to, Allah ymat.
Kbe ana weto mkai bo weto mninon renti mam tabam refo, tna meen mkai roon ro hame ye.”
Yesus ytu kuber wAit mabo 12 weto, yawe ana mesait mama siret su. Tna yawe, “Tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mama mkom bombra ro kbe btek mai kʼJõ. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Anu bmoʼt Yerusalem mefo. Anu snok mam Yerusalem to, bo ro btek mai kʼJõ to, mnan si bo ro
na mkom wia weto.
Ana mkom mawe kbe raa moo Jõ msan kʼraa ro wase Allah. Kbe ana mamus Jõ, mno bo mkair kʼJõ, tfeh oot kʼJõ,
tna moo too mmok-mak Jõ, tna kbe ana mame Jõ tajat ye. Tna ti ro tuuf to, kbe Jõ trok tasen.”
Bokyas rAit reto to, kuber wAit aro mhar kbet fee ye. Maja rau to Allah yno re ana mnaut fee. Ana wase mawe, “Ait ykyas bawya sai meto ee?”
Yesus yama kene snok mam
ro Yerikho, tna raa ro yasu mboh sait hre mam iso yayoh bo.
Raa retait yari he raa mawat frit tna ytu yawe, “Bawya meto?”
Tna raa mawe, “Yesus ro ybam Nasaret frit iti metait.”
Tibyo ait ro yasu mboh retait ytu yawe, “Yesus, Ku ro Daud;
natmof jõ!”
Raa ro mamo msya Yesus to kmo bhah ait mawe, “Shait!” Menohe ait beroh ytu fari renti yawe, “Ku ro Daud, natmof jõ!”
Tna Yesus yros tna ybis yawe raa mbo ait ro yasu mboh retait mbo mama mo kʼAit. Yama, tna Yesus ytu kʼait yawe,
“Nyõ nksoh nawe Jõ tno bawya kʼnyõ?” Tna ait yawe,
jõ ksoh tmat bo ye!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh feto; tbis tawe, ‘Nmat bo oh!’ Bosmot anyõ misoh nyõ meto.”
Mam weto si fo, ait yrok yasu maah tna ymat bo. Tna yasen kro Yesus yamo. Yamo tna bibi Allah. Tna raa mawat mmat bo reto ye. Tibyo ana bibi Allah ye.
Yesus ⌞ysya kuber wAit mamo kri-kri mam iso ro Yerusalem.⌟ Tna mam iso maka to, ana snok mam
ro Yerikho.
Tna bobot sait yasom Zakheus yhau mam beto. Ait fi raa ro yamo
ro Roma tna ait aban mana
taro sor ro moo namabyoh
Ait fi raa ro yabuf.
Raa mawat mama mmat Yesus. Tna bi Zakheus tomer yawe ymat Yesus ye. Menohe raa msis-sas mburut wa ait tibyo ymat Ait fee.
Tibyo ait yhoh yatim mam iso ro Yesus yamo reto, tna yaut mam ara sau tna hre abyõ mam uu. Ait hre abyõ mam uu tna ymat Yesus yamo mam te.
Yesus snok mam ara mair refo tna heyut ymat mam ara refo abyõ tna ymat Zakheus, tna yawe, “Zakheus, nroh fooh! Ayõ refo Jõ tawe tama hre iti mam amah anyõ.”
Zakheus yroh fooh tna ymen Yesus yamoʼt amah rait. Ymen Yesus feto, Zakheus simaut mase.
Menohe raa msis-sas weto mmat feto tibyo mmai kinya mawe, “Ait yhau mam amah raa ro ja yno iro rait!”
Ana mbewok hre mkyas bo tna Zakheus yawe yisoh bo mkair ro tii yno. Tibyo yasen yawe,
kta wojõ to, kbe jõ saim hariyah jaro tee kʼraa kinyah. Tna pitis namabyoh ro raa moo mee
to, tiwya jõ too pitis hair to, jõ too mabyoh mnan si fee. Tawe kbe jõ tisya pitis reto kʼraa. Tisya tna too taro tur ye kʼraa weto muhrin jiit naut.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Ayõ refo raa ro mhau mam amah anyõ refo mkai riof ro mase. Nyõ fi nbam raa mana ro Abraham wait ye.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna Jõ tama saso raa ro mamo marak amo, tna tno re ana mkai riof ye.”
Tna Yesus hre iti mam amah ro Zakheus mam Yerikho fares. Yerikho to kene mam
Yerusalem. Tna raa mnaut mawe oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit to, kbe mama fooh.
Ana mnaut mawe ati ro Yesus yamoʼt Yerusalem to, kbe mabo rauk. Tibyo Yesus ykyas bofret sau afo re misoh bonaut wana ro sre meto.
Yawe, “Bobot sait ksoh yawe yamo
ro ybo rabin rait. Feto to, ysaim yawe kbe yamoʼt oo ro fari yo
ro ybo rabin weto beta. Yamo yayoh
retait yawe afo re ybis ait yamo
mam rabin rait ro ja yhau. Tna fo kbe hah ye yama ybo raa ro mhau mam rabin rait ro ja yhau.

Bobot retait yasen yamo fefares to, ait ytu sryan wait mabo trion nsaa mama mo kʼait. Tna yawe kʼana yawe, ‘Kbe jõ tamoʼt oo ro fari. Tamo tna thau kait baro mam teto. Wore wo jõ tarak fares to, tawe anu nhau nisoh bo wojõ kaket wea. Jõ too pitis trion nsaa refo tna saim sau kʼanu aro sait-sait. Tawe tfyah pitis wefo makit renti.’ Tna bobot retait yasen yamo.
Menohe raa ro rabin rait ro ja yhau to, knait bobot retait. Tibyo ana mbis raa baro mamo mo
retait mam oo ro fari reto ye. Mbis raa weto mamo mawe soo
retait mawe, ‘Amu hawe bobot retait yamo
Menohe mam oo ro fari reto
retait yari ana fee. Ait ybis yawe bobot retait yamo

mam rabin rait reto. Bobot retait yhau kait mam teto tna yasen hah ye yamaʼt rabin rait ro ja yhau. Snok mam amah rait to, tna ytu sryan wait mabo trion nsaa weto mama mo kʼait. Tna ait ytu pitis ro tiwya ait fyah kʼana weto, yawe, ‘Anu tru amot mafer renti aro fe mfe a?’
Sryan ro tinyi yama tna yawe, ‘Bobot, jõ fyah pitis anyõ reto, tna taru amot rau trion nsaa.’
Bobot retait yawe, ‘Nyõ nno bo ro moof oh! Taa nyõ mur-mur nno bo wojõ ro maku to, nisoh nno moof. Feto to jõ teta nyõ namo raa ro nase nasen nbo
trion nsaa.’
Sryan ro ewok yama tna yawe, ‘Bobot, jõ fyah pitis anyõ reto tna tru amot rau trion maat.’
Bobot retait yawe, ‘Moof. Feto to, jõ teta nyõ namo raa ro nase nasen nbo
trion maat ye.’
Tna sryan ro tuuf yama yawe, ‘Taja, pitis anyõ mefo. Tii jõ too hawee sau tna sro pitis anyõ, tse mam amah sai. Jõ te tamo tno mafer renti aro fee.
Jõ twaa kʼnyõ. Tnaut tawe nyõ fi raa ro ja safo triar. Nyõ safo triar tna noo baah raa tna naru amot mawat. Nno mkah bo manhai anyõ fee. Ja nyõ nryoh kake mam armato ro nyõ nyum fee.’

Tna bobot retait kmo. Tna yawe kʼait yawe, ‘Bokyas anyõ reto mnan si. Mkah bawya nyõ hawe nisoh bo wojõ mamyot bo ro tawe! Nyõ nno mkair meto! Nyõ fi sryan ro nkair. Riwai nyõ nawe jõ saso amot mkah bo manhai ajõ fee. Tna nawe jõ tryoh ara make ro jõ tyum fee ye.
Menohe nyõ noo pitis ajõ nisoh re noo mafer mawat fee! Rau ro moof to, nyõ noo pitis ajõ reto nee kʼraa re ana misoh tna mafer mawat! Nno feto re kbe jõ tama tru pitis reto mkah amot rau!’
Tna bobot retait yawe kʼraa ro mros mam weto yawe, ‘Ntak pitis ajõ mbam sryan retait yatem. Tna noo nee kʼsrian ro ybo pitis nsaa retait!’
Menohe ana ro mros mam weto mawe, ‘Bobot; raa retait ybo pitis nsaa oh!’

Tna bobot retait ykyas kʼana yawe, ‘Tawe: Awya ro yisoh bo wait kaket moof, kbe raa moo bo taro naut miryõ kʼait ye. Menohe awya ro hawe yisoh bo rait kaket to, kbe raa mrof moo bo rait ro yse weto beta mkak.
Tna tawe nmo nfot raa ro mamo byoh, ro mawe ana hawe bo jõ tamo
tbo ana to. Nmo nfot ana beta, nbo nma, tna nme ana mam befo re jõ tmat mkah tasu ajõ ye.’”
Yesus ykyas bo weto mkak, tna fo yasen yamo. Ait ysya kuber wAit mamo mam iso ro Yerusalem fares.
Tna ana snok remo ro Betfage msya remo ro Betania. Remo weto mhau mam Faut ro Zaitun. Tna Yesus ybis kuber wAit mabo ewok matim wia. Ait yawe,
“Ntim wia, nmoʼt remo reto. Tna twok nmo to, kbe nkai
maku sau raa make mros wea mam weto.
maku reto raa maut hre mam uu fefares. Nmo skur
reto tna nkuk nma.
Soh raa mtu bo kʼanu mawe, ‘Anu skur
reto mkah bawya?’ Anu nwe kʼana nwe,
ybis.’”
Tibyo ana mbewok mamo tna mmat mnan si bo bawya ro Yesus riwai ykyas kʼana.
Ana skur kri-kri fares, tna raa ro
rana mama mtu kʼana mawe, “Anu skur
ramu reto mkah bawya?”
Ana mawe,
ybis.”
Ana mkuk
reto mamo mee kʼYesus. Tna mrus
wana mnin
kbor. Tna mse Yesus hre abyõ.
Ana mamo renti. Mamo mam iso tna raa tom
wana ntar-tar anya mam iso iti. Tna Yesus ykah
yber iti yamo yamo.

Kene wo frok mam Yerusalem to, iso ro ana mamo reto mroh mbam faut ro Zaitun. Tna raa mawat ro ja kro Ait mamo mtar Ait. Raa weto tii mmat bo msai sor ro Yesus yno. Tibyo ana bibi Allah mkah mai ro mase. Tna ana smar-smar mtar-tar Ait mamo ye.
Ana mawe kʼYesus mawe,
“Nyõ nase toni! Nyõ fi
ro nama mkah
yatak rAit! Nyõ nama mam
yasom! Kbe Nyõ nisoh iranya raa msya Ait! Nbaut Allah ro yhau mam sawro rAit!”
Mazmur 118:26
Raa ro
baro ro mmat feto mawe, “
; nbis raa ro kro Nyõ weto shait!”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Soh tbis ana wefo shait to, kbe fraa wofo masen mmai. Mtu mawe, ‘Ait retait Raa ro yase! Nbaut Ait oh!’”
Yesus snok mam Yerusalem makit rau to, Ait sraujin tna yawia.

Tna yawe, “Jõ ksoh tawe anu ro nhau mam Yerusalem to nhar nwe Jõ tama afo re tisoh iranya wanu nsya Allah. Menohe anu hawe nri bo ro Jõ tawe. Tibyo kbe anu aro srau fee. Kbe anu nhar bo ro Jõ tno reto fee ye.
Raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu to meen mama. Mama mros mur mbusyit anu. Tna kbe masen frok sker mam jaro-jaro.
Kbe raa sbe mame anu msya kukek wanu. Tna ana misasi amah wanu. Tibyo bofir
ro amah wanu to, smut frut-frat beta; sau mhau mros fee. Allah yama yawe sotak iro wanu, menohe anu wase Ait. Tibyo bo ro mkair weto kbe mama mai kʼanu.”
Yesus yamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Ait twok Samu reto bohra rau, tna ymat he raa hre masim bo wana. Tna Ait yhaf aya yasen yikyak ana.
Yawe,
“Bokom ro Allah mawe, ‘Samu aJõ fo mkah bo raa skabuk. Menohe anu nma sikowah Samu refo sai!’”
Yesaya 56:7; Yeremia 7:11
Rabu wawa Yesus ykyas bo mam Samu ro Allah. Tna
manes ro
Yahudi, msya
msya raa mabi taro sor to, saim mawe mame Ait yajat.
Menohe raa taro sor beta mari bokyas rAit tna kbo matak. Tibyo raa manes weto mkai iso ro mame Ait aro fee. Ana mnaut mawe kbe raa weto hafrah. Ana hawe bo mno raa kmo.
Ti sau Yesus betoo watum ro
tna ykyas Bokyas ro Moof
mam Samu ro Allah. Ykyas bo to, raa manes ro
Yahudi mama:
manes,
msya raa mabi wana ye. Ana mama tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe,
“Awya oh mi ybis Nyõ, re Nyõ nama nno bo wefo fo? Tna awya oh mi yoo yatak rait yee kʼNyõ fo?”
Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ttu si bo sau kʼanu ye, tawe:
Yohanes
, Ait retait raabis ro Allah fe mfe a?”
Raa manes weto mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Soh bwe Allah oh mi ybis ait to, kbe Yesus yawe, ‘Feto tna fyi re anu ntu sioh bo ro Yohanes yawe?’
Raa wefo mnaut mawe Yohanes tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Feto soh anu bwe raa sai ybis ait to, kbe raa makin kmo. Tibyo moo fraa mai anu bjat!”
Feto to ana mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Amu wase ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Feto Jõ ye te tkyas tatak aJõ ro tno bombra wefo kʼanu fee.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Bobot sait yyum
mara mawat mam tabam rait. Tna ait ybis raa baro yawe ana mkah tna kmot armato
rait reto wea, kwiyat kʼana. Ait yawe kbe ana moo make rau to, saim baro hayah kʼait. Tna bobot retait yasen yamoʼt oo roto. Ait yhau mam teto kait.
Tna soo ro

mara wait weto make manes to, bobot retait ybis sryan rait sait hah yamoʼt tabam rait, yamo yo kʼraa ro kmot armato reto. Bobot retait ybis sryan retait yawe, ‘Nkyas kʼana ro kmot armato ajõ nawe ana mryoh
make aro moo mee kʼnyõ. Tna noo
make weto nakah nama nee kʼjõ.’ Tna sryan retait yasen yamo. Yamo snok mam armato ro bobot rait reto. Menohe raa ro kmot armato weto to huwya mai sryan retait. Ana mikyak ait. Tibyo ait hah ye ybo
aro fee.

Feto to bobot retait ybis sryan rait roto sait u yamo. Sryan ro ewok retait yamo. Yamo snok mam armato ro bobot rait reto tna raa ro kmot armato reto huwya mai ait ye. Ana mamus ait ye tna mikyak ait. Tibyo hah ye yamo tna ybo
aro fee ye.
Tna bobot retait yasen ybis sryan rait ro tuuf yamo u. Menohe raa mai ait tna yakah yaaf. Tna ana kmo wer mikyak ait mnan ana mbewok ro tinyi ye mawe, ‘Hah namo tno!’
Tna bobot retait ynaut yawe, ‘Kbe tno bawya u? Tnaut tawe tbis ku ajõ ro tksoh refi yesait yamo rof. Kbe ana waa ait tibyo mmat ait rauk.’ Tna ku ait yasen yamo.
Menohe raa ro kmot armato
reto mmat he ku ait yama. Tna ana mkyas kʼanya mawe, ‘Ait ro meen shauk armato refo yama mefi! Ait refi yhau ma! Nma, anu bme ait yajat to, afo re meen armato refo mhau kʼanu!’
Tibyo ana mfot ait mkuk makah mamoʼt armato mne tna mame ait yajat.”
Tna Yesus ytu yawe, “Bobot ro armato rait retait kbe yno bawya kʼana ro kmot armato reto?
Kbe ait yama yame raa weto tu. Tna ysan armato
reto kʼraa roto taro.” Ana mabi ro
Yahudi mari feto, tna mawe, “Aha! Mfe!”
Menohe Yesus ymat ana tna yawe, “Nnaut Bokom ro Allah far-far refo: Fyi re Bokom ro Allah mkyas bo refo?
‘Raa saso fraa mawe sgi samu sau. Ana mmat fraa sau mawe mkair. Fraa reto to, ana hawe. Tibyo moo mbeak makus. Menohe ana wase bo fraa reto oh mi fraa ro ati.’
Mazmur 118:22
Awya ro mbtek yai abyõ mam fraa reto to, kbe sasyoh. Tna awya ro fraa reto mbtek mai to, kbe rarin-raran ye.”
msya

manes weto mhar mawe Yesus ykyas bofret reto ykyas mai kʼana. Tibyo ayõ reto ana saim iso re kbe mfot Ait. Menohe ana waa mfot Ait mam wore raa makin mmat. Ana mnaut mawe kbe raa weto kmo ana. Tibyo mfot Ait tetara mam weto fee ye.
Raa manes ro
Yahudi mmat tan bo ro Yesus yno. Mnaut mawe iso ro moof to, soh ana mari Ait ykyas bo aro ro sre to, kbe ana mamo misisi bo reto

retait, raa ro Roma, tna ait yase re kbe yoo safo mana ymit kʼYesus. Feto tna raa manes weto mbis raa baro, mawe ana mamo ti te kro Yesus tna mari bo ro yawe. Mbis mawe ana mamo wan-wan mfi raa ro mhaf moof tna mtu bo baro kʼAit.
Tibyo raa weto mamo mo kʼYesus mawe, “Bi

amu nhar nwe bo beta ro Nyõ nkyas to, bo mabo. Nyõ nkyas bo ro Allah ybis yawe anu bno, nkyas mnan si. Tna Nyõ waa raa ro manes fee. Nyõ beroh nkyas bokyas ro Allah kʼawya sai. Tna iso ro Allah to, ja Nyõ nerif abyõ kʼraa to, nmyõt bo fee ye.
Feto to amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Allah ksoh yawe anu mbero namabyoh
fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yhar yawe ana mamo wan-wan sai. Tna yawe,
“Noo pitis mauf sau nee kʼJõ tmat wia.
refo fo msya awya yasom rait mefo?” Ana mawe,
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh feto, bo bawya ro
rait to, noo nee
Tna bo bawya ro Allah rait to, noo nee kʼAllah.”
Raa mawat mros mari bo ro Yesus ykyas weto. Tna bo ro ykyas to, yweh kbet fee. Tibyo raa ro mamo byoh weto mrok shait sai tna miskawowo mari bokyas ro Yesus reto.
Tna fo raa ro
baro mama mo kʼYesus. (Raa ro
to raa ro
Yahudi ye, menohe ana ja mnaut mawe raa ro mhai to, meen me mrok masen fee.)
Ana mtu kʼAit mawe, “Bi
tiwya Musa ykom yawe, ‘Soh raa sait yhai tna ait sano. Semit reto kbe yao kro mkah yabe ku aro mkah shauk biin ait ro yhai retait.’
Tna amu ntu bo kʼNyõ nwe: Mfi bo raa sme mabo ngkrema mao kʼanya mhau. Tna ro bum ymen fai sau, he ait sano tna yhai.
Tna ait ro ytan kro semit rana. Menohe ait sano tna yhai ye.
Feto ye yao ro tuuf yama kro semit rana naut menohe yabe ku aro fee ye. Feto ye mnan anya sai mamo snok ro ngkrema beta.
Tna fai reto mhai ye.”
Tna raa ro
weto nti te mtu Yesus mawe, “Meen ati ro hai mrok masen to, awya yfain fai reto? Tiwya ana mabo ngkrema ye mfain fai au reto ye fe mfe a?”
Yesus yawe, “Raa ro mhau mam tabam refo to, ja mmen fnya.
Menohe meen raa mno feto fee. Allah ysok raa taro yno ana mrok masen. Mam makyon ro mama reto to, ana weto kbe mhau mam sawro ro Allah. Ana kbe moo fnya fee. Tna fnya weto kbe mamo msya raa fee ye.
Kbe meen ana mnan fi
sor. Tibyo meen mhai u fee. Allah yno ana mrok masen. Tibyo ana to ku ro Allah wAit.
Nnaut bokom ro Musa tiwya ykom: Ti sau Allah ykyas bo kʼMusa. Musa yari mai rAit mam ara kinyah-kanah sau. Ara reto smut mait warah. Tna Allah yawe,
‘Jõ fi Allah ro Abraham, Ishak msya Yakub ja mbaut.’
Keluaran 3:6
Allah yawe feto tibyo anu bhar bwe hohos wanu weto ro mhai ooh oh, ana mhai tibyo fee. Menohe Allah yawe ana mhau mam sawro rAit smot Ait fares to. Raa ro mhai oh, Allah yawe ana weto mhau fares.”
Tna
baro mawe, “Bokyas aNyõ to moof ati.”
Tna raa aro ter-ter mtu bo kʼYesus u fee.
Tna Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Ja raa mawe kbe
tait Kube ro
Daud.
Menohe
Daud yesait, ati ro ykyas
to, ytu Ait yawe,
ro ybo jõ.’ Mam aam ro Mazmur Daud ykom yawe:
yawe
ro ybo jõ yawe, “Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam ati ro tatem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Hre wea.
Tna raa ro byoh, raa ro srau kair kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe Nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ ana, nbo ana.”’
Mazmur 110:1
Mam bokom far-far reto to, Daud yesait ykyas
yawe, ‘Ait fi
ro ybo jõ’.
Fyi re raa mawe Ait fi Kube ro Daud?”
Raa beta hre mari bo ro Yesus ykyas fares. Tna Ait yawe kuber wAit yawe,
“Kaket anu be kbe
miwro anu! Ana ja hasu bo myum ratan ro moof tna hasu bo raa bibi ana tna ksoh mawe raa mmah meen kʼana wore mamo mam
bo. Ati ro ana mamoʼt samu watum soh mfe mamo sohmaam bo msya raa roto to, ana ja msok ambar ro moof tna mhre mam weto.

Ana skabuk miyõ wer afo re raa mmat ana. Raa mmat feto tna mnaut mawe ana raa ro ja mno bo moof sai. Semit mnaut mawe ana raa ro ja mno bo ro moof, tna ana miwro semit weto tna mtak amah wana ye. Feto to, meen bo ro mkair toni mama mai kʼana tu oh.”
Yesus ykyas bo mam Samu ro Allah fares. Tna ymat raa ro bobot baro mamo mbero pitis wana mam yuk ro raa msan bosan wana
Tna ymat semit sau ro suawe ye. Au mamo mbero pitis mauf rau ewok sai.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri oh: Semit refo mbero pitis rau mawat miwer raa roto beta.
Ana roto beta mbero kebet sai mbam kta wana ro mninon. Menohe semit refo mse bosatoh mawat fee. Au msan bo wau beta
Raa taro tawyõ Samu ro Allah tna mawe raa mfen fraa ro moof toni tna mse. Tna raa msan bo wana ro moof toni to, fayir Samu reto ye. Yesus yawe,
“Bo beta ro anu nmat wefo meen matu. Meen raa mitrah Samu reto. Tna kbe
msya fraa sau bo mhau ntar-tar anya feto fee. Meen fraa weto skik beta mbtek mai mam tabam.”
Ana mtu bo kʼYesus mawe,
tija re bo ro Nyõ nkyas weto mabo to? Kbe amu nmat bo bawya re nhar nwe bo ro Nyõ nawe weto kene wo mabo?”
Yesus yawe, “Kaket anu! Nno be raa mama sioh besruf anu. Jõ fi
sait aran. Menohe meen raa mawat mama to, sruf bo mawe ana
ybam kʼAllah. Tna kbe ana mawe, ‘Ayõ rau kene wo sboh oh!’ Nri ana ma! Kro ana ma!
Kbe anu nri he raa rabin taro mame anya tna mafa mnin-nin. Bo weto kbe mabo tu oh. Menohe waa ma: Bo weto kbe frok matim wia. Bo weto frok mama tna ayõ rau sboh fefares.
Tna raa ro
sau kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro
roto taro. Tna raa ro
sait ybo kbe masen mame anya msya raa ro
roto taro mbo ye.
Kbe iin ro mase toni frok. Tna haisre msya hayama kbe mai raa mam rabin jaro-jaro. Raa mawat kbe kiyam tna mhai. Tna kbe
yno bo ro mase mam ayoh abyõ. Raa beta kbe mmat tna waa.
Bo weto mama fefares to, kbe raa mama mfot anu. Anu fo kuber woJõ. Au oh mi kbe raa mfot tna sikowah anu. Kbe ana makah anu mamoʼt samu watum ro Yahudi. Tna fo ana mbo anu mamo mbu mam
ye. Tna ana makah anu mamo msan
taro msya
na taro sor ye.
Bo mkair weto meen mai kʼanu. Menohe mafer rau ro tis to moof. Jõ bitsre bo reto mai kʼanu afo re kbe anu nkyas Jõ tasom kʼraa ro mase weto.
Nnaut myum-yam bokyas ro kbe anu nkyas si kʼraa weto to ma:
Kbe Jõ tesait besi bonaut msya bokyas ro moof kʼanu, re kbe anu nkyas. Bokyas ranu reto kbe mnan si yum. Tibyo kbe raa byoh ro mhaf kair kʼanu to, aro matak mkyas bo si fee, ana shait sai.
Meen nja, nme, nao, nno msya nfoh na wanu kbe hren ksuk anu. Anu aro kbe ana mame njat ye.
Anu smot Jõ tibyo kbe raa beta knait anu.
Menohe anu nna mawyan wanu kbe sau marak bo fee ye.
Nros ntak tna beroh smot Jõ. Tna meen anu nkai riof ro mase.”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Ati ro anu nmat raa byoh mbusyit Yerusalem to, anu nhar nwe
reto mhau kait u fee. Baro feto bo ro mkair mama sikowah
reto.
Ati ro anu nmat bo reto to, anu ro nhau mam
ro Yudea to; nsen nsam nmo nuut atu mana. Tna anu ro nhau mam
mato to; nsen nsam frok sikba
reto. Tna anu ro nhau mam
mne to; nmo twok mam
reto mato ma!
Ti weto to oon rau sboh oh. Tibyo Allah yno bo mai kʼraa mana ro Yahudi. Yno bo ska ana mnan si Bokom ro Allah tiwya raa mkom.
Wore weto to, fnya ro mhaf tna msya fnya ro mesis ku mees wana fares to, ana mmof toni. Ana kbe matak msam fooh fee. Bo ro mti kair kbe mbtek mai rabin refo. Tna
kbe kmo raa mana ranu refo.
Ana taro kbe raa mame majat. Taro ye kbe raa mfot tna mkuk makah mamoʼt
raa makin. Tna raa ro wase Allah kbe mama mhau mam Yerusalem. Kbe ana mbo
ranu refo snok mam ayõ ro Allah ybis yawe mnan. Tna makyon rau reto mkak.”
“Fyi re anu nhar nwe tabam kene wo haberek? Meen anu nmat ayoh to, nmat bo ro mase
yno mam ayoh; meen yno bo mai ayõ, snyi msya sken ye. Tna yno figyõm mase mai mam sawan ye; tibyo anu nri hmu rau mbam fari. Mam
ro arin aso beta to, kbe raa mmat bo weto, tibyo waa tna mnaut yyi. Ana tetet miskawowo.
Raa beta waa tetet mhai mmat bo beta ro mama mai. Meen bombra ro mhau mam ayoh skes to beta, Allah ybo sin. Tibyo raa mnaut yyi tru bo bawya ro kbe frok mama.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen ati reto to, raa mmat Jõ tbam ayoh mboh abyõ troh tama. Tama to, raa mmat Jõ tatak aJõ ro msai tna mmat tase aJõ ye.
Bombra ro riwai Jõ tkyas weto, ati ro anu nmat bo weto mama to, nsen nros! Nsimaut mase nwe ayõ ro Allah yfes anu to, kene wo mama oh meu!”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret refo kʼana yawe, “Nmat kake mara sor.
Mam tabam ranu refo, soh nmat masyoh rau teta frok feto to, anu nhar oh nwe kene wore snyi ro hwyõm oh meto.
Feto ye, soh anu nmat bo weto mama to, anu nhar sai oh nwe oon reto kene oh meto. Allah siwyan yamo
ytu raa wAit mama ybo meto.
Nnaut: Ati ro bo wefo beta mama to, tawe biin reto to, kbe raa taro mhau fares.
Ayoh msya tabam refo kbe saef marak. Menohe bokyas aJõ kbe meen mhau mawyõs mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nhau kaket afo re anu siwyan ayõ ro meen
yama! Nno bokyõ wer ma. Nta jyõ wer to ma. Nsui bo ro tabam refo toni to ma. Ayõ rau reto snok tubor. Soh anu nhau siwyan anu to fee, kbe anu nrok. Anu nrok mfi bo kak mami sna; tibyo mrok.
Raa beta ro mhau mam tabam refo kbe meen mkai ayõ reto tu oh.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kaket anu yoyo! Skabuk nyoh

afo re kbe anu nhau riof sai wore wo meen bombra wefo mbtek mai kʼraa. Tna meen mam sawro ro Taja to, Jõ ttu srah kʼraa beta to. Kbe anu nma tna nros si mam wore Jõ tasu ye. Skabuk re kbe, ati reto to, tmit safo kʼanu fee.”
Baas to Yesus watum bo mam Samu ro Allah. Tna mti to, Ait yamo yjin mam faut ro Zaitun.
Tna rabu momo raa msis-sas masen mamoʼt Samu ro Allah mawe mari bokyas rAit.
Korat
ro
Marak' to kene oh. Korat reto ja raa mtu mawe masom
ye.
Tna
manes ro
Yahudi msya

wana saso iso ro mame Yesus. Ana mawe mfot Ait wore wo raa makin mmat fee. Raa msis-sas hasu bo mari bokyas rAit. Tibyo raa manes weto waa raa makin mmat bo ana mfot Yesus, be kbe raa makin mrok mnin-nin.
Tna kabes yabi (Iblis) twok ybo Yudas Iskariot. Yudas tait, kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo 12 weto sait ye.
Yudas yasen yamo tna hre saim bo ysya
manes msya aban mana ro ja mbo raa sbe. (Raa sbe weto to raa ro Yahudi. Ana ja kmot Samu ro Allah.) Raa weto hre su msya Yudas tna saso iso ro kbe Yudas ysan Yesus kʼana.
Riwai Yudas yama yo kʼana to, ana weto nksoh toni. Tna ana mawe kʼYudas mawe kbe maren pitis kʼait.
Yudas ksoh. Ait yasen yamo. Tna ywof ati ro moof re kbe besruf Yesus. Yawe kbe yno wore wo raa makin mmat fee.
Raa makyõ korat
ro
Marak'. Ti ro tinyi rau reto ja raa ktan
sau ro kbe mabo mam bokyõ ro
Tna Yesus ybis Petrus ysya Yohanes yawe, “Nmo siwyan bo sohmaam re kbe anu bkyõ bokyõ ro
Ana mtu bo kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ nksoh nawe amu siwyan bo sohmaam mam woyõ?”
Yesus yawe, “Nmo ntwok mam Yerusalem. Tna kbe anu fri raa sme ro yasom baah mkah aya sait. Kro ait retait nmo twok mam samu ro kbe ait yatim twok to ye.
Tna nwe kʼraa ro samu rait reto nwe,
ranu ytu yawe, “Yuk ro kuber woJõ msya Jõ kbe nkyõ bokyõ ro
mam woyõ?”’
Kbe ait yerif amah hawar ro uu sau kʼanu. Amah hawar reto mase. Tna ambar bo mhau wea oh. Siwyan bombra mam beto.”
Tna ana mbewok masen mamo. Ana mmat he bo beta huwya mfi bo bawya ro Yesus riwai yawe kʼana. Tna ana siwyan bo sohmaam mkah makyõ bokyõ ro
reto.
Bo beta raa siwyan oh. Tna mti reto Yesus ysya kuber wAit hre sohmaam bo su.
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Tii ooh oh Jõ ksoh toni tawe hre takyõ korat ro
refo tsya anu wia. Tna fo kbe bo ro mkair mama mai kʼJõ.
Jõ kbe sohmaam korat ro
u fee mamo snok mam meen anu bkai mabo rau mam wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit.”
Tna Yesus yoo hawereh sau tubat abyõ mam uu tna skabuk
maya reto yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait yawe kuber wAit yawe,
maya refo noo nsaim nee kʼanya nta.
Jõ tesait kbe tata
maya u fee mamo snok mam oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit.”
Tna Yesus yoo
sau. Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
reto yee kʼana beta mait. Tna yawe, “Nmat
refo. Tetsu aJõ ro tsan mkah anu oh mefo. Niit oh. Tna kbe nno fefo u re nnaut Jõ.”
Ana sohmaam bo mkak tna Ait yoo hawereh reto tna yno mnan feto u yawe,
maya refo to mees aJõ ro kbe miyi mkah riof kʼanu. Kbe raa mame Jõ tajat tna Allah ysair Bosi ro Tna kʼanu oh meto.”
“Raa ro hren serek Jõ tait hre susai ysya anu mam wefo ye.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Kbe Jõ raa mame tajat mnan si bawya ro Allah yawe bait yum oh. Menohe bo ro mkair meen mama kʼait ro hren serek ysya Jõ retait.”
Tna kuber wAit mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Awya ro kbe hren serek fi?”
Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mkyas renti tna santri anya mawe ana to awya kbe yase toni.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro wase Allah to,
wana ja mberasi raa wana ro mbo. Menohe raa ro mase weto, raa mtu mawe ‘raa ro mhaf ase’. He mfe.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Nbo raa anya feto ma.’ Anu fo, awya ro yase, Jõ tawe yako hawe sai to ait haberek yamo ynan raa ro yaku. Tna ro aban mana to, Jõ tawe yako hawe sai ait yamo ynan sryan.

Awya yase toni: Bobot ro hre yait boit, soh mfe ait ro siwyan boit tna yasyõ yee kʼbobot yait? Ja raa mawe bobot ro hre yait boit tait yase toni. Menohe Jõ tama tfi raa ro siwyan boit tna tasyõ tee kʼanu niit ye.
Anu wefo rabu wawa ja nhau su nrat nsya Jõ, ebokfi bo ro mkair aro mai kʼJõ to. Anu oh mi raa ro ja sikba Jõ fee.
Taja ybis yawe Jõ tamo
tbo raa taro sor. Tna mfo refo Jõ tawe anu meen nbo raa taro ye.
Tno bo reto afo re meen anu sait-sait yase tna ybo raa mana ro Israel trion 12 weto ye. Tna wore wo Jõ tamo
tbo raa woJõ to, meen anu nsya Jõ hre sohmaam bo su.”

Tna Yesus yawe kʼPetrus yawe, “Simon, nari oh: Kabes yabi (Iblis) yayoh kʼAllah, yawe bitsre ait yama sanet anu beta. Yawe yno anu smot Jõ fee. Yawe yno anu sikba Jõ nmo nhau hayah; mfi bo raa sait ja yoo
rait ysok makan rau tna yse hayah. Tna marak rau ait yitsre akus.
⌞Tna Allah ybis.⌟ Menohe Jõ skabuk nyõ oh, afo re bosmot anyõ matak sai. Tna nyõ nhah nama no kʼJõ. Nashana to, tna tawe nisoh nno nao na to, bosmot wana matak ye.”
Petrus yawe,
jõ kbe twok
mato tna tajat su tsya Nyõ ye!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Petrus, nari: Kbe nyõ nno feto fee. Jõ thar tawe kbe kook mara fefares mam mti refo to, kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ muhrin tuuf, nawe nyõ nwase Jõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Tiwya Jõ tbis anu tawe nmo nkyas Jõ tasom aJõ. Tna tawe anu nmo to nbo pitis ma. Tawe, krek yume ro nfau bo to ma. Nse
ma. Ati reto anu nbo bo aro mabut fe mfe a?” Tna ana mawe, “Mfe.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bokom ro Allah far-far sau mkyas Jõ mawe,
‘Kbe raa mnaut mawe Ait tait Raa ro yber safo.’
Yesaya 53:12

Mfo refo bokom reto oon rau sboh oh mefo. Kbe bo reto mabo tu oh. Bo bawya-bawa sai kbe mno wa fee. Mfo refo tawe ati ro anu nmo to, kbe krek yume wanu, tna ro yse pitis to ybo weni, tna ro yse sbe aro fee to, kbe ait yasim ratan rait re kbe kwiyat sbe sau.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bokom ro Allah far-far sau mkyas Jõ mawe,
‘Kbe raa mnaut mawe Ait tait Raa ro yber safo.’
Yesaya 53:12

Mfo refo bokom reto oon rau sboh oh mefo. Kbe bo reto mabo tu oh. Bo bawya-bawa sai kbe mno wa fee. Mfo refo tawe ati ro anu nmo to, kbe krek yume wanu, tna ro yse pitis to ybo weni, tna ro yse sbe aro fee to, kbe ait yasim ratan rait re kbe kwiyat sbe sau.”
Tna kuber wAit mawe,
nmat, sbe trion ewok oh mefo.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Mnan oh.”
Yesus sikba Yerusalem tna yamoʼt faut ro Zaitun mnan ja yno soo oh. Tna kuber wAit kro Ait mamo ye.
Ana snok mam yuk reto tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Skabuk re kbe bo ro tabam refo tko anu nno iro to ma.”
Yesus yiserar yamo baro naut, tna hre tmi yimna skabuk yawe,
“Taja, Jõ tayoh kʼNyõ tawe Nyõ noo kair ro mama refo to, beak fari to. Nno re Jõ tru ma. He mfe: Nyõ nno mnan bonaut aNyõ sai.” [
Tna
sau mbam sawro ro Allah mroh mama frok tubor. Mama misoh bosmot rAit. Tibyo Ait yatak.
Yesus yrok yhaf miyõ toni. Ait yhaf aya tibyo mur-mur skabuk kaket renti. Ait yimyoh frok mnan mees ro miyi tna mbtek-tak mam tabam.]
Yesus skabuk mkak tna hah yamo yo kuber wAit. Ait yama ymat menohe ana mjin beta. Riwai ana sraujin toni tibyo mhai rowyõ.
Tna Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu njin to? Nsen tna skabuk. Skabuk re kbe bo ro tabam refo tko anu nno iro to ma.”
Yesus ykyas bo kri-kri fares, menohe raa majin sau mama. Yudas yatim wia yama yo kʼYesus tna hana Ait. (Yudas tait, kuber wAit mabo 12 sait.)
He Yesus yawe, “Yudas, Jõ oh mi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'! Fyi ro nyõ nama hana Jõ mkah bo hren serek Jõ mefo?”
Ati ro kuber wAit taro mmat bo ro kbe Yesus tru reto ana mtu kʼAit mawe,
fyi, amu nbo tfo nfa nsya ana fe mfe a?”
Tna kuber ro Yesus sait yasen ysot raa sait yimara ati ro yatem ati to hri. Raa retait tait sryan ro
yase rait.
Menohe Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Mnan oh!” Tna Yesus ybo sryan retait yimara tna yisoh mrok moof u mfi tinyi.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana ro mama mfot Ait yawe, “Jõ fi raa ro ja hafrah
Roma fee. Jõ tko raa mrok mnin-nin fee. Anu nbo sogi msya hbat wanu tna nma nfot Jõ to, nno fyi?
Rabu wawa Jõ thau su tsya anu mam Samu ro Allah menohe anu nfot Jõ mam beto fee. Mfo to, ayõ ro mamur snok mama oh. Tna anu nma wefo fo nkah ntak ro mkair mbam kabes yabi. Tibyo anu nma nfot Jõ fo.”
Ana mfot Yesus tna makah mamoʼt samu sau. Samu reto
Yahudi ro yase rait to. Tna Petrus ybo rof-rof ana mtis.
Snok mam bohra ro samu reto tna raa mko tafoh susai. Tna Petrus ysya raa baro hre su.
Tna sryan sau ro ano mmat Petrus hre yni foos ye. Au mmat ait kaket tna mawe, “Raa refi ja ysya Yesus ye!”
Menohe Petrus yawe, “Bokyas anyõ fyi meto? Jõ wase ye!”
Ti baro firwas tna Petrus hre fares. Tna raa sait ymat ait tna yawe, “Nyõ ja nsya Ait ye!” Menohe Petrus ywaar yawe, “Mfe, jõ fee!”
Ayõ sau naut tna raa roto sait yawe, “Ae, ait refi raa ro Galilea ye. Ait kuber ro Yesus sait tu oh!”
He Petrus yawe, “Bokyas anyõ fyi meto? Jõ wase ye!” Petrus ykyas fares si fo tibyo kook sau mara.
Tna Yesus siur tna ymat Petrus. Tna Petrus ynaut bokyas riwai Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Kook mara fefares to, kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ muhrin tuuf.”
Tna fo Petrus yasen frok yamo tna yawia sut-sut.
Raa ro kmot Yesus mamus Ait. Ana moo hawee make Ait yasu tna mai Ait. Mai tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Sgi nawe awya yai Nyõ metait?”
Raa ro kmot Yesus mamus Ait. Ana moo hawee make Ait yasu tna mai Ait. Mai tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Sgi nawe awya yai Nyõ metait?”
Bomus mawat raa mamus Ait.
Rabu momo tna raa manes ro
Yahudi, mama siret su. (Ana weto to
manes wana msya
wana ye. Ja ana siret su re mtu safo raa ro Yahudi.) Tna raa sbe ro kmot Yesus masen mbo Ait mamo mo kʼraa manes weto.
Ana mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Nyõ fi
fe mfe a?” Menohe Yesus yawe, “Soh Jõ tawe feto kʼanu to, kbe anu smot ye fee.
Tna soh Jõ ttu bo kʼanu to, kbe anu nwe si fee ye.
Menohe tawe kʼanu tawe: Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Maban tinyi rau mefo, kbe anu nmat Jõ hre tsya Allah ro yase. Kbe Jõ hre mam ati ro yatem ati; hroh ro mase reto.”
Tna ana beta mtu mawe, “Soh feto, Nyõ refi Allah yare a?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Ae; au oh nwe meto.”
Tna ana mawe, “Ait fi Raa sai. Menohe yesait yawe Ait fi
! Yawe feto, Ait nto Allah oh meto! Tna anu besait bri oh. Kbe anu saso raa roto mama maun Ait mkah bawya! Mfo refo anu besait bmit safo reto kʼAit!”
Raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi weto, beta masen mros. Tna mbo Yesus mamo mo kʼPilatus.
Mamo mo kʼPilatus tna ana masen maun Yesus mawe, “Raa refi berasi watum ro Roma toni: Ro sau to, amu raa mana ro Yahudi to, Ait yiwro amu. Yawe amu nri bo ro
mawe to ma. Ro ewok to, Ait yawe wa yawe, ‘Noo namabyoh
wanu nee
to ma.’
Tna ro tuuf to, Ait yawe Ait yesait oh mi
Au oh mi yawe Ait yamo
Tibyo Pilatus ytu bo kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ fi
ro nbo raa ro Yahudi fe mfe a?” Yesus yawe, “Ae; bokyas anyõ reto mabo oh.”
Tna Pilatus yawe
manes weto msya raa taro sor ro mros mari bo ro ait yawe, “Jõ tnaut tawe Ait refi fi raa ro yisti safo ro mkair aro fee. Tmit safo aro kʼAit fee.”
Menohe raa mberoh sai matak toni mawe, “Bokyas rAit yno raa ro Yudea mhaf wana beta mkair. Tinyi rau yno mam
ro Galilea, tna mfo refo Ait yama ykyas bo rAit mam rabin ranu refo to ye!”
Pilatus yari bokyas reto tna ytu yawe, “Ait refi ybam Galilea a?”
Raa mawe, “Ae.” Tibyo Pilatus yawe, “Herodes oh mi ja ybo raa mam
ro Galilea.
Jõ fee.” (Ja bi Herodes yhau mam Galilea. Menohe ati reto ait yama iti yhau mam Yerusalem.)
Tibyo raa manes ro
Yahudi weto mbo Yesus mamo mo kʼHerodes. Herodes ksoh ymat Yesus. Tiwya ooh oh ait yari raa mkyas mawe Yesus ja yno bosair msis toni. Tna ati reto ait yawe ymat Yesus yno bosair aro.
Herodes ytu bo msis kʼYesus. Menohe Yesus shait sai.
manes msya
na mros su mam weto ye. Ana kmo tna mkyas besus-basas Ait, tna maun Ait.
Riwai Yesus yawe Ait fi
Feto to raa sbe mawah ratan ro mfi
na ja myum to, mse kʼAit yyum. Tna Herodes ysya ana sret Ait masah. Tna Herodes ybis raa sbe wait weto mbo Yesus hah mamo mo kʼPilatus u.
(Herodes ysya Pilatus ana mbewok ja soo mtoh anya, menohe ati reto ana mbewok me haberek miranya u.)
Yesus raa makah hah mamo mo kʼPilatus. Tna Pilatus ytu
manes, raa manes taro, msya raa beta yawe mama siret su.
Ana mama tna ait yawe, “Riwai anu nbo Raa refi nma no kʼjõ tna anu nuun Ait nwe ja yno raa mbeswan
ro Roma. Jõ ttu sas Ait tna tnaut tawe Ait yisti safo maku aro bo fee saut. Yno safo mnan boun ro anu nuun Ait weto ye fee.
Tna Herodes ynaut yawe Ait raa sai bait ja yno safo aro fee ye. Tibyo Herodes ybis Ait hah yama yo kʼamu. Anu nhar nwe Ait yisti safo ro mase aro fee. Safo ro Ait yisti re anu nme Ait to aro fee!
Jõ tbis raa mai mahoh Ait sai. Tna fo jõ bitsre Ait.” [
aro firwas-firwas korat ro
mama tna Pilatus tufrok raa sait ybam
yawe yamo bait. Korat
reto to, ait yawe kbe bitsre Yesus.]
Menohe raa ro siret mam beto hawe. Beta masen mawe, “Mfe! Nme Ait yajat! Tufrok Barabas ybam
(Tiwya raa sait ro yasom Barabas yno raa ro Yerusalem mnin-nin. Tna ait yame raa sait yajat ye. Tibyo raa mbu ait mam
Menohe Pilatus yawe bitsre Yesus. Tibyo yawe kʼraa weto u yawe ait ksoh rait to, bitsre Yesus yamo bait.
Menohe raa weto mtu fari mawe, “Mfe, name Ait yajat mam ara warok!”

Tna Pilatus yasen yawe kʼraa weto mun tuuf u yawe, “Nwe nme Ait to, fyi? Ait Raa ro yisti safo bawya? Jõ tnaut tawe Ait yisti safo aro fee saut. Safo mase ro Ait yisti re anu nme Ait to, aro fee! Feto to tbis raa sbe mai Ait wia, tna bitsre Ait yamo bait.”
Menohe raa kmo mawe renti mawe, “Yesus kbe raa mame tu!” Tibyo bokyas manta mati rana. Tna fo tis rau Pilatus yari.
Tibyo Pilatus ybis yawe raa mame Yesus mnan si bo ro ana mawe.
Tna ait bitsre Barabas ro ana mayoh retait. Tna Yesus raa msan mam ati rana. Tna ana mno mnan bo ro ana mawe sai.
Tna raa sbe mbo Yesus mamo frok amah reto, tna makah mamo mame Ait. Ana mamo mam iso tna fri raa sait ybam safom yama. Ait raa ro srim, ybam
ro Kirene. Yasom rait Simon. Ana mfot ait tna mkuk ait yawe yasom ara warok ro Yesus. Tna Simon yasom ara warok reto kro Yesus mam tis.
Ana mamo to, tna raa mawat kro Yesus mamo ye, msya fnya baro ye. Fnya weto sraujin toni tna mawia Yesus ye.
Yesus siur haberek yawe kʼfnya weto yawe, “Fnya ro nhau mam Yerusalem: Nwia Jõ ma. Nwia anu nesait tna nwia ku wanu sai.
Meen arin mkair mama mai kʼraa ro mhau mam Yerusalem. Tibyo kbe raa mawe, ‘Fnya ro siban, fnya ro mabe ku fee, msya fnya ro moo sis mee ku mait fee to; kbe ana simaut mase!’
Arin mkair tibyo raa mayoh mawe bo mai ana majat. Mawe, ‘Rau ro moof to, atu mbra sor matu mama mnyien amu!’ Tna mawe, ‘Rau ro moof to, faut mama msyoh kait amu!’

Jõ tno safo aro fee. Jõ tnan fi ara sau ro safom fares. Menohe raa mno bo mkair mai kʼJõ mnan fefo. Menohe anu, raa ro Yerusalem fo, nno iro mawat. Anu nnan fi ara ro samer. Meen raa mno bo bawya mai kʼanu?”
Raa sme roto mabo ewok tiwya mno safo. Ana raa makah mamo re mame su msya Yesus ye.

Ana mamo snok mam faut sau ro masom 'Yuk ro Hamana'. Mkah mai rana to, raa mawe 'Golgota'. Raa sbe mse Yesus mam ara warok sau. Tna mse raa ro marmtuk mabo ewok mam ara warok feto ye. Ana mse sait mam ati ro Yesus tem ati tna sait mam ati ro Yesus tem ta.
[Tna Yesus skabuk raa sbe weto yawe, “Taja, nyon iro ro ana mno refo. Ana wase bo bawya ro ana mno.”] Tna raa sbe weto moo bo tane re kbe mhar awya ro yoo ratan ro Yesus rAit. Tna saim kʼanya.
Raa msis mros mam weto horit. Tna raa manes taro mamus Yesus mawe, “Ait yawe Ait tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Yawe Ait tait Raa ro Allah ysok. Ait yno riof kʼraa roto. Sik yno riof kʼAit yesait ye!”
Raa sbe mamus Yesus ye. Tna ana moo
maya ro mano mee kʼYesus yata.
Tna mawe, “Soh Nyõ fi
ro nbo raa ro Yahudi meto mi, sik nno riof kʼNyõ nesait ai.”
Riwai raa mkom bokom sau mse mam ara warok reto abyõ. Bokom reto mkom mawe: “Raa refi
raa ro Yahudi.”
Ait ro raa mame ysya Yesus sait yamus Yesus ye yawe, “Nyõ fi
fe mfe a? Soh nyõ fi
meto mi nno riof kʼamu mbewok nsya Nyõ nesait ye!”
Menohe ait roto sait yastako ait retait yawe, “Nyõ ye raa mame su najat nfi Ait. Tibyo nyõ waa Allah fe mfe a?
Anu bewok bber safo tibyo raa mame anu bewok. Menohe Ait refi yber safo aro fee!”
Tna yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Yesus; kbe namo
nbo raa woNyõ to, nnaut jõ ye!”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Ae, ayõ refo ye kbe nyõ nsya Jõ bhau su mam yuk ro moof.”
Ayõ ro 12 baas bo feto, tna mti abut frok mama mfi bo mti. Mama mhau snok mam hreha ayõ ro tuuf.
Ayõ mo fee. Tna
ro nkro mam Samu ro Allah reto mesait mhah ftah ewok.
Tna Yesus ytu fari yawe, “Taja, Jõ tsan tafos aJõ kʼNyõ sai!” Yawe feto tna yhai.
Raa sbe ro yase yamo aban mana tait, ymat bo weto, tibyo yasen ybaut Allah tna yawe, “Mabo oh, Ait refi raa ro yno bo moof ati sai!”
Raa mawat mros tna horit bo raa mame raa mam ara warok weto. Menohe ati ro mmat bo bawya ro snok weto beta, ana beta sraujin toni tna hah mamo bana.
Menohe Yesus yafoh wAit msya fnya baro ro kro Ait mbam
ro Galilea, mros fari mmat bo weto beta.
Raa sait ro yasom Yusuf yros ymat ye. (Ait retait ybam remo ro Arimatea. Ait raa ro yhaf moof toni. Tna ait ja ste oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Ait raa manes ro
Yahudi sait. Ana weto raa ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi. Menohe Ait hawe bo raa saim mawe mamo mame Yesus.)
Raa sait ro yasom Yusuf yros ymat ye. (Ait retait ybam remo ro Arimatea. Ait raa ro yhaf moof toni. Tna ait ja ste oon ro Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Ait raa manes ro
Yahudi sait. Ana weto raa ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi. Menohe Ait hawe bo raa saim mawe mamo mame Yesus.)
Yusuf ymat bo ro ana mno. Tna yamo yo kʼPilatus tna yayoh yawe ajat ro Yesus reto raa msan kʼait. Pilatus yawe, “Ae.”

Tibyo Yusuf yamo skur Yesus ybam ara warok reto. Tna sro ajat reto mkah hawee ro moof sau. Tna yamo yse mam isra sau. Ako reto raa kowak mam fraa ro faut sau mkah bo raa moo hai wana mse. Tna raa sama hai aro mam isra mato refo fefares.
Ayõ reto
hreha oh. Tna menrabu ayõ ro raa ntmoh
Feto to mam
to, ja raa ro Yahudi siwyan bo mkah
Raa makah ajat rAit reto tna mse mam isra mato. Tna fnya ro kro Ait mbam Galilea weto mrof mamo kro mam tis tna mmat.
Tna ana hah mamo siwyan
ro sawer msya botkif sor mkah kbe mamo ngkaru hai ro Yesus reto. Menohe mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to, ana swior bo ro ana mno beta; ana kro bo mafa ro
rana.
Ayõ ro
rabu momo toni, fnya weto mbo botkif wana ro ana siwyan beta oh tna mbo masen mamoʼt isra reto.
Snok mam weto tna mmat fraa ro taa muut isra wa reto to, raa mririk oh. Tna isra mato maa sai.
Tibyo ana twok mam isra mato reto, he fri hai ro
Yesus reto fee.
Tibyo ana mros tna mnaut tna mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bawya mno mefo?” Menohe raa sme mabo ewok frok tubor mama mros kene msya ana. Raa weto myum ratan ro ngkren mboh fyok.
Fnya weto waa toni mrok tetet. Tibyo maka mabum. Tna raa mabo ewok reto mawe kʼana mawe, “Fyi re anu saso Ait ro yhau yaam mam befo fo? Ako mato refo fo, yuk ro ja raa mse hai.
Ait yarak. Ait yrok yasen oh! Nnaut bawya ro tiwya Ait ykyas kʼanu mam ati ro anu nhau mam Galilea fares.
Tiwya Ait yawe, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' retait tait, kbe raa msan kʼraa ro mno iro. Ana weto kbe mame Ait yajat mam ara warok. Tna kbe ti ro tuuf to, Ait yrok yasen.”
Fnya weto mari bo reto tna mnaut bokyas ro Yesus reto.
Ana hah me mamo. Tna mkyas bo weto beta kuber wAit mabo 11 reto msya raa roto ro kro Ait beta.
Fnya ro mkyas bo weto kʼraabis wAit to, ana masom sor oh mefo: Maria Magdalena, msya Yohana, msya Maria ro Yakobus yme, tna msya fnya roto ro riwai msya ana mamo mmat he Yesus yarak.
Menohe kuber wAit weto mnaut mawe fnya weto sioh-sah sai. Ana mari bokyas ro fnya weto mawe fee.

Tna fo Petrus yasen yhoh yamo ymat isra mato reto. Ait yaka koyo ymat mam isra mato. He hawee ro raa sro Yesus mesait aran mbris mam weto. Tibyo Petrus hah ye yamo. Tna ynaut myum-yam yawe, “Bo bawya ro mno mefo.”
Ayõ reto ye kuber ro Yesus wAit mabo ewok mamoʼt remo sau ro masom Emaus. Mbam Yerusalem mamoʼt remo reto
mara 11 bo feto.
Ana mbewok mamo mam iso miyõ reto to, tna ana mbewok mkyas bo yase ro mnin-nin mam Yerusalem reto.
Ana mbewok mkyas bo weto nkri-kri tna mtu bo kʼanya si fo, tna Yesus yesait yama yo kʼana kait tna yamo su ysya ana.
Ana mmat Yesus, menohe bo sau mburut ana masu wa tibyo ana mhar Ait fee.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nkyas bawya mefo?” Ana mbewok susu mros mkah masu ro sraujin.
Ana mbewok weto sait yasom Kleopas. Ait yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ nari bo aro fefares a? Nyõ nesait aran raa srim mam Yerusalem re wase bo yase ro mfo mnin-nin mam beto to fea!”
Yesus ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Bawya meto?” Ana mawe, “Bo ro taa raa mno kʼYesus, raa ro ybam Nazaret retait. Ait tait
ro Allah ybis yama. Ait yhar bo ykyas watum ro mbam Allah to, ykyas kaket. Tna yatak yno bo ro msai ye. Raa ksoh Ait ye tna yno Allah yhaf mnan ye.
Menohe
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa mabi wamu to, moo Ait msan kʼraa mame yajat mam ara warok.
Ti tuuf yhai. Menohe tiwya amu ninaut nwe Ait oh mi raa ro yama yfes raa ro Israel. Amu ninaut nwe Ait kbe yai raa ro mamo byoh kʼamu tna yno riof kʼanu.
Tna rabu momo fo, fnya wamu baro mamoʼt isra wore raa mse ajat rAit reto. Mamo tna mmat he ajat reto marak! Ana hah me mawe kʼamu mawe ana mmat
mabo baro sor. Tna
weto mkyas bo kʼana mawe Yesus yrok yasen oh!
Tna rabu momo fo, fnya wamu baro mamoʼt isra wore raa mse ajat rAit reto. Mamo tna mmat he ajat reto marak! Ana hah me mawe kʼamu mawe ana mmat
mabo baro sor. Tna
weto mkyas bo kʼana mawe Yesus yrok yasen oh!
Tna raa wamu baro mamo mmat isra reto ye. Menohe mabo mfi bo ro riwai fnya mkyas weto ye. Mmat he ajat reto marak ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu raa ro wase bo! Tiwya Allah ybis
sor mama mkyas bo rAit. Menohe anu nhaf matak tna niwana bombra ro ana mkyas beta!
Yako hawe sai
tru kair ro mnan feto wia, tna kbe Ait ykai bobot rAit ro mase to.”
Tna Yesus betoo Watum ro Allah kʼana mbam aam ro Musa ykom snok mam aam ro
aro sor mkom. Ait betoo bokom beta ro mkyas Ait kʼana re mhar ye.
Kene ye msya remo ro ana mbewok mamo reto to, Yesus yawe mfi bo yamo bait yiwrek sai yamo.
Menohe ana mberoh toni wesi Ait mawe, “Hreha oh, ngkinine mti ye oh. Nhau nsya amu mam befo wia.” Tibyo Yesus yari feto tna twok yhau ysya ana.
Ati ro ana mbewok hre tna msya Ait mait boit su to, Yesus yoo
ybo tna yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
reto saim kʼana mait.
Tibyo mam ati reto to, ana mrok mhar mawe Ait retait Yesus. Menohe Ait yrok yarak sai tubor.
Ana mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Riwai Ait betoo Bokom ro Allah kʼanu mam iso maka iti to, anu smut ksoh!”
Ayõ reto ye ana mbewok reto masen hah me mamoʼt Yerusalem. Mam beto tna ana fri kuber ro Yesus mabo 11 weto beta msya mafoh na makin taro sor hre kri-kri wea.
Ana weto mkyas bo mawe, “Mabo oh!
yrok yasen, tna fo yerif Ait kʼSimon-Petrus!”
Tna ana mbewok masen mkyas mawe Yesus yerif Ait kʼana mam iso tna yamo su ysya ana ye. Mkyas mawe ana wase Ait wea mam weto. Tna wore wo Ait haber
re yee kʼana mait to, ana mbewok mhar Ait ye.
Ana hre mkyas bo kri-kri fares, menohe Yesus frok tubor yros susai ysya ana. Tna yawe, “Waa ma.”
Ana mnaut mawe berwanah oh mi snok tubor mawe bo kʼana meto. Tibyo ana mrok waa tna tetet.
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Fyi re anu waa to? Nnaut bo maut-mroh to ma!
Nmat ye tatem aJõ msya taa aJõ mefo. Sasas Jõ tna haninin ye. Anu nhar nwe ja berwanah to, kwiyan msya mtai aro ye mnan fi Jõ fefo fe mfe a?”
Yesus ykyas feto tna yerif naat ro yaa rAit msya yatem rAit bo kʼana.
Ana simaut toni tna miskawowo fares. Tibyo ana mnaut mamo-me fares. Tna Ait yawe, “Anu nse boit aro mam befo fe mfe a?”
Ana masen moo syoh mabuf ro saruk sau mee kʼAit.
Tna Ait yoo yabo wore wo ana beta mmat ye.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tiwya thau tsya anu fares to, tkyas tawe, ‘Mam Bokom ro Allah to, Musa ysya
na msya raa ro mkom aam ro Mazmur to, mkyas Jõ tasom. Tna bombra ro ana weto mkom oh to, beta kbe mabo mnan bo ro ana mkom to ye.’”
Tna Yesus yno ana makit wana maah afo re ana mhar Bokom ro Allah.
Ait yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mawe,
kbe ykai bo ro samyoh mai kʼAit, tna yhai ye. Tna mam ti ro tuuf kbe Allah yno Ait yrok yasen.’
Tna Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe
kbe ybis raa mamo mkyas Ait yasom.’ Ana weto kbe mawe kʼraa mawe, ‘Nashana tna kbe Allah yyon iro wanu.’ Bo refo kbe raa mkyas mam Yerusalem tinyi wia, tna fo mamo snok mam
beta ye.
Anu nmat bo samyoh weto ro mai kʼJõ oh, mnan Bokom ro Allah mkyas. Anu nmat mabo rau oh to. Anu nmat oh tna kbe nsen nkyas bo weto kʼraa.
Tiwya Allah ysi yawe kbe yatak rAit matam raa. Tna kbe tbis tak ro mbam Allah reto mama matam anu. Tawe nhau mam Yerusalem wea ste tak reto mama.”
Yesus yakah ana weto yamo kene mam remo ro Betania. Mam beto tna Ait yitbat yatem rAit tna skabuk yawe Allah yno bo moof kʼana.
Skabuk ana kri-kri fo, tna Allah tubat Ait yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit.
Ana mbaut Ait. Tna ana hah mamoʼt Yerusalem mkah simaut rana mase toni.
Ja rabu wawa ana mamoʼt Samu ro Allah tna ana bibi Ait yoyo.
John: Tiwya tinyi tabam refo mkah bombra beta marak fares. Menohe Ait sait ro raa mtu 'Bokyas ro Allah' yhau soo bait wia oh. Ait yhau su ysya Allah, tna Ait fi Allah.
Tiwya tinyi Ait yhau su ysya Allah.
Ait tait raa mtu 'Bokyas ro Allah'. Ait tait yfen bombra beta ro mhau mam tabam refo to. Bo sau mbam iso roto aro fee.
Ait yafos rAit mhau sai yum. Ait yhau yroon yawyos. Ait fi ybo raa mafos wana msya bombra beta. Yafos ro mhau kʼAit to mnan fi kek. Tna yafos rAit reto mno raa mmat Kek reto. Mno masu maah.
Tiwya Kek reto mama tna mait mram amur. Tna amur reto to, matak mikabuk Kek reto fee. Mno tna Kek reto mhai fee.
Tna Allah ybis raa sait yama. Raa retait yasom Yohanes.
Ait yama mkah bo ykyas 'Kek' reto. Ait ykyas bo ro yesait ymat. Tna ait yama ykyas bo ro ymat reto afo re raa mhar mawe mabo oh. Afo re raa beta smot 'Ait ro ynan fi Kek.'
Yohanes fi Kek reto fee. Yohanes raa ro yama mkah bo ykyas Kek reto sai.
Kek ro ati refo mamaʼt tabam refo. Mama mram raa sait-sait.
Raa ro Ynan fi Kek retait, tiwya yfen tabam refo. Tna yama yhau mam tabam refo ye. Menohe raa ro tabam refo wase Ait.
Yesus yfen tabam refo. Tibyo bombra beta to bo wAit. Raa wAit ro tii yfen to, Yesus yama yo kʼana. Menohe raa wAit weto to, ana mawat hawe bo mmat Ait.
Menohe raa baro mmat Ait. Ana mmat tna smot Ait to. Yesus ykyas ana yawe, “Ana weto oh mi mamo ku ro Allah wAit.”

Raa mamo ku ro Allah wAit to hayah. Tna iso ro fnya mabe ku to hayah ye. Mnan anya fee. Ku ro fnya mabe to, ana mbam raa sei sai. Menohe ku ro Allah yabe to mbam raa mana sau fee. Ja raa ksoh rana mabe kube aro. Tibyo ana mabe ku. Menohe ku ro Allah yabe to hayah. Ku weto to mbam raa ksoh wana to fee. Raa sme ja ksoh yawe yjin ysya fnya. Yno tna au mhaf tna au mabe ku. Menohe raa mamo ku ro Allah wAit to mnan feto fee.
Bokyas ro Allah reto haberek mamo raa. Raa retait yama yhau mam tabam refo su ysya anu.
Tna amu nmat bo yase rAit oh. Ait tait Ku bum ro Allah yare. Ku rAit sait tomu. Tibyo Allah ysan bo yase rAit beta Ku retait. Ait yhar bo ro ati miwer. Tna Ait tait Raa ro yatmof raa miwer.

Yohanes ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa. Ykyas bo ro yesait ymat feto to, ait yhar yawe mabo oh. Mkah ymai fari Yohanes yawe, “Ait ro tiwya tkyas kʼanu to Ait oh mefi. Jõ tama tkyas Ait wia matim. Tna Ait yama. Menohe Ait fi yase yiwrek jõ. Tiwya fnya mabe jõ fefares to, Ait yhau tuu oh.”
Ait yatmof raa miwer tibyo yno bo moof kʼanu beta. Tna anu fri bo mafer mninon.
Watum ranu ro
Yahudi to
, tiwya Allah ykyas kʼMusa. Tna Musa yoo yee kʼanu. Menohe mfo refo Allah ybis Yesus yama yo kʼanu. Ybis yama afo re yerif boatmof rAit. Tna ybis Ait yama afo re kbe raa mhar Allah yhaf, srau rAit.
Raa aro ymat Allah fefares. Menohe Ku bum rAit yno re anu bhar Allah. Ait tait yesait aran Ku ro Allah yare. Tna Ait hre kut-kut ysya Yaja
Yohanes ykyas Yesus yasom. Ykyas bo ro yesait ymat feto to, yhar yawe mabo oh. Tna ti sau mam Yerusalem to, raa manes ro
Yahudi mbis raa wana baro masen mamo mo kʼYohanes. Raa ro ana mbis to:
wana msya raa mana ro Lewi baro. Mbis ana mamo mtu bo kʼait mawe, “Nyõ fi awya?”
Raa weto mama mo kʼYohanes. Tna mtu bo kʼait. Tna Yohanes yasen yawe abyõ si kʼana yawe, “Jõ fi
ro ja anu nwof to fee.”
Tna ana mawe, “Feto to nyõ fi awya? Amu nwof
Elia
hah yama u. Nyõ fi bi Elia fe mfe a?” Ait yawe “Mfe.” Tna ana mawe, “Allah yawe meen Ait ybis
roto sait yama ye. Nyõ fi
retait, fe mfe a?” Ait yawe, “Mfe.”
Ana mtu mawe, “Feto to nyõ fi awya? Kbe amu hah ne nmo nkyas kʼraa ro mbis amu nma to, tna kbe amu nkyas nwe bawya?”
Tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya yama ykom bokom sau. Bokom reto mkyas raa sait ro meen yama. Tna Yohanes yawe, “Jõ fi ait ro tiwya
Yesaya ykyas yawe,
‘Kbe raa sait yamoʼt tabam ro riamo sau tna ykyas bo ro Allah matim wia. Ykyas yawe, “Mbetrot iso mkah
yama!”’”
Yesaya 40:3
Ana ro raa mbis weto to taro raa ro
Tna ana mawe kʼYohanes mawe, “Nyõ fi
fee,
Elia fee, tna
roto sait reto fee ye. Awya ybis re nyõ
raa fo?”
Ait yawe, “Jõ fi raa ro
anu mkah aya sai. Menohe raa roto sait yros su ysya anu wefo ye. Tna anu wase Ait fares.
Jõ tama tkyas Ait wia matim. Tna fo Ait yama. Ait retait yase toni yiwer Jõ. Tna jõ toof mkah bo skur
rAit to fee.
Bo weto to, Yohanes ykyas mam Betania. Remo reto mhau mam Aya Yordan majoh ti brat, ti ayõ maut. Ait
raa mam beto.
Rabu ti fo, Yohanes ymat he Yesus yama. Tna Yohanes yawe kʼraa ro hre mari ait yawe, “Nmat, Ait ro yama fi. Ait ynan fi
maku
ro Allah ybis yama. Ait tait Raa ro yama yyon iro wanu beta.
Ait oh mi riwai tkyas kʼanu tawe, ‘Jõ tama tkyas Ait wia matim. Tna fo Ait yama. Menohe Ait refi yase yiwer jõ. Tiwya fnya mabe jõ fefares to, Ait yhau bait wia oh.’
Jõ tama
raa mkah aya afo re raa ro Israel mhar Ait. Tinyi rau to, jõ wase Ait ye.
Ati ro Allah ybis jõ
raa mkah aya to, jõ wase Ait fares. Menohe Allah yerif Ait kʼjõ yawe, ‘Soh nyõ nmat Har aJõ mroh mhau abyõ kʼRaa sait to, Ait oh metait kbe
raa mkah Har aJõ.’ Tna mabo oh. Tkyas bo ro jõ tmat kʼanu tawe: Tmat Har ro
haberek mnan fi ruu
sau. Tna fru mbam uu mama mroh abyõ kʼAit.
Ati ro Allah ybis jõ
raa mkah aya to, jõ wase Ait fares. Menohe Allah yerif Ait kʼjõ yawe, ‘Soh nyõ nmat Har aJõ mroh mhau abyõ kʼRaa sait to, Ait oh metait kbe
raa mkah Har aJõ.’ Tna mabo oh. Tkyas bo ro jõ tmat kʼanu tawe: Tmat Har ro
haberek mnan fi ruu
sau. Tna fru mbam uu mama mroh abyõ kʼAit.
Bo refo tasu tmat tna tkyas tawe Ait tait Ku ro Allah yare.”
Tna rabu ti fo Yohanes ysya kuber
wait mabo ewok mros mam weto.
Tna Yohanes ymat he Yesus frit yamo tna yawe, “Nmat,
maku ro Allah yama oh metait.”
Kuber ro Yohanes mabo ewok reto mari bokyas reto tibyo sikba ait tna kro Yesus.
Yesus siur, ymat ana mbewok reto kro Ait mamo mam tis tna ytu kʼana yawe, “Anu mbewok saso bawya meto?” Tna ana mtu bo kʼAit mawe,
nyõ njin mam woyõ?”
Yesus yawe, “Nma nmat.” Tibyo ana mbewok msya Ait mamoʼt amah ro Ait yhau. Ayõ ro jiit hreha bo feto. Tna ana hre mkyas bo su mamo snok mam ayõ hawer.
Kuber mabo ewok ro masen kro Yesus reto to, sait yasom Andreas. (Ait tait Simon-Petrus yao.)
Tna Andreas yamo fooh saso yao Simon tna yawe, “Amu tru
oh!” (Reto oh mi
Tna ymen yao yakah yamo yo kʼYesus. Yesus yasu yrom Simon tna yawe kʼait yawe, “Nyõ fi ku ro Yunus yare. Kbe raa mtu nasom ‘Kefas’.” (Reto oh mi Petrus.)
Tna rabu ti fo Yesus yawe yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Ait yamo saso Filipus tna yawe, “Nama kro Jõ.”
Filipus tait raa ro Betsaida. Betsaida to remo ro Andreas ysya yao Petrus rana.
Tna Filipus yamo saso Natanael tna yawe kʼait yawe, “Amu nkai Ait ro tiwya Musa ykyas mam Watum ro Allah. Ait ro tiwya
na mkyas ye! Yasom Yesus. Ait retait tait Yusuf yare ybam remo ro Nazaret!”
Menohe Natanael yawe, “Hemba! Feto to bo ro moof aro mbam Nazaret oto?”

Tna Filipus yawe, “Nama bmo tna kbe nyõ nesait nmat!” Ati ro Yesus ymat Natanael yama to yawe, “Ait retait raa Israel ro yhaf moof. Bosruf aro mhau kʼait fee. Ait ja yno bo mnan si raa Israel ro yoof.”
Natanael ytu bo kʼYesus yawe, “Fyi re Nyõ nhar jõ to?” Tna Yesus yawe, “Riwai Filipus ytu nyõ fefares to, Jõ tmat nyõ oh hre mam ara mair tno.”
Natanael yawe, “Bi
: Nyõ fi Ku ro Allah yare, Nyõ fi
ro nbo raa ro Israel.”
Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Riwai tawe tmat nyõ hre mam ara mair oh mi nyõ smot Jõ to? Bo sair reto maku sai. Jõ kbe terif bo ati ro mase aro hair kʼnyõ.
Kbe nmat ayoh mato nkro tna nmat
na maut mroh abyõ kʼJõ. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'.”
Mam ti ro tuuf to, raa makyõ bokyõ mam remo ro Kana. Raa sait yoo fai sau. (Kana to mhau mam
ro Galilea.) Yesus yme mamoʼt bokyõ reto ye.
Tna raa moo taah mee kʼYesus ysya kuber wAit ye. Tna ana mamoʼt bokyõ reto beta.
Raa makyõ bokyõ reto tna
maya mkak. Tibyo Yesus yme mamo mo kʼAit mawe, “Yesus;
maya fo mkak oh.”
Menohe Yesus ye yawe kʼau yawe, “Nyõ nama nawe bo reto kʼJõ fyi? Jõ tno bo ro mno raa mhar Jõ to fefares. Oon reto sboh fefares. Jõ thar bo woJõ.”
Menohe yme masen mamo mkyas bo kʼsryan na. (Sryan baro mhau tna siwyan bo ro bokyõ reto.) Yesus yme mawe, “Bo bawya ro Ait ybis kʼanu nno to, nno oh.”
Yesus ymat baah marak (
) ro mase trion ntamam mhau. (Baah weto to ja raa mse aya mkah bo raa myon matem wana mnan fi raa ro
rana ja mno soo oh. Baah weto to ja raa mror aya 100
bo feto mam sau-sau.)
Tna Yesus yawe kʼsrian weto yawe, “Nmo nwyan aya nkah nma. Tna nror mam baah weto matot beta.” Sryan weto mari tna mamo mwyan aya mama tna mror matot.

Tna Yesus yawe kʼsryan weto yawe, “Tna nwyan aya reto kebet baro nror mam hawereh sau. Tna nbo nmo nee kʼbi ait ro yisoh bo sohmaam to, yata sanet yari wia.” Tibyo ana moo aya baro mamo mee kʼbi ait yata.
(Riwai Yesus yno aya mboh mam baah weto haberek mamo
maya.) Ana makah mamo mee tna bi retait yata baro sanet. (Ait wase
maya ro msu refo mbam mam woyõ. Sryan weto mesait mhar.) Bi retait sanet yari he aya reto msu.
maya reto to, mafah rau to moof ati. Tna bi ait ytu kʼait ro ymen fnya retait yama.
Tna yawe kʼait yawe, “Ja raa moo
maya ro msu mee kʼraa mata matim wia. Raa mata ro moof reto tibyo bisir. Tna kbe tis rau to, raa masyõ
maya ro mkair to mee kʼraa mata. Menohe riwai nyõ nabe
maya ro moof refo mamo snok mam wore mfo refo tna nyõ nasyõ nee kʼraa mata!”
Yesus yno bo msai reto yerif yase rAit oh mefo. Bo msai ro tinyi reto Yesus sair mam Kana ro mhau mam
ro Galilea. Tna kuber wAit smot Ait mawe Ait yase toni.
Tna fo Yesus ysya yme, yao na, msya kuber wAit mroh mamo sia mamoʼt remo ro Kapernaum. Tna mhau mam beto ti baro bo feto.
Korat ro
makyon rau to kine oh. Tna Yesus yaut yamoʼt Yerusalem.
Ait yamo twok mam Samu ro Allah tna ymat he raa masim
msya ruu
bo.
Tna ymat he raa taro hre mam ambar wana tna
pitis ye. Raa ro srim moo pitis wana mee kʼraa weto. Tna raa weto mee pitis mauf ro Yahudi kʼana si ye.
Yesus ymat raa mno bo weto tibyo yoo too sau yfen mnan
bo feto. Tna ybo ymok-mak
msya
ro raa masim weto frok msam mbam Samu ro Allah mato. Tna Ait haberek-barak ambar ro raa hre mkah bo moo pitis mee si kʼraa. Tibyo pitis wana somya-meya.
Tna Ait yawe kʼana ro masim ruu
weto to yawe, “Anu nno bawya meto ee? Tubat ruu wanu wefo fo nkah nmo to! Samu ro Taja refo fo samu ro raa masim-asam bo to fee!”
Kuber wAit mmat bo ro yno to, mnaut mawe Bokom ro Allah, far-far sau mkyas mawe:
“Tmat Samu aNyõ to thaf myoh!”
Mazmur 69:10

Tna raa ro Yahudi mastako Yesus mawe, “Nyõ nno bo feto mkah bawya! Awya ro ybis ee! Nyõ awya re nno bo feto to? Mfi bo Nyõ nawe Allah ybis Nyõ nama to, sik nno bo msai sau tna amu nmat. Nno bo ro merif Allah yatak rAit tna fo kbe amu smot Nyõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Soh anu nihabah samu refo to, kbe Jõ sgi te u to mkah ti tuuf sai.”
Tna ana mawe kʼAit mawe, “Amah refo tii raa sgi sgi
trion 46 wia tna mkak. Fyi re nyõ nawe sgi mkak mkah ti tuuf sai a?”
Menohe ati ro Yesus yawe 'samu' reto to, Ait fret bo yawe Ait yetsu rAit yesait meen yajat tna mam ti ro tuuf to, ait yrok yasen. ⌞Reto to bo msai ro kbe yno re kbe raa mmat tna smot Ait.⌟
(Meen Yesus yrok yasen tna fo kuber wAit mnaut bokyas ro tiwya Ait ykyas reto, tna ana srau wana mrok mbrah. Tibyo ana mhar yum oh mawe Bokom ro Allah msya bokyas ro Yesus reto sioh fee; bo mabo oh.)
Mam wore raa makyõ Korat ro
to, Yesus yhau mam Yerusalem. Tna Ait yno bo msai mawat. Tibyo raa msis-sas smot Ait.
Menohe Yesus yhar raa mhaf wana to. Yhar yawe kbe ana mros smot Ait tu fee. Tibyo Ait smot
ana toni fee.
Yesus yhar bo ro raa mnaut mam srau mato wana to. Yhar oh. Feto to ytu bo ro raa mnaut mam srau mato wana fee.
Raa ro
sait yasom Nikodemus. Ait tait raa manes ro Yahudi.
Mti oh tna ait yama yo kʼYesus tna yawe,
raa aro mno bosair mnan mfi Nyõ feto fee, soh Allah yatam ait fee. Tibyo amu nhar nwe Nyõ Allah ybis.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret yawe, “Soh raa sait yawe yamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, kbe ait yhah ye yamo yfi ku mees u. ⌞Au oh mi ku ro fnya mabe fee, menohe ku ro Allah yesait yabe mkah Har rAit.⌟ Soh raa retait yamo ku ro Allah yabe fee, kbe yamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee ye.”
Nikodemus wase bofret ro Yesus ykyas reto tna yawe, “Fyi re raa ro mabi oh hah me tna fnya mabe u mun ro ewok?”
Yesus yawe, “Soh raa sait yawe yamo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to fyi? Tawe fnya me mabe ait u fee. Tawe Allah oh mi yabe Ait. Yako hawe sai kbe ait yawe Allah yabe mkah aya ye tna mkah Har rAit ye. Bokyas ro ati oh mefo.

Ati ro fnya mabe ku to, mabe ku mees. Ku mees retait yetsu rait to metsu ro tna. Menohe riwai tawe, ‘Soh raa mawe mamo raa mana ro Allah wAit to, kbe yhah ye yamo yfi ku mees u.’ Bo fret reto to, tkyas tawe: Ati ro Allah yabe ku mkah Har rAit to, raa retait yhaf, srau rait haberek. Har ro
mno yhaf srau rait haberek mamo mnan Yaja Allah yhaf msya srau rAit. Feto tibyo yamos rait to yamos ro tna.
Allah ‘yabe raa mun ro ewok u’ mkah Har rAit saah. Tibyo raa mhaf, srau wana haberek, mrok moof to. Nyõ ktak bo ro tkyas reto ma!
Foos mfi to mamo tiyo-teya sai. Tna anu wase foos reto mbam woyõ. Anu bmat foos fee. Anu bri au hmu sai. Tna Har ro
mno raa mhaf, srau wana haberek to, anu bmat fee ye.”
Nikodemus yawe si kʼYesus yawe, “Bo reto mno fyi?”
Yesus yawe, “Nyõ namo
tna raa ro Israel ja mari nyõ ye: Fyi re nyõ wase!
Nnaut: Amu nkyas bawya ro amu nhar. Tna amu nkyas bawya ro amu nmat oh. Menohe anu, raa manes ro Israel, ja hawe bo nri bokyas ramu.

Riwai tkyas bo ro ja mabo mam tabam refo sai. Menohe anu srau fee. Anu nnaut bo weto mamo-me fares. Soh Jõ tkyas bo ro ja mabo mam sawro ro Allah to, kbe anu nfot fee ye. Feto to, tkyas bo maja ro Allah kʼanu fefares.
Raa aro mamoʼt sawro rAit fefares. Menohe Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Jõ tbam sawro reto frok tama oh.”
Tna Yesus ykyas kʼNikodemus yawe, “Tiwya Musa yhau mam tabam ro riamo. Tna yoo
yfen aban. Yfen tna yoo ara sau yse aban ro yfen mam ara reto makit uu abyõ. Tna yati mros.
Nnaut aban reto. Tna nnaut bo ro kbe raa mno mai kʼJõ: Meen 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, kbe raa mfot. Tna kbe ana moo Jõ mse mam ara abyõ uu mnan anya mfi feto ye.
Ait kbe raa teta abyõ afo re raa beta ro smot
Ait to, kbe ana mhau hame wajin.
Allah yatmof raa ro tabam refo toni. Tibyo yasen ysan Ku rAit sait tomu yamaʼt tabam refo. Yno afo re awya sai ro smot tna msam wai kʼAit kbe mhau hame wajin. Kbe yhai fee.
Allah ybis Ku rAit yroh yama re yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa ro tabam refo fee. Menohe Ku rAit yama afo re yno riof kʼraa.

Awya ro smot tna msam wai kʼAit to, kbe bi Ait yoo safo mana ymit fee. Menohe awya ro smot Ait to fee, kbe safo mana mhau kʼait oh. Raa taro smot Ku ro Allah rAit sait tomu fee. Smot Ait fee tibyo ana mesait masom safo mana wana weto.
Au oh meto: Kek reto mama tabam refo oh. Menohe raa hasu amur toni bana. Ana nksoh mno safo. Ana hawe kek reto. Feto tibyo Allah yoo safo ymit kʼraa weto.
Awya ro yno safo to ait knait kek. Ait hawe bo yama kene mam kek. Ait waa re kbe kek reto ntara bo ro ait yno mkair tna raa mmat.
Menohe awya ro kro iso ro ati reto to, ksoh yamaʼt wore wo kek. Yama re kbe raa mmat he bo ro ait yno weto mnan si bo ro Allah yawe, yno mkah tak ro Allah rAit.”
Yesus ykyas bo weto mkak. Tna fo ysya kuber wAit masen mamoʼt yuk roto mam
ro Yudea. Mhau mam beto tna Ait
raa.
Tna Yohanes ja
raa ye. Ati reto to, Yohanes yhau mam Ainon kene mam Salim. Mam beto to aya mawat. Tna raa mawat mama mo kʼait mawe ait
ana.
(Ti reto Yohanes raa mfot mbu mam
mato fefares.)
Tna kuber ro Yohanes wait mkyas bo msya raa ro Yahudi sait. Ana santri bo mkyas bo mafa raa ro
Yahudi ja mno soo oh. Ana mkyas iso ro raa misoh ana moof afo re Allah ymat ana.
Kuber ro Yohanes weto mamo mo kʼait tna mawe,
Raa ro taa ysya nyõ mam aya ro Yordan tino tait, Ait ro nyõ nerif kʼamu to, Ait
raa ye. Tna raa msis-sas mamo mo kʼAit.”
Tna Yohanes yawe, “Allah ybis raa mno bo rAit. Tna Ait oh mi Raa ro yoo tak yee tibyo raa weto mtai mno bo rAit. Soh Allah ybis fee, kbe raa mno bo feto fee ye.
Taa anu nesait nri bo ro tkyas tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Jõ fi
fee. Jõ fi raa ro Allah ybis tama tatim wia.’”
Tna Yohanes fret bo yawe,

yama to yama yfi raa sait ro ymen fnya. Tna jõ tnan fi yafoh rait. Yafoh rait yhau siwyan bo re kbe raa makyõ bokyõ. Yafoh retait yhau siwyan bo mam remo ro fnya reto. Ait ro yoo fnya reto yama tna yafoh yari ait ymai to, yafoh retait ksoh toni. Ynaut yawe, ‘Fnya refo fo fnya ajõ fee; au sikba jõ mamo msya Ait retait, moof toni.’

yama tna raa msis-sas mamo mo kʼAit to, jõ simaut toni. Mfi bo raa moo fnya to, ja raa makyõ bokyõ. Jõ tnan fi ait sait ro ymen fnya yafoh rait. Yafoh retait siwyan bo beta. Tna huwya re kbe ait ro yoo fnya yama. Yari he ait yama tna simaut toni. Feto to jõ simaut mase tari he Yesus yama.
Mfo refo Ait yamo Raa ro ati. Tna yamo yase renti yiwer jõ. Jõ fi raa ro ati fee. Tna te taku renti ye.

Ait ro ybam sawro ro Allah yroh yama tait yase ybo raa beta. Menohe ait ro yama ybam tabam refo to, raa ro sei sai. Ykyas bo ro tabam refo sai. Ait ro yama ybam sawro ro Allah tait yase yiwrek raa beta.
Ait ro yroh yama retait yama ykyas bombra ro Ait ymat msya bo ro yari mam sawro ro Allah. Menohe raa aro mari bo ro Ait ykyas to fee.
Ana ro mari bokyas ro Ait ykyas to mhar mawe, ‘Allah tait ja ykyas bo ro mabo.’
Allah yoo Har rAit mnan si yee
Tna ybis Ait yama. Tibyo Ait tait ykyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah.
Yaja yhafri Ku rAit. Tna ysan bombra beta kʼAit ye. Yawe yamo
ybo bombra beta.
Awya ro smot Ku rAit kbe yhau hame wajin. Menohe awya ro hawe bo yari Ku rAit to, ro yiwana bokyas rAit to, kbe ait fri kmo ro mbam kʼAllah mamo snok hame wajin.”
Yesus yber raa mawat tna
raa mawat miwer Yohanes. Yohanes
raa mabo kbet sai. (Yesus yesait
raa fee, kuber wAit oh mi ja
raa.) Raa ro
mari he Yesus yber raa mawat. Feto tibyo Ait sikba
ro Yudea hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea.
Yesus yber raa mawat tna
raa mawat miwer Yohanes. Yohanes
raa mabo kbet sai. (Yesus yesait
raa fee, kuber wAit oh mi ja
raa.) Raa ro
mari he Yesus yber raa mawat. Feto tibyo Ait sikba
ro Yudea hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea.
Yesus yber raa mawat tna
raa mawat miwer Yohanes. Yohanes
raa mabo kbet sai. (Yesus yesait
raa fee, kuber wAit oh mi ja
raa.) Raa ro
mari he Yesus yber raa mawat. Feto tibyo Ait sikba
ro Yudea hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea.
Yesus yamoʼt Galilea to Ait yamo frit iti rabin raa ro Samaria.
Tna snok mam remo ro Samaria sau ro masom Sikhar. Sikhar mhau kene msya tabam ro tiwya Yakub ysan ku rait Yusuf.

Mam weto aya mato sau ro tiwya Yakub yabah. Snok mam aya mato reto tna kuber ro Yesus mamo twok mam remo saso boit ro mait. Yesus yhai rowyõ iso ro yamo. Tibyo yhau bait mam aya mato reto hre sne hoh. Ayõ ro 12 baas bo feto. Yesus hre kri-kri fo, fai ro Samaria sau mama mwyan aya. Tna Yesus huwya yayoh aya kʼau yawe, “Noo aya baro nee kʼJõ tata.”

Mam weto aya mato sau ro tiwya Yakub yabah. Snok mam aya mato reto tna kuber ro Yesus mamo twok mam remo saso boit ro mait. Yesus yhai rowyõ iso ro yamo. Tibyo yhau bait mam aya mato reto hre sne hoh. Ayõ ro 12 baas bo feto. Yesus hre kri-kri fo, fai ro Samaria sau mama mwyan aya. Tna Yesus huwya yayoh aya kʼau yawe, “Noo aya baro nee kʼJõ tata.”

Mam weto aya mato sau ro tiwya Yakub yabah. Snok mam aya mato reto tna kuber ro Yesus mamo twok mam remo saso boit ro mait. Yesus yhai rowyõ iso ro yamo. Tibyo yhau bait mam aya mato reto hre sne hoh. Ayõ ro 12 baas bo feto. Yesus hre kri-kri fo, fai ro Samaria sau mama mwyan aya. Tna Yesus huwya yayoh aya kʼau yawe, “Noo aya baro nee kʼJõ tata.”
Menohe au mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ fi Raa ro Yahudi. Tna jõ fo fnya ro Samaria. Fyi re Nyõ nayoh aya tee kʼNyõ nata?” (Ja raa ro Yahudi msya raa ro Samaria miranya fee.)

Yesus yawe, “Soh nyõ nhar bouum ro Allah yawe yuumto kʼraa to, tna soh nhar awya oh mi yayoh aya kʼnyõ metait, kbe nyõ oh mi nayoh bo kʼJõ. Tibyo kbe Jõ too aya tee kʼnyõ nata to. Aya reto to mnan fi aya masu ro miyi yoyo.”
Fai au reto mawe, “Bo ro Nyõ nbo re nwyan aya to marak. Tna aya mato refo miyõ mrit toni. Fyi re Nyõ ntru aya ro mnan fi aya masu ro miyi yoyo reto?
Hohos ramu sait yasom Yakub. Tiwya yabah aya mato refo tna ysan kʼamu. Ait yesait ywyan aya mbam aya mato refo yata ye. Tna ku wait msya
wait ro ysia beta moo aya refo mata ye. Fyi, nawe Nyõ nase niwrek Yakub a?”
Yesus yawe, “Ja raa ro mata aya refo kbe mhai sbit u.
Menohe aya ro Jõ too tee kʼraa to hayah.

Awya ro yata aya ro Jõ too tee kʼait to, kbe yhai sbit u fee mamo snok mam hame wajin. Aya ro Jõ too tee kʼait yata reto to, haberek mamo aya masu mam kʼait yhaf mato frok. Tna aya ro Jõ too tee to, awya ro yata to, kbe yhau hame wajin.”
Fai reto mayoh kʼAit mawe, “Noo aya reto baro nee kʼjõ tata. Tna kbe thai sbit u fee. Tna meen thah tama twyan aya refo u fee ye.”
Yesus ybis kʼau yawe, “Namo ntu naa, tna hah nmaʼt wefo.”
Tna au mawe, “Jõ tsya raa aro fee.” Yesus yawe, “Bo ro nyõ nawe reto mabo oh.
Raa mabo trion maat ro nyõ nsya. Tna mfo refo ro ysya nyõ yhau mam amah tait nyõ naa metait fee. Bokyas anyõ reto mabo to!”
Au mawe, “Jõ tnaut tawe Nyõ fi
ro Allah ybis nama fo.
Amu hohos wamu ro Samaria ja bibi Allah to, mamoʼt atu rno. Menohe raa wanu ro Yahudi to, mawe raa bibi Allah mam Yerusalem sai.”
Ait yawe, “Nari bo ro Jõ tawe fo: Ayõ ro meen mama to, anu kbe nhar Taja aJõ. Mam wore weto to, anu nbaut Ait mam atu rno u fee tna mam Yerusalem u fee ye.
Anu raa ro Samaria nbaut Ait ro anu wase. Menohe amu raa ro Yahudi nbaut Ait ro amu nhar. Riof ro mase mama mbam raa ro Yahudi.
Menohe ayõ ro kbe mama to Har ro

kbe mkyas betoo bi Ait kʼraa re mhar bo mbaut Ait mkah mhaf ro ati. Feto kbe raa mhar bo mbaut Allah, tna mbaut Ait mam woyõ-woya sai. Allah ksoh bo raa mbaut Ait mfi feto. Tawe kʼanu tawe ayõ rau mama oh. Allah tait yfi raa fee: Yetsu marak. Allah tait har.
