Tibyo awya ro yawe ybaut Ait to, yako hawe sai kbe ybaut Ait mkah yamos rait ye tna tomer yhar yhaf rAit kaket ye.”
Menohe ayõ ro kbe mama to Har ro

kbe mkyas betoo bi Ait kʼraa re mhar bo mbaut Ait mkah mhaf ro ati. Feto kbe raa mhar bo mbaut Allah, tna mbaut Ait mam woyõ-woya sai. Allah ksoh bo raa mbaut Ait mfi feto. Tawe kʼanu tawe ayõ rau mama oh. Allah tait yfi raa fee: Yetsu marak. Allah tait har. Tibyo awya ro yawe ybaut Ait to, yako hawe sai kbe ybaut Ait mkah yamos rait ye tna tomer yhar yhaf rAit kaket ye.”
Tna au mawe, “Jõ thar tawe,
(ro raa mtu mawe
to) kbe yama. Yama, tna kbe betoo bombra refo beta kʼamu.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi Ait oh.”

Ti reto kuber ro Yesus wAit hah me. Tna mmat he Yesus hre ykyas bo ysya fai sau. Tibyo mrok ktak. Ana mawe mtu bo bawya ro ana mbewok mkyas. Tna mawe mtu fyi re Ait ykyas bo ysya fai reto. He mfe, ana shait sai.
Fai au sikba bo ro mwyan aya akus mam yuk reto, tna mhoh mamoʼt remo mawe kʼraa mawe,
“Nma nmat raa ro riwai jõ tkai mam aya mato reto! Ait ykyas bo kʼjõ tna yhar bombra ro tiwya jõ tno beta. Ait retait
fe awya?”
Ana mari bo ro au mkyas kʼana tna masen frok mbam remo reto mamo mmat Yesus.
Wore au marak to, kuber ro Yesus mawe kʼAit mawe,
noo boit baro nait!”
Menohe Ait yawe, “Mfe, Jõ tse boit ro anu nhar fee. Boit reto to, tait oh.”
Tibyo ana mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Raa aro mayõ boit mama mee kʼAit yait oh a?”
Yesus yawe, “Jo tari bo kʼAit ro ybis Jõ tama. Tna boit aJõ oh mefo: Tno bo ro yawe reto beta mkak.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ja raa mawe ‘Snyi jiit naut tna ora ro armato manes. Tna fo raa saraf.’ Menohe Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe bo ro armato Taja rAit make manes oh. Nesait nmat oh!
Raa taro furere bo manaf (
) mam armato ro Allah rAit wia oh. Mfo refo bo reto make manes. Tna anu fo raa ro mryoh bo ro armato rAit.
Anu nryoh bo ro armato reto tibyo meen raa mhau hame wajin. Raa ro tiwya furere bo manaf tna ysya raa ro yryoh bo ro armato reto to, Allah yoo boren yaren ana mbewok ye. Tna mbewok ye simaut mase.
Ja raa mkyas mawe, ‘Raa sait furere bo manaf tna raa roto sait yama yryoh mafer rau.’ Mabo oh.
Jõ tbis anu nmo nryoh bo mam armato ro tii anu nkah fee. Raa roto mkah oh mimyoh mbtek, tna anu nmo nkai mafer rau reto sai.”
Raa ro Samaria msis mari bo riwai fai reto mawe: “Ait yhar bombra ro tiwya jõ tno beta.” Tibyo ana smot Yesus mawe Ait fi
Tna ana mawe mabe Yesus mawe yhau ysya ana. Tna Ait yhau mam remo rana reto ti ewok.
Ana ro Samaria mari bo ro Yesus ykyas tibyo raa msis u mama smot Ait mawe bo ro Ait ykyas to mabo oh.
Tna mawe kʼfai au mawe, “Riwai bo ro nyõ nkyas sai oh mi amu smot Ait. Mfo refo amu nesait nri bokyas ro Ait ykyas. Tna amu nhar nwe Ait oh mi Raa ro yama yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa ro tabam refo.”
⌞Ybam
ro Yudea Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea fares fo. Yamo iso ro Sikhar.⌟ Yhau mam Sikhar ti ewok reto mkak tna fo yamo renti yamoʼt Galilea.
Tiwya raa ro rabin rAit hawe mari Ait. Feto to Yesus yawe,
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit to, ja raa ro rabin rait yesait to, hawe mari ait.”
Raa ro Galilea tiwya mamoʼt Yerusalem makyõ korat ro
Tna mam beto ana mmat bo Yesus yno bo ro msai. Tibyo ati ro Yesus hah yamo snok mam Galilea to, raa rabin reto ksoh mmat Ait.
Tna Ait hah yamoʼt remo ro Kana u mam Galilea. Taa Ait yno aya mboh haberek mamo
maya mam remo reto. Yhau mam Kana kri-kri fo,
sait ku rait kiyam samyoh mam remo ro Kapernaum.
Bi retait yari he Yesus ybam Yudea hah yamaʼt Galilea. Yari feto, tibyo ait yamo yo kʼYesus tna soh-soh kʼAit yawe, “Bobot, nama nisoh ku ajõ ro kiyam msai tna kerit yhai!”
Yesus yawe
retait yawe, “Soh anu nmat Jõ sair bo ro hnah fee, tna nmat Jõ tno bo ro msai fee ye, anu aro kbe smot Jõ fee.”
Tna
retait soh-soh u yawe, “Bobot, nama fooh be kbe ku ajõ kene wo yhai oh!”
Yesus yawe, “Namo oh. Ku anyõ retait kiyam marak.”
retait smot bo ro Yesus yawe reto. Yhar yawe Ait yatak yisoh ku rait. Tna re ait yamo.
Ait yamo fares mam iso maka fo sryan wait mama mkai ait mawe, “Ku anyõ to kiyam marak oh!”
Tna
retait ytu bo kʼana yawe, “Kiyam marak to riwai ayõ jya bo feto?” Tna ana mawe, “Iis mam ayõ ro sau baas bo feto kiyam marak.”
Tna ait yrok srau mbrah yawe, “Ae, iis ayõ reto oh mi Yesus yawe, ‘Ku anyõ yoof oh.’” Tibyo
retait ysya fnya, kukek, raa wait beta smot Yesus.
Yesus ybam
ro Yudea yamoʼt Galilea tna yno bo msai ro ewok refo mam beto.
Ti baro firwas tna raa ro
Yahudi makyõ korat rana sau naut. Tna Yesus yaut yamoʼt Yerusalem u.
ro Yerusalem to aya mbair sau mhau mam makit rau. Mhau kene mam Mato ro
Mam mai ro Ibrani to, aya mbair reto masom Betesda. Tiwya raa mkait yuk trion maat ro mhau mur aya reto, mkah bo raa hre baas iti.
Raa mawat ro mafa kiyam ja mjin mam yuk weto to: Raa ro kiyam, msya raa ro masu mboh msya ro maa maka msya ro matem maa bo mhai to ja mjin mam yuk reto. [Raa weto beta hre mwof aya mata mnah-nah.
sau mroh tna mno aya reto mnah-nah. Tna awya ro yroh wia yatim mam aya reto to, raa retait kiyam mrok marak.]
Mam yuk reto raa sait ro yafa bo
trion 38 bo feto yhau.
Tna Yesus yama tna ymat ait yjin mam beto. Yhar yawe ait tait kiyam ooh oh. Tibyo ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ ksoh bo noof fe mfe a?”
Menohe ait yawe si kʼYesus yawe,
mam ati ro
mno aya masu refo mata mnah-nah fo tesait ttai troh fee. Raa ro tubat jõ mse troh mam aya to marak. Tawe tamo troh menohe raa roto taro mroh wia oh.”
Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Beah aam anyõ tna nasen namo oh.”
Ayõ reto si fo raa retait yoof. Tna ait yasen beah aam rait ybo tna yamo.
Yesus yisoh raa retait mam ayõ ro raa
Yahudi ja ntmoh
Ait ro kiyam marak retait yamo to, tna fri raa manes ro Yahudi baro. Ana mmat he bi ait ybo aam rait yamo to. Ait yiwer Watum ro
ranu oh meto. Tibyo ana mastako ait mawe, “Ayõ ro raa wanu ntmoh refo: Nasom aam anyõ namo to nno fyi?”
Ait retait ye yawe, “Bi Ait ro riwai yno re jõ kiyam marak retait oh mi ybis jõ yawe tubat aam ajõ tna tamo fo.”
“Awya oh mi ybis nyõ tubat aam anyõ namo fi?”
“Twase ye. Ait yarak mam raa makin wefo.”

Ti baro firwas tna Yesus fri ait retait mam Samu ro Allah mato. Tna yawe kʼait yawe, “Nyõ kiyam marak mefo to, ne nno iro u to ma. Soh nawe nno bo ro mkair-kar u to, kbe kiyam ro samyoh toni mama mai kʼnyõ u.”
Tna raa retait frok yamo ykyas kʼraa manes ro Yahudi yawe, “Yesus, Ait oh mi yno re jõ kiyam marak fo.”
Ana ro Yahudi hawe bo Ait yisoh raa mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh. Tibyo ana tomer mfot Yesus.
Menohe Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Taja tait ykah bo rAit yoyo mamo snok mam ayõ refo. Feto to Jõ tkah bo ye.”

Riwai Yesus yisoh raa mrok moof mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh ye, tna fo Ait yawe Allah tait Yaja rAit ye. (Feto Ait yawe ynan anya ysya Allah.) Tibyo raa ro Yahudi mhaf kek renti tna mawe saso fyi re mfot Yesus tna mame.

Yesus ykyas Ait yesait kʼraa manes ro Yahudi yawe, “Nnaut: Bo bawya-bawa ro Ait retait ymat Yaja yno to, Ait yno ye. Tibyo Ait yesait yno bo aro kar fee. Ymat sas bo ro Yaja ybo yno. Tna Ait kro yno bo weto sai ye.
Allah yhafri Ku rAit. Tna yerif kʼAit bombra ro Ait yno beta. Tibyo Ait ytai yno bo ro Yaja yno ye. Kbe yerif bo ro msai toni miwrek weto ye. Tna anu nmat to nrok ktak.
Taja yatak yno raa ro mhai mrok masen, tna yno raa maam ye. Feto ye Ku retait yatak ye yno raa maam ye. Yno kʼawya ro Ait ksoh sai.
Taja yesait ytu srah ro raa sait bo yari fee. Yawe Ku rAit ytu srah raa beta.
Taja yno feto afo re kbe raa beta mmat Ku rAit, tna waa Ku rAit ye mfi bo ana mmat Ait, tna waa Ait ye. Awya ro ymat tna waa Ku rAit to fee, ait waa Taja ro ybis Ku rAit yama to fee ye.
Nnaut: Awya ro yari bokyas aJõ, tna smot Ait ro ybis Jõ tama to, meen yhau hame wajin. Ait retait meen Allah yno safo mana ymit kʼait fee. Ait yisnak hai yamoʼt roon ro hame.
Raa ro mhai oh kbe mari Ku ro Allah ymai. Tna raa ro mari kaket to, kbe maam. Makyon reto mama oh mefo.
Taja Ait yafos rAit mhau tu mroon mawyõs. Raa aro mabe Ait fee. Yhau sai. Tna yno re Ku rAit, Ait yafos rAit mhau tu mroon mawyõs ye.
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tibyo Allah yoo tak yee kʼJõ yawe Jõ fi tros susai ttu srah raa ro tabam refo. Bokyas ro ati oh mefo.
Nri bo ro Jõ tawe to ktak ma. Ayõ rau meen mama to tna raa beta ro mhai oh kbe mari Ait ymai.

Ana weto raa sama oh, menohe kbe ana beta mrok masen: Ana ro tiwya mno bo ro moof to, mrok masen tna kbe mhau hame wajin. Ana ro tiwya mno bo ro mkair to, kbe mrok masen ye. Tna Jõ ttu srah ro ana mno. Tna too safo mana tmit kʼana weto ye.

Jõ tesait ai ttu srah rana fee. Tesait tno bo sau kar fee. Jõ ttu srah tari to mnan bawya ro Allah ybis kʼJõ. Tna ja tno mnan si bo ro Ait yawe. Tno bo aro mkah ksoh aJõ tesait fee. Tno bo to tawe tno Taja yhaf mnan.
Mfi bo Jõ tesait aran tkyas tawe Jõ fi Ku ro Allah yare, kbe raa aro mari fee. Tna smot fee ye.
Menohe raa roto sait yhar Jõ tna ykyas Jõ ye. Tna thar tawe bokyas rAit reto to mabo tu oh.”
Tna Yesus ykyas kʼana ro Yahudi u yawe, “Anu nbis raa mamo mo kʼYohanes tna mtu bo kʼait oh. Ait ymat bo ro tno tna ykyas Jõ kʼanu. Ykyas bo mabo.
Ja tari bokyas mbam raa sai to fee. Menohe Jõ tkyas Yohanes bokyas rait afo re kbe anu nri ait tna nkai riof.
Tiwya Yohanes yama ynan kek ro mait. Yama tna ti baro to kek reto mram anu fo ye. Au oh mi ti reto to, anu nsu maah tna nksoh nri bokyas rait ye.

Tawe Jõ fi Ku ro Allah yare to. Tna bombra ro Jõ tno merif mawe Taja oh mi ybis Jõ tama fo. Tama tno bo ro Ait ybis to tno fo. Yohanes ykyas yawe Jõ fi Ku ro Allah yare ye. Bokyas rait reto merif Jõ tasom aJõ kebet sai. Menohe bombra ro tno merif bo reto kaket re raa mhar mawe Allah oh mi Raa ro ybis Jõ tama.
Taja ro ybis Jõ tama fo, yesait ykyas yawe Jõ fi Ku rAit. Menohe anu smot Jõ fee. Tibyo anu nri ymai fee. Tna anu nmat yasu rAit fee ye. Tna bokyas rAit anu nse mam nhaf mato wanu fee ye.
Taja ro ybis Jõ tama fo, yesait ykyas yawe Jõ fi Ku rAit. Menohe anu smot Jõ fee. Tibyo anu nri ymai fee. Tna anu nmat yasu rAit fee ye. Tna bokyas rAit anu nse mam nhaf mato wanu fee ye.
Anu ksoh nwe meen anu nhau hame wajin. Feto to anu ja hre nmat Bokom ro Allah. Nwe anu nmat tna nhar Bokom reto kaket. He mfe. Bokom ro Allah oh mi mkyas Jõ.
Menohe anu hawe bo nma no kʼJõ afo re meen nhau hame wajin.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa manes ro Yahudi yawe, “Jõ saso tasom aJõ fee. Reto bo ro ati fee.
Jõ thar anu. Thar tawe anu nhafri Allah mam nhaf mato wanu to fee.

Allah yesait ybis Jõ tama tkyas yasom rAit kʼanu. Tibyo Jõ tama. Menohe anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼJõ fee. Anu nri bo ro Jõ tkyas fee. Raa taro kbe mama mo kʼanu tna mkyas bonaut rana mesait sai. Fyi re anu nri ana? Ana mkyas masom rana mesait. Fyi re anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼraa weto?

Anu ksoh raa mmat anu tna bibi anu. Menohe anu sorni nwe Allah ymat anu to, bo ro ati. Tibyo anu ja nwe nno bo re kbe Ait bibi anu to fee. Nno fyi meto? Allah yesait aran Raa ro yase. Au oh mi anu hawe smot Jõ fea!

Meen Jõ tamo to kʼTaja. Tamo tna taun boun kʼanu to fee. Bi Musa oh mi yaun baun kʼanu oh. Bo ro Musa ykom mesait maun boun kʼanu. Anu ninaut nwe, ‘Amu nri Musa msya Watum rait reto. Feto kbe amu nkai riof.’ He mfe.
Watum ro Musa mkyas Jõ. Soh anu nfot Watum rait kaket to, maami anu kbe smot Jõ ye.
Menohe anu nmat Watum ro Musa to, nbo nno kaket fee. Feto kbe anu niwana bo ro Jõ tkyas ye.”
Ti baro firwas, tna Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Tna snyi reto to, kene wo raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro

Tna Yesus yroh yamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Tna frit yamoʼt ati tino. (Maru reto raa mtu masom maru ro Tiberias ye.) Raa mhar mawe Yesus yatak yno bo msai yisoh raa ro kiyam sor. Tibyo raa mawat mjor mama kro Ait. Tna fo Yesus yaut yamoʼt atu sau. Tna hre su ysya kuber wAit.
Ti baro firwas, tna Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Tna snyi reto to, kene wo raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro

Tna Yesus yroh yamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Tna frit yamoʼt ati tino. (Maru reto raa mtu masom maru ro Tiberias ye.) Raa mhar mawe Yesus yatak yno bo msai yisoh raa ro kiyam sor. Tibyo raa mawat mjor mama kro Ait. Tna fo Yesus yaut yamoʼt atu sau. Tna hre su ysya kuber wAit.
Ti baro firwas, tna Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Tna snyi reto to, kene wo raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro

Tna Yesus yroh yamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Tna frit yamoʼt ati tino. (Maru reto raa mtu masom maru ro Tiberias ye.) Raa mhar mawe Yesus yatak yno bo msai yisoh raa ro kiyam sor. Tibyo raa mawat mjor mama kro Ait. Tna fo Yesus yaut yamoʼt atu sau. Tna hre su ysya kuber wAit.
Ti baro firwas, tna Yesus hah yamoʼt
ro Galilea. Tna snyi reto to, kene wo raa ro Yahudi makyõ korat ro

Tna Yesus yroh yamoʼt maru ro Galilea. Tna frit yamoʼt ati tino. (Maru reto raa mtu masom maru ro Tiberias ye.) Raa mhar mawe Yesus yatak yno bo msai yisoh raa ro kiyam sor. Tibyo raa mawat mjor mama kro Ait. Tna fo Yesus yaut yamoʼt atu sau. Tna hre su ysya kuber wAit.
Yesus ymat he raa msis-sas maut mamaʼt atu reto mo kʼAit. Ait yawe kʼFilipus yawe, “Raa mawat mam befo fo, kbe anu boo
mam woyõ bee kʼana mait fo?”
(Yesus yawe ytu feto sanet bosmot ro Filipus. Yesus yesait yhar bo bawya ro kbe Ait yno oh.)
Filipus yawe, “Pitis mabut mkah anu boo
bee kʼana beta mait. Mfi bo pitis
trion 200 bo feto, kbe ana makin mait
kebet-kebet sai to. Pitis mabut sai.”
Kuber ro Yesus rAit roto sait yasom Andreas. Andreas tait Simon-Petrus yao. Tna Andreas yawe,
“Ku yaku sait yros mam befo. Tna ait yse
trion maat msya syoh mana ewok. Menohe bo wait weto mabut ye. Raa msis-sas fo.”
Yesus yawe, “Nbis raa weto hre mte.” Mam yuk reto bosafom moof. Tna raa weto beta hre mte. Raa sme wore weto beta to raa mabo trion 5000 bo feto.
Tna Yesus yoo
weto, tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna ybo saim kʼraa ro hre mam weto. Ana moo nksoh rana sai. Tna yoo syoh weto to, yno saim mnan anya ye.
Raa beta sohmaam mhaf matu. Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Noo
nmo soo
msya syoh mabuf ro mhau to nfau mam
Mbeak ma.”
Riwai
mabuf maat aran sai. Tna raa mait mhaf matu. Tna kuber wAit soo
mabuf ro mhau fares to, mfau mam
Mfau
trion 12 matot.
Raa mmat bo msai reto tibyo mawe kʼanya mawe, “Mamo snok ayõ mfo refo anu bwof
ro Allah ybis sait yama. Amu nnaut nwe Ait refi fi
retait yroh yama tabam refo!”
Ana baro mnaut mawe mabe Yesus yhau ysya ana. Ana saim kʼanya mawe mikoh Ait yamo
rana. Yesus yhar yawe ana mnaut bo reto tna hawe. Tibyo Ait sesa Ait tna yesait yaut yamoʼt atu sau.
Mti knu-knu fo, kuber ro Yesus mroh mamoʼt maru.
Arin mti oh to, tna Yesus yama yo kʼana fefares. Ana maut mam wiak rana mawe miin frit matim mamoʼt remo ro Kapernaum.
Ana miin mamo, mamo tna foos mase mama, figyõm mase mama mai ye.
Ana miin mamo
mara maat bo feto oh. Tna ana mmat he Yesus yama. Yama abyõ mam aya mata yo kʼana. Mmat tna ana waa.
Menohe Ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Waa ma, Jõ mefi.”
Ana mari mai rAit tibyo ana beta simaut. Tna mawe, “Nama naut oh!” Yaut hre tna mam weto si oh to, ana mmat he wiak rana snok mam joh ro Kapernaum oh.
Raa mawat mhau akus fares mam maru maam ati tino. ⌞Mam wore wo Yesus yoo

yayoh asik mase kʼAllah tna yee kʼraa mait to.⌟ Tna rabu ti fo, ana mnaut mawe, “Iis wiak sau aran mros mam joh. Tna mam wiak reto kuber ro Yesus mesait aran maut mamo. Yesus fee. Feto to Ait yaut wiak ryo?” Mhau tna wiak roto baro mbam remo ro masom Tiberias mama msyoha mam joh reto ye.
Raa mawat mhau akus fares mam maru maam ati tino. ⌞Mam wore wo Yesus yoo

yayoh asik mase kʼAllah tna yee kʼraa mait to.⌟ Tna rabu ti fo, ana mnaut mawe, “Iis wiak sau aran mros mam joh. Tna mam wiak reto kuber ro Yesus mesait aran maut mamo. Yesus fee. Feto to Ait yaut wiak ryo?” Mhau tna wiak roto baro mbam remo ro masom Tiberias mama msyoha mam joh reto ye.
Raa ro mhau mam weto fares mmat he Yesus ysya kuber wAit marak. Feto tibyo ana maut wiak weto mamoʼt Kapernaum mawe saso Ait mam beto.
Raa weto mkai Yesus mam maru tino. Tna mtu bo kʼAit mawe,
tija oh Nyõ snok wefo fo?”
Yesus yawe, “Anu saso Jõ fyi? Anu nmat bo msai ro Jõ tno menohe bohar wanu to mabuf fares. Anu niit
tna nhaf matu. Reto oh mi anu saso Jõ.
Tomer nkah bo re nkai
ro niit sai to ma.

to bo ro tabam refo sai. Rau ro moof to, anu nnaut nmos wanu. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Saso boit ro mbam kʼJõ oh. Boit ro Jõ too tee kbe mnis fee, kbe mkak fee. Boit reto to mno raa mhau hame wajin. Taja ykyas Jõ yawe, ‘Ait fi, Jõ thaf mnan.’”
Tna ana mtu kʼAit mawe, “Bo bawya sai ro kbe amu nno re Allah ksoh amu to?”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Bo ro Allah ksoh anu nno to fefo: Smot tna nsam wai kʼAit ro Allah ybis yama to.”
Ana mawe, “Mfi bo Nyõ raa ro Allah ybis, tna nawe Nyõ nase niwer Musa to, sik nno bo msai sau naut u. Afo re amu nmat wia tna smot Nyõ. Kbe nno bo bawya?
Tiwya tinyi hohos wanu mhau mam yuk ro riamo. Tna Allah ysair boit
ro ana mait. Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe: ‘Boit mfi
mroh mbam uu mbtek. Tna Musa yoo yee kʼana mait.’”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Musa fee. Nnaut: Taja oh mi tii yno
mbtek mroh mbam uu to. Tna mfo refo yoo
ro ati yee kʼanu niit.
Ait ro yroh yama ybam Allah tna yno raa ro tabam refo maam to, Ait retait tait
ro ati ro mbam kʼAllah oh metait.”
Ana mayoh mawe,
reto, noo nee kʼamu niit yoyo oh.”
Yesus yawe, “Jõ refi fi
reto. Tno raa mhau hame wajin. Awya ro yama yo kʼJõ tait yhai sre u fee. Tna awya ro smot Jõ to, kbe yhai sbit fee ye.
Riwai tawe, ‘Anu nmat Jõ menohe anu smot Jõ fefares.’ Mabo oh.
Menohe Taja ykyas raa roto taro yawe, ‘Ana ro Jõ tsan kʼNyõ to, ana weto kbe mamo raa woNyõ.’ Ana weto beta kbe mama mo kʼJõ. Tna awya ro yama yo kʼJõ to, kbe Jõ tikyak ait fee.
Jõ tbam Allah troh tama tno bo ro Jõ tesait ksoh to fee. Menohe tama tno bo ro Taja yawe.

Allah oh mi ybis Jõ tama to. Tna Ait ybis yawe Jõ kmot ana afo re ana beta beroh smot Jõ. Ana beta ro ysan kʼJõ to Ait ksoh yawe kbe sait yarak o yakus bo to fee. Tna meen tno re ana beta mrok masen mam ti ro tabam refo haberek u.
Allah ksoh yawe awya sai ro ymat Ku rAit tna smot Ait to, meen yhau hame wajin. Tna meen Jõ tno ana beta mrok masen mam ti ro tabam refo haberek.”
Riwai Yesus yawe, “Jõ refi fi
ro mbam kʼAllah.” Tibyo raa ro Yahudi knot-knot Ait.
Mawe, “Menohe Ait tait Ku ro Yusuf yare sai! Anu bhar Ait yaja yme oh! Fyi re Ait yawe Ait yroh ybam Allah?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Knot-knot ma.

Taja ybis Jõ troh tama tabam refo. Tna Ait oh mi ykuk raa taro mama mo kʼJõ. Tna soh Ait ykuk ana weto fee, ana mesait mtai mama mo kʼJõ fee ye. Tna meen Jõ tno ana beta mrok masen mam ti ro tabam refo haberek u.
Tiwya Allah ybis
rAit sait yama ykom bokyas rAit yawe, ‘Allah kbe yfi
ykyas watum rAit kʼraa beta.’ Awya sai ro yari bo ro Allah yawe tna yse mam yhaf mato rait to, kbe ait retait yama yo kʼJõ.
Raa aro bo mmat Taja fee. Ait ro yama ybam Allah yesait aran ymat Taja oh.
Nnaut: Awya ro smot Jõ to, meen yhau hame wajin.
Jõ tno raa mhau maam hame wajin. Mnan fi
ro mno re raa mhau maam mam tabam refo.
Riwai anu nkyas nwe, ‘Anu hohos na tii mait
ro mbam Allah mam yuk ro riamo.’ Mait fea! Menohe beta mhai.
ro mbam Allah oh mi Jõ mefi. Tna raa ro mait
refo kbe mhai fee.
Jõ fi
ro mama mbam kʼAllah. Awya ro yait
refo kbe yhau hame wajin.
refo fo kwiyan aJõ. Tsan kwiyan aJõ afo re tno riof kʼraa ro tabam refo.”
Mari feto raa ro Yahudi santri anya mawe, “Fyi re raa refi yawe yoo kwiyan rAit yee kʼanu bbo?”
Yesus yawe, “'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, Soh anu nbo kwiyan rAit fee, tna soh nta mees rAit fee ye, kbe nkai riof ro hame fee. Bokyas ro ati oh mefo.
Awya ro yabo kwiyan aJõ tna yata mees aJõ to, meen yhau hame wajin. Tna jõ tno ait yrok yasen mam ti ro tabam refo haberek u to.
Kwiyan aJõ to boit ro niit oh meto. Tna mees aJõ to aya ro nta oh meto.
Awya ro yabo kwiyan aJõ tna yata mees aJõ to yhaf sau su ysya Jõ renti, tna Har aJõ mjin mam ait yhaf rait renti ye.
Taja ro yawyos retait ybis Jõ tama. Tna Ait yno re Jõ thau tawyos ye. Feto ye awya ro yabo kwiyan aJõ to yhau yawyos ye.
Jõ fi
ro mbam Allah. Hohos wanu tiwya mait
Tna beta mhai. Menohe
ro Jõ tkyas refo mnan anya msya
reto fee. Awya ro yait
aJõ refo meen yhau hame wajin.”
Bo wefo beta Yesus ykyas mam samu watum ro Kapernaum.
Mari bokyas ro Yesus reto, tna kuber ro Yesus wAit mawat mawe, “Bokyas refo samyoh toni. Kbe awya ro yari tna yse kʼait?”
Yesus yhar kuber wAit mmai kʼanya bokyas rAit reto. Tna yawe, “Anu kmo bokyas reto a?
Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Meen Jõ hah u taut tamoʼt oo ro tii thau wia. Mfi bo meen anu nmat bo reto to, kbe anu ne nnaut nwe bawya?
Har ro

mno raa ro tabam refo, mhaf, srau wana mrok haberek. Mno re ana weto moo ‘mamos ro tna’. Raa mesait tomer mno mhaf wana haberek to, mtai fee, mkai riof ro hame wajin fee. Menohe bokyas ro Jõ tkyas kʼanu to bokyas Har ro
rAu. Tna bokyas reto mno raa mkai riof ro hame wajin.
Anu nkin wefo to, taro smot Jõ fee.” (Maban tinyi wore Ait yamo
Yesus yhar wia oh awya ro smot Ait fee, tna awya ro kbe hren serek Ait.)
Tna Yesus yawe, “Reto oh mi Jõ tkyas kʼanu tawe soh Taja ybis wia to fee, kbe raa sait ytai yama yo kʼJõ fee ye.”
Tna ayõ reto kuber wAit mawat sikba Ait, hawe bo kro Ait u fee.
Tna Yesus ytu kuber wAit mabo 12 reto yawe, “Fyi, anu nwe sikba Jõ ye fe mfe a?”
Simon-Petrus yawe kʼAit yawe,
amu kbe nmo no kʼawya u? Nyõ oh mi nkyas bokyas ro mno re raa mhau hame wajin.
Amu smot Nyõ tna nhar nwe, Nyõ fi Ait ro Allah Ybis Yama.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nbo 12 refo Jõ tsok oh. Menohe anu wefo sait tait kabes mhau kait yhaf mato rait.”
(Ait ykyas Yudas, ku ro Simon Iskariot yare. Ait ysya raa mabo 12 ja kro Yesus. Menohe kbe ait besruf Yesus kʼraa re mame yajat.)
Raa manes ro Yahudi mawe mame Yesus yajat. Tibyo Ait hawe yamoʼt
ro Yudea fee. Yamo yur mam
ro Galilea sai.
Ti weto kene wo raa ro Yahudi ja mamoʼt Yerusalem makyõ korat rana sau. Korat refo masom Korat ro Sbyah.

Tna Yesus yao na mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ namo ye fea!” Ana smot Ait fefares ye. Tibyo mamus tna mbesre Ait mawe, “Nasen sikba befo. Namoʼt Yudea afo re raa ro kro Nyõ kbe mmat bo msai ro nno. Soh raa sait yawe yamo raa ro kbe masom to, ja ait ymyõt bo bawya ro yno to fee. Ja yno mam wore raa makin masu mmat. Soh Nyõ nno bo msai to, nno mam wore raa beta mmat tna mhar!”

Tna Yesus yao na mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ namo ye fea!” Ana smot Ait fefares ye. Tibyo mamus tna mbesre Ait mawe, “Nasen sikba befo. Namoʼt Yudea afo re raa ro kro Nyõ kbe mmat bo msai ro nno. Soh raa sait yawe yamo raa ro kbe masom to, ja ait ymyõt bo bawya ro yno to fee. Ja yno mam wore raa makin masu mmat. Soh Nyõ nno bo msai to, nno mam wore raa beta mmat tna mhar!”

Tna Yesus yao na mawe kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ namo ye fea!” Ana smot Ait fefares ye. Tibyo mamus tna mbesre Ait mawe, “Nasen sikba befo. Namoʼt Yudea afo re raa ro kro Nyõ kbe mmat bo msai ro nno. Soh raa sait yawe yamo raa ro kbe masom to, ja ait ymyõt bo bawya ro yno to fee. Ja yno mam wore raa makin masu mmat. Soh Nyõ nno bo msai to, nno mam wore raa beta mmat tna mhar!”
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Jõ tamo fefares. Ayõ ro Jõ tamo to fefares. Ayõ rau snok fefares. Menohe anu fo, nmo ti woyõ-woya sai to moof. Bo ati fee.
Raa ro wase Allah ja knait anu fee. Menohe Jõ tkyas bo ja raa mno to, tawe ana mno bo ro mkair-kar. Tibyo ana knait Jõ.
Nesait nmoʼt korat reto oh. Jõ tamo fefares. Ayõ aJõ reto mama fefares.”
Yesus ykyas bo feto tna yhau bait mam Galilea wea.
Yesus yao na matim wia mamoʼt korat reto. Tna Ait yesait yamo yrof. Ait yasen yamo wai. Raa aro mhar fee.
Mam korat reto raa manes ro Yahudi saso Ait. Tna mtu kʼanya mawe, “Ait miya mefi?”
Raa mawat mkyas Ait kmun-kmun kʼanya. Taro mawe, “Bi Ait tait Raa ro yoof.” He taro mawe, “Mfe, Ait besruf raa mawat.”
Menohe ana waa raa manes ro Yahudi. Tibyo ana mkyas Ait fari fee. Mkyas rere kʼanya sai.
Korat reto raa makyõ ti baro oh tna Yesus twok mam Samu ro Allah. Tna yasen ykyas bo.
Raa manes ro Yahudi mari Ait ykyas bo moof kaket, tna ana mrok miskawowo. Ana mawe, “Raa refi yhar bo mnan si, menohe ykom bo ysya
to fee! Ykom bo mam remo rAit sai.”
Yesus yawe, “Bo ro Jõ tkyas refo bokyas aJõ fee. Bokyas refo mbam kʼAit ro ybis Jõ.
Awya ro ksoh yari tna yno bo ro Allah yawe to, kbe yesait yhar yawe soh bokyas ro Jõ tkyas refo fo mbam Allah fe mfe a.

Awya ro ykyas bokyas rait yesait to saso yasom rait yesait. Ait ksoh yawe raa mmat ait tna bibi ait. Menohe soh anu nmat raa sait ykyas bi roto taro yasom rait to, nri ait. Ait ro ykyas yasom bi ait ro ybis ait yama to, ait retait saso raa yasom rait sai. Ait retait oh mi raa ro ja ykyas bokyas ro ati. Bosruf aro mhau kʼait fee.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Tii Musa yoo Watum ro Allah yee kʼanu fe mfe a? Fyi re anu wefo aro nri Watum reto nbo nno fee? Fyi re anu tomer nme Jõ?”
Tna raa msis weto mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Kabes mbo Nyõ a? Awya yawe yame Nyõ to?”
Yesus yawe, “Tiwya Jõ tno bo msai sau mam ayõ ro anu ntmoh to. Nmat bo msai reto tna anu nrok niskawowo. ⌞Tna anu kmo Jõ nwe tisoh raa ro kiyam mam ayõ ro anu ntmoh to ma.
Menohe anu nesait nno bo mam ayõ ro anu ntmoh to ye.⌟ Tiwya Musa ysi bo kʼanu yawe anu nkom ku sme wanu
. (Bo reto Musa sair fee, hohos ranu tiwya ysi bo reto kʼanu.) Bo reto ait ysi tibyo anu ja nno mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh to ye.
Ati ro anu nkom ku sme wanu mam ayõ ro ntmoh to, anu nnaut nwe nno feto afo re niwer Watum ro Musa reto fee. Feto to fyi re anu kmo Jõ? Jõ tisoh raa yetsu rait muuf mrok moof mam ayõ reto.

Anu nsu nmat bo mam ti sau sai. Tna ja nuun boun fooh. Nno feto ma. Rau ro moof to, anu nmat ati ewok ye. Nmat sas tna nnaut bau mam nhaf mato wia matim. Tna kbe nhar kaket. Nno feto wia tibyo nhar tu oh nwe bo ro raa mno aro to mkair fe mfe a.”
Tna raa ro Yerusalem baro mawe, “Ait refi oh mi raa saso mawe mame mefi, fe mfe a?
Mfo refo Ait ykyas bo wore raa mawat mmat tna waa fee. Menohe raa aro mkyas bo mai kʼAit fee. Raa mabi wanu mhar mawe Ait fi
a?
He mfe. Ait refi anu bhar Ait ybam rabin hayo yama. Meen
yama to, kbe raa sait bo yhar Ait ybam hayo yama to fee.”

Yesus ykyas bo mam Samu ro Allah mato fares tna ykyas ymai fari yawe, “Anu saah nhar Jõ fi awya, tna nnaut nwe anu nhar nwe Jõ tbam rabin hayo tama. Menohe anu wase fares: Allah oh mi ybis Jõ tama fo. Jõ fi Raabis sai. Tna bo ro Ait yawe to mabo tu oh. Menohe anu wase Ait.
Tiwya thau su tsya Ait. Tna Ait oh mi ybis Jõ tama fo. Tibyo Jõ thar Ait.”
Yesus yawe feto tibyo raa mawe mfot Ait. He mfe. Ayõ ro raa mfot Ait to sboh rau fefares. Tibyo raa sait bo yfot Ait fee.
Raa weto to, mawat smot Yesus. Ana weto mawe, “Ati ro
ro amu nwof yama to, kbe ysair bo ro hnah mawat miwer Raa refi fe mfe a?”
Raa ro
mari he raa mkyas bo reto. Tna fo
manes msya raa ro
mbis raa sbe ro kmot Samu ro Allah reto to, mawe mamo mfot Ait.
Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa mam Samu ro Allah yawe, “Thau boti sai tsya anu. Tna fo kbe hah tamo to kʼAit ro ybis Jõ tama.
Kbe anu saso Jõ. Menohe yuk ro thau to anu ntai nma fee. Tibyo kbe nkai Jõ fee ye.”
Raa ro kro
Yahudi weto mawe kʼanya mawe, “Kbe yamo tiyo tna re kbe anu bmat Ait u fee? Kbe yamoʼt rabin roto rauk? Tna yo kʼraa
wanu ro mhau mam rabin reto? Yamo ykyas bo kʼana rauk? Soh mfe Ait yamo yo kʼraa ro wase
ranu rauk?
Riwai yawe, ‘Kbe anu saso Jõ. Menohe nkai Jõ fee.’ Tna yawe, ‘Yuk ro thau to anu ntai nma fee.’ Reto fyi oh meto?”
Korat reto ayõ ro tis rau to ayõ ro ati. Tna Yesus yros ytu yawe, “Awya ro yhai sbit to, yama yo kʼJõ re yata aya!”
Yesus ykyas aya reto to, ykyas Har ro

Tna yawe, “Awya ro smot Jõ to Bokom ro Allah refo mkyas ait retait. Mkyas bofret mawe, ‘Kbe ait yfi aya sau. Tna aya refo mbam ait miyi mamo. Aya reto mno re raa mhau hame wajin.’” (Meen Yesus raa mame yajat tna hah yamoʼt sawro ro Allah. Tna Yaja yoo bo yase rAit yee yno Yesus yrok yase toni. Tna fo ysan Har ro
mhau kʼraa ro smot Ait. Kbe mhau mam mhaf mato wana. Yesus yase toni fefares to, ysan Har ro
kʼraa wAit fefares ye.)
Yesus ykyas aya reto to, ykyas Har ro

Tna yawe, “Awya ro smot Jõ to Bokom ro Allah refo mkyas ait retait. Mkyas bofret mawe, ‘Kbe ait yfi aya sau. Tna aya refo mbam ait miyi mamo. Aya reto mno re raa mhau hame wajin.’” (Meen Yesus raa mame yajat tna hah yamoʼt sawro ro Allah. Tna Yaja yoo bo yase rAit yee yno Yesus yrok yase toni. Tna fo ysan Har ro
mhau kʼraa ro smot Ait. Kbe mhau mam mhaf mato wana. Yesus yase toni fefares to, ysan Har ro
kʼraa wAit fefares ye.)
Raa mari bo ro Yesus ykyas reto, tibyo taro mnaut mawe, “Ait refi fi
ro anu bwof Allah ybis yama tu oh mefi!”
Taro mawe, “Mfe, Ait refi
!” He taro mawe, “Ah,
ybam Galilea fee!
Bokom ro Allah mawe
ybam kube ro
Daud. Tna kbe Ait yama ybam Betlehem, remo ro
Daud tiwya fnya mabe.”
Tibyo raa mkyas Yesus to, ana mhaf sau fee tna santri anya.
Raa taro mawe mfot Yesus, he mfe; ana sait bo yfot Ait fee.
Riwai
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa ro
to, mbis raa sbe wana mamo mfot Yesus. Raa sbe weto to ja kmot Samu ro Allah reto. Ana masen mamo mfot Yesus. He mfe. Ana hah me mama sai. Tna raa mabi ro
Yahudi weto mtu bo kʼana mawe, “Fyi re anu nfot Ait nkah nma fee!”
Raa sbe mawe, “Raa sait ja ykyas bo mnan mfi raa retait ykyas to fee!”
Raa ro
mawe, “Anu Ait besruf ye a?
Raa manes aro smot Ait fee. Tna raa ro
aro smot Ait fee ye.
Ro smot Ait to, raa makin ro wase Watum ro Musa sai. Kbe ayoh mroh kʼana.”
Bi Nikodemus tait raa manes sait ye. (Tiwya mti sau ait yamo ykyas bo ysya Yesus.)
Mfo refo ait hre siret su ysya raa manes taro weto tna yawe kʼana yawe,
“Ati ro anu, raa ro

Yahudi, btu safo mana bmit raa to, anu ja bkyas safo reto, tna btu bo kʼait bri wia. Watum ranu mbis mawe anu bno feto. Bno feto afo re bhar bo ro raa retait yno kaket wia. Tna fo boo safo mana bmit kʼait retait. Ja anu bfot raa ninya tna bbu wia ma.”
Raa manes taro mastako Nikodemus mawe, “Amu nnaut nwe nyõ raa ro Galilea ye! Nmat Bokom ro Allah! Amu nhar nwe Allah ybis
aro mbam Galilea fee!” [
Tna raa weto sait-sait hah yamoʼt amah rait-rait.
Menohe Yesus yamoʼt faut ro Zaitun.
Rabu momo Yesus hah yamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Tna raa mawat mama mo kʼAit. Yesus hre tna ykyas bo kʼana.
Hre ykyas bo tna
Yahudi msya raa ro
baro mama twok. Tna sai ana mfot fai ro mwyah sau tna makah mama. Mama mse au mros susai masuf raa mawat weto.
Tna
msya raa ro
weto mawe kʼYesus mawe,
fai au refo mwyah msya raa sait kri-kri tna amu nfot.
Watum ro Musa mawe fnya ro mnan fefo kbe raa mawah fraa mai tibyo majat to! Tna amu ntu bo kʼNyõ: Nyõ nawe kbe amu nno bo bawya? Amu nme au fe mfe a?”
(Ana mtu bo reto kʼYesus mawe sanet Ait. Soh Ait ykyas bo ro sre kbe ana maun Ait.) Yesus yari feto to shaitrun bait sai. Tna hre mte, yatem ykom bo bait mam tabam sai.
Menohe ana beroh mtu mitan kʼAit. Tibyo Ait yasen yros yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu nkin wefo, soh awya ro yno iro fefares meto ee, yasen yama tinyi yoo fraa yai kʼau wia.”
Tna Yesus hre u tna yatem ykom mam tabam u.
Ana mari bo ro Yesus yawe reto tibyo ana sait-sait yamo sikba yuk reto marak. Sait yamo-yamo mbam kʼana ro mabi mamo snok mam ro tna beta. Tna Yesus ysya fai au refo mbewok aran mhau akus.
Yesus yasen yros ytu kʼfai au reto yawe, “Raa ro mros wefo sor to, ana beta miyo? Raa aro mamus nyõ fee mfe a?”
Fai au mawe, “Mfe. Raa aro fee.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ ye tamus nyõ fee. Namo bonyõ. Tna maban mfo refo nno iro u ma.”]

Ti baro firwas Yesus ykyas bo u kʼraa mawat. Yawe, “Jõ fi kek ro mno raa ro tabam refo to masu maah. Awya ro kro Jõ to, tafos aJõ mno re ait yasu maah. Tibyo ait yamo ninya mam amur u fee. Too tafos ro tna tee kʼait tna meen yhau hame wajin ye.”
Raa ro
mari bokyas rAit reto mawe, “Nyõ nesait nkyas Nyõ ai. Feto to bo ro Nyõ nkyas reto to, raa mari fee, kbe mtu sioh.”

Yesus yawe, “Jõ thar tawe Jõ tbam tiyo tama. Tna thar tawe kbe tamo tiyo ye. Tibyo tesait tkyas Jõ sai to, tna raa saah mhar tro mawe bokyas aJõ reto to, mabo bau yum oh. Menohe anu to wase wore Jõ tama tna wase wore kbe Jõ tamo ye.

Ati ro Jõ hre susai tna tse srah kʼraa to tno tesait kar fee. Jõ tsya Taja ro ybis Jõ tama to hre su. Tibyo soh Jõ tawe tse srah raa aro tari to, tno mnan si. Jõ tesait tmit safo kʼraa to fee. Menohe ati ro anu ntu srah raa nri to, anu ntu mamyot mfi bo ja raa sei sai mtu bo mari.

Ati ro Jõ hre susai tna tse srah kʼraa to tno tesait kar fee. Jõ tsya Taja ro ybis Jõ tama to hre su. Tibyo soh Jõ tawe tse srah raa aro tari to, tno mnan si. Jõ tesait tmit safo kʼraa to fee. Menohe ati ro anu ntu srah raa nri to, anu ntu mamyot mfi bo ja raa sei sai mtu bo mari.
Ja anu nri Watum ro Musa. Tna Watum
ranu reto mkyas mawe, ‘Soh raa mabo ewok mmat bo tna mros mkyas mnan anya to, raa mhar mawe bokyas reto mabo. Raa mtu sioh fee.’
Feto Jõ tesait tkyas Jõ ai tna Ait ro ewok to, Taja aJõ. Ait ro ybis Jõ tait ykyas Jõ ye.”
Tna ana mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Naja yhau mam tiyo?” Menohe Yesus yawe, “Anu wase Jõ tna wase Taja ye. Soh anu nhar Jõ to, anu nhar Taja ye.”
Bo weto Yesus ykyas mam Samu ro Allah, kene wore yuk ro raa mama mruk pitis ro ana msan kʼAllah. Menohe ti ro Yesus yhau mam tabam refo mkak fefares. Ayõ rau snok fefares. Tibyo raa aro mfot Ait fee.
Yesus ykyas u yawe, “Jõ kbe tamo. Tna anu saso Jõ. Menohe iro ro nno mhau fares. Tibyo meen nhai. Tna yuk ro Jõ tamo to, anu kbe nmo fee.”
Ykyas feto tibyo raa ro Yahudi mtu kʼanya mawe, “Riwai Ait yawe ‘Yuk ro tamo to, anu kbe nma fee.’ Ykyas fyi meto? Kbe takoh Ait a?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Anu nma nbam te. Tna Jõ fi troh tama tbam uu. Anu fo nbam tabam refo. Menohe Jõ fi tbam tabam refo fee.
Riwai tawe, ‘Iro ro nno mhau fares tibyo meen nhai.’ Soh anu smot nwe Jõ fi ‘Ait ro Yroh Ybam Uu Yama’ to fee, kbe iro ro nno mhau fares tna meen nhai tu oh!”
Ana mtu kʼAit mawe, “Nyõ fi awya?” Yesus yawe, “Muhrin aro-aro Jõ tkyas betoo kʼanu oh, afo re anu nhar nwe Jõ fi awya. Menohe anu nri fee.

Thar tawe iro msya bo mkair ro anu nno to mawat. Menohe Jõ tesait kar tmit safo kʼanu fee. Bi Ait sait ybis Jõ tama. Tna Ait oh mi ykyas kʼJõ yawe bo bawya ro Jõ tama tkyas kʼanu. Tkyas bo weto aran sai. Tna bo ro Ait yawe to mabo tu oh.”
Ana wase bo Yesus ykyas Yaja Allah kʼana.
Feto to Yesus yawe, “Anu kbe tubat

Jõ abyõ. Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Anu tubat Jõ abyõ tna fo anu nhar nwe Jõ fi awya. Ja tkyas bo kʼanu afo re anu nhar Jõ awya mefi. Tna kbe nhar nwe tesait kar tno bo aro fee. Menohe tkyas bo ro Taja ykyas kʼJõ to sai aran.
Ait ro ybis Jõ tama to yatam Jõ yoyo. Tna tno bo bawya ro Ait yhaf ksoh sai yoyo. Feto to kbe Ait sikba jõ akus to fee.”
Yesus ykyas bo reto tna raa mawat mari tna smot
Ait.
Yesus yawe kʼraa ro Yahudi ro smot Ait yawe, “Soh anu nri bokyas aJõ nbo matak nwe mabo oh to, anu fo kuber woJõ ro ati tu oh.
Kbe anu susit u fee. Kbe nhar nwe bo maja ro Allah to bo ro ati. Tna bohar reto kbe mno anu nros ntak tibyo. Bohar reto mno wa re kbe iro make anu matak u fee. Mno re anu nmo sryan boh u fee.”
Menohe ana mawe, “Amu fo kube ro Abraham. Tiwya amu nmo sryan ro raa mbis fee. Nyõ nkyas bawya meto ee!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nnaut: Tkyas bofret, tawe awya ro yno iro to yfi sryan boh. Iro mbo ait matak. Tna yako hawe sai yno iro.
Raa ro mamo sryan to, ja mhau tibyo mam amah ro bobot rait fee. Ait ynan fi raa ro amah mato rait reto fee. Menohe ku ro bobot retait yare wotur retait oh mi yhau ysya yaja tibyo.
Tna Bobot retait yawe Ku rAit retait oh mi yatak yno re anu nmo sryan u fee. Mabo oh: Ait yatak re yno wa bo mkair ro make anu matak.
Jõ thar tawe anu fo kube ro Abraham. Menohe anu hawe bo nri bokyas aJõ. Tibyo nwe nme Jõ.
Bo bawya ro Jõ tmat Taja yno oh mi tkyas kʼanu. Tna bo ro anu nno to, anu nri nja ranu ybis mfi feto ye.”
Ana mawe, “Abraham tait amu nja ramu!” Menohe Yesus yawe, “Soh anu fo kube ro Abraham wait to, kbe nno bo mnan fi bo ro Abraham tiwya yno ye.
Menohe anu nwe nme Jõ. Jõ fi raa ro tkyas bo ro ati kʼanu. Bo ro tkyas weto to, tari mbam kʼAllah. Tiwya Abraham yno bo ro mnan fi anu nno reto fee!
Anu nno bawya ro nja ranu ja yno.” Ana mawe, “Raa mwyah re mabe amu fee! Nja ramu Allah yesait aran!”
Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi tama tbam Allah. Ait oh mi ybis Jõ troh tama tabam refo. Ksoh aJõ tesait sai oh mi Jõ tama mefo fee. Soh Allah tait anu nja to, meto mi anu ksoh Jõ ye.
Anu fo ntai nri tna nhar bokyas aJõ fee. Bo bawya mno re anu nri bo ro tkyas to fee?

Kabes yabi (Iblis) tait anu nja ranu. Anu fo raa wait. Ja anu nri bo ro ait ykyas. Mbam tinyi rau Kabes Yabi tait ja yame raa. Ait tait raa ro sioh. Tna ykyas bo ro mabo aro fee. Bo mafa ro ja yno to, ykyas bo sioh. Raa ro ja mkyas bo sioh to, kabes yabi tait maja rana.
Anu ja nri bo sioh sai. Menohe Jõ tkyas bo ro mabo kʼanu. Tibyo anu nri Jõ fee, smot Jõ fee.
Anu weto, awya yasu ymat Jõ tno iro? Menohe soh Jõ tkyas bo ro mabo to, fyi re anu smot Jõ fee?
Awya ro yamo ku ro Allah rAit tait, yari bokyas rAit. Menohe anu fo ku ro Allah wAit fee. Tibyo anu nri bokyas rAit fee ye.”
Raa ro Yahudi mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Amu nnaut nwe nyõ fi nnan raa ro Samaria. Tna kabes mbo Nyõ!”
Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi kabes mbo fee. Jõ fi waa Taja. Tari bo ro Ait yawe. Menohe anu fo nri Jõ fee tna waa Jõ fee ye.
Bi Ait sait ksoh yawe raa bibi Jõ. Jõ tesait oh mi tomer tno bo afo re kbe raa bibi Jõ fee. Tna bi Ait retait oh mi Raa ro kbe yros susai tna beah srah raa.
Awya ro yari bokyas aJõ ybo matak to, meen yhai fee. Bokyas aJõ to bokyas ro mabo.”
Raa ro Yahudi mawe, “Mfo refo amu nhar nwe kabes mbo Nyõ tu oh! Tiwya Abraham yesait yhai oh, tna
na sor ro tiwya Allah ybis mama to, mhai beta ye. Menohe Nyõ nawe, ‘Awya yari bokyas aJõ meen yhai fee.’
Fyi, Nyõ fi nawe nase niwer nja ramu Abraham a? Ait yhai oh, tna
na sor mhai ye. Nyõ fi awya?”
Yesus yawe, “Soh Jõ bibi Jõ ai to, mafer marak. Menohe Jõ Taja oh mi bibi Jõ. Tna anu nwe Ait retait tait Allah ro anu smot.
Anu wase Ait. Menohe Jõ thar Ait. Mfi bo tawe Jõ wase Ait to, reto kbe Jõ raa ro sioh-nat tnan mfi anu fo ye! Jõ thar Ait tna bo ro Ait yawe to, tbo matak.
Hohos ranu, Abraham ksoh yinaut yawe kbe Jõ tama. Yhar yawe tama tna ait simaut.”
Tna raa ro Yahudi mawe, “Nyõ 50
fefares! Tna re nawe Nyõ nmat Abraham oh a?”
Yesus yawe, “Abraham fnya mabe fefares to, Jõ fi ‘Raa ro thau yum boJõ oh.’”
Yawe feto tibyo raa Yahudi ro mros weto sor moo fraa mawe mai Yesus yajat. Menohe Ait ymyõt Ait wai, tna yamo sikba Samu ro Allah mato.
Yesus yamo tna ymat bi ro yasu mboh sait. Ait retait tii fnya mabe to, yasu mboh bait yum oh.
Tna kuber ro Yesus mtu kʼAit mawe,
fyi re bi refi fi, fnya mabe to yasu mboh feto? Ait yno iro fe mfe a? Yaja, yme mno iro a?”
Yesus yawe, “Ait yesait yno iro mi yasu mboh meto fee. Tna raa mabi wAit mno iro ro misti re yasu mboh meto fee ye. Ait yasu mboh afo re kbe raa mmat bo ro Allah yno tna mhar yatak rAit.”
Tna Yesus ykyas bofret kʼana yawe, “Baas fares fo, feto nma, anu bno bo rAit ro ybis Jõ. Kbe mti mama tna hawe sai to, raa aro mno bo fee.
Wore Jõ thau fares mam tabam refo to, Jõ fi kek ro mram tabam refo.”
Yesus ykyas mkak tna fo tfeh oot mam tabam. Ait hre tna ysom tabam reto tna mka mfi hrotat. Ait yoo tabam reto karu mam bi ait retait yasu.
Yawe, “Nasen namo nyon nasu mam aya masu ro Siloam.” ('Siloam' mkah mai ro Ibrani to mawe 'raa mbis'. ) Raa retait yamo yyon yasu mam aya reto tna hah yamo to, yasu mrok moof oh.
Raa mhar mawe ait tait raa ro yasu mboh tna ja hre yayoh bo kʼraa. Tna ana mmat ait yasu ymat bo yamo mam iso. Tibyo mtu kʼanya mawe, “Ait refi awya? Ait fi bi ro ja hre yayoh bo metait fe mfe a?”
Taro mawe, “Ait oh metait.” He taro mawe, “Mfe, raa retait yasu ynaif ynan bi retait sai.” Tna ait yesait yisboh kʼana yawe, “Aha, jõ oh mefi.”
Ana mtu kʼait mawe, “Nyõ nno fyi re nasu moof to?”
Ait yawe, “Raa sait ro yasom Yesus yoo tabam kbet yno mka, tna karu mam tasu aJõ. Tna ybis jõ yawe, ‘Namo nyon nasu mam Siloam.’ Tibyo tamo tyon tasu. Tna fo tmat bo!”
Ana mtu mawe, “Raa retait miya?” Ait yawe, “Jõ twase ye.”
Ana weto makah ait ro riwai yasu mboh retait mamo mo kʼraa ro
Ti ro Yesus yoo tabam yisoh raa ro yasu mboh retait to, yno mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
Feto to raa ro
mtu sas kʼait refi ye mawe, “Fyi re Ait yisoh nyõ nasu moof?” Tna ait yawe, “Ait yoo tabam ro hrotat yse mam tasu ajõ. Tna ybis tamo tyon tasu, tna tasu ajõ maah.”
Raa ro

weto taro mawe, “Raa ro yno bo msai refi fi raa ro Allah ybis fee. Soh Ait Allah ybis meto mi Ait yiwer ayõ ro raa ntmoh feto fee.” Menohe raa taro mawe, “Mfe, raa ro mno iro ja mno bo msai mnan fefo fee!” Tibyo raa ro
masen santri kʼanya feto.
Tna ana mtu kʼait ro riwai yasu mboh tait u mawe, “Nyõ oh mi riwai Ait yisoh. Nyõ nnaut nawe fyi? Ait tait awya metait?” Menohe ait yawe, “Raa retait tait
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit.”
Menohe raa ro Yahudi weto mtu sioh mawe tiwya ait retait yasu mboh fee, tna mfo yasu mrok moof to fee. Tibyo ana mtu raa mabi wait mama.
Tna mtu sas kʼana mbewok mawe, “Ait refi ku ranu bewok fe mfe a? Tna ati ro yme mabe to ait yasu mboh fe mfe a? Fyi oh mi mfo ait yasu ymat bo fo?”
Yaja ysya yme mawe, “Ait refi ku ramu. Tna amu nhar nwe ati ro yme mabe ait to yasu mboh yum bait oh.
Menohe amu wase fyi re ait yasu moof. Tna amu wase awya ro yisoh ait yasu ye. Sik ma ntu kʼait yesait sai. Ait yabi oh tna yesait ykyas bo kʼanu.”
Ana mbewok mhar mawe taa raa ro
mawe, “Awya ro smot Yesus yawe, ‘Ait tait
to, kbe amu nikyak ait, nwe ait skabuk su ysya raa ro Yahudi u fee.” Tibyo yaja yme waa raa manes ro Yahudi.
Reto oh mi ana mbewok mawe, “Ait yabi oh. Feto to ntu kʼait yesait sai.”
Tna raa ro

mtu kʼait ro riwai yasu mboh refi mawe yama yo kʼana u. Yama tna ana mawe, “Amu nhar nwe Ait ro yasom Yesus retait tait Raa ro ja yno iro. Ait ytai yno re raa masu maah to fee! Nkyas nawe bi Allah yesait oh mi yisoh nyõ re nasu maah. Afo kbe raa bibi Allah.”
Tna ait retait yawe, “Ait retait raa ro ja yno iro fe mfe a? Jõ wase ye! Ro jõ thar to tiwya jõ tasu mboh. Tna mfo refo jõ tmat bo oh.”
Tna raa weto mtu kʼait u mawe, “Ait yno bawya kʼnyõ re nmat bo fo?”
Ait retait yawe, “Riwai jõ tkyas kʼanu oh to, he anu nri fee. Fyi re anu nwe nri u? Anu nwe kbe nmo nkro Ait ye a?”
Ana mari bo ait yawe reto tna mamus ait mawe, “Nyõ fi raa ro namo kuber Raa retait! Amu fo raa ro nri bo ro Musa ykom!
Amu nhar nwe Allah ykyas bo kʼMusa oh. He amu wase Raa retait ybam tiyo meto!”
Tna ait ro tii yasu mboh retait yasah yawe, “Ait yisoh jõ tasu mrok moof, tna anu wase nwe Ait retait ybam tiyo to fyi?
Anu bhar bwe soh raa ja mno iro to, Allah kbe yari boyoh raa weto fee. Menohe bi Ait yari boyoh kʼraa ro ja mhau mrat msya Ait tna mno bo ro Ait yawe.
Maban tiwya tinyi mamo snok mam mfo wefo to, raa sait bo yisoh raa ro masu mboh maban mam wore fnya mabe to fee.
Soh Ait retait raa ro Allah ybis to fee, meto mi Ait ytai yno bo feto fee.”
Tna ana mawe kʼait mawe, “Nbam ti ro nme mabe nyõ to nyo nno iro oh. Tna nyõ fi nawe nama watum bo kʼamu a?” Tna ana mikyak ait mawe ait skabuk su ysya raa ro Yahudi u fee.
Yesus yari he ana mikyak ait ro yasu maah retait, tibyo yamo saso. Ykai tna ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ smot 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait fe mfe a?”
Bi ait ro yasu maah retait yawe, “Awya metait? Nawe kʼjõ ye re kbe jõ smot Ait ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ait nyõ nmat oh. Ait ysya nyõ mbewok nkyas bo ngkri to, Ait oh metait.”
Raa retait yawe,
jõ smot Nyõ.” Tna ait yaka mte ybaut Ait.
Yesus yawe, “Jõ tamaʼt tabam refo mkah bo ttu srah raa tari. Tama afo re tno raa ro masu mboh to mmat bo. Tna ro masu mmat bo to, tno ana masu mti.”
Raa ro
mabo baro mros mam weto ye tna mari bo ro Yesus yawe reto. Tna ana mtu kʼYesus mawe, “Fyi? Nyõ nawe amu fo raa ro masu mboh ye a?”
Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo anu nsu mboh meto mi safo makan mbtek mai kʼanu fee. Menohe anu nwe anu raa ro nmat bo. Feto to iro ro anu nno to mhau tu.”
Yesus yawe, “Nnaut:
mana mawat mhau mam ana
Tna ana reto masa rau sau aran sai. Raa sait ja yhau kmot masa reto. Ait ywan tok. Soh raa ro ja ysia
wait yama to, ait ro kmot masa reto yawe raa refi yama twok. Menohe mfi bo raa sait yama wai, ait twok mam masa rau to fee, ait yaut ana reto yroh ti mato to. Anu bhar bwe ait retait raa ro ysyõf
Yesus yawe, “Nnaut:
mana mawat mhau mam ana
Tna ana reto masa rau sau aran sai. Raa sait ja yhau kmot masa reto. Ait ywan tok. Soh raa ro ja ysia
wait yama to, ait ro kmot masa reto yawe raa refi yama twok. Menohe mfi bo raa sait yama wai, ait twok mam masa rau to fee, ait yaut ana reto yroh ti mato to. Anu bhar bwe ait retait raa ro ysyõf
Ait ro ysia
yama tna raa ro ja kmot ana masa reto yhar ait yawe, ‘Ae, nama ntruk.’ Tna ait ro ysia
ytu
wait weto. Ytu
weto masom wana tna
weto kro ait mamo.
wait weto mari ait ymai tna fo kro ait mamo.
Ait yakah
wait weto beta frok. Tna ait yamo. Yamo yatim tna
weto mhar ait ymai tibyo nkro.
Menohe soh raa srim sait yama ytu
weto mama to; kbe
weto hawe kro ait ye. Ana wase mai rait reto. Tibyo waa tna msam.”
Yesus fret bo reto kʼana menohe ana wase bo maja rau ro Ait ykyas reto.
Feto to Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Jõ fi tamo masa ro
twok.
Tiwya raa taro mama tna ksoh mawe raa kro ana. Ana sioh mawe soh raa kro ana to, kbe riof kʼana. He mfe. Raa ro tiwya mama, ti ro Jõ tarak fares to, ana beta raa ro msyõf bo sai. Tna
mari ana mmai fee ye.
Jõ fi tamo masa. Awya ro twok mam masa reto kbe ykai riof ro mase. Awya ro yama yo kʼJõ to, ait ynan fi
ro ja mamo me mkai bosafom ro moof tna mabat.
Raa taro to mnan fi raa ro mama mawe msyõf
weto, tna mame
weto, tna sikowah
weto. Menohe Jõ tama afo re riof kʼana. Tama re kbe ana mhau bo mninon. Bokyas ro ati oh mefo.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi Raa ro tsia
woJõ kaket. Ait ro ja ysia
wait kaket to, soh ymat mtah rbyoh mama mafit
wait re mabo to, ait waa fee. Ait yno wa re mtah reto mafit
wait fee. Ysan yetsu rait mkah riof ro
wait. Menohe ait ro kmot
raa to, soh ait retait ymat mtah rbyoh mama mafit
weto to, kbe ysam yamo sikba
weto. Tibyo mtah mafit
taro mabo, tna taro mamo brir-brar.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi Raa ro tsia
woJõ kaket. Ait ro ja ysia
wait kaket to, soh ymat mtah rbyoh mama mafit
wait re mabo to, ait waa fee. Ait yno wa re mtah reto mafit
wait fee. Ysan yetsu rait mkah riof ro
wait. Menohe ait ro kmot
raa to, soh ait retait ymat mtah rbyoh mama mafit
weto to, kbe ysam yamo sikba
weto. Tibyo mtah mafit
taro mabo, tna taro mamo brir-brar.
Raa retait saso boren ro kbe raa maren sai. Au oh mi ait kmot
weto. Ait ye ynaut
weto fee. Ait yisoh ymat
weto kaket fee. Tibyo ysam sikba
weto sai.
Menohe Jõ fi raa ro kmot
woJõ kaket. Jõ thar
woJõ sau-sau, tna ana mhar Jõ ye.
Taja yhar Jõ tna Jõ thar Ait mfi feto ye. Tna Jõ bitsre Jõ tetsu aJõ raa mame afo kbe riof raa ro mnan fi
woJõ.
Jõ kmot
woJõ roto taro ye. Ana weto ja mberur su msya
woJõ wefo fo fefares. Mhau hayah fares. Kbe takah
weto nma. Kbe ana mari Jõ tmai tna kro Jõ ye. Meen tno re
woJõ beta mberur su mamo
mkbair sau. Tna kbe Jõ tesait aran kmot ana beta.
Jõ tsan tetsu aJõ mkah riof raa woJõ weto beta. Reto oh mi Taja yhafri Jõ. Meen tsan tetsu aJõ raa mame mkah
woJõ tna kbe trok tasen.
Raa sait bo ytak tetsu aJõ kʼJõ fee. Jõ ksoh aJõ sai oh too tsan. Taja yno Jõ tatak re too tafos aJõ tsan tna tatak re tesait trok tasen ye.”
Raa ro Yahudi mari bokyas ro Yesus reto tibyo mhaf sau fee. Ana santri anya u.
Ana taro mawat mawe, “Ait refi fi kabes mbo tna yker meto! Nri Ait ma!”
Menohe ana taro mawe, “Raa ro kabes mbo to ja mkyas bo feto fee! Ait kabes mbo fee. Raa ro kabes mbo to, ja ana misoh raa ro masu mboh to mno re masu mrok maah mfi feto fee.”
Mam soo ro arin ngkanam tna raa mfos to raa ro Yahudi ja makyõ korat sau ro masom
Allah'. Tna ti reto to Yesus yamoʼt Yerusalem.
Tna Yesus yamo-ama bait Samu ro Allah mam yuk ro masom
Salomo'.
Raa ro Yahudi mawat mama mur mtan Yesus. Tna mtu kʼAit mawe, “Snyi ja naut tna Nyõ nawe abyõ afo re amu nhar nwe Nyõ fi
fe mfe a?”
Yesus yawe, “Riwai Jõ tawe oh kʼanu to. Menohe anu nhar nwe Jõ fi
fefares. Bo msai ro Jõ tno sor to Taja ybis, tibyo tno. Tno mkah Ait yatak rAit afo re anu nmat tna nhar nwe Jõ fi awya.
Menohe anu wefo fo
woJõ fee. Tibyo anu smot Jõ fee.
woJõ to ja mhar Jõ tmai. Tna Jõ thar ana. Tna ana kro Jõ.
Jõ tno re ana meen mhau hame wajin. Meen ana mhai fee. Tna raa sait bo yatak ytak ana mam Jõ tatem bo fee saut.
Taja ro ysan ana kʼJõ retait tait yase ybo bombra beta. Tna raa aro matak re mtak ana mbam Ait yatem rAit fee.
Jõ tsya Taja to Raa sau aran sai: Amu mbewok fo nhaf, nkit msya srau sau aran.”
Yesus ykyas bo reto tna raa ro Yahudi moo fraa u mawe mai Yesus yajat.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ Taja ybis yawe tno bo ro msai. Bo msai ro Jõ tno weto to mawat oh. Tna tno bo msai ro ryo afo tibyo anu nwe nme Jõ?”
Menohe ana mawe, “Bo ro nno fee. Nyõ fi raa tu sai menohe riwai nawe Nyõ nnan anya nsya Allah. Nyõ namus-amas Allah oh meto. Feto oh mi amu nwe nwah fraa nii Nyõ to.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Menohe Watum ro Musa ja anu nri to mawe,
‘Tawe anu fo raa matak nfi “allah.”’
Mazmur 82:6
Anu bhar bwe Bokom ro Allah to mhau bau yum. Tiwya Allah ykyas bo reto kʼraa baro. Soh Allah yawe ana weto mfi ‘allah’ to,

tnaut tawe kbe Raa roto sait yfi ‘allah’ ye saah. Mabo oh: Allah ysok Raa sait tna yse Ait hayah. Ait yawe, ‘Ait tait Raa aJõ.’ Ait retait Allah ybis yroh yama tabam refo to. Tiwya Allah yawe feto. Tna Jõ tawe ‘Jõ fi Ku ro Allah yare.’ Fyi re anu nwe Jõ tamus-amas Allah oh meto?
Soh Jõ tno bo ro mnan anya msya bo ro Taja ja yno to fee, smot Jõ ma.

Bo ro tkyas sai mno re anu smot Jõ fee rauk. Menohe nmat bo ro tno. Jõ tno bo ro mnan Taja aJõ ja yno. Tno afo re anu smot Jõ. Jõ tno re kbe anu srau nwe Jõ Taja yhaf, srau rAit sau su ysya Jõ. Tna Jõ thaf, srau sau tsya Ait ye.”
Yawe bo reto tna ana tomer u mawe mfot Ait. Menohe Ait frok yamo sikba ana.
Tna fo Yesus hah yamo frit aya ro Yordan yamoʼt majoh ro tiwya Yohanes
raa wia. Tna yhau.
Tna raa msis mama mo kʼAit. Tna mawe, “Tiwya Yohanes yno bo msai aro fee. Menohe ykyas Raa refi. Tna bo ro yawe to mabo mnan bo ro tii ait ykyas.”
Tibyo raa msis ro siret mam beto smot Yesus.
Raa sait yasom Lazarus yhau mam remo ro Betania. Yhau ysya yano na Maria msya Marta. (Yano Maria refo oh mi kbe moo
karu
Yesus yaa rait tna mawah mana mawyan karu to.) Lazarus tait kiyam.
Raa sait yasom Lazarus yhau mam remo ro Betania. Yhau ysya yano na Maria msya Marta. (Yano Maria refo oh mi kbe moo
karu
Yesus yaa rait tna mawah mana mawyan karu to.) Lazarus tait kiyam.
Kiyam tibyo yano mbewok reto tiim soo kʼYesus mawe,
amu nno ramu ro nyõ nhafri tait kiyam.”
Yesus yari feto tna yawe, “Kiyam reto to misti ait yhai fee. Bo mno feto re raa bibi Allah. Ait kiyam afo re kbe raa bibi Ku ro Allah yasom rAit ye.”
Yesus yhafri Maria msya mao Marta msya mano Lazarus.
Yesus yari soo ro raa mawe Lazarus ait kiyam. Menohe Ait beroh yhau mam beto ti ewok naut.
Tna fo yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Nma hah bmoʼt Yudea.”
Ana mawe,
taa sai raa ro Yahudi mam beto mawe moo fraa mai Nyõ! Tna re mfo nawe nhah namoʼt beto u a?”
Yesus yawe, “Mbam rabu mamo snok hreha to, arin maah. Awya ro yamo ayõ ro maah to, kbe ait wasim fee. Kek ro mhau mam uu mno re tabam refo maah.
Menohe soh yamo mamur to, kek aro fee, kbe ait wasim.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bfoh ranu, Lazarus, yjin oh. Tna Jõ tamo tti ait yrok yasen.”
Menohe kuber ro Yesus mawe,
soh Lazarus yjin sai to, kbe kiyam marak.”
(Yesus yhar yawe Lazarus yhai oh. Riwai yawe 'yjin' to Ait fret bo sai. Menohe kuber wAit mnaut mawe ykyas yawe yjin mfi bo ja soo raa mno.)
Tibyo Yesus yawe kʼana abyõ yawe, “Lazarus yhai oh.
He Jõ tarak mam remo reto to, moof kʼanu. Soh anu nmat bo ro kbe tno to, kbe anu smot Jõ. Nma, anu bmo bmat ait.”
Tna Tomas, ro ja raa mtu yasom Didimus tait, yawe kuber roto yawe, “Nma bmo kro Ait tna soh raa mame Ait to, kbe anu bjat su bsya Ait rof!”
Ana mamo. Tna snok mam Betania to, tna raa mawe kʼYesus mawe Lazarus yhai tna raa mse mam isra mato yasno jiit oh.
Remo reto to kene mam Yerusalem. Nmo to
mara tuuf bo feto.
Tna raa ro Yahudi mawat mama mbam Yerusalem mawe hre mawia msya Lazarus yano mabo ewok reto.
Marta mari he Yesus yama. Tna au frok mamo mtar Ait mam iso. Tna Maria mhau mam amah.
Marta mamo mo kʼYesus tna mawe,
Nyõ nama mam befo fooh mi tano ajõ yhai fee.
Menohe jõ thar tawe bo bawya sai ro Nyõ nayoh kʼAllah to, kbe Ait yari.”
Yesus yawe, “Nano anyõ kbe yrok yasen.”
Marta mawe, “Thar tawe meen tabam haberek u tna raa ro mhai kbe mrok masen. Feto meen Lazarus yrok yasen.”
Yesus yawe, “Jõ oh mi Raa ro yno re raa mrok masen. Tna tno re meen ana mhau hame wajin. Raa ro smot Jõ kbe mhai to, menohe mhai tibyo fee.
Awya ro yhau smot Jõ to, kbe yhai fee. Nyõ nhar nwe bokyas aJõ refo bo mabo to, fe mfe a?”
Marta mawe, “Ae
Jõ smot Nyõ. Jõ thar yum oh tawe Nyõ fi
Nyõ fi Ku ro Allah yare. Nyõ fi Raa ro tiwya raa mkyas mawe, ‘Meen Allah ybis Raa sait yroh yamaʼt tabam refo.’”
Marta mawe feto tna au hah mamoʼt amah. Tna samoh kʼmao Maria mawe, “Bi
yhau mam wono. Tna Ait ytu nyõ yawe namo.”
Maria mari feto tna masen fooh tna frok mamo mo kʼYesus.
Ti reto Yesus twok remo reto fefares. Ait yhau fares mam yuk ro Marta riwai mkai Ait.
Raa Yahudi ro hre mawia msya Maria mam amah to mmat he Maria masen tna frok fooh mamo. Ana mnaut mawe mamo mawia mam yuk ro isra wore raa mse Lazarus yetsu. Tibyo ana beta masen kro au.
Menohe Maria mamo mo kʼYesus. Mmat Ait, tna mjit mimna mam wore Ait yros. Tna mawe,
ti ro Lazarus yhai to, soh Nyõ nhau mam wefo mi, tano ajõ yhai fee.”
Yesus ymat Maria mawia feto tna ymat raa ro Yahudi mama msya au to mawia ye. Ymat tibyo Ait srau mham ye.
Yawe, “Anu nse ait mam woyõ?” Tna ana mawe, “Nama nmat.”
Tna Yesus yawia.
Raa ro Yahudi weto mmat he Yesus yawia tna mawe, “Ait yhafri Lazarus toni.”
Menohe taro mawe, “Ait yisoh raa ro masu mboh to masu maah. Fyi re Ait ymat Lazarus fee, tna yisoh kiyam rait yno wa re yhai fee?”
Yesus sraujin toni u. Tna yamoʼt isra reto. (Tiwya raa moo Lazarus mse mam isra mato, tna muut mkah fraa mabi sau.)
Yesus yawe, “Niyaban fraa reto!” Menohe Lazarus yano, Marta mawe kʼYesus mawe, “Nno ma! Ait yhau mam isra mato masno jiit oh. Ynis oh!”
Yesus yawe, “Tkyas kʼnyõ oh tawe, ‘Soh nyõ smot Jõ to, kbe nmat bo yase ro Allah rAit.’”
Tna ana miyaban fraa reto tna Yesus yasu heyut ayoh yawe, “Taja, Nyõ ja nari bo ro Jõ tkyas. Tibyo tayoh asik mase.
Thar tawe Nyõ nari bo ro tkyas yoyo. Menohe tkyas bo refo afo re raa ro mhau mam wefo mari tna smot Jõ. Afo re ana mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi Raa ro nbis Jõ fo.”
Yesus yawe feto, tna ytu mkah ymai fari yawe, “Lazarus, frok nama!”

Tibyo Lazarus yari tna frok yama. Ait frok menohe hawee ro taa raa moo sro yetsu to make ait matak fares. Tna hawee sau sro yasu ye. Tna Yesus yawe kʼraa ro mros mam weto yawe, “Skur hawee reto re mbitsre ait yamo.”
Raa Yahudi mama hre mawia msya Maria tna ana masu mmat bo msai ro Yesus yno reto. Tibyo ana mawat smot Yesus.
Menohe ana taro mamo mo kʼraa ro
tna mkyas bo ro Yesus yno reto.
Tibyo raa ro
msya
manes mtu raa manes taro ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi to beta mama. Mama hre siret su tna ana mtu kʼanya mawe, “Anu bno fyi? Raa refi yno bo msai mawat!
Soh anu bno bo aro fee, kbe raa beta smot Ait mawe Ait fi
! Tna tis rau to, raa
ro Roma kbe mama soyak yuk refo. Yuk refo tiwya Allah ysan kʼanu, raa mana ro Yahudi. Mfo refo
ro Roma mbo anu, menohe mbis mawe bo ro
ranu to, besait bno tna bbis fares. Anu waa kbe Raa refi mno raa mrok mnin-nin. Tna fo
mama mbo anu matak. Tna mawe besait bbo raa wanu u fee ye.”
Raa weto sait yasom Kayafas.
reto to, ait retait yamo
Yahudi ro yase. Tna ait yawe, “Anu nhar bo aro fee!
Rau ro moof to, raa sait yhai sai. Soh mfe, kbe raa mana ranu ro Yahudi majat beta.”
Kayafas yawe feto menohe bokyas reto mbam ait yesait fee.
reto ait oh mi yamo
ro yase. Feto tibyo Allah oh mi ybis ait ykyas bo reto ynan fi

ro ykyas bokyas ro Allah.) Kayafas ykyas feto tna bonaut rait yesait yawe riof kʼraa mana ro Yahudi ⌞mam tabam refo. Menohe bo maja ro Allah ynaut yawe to: Yesus kbe yajat siwyan iso re raa mkai riof mase ro hame wajin.⌟

Yajat afo re yno bo moof kʼanu ro Yahudi kar fee. Kbe yajat afo re yno bo ro moof ku ro Allah makus mbrir-brar sor mam tabam refo beta ye. Mfo refo ana mhau ha-hayah. Menohe kbe mhau su tna mamo mhaf srau sau su ye.
Maban ayõ reto raa ro Yahudi saim mawe mame Yesus yajat.
Feto to Yesus sikba Yudea. Yawe yamoʼt wore raa masu makin mmat Ait fee. Tibyo yamoʼt remo sau ro masom Efraim. Efraim to mhau kene wo tabam ro riamo. Tna ysya kuber wAit mamo mhau mam weto.
Korat ro
kene oh. Tibyo raa ro Yahudi mawat mbam remo aro sor mamoʼt Yerusalem. Mamoʼt Yerusalem mawe misoh ana siwyan mamyot bo mafa raa ro
Yahudi ja mno ati ro makyõ korat ro
fefares.
Raa mawat mamoʼt Yerusalem tna mamoʼt Samu ro Allah. Ana saso Yesus he mkai fee. Tibyo mros mam Samu ro Allah mkyas kʼanya mawe, “Anu nnaut nwe kbe Yesus yamaʼt korat refo fe mfe a?”
Taa
manes msya raa ro
msi bo kʼraa mawe, “Awya ro yhar yuk ro Yesus yhau mam woyõ to, kbe raa retait yama yawe kʼanu.” Mbis feto re kbe ana mamo mfot Ait.
Ti ntamam naut tna Korat ro
Tna Yesus yamoʼt Betania, remo ro Lazarus. Lazarus tait raa ro tiwya yhai tna Yesus yno yrok yasen.
Yesus yama tibyo raa siwyan bo sohmaam. Tna Lazarus, Yesus msya raa taro hre su tna Marta masyõ bo sohmaam reto.
Tna Maria moo
ro mabyoh maut. Kusia reto
hariyah bo. Moo
reto mtu mam Yesus yaa. Tna ngkaru mkah mana mawyan rau.
reto sawer fiyau mam amah mato reto beta.
Yudas Iskariot tait, kuber ro Yesus sait. (Ait oh mi ro kbe hren serek Yesus.) Ymat bo ro Maria mno tna hafrah yawe,
“Nno bawya meto ee? Fyi re
reto sikowah sai a? Rau ro moof to, nasim kʼraa tna noo mabyoh rau 300
Tna mabyoh ro mase reto kbe raa msan kʼraa kinyah ro mse bo fee.”
Yudas ymat raa ro kinyah fee. Ait tait raa ro ybo pitis wana beta. Ait yasu mase ja ysyõf pitis wana baro. Au oh mi yawe feto.
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Bhah au ma! Mno feto re mnaut ti ro kbe raa sama hai aJõ.
Raa kinyah to, ja mhau su msya anu yoyo. Menohe Jõ fo kbe thau tsya anu yoyo fee.”
Raa ro Yahudi mawat mari he Yesus yhau mam Betania. Tna ana masen mamoʼt beto. Mamo mawe mmat Yesus yesait ye, tna mamo mawe mmat Lazarus ro Yesus yno yrok yasen to ye.
Feto tibyo
manes ro
Yahudi saim bo mawe mame Lazarus ye.
Mawe ait yaam tna bo reto misti re raa ro
Yahudi mawat mawe kro Yesus tna smot Ait tna sikba bo ro ana mkyas.
Korat ro

kene oh. Tibyo raa ro Yahudi mawat mbam remo aro sor mamaʼt Yerusalem oh. Yesus sohmaam bo ysya Lazarus tna rabu ti fo yawe yamoʼt Yerusalem. Raa mawat mari he Yesus yamaʼt Yerusalem. Yama fares mam iso
tna ana mama mtar Ait. Raa miji ara
mata tna mbo mamo sikoyõ mtar Yesus mawe,
Ait yase toni!
ybis Ait yama! Ait yamo
tna ybo raa ro Israel!”
Yesus tru
ro maku teta tna sau tna yaut hre abyõ. Bo reto yno mnan Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Anu raa ro Yerusalem, ro mhau mam atu ro Sion; waa ma. Nmat,
ro ybo anu tait yama yo kʼanu. Ait yaut
ro tna sau yama.”
Zakharia 9:9

Ti reto kuber ro Yesus wAit mnaut bokom far-far reto fee. Ana srau bombra weto fefares. Menohe kbe Yesus yrok yasen tna fo ana mrok mnaut bo reto tiwya raa mkom oh mam Bokom ro Allah. Tna ana mrok mnaut mawe bo ro raa tiwya mno weto, ana mno kʼYesus mnan si Bokom reto.
Ti weto to, raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem to, ana mawat tiwya mmat Yesus yno Lazarus yrok yasen tna frok ybam isra mato reto. Tna ana weto mkyas bo reto renti.
Tibyo raa mawat mhar mawe Yesus yno bo msai reto. Feto tibyo ati ro Ait yamaʼt Yerusalem reto to, raa mawat mamo mtar Ait.
Raa ro
mmat he raa msis-sas mamo mo kʼAit tibyo mawe kʼanya mawe, “Raa arin aso beta mamo kro Yesus, tna anu bno bo aro u fee!”
Mam korat ro
to, raa mawat mamo mbaut Allah mam Yerusalem. Ana ro mama makyõ korat reto to, ana baro raa ro Yunani ye.
Ana weto mamo mo kʼYesus kuber wAit sait yasom Filipus. (Filipus tait remo rait Betsaida mam
ro Galilea.) Mamo mo kʼFilipus tna mawe, “Amu nwe ksoh nmat Yesus.”
Tna Filipus yamo yawe bo reto kʼAndreas. Tna ana mbewok mamo mawe kʼYesus.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Ayõ kene wo Jõ thai. Kbe bo mai kʼJõ tna raa mmat Jõ tase aJõ.
Nnaut: Tkyas
makan kʼanu tawe, ‘Ja
makan krioh mbam kayoh rau tna mbtek mai tabam. Tna mbrom-brom mhai. Tna fo kmoh frok. Tna mo maut. Tis rau to make. Make makan sarer. Soh
makan reto mbrom-brom mam tabam fee, kbe mhau makan sau yum. Soh mhai fee kbe make fee.’
Awya ro ksoh yhau mam tabam refo toni to, kbe ykai riof ro hame fee. Menohe awya ro yako yawe yhau mam tabam refo kait fee, meen ait retait yhau hame wajin.
Awya ro yawe yno bo woJõ to, yako hawe sai yama kro Jõ. Wore wo thau to, kbe sryan aJõ yhau mam beto ye. Kbe Taja ymat sryan aJõ retait yawe ait yno bo ro moof.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfo refo to tnaut yyi toni. Ayõ refo mama tna tkyas tawe bawya? Tayoh Taja tawe riof kʼJõ fe mfe a? Mfe. Bitsre bo ro samyoh refo mai kʼJõ. Jõ tsan tafos aJõ oh mi tama mam tabam refo to!
Tawe, ‘Taja bo ro tno refo, nno re raa mmat tibyo bibi Nyõ nasom aNyõ.’” Tna Allah ybam sawro rAit ykyas yawe, “Tno oh. Tna kbe tno u.”
Raa ro mros mam weto to mawat. Ana mari mai reto tna taro mawe, “Barmabyõ mji!” Menohe taro mawe, “Mfe,
sau mkyas bo kʼAit!”
Yesus yawe, “Mai reto anu nri ye a? Fyi re Allah ykyas kʼJõ feto? Yno afo re anu nri mai rAit ye.
Ayõ rau snok oh. Allah kbe ytu srah raa ro tabam refo. Yno tibyo kabes yabi (Iblis) ro ja ybo raa ro tabam refo to, Allah yikyak ait yamo.
Menohe kbe raa tubat Jõ abyõ tna tajat. Feto kbe tkuk raa beta mama mo kʼJõ.”
Yesus yawe feto afo re raa mhar mawe kbe raa mame yajat mam ara warok.
Raa mawat mros mari bo ro Yesus ykyas. Ana mari bo ro yawe reto tna mawe, “Watum ro Musa mkyas mawe,
kbe yhau hame wajin.’ Fyi re Nyõ nawe, 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait, kbe raa mame yajat? 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai' tait bi awya metait?”
Yesus yawe, “Kek reto mhau su msya anu waor sai. Arin ro maah fo, nmat sas iso ro anu nmo. Kbe arin ro mti mama. Kbe nmo fyi-fya? Awya ro yamo mam amur wase iso ro ait yamo.
Smot Kek reto wore mhau msya anu fares to. Smot Kek reto afo re kbe nhau mam arin ro maah.” Yesus ykyas bo reto mkak tna sikba yuk reto sesa Ait.
Yesus yno bo msai mawat ro merif Allah yatak rAit. Yno re kbe raa ro Yahudi mmat. Menohe ana smot Ait fee.
Bo reto mamo mnan si bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykyas yawe:
; awya yari bokyas ramu tna yfot yse kʼait? Awya ymat yatak aNyõ?”
Yesaya 53:1
Ana mari watum aNyõ, menohe ana moo mse kʼana fee. Feto to
Yesaya ykyas u yawe:
“Allah yno ana masu mboh afo re mmat bo ma. Tna yno makit wana mbin afo re ana mnaut bo kaket ma. Mfi bo ana hah me mama mo kʼJõ maami tisoh ana.”
Yesaya 6:10
Tiwya tinyi Yesaya yhar Yesus yase rAit. Feto oh mi ykyas Ait feto.
Feto sai, menohe raa mawat smot Ait tna msya raa manes ro Yahudi taro smot Ait ye. Menohe ana waa raa ro
kbe mikyak ana. Waa kbe mawe ana skabuk su msya raa ro Yahudi mam samu watum rana u fee. Tibyo mawe abyõ fee.
Ana weto hasu bo raa bibi ana sai, menohe ana mrok mawe Allah bibi ana to bo ati fee.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Awya ro smot Jõ to, ait smot Jõ tesait sai meto fee. Ait smot bi Ait ro ybis Jõ ye oh meto.
Awya ro ymat Jõ to, ymat bi Ait ro ybis Jõ ye.
Jõ tamaʼt tabam refo tnan kek. Tama afo re raa beta ro smot Jõ to, kbe mamo mam arin ro mamur u fee.
Raa taro mari bokyas aJõ menohe mbo mno fee. Jõ too safo mana tmit kʼana weto to fee. Tama tabam refo mkah bo tmit safo kʼraa to fee. Tama tno riof kʼraa.

Raa taro to mikyak Jõ tna mse bokyas aJõ mam mhaf mato rana to fee. Ati ro tabam refo haberek u to, kbe awya yoo safo mana ymit kʼana? Raa fee: Meen bokyas ro Jõ tkyas oh to, mesait mmit safo mana kʼana weto. Tesait kar tkyas bo aro fee. Menohe tkyas bo ro Taja ykyas kʼJõ to sai.
Tna Jõ betoo bo bawya ro Ait yawe Jõ betoo kʼanu. Tibyo mam ati ro tabam refo haberek to bokyas aJõ mesait oh mi meen mmit safo mana kʼana weto.

Raa taro to mikyak Jõ tna mse bokyas aJõ mam mhaf mato rana to fee. Ati ro tabam refo haberek u to, kbe awya yoo safo mana ymit kʼana? Raa fee: Meen bokyas ro Jõ tkyas oh to, mesait mmit safo mana kʼana weto. Tesait kar tkyas bo aro fee. Menohe tkyas bo ro Taja ykyas kʼJõ to sai.
Tna Jõ betoo bo bawya ro Ait yawe Jõ betoo kʼanu. Tibyo mam ati ro tabam refo haberek to bokyas aJõ mesait oh mi meen mmit safo mana kʼana weto.
Bi Ait ysi bo, tna raa ro mari mno bo ro Ait ysi to meen mhau hame wajin. Feto to bo bawya ro tkyas to, bo reto mnan si msya bo ro Taja ysi kʼJõ yawe Jõ tkyas.”
Yesus ysya kuber wAit makyõ korat ro

fefares tna Ait yhar yawe kbe Ait sikba tabam refo tna yamo yo kʼYaja. Ayõ rau to kene oh. Tna Yesus yno bo sau afo re ana mhar mawe Ait yhafri raa wAit ro mhau mam tabam refo. Ait yhafri ana toni syok.
Mti oh tna Yesus ysya kuber wAit huwya mait boit. (Ti reto to, kabes yabi (Iblis) yisbyo bonaut rait kʼYudas Iskariot oh. Tna Yudas yari yawe kbe besruf Yesus. Yudas tait Simon yare.)
Yesus yhar yawe Yaja ysan tak rAit kʼAit oh re yase ybo bombra beta. Tna yhar yawe Allah oh mi ybis Ait yama, tna kbe hah ye yamo yo kʼAllah u.
Yhar bo reto tibyo yasen tna yrus ratan miyõ rait. Tna yoo hawee ftah sau ybin mam yaka.
Tna ywyan aya yama. Tna fo hre yyon kuber wAit maa maban. Tna moo hawee reto karu.
Yno tna snok Petrus yawe yyon yaa. Menohe Petrus yawe wa yawe,
fyi re Nyõ ro nase nawe nyon jõ taa a?”
Yesus yawe, “Bo ro Jõ tno refo, mfo wefo fo nyõ wase fares. Menohe kbe meen nyõ nhar.”
Petrus yawe, “Nyon taa ajõ ma!” Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh Jõ tyon nyõ naa to fee, nyõ namo kuber woJõ fee ye.”
Simon-Petrus yawe, “Soh feto, nyon taa mesait sai ma! Nyon tatem msya tana ye re toof!”
Yesus yawe, “Awya ro yate aya oh to yetsu rait moof oh. Ait yaa rait mesait aran kbe yyon u, tna yetsu beta moof oh. Anu sait aran yhaf moof fee, menohe anu beta taro nhaf moof oh.”
(Yesus yhar oh awya ro kbe hren serek Ait. Reto oh mi Ait yawe, “Anu beta noof fee.”)
Yesus yyon ana maa beta mkak. Tna fo yoo ratan rAit yyum u, tna yama hre u. Tna yawe, “Bo ro riwai tno to, anu nhar bo maja rau fe mfe fares a?
Ja anu ntu Jõ ‘bi
soh mfe nwe
Mabo oh, anu ntu feto bo moof.
Jõ fi tamo
tna
ranu. Tna tyon anu naa to. Feto to tbis anu beta kbe nyon naa wanu kʼanya ye to.
Tno feto afo re anu nhar bo moof ro nno. Tawe anu ye nno bo moof kʼraa anya, mnan fi ja Jõ tno kʼanu to!
Nnaut: Sryan sait yase yiwer bobot rait fee. Tna raabis sait yase yiwer ait ro ybis fee ye.
Anu nhar bo ro tkyas kʼanu weto beta. Au oh mi nhaf sneh sai to. Nhau nfi sryan ro ja yno bo moof kʼraa anya. Soh anu nno bo feto to, kbe Allah yno bo ro moof kʼanu.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Riwai tawe, ‘Anu nhaf moof oh.’ Tawe bo reto menohe tkyas anu beta fee. Jõ thar awya ro Jõ tsok. Bokom ro Allah far-far sau mkyas mawe,
‘Ait sait ro hre yait boit su ysya Jõ oh mi kbe yamo byoh kʼJõ.’
Mazmur 41:9
Tawe bokom reto mabo fo.
Jõ tkyas bo refo kʼanu wia. Tkyas kʼanu wia matim afo re wore wo anu nmat bo refo mabo to, kbe anu smot Jõ. Tna kbe nhar nwe Jõ fi
Nnaut: Awya ro ymat tna hartu raa ro Jõ tbis to, ait ymat tna hartu Jõ oh meto. Tna awya ro ymat tna hartu Jõ to, ait ymat tna hartu bi Ait ro ybis Jõ ye oh meto.”
Yesus ykyas bo refo mkak tna fo Ait sraujin. Tna bo ro yhar oh Ait ykyas abyõ yawe, “Anu nkin wefo sait kbe besruf Jõ.”
Kuber wAit mmat sas anya. Mnaut mawe awya mi Yesus yawe metait.
Kuber ro Yesus sait, ro Ait yhafri retait hre mam yajoh ti jaro.
Tna Simon-Petrus skabuk yasu kʼait re ait ytu kʼYesus awya mi Yesus yawe metait.
Tna kuber retait susu kene kʼYesus tna ytu yawe, “Awya oh mi Nyõ nawe metait?”
Yesus yawe, “Nmat: Too
ftah kebet. Tna Jõ beru mam aya refo tee kʼait.” Tna Yesus yoo
ftah sau beru mam aya reto tna yee kʼYudas. (Yudas tait ku ro bi Simon yare.)
Yudas yoo
reto si fo, kabes yabi (Iblis) twok mam yhaf mato. Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Bo ro kbe nno reto to, nno fooh oh!”
(Ana taro ro hre mait boit to wase mawe fyi re Yesus ykyas feto kʼYudas.

Yudas oh mi raa ro ja ybo pitis wana. Tibyo ana taro mnaut mawe Yesus ybis Yudas yamo yoo boit aro re kbe ana mait mam korat reto. Soh mfe ana mnaut mawe Yesus ybis ait yoo pitis aro yamo yee kʼraa ro masu awe.)
Yudas yoo
reto si fo, ait frok. Arin mamur oh.
Yudas yamo. Tna Yesus ykyas bo kbe yhai tna yrok yasen. Yawe, “Jõ fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Fooh sai tna kbe raa mmat Jõ tase aJõ. Kbe raa mmat bo ro Jõ tno tibyo ana mbaut Allah.
Bo ro tno mno re kbe raa mbaut Allah. Feto to fooh re Allah yerif Jõ tase aJõ ye.
Kukek woJõ sor: Ayõ baro firwas tna Jõ kbe thau kait tsya anu u fee. Anu kbe saso Jõ, menohe yuk ro Jõ tamo to anu ntai nma fee. Taa tkyas bo refo kʼraa manes ro Yahudi ye.
Tbis bo ro tna sau kʼanu nbo nno. Jõ tatmof anu. Tna tawe, ‘Fyi-fya rau to anu natmof anya kaket mfi Jõ tatmof anu to!’
Soh anu natmof anya kaket to, kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe anu fo kuber woJõ.”
Simon-Petrus ytu yawe,
namo tiyo?” Yesus yawe, “Yuk ro Jõ tamo to, mfo refo nyõ kro fee. Kbe meen nyõ nama nrof.”
Petrus yawe,
fyi re jõ kro Nyõ mfo refo fee? Jõ waa fee. Jõ kbe raa mame tajat saah! Menohe tawe tsan tetsu ajõ afo re riof kʼNyõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Petrus, nari: Nyõ nawe nsan netsu re riof kʼJõ to, nyõ nkyas niwer fe mfe a? Rere kook mara fefares to, kbe nyõ nwaar Jõ wia muhrin tuuf oh, nawe nyõ wase Jõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Waa ma. Sraujin ma. Smot Allah oh! Nsam wai kʼAit. Tna smot Jõ. Nsam wai kʼJõ ye.
Mam samu ro Taja yhau to yuk ro meen anu nhau to mawat. Jõ tamoʼt samu ro Taja re kbe siwyan yuk aro kʼanu kbe nma nhau. Soh samu reto marak to, Jõ tkyas kʼanu feto fee.
Tamo siwyan yuk ro anu kbe nhau to, tna hah tama tmen anu bmo. Tmen anu re kbe anu nhau nsya Jõ su mam beto.
Anu ye nhar iso ro mamoʼt yuk reto.”
Menohe Tomas yawe,
kbe Nyõ namo tiyo? Amu wase! Feto to amu wase iso reto ye!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ fi iso reto. Bokyas aJõ to mabo beta. Jõ oh mi tno re raa mhau hame wajin. Tna raa aro yamo yo kʼTaja mam iso roto to fee. Awya ro yawe yamo yo kʼTaja to, yako hawe sai kro Jõ.
Anu nhar Jõ oh to, anu nhar Taja aJõ ye. Mfo refo anu nhar Ait oh. Anu nmat Jõ mnan anya mfi anu nmat Ait ye oh.”
Filipus yawe,
nerif Naja kʼamu re kbe amu nmat Ait kaket rof tna fo kbe amu nnaut yyi u fee.”
Yesus yawe kʼFilipus yawe, “Thau tsya anu ooh oh, menohe nyõ wase Jõ fares a? Awya ro ymat Jõ to, ait retait ymat Taja ye oh meto. Fyi re nyõ nawe, ‘Nerif Naja kʼamu’?

Jõ fi srau sau, thaf sau tsya Taja. Tna Taja srau sau, yhaf sau su ysya Jõ ye. Menohe nyõ wase bo reto fares a? Bo ro tkyas kʼanu to, tkyas bonaut aJõ sai fee. Taja oh mi yatam Jõ yoyo tna Jõ tkyas bo ro Ait yawe kʼJõ. Ait yesait yno re tno bo wefo beta.

Smot Jõ. Tna nhar nawe bokyas aJõ refo mabo: ‘Jõ fi srau sau, thaf sau tsya Taja. Tna Taja srau sau, yhaf sau su ysya Jõ ye.’ Soh nyõ ntu sioh bokyas aJõ reto fares to, sik nmat bo msai ro Jõ tno mkah tak rAit to, afo re nyõ smot Jõ matak.
Nnaut: Awya ro smot Jõ to, kbe yno bombra mnan si bo ro Jõ tesait tno to ye. Tna tamo to kʼTaja. Tibyo kbe raa retait yno bo ro mase miwrek bo ro Jõ tno to ye.
Bo bawya sai ro anu nyoh to, kbe Jõ tno. Bo ro nyoh mkah tak ro Jõ tasom aJõ to, kbe tno yum. Tno afo re raa mbaut Taja.
Soh anu weto nyoh bo sau kʼJõ mkah tak ro tasom aJõ to, kbe Jõ tari tno yum.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Soh anu nhafri Jõ to, kbe nbo nno bo ro Jõ tbis kʼanu to ye.
Jõ tamo tayoh Taja afo re ybis Har rAit mama mhau matam anu mamo snok hame wajin. Bo ro nno to Har mban anu yoyo. Har reto ja mkyas bo ro mabo.
Raa ro wase Allah to, ana mhar Har rAit fee. Srau Har rAit fee ye. Feto to raa weto to Har rAit mjin kʼana mhaf mato fee. Mako hawe sai ana mkai Har rAit fee. Menohe anu fo, Har ro
mhau mam nhaf mato wanu tna mhau matam anu yoyo. Feto to anu nhar Har rAit, srau Har rAit reto.
Jõ kbe sikba anu nhau nkus mnan fi kukraa to fee. Jõ kbe hah te to kʼanu u.
Mhau baro feto raa ro wase Allah kbe mmat Jõ u fee. Menohe anu fo kbe nmat Jõ u. Jõ fi raa ro tawyos. Tibyo anu meen nhau nawyos ye.
Ayõ reto to, kbe anu nhar nwe Jõ thaf sau su tsya Taja, tna anu nhaf sau nsya Jõ ye. Tna Jõ thaf sau tsya anu ye.
Awya ro ybo yno bo ro Jõ tbis kʼait to, ait retait oh mi yhafri Jõ ye. Ait ro yhafri Jõ tait kbe Taja yatmof ait retait ye. Tna Jõ kbe tatmof raa retait tna tno re ait yhar Jõ to ye.”
Tna Yudas roto sait, (Iskariot fee,) ytu kʼYesus yawe,
Nyõ nno re amu nesait nhar Nyõ sai. Tna fyi mkah raa ro tabam refo, ana ro wase Allah ye?”
Yesus yawe, “Awya ro yhafri Jõ kbe yari bo ro tbis kʼait ybo yno ye. Tna Taja kbe yhafri ait. Tna Jõ tsya Taja kbe nma nhau su nsya ait retait ye.
Awya ro yhafri Jõ fee kbe yari bo ro tbis kʼait fee, ybo yno fee ye. Bokyas ro tkyas refo fo bonaut aJõ tesait to fee. Tkyas bo ro Taja ykyas kʼJõ sai.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bo wefo beta Jõ tkyas kʼanu mam wore wo Jõ thau tsya anu fares fo.
Tna kbe Taja ybis Har rAit mama mo kʼanu. Har reto kbe mkyas watum kʼanu tna bo ro nno to, Au mban anu ye. Taja ybis Har mama shauk Jõ re kbe mno bo woJõ renti. Har reto kbe mamo
ro betoo bombra beta kʼanu tna mno anu nnaut bombra ro Jõ tkyas kʼanu to beta.

Tawe tsan bo sau kʼanu. Jõ thau thaf tnok sai. Jõ tamo menohe tawe tno anu nhau nhaf tnok ye. Raa ro tabam refo mawe mno raa mhaf tnok ye. Menohe bo raa mno re mhaf wana tnok to hayah. Ana mhaf tnok mnan si Jõ thaf tnok to fee. Jõ tamo menohe tawe tno anu nhau nhaf tnok. Feto to waa ma. Sraujin toni ma.
Riwai tawe, ‘Jõ tamo tna kbe thah te tama to kʼanu u.’ Taja tait yase yiwer Jõ. Tna tamo to kʼAit. Feto to sraujin ma. Rau ro moof to, soh anu nhafri Jõ to, kbe anu simaut bo nhar nwe tamo to kʼAit.
Jõ tkyas bo refo kʼanu wia. Tkyas kʼanu wia matim afo re kbe nmat bo refo mabo to, kbe anu smot Jõ.
Ayõ rau kene oh, tna kabes yabi (Iblis) yama. Tibyo ayõ aro u fee re tkyas bo mawat tsya anu. Kabes retait yase ybo raa ro tabam refo. Menohe ait yase yiwer Jõ fee.
Menohe Jõ sayõ bo ro yno afo re raa ro tabam refo mhar mawe Jõ thafri Taja. Afo re ana mhar mawe bombra ro tno to tno mnan si bo ro Taja ybis Jõ.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nma, bsen bmo.”
Kuber ro Yesus wAit msya Yesus mamo. Tna Yesus ykyas bo renti. Ait fret bo yawe, “Jõ fi
mara ro moof. Taja oh mi yamo Raa ro mkah tna misoh armato
reto.
mara fo, ngkre rau ro make fee, kbe Taja ysot. Tna kre rau ro make to, kbe yisoh srof re make mawat renti.
Anu noof mfi
mara ro raa misoh oh. Bokyas ro anu nri kʼJõ reto mno re anu wefo nhaf moof.

Nhau nrat nsya Jõ tna Jõ thau trat tsya anu ye. Ngkre sau mesait kar kbe make fee. Soh ngkre sau mhau mrat msya mara rau fee, kbe make fee. Tna soh anu nhau nhaf, srau sau nsya Jõ to fee, kbe nke fee ye.
Jõ fi tnan fi

mara sau. Tna anu to nnan fi ngkre rau. Awya ro yhau yhaf sau ysya Jõ to, tna soh Jõ thau thaf sau tsya ait ye, kbe ait retait yake mawat. Soh anu nhaf sau su nsya Jõ to fee, kbe anu ntai nno bo aro fee ye.

Awya ro yhau yhaf sau ysya Jõ fee, ait retait ynan fi ara ngkre sau ro raa msot tna beak makus. Ara ngkre reto mhau ngkaat. Tna kbe raa moo ngkre weto makrao mam wo sau mbeak tna mko mam tafoh tna mait.
Soh anu nhau nhaf sau su nsya Jõ tna soh bokyas aJõ anu nme mam nhaf wanu to ye, kbe anu nyoh bo bawya ro anu nksoh sai to tna kbe nkai.
Soh anu make mawat to, kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe anu fo kuber woJõ oh meto. Soh anu nno bo wefo kbe raa mbaut Allah.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Taja yhafri Jõ. Tna Jõ thafri anu wefo mfi feto ye. Nhau nhafri Jõ wer.
Jõ tari bo ro Taja ybis kʼJõ tbo tno. Tibyo Ait yhafri Jõ wer. Soh anu nri bo ro tbis kʼanu, nbo nno to, kbe Jõ thafri anu wer mfi feto ye.
Jõ simaut mase. Tna tkyas bo weto kʼanu afo re anu simaut mase ye. Jõ ksoh tawe anu simaut mase, mnan fi Jõ simaut mase; aro mabut fee.
Bo ro Jõ tbis kʼanu oh mefo: Nhafri anya kaket. Nhafri anya kaket mnan fi Jõ thafri anu wefo ye.

Soh raa sait yhafri yafoh wait to, ja ksoh yawe yno riof kʼana. Tna mfi bo raa mbis mawe raa retait ysan ait yetsu afo re riof kʼana to, kbe yawe, ‘Ae.’ Ait ro ysan yetsu rait feto to, kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe ait retait yhafri yafoh wait toni miwer.
Soh anu nno bo bawya ro Jõ tbis kʼanu to, anu fo Jõ tafoh woJõ.
Sryan sor to, ja wase bo ro bobot rana yno. Menohe bo bawya ro Jõ tari kʼTaja to, tkyas kʼanu. Tibyo ati ro Jõ tkyas anu to, ttu anu sryan woJõ u fee. Anu fo Jõ tafoh woJõ.
Anu nsok Jõ to fee. Jõ oh mi tsok anu. Tna tbis anu nmo tna tufrok make:
Make ro kbe mhau bau tibyo. Tna bo ro anu nyoh mkah tak ro Jõ tasom to,
kbe Taja yoo yee kʼanu.
Bo ro tbis kʼanu oh mefo: Hafri anya kaket.”
Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Raa ro tabam refo knait anu. Menohe ktak ma. Nnaut nwe ana weto tiwya knait Jõ wia oh.

Raa ro tabam refo smot Jõ fee. Menohe anu fo nhaf sau nsya ana weto fee. Mfi bo anu nhaf sau su nsya ana weto meto mi kbe ana ksoh anu to! He mfe. Anu smot Jõ tibyo anu nhaf sau su nsya raa ro tabam refo fee. Jõ tsok anu afo re anu nmo raa woJõ. Anu fo raa ro tabam refo u fee. Au oh mi ana weto knait anu.

Nnaut bo ro riwai tkyas kʼanu tawe, ‘Sryan sait yase yiwer bobot rait fee.’ Jõ tnan fi bobot ranu. Tna ja raa sikowah Jõ. Feto kbe raa sikowah anu fo ye. Raa ro tabam refo ja mari bo ro Jõ tkyas kʼana to fee. Tna meen ana mari bo ro anu nkyas kʼana to ye fee.
Ana wase Allah ro ybis Jõ troh tamaʼt tabam refo. Tibyo raa weto kbe mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu. Anu kro Jõ oh mi kbe ana mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu to.

Mfi bo tama to kʼana fee tna tkyas bo kʼana fee, maami Allah ymit iro kʼana fee. Tna yawe ana masom iro wana to fee ye. He mfe, tama to kʼana oh. Tna ana mari bo ro Jõ tkyas kʼana fee. Tibyo kbe ana mesait masom iro wana yum. Kbe saak iro wana fee.
Awya ro knait Jõ to, Ait retait knait Taja aJõ ye.
Mfi bo tama to kʼana fee tna tno bo ro msai aro fee, maami Allah ymit iro yawe ana masom to fee. He mfe, ana mmat bo msai ro Jõ tno, bo ro ja raa mno fee. Tna ana beroh knait Jõ tsya Taja ye.
Bo mkair ro ana mno reto to mnan si bo ro tiwya Musa ykyas. Watum ro
rana reto mkyas ana matim wia. Au oh mi:
‘Jõ tno bo mkair aro fee menohe raa knait Jõ sai.’
Bo ro tiwya Allah yawe to mhau rau oh.”

Tna Yesus yawe, “Kbe tayoh kʼTaja re ybis Har rAit mama matam anu. Har reto kbe watum bo kʼanu. Tna bo ro nno to, kbe Har reto mban anu ye. Har reto mbam Allah mama to tna ja mkyas bo ro maja to sau sre fee. Mkyas bo ro mabo. Kbe mama tna mkyas Jõ tasom aJõ.
Tna anu fo tiwya kro Jõ bmo su maban tinyi wore wo Jõ tamo
Tibyo anu nkyas Jõ tasom aJõ kʼraa ye.”

Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Riwai tkyas tawe, ‘Kbe raa ro tabam refo knait anu.’ Bo weto beta Jõ tkyas kʼanu wia matim afo re kbe nmat bo wefo mabo to, kbe anu beroh smot Jõ fares. Kbe anu btek nwe fee.

Raa manes ro Yahudi kbe meen mikyak anu, mawe wa mawe anu skabuk su nsya raa ro Yahudi mam samu watum rana u fee. Tna kbe raa mame anu taro njat. Tna raa ro mame anu weto to mnaut mawe ana mno bo moof, mnaut mawe reto Allah yhaf mnan.
Ana weto wase Taja tna wase Jõ ye. Tibyo mno bo feto.

Kair weto mama mai kʼanu fe fares. Tiwya tinyi snok mfo refo thau tsya anu fares. Feto to tkyas bo mkair weto tna sai. Mfo refo Jõ tkyas bo wefo kʼanu wia matim. Tkyas wia re kbe meen, ati ro bo mkair weto mabo to, anu nnaut nwe bo weto tiwya tawe kʼanu oh.”
“Menohe ayõ baro firwas tna thah tamo to kʼAit ro tiwya ybis Jõ troh tama tabam refo. Menohe fyi re anu sait bo ytu kʼJõ fee yawe, ‘Nyõ namoʼt hayo meto?’
Jõ tkyas bo wefo tibyo anu sraujin.
Anu hawe bo Jõ sikba anu. Tamo tna kbe tbis Har ro
mama mo kʼanu. Har reto kbe mkyas watum kʼanu tna bo ro nno to, Au mban anu ye. Nnaut: Jõ tamo menohe tis rau to mafer moof kʼanu meto. Soh Jõ tamo fee; kbe Har reto mama mo kʼanu fee ye.
Meen Har ro

mama tna betoo bo kʼraa ro tabam refo. Mkyas kʼana ro hawe smot Jõ. Har rAit betoo iro ro ana ja mno to re mhar kaket. Tna Har rAit betoo bo ro Allah ksoh raa mno to ye. Raa ro tabam refo ja mnaut mawe ana mhar bo ro Allah ksoh ana mbo mno oh. He mfe. Kbe Har rAit betoo bo reto kʼana kaket. Tna raa ro tabam refo ja mros susai mtu sas safo raa to, mtu kaket fee ye. Kbe Har rAit betoo bo reto kʼana kaket ye.
Raa ro tabam refo smot tna msam wai kʼJõ fee. Au oh mi Har rAit kbe betoo iro wana kʼana kaket.
Tamo to kʼTaja to tna kbe anu nmat Jõ u fee. Feto to tesait tkyas bo kʼraa ro tabam refo u fee. Au oh mi Har ro
kbe betoo bo ro Allah ksoh raa mno to.
Kabes yabi (Iblis) ja ybo raa ro smot Jõ fee. Menohe Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼait oh. Au oh mi kbe Har rAit mama betoo iso ro Allah kbe yros susai ytu safo raa to.
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Jõ tawe tkyas bo mawat kʼanu fares. Menohe tkyas bo weto beta fee. Bo ro samyoh meto tna mfo refo anu srau fefares.
Menohe kbe Har ro
mama. Tna Har reto mkyas bo sioh fee. Mkyas bo ro Allah kʼanu re anu nhar bombra beta ro ati. Har reto mesait mkyas bonaut rau fee. Menohe mkyas bo ro mari kʼAllah. Tna mkyas bo ro meen mama ye.
Har reto mari bo mbam kʼJõ tna mkyas bo reto kʼanu. Mno feto tna kbe raa mhar bo yase aJõ, tibyo bibi Jõ.
Bombra ro Taja wAit msya bohar rAit weto beta to bo woJõ ye. Feto oh mi tawe kʼanu tawe, ‘Har reto kbe mkyas bombra ro Au mari mbam kʼJõ to mkyas kʼanu.’”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Ayõ kbet baro sai tna kbe anu nmat Jõ u fee. Tna ayõ kbet sai naut tna anu nmat Jõ u.”
Tna kuber ro Yesus mtu kʼanya mawe, “Ykyas bawya meto ee? Ait yawe yamo yo kʼYaja tibyo ayõ kbet sai baro tna kbe bmat Ait u fee. Tna ayõ kbet sai naut tna anu bmat Ait u.
Bawya oh mi ykyas yawe, ‘Ayõ kbet sai?’ Anu wase bwe Ait ykyas bo bawya meto!”
