Menohe Yesus yhar yawe ana mawe mtu bo kʼAit. Tibyo yawe, “Riwai tawe, ‘Ayõ kbet sai baro tna kbe nmat Jõ u fee. Tna ayõ kbet sai naut anu nmat Jõ u.’ Reto oh mi anu ntu kʼanya meto a?
Nnaut: Anu kbe sraujin tna nwia. Menohe raa ro tabam refo kbe simaut renti. Anu kbe nwia wia matim. Menohe kbe simaut mrof.
Mfi bo fai sau ro mhaf kene wo mabe to, ayõ ro ngkine mabe to kborham toni. Tna ku frok. Tna au sorni bo riwai kborham reto. Ku rau frok yama oh tibyo au simaut.
Mfo refo anu fo sraujin. Menohe kbe anu simaut mase mfi feto ye. Kbe hah tama fri anu u. Tna raa sait bo yatak yno re simaut ranu reto marak fee.
Nnaut: Ti reto to, anu ntu bo aro kʼJõ u fee. Wore weto to, bo bawya sai ro anu nyoh mkah tak ro Jõ tasom aJõ to, kbe Taja ysan kʼanu.
Mamo snok mam mfo refo to, anu nyoh bo aro mkah tak ro Jõ tasom fefares. Nyoh re kbe anu tru. Tna kbe simaut mase.”
Tna Yesus yawe kuber wAit yawe, “Bo wefo beta Jõ tkyas kʼanu mkah bofret. Menohe meen tkyas bo maja ro Taja to, tkyas abyõ sai kʼanu.

Ati weto to, kbe anu nesait nyoh bo kʼTaja mkah tak ro Jõ tasom. Jõ tayoh fee. Taja yesait yhafri anu. Tibyo anu nesait nyoh bo kʼAit. Anu nhafri Jõ tna smot Jõ to. Tna Anu nhar nwe Allah ybis Jõ tama. Feto tibyo Taja yesait yhafri anu to.

Ati weto to, kbe anu nesait nyoh bo kʼTaja mkah tak ro Jõ tasom. Jõ tayoh fee. Taja yesait yhafri anu. Tibyo anu nesait nyoh bo kʼAit. Anu nhafri Jõ tna smot Jõ to. Tna Anu nhar nwe Allah ybis Jõ tama. Feto tibyo Taja yesait yhafri anu to.
Tbam Taja troh tamaʼt tabam refo. Tna mfo refo Jõ sikba tabam refo hah tamo to kʼTaja.”
Tna kuber ro Yesus mawe, “Mfo refo Nyõ nkyas bo abyõ. Nyõ fret bo fee.

Nkyas feto to tna mfo refo amu nhar nwe Nyõ nhar bombra beta. Riwai Nyõ nhar bo ro amu nwe ntu kʼNyõ oh, menohe amu ntu bo reto fefares! Nyõ nkyas bombra beta mkak oh. Reto oh mi amu smot Nyõ tna nhar nwe Nyõ nama nbam Allah. Kbe amu ntu bo aro u kʼNyõ to fee.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Mfo refo anu smot Jõ.
Menohe kbe anu nsam. Anu aro yasen ysam yamoʼt samu rait-rait. Tna sikba Jõ tesait akus. Menohe Taja yatam Jõ tibyo tesait kar fee.

Bo wefo beta tkyas kʼanu afo re nhaf tnok tna waa ma. Nhau nhaf sau, srau sau su nsya Jõ tna kbe nhaf wanu tnok tna waa ma. Anu nhau mam tabam refo fares tibyo kbe anu raa sikowah. Menohe sraujin toni ma, mbito ntak. Jõ tase tros tatak tbo ait ro ybo tabam refo.”

Yesus ykyas bo weto kuber wAit mkak. Tna fo heyut ymat ayoh tna yawe, “Taja, Jõ fi Ku aNyõ. Kene wo ayõ rau sboh oh. Nno re raa mmat Jõ tase aJõ. Raa mmat Jõ tase aJõ mi ana mmat Nyõ nase aNyõ oh meto.

Tiwya Nyõ noo tak nee kʼJõ tamo Raa ro tase tbo raa ro tabam refo beta. Nno feto afo re Jõ tatak tno raa mhau hame wajin. Nyõ nsok awya ro yamo raa woJõ, tna Jõ tno ana weto beta meen mhau hame wajin ye.
Jõ ksoh re ana mhar Nyõ nhaf, srau aNyõ kaket, tna mhar mawe Nyõ fi Allah yesait aran tum. Tna Jõ ksoh re ana mhar mawe Jõ fi Yesus
: Jõ fi Ait ro Nyõ nbis tama tabam refo. Soh ana mhar anu mbewok feto kbe ana mkai roon ro hame oh meto.
Tno bo ro Nyõ nbis kʼJõ to, beta tno mkak. Au oh meto tno re raa mmat bo yase aNyõ.
Tiwya tinyi thau tsya Nyõ su mam wore wo tabam refo raa mfen fefares. Bo yase wanu bewok to mninon. Mfo refo tayoh tawe Nyõ tubat Jõ hah te tamo to kʼNyõ, tna nno re tase mnan tii reto u.
Taja, raa ro tabam refo to, taro mamo raa woNyõ. Tna Nyõ nawe raa weto to raa woJõ ye. Jõ tno re ana mhar Nyõ. Ana mari bo ro Nyõ nawe tna mbo mno.
Bo ro Nyõ noo nee kʼJõ oh, mfo refo raa woJõ weto, mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi Raa ro noo bombra wefo beta nee kʼJõ.
Bokyas ro Nyõ nawe kʼJõ to, Jõ tkyas kʼana oh. Tna ana mari tna moo mse kʼana oh. Ana mhar mawe Jõ tama tbam Nyõ. Ana mnaut maut-mroh fee. Ana smot Jõ tna mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi nbis Jõ tama.
Mfo refo Jõ skabuk ana. Skabuk raa ro tabam refo fee. Skabuk ana ro Nyõ nsan kʼJõ sai. Ana wefo fo raa woNyõ.
Raa woJõ beta to raa woNyõ ye. Tna raa woNyõ beta to raa woJõ ye. Ana weto, bo ro mno to merif bo yase aJõ.”

“Taja, Nyõ nesait aran Raa ro nase. Thau mam tabam refo kait u fee tna Jõ tama to kʼNyõ. Menohe ana mhau mam tabam refo fares. Taja, Nyõ to Raa ro nase. Jõ tayoh kʼNyõ tawe kmot ana mkah natak aNyõ. Tak reto Nyõ nsan kʼJõ ye. Kmot ana re kbe ana mhau mhaf, srau sau, mnan fi Nyõ nsya Jõ bhaf sau to ye.
Wore thau tsya ana fares to, Jõ kmot ana mkah natak aNyõ, tak ro Nyõ nsan kʼJõ reto. Jõ kmot ana tibyo ana beta beroh smot Jõ. Menohe Bokom ro aNyõ mawe ana sait kbe safe mkak. Reto tiwya
sait ykom tna kbe mabo mnan si Bokom reto.”
Tna Yesus skabuk yawe, “Ayõ baro firwas tna hah tama to kʼNyõ mam teto. Menohe thau mam tabam refo fares to, tkyas bo wefo beta afo re ana wefo simaut toni mnan fi Jõ to ye.
Jõ tnan anya tsya raa ro tabam refo fee. Jõ tkyas bokyas aNyõ kʼana ro Nyõ nsan kʼJõ oh. Ana wefo mnan anya msya raa ro tabam refo fee. Tibyo raa ro tabam refo knait ana.
Jõ skabuk tawe Nyõ tufrok ana mbam tabam refo fee. He tayoh re Nyõ kmot ana re kbe kabes yabi (Iblis) yno ana ma.
Ana wefo mnan anya msya raa ro tabam refo fee; mnan fi Jõ tnan anya raa ro tabam refo fee ye.
Bokyas aNyõ to bo ro ati. Bokyas aNyõ to bo ro mabo tu oh! Jõ tayoh tawe nno re ana mari bokyas aNyõ tna mbo mno. Feto oh mi Nyõ noo ana nbo mkah mno bo woNyõ.
Tiwya Nyõ nbis Jõ troh tama tabam refo. Tna tbis ana wefo mamo mo kʼraa ro tabam refo mfi feto ye.
Tawe too Jõ tsan kʼNyõ re tno bo ro Nyõ nawe. Tno feto afo re mafer ro moof kʼana. Kbe ana beroh matak moo ana msan kʼNyõ re mno bo woNyõ to ye.”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼYaja yawe, “Jõ skabuk ana wefo mesait aran fee. Meen ana mamo mkyas Jõ tasom aJõ renti. Tibyo kbe raa taro smot Jõ. Feto to Jõ skabuk raa weto ye.

Tayoh re ana beta mhaf sau msya anya, mnan fi Nyõ nhaf sau nsya Jõ to ye. Tna mnan fi Jõ thaf sau tsya Nyõ ye. Jõ skabuk bo refo re kbe ana beta mhaf sau msya anu mbewok. Feto tibyo raa ro tabam refo mmat tna mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi Raa ro nbis Jõ troh tama tabam refo.
Tiwya Nyõ nsan bo yase aNyõ to kʼJõ. Tna Jõ tsan bo yase aNyõ reto kʼana ro smot Jõ. Afo re ana beta mhaf sau, mnan fi Anu bewok bhaf sau ye.

Jõ fi thaf sau su tsya ana. Tna Nyõ fi nhaf sau su nsya Jõ. Tayoh re ana ro smot Jõ to beta mhaf sau su mnan si. Soh raa woJõ mhaf sau su to, kbe raa ro tabam refo mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi nbis Jõ. Tna raa ro tabam refo mhar mawe Nyõ nhafri Jõ tna Nyõ nhafri ana ro smot Jõ mnan anya ye.”

Tna Yesus skabuk renti yawe, “Taja, tiwya tabam refo Anu bfen fefares to, Nyõ hafri Jõ oh wia. Tibyo Nyõ nsan bo yase aNyõ kʼJõ. Jõ skabuk raa ro Nyõ nsan kʼJõ; raa beta ro kbe smot Jõ: Jõ ksoh tawe ana meen mhau su msya Jõ mam sawro aNyõ ye. Tna re ana mmat bo yase aJõ reto ye.
Taja: Nyõ fi raa ro nhaf mato moof ati. Raa ro tabam refo wase Nyõ. Menohe Jõ thar Nyõ. Tna kuber woJõ wefo mhar mawe Nyõ oh mi nbis Jõ sai.

Jõ tkyas Nyõ nasom aNyõ kʼana wefo oh. Tna kbe tno feto renti. Nyõ nhafri Jõ kaket. Tna tkyas nasom aNyõ kʼana afo re ana mhar bo hafri raa anya mnan fi Nyõ nhafri Jõ. Tno afo re Jõ tesait thaf sau tsya ana.”
Yesus skabuk mkak. Tna fo Ait ysya kuber wAit masen mamo. Ana frit aya ro Kidron mamoʼt maam jaro. Tna twok mam armato sau.
(Yesus ysya kuber wAit ja mamoʼt armato reto. Tibyo Yudas ro besruf Yesus, yhar yuk reto oh.)
Yudas yerif iso ro mamoʼt armato reto kʼraa sbe ro Roma. Tna riwai
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa ro
mbis aban mana wana mesait baro mama ye. Feto to Yudas yakah raa mawat yama mbam Yerusalem: Raa sbe ro Roma majin sau, msya aban mana ro
Yahudi baro mama ye. Ana mama nkro Yudas to, mbo
tafoh, msya masom sbe wana to ye.
Yesus yhar bo ro kbe mai kʼAit wia oh. Tibyo Ait yasen yamo yo kʼraa weto yawe, “Anu saso awya?”
Ana mawe, “Yesus, raa ro Nazaret.” Tna Yesus yawe, “Jõ Ait oh mefi.” (Yudas, ro besruf Ait, yros ysya ana mam weto ye.)
Ati ro Yesus yawe, “Jõ Ait oh mefi.” to, ana susu mhah me tna mbtek mawe mam tabam.
Yesus yawe u kʼana yawe, “Anu saso awya?” Ana mawe, “Yesus, raa ro Nazaret.”
Ait yawe, “Tkyas oh tawe Jõ oh mefi. Soh Jõ tesait oh mi anu saso to, bitsre ana wefo taro mamo rof.”

(Yesus yawe raa sbe weto bitsre kuber wAit mhau riof feto to, ykyas mnan fi bo ro riwai Ait skabuk wia matim yawe, “Raa ro Nyõ nsan kʼJõ to Jõ kmot ana tibyo ana beta beroh smot Jõ; sait bo kbe yarak fee.”
Tna Simon-Petrus ybo
rait tna ysot raa ro yama yfot Yesus sait yimara. (Ait retait yasom Malkhus. Ait tait sryan ro
yase rait.) Petrus ysot yimara rait ro tem ati ktos.
Tna Yesus yastako Petrus yawe, “Noo
anyõ reto srya mam tafat rau u! Taja ysi bo kʼJõ, yawe tasom bo ro samyoh ro mfo refo mama mai kʼJõ. Tna Jõ tawe tno bo beta mnan si bo ro Taja ybis oh!”
Tna raa sbe ro Roma majin reto msya aban mana ro yase ybo ana mfot Yesus. Ana msya raa ro ja kmot Samu Ro Allah tna msya raa manes ro
Yahudi weto sor mfot Yesus tna make yatem.
Ana mbo Ait makah mamo mo kʼHanas. (Ti weto to bi Kayafas yamo
Yahudi ro yase. Bi Hanas tait
yase ro wia. Bi ait tait Kayafas snyim rait.
Kayafas oh mi raa ro taa yawe kʼraa mabi ro
Yahudi yawe, “Rau ro moof to, raa sait yhai sai. Soh mfe to, kbe raa wanu majat beta.”)
Mbam armato reto, Simon-Petrus ysya kuber roto sait kro mam ttis mrof. Raa makah Yesus twok mam samu mato ro
yase rait. Kuber roto retait,
yase yhar oh. Tibyo ait kro Yesus mamo snok mam bohra reto.
Menohe Petrus ste mne wea mam masa. Tna kuber roto retait yamo ykyas kʼsrian ro ano sau ro ja kmot masa, tna ymen Petrus twok mam bohra reto mato ye.
Petrus twok tna sryan ro mros mam masa reto mtu kʼait mawe, “Nyõ refi kuber ro Raa retait ye, fe mfe a?” Petrus ywaar yawe, “Mfe.”
Arin foos-foos tna sryan msya raa manes taro mros mam bohra mni foos. Tna Petrus yamo yros kene ysya ana mam tafoh reto yni foos ye.
yase ro wia yasom Hanas. Ait yhau mam amah mato tna ytu sas Yesus. Ytu yawe bo ro ja ykyas to bawya, tna raa ro ja kro Ait to awya.
Yesus yawe, “Taja: Ja Jõ tkyas abyõ kʼraa mawat mari. Tkyas bo kʼraa ro Yahudi sor mam samu watum wana tna mam Samu ro Allah mam Yerusalem fo ye. Tkyas bo wai aro fee.
Fyi re nyõ ntu bo kʼJõ? Ntu bo kʼana ro mari bokyas aJõ reto. Ana mhar bo ro Jõ tkyas reto.”
Yesus yawe feto tna raa manes sait yiban yasu. Tna yawe, “Nasoh moof sai! Nkyas bo feto
ro yase retait ma!”
Yesus yawe, “Soh Jõ tkyas bo ro mkair aro, feto nawe abyõ re raa mhar. Menohe soh Jõ tkyas bo ro ati to, fyi re nyõ niban Jõ?”
Yesus yatem rait, riwai raa make mkah too. Tna Hanas ybis raa makah Yesus mamo mo Kayafas. (Ti reto to, bi Kayafas yamo
ro yase.)
Mam bohra samu reto to, Petrus yros yni foos fares. Tna raa mtu kʼait mawe, “Nyõ fi kuber ro Yesus!” Menohe Petrus ywaar yawe, “Mfe!”
Sryan
ro yase sait yros mam weto ye. Ait retait raa mana sau ysya sryan ro riwai Petrus ysot yimara retait. Tna yawe kʼPetrus yawe, “Jõ thar Nyõ. Nyõ oh mi riwai nsya Ait nmo su mam armato!”
Tna Petrus ywaar yawe, “Mfe!” Yawe feto si fo kook sau mara.
Rabu momo raa ro Yahudi weto makah Yesus mbam samu ro Kayafas mamoʼt samu wore wo
Pilatus ja ytu srah yari. Menohe ana raa ro Yahudi tibyo ana mesait twok mam samu reto mato fee.
Watum ro
rana mawe samu raa ro
roto to mbau kʼana. Tibyo ana kaket ana tna twok mam mato fee. Soh miwer watum reto kbe ana sohmaam bo msya raa wana mam korat ro
to ma.
Feto tibyo Pilatus frok yamoʼt mne yo kʼana tna ytu yawe, “Bo bawya ro anu nkyas mai kʼraa refi fo?”
Ana mawe, “Soh Ait yno safo fee, fyi re amu nfot Ait nkah nma no kʼnyõ!”
Pilatus yawe, “Nbo Ait nmo oh! Nesait nmit safo kʼAit mnan si Watum ro
ranu rof.” Ana mawe kʼPilatus mawe, “Amu nwe nno yasu marak menohe
Roma mawe amu raa ro Yahudi ntu srah wamu tna nmit safo menohe mbis mawe anu nme raa majat mamyot si watum ranu fee!”
Bo refo ana mkyas mnan si bawya ro Yesus ykyas wia matim yawe iso ro kbe raa mame Ait yajat.
Pilatus hah twok mam samu reto tna yawe Yesus kro Ait. Ait ytu bo kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ fi
raa ro Yahudi fe mfe a?”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Bokyas reto mbam kʼnyo nesait sai a? Bo ro nyõ nawe reto mbam raa roto fe mfe a?”
Pilatus yawe, “Jõ fi raa ro Yahudi fee! Raa woNyõ ro Yahudi msya
manes wonyõ mesait oh mi msan Nyõ kʼJõ tatem fo. Nyõ nno bo bawya re ana msan Nyõ kʼjõ fo?”
Yesus yawe, “Wore wo Jõ tase tbo raa mnan fi
to, tno mam tabam refo fee. Mfi bo tawe tamo
mam tabam refo fo, maami raa ro kro jõ kbe mros tis kʼJõ. Soh feto to, kbe ana mafa tna mno wa afo re raa ro Yahudi mfot Jõ to ma. He mfe. Wore wo tbo raa mnan fi
to, tno mam tabam refo fee.”
Tna Pilatus yawe, “Soh feto, Nyõ fi
fe mfe a?” Yesus yawe, “Ae, Jõ fi

Au oh mi fnya mabe Jõ tna troh tama tabam refo. Tama tabam refo mkah tno bo sau aran, au oh mi; tama tkyas bokyas ro ati. Tama afo re tkyas bo ro ati kʼraa. Tna awya ro yros tis bo ro ati mbam kʼAllah to, ait yari bo ro Jõ tkyas.”
Tna Pilatus ytu kʼAit yawe, “Bo ro ati to bawya meto?”
Tna Pilatus frok yamo yo kʼraa ro Yahudi ro mros mam mne tna yawe, “Tkai bo ro Ait yno mkair aro fee.
Menohe mfo refo anu nkyõ korat ranu ro
. Tna bo mafa ro anu nno soo oh mi, ja tbis re raa ranu sait frok mbam
tna yamo bait. Feto to anu ksoh nwe jõ kbe tufrok
ro Yahudi refi fe mfe a?”
Ana mawe, “Mfe! Bitsre Ait yamo bait ma! Bitsre Barabas kʼamu!” (Barabas tait raa ro tiwya yno safo tibyo
Roma mbu ait mam
to.)
Tna
Pilatus yoo Yesus yee kʼraa nsaah Ait.
Tna raa sbe ro Roma weto moo bo ro maan mnan fi bmun hyoh tna ste watau sau. Tna mse Yesus sbyõ yana. Tna ana mawah ratan ro mkof ngknu sau, ro ja raa mase myum to, tna mse kʼAit yyum.
Tna ana mama mros mam Ait yasu tna sret Ait masah mawe, “Meen oh kʼNyõ,
raa ro Yahudi!” Tna ana mai Ait yasu.

Tna Pilatus frok yamoʼt mne mun sau naut yo kʼraa ro Yahudi, tna ybis raa sbe makah Yesus frok. Ait yawe, “Jõ tsan Ait kʼanu re anu nhar nwe jõ tnaut tawe Ait yno safo sau bo fee. Jõ tmit safo aro kʼAit fee ye.”
Yesus yyum ratan ro mkof tna sbyõ watau ro maan reto to, tna raa makah Ait mama. Tna Pilatus yawe, “Nmat Ait oh metait.”
manes msya raa wana ro mabi mmat Ait fo ana masen mawe, “Name Ait yajat oh!” Pilatus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nesait nkah Ait nme yajat. Jõ tkai bo ro mkair sau aro Ait yno fee.”
Menohe raa ro Yahudi weto mawe, “Ait yawe Ait fi Ku ro Allah yare. Tna watum ro
ranu mbis mawe, ‘Soh raa yawe bo feto to, kbe Ait raa mame yajat.’”
Pilatus yari bo reto to, ait waa toni renti.
Tibyo Ait hah twok mam samu mato reto u. Tna raa sbe mbo Yesus twok ye. Tna Pilatus ytu kʼAit yawe, “Nyõ raa ro hayo?” Menohe Yesus yawe bo aro si kʼait fee.
Pilatus yawe, “Nyõ hawe nkyas bo nsya jõ a? Nyõ wase nawe jõ fi tatak tbis raa mbitsre Nyõ namo bo Nyõ. Tna soh jõ tbis feto to, kbe raa mbitsre. Tna soh tbis raa mame Nyõ to, kbe raa mame.”
Yesus yawe, “Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo tak reto yee kʼnyõ to. Soh Ait yoo yee fee maami nyõ natak fee ye. Feto to ait ro ysan Jõ kʼnyõ natem anyõ to iro rait reto msai miwer iro anyõ.”
Pilatus yari bokyas ro Yesus reto tna yawe tomer bitsre Yesus. Menohe raa ro Yahudi mtu fari-fara mawe, “Bi yabi, soh nyõ bitsre Ait to, nyõ nafoh Kaisar fee! Awya ro yawe yamo
to ait retait yamo byoh Kaisar!”

Raa ro ytu srah to ja hre mam ambar sau. Ambar refo fo mhau mam yuk ro raa mtu mawe 'Litostrotos'. (Mai ro Ibrani to, raa mtu mawe 'Gabata'.) Pilatus yari bo raa ro Yahudi riwai mawe reto tna yamo hre mam ambar reto. Ait ybis raa sbe makah Yesus frok.
(Ti reto to, raa siwyan bo re menrabu mno korat ro
Ayõ ro 12 baas bo feto.) Tna Pilatus yawe kʼraa ro Yahudi weto yawe,
ranu mefi!”
Menohe ana mtu mawe, “Nkah Ait nmo oh! Nmo nme Ait yajat! Nme ait yajat mam ara warok!” Tna Pilatus yawe, “Nwe tbis raa mame
ranu mam ara warok a?” Tna
manes weto mawe, “Kaisar yesait aran yamo
ramu!”
Tna Pilatus ysan Yesus kʼana re raa mame.
Tna raa sbe ro Roma weto makah Yesus mamo.
Ana moo ara warok mse kʼYesus yasom. Tna mamoʼt yuk ro masom Hamana. (Mai ro Ibrani to raa mawe 'Golgota'.)
Mam beto raa mse Ait mam ara warok reto. Raa roto mabo ewok raa mame su msya Ait ye. Sait mam ti yatem ati, tna sait mam ti yatem ta, tna Yesus raa mse mam masuf.
Tna Pilatus ybis raa mkom bo refo: “Yesus fi raa ro Nazaret. Ait fi
raa ro Yahudi.” Bokom refo raa moo mse mam ara warok.
Yuk ro raa mame Yesus to kene sai mam
Tibyo raa ro Yahudi mawat mmat bokom reto. Bokom reto raa mkom mam mai trion tuuf: Ibrani, Latin msya mai ro Yunani.
Menohe
manes ro
Yahudi weto hafrah. Ana mamo mo kʼPilatus mawe, “Nkom
raa ro Yahudi’ ma! Nkom: ‘Raa refi yawe ait
raa ro Yahudi.’”
Menohe Pilatus yawe, “Ro jõ tkom reto mhau yum oh.”
Raa sbe ro Roma mse Yesus mam ara warok. Tna fo ana moo ratan rait saim ftah trion jiit. Aro yoo ftah sau-sau. Menohe
rAit to, tiwya raa mfen kaket moof.
reto to, raa mtin mnan fi ja raa mtin ratan to fee. Raa moo
tna sne muuf. Mfen mbam uu snok mam te.)
Feto to raa sbe mawe kʼanya mawe, “Anu bhah
rAit reto ma. Nma, anu tane mkah
re merif awya ro kbe ykai
reto.” Tna ana mno feto re mnan si mkah Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Ana saim-sam ratan aJõ, tna
aJõ ana mno mkah botane.”
Mazmur 22:19
Fnya mabo jiit mros kene mam ara warok mair ro Yesus. Ana oh mi: Yesus yme Maria, msya mao, msya Klopas yfain ro masom Maria ye, tna msya Maria Magdalena ye.
Yesus ymat yme msya kuber wAit sait mros. Ait retait Yesus yhafri. Tna yawe kʼyme yawe, “Tme, ku anyõ retait.”
Tna yawe kuber rAit retait yawe, “Nme oh meto.” Ayõ reto ye kuber retait ymen Yesus yme yamo yse mam samu rait.
Tna fo Yesus yhar yawe bombra beta ro Yaja yawe kʼAit yno to, yno mkak oh. Tna yawe, “Thai sbit.” Yawe feto ykyas mnan si tiwya Allah ybis raa mkom mam Bokom rAit.
maya ro mano baro mhau mam baah sau. Tna raa moo bo ro mmot aya mnan fi
make mam ara makit tna mberu mam
maya reto. Tna tubat mee kʼYesus yata.
Yata tna yawe, “Bo ro tama tno mam tabam refo, tno mkak oh!” Tna yanwaruk ysan yamos rAit kʼYaja tibyo yhai.
Ti reto to, ayõ ro
Feto to, raa ro Yahudi siwyan bo mkah ayõ ro raa wana ntmoh
Ana ro manes hawe bo ajat weto mhau nkro akus mam ara warok ayõ menrabu reto. Menrabu to ayõ ro mase. Au oh mefo ana baro mamo mo kʼPilatus mayoh re ybis raa sbe wait miji raa weto maa wana
tna skur ajat weto mbam ara warok trion tuuf reto.
Pilatus ybis. Raa mana ewok raa mame msya Yesus fo. Tna raa sbe weto miji maa wana wia.
Tna ana mawe miji Yesus yaa rAit, he Ait yajat wia oh. Tibyo miji Yesus yaa fee.
Menohe raa sbe sait yawah sawya ysu yajoh. Tibyo mees msya aya miyi frok.
Ti reto to, raa sait yesait ymat bo reto.
Tna ait oh mi ro ykom aam refo. Tna bo ro ykyas to mabo tu. Ykyas bo refo afo re anu nhar nwe bo wefo beta ait ykyas sioh fee.
Bo weto mabo feto afo re mnan si Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Ytai rAit sau kbe raa miji fee.”
Keluaran 12:46; Bilangan 9:12; Mazmur 34:21
Tna bokom far-far taro ye mawe:
“Ana kbe heyut mrom Ait ro ana msu.”
Zakharia 12:10; Wahyu 1:7

Bi Yusuf tait raa ro Arimatea. Tna ait kuber ro Yesus wAit sait ye. Menohe ait waa raa manes ro Yahudi. Tibyo smot bait wai. Yesus yajat tna Yusuf yamo yo kʼPilatus tna yayoh yawe yoo ajat ro Yesus. Tna Pilatus ybis Yusuf yamo yoo.
(Nikodemus tait raa ro tiwya yamo yo kʼYesus mam wore arin mti sau.) Ati refo ait yama tna ysya Yusuf mbewok makah ajat reto mamo. Nikodemus yakah bo ro mnan fi
Bo reto raa srioh msya
tna mabyoh maut toni. Samyoh rau to 34
bo feto.
Ana mabo ewok reto makah
(hawee ro moof) ye. Moo bo reto tna ngkaru mam hawee reto tna sro ajat ro Yesus. Mbewok mno mnan si ja raa ro Yahudi mno hai wana.
Kene wo Golgota to armato ro moof sau. Tna wore weto to raa mabah isra mato mkah bo meen raa mse hai wana. Menohe mamo snok ayõ reto raa mse hai mam isra mato reto aro fefares.
Menrabu ayõ ro raa ntmoh. Tna isra reto kene sai. Tibyo ana mbewok moo ajat reto sama mam isra mato ro armato reto.
Ayõ ro

rabu ati reto to, arin maah fefares. Tna Maria Magdalena mamoʼt isra reto. Mamo snok yuk reto tna mmat he isra reto to, masoh maa wea. Au mmat he fraa ro raa muut wa isra masoh reto to, raa mririk oh.
Mmat feto tibyo mhoh fooh mamo saso Simon-Petrus ysya kuber ro Yesus yhafri retait. Mamo mo kʼana mbewok tna mawe, “Jõ tmat
yarak mam isra! Raa msyõf Ait oh! Amu wase raa mse Ait mam tiyo!”
Tibyo Petrus ysya kuber roto sait masen mamo mmat Ait mam isra reto.
Mbewok mhoh mamo, he kuber roto retait yhoh wia Petrus. Tna snok isra mato reto wia matim.
Ait retait yaka koyo ymat mam isra mato. Ymat he hawee
ro raa sro Yesus reto sai mbris akus. He ait twok isra mato reto fee.
Tna Simon-Petrus yama tis yrof ait snok mam yuk reto. Snok tna twok mam isra reto mato. Tna ait ymat hawee reto mbris akus mam weto.
Tna ymat hawee mabuf ro raa make Yesus yana. Hawee reto raa beah tna mse hayah baro.
Tna fo kuber ro riwai yhoh yatim wia Petrus fi yamo twok ye. Ymat tna ait yhar yawe Yesus yrok yasen.
(Bokom ro Allah mawe Yesus kbe yrok yasen. Menohe ati reto to, ana mhar maja rau kaket fefares.)
Tna fo kuber mabo ewok weto to hah mamoʼt amah.
Maria Magdalena mros kait kene wo isra reto to, mawia. Mawia tna maka mmat isra mato.
Menohe mmat he
mabo ewok.
weto mbewok myum ratan ro mboh. Mbewok hre mam ati ro raa mse Yesus ajat rAit. Sau hre mam ati ro yana, tna sau hre mam ti yaa.
weto mawe kʼau mawe, “Fyi re nyõ nawia fo?” Maria mawe,
ajõ ro smot tait, ajat rAit raa moo mamo marak. Tna jõ wase raa mse mam woyõ.”
Mawe bo reto tna haberek mmat he Raa sait yros mam weto. Ait refi Yesus, menohe au wase Ait ye.

Yesus ytu kʼfai au yawe, “Fyi re nyõ nawia fo? Nyõ saso awya meto?” Maria mrok mawe Ait fi raa ro kmot armato reto. Tibyo mawe kʼAit mawe, “Taja, soh nyõ noo Ait meto mi, nerif wore wo nyõ nse afo re jõ tamo too Ait takah tamo.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Maria!” Tibyo au msiur mmat Yesus tna mawe,
!” (Mai ro Ibrani reto to, mawe

Tna Yesus yawe, “Nbo Jõ wia ma! Jõ hah te taut tamo to kʼTaja fefares. He namo no kʼtao woJõ na. Tna nkyas kʼana nawe mfo refo Jõ hah te tamo to kʼTaja aJõ. Ait fi anu Nja wanu ye. Ait fi Allah ro Jõ smot. Tna Ait fi Allah ro anu smot ye.”
Maria mamo mo kuber ro Yesus wAit mawe, “Riwai jõ tmat
!” Tna mkyas kʼana bombra beta ro Ait yawe.
Ayõ ro
reto arin mti oh. Tna kuber ro Yesus wAit hre su mam amah sau. Ana waa raa Yahudi ro manes weto. Tibyo muut masa matak. Menohe Yesus yama yros tubor susai kʼana tna yawe, “Waa ma.”
Ait ykyas feto tna yerif yatem msya yatefau rAit kʼana. Ana mmat
u to, ana simaut mase.
Tna Yesus yawe u yawe, “Riof kʼanu oh! Tiwya Taja ybis Jõ tamo to kʼraa. Tna mfo refo tbis anu tawe nmo no kʼraa nfi feto ye.”
Tna fo Ait yfi yafos rAit kʼana tna yawe, “Tsan Har ro
kʼanu mefo. Noo oh!
Soh anu nwe kʼraa nwe, ‘Jõ tawe, iro ro nno to marak oh.’ Feto kbe Allah yyon iro ro ana mno oh. Menohe soh anu nwe iro ro ana mno mhau fares to, iro ro ana mno mhau bau.”
Tomas, ro ja raa mtu yasom Didimus ye, tait kuber ro Yesus wAit sait ye. Ana to mabo 12. Ti ro Yesus yerif Ait reto to, Tomas hre su ysya kuber taro to fee. Ait yarak.
Yama tna kuber taro mkyas kʼait mawe, “Amu nmat
!” He Tomas yawe, “Soh jõ tmat yier ro
mam yatem fee, tbo fee, tna tnit temkrem mam yhaf ate ro raa mame fefares to, jõ aro wase bokyas ranu reto bo mabo rau yum fee.”
sau firwas tna kuber ro Yesus wAit hre su mam amah u. Tna Tomas hre ye. Mato beta raa muut matak. Menohe Yesus yama yros tubor susai ana tna yawe, “Riof kʼanu oh!”
Tna Ait yawe kʼTomas yawe, “Nmat tatem aJõ nbo. Natem nbo tatefau aJõ. Nnaut maut-mroh ma. Smot Jõ oh!”
Tomas yari yno tna yawe kʼYesus yawe, “Nyõ fi
ajõ! Nyõ fi Allah ro Jõ smot!”
Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nmat Jõ oh mi nyõ smot Jõ. Raa taro mmat Jõ fee, menohe kbe ana smot Jõ. Kbe ana weto mhau simaut mase.”
Amu, kuber ro Yesus nmat bo msai ro yno mawat. Menohe jõ tkom bombra beta mam aam refo fee.
Bombra ro jõ tkom mam aam refo fo, tkom afo re anu nhar nwe Yesus tait
. Ait fi Ku ro Allah yare. Tkom afo re anu smot Ait. Anu ro smot Ait msya nri bo ro Ait yawe to, kbe nkai riof ro hame.
Ti baro firwas tna Yesus yerif Ait kuber wAit mam maru ro Galilea. (Maru reto to, masom maru ro Tiberias ye.) Bo reto fefo:
Simon-Petrus, Tomas (ro ja raa mtu yasom Didimus), Natanael (raa ro Kana mam
ro Galilea), ku ro Zebedeus wait, tna msya kuber ro Yesus mabo ewok roto taro naut to ana hre su.
Tna Simon-Petrus yawe kʼana yawe, “Tamo takam syoh.” Tna ana mawe, “Amu kro ye.” Ana maut wiak tna saso sioh mti reto mamo snok rabu. He mfot syoh aro fee.
Isi ntara Yesus yros maru maam. Menohe ana mhar mawe Yesus metait fee.
Tna Ait ytu kʼana yawe, “Tao na, nfot syoh aro fe mfe a?” Ana mawe, “Mfe!”
Yawe, “Sik beak
ranu ti ntem ati kbe tru sioh!” Ana mari mno feto tna mkai syoh mawat toni. Tibyo ana mtai tubat fee.
Kuber ro Yesus yhafri retait yawe kʼPetrus yawe,
metait!” Petrus yari feto tna yasen yyum ratan ro riwai yrus. Tna tbat mam aya kni yamo yo kʼYesus.
Kuber taro mhau mam wiak mato tna miin mamo mrof. Miin mamo tna mkuk
reto msya syoh weto mamoʼt maru mne. (Mne reto mhau fari fee; 100
sai bo feto.)
Ana snok mne tna mroh mbam wiak. Tna ana mmat
msya syoh baro raa konta mam tafoh masuf.
Tna Yesus yawe, “Sgi nbo syoh ro anu tru baro nma!”
Simon-Petrus yaut mam wiak tna ykuk
reto mamaʼt mne. Syoh ro mabi ran trion 153 mhau mam
reto mato menohe hri fee.
Yesus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nma sohmaam bo.” Kuber weto mhar mawe Ait refi
tibyo ana beta waa mawe mtu kʼAit fee. Mtu mawe Ait awya fee.
Tna Yesus yoo
reto saim kʼana. Yoo syoh weto yee kʼana mabo ye.
(Yesus yrok yasen tna ti ro yerif Ait kuber wAit reto to, muhrin tuuf oh meto.)
Ana sohmaam bo mkak. Tna Yesus yawe kʼSimon-Petrus yawe, “Yohanes yare: Fyi, nyõ nhafri Jõ toni niwer raa taro fe mfe a?” Tna Petrus yawe, “Ae,
Nyõ nhar nawe jõ thafri Nyõ.” Yesus yawe, “Feto to nsia
maku woJõ.”
Mun ro ewok u Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Yohanes yare: Fyi, nyõ nhafri Jõ kaket fe mfe a?” Tna Petrus yawe, “Ae,
Nyõ nhar nawe jõ thafri Nyõ.” Yesus yawe, “Feto to kmot
woJõ.”
Tna Yesus ytu ro mun tuuf u kʼait yawe, “Yohanes yare: Fyi, nyõ nhafri Jõ fe mfe a?” Yesus ytu bo reto mun tuuf tna Petrus yari feto tna sraujin yawe, “Ae,
Nyõ nhar bombra beta. Tibyo nhar nawe jõ thafri Nyõ.” Yesus yawe, “Feto to nsia
woJõ.
Nnaut: Ati ro nyõ mere fares to, nyõ nesait ntau hotom anyõ, tna namo tiyo-teya ro nyõ ksoh sai. Menohe ati ro nyõ
to, kbe nyum natem nee kʼraa roto mbo tna moo hotom anyõ mbo mtau mati kʼnyõ naka ye. Tna ana makah nyõ mamoʼt yuk ro nyõ hawe bo namo.”
Yesus yawe bo reto yerif iso ro meen Petrus yajat. (Meen Petrus smot Yesus matak tibyo raa mame ait yajat Raa mmat bo ro yno tna mbaut Allah.) Tna Yesus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nama, kro Jõ oh!”
Tna Petrus ymat he kuber ro Yesus yhafri retait kro ana mam tis. (Ait retait oh mi raa ro tiwya susu hre kene ysya Yesus tna ytu kʼAit yawe,
awya oh mi kbe besruf Nyõ to?”)
Petrus ymat kuber retait tna ytu kʼYesus yawe, “Fyi? Bo bawya ro kbe mai kʼait refi?”
Yesus yawe, “Mfi bo Jõ tawe ait yhau yroon snok mam ti ro Jõ tama u to, bo ro nyõ nsya nhar meto fee. He bo ro nyõ nno to, nyõ kro Jõ sai!”

Tibyo kuber weto taro mabah bokyas mawe kuber retait meen yhai fee. Ebokfi Yesus yawe feto fee. Ait yawe, “Soh Jõ ksoh tawe ait yhau yaam mamo snok mam ati ro Jõ thah tama u to, bo ro nyõ nsya nhar meto fee.”
Jõ oh mi kuber retait. Tmat bo ro Yesus yno weto tna tkom fo. Tna anu bhar bwe bawya ro jõ tkyas to beta mabo tu oh.
Bo ro Yesus yno taro to mawat fares, raa mkom beta fee. Mfi bo raa mkom beta beryum to, aam ro raa mkom weto to mninon. Tnaut tawe kbe yuk ro raa mse bokom reto mam tabam refo to mnan fee.
Acts: Teofilus; tkom aam ro ewok refo tiim kʼnyõ.
Tiwya tkom aam ro tinyi to, tkyas bombra ro tii Yesus yno tna msya bombra ro Ait watum ye.

Mam aam ro tinyi reto to, jõ tkom tna tkyas tawe raa sikowah Yesus tna mame Ait yajat. Tna Ait yrok yasen. Tna yhau mam tabam refo ti 40 naut. Mam wore weto to, raabis ro tiwya Ait ysok mmat Ait muhrin aro-aro ye. Tna Ait yno bo ro msai mawat afo re ana mhar kaket mawe Ait yrok yasen tu oh. Tna Ait ykyas bo kʼana. Ykyas wore wo Allah yamo

ybo raa mana rAit to kʼana. Tna Ait ysya Har ro Allah mbewok mbis bo kʼana ye. Aam ro tinyi reto to, tkyas wore wo Yesus yhau mam tabam refo mamo snok mam ati ro Allah tubat Ait yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit.

Mam aam ro tinyi reto to, jõ tkom tna tkyas tawe raa sikowah Yesus tna mame Ait yajat. Tna Ait yrok yasen. Tna yhau mam tabam refo ti 40 naut. Mam wore weto to, raabis ro tiwya Ait ysok mmat Ait muhrin aro-aro ye. Tna Ait yno bo ro msai mawat afo re ana mhar kaket mawe Ait yrok yasen tu oh. Tna Ait ykyas bo kʼana. Ykyas wore wo Allah yamo

ybo raa mana rAit to kʼana. Tna Ait ysya Har ro Allah mbewok mbis bo kʼana ye. Aam ro tinyi reto to, tkyas wore wo Yesus yhau mam tabam refo mamo snok mam ati ro Allah tubat Ait yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit.
Yesus yaut yamo fefares to, Ait ysya raabis rAit hre sohmaam bo su. Tna Ait yawe, “Nhau mam
ro Yerusalem. Frok nbam
refo wia ma. Nhau ste bo ro tiwya anu Bja ranu yawe kbe yoo yee kʼanu to. Bo reto tiwya Jõ tkyas kʼanu oh:
Tiwya Yohanes yama
raa mkah aya sai, menohe ti baro firwas to, kbe Allah
anu mkah Har rAit.”
Ati sau to, raabis ro Yesus wAit hre su msya Ait mam faut ro Zaitun.
Tna ana mtu kʼAit mawe,
mfo refo Nyõ nasen nno
Israel mros u fe mfe a?”
Menohe Yesus yawe, “Anu Bja yesait yhar bo rAit. Yno bo reto mam ayõ ro meen wono naut. Menohe Ait ykyas ayõ reto kʼanu nhar fee.
Tkyas ti ro meen Har rAit mroh mbo anu. Ati reto to, kbe Ait yoo yatak rAit yee kʼanu. Tna bo ro tiwya anu nmat Jõ tno to, kbe anu nbo nkyas mam
ro Yerusalem tna mam
ro Yudea beta. Tna kbe nkyas mam rabin ro Samaria ye tna mamo snok mam tabam arin aso wefo beta ye.”
Yesus ykyas bo weto kʼana mkak. Tna fo Allah tubat Ait yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit. Tna raa ro mros mam weto sor heyut mmat Ait yaut yamo. Tna ayoh mboh burut Ait wa tibyo ana mahni Ait.
Ana mhau mrom Ait yaut kri-kri fo,
mabo ewok ro myum ratan mboh toni frok tubor.

mbewok mawe kʼana mawe, “Anu raa ro Galilea: Anu nros heyut nmat bawya meto? Yesus yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit. Tna meen Ait hah ye yama u. Meen Ait hah ye yama u mnan bo riwai anu nmat Ait yaut yamo feto.”
Kuber wAit mbam Faut ro
me mhah me mamoʼt Yerusalem. Mbam
mamoʼt Yerusalem to
sau bo feto.

Tna ana me mamoʼt amah ro ja ana mhau. Maut mamoʼt amah hawar ro uu. Ana weto to: Petrus ysya Yohanes, Yakobus ysya Andreas, Filipus ysya Tomas, Bartolomeus ysya Matius, tna Yakobus ro bi Alfeus yare ysya Simon (Simon tait ja knait raa ro Roma mbo raa ro Israel ma.) tna Yudas ro Yakobus yare,
fai Maria ro Yesus yme, Yesus yao na msya fnya baro ye. Ana beta to mhaf rana sau tna ana ja hre su skabuk yoyo.
Ati sau reto to, raa wana mabo 120 bo feto mama siret su msya ana. Tna Petrus yasen yros ykyas bo kʼana yawe,
“Raa wamu: Bo ro tiwya Allah yawe to, mhau rau oh. Tiwya Har rAit sobu
Daud. Bokyas reto ait ykom mam aam ro Mazmur. Ykom yawe, ‘Ait yerif iso ro raa kbe mama mfot Yesus.’ Daud ykom bo reto tiwya ooh oh.
Tna anu nhar nwe Yudas tiwya ysya amu yamo raabis ro Yesus wAit ye. Yesus ysok ait tna yno bo ro Yesus ybis ysya amu wefo ye.
Menohe Yudas yno bo ro mkair. ⌞Ait yasim Yesus.⌟ Mkah pitis ro raa maren ait to, Yudas yoo tabam. Tna ait btek yhaf mamo siya tna yhaf ntaba mfais yajat mam tabam reto.
Tna raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem beta to, mhar bo reto. Tibyo ana mkyas tabam reto to, mawe masom
to, mai ranu mawe, ‘Tabam ro Mees’).
Watum ro Allah tiwya Daud ykom mam aam ro
reto mawe,
‘Tabam ro yhau to, makus oh. Tna raa me mhau mam tabam reto u ma.’
Mazmur 69:26
‘Hroh ro tiwya ait hre reto to, raa roto me shauk hre riryõn.’”
Mazmur 109:8
Tna Petrus ykyas yawe, “Mamyot bokom reto tawe nma, anu bsok raa sait hre mam hroh ro Yudas. Anu bsok raa ro yhau ysya anu su mam wore wo tiwya
Yesus yhau su ysya anu fares to:
Raa ro yhau ysya anu maban ati ro Yohanes
raa, mamo snok mam ati ro Yesus yaut yamoʼt sawro rAit sikba anu beta to. Kbe ait retait kro anu tna bkyas bo ro anu bmat: Bkyas bwe Yesus yrok yasen.”
Tna ana beta msok raa mabo ewok. Raa mabo ewok reto, sait yasom Yusuf (ja raa mawe yasom Barsabas ye tna yasom Yustus ye), tna msok ait sait yasom Matias.
Tna ana skabuk mayoh
mawe,
Nyõ nhar raa mhaf wana beta. Nerif kʼamu awya ro Nyõ ksoh nsok.
Raa retait shauk hroh ro Yudas yamo raabis aNyõ. Kbe yno bo woNyõ ro nbis. Yudas btek tna sikba hroh reto. Yamo ykair, btek kayah.”
Tna ana hre tane, he maut Matias. Tibyo ait kro raabis ro Yesus tna ana beta mabo 12.
Mabu ro Pentakosta to, raa ro smot Yesus beta siret mam yuk sau.
Tna ana ro hre mam amah mato reto beta mari bo ro hmu sau. Hmu mfi foos ro msai toni mbam ayoh mama.
Tna ana mmat mfi bo tafoh mait feto. Tna tafoh reto mbet raa mana abyõ beta.
Tna Har ro
mbo ana matak. Tibyo ana masen mkyas bo mkah mai raa roto. Mkyas mamyot bo ro Har sobu ana.
Ja raa ro
Yahudi mawat mama makyõ korat rana reto mam
ro Yerusalem. Tna
reto ye raa
Yahudi mbam rabin roto makin mamaʼt Yerusalem ye. Ana weto to raa ro ja mur-mur skabuk Allah.
Ati ro ana mari bo ro hmu reto to, raa mhoh mama mmat. Mama mari he raa Kristen weto mkyas bo: Ana makin mari bo ro ana mkyas mkah mai wana-wana tibyo ana beta mrok.
Ana mrok ktak toni tna mawe kʼanya mawe, “Ana ro mkyas bo weu beta raa mbam
ro Galilea!
Fyi sai re ana mkyas bo mkah mai wanu beta to?
Anu fo raa ro bbam rabin ro Partia, rabin ro Media msya rabin ro Elam ye. Tna taro to raa ro mbam rabin ro Mesopotamia,
ro Yudea,
ro Kapadokia,
ro Pontus, rabin ro Asia,
rabin ro Frigia, rabin ro Pamfilia,
ro Mesir msya raa ro mbam
ro Libia ro kene mam
ro Kirene ye. Tna anu taro fo nbam
ro Roma, tna taro to nbam sato ro Kreta, nsya rabin ro Arab bo. Anu beta fo raa bbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye tna bsya raa roto ro mrok kro
Yahudi tna sai. Anu bri raa Kristen wefo mkyas bo yase ro Allah yno mkah mai wanu ro ja bmai soo.”
rabin ro Frigia, rabin ro Pamfilia,
ro Mesir msya raa ro mbam
ro Libia ro kene mam
ro Kirene ye. Tna anu taro fo nbam
ro Roma, tna taro to nbam sato ro Kreta, nsya rabin ro Arab bo. Anu beta fo raa bbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye tna bsya raa roto ro mrok kro
Yahudi tna sai. Anu bri raa Kristen wefo mkyas bo yase ro Allah yno mkah mai wanu ro ja bmai soo.”
Ana ktak beta. Tna ana mtu kʼanya mawe, “Bo bawya ro mefo ee?”
Menohe ana taro sret raa Kristen weto mawe, “Ana weto mata
ro msu tna bisir meto!”

Tibyo Petrus yasen yros ysya raabis mabo 11 refo tna ykyas bo mkah mai ro mase kʼraa weto beta yawe, “Anu raa ro Yahudi nsya raa ro nhau mam Yerusalem sor: Nri bo ro jõ tkyas kʼanu fo, tna nhar kaket:
Raa ro mkyas bo mkah mai raa roto wefo fo, ana bisir mfi bo anu nwe to, fee! Rabu sai fares mefo.
Menohe bo msai ro anu bmat refo oh mi bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yoel yama ykom mam aam rait yawe,

‘Meen, kene mam sboh rau to, Jõ too Har aJõ tee kʼraa beta. Feto to ku ro sme wanu msya ku ro ano wanu bo to, kbe ana makah soo woJõ mamo mkyas kʼraa. Tna ku ro tna mmat bo ro Jõ terif kʼana ye. Tna raa mabi kbe smi mmat bo ro Jõ tkait kʼana ye.
Tna mam ati reto ye, sryan woJõ ro sme msya ro ano bo to, kbe Jõ too Har aJõ tee kʼana ye. Tna kbe ana makah soo woJõ mamo mkyas kʼraa ye.
Tna kbe Jõ tno bo ro msai mam ayoh. Tno bo msai mam tabam refo ye afo re raa mmat tna mhar Jõ tatak aJõ. Meen raa mmat mees, mmat tafoh msya wasi ro maun maut ye.
Tna kbe ayõ haberek mti mamur htoh, tna kbe snyi haberek mkek mfi mees wia, tna fo ayõ ro
to mama. Ayõ reto to, ayõ ro msai toni.
Tna awya ro ksoh kro
kbe ykai riof.’”

Tna Petrus yawe, “Raa ro Israel: Nri bo ro jõ tawe fo: Nnaut oh: Yesus raa ro Nasaret tait, tii yno bo ro msai. Ait sair bo ro hnah re kbe raa mmat tna mrok ktak tna waa. Bo weto beta Ait yno re kbe anu nmat tna nhar nwe yatak rAit to mbam Allah.
Tna Allah ysan Ait kʼanu, raa ro
Yahudi, re anu nsan Yesus kʼraa ro wase Allah. Ana weto mame Ait yajat mam ara warok. Anu nesait oh mi nsom isti reto to. Bo weto beta mamo mamyot iso ro tiwya Allah yhar tna saim wia to.
Menohe Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen. Yesus Raa ro yatak. Ait yhai tibyo fee. Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen.
⌞Mam aam ro Mazmur⌟ Daud ykom ⌞bo ro Yesus yawe
Allah⌟ yawe,
‘Jõ tmat
yhau kait ysya Jõ yoyo. Allah yros mam ati ro Jõ tatem ati tna yban Jõ. Feto Jõ waa bo mkair kbe raa mno mai kʼJõ to fee.
Kbe thai to, tna
Allah beak Jõ takus mam sawro ro hai fee. Jõ fi Ait ro Allah ybis yama. Hai aJõ, kbe Ait sayõ rof makus mnis fee. Feto oh mi Jõ simaut mase. Jõ bibi Nyõ yoyo ye.
Kbe thai to, tna
Allah beak Jõ takus mam sawro ro hai fee. Jõ fi Ait ro Allah ybis yama. Hai aJõ, kbe Ait sayõ rof makus mnis fee. Feto oh mi Jõ simaut mase. Jõ bibi Nyõ yoyo ye.
Nyõ nerif iso kʼJõ re tamo tru roon ro hame wajin. Soh thau tsya anu to, kbe Jõ simaut mase.’”
Mazmur 16:8-11
Tna Petrus ybo ykyas renti yawe, “Raa wamu: Jõ thar tawe far-far ro riwai mkyas
Daud fee. Anu hohos ranu Daud tiwya yhai oh. Tna raa moo hai rait sama mam isra mato. Tna anu bhar isra reto mhau tno fares.
Daud tait
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit. Tna Allah ykyas bo kʼait yawe,
‘Meen Jõ tsok Raa sait ybam ku renti wonyõ. Tna Raa retait kbe Jõ tse hre shauk hroh anyõ mkah bo yamo
Mazmur 132:11; 2 Samuel 7:12-13
Daud yhar bo ro meen Allah yno. Feto oh mi ykyas yawe,
meen yhai tna yrok yasen. Kbe Allah sikba
yakus mam sawro ro hai fee. Tna hai rAit mhau makus mnis bo fee ye.’
Mazmur 16:10
Yesus oh mi Allah yno re yrok yasen to. Tna amu, raabis wait beta, tii nmat Ait mkah nsu wamu.

Allah tubat Yesus yse hre mam hroh ro mbe. Tna Ait yoo Har rAit yse kʼYesus mnan fi tiwya Ait yawe yno. Har rAit reto oh mi Yesus yoo yse kʼamu ye. Tibyo amu nkyas Ait yasom mkah mai aro rau-rau. Bo reto anu nmat tna nri kri-kri fo.
Daud ykom bo ro Allah yawe kʼYesus:
Allah yawe

ajõ yawe: “Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam ati ro tatem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Tna raa ro byoh, raa ro srau kair kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ ana, nbo ana.”’
Mazmur 110:1
Anu bhar bwe Daud yesait yamoʼt sawro tna hre ysya Allah feto fee.
Daud ykom bo ro Allah yawe kʼYesus:
Allah yawe

ajõ yawe: “Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam ati ro tatem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Tna raa ro byoh, raa ro srau kair kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ ana, nbo ana.”’
Mazmur 110:1
Anu bhar bwe Daud yesait yamoʼt sawro tna hre ysya Allah feto fee.
Feto to tkyas kʼanu raa ro Israel beta, tawe: Nhar nwe Yesus ro anu nme yajat tait, Allah tubat Ait yse abyõ, yawe Yesus fi
Yawe Yesus fi
ye.”
Ana mari feto tna bokyas reto mroh mame kʼana mhaf. Tibyo ana mtu kʼPetrus ysya raabis
makin taro fo mawe, “Amu kbe nno bawya?”
Tna Petrus yawe kʼana yawe, “Nashana oh! Tna nbis raa
anu mkah Yesus yasom. Afo re Ait yyon iro wanu ye. Tna kbe Ait yoo Har ro Allah yse matam anu.
Allah ranu kbe yoo Har ro rAit yse matam awya sai ro Ait ytu yama yo kʼAit: Yse kʼanu raa ro
Yahudi bsya kukek wanu ye, tna msya raa roto ro wase Allah ye.”

Tna Petrus ykyas bo taro mawat ye: Ait yawe wa kʼana yawe, “Raa ro mfo wefo mhau mam tabam refo to, ja mno bo ro mkair-kar. Kbe meen Allah ymit safo kʼana. Snok nbam kʼana weto tna nmo no kʼAit re kbe nkai riof!”
Raa ro mari bo ro Petrus ykyas tna mawe ana smot Yesus ye to, raa mabo 3000 bo feto. Ana mawe raa
ana.
Ana mari bo ro raabis mkyas to, mbo mno. Tna ana miranya kaket, tna makyõ Korat ro Mait
Su afo re ana mnaut Yesus ro yhai to. Tna ana skabuk su ye. Bo weto beta to, ana mno yoyo.
Raabis ro Yesus mno bo ro msai. Ana mno bo ro msai tna re raa mmat tna mhar Allah yatak rAit. Tna raa beta mrok ktak tna waa Allah.
Raa ro smot Yesus weto to, beta msuk siret su. Tna bo bawya sai ro ana mse to, bo wana su.
Ana moo bo wana masim tna moo mabyoh rau to saim kʼraa kinyah wana ro mse bo mabut.
Tna rabu ti wawa ana mhaf sau siret su mam Samu ro Allah. Ana siret makyõ Korat ro Mait
Su, tna mait boit su mam amah aro mamo-mamo ye. Ana simaut mase mno bo weto. Ana aro srau ewok fee.
Ana mbaut Allah yoyo. Tna raa beta ksoh ana ye. Rabu ti wawa to Allah yoo riof yee kʼraa taro u. Tibyo raa mkbair ro smot Yesus to mrok mase renti.
Ti sau fo, Petrus ysya Yohanes mbewok mamo skabuk mam Samu ro Allah. Ana mamo mam wore ayõ hawer bo feto. Ja raa ro Yahudi skabuk mam ayõ reto.

Ana mbewok mamo to, raa masom bi ro yaa mhai sait kri-kri mama ye. Ait retait yaa mhai. Yaban ykek to feto bait oh. Ti ro raa mabe ynan feto oh. Tna rabu ti wawa ja raa makah bi ait mama mse mam bohra makit Samu ro Allah reto. Ana mse ait hre mam masa ro masom 'Masa ro Moof'. Ja ait hre mam yuk reto yayoh pitis kʼraa ro mama twok mam Samu ro Allah.
Ait hre tna ymat Petrus ysya Yohanes mama twok mam bohra Samu ro Allah. Tna yayoh bo kʼana mbewok yawe, “Natmof jõ, noo pitis nee mbau a!”
Ana mbewok masu sayõ ait tna Petrus yawe kʼait yawe, “Nasu nmat amu wia!”
Tibyo ait yasu ymat ana tna ait ynaut yawe kbe ana moo pitis aro mee kʼait.
Menohe Petrus yawe kʼait yawe, “Jõ tse pitis aro fee saut. Menohe bo ro jõ tatak tno fo, tno kʼnyo: Mkah Yesus
ro Nasaret yatak rAit to, jõ tbis nyõ nasen namo oh!”
Tna Petrus ybo ait refi yatem ati ybo tubat yasen yros. Petrus yno feto si to, ait refi yaa masu mrok matak tna yaa beta mrok matak ye.
Ait yasen srot tna kro ana twok mamoʼt bohra Samu ro Allah. Ait simaut mase yamo tna tbat- tbat ybaut Allah.
Raa beta mmat he raa retait yamo tna ybaut Allah feto.
Ana mhar mawe ait retait ro ja soo hre yayoh pitis mam 'Masa ro Moof'. Tna mrok ktak sai mawe, “Ait ro yaa mhai retait; yaa moof yasen yamo a?”
Ana mros mam Samu ro Allah amah hawar mase ro mne sau. Hawar reto masom

ro Salomo. Ait ro riwai Petrus yisoh retait simaut tibyo yatem ybo Petrus ysya Yohanes matak fares fo. Tna raa beta mhoh beak-ak anya mama mo kʼana tna raa mmat bi ait bo yaa haberek moof to, ana ktak sai.

Tna Petrus ymat raa msis-sas refo tibyo yasen yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa ro Israel, anu nmat bo ro msai refo tna nrok ktak nno fyi? Anu nmat sas amu to, nrok nwe amu nkah ntak ramu oh mi nisoh ait refi re yoof yasen yamo to ma. Bo moof ro amu nno to, mno re amu ntak nisoh ait refi fo fee ye.

Allah ro anu hohos na wanu Abraham, Ishak, ysya Yakub, ja smot to, Ait oh mi yno Yesus Sryan rAit yrok yase toni to. Yesus Ait oh mi tiwya anu nsan kʼPilatus. Tna Pilatus yawe bitsre Ait he mfe, anu nwe, ‘Bitsre Ait ma!’
Yesus, Ait yama yno bo ro Allah ybis sai, Ait yato mboh sai, menohe anu hawe Ait. Tna anu nyoh kʼPilatus nwe bitsre Barabas ro ja yame ajat riryõn kʼanu.
Tna Yesus oh mi sair iso ro raa mhau mae tinyi tait. Anu nme Ait yajat oh. Ait yajat menohe Allah yno Ait yrok yasen yaam u. Tna amu oh mi nsu nmat bo weto beta to.

Anu beta nhar ait ro yaa mhai. Yesus yatak rAit oh mi mno ait refi yaa rait matak to. Amu smot Yesus. Amu nhar nwe Ait yasom rAit to matak toni. Tna bosmot reto oh mi misoh ait yaa moof matak. Anu nsu wanu beta nmat fo.
Raa wamu; tiwya anu nsya raa mabi wanu wase nwe Yesus tait
fee. Tna anu nme Ait yajat. Anu wase oh mi anu nno bo ro mkair reto.
Tna Allah sayõ anu nno feto rof. Yawe bo reto mabo mamo mnan si bokyas ro tiwya Ait ybis
wAit mama mkyas wia. Tiwya ana mawe,
tait meen ykai bo ro samyoh mai kʼAit wia tu.’
Mazmur 2:1-2, 22:1; Yesaya 53:7-8
Bo reto mabo rau oh mefo.
Nri beta! Tna nashana oh! Tna haberek ne nma no kʼAllah, afo re kbe Ait yyon iro wanu.
Tna Ait yno re anu nhaf simaut. Meen
Allah ybis Yesus hah yama u. Tiwya Ait ysok Yesus
yamo
ranu.
Mfo refo Yesus yhau mam sawro ro Allah wea. Ait yhau mam beto mamo snok oon ro tiwya Allah yawe. Tna ati reto to, meen Ait yisoh bombra beta mam arin aso mrok moof wea. Tiwya Allah ybis
na wAit mamo mkyas bo rAit. Ait ybis ana mkyas bo reto matim wia oh.
Tiwya Allah ybis
Musa yama ykyas yawe,
Allah meen teta
sait ybam raa wamu wefo yfi jõ. Tna bo ro
retait yawe kʼanu beta to, nri kaket!
Tna raa ro hawe bokyas rAit to, kbe Allah tufrok ana mbam kʼraa wAit mamo mhau mne.’
beta sor tiwya mkyas oon ro meen mama reto ye.
Samuel ye, tna ysya
taro sor ro mrof ait to ye. Ana mkyas bo ro meen mabo mam wore weto to, mkyas matim wia.
Tna anu oh mi ku renti ro
na weto to. Bo ro Allah ysi kʼana yawe meen yno to, ykyas kʼanu ye. Nnaut bo ro tiwya Allah ysi kʼAbraham yawe fefo:
‘Ku renti wonyõ meen sait oh mi yno re Allah yno bo ro moof kʼraa ro tabam refo beta.’
Kejadian 22:18

Tna au oh mi Allah ybis Yesus, Sryan rAit, yama yo kʼanu raa ro Yahudi wia, afo re Ait yno bo ro moof kʼanu. Bo moof ro Ait yno to oh mefo: Ait yno re anu sait-sait haberek kro Ait tna ne nmo iso ro mkair u fee.”
Petrus ysya Yohanes mbewok mkyas bo kri-kri msya raa msis-sas weto fares. Tna raa mabi ro
Yahudi baro mama mo kʼana mbewok. Ana ro mama to,
ro Yahudi baro ye, raa ro Saduki baro msya aban mana raa sbe ro ja kmot Samu ro Allah ye.
Ana mbewok mkyas bo kʼraa weto mawe, “Yesus yrok yasen oh. Feto to, kbe raa ro mhai meen mrok masen maam u ye.” Raa mabi ro Yahudi weto mari bo ro ana mkyas reto. Tibyo mrok kmo ana mbewok.
Tibyo ana mfot ana mbewok tna makah mamo mbu mam
mato. Menohe arin fo mti oh. Tibyo ana mbewok mhau mam
mato reto snok mam ayõ ro menrabu.
Raa makin ro riwai mari bo ro ana mbewok mkyas weto to, mawat mama smot Yesus. Ana weto msya raa ro smot Ait wia to, raa sme beta mabo trion 5000 bo feto. (Fnya msya kukek wana raa ntuu fee.)
Rabu fo, raa manes ro
Yahudi mama siret su mam Yerusalem: Raa mabi, msya
ye hre siret beta.
Bi Hanas ro yamo
yase, bi Kayafas, bi Yohanes ysya bi Aleksander tna msya raa ro mbam raa mana ro ja mamo
mase wana to, ana beta mama siret ye.

Tna raa makah Petrus ysya Yohanes mamo mse mros susai mam wore ana siret fo, tna ana mtu bo kʼana mbewok mawe, “Iis anu mbewok nisoh raa retait mkah awya yasom? Iis anu nisoh ait mkah awya yatak rait?”
Tna Har ro
matam Petrus matak, tibyo ait yawe kʼraa weto yawe, “Anu raa manes ro Yahudi nsya raa mabi sor:
Mfo anu ntu srah refo kʼamu nri. Safo ro anu ntu oh mi amu mbewok nno bo moof kʼait ro kiyam sait to a? Tna anu ntu kʼamu nwe fyi oh mi amu nisoh raa retait re yoof to.
Amu nkyas kʼanu beta nsya raa ro Israel beta ye afo re anu nhar bo refo kaket: Taa ait retait yaa mhai menohe mkah Yesus
ro ybam Nasaret yatak rait oh mi amu nisoh raa retait. Yesus tait anu nme yajat tna Allah yno Ait yrok yasen. Ait retait oh mi yno re raa retait yrok yoof tna yros re anu nsu nmat beta to.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas Yesus mawe,
‘Raa sgi samu sau mkah fraa. Ana moo fraa sau sanet. He mfe, ana hawe fraa reto tibyo mawah beak makus to. Menohe fraa reto mrok mamo fraa ro moof.’
Mazmur 118:22
Yesus tait yfi fraa reto. Tna anu fo nikyak Ait wia tinyi nfi raa ro sgi samu reto.
Ait yesait aran yatak yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa. Raa roto fee. Mam tabam refo fo, Allah yno Yesus yesait aran yatak yoo riof yee kʼraa.”
Tna raa ro siret weto mhar mawe ana mbewok to, raa ro tiwya mkom bo mam
to fee. Tibyo ana mrok ktak sai mmat bo Petrus ysya Yohanes matak mros mkyas to. Ana mhar mawe ana mbewok to tiwya msya Yesus ye.
Tna ana mmat bi ait ro iis Allah yisoh ye. Mmat ait retait yros yatak mam beto ysya ana ye. Tibyo ana mastako ana mbewok fee. Ana shait sai.
Feto to ana mbis ana mbewok frok mbam siret reto wia, tna ana saim bo kʼanya mawe,
“Raa ro Yerusalem beta mhar mawe ana mno bo ro msai. Kbe anu btak bwaar bo reto fee ye. Feto to kbe anu bno bawya kʼana mbewok refo u?
Anu hawe raa mabah msas bo refo be kbe raa beta mari. Feto to nma, anu bwe wa kʼana mbewok. Bwe ana mkyas bo mam Yesus yasom u ma.”
Tna fo raa manes weto mtu Petrus ysya Yohanes me mama twok u. Tna ana mawe wa kʼana mbewok mawe, “Ne nkyas Yesus yasom u kʼraa ma ee!”
Menohe Petrus ysya Yohanes mbewok mawe si kʼana mawe, “Anu nesait nnaut nwe fyi? Ja Allah ksoh yawe amu mbewok nri bo ro awya yawe? Anu beta fe bo ro Allah yawe a?
Nko hawe sai amu bewok nkyas Yesus yasom renti. Bo ro amu nsu nmat msya bo ro amu nri oh to, kbe amu nbo nkyas yum!”
Ana ro mtu srah weto mkai safo makan aro fee. Tna ana mhar mawe ait ro Yesus yisoh retait,
bo feto. Raa makin mmat bo msai reto tna bibi Allah. Feto to raa manes weto waa mawe raa makin kbe kmo ana ye. Tibyo ana mawe wa kʼPetrus ysya Yohanes matak u ye. Tna fo bitsre ana mbewok mamo.
Ana ro mtu srah weto mkai safo makan aro fee. Tna ana mhar mawe ait ro Yesus yisoh retait,
bo feto. Raa makin mmat bo msai reto tna bibi Allah. Feto to raa manes weto waa mawe raa makin kbe kmo ana ye. Tibyo ana mawe wa kʼPetrus ysya Yohanes matak u ye. Tna fo bitsre ana mbewok mamo.
Raa manes ro Yahudi bitsre Petrus ysya Yohanes. Tna ana mamo mo kʼmafoh na wana ro smot Yesus. Tna bo ro riwai
manes msya raa mabi ro Yahudi mkyas kʼana to, ana mbewok mkyas beta.
Ana mafoh na wefo mari feto, tibyo ana skabuk mawe kʼAllah mawe,
Nyõ oh mi nfen ayoh, tabam, aya sawan msya bombra beta ye.
Amu nnaut bi Daud, hohos ramu. Ait yamo sryan aNyõ. Tna ait ykyas yawe,
‘Raa mana makin mrok minin mno fyi? Tna ana hre saim bo mati sai mno fyi!
makin ro tabam refo siwyan mame anya oh. Tna raa manes sor berur mhau mam wo sau mno bo ro mkair mai
Allah ysya
rAit ye.’
Mazmur 2:1-2
Bo ro tiwya Daud ykyas reto to, bokyas aNyõ. Bokyas ro Nyõ nkyas kʼait nkah Har aNyõ.
Amu nnaut bi Daud, hohos ramu. Ait yamo sryan aNyõ. Tna ait ykyas yawe,
‘Raa mana makin mrok minin mno fyi? Tna ana hre saim bo mati sai mno fyi!
makin ro tabam refo siwyan mame anya oh. Tna raa manes sor berur mhau mam wo sau mno bo ro mkair mai
Allah ysya
rAit ye.’
Mazmur 2:1-2
Bo ro tiwya Daud ykyas reto to, bokyas aNyõ. Bokyas ro Nyõ nkyas kʼait nkah Har aNyõ.
: bo ro tiwya Nyõ nbis Daud ykom reto to, mabo oh. Bo reto oh mi
Herodes ysya
Pontius Pilatus siret su msya raa mana ro Israel ye tna msya raa mana roto makin ye to. Ana siret su mam
refo saim bo mawe mame Yesus yajat. Yesus tait sryan aNyõ ro Nyõ nesait nbis yama. Ait tait, Nyõ nbis yamo
Amu nhar nwe bo ro ana mno reto to, Nyõ nesait saim mamyot Nyõ natak anyõ msya ksoh aNyõ matim wia oh. Tna ana mame Yesus yajat.
: Mfo wefo raa mabi ro Yahudi mawe kbe ana mno bo mkair-kar mai kʼamu ye. Feto to amu nma no kʼNyõ soh-soh nwe noo natak aNyõ nee kʼamu afo re amu nros ntak bito nkyas bokyas aNyõ.

Tna nisoh raa ro kiyam mrok moof. Nno bo ro msai, sair bo ro hnah re kbe raa makin mmat tna mhar natak aNyõ. Tna mhar mawe Yesus, sryan aNyõ ro Nyõ nesait nbis yama tait, yoo yatak rAit yee kʼamu afo re amu nno bo ro msai weto.”
Ana skabuk mkak si to, amah ro ana skabuk reto mrok mnah-nah. Tna Har ro
mbo ana matak beta, tibyo ana matak mkyas Watum ro Allah. Waa fee.

Mam wore weto to, raa makin ro smot Yesus weto to, ana mhaf sau. Tna bombra ro ana aro mse to, ana mawe bo rana mesait kar fee. Ana mawe bo wana beta. Tibyo raa aro mse bo mabut fee. Ana ro mse bo mnan to, mabe bo wana weto fee. Moo mee sai.
Tna Allah yoo yatak ro mase yee kʼraabis
wAit. Tibyo ana ja mkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa, mawe Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen yaam u. Tna Allah yoo bouum mawat yee re ana beta mhau matak mno bo wAit ye.

Ana aro mbo amah, tna aro mbo tabam. Ti aro-aro soh ana mmat raa Kristen taro mhau matem marak to, ana masen masim bo wana. Masim bo tna moo mabyoh rau to, mbo mama mee kʼraabis ro Yesus. Tna raabis weto saim kʼana ro ja mhau matem marak. Feto kbe bo wana mabut fee. Ana aro bo mhau matem marak u fee.

Ana aro mbo amah, tna aro mbo tabam. Ti aro-aro soh ana mmat raa Kristen taro mhau matem marak to, ana masen masim bo wana. Masim bo tna moo mabyoh rau to, mbo mama mee kʼraabis ro Yesus. Tna raabis weto saim kʼana ro ja mhau matem marak. Feto kbe bo wana mabut fee. Ana aro bo mhau matem marak u fee.
Ana sait yasom Yusuf. Ait ja raabis mtu yasom Barnabas ye. (Mam mai ramu to, mawe ‘raa ro ja ykyas bo moof re kbe raa sorni sraujin rana’). Ait to raa mana ro Lewi ybam sato ro Siprus.
Ait yasim armato rait tna yoo mabyoh rau to, yama ysan kʼraabis weto mbo tna saim kʼraa kinyah wana ye.
Ait sait yasom Ananias tna yfain masom Safira. Ana mbewok masim tabam wana baro ye.
Menohe ait yabe mabyoh rau baro yse kʼana mesait wai. Tna yoo baro ysan kʼraabis yawe, “Mabyoh rau beta oh mefo.” Bo ro Ait yno reto to, yfain mhar ye oh.
Menohe Petrus yawe kʼait yawe, “Kabes yabi (Iblis) mbo nyõ nhaf anyõ meto! Thar tawe nyõ nabe pitis reto jaro nse kʼnyõ. Nyõ nno safo meto! Sioh Har ro
to ma!

Ati ro nyõ nasim tabam reto fefares to, tabam reto tabam anyõ. Tna ati ro nyõ nasim to, pitis reto mhau kʼnyõ beta ye. Soh riwai nyõ ksoh nabe pitis beta mhau to, reto safo aro fee. Menohe nyõ sioh Allah oh meto! Nyõ sioh raa meto fee!”
Ananias yari feto tibyo yatu btek yai mam tabam yajat. Tna raa ro mari bo reto beta to, mrok waa toni.
Tibyo ku sme ro mere baro mama sro ajat refo, tna ana teta masom mamo sama.
Ayõ tuuf bo feto firwas, tna Ananias yfain mama twok. Au wase bo ro mai kʼau maa Ananias to, fefares ye.
Tna Petrus ytu kʼau yawe, “Sik ma nawe abyõ kʼjõ: Tabam ro anu nsim reto to, mabyoh rau beta oh mefo a?” Tna au mawe, “Ae, pitis beta oh meto.”
Menohe Petrus yawe, “Anu mbewok saim kʼanya nwe sanet Har ro
meto a? Nmat mere ro mama fo. Riwai ana sama hai ro naa. Ana kbe teta hai anyõ makah mamo sama naut.”
Tibyo fai au matu mai mam tabam majat ye, kene kait mam wore Petrus yros to. Tna mere weto twok mmat he fai au majat. Tna ana teta ajat reto masom frok mamo sama ye mam ati ro kene maa yajoh jaro.
Tibyo raa mana ro smot Yesus msya raa roto ro mari bo reto to, mrok waa beta ye.
Tna raabis ro Yesus mno bo msai, tna sair bo hnah mawat ye afo re raa makin mmat tna mhar Allah yatak rAit. Tna raa ro smot Yesus to, mhaf sau. Ana beta ja mama siret su mam
ro Salomo'.
Raa roto taro waa mama berur su msya raa ro smot Yesus weto. Menohe raa ksoh ana ro smot Yesus weto tna mawe ana ja mno bo moof toni.
Tna rabu ti wawa raa msis-sas mama smot
Yesus tna mama kro ana miranya su ye. Ana ro mama weto to, raa sme taro tna msya fnya taro ye.

Raa mmat raabis mno bo msai. Tibyo makah raa ro kiyam sor frok mama mse mam iso mabi. Ana taro raa mse mjin abyõ mam ambar tna taro mse mjin mam aam wana ye. Ana mno feto afo re soh Petrus yama frit iti to, yawyan mai ana tna kbe mno ana mrok moof ye.
Tna raa mbam remo ro mhau kene mam
ro Yerusalem sor to, mama ye. Ana makah raa ro kiyam msya raa ro kabes mbo ye mama. Tna Allah yisoh ana mrok moof beta.
Menohe
Yahudi ro yase ysya raa wait ro Saduki mmat bo ro kuber ro Yesus wAit mno. Tna ana mrok mhaf kair toni.
Tna ana mbis raa mamo mfot raabis ro Yesus mbu mam
Menohe mti rau to
sau mama mitrah masa ro
reto sor tna tusnok ana frok. Tna
reto mawe kʼana mawe,
“Nmo nros mam Samu ro Allah tna nkyas bokyas ro mroon refo beta.”
Ana mari feto, tibyo rabu momo fo, ana mamo twok mam Samu ro Allah. Tna masen mkyas watum ro Yesus reto. Mam ati reto ye

ro yase ysya raa wait hre mkyas bo ro iis. Tna ana mtu raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi sor to, mawe mama siret su. Raa manes ro Israel beta hre su. Tna fo ana mbis raa mamo tufrok raabis ro Yesus mbam
makah mama.
Tna raa weto mamoʼt
Mamo tna mmat he raabis weto marak. Tibyo raa weto me hah mamo mkyas kʼraa ro siret wea weto mawe,
“Amu nmoʼt
tna nmat mato matak wa fares tna raa ro kmot
mros kmot sai fares. Menohe amu nitrah masa reto to, amu nkai raa sait bo yhau mam
mato reto fee!”
Aban mana raa sbe ro ja kmot Samu ro Allah tait ysya
manes mari bo ro raa mkyas feto. Mari tna ana mrok miskawowo. Tna mawe kʼanya mawe, “Bo bawya ro mabo mefo? Kbe meen sboh rau to fyi?”
Tna fo raa sait yama yo kʼraa manes ro Yahudi weto tna yawe, “Raa ro iis anu nfot nbu to, ana mros mkyas bo mam Samu ro Allah mno.”

Tibyo ait yabi ro ybo raa sbe ro ja kmot Samu ro Allah ysya aban mana wait mamo mbo raabis ro Yesus weto makah mama. Ana mbo raabis weto to, mno bo ma fee, ana waa bo kbe raa msis-sas refo mrok kmo mawah fraa mai ana majat.
Raa sbe mbo raabis wefo makah mama mse mros mam wore ana ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi to, hre siret wea. Tna
rana ro yase ytu bo kʼraabis ro Yesus yawe,

“Tiwya amu nwe wa anu nwe anu nkyas Yesus yatak rait u ma. Menohe anu nri fee sai, tibyo beroh nmo nkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro Yerusalem beta mari oh! Tna anu nkyas kʼraa nwe amu oh mi nsom mees ro Yesus rAit to.”
Menohe Petrus ysya raabis makin taro fo mawe, “Amu nri bo ro Allah yawe tu oh. Soh raa mawe bo roto hayah to, amu nri ana to fee.
Anu nme Yesus mam ara warok yajat. Tna Allah ro anu hohos na smot tait, yno ait yrok yasen.
Ait oh mi Allah yse hre mam hroh ro mbe re yamo aban mana ro yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa to. Yno feto afo re raa ro Israel mashana tna Ait yyon iro wana.
Amu nsya Har ro
ye oh mi nsu nmat bo weto beta. Allah ysan Har rAit kʼraa ro mari bo ro Ait yawe.”
Bo ro raabis weto mkyas to, mame kʼana mhaf tibyo ana kmo tna mnaut mawe mfot raabis wefo mame majat to.
Menohe raa ro
sait yasom Gamaliel yasen yros. Bi ait tait
ro Yahudi. Tna ja raa makin mari bo ro ait yawe. Ait yasen yros tna ybis raa tufrok raabis weto mamoʼt mne rere wia.
Ana frok mamo wia tna fo ait yawe, “Raa wojõ: Nnaut kaket bo ro kbe anu nno kʼraa weu.

Raa wefo mno bo mnan si mfi bo ro bi ait sait yasom Teudas tiwya yno. Teudas tait frok yama tna yawe ait raa ro yase. Tna raa mabo trion 400 mari kro ait ye. Menohe ait raa mfot mame tna fo raa ro ja kro ait weto mso-sa ha-hayah ye. Tis rau to, bo ro ait ykyas to, mabo fee.
Teudas mkak tna fo mam ati ro
Kaisar yawe ntuu raa makin wait to, raa sait naut yasom Yudas frok ye. Ait retait ybam
ro Galilea. Ait hawe bo
Kaisar ybo rabin refo tna raa msis-sas mari kro ait ye. Menohe ait raa mame, tibyo raa ro kro ait weto mso-sa ha-hayah ye.
Feto to jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, nme raa ro kro Yesus wefo majat ma. Anu kbe bhau bmat rof bo ro ana mno sai. Soh bo reto mbam kʼraa to, kbe mso-sa sai akus.
Soh bo reto mbam kʼAllah to, kbe anu btai bno wa bo ro ana mno bo fee saut, tna kbe anu bfa bsya Allah yesait sai oh meto.”

Raa weto srau sau mari bokyas reto. Tna ana mtu raabis weto twok. Tna ana mbis raa moo too mok-mak ana. Tna mawe wa kʼana mawe, “Nkyas Yesus yasom u to ma ee!” Tna raa manes ro Yahudi weto mitsre raabis ro Yesus frok mamo.

Raabis weto sikba amah reto frok mamo mkah simaut ro mase. Ana mhar mawe bosmot wana kbe mno re ana mkai bo ro samyoh. Mawe, “Allah ymat amu yawe nhaf moof mnan si. Tibyo amu nkai bo reto.” Mnaut feto tna ana simaut mase.
Tna fo rabu ti wawa ana mamo mkyas Yesus yasom renti. Mawe, “Ait tait
Ana mkyas Bokyas Moof
refo yoyo mam Samu ro Allah tna mam amah aro maut mroh ye.

Ti weto to raa taro mawat naut mama smot Yesus. Ana weto mbam raa mana ro Yahudi beta. Ana taro ja mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yunani, tna taro to, ja mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yahudi ye. Tna mkbair ro ja mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yunani weto mno mmai msya ana ro mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yahudi. Ana mawe, “Raa ro ja saim boit mee kʼraa soo to, ana saim mee kʼsemit wanu kaket fee.”
Raabis mabo 12 reto mari bo raa weto mawe. Tibyo ana mtu raa
beta mama hre su mkyas bo reto. Ana mawe, “Raa wamu, soh amu nesait sui saim boit nee kʼraa to, amu nrero re kbe nkyas Watum ro Allah kaket fee. Feto to mkair.
Nma, anu bsok raa wamu mabo krema tna bbis ana saim boit mee kʼsemit wanu. Kbe anu saso raa ro ja raa hartu, raa ro ja Har ro
mbo matak, tna ro mhar bo kaket ye. Anu bsok raa ro mfi feto.
Anu bno feto afo re amu nrero mkah bo skabuk kʼAllah tna nkyas watum rAit kaket.”
Tna bo ro ana mawe reto to, raa beta ksoh. Tibyo ana msok Stefanus. Ait bosmot rait matak toni, tna Har ro
mbo ait matak ye. Tna msok Filipus, Prokhorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, msya Nikolaus ye. Nikolaus tait raa ro Antiokhia, ybam raa mana ro Yahudi fee. Menohe tiwya ait yrok kro
Yahudi.
Raa baro makah raa mabo krema refo makah mama mee kʼraabis
weto. Ana moo matem mtor kʼana abyõ skabuk ana, re kbe ana moo boit saim kʼraa kaket.
Tna Watum ro Allah to, syohor yoyo mamo. Tibyo rabu ti wawa raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem taro u mawat mama smot Yesus. Tna
Yahudi mawat mama msan ana mhaf smot Yesus ye.
Stefanus tait, bouum
ro mbam kʼAllah mhau kʼait. Bi Ait ysan yatak rAit yee kʼStefanus ye. Tibyo Stefanus yno bo ro msai. Tna ysair bo ro hnah mawat ye afo re raa mmat tna mhar Allah yatak rAit.

Stefanus ykyas Yesus yasom. Tna raa baro ro smot Yesus fee, masen besboh bo ro Stefanus yawe. (Ana to mbam samu skabuk ro Yahudi sau. Ana tiwya mamo sryan raa, tna bobot wana mitsre ana. Ana weto taro to, mbam
ro Kirene msya raa ro mbam
ro Aleksandria, tna taro to raa ro mbam
ro Kilikia msya raa ro mbam rabin ro Asia taro ye.)
Ana weto santri bo ro Stefanus yawe. Menohe Stefanus ykyas mkah Har ro Allah matak rAu. Ait ykyas bo kaket. Tibyo ana weto mros matak santri bo msya Stefanus fee ye.
Ana mhaf kair Stefanus. Tibyo ana masen mamo wai tna msu bo kʼraa roto baro mbis ana mamo mkyas-kas Stefanus. Tna raa weto sioh mawe kʼraa makin mawe, “Amu nri Stefanus yamus Musa ysya Allah.”
Mkah iso reto ana misti re raa makin, raa mabi ro Yahudi msya
Yahudi mrok kmo Stefanus. Tibyo ana mfot Stefanus makah mamo mee kʼraa manes ro mtu srah raa ro Yahudi.
Menohe raa ro mhaf kair Stefanus mamo wai tna mbis raa masen mkyas bo sioh mawe, “Stefanus yiwana Samu ro Allah refo yoyo tna yiwana Watum ro Musa!
Amu nri ait ykyas Yesus raa ro Nasaret. Yawe Yesus meen yama yihabah Samu ro Allah refo! Tna ait ykyas bo ro anu bno soo. Yawe Yesus ybis raa mno bo roto hayah ye. Ait ykyas Watum ro Musa kaket fee!”
Tna raa beta ro hre mam siret reto mmat Stefanus yasu rait. Mmat he yasu rait to ngkren moof, mfi
masu to.
Tna
Yahudi ro yase ytu kʼStefanus yawe, “Bo ro raa mkyas mai kʼnyõ wefo fo, bokyas ro ati fe mfe a?”

Tna Stefanus yawe, “Tafoh na nsya raa mabi wojõ: Nri, tkyas masmair rau mefo: Tiwya tinyi anu hohos ranu Abraham yamo yhau mam Haran fefares to, Allah ro yase toni tait yerif Ait kʼAbraham mam rabin ro Mesopotamia.
Tna Allah yawe kʼait yawe, ‘Nasen sikba rabin anyõ refo namo. Sikba raa mana wonyõ akus, tna namoʼt rabin sau ro kbe Jõ terif kʼnyõ.’

Abraham yari feto, tibyo ait sikba rabin raa ro Kasdim tna yamo yhau mam remo ro Haran. Yhau tna yaja yhai. Tna fo, Allah ybis ait satoh ybam rabin reto yamoʼt rabin ro mfo anu nhau mam Kanaan refo fo.
Mam wore weto to, Allah ysan bo aro kʼait fee, tabam kebet baro bo fee. Tna Abraham ait yabe ku aro fefares ye, menohe Allah ysi bo kʼait yawe,
‘Meen Jõ tno rabin refo beta mhau kʼnyõ nsya ku renti wonyõ nbo ye.
Tna meen ku renti wonyõ kbe mamo raa srim mam rabin raa roto. Tna raa ro rabin reto masen mbis ana mamo sryan wana tna mno bo ro samyoh mai kʼana ye mamo snok mam
trion 400.
Raa ro mbo ku renti wonyõ weto to, kbe meen Jõ tno bo ro samyoh btek mai kʼana. Tna fo ku renti wonyõ frok mbam
reto tna mama skabuk Jõ mam yuk refo.’
Kejadian 15:13-14
Tna Allah ybis Abraham yawe,
‘Nyõ nsya raa sme wonyõ beta kbe nkom tohmi
afo re raa mhar mawe anu fo raa woJõ.’
Abraham yabe Ishak tna ti ro krentuuf to ait ykom
Ishak. Ti baro firwas fo Ishak tait yabi tna ait yabe Yakub. Tna Yakub yabe anu hohos na wanu mabo trion 12 ro masom to.
Tna ait sait ybam kʼana yasom Yusuf. Ait yao na mabo 11 to, mhaf kair ait. Tibyo ana moo ait masim mtai kʼraa ro Ismael. Tna raa weto moo ait makah mamoʼt rabin ro Mesir. Menohe Allah yatam ait.
Bombra ro mkair ro raa mno mai kʼait beta to, Allah yno riof kʼait. Tna Allah yno re
Mesir ksoh ait. Ait ymat he Yusuf yhar bo kaket. Tibyo
retait ysok Yusuf yamo
ybo rabin ro Mesir msya ybo samu ro
wait beta ye.
Tna hai awyah frok mama mai rabin ro Mesir msya rabin ro Kanaan ye. Tibyo raa mkai bo ro samyoh toni. Tna anu hohos na, bo ro ana mait to mrok marak ye.
Menohe ati ro Yakub yari he Mesir to, boit
mhau fares to, ait ybis anu hohos na wanu masen mamoʼt Mesir. Tinyi rau ro ana mamoʼt Mesir oh meto.
Tna ana hah me mamo muhrin ewok to, Yusuf yasbrah ait kʼyao na. Tna ait yakah yao na wait weto yamo yerif
, re kbe ait yhar ana.
Tna Yusuf ybis raa mamo mtar yaja ysya raa wait mamaʼt Mesir. Tibyo raa mabo trion 75 satoh bo wana mamo mhau bana mam beto.
Yakub yasen yamoʼt Mesir yhau ti baro, tna yhai mam beto. Tna anu hohos na ro masom to ana mhai mam Mesir ye.

Tna ati ro hohos wanu frok mbam Mesir to, ana masen moo maja rana ytai mirenti mamo mse mam isra sau ro mhau mam tabam refo. Isra reto tiwya tinyi kukek ro bi Hemor ro mhau mam remo ro Sikhem to, masim kʼAbraham.
Tiwya Allah yawe kʼAbraham yawe, ‘Meen Jõ takah ku renti woNyõ frok sikba Mesir.’ Tiwya ana frok mbam Mesir fefares to, raa mana ranu mabe ku mawat hair. Tibyo ana ro Israel weto mrok msis toni.
Tna fo
roto sait yasen ybo rabin ro Mesir reto riryõn.
retait wase Yusuf ye.
Ait yasen sikowah raa mana ranu ro Israel reto. Yber kait anu hohos na tna ybis ana moo ku mees wana to, beak mne majat makus.
Ti weto oh mi Musa fnya mabe ye to. Musa fnya mabe to, Allah ymat yawe Musa yoof toni tna yme mtos ait snyi tuuf mam amah ro yaja.
Snyi tuuf weto mkak to, yme moo ait mse mam wiak maku sau yakus. Tna ku ro ano ro
sau moo ait mtos mfi ku rau feto.
Tna Musa ykom bo mam Mesir. Yhar bo ro Mesir kaket. Tna ait yros yatak ykyas bo ye tna ait yatak yno bo ye.
Musa tait
bo feto fo, ait yawe yamo ymat raa wait ro Israel.
Ait yamo, tna ati reto, ait ymat raa ro Mesir sait yai raa ro Israel sait. Musa ymat feto tibyo ait yban raa rait ro Israel retait tna yai ait ro Mesir retait yajat.
Musa ynaut yawe, ‘Raa ro Israel ana mmat feto to, kbe mhar mawe Allah ysok jõ mkah tno riof kʼana.’ Menohe ana mhar fee.
Tna fo rabu ti ait frok yamo tna ymat he raa mana wait ro Israel mabo ewok mafa anya. Ait yawe yno re ana miranya. Ait bhah ana yawe, ‘Anu to raa mana sau sai, nfa ma!’
Menohe ait ro yno bo mkair kʼraa roto fi besre kʼMusa yawe, ‘Awya oh mi ysok nyõ yse nbo amu tna ntu srah ro ja amu nno fo?
Nyõ nawe name jõ mfi bo iis nyõ name raa ro Mesir sait yajat a?’
Musa yari feto tibyo waa. Tna yasen ysam yamoʼt rabin ro Midian tna yhau bait beto yfi raa srim sai. Tna ait yabe ku sme mabo ewok mam beto ye.
Musa yhau mam Midian
trion 40. Tna ait yamo kene mam atu ro Sinai. Tabam reto riamo. Yamo nkri-kri to, tna
sau mbrah nenat mam tafoh ro mait mam hyoh mana sau fo.
Musa ymat bo reto tibyo yrok ktak sai. Tna yamo kait ymat kaket. He
yawe kʼait yawe,
‘Jõ fi Allah ro nyõ hohos na ja smot. Tiwya Abraham, Ishak, ysya Yakub ja smot Jõ ye.’ Musa yrok waa tetet tibyo ait yros ymat bo reto u fee.
Tibyo
yawe kʼait yawe, ‘Jõ tama terif Jõ kʼnyõ mam yuk refo fo tibyo yuk refo mbau. Feto to nrus
ro nyõ nse to.
Jõ tmat bo samyoh ro mai kʼraa woJõ mam Mesir oh to. Jõ tari bo ro ana mawia ye. Jõ troh tama fo mkah bo too riof tee kʼana. Feto to mfo refo Jõ tbis nyõ nasen hah namoʼt Mesir.’
Keluaran 3:5-10
Tiwya Raa ro Yahudi mikyak Musa mawe, ‘Awya oh mi ysok nyõ nbo amu tna ntu srah ro amu nno bo to?’ Menohe ait oh mi Allah ysok yamo aban mana ro yoo riof yee kʼana. Allah ybis
rAit mama merif au kʼait mam hyoh mana to.

Musa oh mi yakah raa ro Allah wAit snok ybam Mesir. Ait yno bo ro msai. Ait ysair bo ro hnah afo re raa mmat tibyo mhar Allah yatak rAit ye. Ait yno bo msai weto mam rabin ro Mesir, mam sawan ro masom 'Aya Mkek' tna mam tabam ro riamo wore wo ana mamo mur
trion 40 bo to ye.
Musa ykyas yawe kʼraa ro Israel
yawe,
‘Meen
sait yfi jõ, kbe Allah ysok ybam raa mana wamu tna ybis Ait yama yo kʼanu.’
Ulangan 18:15,18
sau moo bokyas ro mroon to, mee kʼMusa mam atu ro Sinai. Tna Musa ykyas watum reto kʼanu hohos na mam tabam ro riamo tna ait ykom watum reto re kbe anu bmat tna bhar ye.
Menohe anu hohos na hawe mari bo ro ait yawe tna ana mikyak ait sai. Tna ana mnaut mam mhaf mato mawe ana hah me mamo bana Mesir u sai.

⌞Tna ti sau Musa yaut yamoʼt atu ro Sinai yhau baro kait tna hah ye fefares.⌟ Tna raa weto mawe kʼHarun mawe, ‘Musa ro tiwya ybo amu frok nbam Mesir tait, amu wase bo ro btek mai kʼait ye. Feto to nasen nfen
sau mkah bo mira iso kʼanu frok bbam tabam refo bmo. Bo weto kbe raa katar matim tna anu kro mam ttis.’
Tibyo ana mfen
sau mfi
maku sau feto. Tna ana moo kak baro ktan mse mkah bo ro msan re kbe
reto mhaf moof. Ana mmat bo ro ana mesait mfen moof, tibyo ana simaut mase mbaut
reto ye.
Tibyo Allah kmo tna haberek kbor rof re ana skabuk sken, snyi msya ayõ bo ye. Allah yno feto mamyot bokom ro tiwya Ait ybis
na mama mkom wia mawe,
‘Raa ro Israel; tiwya anu nhau mam tabam ro riamo
trion 40. Tna anu ktan kak nsan kʼJõ aro fee.
Menohe anu skabuk smot bo ro anu nesait nfen sai. Tna anu sgi samu sahfra kabes Molokh tna anu bibi smot sken ro masom Refan ye. Feto to, kbe Jõ tawah anu beak, nmoʼt rabin ro Babel tino.’

Tna Allah ybis Musa yfen Sbyah ro moof sau. Tna Allah yerif iso ro Musa yfen ye. Ja raa mmat Sbyah reto tna mhar mawe Allah yhau ysya ana. Tna Sbyah reto, anu hohos na wanu ja mitrah mbo makah mamo mam woyõ-woya sai ana mamo mam tabam ro riamo reto.

Tna anu hohos na wanu msya Yosua mbo Sbyah ro Allah reto makah mamaʼt rabin ro Kanaan refo fo ye. Ana mama twok to, Allah yatim yno raa mana makin ro ja mhau mam oo reto msam mbrir-brar mamo wia. Tna hohos wanu mbo Sbyah reto mamo mhau mam rabin reto riryõn. Tna Sbyah ro Allah reto mhau msya ana weto
firwas
mamo snok mam oon ro
Daud ybo ana.
Tna Allah Ait yhaf ksoh Daud. Tna Daud yayoh kʼAllah yawe, ‘Nbis re jõ sgi amah sau mkah bo Nyõ nhau. Nyõ fi Allah ro tiwya Yakub smot.’
Menohe ku rait Salomo oh mi sgi amah ro mkah bo Allah yhau reto to.
Menohe Allah ro yase toni tait ja yhau mam amah ro raa sgi fee. Tiwya ybis
rAit sait yama ykyas bo reto wia yawe,

‘Jõ tbo raa beta ro mhau mam sawro aJõ msya raa ro mhau mam tabam refo beta ye. Sawro aJõ to mfi wore Jõ hre wefo tna jõ tawah taa skok mam tabam refo. Amah ro ma fyi kbe anu sgi kʼJõ thau to? Anu wefo ntai sgi samu mkah jõ tamo thau baas ye fee saut.
Jõ tatem aJõ oh mi tno bombra wefo beta fo.’”
Yesaya 66:1-2
Tna Stefanus yawe kʼraa ro kmo ait weto yawe, “Anu nsya anu hohos na to, nnan anya sai. Anu nhaf matak tibyo hawe nri bo Har ro
mawe kʼanu. Anu nnan fi raa ro wase Allah tibyo nimara mtuk ja nri Ait fee!
na sor ro tiwya Allah ybis mama to, anu hohos na sikowah ana beta. Tna
weto baro mama mkyas Raa sait ro wase yber safo. Mawe kbe Ait retait yama. Menohe anu hohos na mame
weto majat ye. Tna fo Ait retait yesait yama. Menohe anu besruf Ait, tna nsan Ait kʼraa mame yajat to ye. Ait tait Yesus.
Watum ro
mkyas kʼMusa ykom to, tiwya Musa ysan kʼanu menohe anu nri Watum reto nbo nno fee ye.”
Raa manes ro Yahudi mari feto, tibyo ana mhaf mrok kmo toni.
Menohe Har ro
mbo Stefanus matak. Tna ait heyut abyõ sawro ro Allah. Tna ymat bo yase ro Allah rAit. Tna ymat Yesus yros ysya Allah mam hroh ro mbe ye.
Tibyo Stefanus yawe, “Jõ tmat sawro ro Allah mato nkro, tna tmat 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Ait yros mam ati ro Allah yatem ati ye.”
Ana mari feto, tibyo kmo toni msyah tna burut wa mimara wana afo re mari bo ro ait ykyas fee. Tna ana beta masen mamo mfot Stefanus.
Mfot ait tna makah frok mamoʼt
mne. Raa ro riwai mkyas bo mai kʼStefanus weto to, mrus ratan wana ro ja myum mne fo, mse kʼraa sait ybo kmot wea. Raa retait ait yasom Saulus. Tna ana moo fraa mai ait.
Ana mawah fraa mai Stefanus kri-kri fo, ait yawe,
Yesus: Noo tafos ajõ!”
Tna ait sisya tmi yimna tna skabuk mkah ymai ro mase yawe,
noo iro refo nse kʼana masom to ma.” Ait ykyas bo weto mkak si fo tna yajat.
Tna raa ro mhau mrat msya Allah baro mama sama hai ro Stefanus. Tna ana sraujin ait ye.
Tna maban ti reto to, raa sikowah raa mana ro smot Yesus. Tibyo ana ro smot Yesus beta masen mso-sa mamoʼt remo aro-aro mam
ro Yudea reto. Tna taro mamo mhau mam rabin ro Samaria ye. Raabis
ro Yesus wAit mesait aran mhau akus mam Yerusalem.
Tna Saulus ait srau sau ysya ana ro mame Stefanus ye.
Tna raa ro mhau mrat msya Allah baro mama sama hai ro Stefanus. Tna ana sraujin ait ye.
Tna maban ti reto to, raa sikowah raa mana ro smot Yesus. Tibyo ana ro smot Yesus beta masen mso-sa mamoʼt remo aro-aro mam
ro Yudea reto. Tna taro mamo mhau mam rabin ro Samaria ye. Raabis
ro Yesus wAit mesait aran mhau akus mam Yerusalem.
Tna Saulus ait srau sau ysya ana ro mame Stefanus ye.

Tna ait tomer yno bo mkair mai kʼraa ro smot Yesus. Saulus twok mam amah aro frok-frok tna soh ykai raa ro smot Yesus aro to, ait ybis raa mfot ana weto. Ait yfot raa sme msya ro ano ye, makah mamo mbu mam
Raa ro smot Yesus frok mso-sa mamo mhau mam remo aro-aro. Mhau to, ana mkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
mam woyõ-woya sai.
Ana sait ro yasom Filipus yasen yamoʼt
sau mam rabin ro Samaria. Ait ykyas kʼraa ro mhau mam
reto yawe, “Yesus tait oh mi
Filipus ykyas Yesus yasom tna ysair bo ro hnah re kbe raa mmat tna mhar Allah yatak rAit. Raa msis-sas mari ait tna mmat bosair ro ait yno. Tibyo ana beta mari bo ro ait ykyas to, kaket ye.

Ait yikyak kabes frok mbam kʼraa mawat. Tna kabes weto frok mamo to, wohrarar mkah mai ro mase. Tna raa ro maa msya matem mhai to mawat. Filipus yisoh ana re maa, matem me moof. Tna raa ro maa maka to, ait yisoh tibyo ana mrok masen mamo ye.
Raa ro
reto mmat feto, tibyo mrok simaut mase toni.
Tna raa sait yasom Simon ja yno bo ro hnah mam
reto soo oh. Tna raa ro Samaria mmat bo ro ait yno to mrok ktak sai. Tna bi ait ynaut ait yesait yawe ait tait raa ro ati toni.

Raa kinyah msya raa ro bobot beta ja mari ait kaket tna mnaut mawe Allah yoo yatak rAit yee kʼbi ait refi. Mnaut mawe au oh mi ait yno bo ro hnah. Ja raa mtu Simon retait mawe, 'Bi Ait ro Yatak Toni'.
Raa makin weto mmat ait yno bo ro hnah feto ti ooh-oh. Tibyo ana kro ait.
Menohe Filipus yama ykyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
Ykyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Raa mari mfot bo ro Filipus yawe feto tna smot Yesus. Smot Yesus tna raa
ana ro sme msya ro ano ye.
Tna Simon, ro ja yno bo hnah retait, yama smot Yesus ye. Tibyo raa
ait ye. Tna ait yhau kro Filipus yoyo. Tna Simon ymat bo Filipus yno bo ro msai mawat. Filipus ysair bo ro hnah re kbe raa mmat tibyo mhar Allah yatak rAit. Simon ymat bo weto beta tna yrok ktak sai.
Raabis ro mhau mam Yerusalem mari bo raa ro Samaria smot bokyas ro Allah feto, tibyo ana mbis Petrus ysya Yohanes mbewok masen mamoʼt rabin reto.
Tiwya raa makin weto raa
ana mkah Yesus yasom sai. Menohe Har ro Allah reto mroh matam ana fefares. Tna Petrus ysya Yohanes snok mam rabin reto to, ana mbewok skabuk re kbe Allah yoo Har rAit yee kʼana makin weto.
Tiwya raa makin weto raa
ana mkah Yesus yasom sai. Menohe Har ro Allah reto mroh matam ana fefares. Tna Petrus ysya Yohanes snok mam rabin reto to, ana mbewok skabuk re kbe Allah yoo Har rAit yee kʼana makin weto.
Ana mawah matem mse kʼraa weto, tibyo Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼana.
Simon ymat he raabis weto moo matem mtor abyõ kʼraa feto, tibyo Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼraa weto. Simon ymat feto, tna ait yhaf myoh yawe yoo pitis yee kʼana mbewok.
Ait yayoh yawe, “Nasim tak reto kʼjõ ye, afo re awya sai ro jõ tawah tatem tse abyõ to, kbe Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼana ye.”
Menohe Petrus yastako Simon yawe, “Nyõ nnaut nawe Allah yatak to, ja raa moo mkah pitis a? Kbe nyõ nbo pitis wonyõ namoʼt rabin kair ro tafoh mait yoyo rno!
Nyõ srau ewok kʼAit oh meto ma! Kbe tak refo mhau msya nyõ ye fee saut.
Nashana oh! Nnaut nawe noo tak ro Allah rAit mkah pitis ma! Nyõ nno iro meto! Soh-soh
yyon iro ro nyõ nno reto.
Thar tawe nyõ nhaf mkair toni. Kabes yabi ybo nyõ tna re ja nno iro mawat.”
Menohe Simon yawe kʼana mbewok yawe, “Anu nesait soh-soh
afo re kbe bo ro anu nkyas kʼjõ weto to, btek mai kʼjõ ma.”
Petrus ysya Yohanes mbewok mkyas watum ro
msya bo ro tiwya ana mmat Yesus yno ye. Ana mkyas bo mkak tna fo hah me mamoʼt
ro Yerusalem. Tna mam iso ro ana mamo to, ana mkyas Bokyas ro Moof
reto mam remo raa ro Samaria makin ro ana mamo iti to.
Tna
ro
sau mbis Filipus mawe, “Nasen namo sia snok mam iso ro mroh mbam Yerusalem mamoʼt
ro Gaza to.” Iso reto to, iso ro riamo sai.
Filipus yari feto tibyo yasen yamo. Ait yamo tna ykai raa manes sait ro ybam
ro Etiopia. Bi ait ja ybo pitis ro
reto. Tna fai Kandake mamo
ro mbo
ro Etiopia. Bi ait tiwya yamoʼt Yerusalem mkah bo skabuk.
Mfo refo hah ye yamoʼt Etiopia yamo. Bi ait hre mam asya rait yhoh yamo kri-kri to, ait
aam ro tiwya Allah ybis
Yesaya ykom.
Tna Har ro Allah mbis Filipus mawe, “Namo oh teto, namo kene kait mam asya reto to.”
Tna Filipus yhoh yamo mam weto tna yari he bi ait
aam ro
Yesaya ykom. Tibyo Filipus ytu kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nmat aam reto tna srau ye fe mfe a?”
Tna bi ait yawe, “Soh raa aro betoo bokom refo maja rau kʼjõ fee, fyi re kbe jõ thar to? Nama naut hre nsya jõ.
Bokom ro bi ait
reto mkyas Yesus mawe,
‘Ait yfi
ro ja raa mkuk makah mamo ktan mkah bo mabo to. Tna Ait ye yfi
maku ro raa ktan mawyan menohe kwek fee, shait sai. Ait retait ykyas bo aro fee ye.
Tna raa sikowah Ait mfi Ait raa kair sai. Raa mtu srah rAit to hayah sai, mfi srah ja raa mtu soo to fee. Ait yabe ku fefares to, raa mame yajat oh. Feto to raa aro bo mkyas ku renti wAit fee ye.’”
Yesaya 53:7-8
Tna bi ait retait ytu bo kʼFilipus yawe, “Bo ro
Yesaya ykom reto to, awya oh mi ait ykyas feto to?
Yesaya ykyas ait yesait fe ykyas raa roto aro ye a?”
Tna Filipus betoo bokom ro
Yesaya ykom reto. Tna fo ykyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
kʼbi ait ye.
Ana mbewok mamo, mamo, tna snok mam aya sau. Tibyo bi ait yawe kʼFilipus yawe, “Aya saah mefo. Mfo refo nyõ
jõ fe mfe a?” [
Filipus yawe, “Soh nyõ smot mkah nhaf anyõ kaket ee, kbe jõ
nyõ.” Tna bi ait yawe, “Jõ thar tawe, Yesus
tait Ku ro Allah yare.”]
Tibyo bi ait ro ybo pitis ro Etiopia retait yawe kʼait ro ybo asya rait reto yawe, “Nros! Jõ troh wia.” Tna Filipus ysya bi ait mbewok mroh mamo mros mam aya reto tna Filipus
bi refi mam aya reto.
Ana mbewok frok mbam aya maut mros mne to, Har ro
tubat Filipus makah mamo. Tna bi ait ymat Filipus u fee. Tna bi yabi refi yasen yamo renti mkah simaut ro mase.
Har ro
makah Filipus mamoʼt remo ro Asdod. Tna ait yasen yamo renti. Yamo ykyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus (
) mam remo beta ro mhau mam iso ro ait yamo iti. Tna ait snok mam
ro Kaisarea.
Tii weto to, Saulus knait raa ro smot
Yesus. Tna ait saim bo yawe raa mame raa ro smot Yesus to majat. Tna ait yamo yo
Yahudi ro yase yawe,
“Taja; nkom aam baro kʼraa mabi ro Yahudi sor ro mhau mam
ro Damsyik. Mam aam weto nkom nawe nyõ nbis jõ tama tfot raa ro kro Iso ro
Yesus to. Noo aam weto nee kʼjõ tna tamoʼt Damsyik tee aam weto kʼraa mabi mmat. Tna soh jõ tkai raa sme msya fnya ro smot Yesus sor to, kbe jõ tfot ana take takah tamoʼt Yerusalem.”
Paulus yamoʼt Damsyik, tna wore ait yamo kene kait mam
reto to, ait ymat bo sau mfi rir ro mrir mkek to. Bo reto mbam ayoh btek mama mame mur mam wore ait yros.
Ait yatu yai mam tabam, tna yari mai sau mawe, “Saulus; nyõ sikowah Jõ nno fyi meto?”
Menohe Saulus ytu si yawe,
Nyõ fi awya metait?” Menohe Ait yawe si yawe, “Jõ fi Yesus ro ja nyõ sikowah tait.
Nasen oh! Tna namoʼt
Mam
kbe raa sait ykyas bo ro tbis tawe meen nyõ nno.”
Raa ro kro ait mamo su weto to, mrok shait bana sai. Riwai ana mari mai reto, menohe ana mmat raa ro ykyas bo reto aro fee ye.
Saulus yari mai reto tibyo yasen yros, menohe yasu mti. Tibyo ana ro kro ait mamo to, mbo yatem mamoʼt Damsyik.
Ti ro tuuf firwas to, ait ymat bo fefares ye. Ait yait bo fee ye, tna yata aya bo fee ye.
Raa sait ro smot Yesus yasom Ananias. Ait yhau mam
ro Damsyik. Tna
yinyam bo kʼait mkah bosmi yawe, “Ananias!” Tna Ananias yawe,
; jõ mefi!”
ybis ait yawe, “Nasen namoʼt iso ro ja raa mtu masom ‘Iso ro Ntrot’ to. Tna ntu kʼraa ro mhau mam amah ro bi Yudas to, nawe nyõ saso raa sait yasom Saulus ro tiwya raa mabe mam
ro Tarsus. Saulus tait mfo refo skabuk kri-kri meto.
Riwai Jõ tinyam bo kʼSaulus tna ait ymat raa sait yasom Ananias twok yamaʼt amah mato reto. Tna ymat Ananias yawah yatem ytor kait abyõ afo re ait yasu mrok maah tna ymat bo ye.”
Tna Ananias yawe,
; ait retait, tiwya jõ tari raa msis mkyas mawe ait yno bo ro mkair mai kʼraa woNyõ mam Yerusalem.
Ait fi,
manes ro
Yahudi mbis ait yamaʼt befo. Yama mkah bo yfot yake raa ro smot Nyõ beta meto.”
Menohe
yawe, “Nasen namo no kʼait oh! Saulus tait raa ro Jõ tsok yno bo woJõ. Jõ tsok ait mkah bo ykyas Jõ tasom kʼraa mana ro Israel ye, tna kʼraa mana roto makin msya
wana ye.
Tna meen bo ro samyoh kbe btek mai kʼait ye. Bo weto, kbe Jõ tesait terif kʼait matim wia.”
Ananias yari feto tibyo yasen yamo. Yamoʼt amah ro bi Yudas tna ykai Saulus. Tna Ananias yoo yatem ytor kʼSaulus tna yawe, “Saulus, tao ajõ; ti taa
Yesus yerif Ait kʼnyõ mam iso ro nyõ nama iti to. Ait ybis jõ tama to kʼnyõ afo re nyõ nasu mrok maah tna re Har ro Allah mama mbo nyõ matak ye.”
Ananias yawe feto to, bo sau mfi syoh masin btek mbam kʼSaulus yasu. Tibyo ait yrok yasu maah. Ait yasen tna Ananias
ait.
Tna ait yait boit, tibyo yetsu matak u.
Saulus yhau ti baro ysya raa ro smot Yesus mam
ro Damsyik.
Tna mam weto si oh to, ait ja yamo wosa bokyas ro Yesus mam samu skabuk raa ro Yahudi sor yawe, “Yesus tait Ku ro Allah yare.”

Raa ro mari bo ro ait ykyas to, mrok ktak beta tna mawe, “Ait refi oh mi tiwya yhau mam Yerusalem tna sikowah raa ro smot Yesus mam tno. Tna raa mawe ait yamaʼt befo mkah bo yfot raa weto yakah yamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna kbe ysan ana
manes ro Yahudi.”
Saulus ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro Yahudi ro mhau mam Damsyik. Ykyas kaket. Ait betoo kʼana yawe Yesus tait
Mbetoo mbe toni. Tibyo ana mrok mamboi tna ana matak msya ait santri bo fee ye.
Ti mawat baro firwas tna raa ro Yahudi hre siret tna saim bo su mawe kbe ana mame Saulus yajat.
