Menohe Saulus yari bo ro ana saim reto. Baas mti bo to, raa ro Yahudi ste wa mam
kitana re huwya mame ait yajat. ⌞Tiwya raa mana
muur
reto mne.⌟
Ana ro Yahudi ste wa Saulus feto, tibyo mti sau fo raa ro smot Yesus mse Saulus mam
maboh sau. Tna mruk ait yroh wai mam
ti mne.

Ait yasen frok ybam Damsyik hah ye yamoʼt Yerusalem. Ait snok si mam Yerusalem fo, ait yawe yiranya ysya raa ro smot Yesus. He mfe. Ana waa mtu sioh kʼait mawe, “Ait refi sne mate kʼanu yawe ait smot Yesus, yawe feto to, ait sioh anu sai meto.”
Menohe Barnabas yakah ait yamo tne kʼraabis ro Yesus tna ait ykyas kʼana yawe, “Saulus ro tiwya tinyi hawe kro Yesus tait, mfo refo haberek kro Yesus oh.
yerif Ait mam iso maka, tna ykyas bo kʼait ye. Tna fo ait yamoʼt Damsyik to. Mam Damsyik Ait yasen ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa. Ait waa ana fee ye.”
Feto to ana ksoh Saulus yhau mam Yerusalem ysya ana. Yhau mam Yerusalem tna ykyas Yesus yasom kaket mam beto ye.
Ait ja santri bo ysya raa Yahudi ro ja mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yunani. Menohe ana mari Ait fee. Ana mawe mame ait yajat.
He mfe. Kuber ro Yesus wAit ana mari bo ro ana saim reto. Tibyo ana makah ait mamoʼt
ro Kaisarea. Tna fo ana mbis ait yamo renti yamoʼt
ro Tarsus.
Tna ti weto to, raa mkbair ro smot Yesus mam
ro Yudea,
ro Galilea msya rabin ro Samaria beta to, raa aro bo sikowah ana u fee ye. Ana bosmot wana mo matak renti. Mhau to waa
Tna Har ro Allah mros tis ana, mban ana. Tna raa mawat ro smot Yesus fefares to, ana mama smot Yesus ye.
Petrus yamo yur ytan mam remo makin weto to, ait yamo sia yamo ymat raa ro Allah wAit mam remo ro Lida.
Mam beto to, ait ykai raa sait yasom Eneas. Eneas tait, yaa msya yatem bo to mhai ye, tibyo ja yakus yjin sai bait mam aam sai
trion krentuuf oh.
Petrus yawe kʼEneas yawe, “Eneas, Yesus
yisoh nyõ noof oh. Nasen beah aam anyõ oh.” Petrus yawe feto, tibyo Eneas yasen buu yros.
Tna raa ro mhau mam Lida msya raa ro mhau mam Saron beta to, ana mmat Eneas yamo fo, feto tibyo mrok waa smot
Yesus ye.
Tna fai sau ro smot Yesus mhau mam remo ro Yope. Fai au masom Tabita. (Tna mam mai ro Yunani to, raa mtu au masom Dorkas ye.) Au to ja mno bo moof tna matmof raa kinyah yoyo ye.
Mam ati reto to, au kiyam tibyo mhai. Raa moo hai rau mse mate aya tna moo mse mam amah hawar ro uu.
Remo ro Yope msya remo ro Lida to mhau kene sai. Tna raa mkbair ro smot Yesus tna ro mhau mam Yope mari he Petrus yhau iti mam Lida. Tibyo ana mbis raa mabo ewok masen mamo mawe kʼait mawe yama fooh.

Mamo, tna Petrus yari feto tibyo yasen kro ana mamoʼt Yope. Ait snok si fo ana makah ait mamoʼt amah hawar ro uu reto. Semit beta ro mhau mam beto to, hre mawia. Ana mama mo kʼPetrus tna merif ratan ro tiwya Dorkas mtin mee kʼana sor fo.

Petrus ybis ana ro mhau mam beto beta frok. Tna fo, ait yesait aran yhau mam amah hawar reto. Tna ait yaka tmi yimna mte tna skabuk. Tna ait haberek ymat hai reto tna yawe, “Tabita, nasen oh!” Tibyo au mrok mmat Petrus tna masen hre ye.
Petrus ybo au matem teta tna au masen mros. Tna fo ait ytu semit weto msya raa ro Allah wAit mama mmat fai Dorkas ro mrok masen.
Bo ro Petrus yno reto syohor mamo snok mam rabin reto beta. Raa mawat mari feto tibyo mama smot Yesus.
Tna Petrus yhau mam Yope ti baro kait ye. Yhau mam amah ro bi Simon ro ja yfen bo ro mbam kak marak tait.
Bi sait yhau mam
Kaisarea to yasom Kornelius. Ait yamo aban mana ro ja ybo raa sbe majin sau. Raa sbe ro ybo weto mabo 100. Tna ana weto to raa mbam rabin ro Italia.

Kornelius ja mur-mur skabuk Allah. Tna Kornelius, yfain, msya raa ro ja mhau mam amah rait to, beta waa Allah ye. Menohe ana to raa ro Yahudi fee. Ait ja yoo bo mawat yee kʼraa kinyah ro Yahudi, tna ait skabuk Allah yoyo ye.
Baas fares mam ayõ ro tuuf feto, ait ymat
ro mbam Allah sau mama twok mam amah rait tna mawe kʼait mawe, “Kornelius fi!”
Ait ymat sas
reto tna yrok waa yawe,
bo bawya mefo?” Tna
reto mawe kʼait mawe, “Allah yari skabuk anyõ oh tna ymat bosan ro ja nyõ nsan kʼraa kinyah ye oh. Ait ymat feto mno yhaf mnan.
Nasen nbis raa baro mamo fooh mamoʼt remo Yope. Tna mmen Simon-Petrus yama.
Ait yhau mam amah ro bi Simon ro ja yisoh kak marak. Amah reto to mhau kene mam wore aya sawan maam kait.”
Tna
reto sikba Kornelius mamo. Tna fo ait yasen ytu sryan wait mabo ewok msya raa sbe ro ja smot Allah kaket sait mama. Ana weto ja mhau mno bo ro Kornelius ybis sai.
Ana mama tna ait betoo bo ro ait ymat weto beta kʼana. Tna fo, ybis ana mamoʼt Yope tna mmen Petrus yama.
Rabu ti fo ana masen mamo. Ayõ baas to ana mamo kene mam remo ro Yope. Tna mam weto to, Petrus yamo yaut abyõ mam amah tna skabuk ye.
Petrus yhai sre tna yawe yait boit. Boit raa siwyan kri-kri fo tna Allah yinyam bo sau kʼait.
Ait ymat ayoh mato maah, tna fo ait ymat bo sau mfi bo hawee mabuf ro maboh sau mroh mbam uu mama. Hawee reto kro mbam tuut trion jiit mroh snok mam tabam.
Ymat he
aro rau-rau beta mhau abyõ mam hawee reto.
msya aban ro mton aro rau-rau, tna msya ruu aro rau-rau ye.
Tna ait yari mai sau mawe, “Petrus: Nasen ktan bo weto nabo oh!”
Menohe Petrus yisboh si yawe
yawe, “Mfe saut! Bo ro amu nbau weto to, ja jõ tabo bo weto mafa fee!”
Tna mai reto mkyas kʼait muhrin ro ewok mawe, “Allah yawe, ‘Mfo wefo to, tawe bo weto bo ro mbau fee. Nabo oh. Nbau bo weto u to ma.’”
Bo reto Allah yno muhrin tuuf, tna fo Allah tubat hawee ro riwai reto to, maut mamoʼt ayoh twok mamo marak.

Tna Petrus ynaut bo refo mam yhaf yawe, “Bo bawya ro jõ tmat mefo ee?” Ait ynaut feto, tna raa ro bi Kornelius ybis weto mama. Riwai ana snok mam remo ro Yope tna mtu sas amah ro bi Simon. Ana mros mam amah mato.
Tna mtu mawe, “Simon-Petrus metait a?”
Petrus hre ynaut bo ro ymat fares. Tna Har ro Allah mawe kʼait mawe, “Nari, raa mabo tuuf saso nyõ mama fo.
Nasen tna nroh namoʼt te. Tna fo nsya ana nmo. Jõ oh mi tbis ana mama mmen nyõ to. Feto to namo sai.”
Tna Petrus yroh yamoʼt te tna yawe kʼana yawe, “Jõ ro anu saso oh mefi. Bo bawya ro anu nnaut nma fo?”

Tna ana mawe kʼait mawe, “Amu nma fo, bi Kornelius ybis. Ait tait aban mana raa ro sbe. Ait ja yno bo ro Allah ksoh tna smot Allah ye. Tna raa ro Yahudi beta mmat bo ro ait yno to, mawe ait tait raa ro ja yno bo moof. Iis
ro Allah rAit sau mawe ait ybis amu nma nmen nyõ bmoʼt amah rait mam Kaisarea. Mawe nyõ namo no kʼait tna kbe ait yari bo ro nyõ nkyas kʼait.”
Petrus yari bo ro ana mawe feto. Tna yawe, “Nma njin nsya jõ oh mam befo. Tna menrabu rabu anu bmo.”
Rabu fo, ana mabo jiit masen mamo sikba Yope tna kro iso ro mamoʼt Kaisarea. Tna raa ro Yope ro smot Yesus taro kro ana ye.
Mam Kaisarea to, Kornelius ytu yao na msya yafoh na bo to mama hre su msya ait ste Petrus wea. Tna rabu ti fo, Petrus ysya raa wait wefo mamo snok mam Kaisarea.
Petrus yamo twok mam amah mato fo, Kornelius yama tna yaka yabum yawe hartu ait ye.
Menohe Petrus ymat feto ybo ait yasen tna yawe, “Nasen oh, jõ fi raa sai mefo. Tnan anya tsya nyõ sai.”
Petrus ykyas bo ysya bi ait kri-kri to, twok mam amah mato fo. Ait ymat he raa msis siret ste ait wea oh.
Tna ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Anu fo raa ro srim. Menohe anu nhar bo mafa ramu raa ro

Yahudi to. Watum ranu mkyas mawe, ‘Anu raa ro Yahudi: Nmo niranya nsya raa mana roto ma! Tna twok mam amah wana bo to ma ye!’ Menohe taa, Allah yinyam bo kʼjõ yawe raa mana roto to, kbe mbau kʼamu, raa ro Yahudi u fee. Yawe, ‘Nnaut nwe raa mana roto to raa ro mkair ma!’
Feto oh mi ati ro anu ntu jõ tamaʼt befo to, jõ ksoh tama sai. Tna hawe fee. Mfo, jõ ksoh thar bo bawya ro mno re anu ntu jõ tamaʼt befo fo?”
Tna bi Kornelius yawe kʼait yawe, “Ti jiit mam wore ayõ hawer fefo fo, jõ skabuk mam amah. Jõ skabuk kri-kri fo, bi ro yyum ratan ro mboh kren toni sait yros tubor kene mam jõ tasu.
Tna yawe kʼjõ yawe, ‘Kornelius, bo ro nyõ skabuk kʼAllah to, Ait yari oh. Tna bombra ro nyõ ja nsan kʼraa kinyah to, Ait yhar oh.
Feto to, nbis raa mamoʼt Yope mmen Simon-Petrus yama. Ait mfo yhau mam amah ro bi Simon ro ja yfen bo mkah kak marak tait. Amah reto to mhau kene mam aya sawan maam kait.’
Jõ tari feto si to, tbis raa mamo fooh mmen nyõ tna nyõ nhaf moof kʼjõ nama fo. Tna mfo amu beta siret mam wore Allah yasu ymat refo, mkah bo nri bo ro Allah ybis nyõ nkyas kʼamu beta.”
Petrus ykyas bo kʼana yawe, “Mfo refo Jõ srau tnaut tawe Allah ysok raa mana sau yse hayah tna ysok raa mana roto taro yse hayah fee saut. Ait ymat beta yawe mnan anya sai.
Ja Ait ymat raa mana ryo sai to, awya sai ro waa Ait tna yno bo ro Ait ksoh to, Allah yoo ait yamo raa mana rAit ye.
Bokyas riwai reto Allah ykyas kʼraa mana ro Israel: Ykyas yawe, ‘Yesus
tait kbe yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa beta.’
Anu nesait nhar bo beta ro tiwya mabo mam
ro Yudea. Tinyi rau to, Yohanes ro ja
raa to, ykyas bo mam
ro Galilea.

Tna fo Yesus ro ybam remo ro Nazaret yama. Allah yoo yatak yee kʼAit tna yoo Har rAit yse matam Ait ye. Allah yatam Yesus tibyo woyõ-woya sai Yesus yamo to, Ait ja yno bo moof tna raa ro kabes yabi (Iblis) ybo to Ait yisoh moof ye.
Tna amu, raabis ro Yesus wait, nmat bo ro Ait yno beta mam
Yerusalem msya rabin ro Yahudi to ye. Bo reto amu nbo nkyas. Tna raa mame Ait yajat mam ara warok.
Menohe mam ti ro tuuf to Allah yno Ait yrok yasen. Tna yno re raa mmat Ait ye.
Raa makin beta fee. Menohe amu nmat Ait, tna amu hre niit boit nsya Ait su ye. Tiwya Allah ysok amu nesait re nmat tna nkyas Ait yasom kʼraa roto ye.
Ait ybis amu nmo nkyas Yesus yasom. Ybis amu nmo nkyas nwe, ‘Allah ysok Ait yamo Raa ro yhau susai ytu srah raa ro mhai msya raa ro mhau fares bo yari ye.’
Tiwya
na beta mhaf sau mkyas Ait msya bo ro kbe Ait yno. Ana mawe awya sai ro smot Ait to, kbe Allah yyon iro wana beta ye.”
Tna Petrus ykyas bo wefo kri-kri fo, Har ro
mroh mama mbo Kornelius ysya raa wait ro mari bo ro Petrus ykyas fo beta.

Tna ana mrok mkyas bo mkah mai roto ro ana wase fares, tna mbaut Allah ye. Tna raa ro Yahudi ro smot Yesus, ana ro riwai kro Petrus mama mbam Yope to, hre mmat. Ana ro Yahudi mmat Allah yoo Har rAit yuumto kʼraa mana roto ye to, ana mrok ktak toni. Tna Petrus yawe kʼana yawe,

Tna ana mrok mkyas bo mkah mai roto ro ana wase fares, tna mbaut Allah ye. Tna raa ro Yahudi ro smot Yesus, ana ro riwai kro Petrus mama mbam Yope to, hre mmat. Ana ro Yahudi mmat Allah yoo Har rAit yuumto kʼraa mana roto ye to, ana mrok ktak toni. Tna Petrus yawe kʼana yawe,
“Allah yoo Har rAit yse mbo raa wefo oh. Yno mamyot mnan fi ro tiwya Ait yno kʼanu ye oh. Nma, anu
raa wefo mkah aya ye! Kbe raa aro mno wa fee.”
Tibyo Petrus ybis raa
ana mkah Yesus
yasom. Tna ana mabe Petrus soh-soh ait mawe, “Nyõ namo wia ma. Nhau nsya amu ti baro wia rere!”
Tna raabis
ro Yesus msya raa ro smot Yesus mam rabin ro Yudea beta to, tiwya mbam raa mana ro Yahudi sai aran. Tna ana mari he raa mbam raa mana roto baro mama smot bokyas ro Allah ye.
Tna Petrus yamoʼt Yerusalem. Mam beto to, raa Yahudi ro smot Yesus taro mastako ait mawe,
“Taa nyõ twok mam amah raa mana roto to, tna sohmaam bo nsya ana su ye. Feto Allah hawe!”
Menohe Petrus betoo bo weto sau-sau kʼana kaket yawe,

“Taa jõ skabuk mam remo ro Yope kri-kri fo, Allah yinyam bo sau kʼjõ. Tna jõ tmat bo sau mfi bo hawee mabuf ro maboh sau mroh mbam uu. Hawee reto kro mbam tuut trion jiit, tna mroh snok mam tabam kene wore jõ hre.
Tna jõ thaninin, tmat he mato to matot mkah
ro mha,
ro rbyoh, aban ro mton, msya ruu ye.
Tna jõ tari mai sau mama mawe kʼjõ mawe, ‘Petrus; nasen ktan bo weto nabo oh!’
Menohe jõ tawe
tawe, ‘Mfe, bo ro amu nbau mefo, ja jõ tabo fee.’
Menohe tari mai ro mbam sawro reto muhrin ro ewok. Mkyas mawe, ‘Bo ro Allah yawe nyõ nabo to, ne nbau to ma!’
Bo reto, Allah yno muhrin ro tuuf. Tna fo Allah tubat bo weto beta yakah yamoʼt ayoh twok marak.
Tna mam weto si to raa mabo tuuf snok mam amah ro amu nhau. Ana weto to, taa Kornelius ybis mbam
ro Kaisarea yawe mama mo kʼjõ mam remo ro Yope.
Tibyo Har ro Allah mawe kʼjõ mawe, ‘Nasen nsya ana nmo su oh! Nnaut bo myum-yam ma!’ Tna raa wamu mabo ntamam refo masen kro jõ mamoʼt Kaisarea. Amu nmo twok mam amah ro bi Kornelius.
Tna ait yawe, ‘Taa
sau frok tubor mam amah mato tna mkyas kʼjõ mawe jõ tbis raa mamoʼt Yope tna mmen Simon-Petrus yama.
reto mawe kbe amu nri bokyas ro Simon-Petrus ykyas afo re kbe Allah yoo riof ro mase yee kʼjõ tsya raa wojõ beta.’
Tibyo jõ taban tkyas bo fo, Har ro
mroh mama mbo ana mfi bo ro tiwya tinyi rau mroh mama mbo anu wia oh mefo.
Tna jõ te tnaut bo ro tiwya
yawe, ‘Yohanes
raa mkah aya sai, menohe anu to, kbe Allah
anu mkah Har rAit.’
Tiwya anu smot
Yesus

tna Allah yoo Har rAit yee kʼanu. Tna jõ tmat tawe Allah yoo Har rAit yee kʼana ye. Ait yno mnan fi bo tiwya yno kʼanu ye to. Feto tna jõ thau sayõ bo ro Ait yno sai. Tnaut tawe jõ fi raa sei sai, kbe tno wa bo ro Allah yno reto to fee!”
Tna raa ro Yahudi mari bo ro Petrus betoo feto. Tibyo ana mastako ait u fee. Tna mbaut Allah mawe, “Allah yno iso ro moof afo re raa mbam raa mana roto mashana ye, tna meen ana mkai mamos mae ye.”
Maban mam wore Stefanus tiwya raa mame to, raa sikowah raa ro smot Yesus. Tibyo ana msam somya mamo snok mam rabin ro Finisia, sato ro Siprus msya
ro Antiokhia. Ana mamo to, mkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro Yahudi sai aran.
Menohe ana makin ro somya weto to, ana taro raa ro mbam Siprus msya raa ro mbam
ro Kirene. Ana weto mkyas Bokyas ro Moof (

ro Antiokhia. Tibyo mkyas
Yesus yasom kʼraa ro ja mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yunani ye.
Tna
yatam ana tibyo raa msis-sas mashana smot Ait.
Tna raa ro smot Yesus mam Yerusalem to, ana mari bo raa ro Yunani smot Yesus ye.
Tibyo ana weto mbis Barnabas yasen yamoʼt Antiokhia.
Barnabas tait raa ro ja yno bo moof, tna Har ro Allah ja mbo ait matak. Tna bosmot rait matak ye. Barnabas yamoʼt
ro Antiokhia. Tna ymat bo Allah yatmof raa ro rabin roto ye feto. Ait srau bo reto, tibyo yrok simaut mase. Tna ait ykyas bo moof kʼana yawe, “Nhau to, smot
kaket!” Tibyo, raa msis-sas mama smot
Yesus.
Barnabas tait raa ro ja yno bo moof, tna Har ro Allah ja mbo ait matak. Tna bosmot rait matak ye. Barnabas yamoʼt
ro Antiokhia. Tna ymat bo Allah yatmof raa ro rabin roto ye feto. Ait srau bo reto, tibyo yrok simaut mase. Tna ait ykyas bo moof kʼana yawe, “Nhau to, smot
kaket!” Tibyo, raa msis-sas mama smot
Yesus.
Tna fo Barnabas yasen yamoʼt
ro Tarsus saso Saulus.
Ait ykai Saulus, tna yakah ait hah yamoʼt Antiokhia. Ana mbewok mhau su msya raa ro smot Yesus mam beto to
sau. Ana mhau mam beto to mkyas, mbetoo bokyas ro Yesus kʼraa msis. Tna mam beto ye raa maban mtu raa ro smot Yesus weto, ja mtu mawe 'raa mana ro Kristen' to.
Ti weto to,
ro Allah ja ybis mkyas bo wAit to, baro mama mbam Yerusalem mamoʼt Antiokhia.
Tna
weto to, sait yasom Agabus. Har ro
ybis ait yasen yawe, “Meen hai sre ro msai sau btek mai rabin ro wefo beta.” (Bo ro ait yawe reto mabo mam ati ro
Klaudius ro yase ybo rabin weto beta.)

Tna raa ro smot Yesus ro mhau mam Antiokhia to, ana mawe, “Boit wana ro mhau mam Yudea to mabut. Feto to bma, anu boo pitis wanu baro bee kʼana ro smot Yesus ro mhau mam beto.” Tibyo raa sait-sait yoo pitis rait yee mamyot bo ro ait yse.
Tna fo Barnabas ysya Saulus mbewok makah pitis weto mamo msan
ro mhau mam Yerusalem mkah bo ana saim kʼraa wana ro hai sre.
Mam ti weto to
Herodes ybis raa wait mamo mfot raa ro Kristen baro afo re ait yno bo ro mkair btek mai kʼana.
Tna ait ybis raa sait yoo sogi yaru Yakobus ro Yohanes yao tait yajat.
Raa ro Yahudi ksoh bo ro ait yno reto. Tibyo ait ybis raa mamo mfot Petrus. Yfot Petrus mam wore raa ro Yahudi makyõ Korat
ro
Marak.

Herodes ybis ana mbu ait mam
tna ybis raa sbe mabo trion 16 kmot ait.

mkak oh tna fo, ait kbe ytu srah rait mam wore raa masu makin mmat.
Feto to Petrus, yhau mam
fares, menohe raa ro Kristen mur-mur skabuk ait kʼAllah.
Raa ro Yahudi makyõ Korat ro
mkak. Tna Herodes yawe mhau rabu tna tufrok Petrus frok ybam
reto. Tna mti rau fo, Petrus yjin. Raa sbe mabo ewok kmot ait.
trion ewok make ait yatem tna mii kʼana matem ye. Tna Petrus yjin mam masuf. Tna raa sbe mabo ewok naut mros mam masa ro mne kmot
reto.

ro

reto. Tna
reto mti ait mawe, “Nasen fooh!” Tibyo

Tna
reto mawe, “Noo ratan anyõ nyum tna noo
anyõ nse naa ye.” Petrus yari yno bo ro
mawe reto. Tna fo
mawe, “Noo
anyõ to nyum naut tna kro jõ bmo.”
Tna ait kro
reto frok mamo. Mamo to mfi bo ait wase-wasa sai. Ynaut yawe yjin smi bo ymat
reto. Ait wase yawe bo reto mabo tu oh, fe mfe a?
Tna ana mbewok frok miwrek raa sbe ro kmot
reto, tna fo mamo miwrek raa sbe roto, tna ana snok mam masa
ro muut snek reto wa. Masa reto to, mesait mato maa sai. Tna ana frok, tna mamo kro iso sau si fo,
reto mrok marak sikba tubor sai mam weto.
Tna ait yrok yhar kaket yawe, “Bo refo mabo oh! Mfo refo jõ thar tawe
ybis
rAit tna yno riof kʼjõ. Ait bitsre jõ tbam
Herodes yatak rait tna mbam bo ro raa ro Yahudi saim mawe mno mai kʼjõ bo ye.”
Ait yrok srau feto tna fo, yamoʼt samu ro Maria ro Yohanes-Markus yme. Mam beto to, raa mawat siret tna hre skabuk.
Petrus yama yai masa ytu ana. Tna sryan ro ano sau masom Rode mama mros wane mari awya ro mii ytu mam ti masa meit.
Au mari he Petrus ymai tna au simaut mase tibyo sorni mitrah masa reto kʼait. Au mamo fooh mamo mabah kʼana ro mhau mam amah mato reto mawe, “Petrus yama meit!”
Menohe ana mawe si kʼau mawe, “Nyõ nker meto a?” Menohe au mawe, “Jõ tker fee. Bi ait yama meit!” Tibyo ana mawe, “Tna sai nyõ nmat
ro ja kmot ait.”
Menohe Petrus yros fares tna ytu u. Tna ana mitrah masa tna mmat he ait yesait yros. Tibyo mrok ktak sai.
Petrus yawe kʼana yawe, “Shait oh!
yakah jõ frok tbam
reto. Jõ tkyas bo ro
yno wia. Tna fo nsen nmo nkyas bo weto kʼYakobus ysya raa wanu taro ye mari.” Ait ykyas bo weto mkak tna ymah meen kʼana akus tna frok yamoʼt yuk roto.
Rabu fo, raa sbe wefo mrok mkyas mnin-nin mawe, “Wah, ait snok ybam woyõ? Ja weno anu ste matak to re ait frok yamo woyõ!”
Herodes yari bo reto, tibyo ybis raa sbe roto mamo saso Petrus menohe ana mkai ait fee. Tna Herodes ytu sas kʼraa sbe ro ti sai kmot Petrus weto tna ybis raa sbe roto mfot ana mame majat. Tna fo
Herodes yasen frok ybam rabin ro Yudea yamoʼt
ro Kaisarea tna ait yhau ti baro kait mam beto ye.
Ti weto to
Herodes kmo raa ro
Tirus msya raa ro
Sidon toni.
wana to ja mkai boit mbam oo ro
retait ybo. Tna raa wana baro saim su tna mamo mkyas bo kʼait. Ana mamo tna mkai bi Blastus wia. Ait retait ja yisoh amah ro
rait. Ana mawe kʼait mawe ana ksoh mrok miranya msya
u. Blastus yari feto, tna yawe bo ro ana saso reto moof. Tibyo ait yamo ykyas
Herodes.
Tna Herodes ysok ti sau yse mkah ykyas bo kʼraa weto beta. Ti reto ait yyum ratan ro ja
myum tna yaut hre mam ambar ro ja
hre ye. Tna ykyas bo kʼana.
Ana mari bo ro yawe to, simaut mmai mnin mawe, “Mai reto mai ro mbam kʼallah sait meto tna mai reto raa meto fee.”
Tna
Herodes sayõ ana mbaut ait sai. Ait ywaar bo ro ana mawe fee, tna ait ybaut
fee ye. Tibyo mam weto si oh to,
ro
sau mno ait kiyam. Moo saba mse mkok ait. Tibyo yhai.
Tna watum ro
to syohor yum. Tibyo raa taro u mawat bo mari tna mama smot Yesus ye.
Barnabas ysya Saulus mbewok mno bo ro raa mbis kʼana mam Yerusalem mkak. Tna fo, ana mbewok mhah mamoʼt Antiokhia tna mmen Yohanes ro ja raa mtu yasom Markus tait ysya ana mama ye.
Ati sau fo
ro Antiokhia siret su. Ana skabuk
tna mhau bo ro mait afo re skabuk kaket. Ana fo
ro ja Allah ybis mamo mkyas bo wAit to baro msya
baro ye. Ana weto to, sait yasom Barnabas tna sait yasom Simeon-Niger. Tna sait yasom Lukius ro ybam
ro Kirene, tna sait yasom Menahem. (Menahem tait, Saulus ysya Herodes bo to ana tiwya raa mtos su.) Ana hre skabuk su to, Har ro
mawe kʼana mawe, “Jõ ksoh Barnabas ysya Saulus mamo mno bo woJõ.”
Ati sau fo
ro Antiokhia siret su. Ana skabuk
tna mhau bo ro mait afo re skabuk kaket. Ana fo
ro ja Allah ybis mamo mkyas bo wAit to baro msya
baro ye. Ana weto to, sait yasom Barnabas tna sait yasom Simeon-Niger. Tna sait yasom Lukius ro ybam
ro Kirene, tna sait yasom Menahem. (Menahem tait, Saulus ysya Herodes bo to ana tiwya raa mtos su.) Ana hre skabuk su to, Har ro
mawe kʼana mawe, “Jõ ksoh Barnabas ysya Saulus mamo mno bo woJõ.”
Raa weto mhau bo ro mait tna moo matem mtor abyõ kʼana mbewok refo skabuk mayoh Allah yatam ana. Tna fo ana mmah meen akus tna bitsre ana mbewok mamo.
Har ro
mbis, tibyo Barnabas ysya Saulus mbewok mamoʼt joh ro Seleukia. Tna ana mbewok mbam Seleukia maut
mamo snok sato ro Siprus.
Ana mhau mam remo ro Salamis to, ana mkyas Watum ro Allah. Mamo mkyas mam samu skabuk raa ro Yahudi sor. Tna mere sait yasom Yohanes-Markus kro ana mbewok ye mkah yno bo wana.
Ana mamo mur mtan mam sato reto, tibyo snok mam remo ro Pafos. Mam beto to, ana mkai raa ro Yahudi sait yasom Baryesus-Elimas. Ait tait raa ro ja yari botkif mafot kaket tna sioh yawe ait tait
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit.
Ait ja yiranya ysya
ro sato reto.
retait yasom Sergius-Paulus. Ait raa ro yhar bo toni.
retait ja ksoh yari Watum ro Allah. Tibyo ait ytu Barnabas ysya Saulus mama.
Menohe Baryesus-Elimas yno wa afo re
retait smot Yesus ma.
Menohe Har ro
mbo Saulus matak. (Ja raa mtu ait yasom Paulus ye.) Mbo matak tna yasu sayõ Baryesus-Elimas tna yawe,
“Kabes yabi (Iblis) ybo nyõ matak to! Ja nyõ hawe bo ro moof tna nno bo kbik-kbak sai! Nyõ sioh raa yoyo tna iso moof ro Allah yerif kʼraa to, nyõ nno mkair sai.
Nyõ nno feto tibyo

kbe yno bo ro samyoh btek mai kʼnyõ ye. Mfo refo nasu mrok mboh! Ti baro firwas nyõ nmat bo fee ye.” Paulus yawe si feto fo, Elimas ait yrok yasu mti. Tna ait saso ninya wore yamo tna saso raa yawe ro mbo yatem re befatu mamo.
retait ait ymat he Elimas yrok yasu mti tna ait yari bokyas ro
ana mbewok mkyas to yrok ktak. Tibyo ait yrok smot Yesus.
Paulus ysya yafoh na sikba Pafos tna maut
tna mhoh mamoʼt remo ro Perga. Perga mhau mam
ro Pamfilia. Mam Perga Yohanes-Markus sikba ana tna hah ye yamoʼt Yerusalem.
Tna mbam Perga ana mamo renti mam iso mne. Mamo tna snok mam
Antiokhia ro mhau mam rabin ro Pisidia. Tna mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
to, ana mamo skabuk mam samu skabuk raa ro Yahudi.
Ana hre tna mari raa m
bokom ro Musa ykom baro msya bokom ro
na mkom baro ye. M

mkak, tna raa mabi ro mbo samu skabuk reto to, mbis raa mamo mtu bo kʼPaulus ysya Barnabas. Mtu bo kʼana mbewok mawe, “Raa wamu: Anu ksoh nma nkyas bokyas baro kʼamu ye, fe mfe a? Soh nwe nkyas meto mi nkyas oh.”
Paulus yasen yros. Tna yawe, “Anu raa ro Israel
nsya anu raa mbam rabin roto ro wa Allah bo nri ee:

Allah ro anu raa ro Israel ja smot tait, tiwya tinyi ait ysok hohos wanu. Ana mamo raa srim mam Mesir. Mhau mam Mesir to, Ait yno ana mrok mriembes mase. Tna mkah Ait yatak rAit ro mase to, Ait ybo ana frok mbam Mesir mamo.
Tna
trion 40 firwas bo feto to, Ait yhau ymat tan bo ro ana mno mkair mam tabam ro riamo to.
Anu hohos na mamo snok mam oo ro Kanaan tna mame anya msya raa ro mhau mam oo reto. Mame anya msya raa mana krema. Tna Allah yoo yatak yee kʼana re safto tabam wana shauk riryõn kʼraa wAit ro Israel.
Allah yno bo weto beta to
trion 450 bo feto firwas wa. Mam wore wo ana mhau mam Kanaan Allah ysok raa ro ja yamo aban mana ybo ana. Aban mana weto to, aro sor mbo ana mamo snok mam wore wo
sait ro yasom Samuel yama ybo ana mtis naut u.
Tna anu hohos na mayoh kʼAllah mawe, ‘Noo
sait nse ybo amu.’ Tibyo Allah yoo Saul yse yamo
ro ybo ana. Saul tait ku bi Kisy yare. Raa wait beta to ku renti-renta bi Benyamin ro tiwya tinyi bi Yakub yare. Saul yamo
tna ybo ana 40
Tna Allah beak ait yakus. Allah yawe:
‘Jõ tmat sas Daud ku ro bi Isai yare tna ait yno Jõ thaf mnan. Ait raa ro kbe yno bo ro Jõ ksoh beta.’
1 Samuel 13:14; Mazmur 89:21
Feto to Ait ysok Daud yse yamo
riryõn shauk hroh ro Saul reto.
Mbam ku renti ro Daud yabe oh mi, Allah siwyan Raa sait mkah bo yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa ro Israel. Ait retait yama oh. Yasom rAit Yesus.
Yesus yasom frok fefares to, raa sait ro yasom Yohanes yama. Yohanes ykyas kʼraa ro Israel makin yawe, ‘Nashana oh! Tna nma re kbe jõ
anu.’
Yohanes yno bo ro Allah ybis kʼait tna yawe, ‘Anu nnaut nwe jõ fi awya? Jõ fi
fee. Ait retait kbe yama yrof jõ. Ait yase toni syok. Menohe jõ fi raa kair sai. Tibyo jõ trus
rAit fee.’”

Tna Paulus ykyas bo renti naut yawe, “Raa wojõ; anu taro to ku renti ro bi Abraham yabe. Tna anu taro to raa rabin roto menohe anu waa Allah bo ye. Allah tiwya ykyas yawe Raa sait meen yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu. Tiwya Allah ykyas Raa retait re kbe anu ro mfo refo bhau to bri tna kbe bkai riof.
Tiwya raa wase mawe Yesus tait
Raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem msya raa mabi wana mhar bo reto fefares. Bokom ro tiwya Allah ybis
na mkom mawe, ‘Meen raa mikyak Ait tna mame Ait yajat.’
Tna ana ro mhau mam Yerusalem to, ja m
bokom reto mam ayõ ro ana ntmoh
soo oh. Tna ana mesait mikyak Yesus mnan si bo ro
na tii mkyas weto to, mhau rau oh. Menohe ana srau mnaut bo weto fee ye.
Yesus yno bo ro mkair aro fee. Menohe raa sioh mawe yno bo mkair. Mawe yno safo tibyo mamo mo kʼPilatus mawe, ‘Noo safo mana nmit kʼAit oh! Nbis raa wonyõ nawe mame Ait yajat!’
Ana mno bo weto beta mamyot bo ro tiwya
na mkom wia matim oh. Ana mno bo weto mkak. Tna fo, ana skur ajat rAit mbam ara warok reto mamo sama Ait mam isra mato.
Menohe Allah yno Ait yrok yasen.

Tna raa mmat Ait u ye. Raa ro tiwya kro Ait mamo mbam Galilea mamo snok mam Yerusalem to, ana weto mmat Ait ti aro ye. Tna mfo refo ana weto ja mkyas bo ro ana mmat Ait yno to. Ana mkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa wamu ro Yahudi ye.
Mfo refo jõ tsya Barnabas nma nkyas bokyas refo kʼanu. Bokyas reto misti simaut kʼraa: Au oh mi bosi ro tiwya Allah ykyas ysi kʼhohos wanu.
Bo ro tiwya ysi reto to, mfo refo mabo oh. Anu fo ku renti wana. Tna anu fo bmat: Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen. Yno mamyot mfi bokyas ro tiwya tinyi
Daud ykom mam
ro ewok to, yawe,
‘Nyõ tait Ku aJõ tna riwai Jõ tabe Nyõ oh.’
Mazmur 2:7
Tna Allah ykyas Ku rAit Yesus yawe Ait kbe yno Yesus yrok yasen tna kbe ye yhai u fee. Allah yawe,
‘Tiwya tsi bo tawe tno bo moof ku renti ro Daud yabe sait to. Tna bo ro Jõ tesait tsi meto kbe mabo! Au oh mi; “Meen Ku renti rait sait yasen yamo
Yesaya 55:3
Tna tiwya Daud yawe kʼAllah mam
far-far roto yawe,
‘Ait ro Nyõ Nbis Yama tait, meen Nyõ sayõ ajat rAit makus mnis fee.’”
Mazmur 16:10

Tna Paulus ykyas renti yawe, “Bokyas reto to, Daud ykyas ait yesait fee. Daud yno bo ro Allah ybis kʼait yno mam wore wo tiwya ait yhau fares to. Ait yno bo weto mkak tna ait yhai. Tna raa makah hai rait mamo sama mam yuk ro tiwya raa sama hohos na wait ye. Tna hai rait mrok mnis.
Menohe hai ro Yesus mnis makus mfi Daud fee: Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen.
Taja, tano na; nri oh. Nhar oh. Bo ro Yesus yno oh mi mno re Allah yyon iro raa to.
Tna awya ro smot Ait to, kbe Allah yyon iro wait beta. Tibyo Allah yawe ait retait raa ro yhaf moof ati. Menohe Watum ro Musa mno raa mhaf wana moof ati feto fee.
Tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mama mkom mawe,
‘Meen, mam wore wo anu nhau to, kbe Jõ tno bo ro msai sau. Kbe raa betoo bo reto kʼanu. Menohe kbe anu nri tna nfot fee. Kbe anu nmus-amas Ait. Kbe anu nrok ntak ye. Tna kbe anu nhai beta.’”
Habakuk 1:5
Nri smot Yesus be kbe bokyas reto mai kʼanu ye.
Tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mama mkom mawe,
‘Meen, mam wore wo anu nhau to, kbe Jõ tno bo ro msai sau. Kbe raa betoo bo reto kʼanu. Menohe kbe anu nri tna nfot fee. Kbe anu nmus-amas Ait. Kbe anu nrok ntak ye. Tna kbe anu nhai beta.’”
Habakuk 1:5
Nri smot Yesus be kbe bokyas reto mai kʼanu ye.
Paulus ysya Barnabas mkyas bo mkak. Tna raa frok samu skabuk reto mamo. Mamo tna raa weto soh-soh ana mbewok mawe, “Amu ksoh anu mbewok ne nma nkyas bo reto u kʼamu. Nma nkyas mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
ro rouu ro mama naut.”
Raa skabuk mkak. Tna raa mawat kro Paulus ysya Barnabas mamo. Ana weto to, raa ro Yahudi ye tna msya raa ro mbam rabin roto menohe ro kro
ro Yahudi ye. Tna ana mbewok reto mkyas kʼana mawe, “Mkah tak ro Allah rAit to, nhau smot Ait yoyo.”
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh rouu to, raa ro
reto beta mama siret mari bokyas ro Allah.
Menohe raa ro Yahudi mmat raa msis weto mari bo ro Paulus ykyas to, ana hawe. Tna mrok mhaf mkair. Tibyo ana mamus ana mbewok. Tna besboh bo ro ana mawe.

Menohe Paulus ysya Barnabas waa fee. Ana me mawe kʼana ro Yahudi weto mawe, “Allah ybis amu nkyas watum rAit kʼanu wia matim. Menohe anu hawe bo nri. Anu nnaut nwe anu noof mnan si, tibyo meen nkai nmos mae fe mfe a? Anu hawe bo nri Watum ro Allah feto to, kbe amu haberek kbor wamu tna nmo nkyas kʼraa mana roto.
Feto ye
ybis amu yawe,
‘Jõ tsok nyõ mkah namo nnan nfi kek. Kbe nyõ nram iso kʼraa rabin roto makin. Re kbe nyõ nakah riof ro mase namo nee kʼraa ro mhau mam arin aso beta.’”
Yesaya 49:6
Raa mbam raa mana roto mari feto, tibyo mrok simaut mase. Ana mawe bokyas ro
reto moof syok. Tna raa ro tiwya Allah ysok yawe meen mkai mamos mae to, ana mama smot Yesus beta.
Tna bokyas ro
raa makah mamo mkyas mam rabin reto beta.
Menohe raa ro Yahudi mkyas-kas Paulus ysya Barnabas. Ana mkyas kʼfnya manes ro mhau mam
reto tna ro ja waa Allah ye. Tna mamus ana mbewok kʼraa ro mase ye. Tibyo fnya msya raa wefo sikowah Paulus ysya Barnabas tna mikyak ana mbewok frok mamo mbam oo rana ye.
Paulus ysya Barnabas ngkaru bohasyaf ro mhau kʼana mbewok maa to war feto.
Tna mbewok masen mamoʼt remo ro Ikonium.
Raa ro smot Yesus mam Antiokhia simaut mase tna Har ro Allah mbo ana matak ye.

Mam remo ro Ikonium Paulus ysya Barnabas mno bo ro ja ana mno soo oh: Ana mbewok twok mam samu skabuk ro raa Yahudi tna mkyas Yesus yasom. Mkyas bo kaket, tibyo raa ro Yahudi msya raa ro Yunani ye msis-sas mama smot Yesus.
Menohe raa ro Yahudi taro hawe smot Yesus. Ana weto mkyas-kas ana mbewok kʼraa ro wase Allah. Mno raa mrok kmo ana ro smot Yesus.
Paulus ysya Barnabas mbewok mhau ti mawat baro kait ye mam beto. Ana mbewok mkyas
yasom kʼraa. Ana waa fee. Ana mkyas boatmof ro
Tna Ait yoo yatak rAit yee kʼana re mbewok mno bo ro msai. Ana sair bo ro hnah re kbe raa mmat tibyo mhar mawe ana mkyas bo ati, ana sioh fee.
Raa ro mhau mam remo reto to, mhaf sau fee: Taro ksoh Paulus ysya Barnabas. Tna taro ksoh raa Yahudi ro hawe smot Yesus.

Ana ro hawe smot Yesus weto to taro raa ro Yahudi msya raa manes wana. Tna taro to, raa mana roto tna msya raa manes wana. Ana weto beta saim bo su mawe mfot ana mbewok afo re ana mno bo ro mkair mai kʼana. Mawe mawah fraa mai ana majat bo ye.
Ana mbewok mari feto, tibyo ana msam mamoʼt rabin ro Likaonia. Ana mamoʼt remo ro Listra, remo ro Derbe msya tabam ro kene mam remo weto. Mamoʼt rabin ro Likaonia reto tna mkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
renti.
Ana mbewok mari feto, tibyo ana msam mamoʼt rabin ro Likaonia. Ana mamoʼt remo ro Listra, remo ro Derbe msya tabam ro kene mam remo weto. Mamoʼt rabin ro Likaonia reto tna mkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
renti.
Ana mamo snok mam remo ro Listra to, ait ro yaa mhai sait hre. Ait tait, tii tinyi fnya mabe to, yaa mhai oh. Tna ja yamo fefares.
Ait hre yari bo ro Paulus ykyas. Paulus yasu sayõ ait tna ynaut yawe bosmot rait matak. Bosmot rait matak re kbe Allah yisoh yaa rait moof matak.
Paulus ymat feto, tibyo yawe mkah ymai ro mase yawe, “Nasen nros ntrot.” Tibyo ait retait yrok sontor yasen yros tna yamo ye.

Raa msis-sas mmat bo ro Paulus yno feto. Tibyo masen mmai mnin. Ana mkyas mkah mmai rana ro Likaonia mawe, “Ana mbewok refo raa sai fee. Ana mbewok refo allah mefo. Ana haberek mamo mfi raa sai tna mbam sawro wana mama mo kʼanu oh mefo!”
Ja Barnabas ykyas bo kebet sai, tibyo ana mtu yasom Zeus mfi allah rana sait. Tna Paulus ja ykyas bo mawat tibyo ana mtu yasom allah Hermes.
Tna
yanes sait yama ye.
retait tait, yoo tafuf fayir
ro sme baro. Fayir tna yakah
weto yamo frok remo kitana wore samu sahfra ro Zeus rait mhau. Ait ysya raa msis-sas mawe ktan
weto mee kʼPaulus ysya Barnabas. Mawe mee mkah bo mbaut ana mbewok.

Ana mbewok mari feto tna hawe. Hawe tibyo ana mbewok mhah ratan wana ro mesait myum mawe, “Raa wefo mnaut mawe amu fo mfi allah sor ro ja ana smot!” Tna ana mbewok mhoh mamo mbukak iti mam raa msis-sas wefo masuf susai tna mtu mawe,
“Anu nkin; nri oh! Nno bo refo nno fyi? Nhar nwe amu fo Allah fee. Amu fo raa sai, nnan anu ye. Bokyas Moof ro mkyas Yesus
to, amu nkyas kʼanu afo re anu sikba bosmot wanu ro mkair weto tna nma smot Allah ro yaam. Ait oh mi yfen ayoh msya tabam refo tna yfen aya sawan msya bombra ro mhau mam wore weto beta to.
Ti bose oh to, Ait yhau sayõ raa mana sau-sau beta mamo iso wana mamyot bo ro ana mhaf wana ksoh sai.

Ait sayõ raa mno feto to, menohe Ait sikba ana makus fee. Ait yerif Ait kʼraa mam bo moof msis-sas ro Ait yno kʼanu. Bo moof ro Ait yno kʼanu oh mefo: Ait yno oom mais mbam ayoh tna yno boit msya bobat moo moof mam armato wanu ye. Tna yoo boit yee kʼanu niit re nhaf mnan tna yno anu simaut mase ye.”
Ana mbewok mkyas feto re mno wa raa makin weto kbe mno bo reto ma tna mbaut ana feto ma. Raa weto mawe beroh msan bo kʼana mbewok menohe mfe.
Ti baro firwas, tna raa ro Yahudi baro mbam

ro Antiokhia msya remo ro Ikonium mama. Mama, tna mkyas bo haberek hren msya myoh moo raa makin refo afo re ana haberek knait Paulus. Tibyo ana mai ait mkah fraa. Mai mkak oh tna ana mrok mawe ait yajat oh. Tibyo mkuk ajat rait frok mamo beak mam remo mne.
Menohe raa ro smot Yesus mama mros mur mtan kʼait, tna ait yrok yasen tna twok mam remo reto u. Tna rabu ti fo ait ysya Barnabas mbewok masen frok remo reto mamo renti remo ro Derbe.
Paulus ysya Barnabas ana mamoʼt remo ro Derbe, tna mkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
mam beto. Tna raa msis mama smot Yesus. Tna ana mbewok mhah mamoʼt Listra, Ikonium msya Antiokhia mam rabin ro Pisidia ye.
Tna mam
weto to, ana mkyas bo kʼraa ro smot Yesus mawe, “Nros natak nbo bosmot wanu matak. Soh anu ksoh bmo raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, kbe anu bkai bo ro samyoh mawat.”
Tna mam
sau-sau Paulus ysya Barnabas msok
taro mkah bo kmot raa ro smot Yesus mam
wana. Ana mbewok mhau bo ro mait tna skabuk msan
weto
ro ana smot. Tna ait yayoh yawe
yatam
weto.
Ana mbewok mamo mur mam rabin ro Pisidia mkak, tna twok mam rabin ro Pamfilia.
Tna ana mkyas watum ro
mam remo ro Perga. Mkyas mkak, tna mamo siya snok mam remo ro Atalia.
Tna ana mbam beto maut
hah me mamoʼt
ro Antiokhia mam
ro Siria. (Tiwya

ro mhau mam Antiokhia oh mi ro mbis Paulus ysya Barnabas mamo mkyas Yesus yasom mam rabin roto taro to. Tiwya ana skabuk mayoh Allah mawe Ait yatam ana mbewok wore woyõ-woya sai mamo. Tna mayoh mawe Allah yoo bouum ye kʼana mbewok, yno re raa mari bokyas ro ana mkyas, tibyo mama smot Yesus. Paulus ysya Barnabas mkyas Yesus yasom mam rabin roto mkak.)
Tna ana snok si mam
ro Antiokhia. Ana mbewok mtu raa
reto beta mama siret su. Tna fo ana mbewok mkyas bombra beta ro ana mno mkah tak ro Allah rAit. Tna mawe Allah yitrah amah rait tna yawe raa mbam raa mana roto ye mama smot
ye.
Tna fo ana mbewok mhau baro kait msya raa ro smot Yesus mam beto ye.
Raa baro mbam Yudea mamaʼt Antiokhia tna mkyas kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam beto mawe, “Soh anu
fee mamyot watum ro Musa ykyas feto, kbe anu nkai riof fee ye.”
Menohe Paulus ysya Barnabas ana mbewok hafrah bo ro ana mkyas reto. Ana masen santri bo msya raa weto. ⌞Tna
ro Antiokhia wase kbe Allah yawe ana
ku sme wana fe mfe a?⌟ Wase, feto mnaut mawe ana mtu kʼraa ro mhar bo reto. Tna ana msok raa baro mbis ana mamoʼt Yerusalem. Mbis ana mamo mkyas bo reto su msya raabis
ro Yesus wAit msya raa manes roto. Tna ana msok Paulus ysya Barnabas msya raa baro mbam Antiokhia ye. Msok ana weto to, mbis mamoʼt Yerusalem tna mtu mawe, “Kbe anu, raa Kristen
ku sme wanu fe mfe a?”
Raa Kristen ro Antiokhia to, ana mkyas bo reto mkak tna masen mamo betne Paulus ysya raa weto sor mamo snok
rana reto makit.
Paulus, Barnabas msya raa
ro kro ana mamo iso rabin ro Fenisia msya
ro Samaria. Mam iso maka iti to, ana fri raa Kristen ro mbam raa mana ro Yahudi baro. Paulus ysya raa ro kro ait mkyas bo kʼana mawe, “Raa ro mbam raa mana roto to, ana taro mashana tna smot
Yesus oh!” Raa Kristen mari feto tibyo simaut mase toni ye.
Paulus ysya Barnabas msya raa Kristen ro mbam Antiokhia weto mamo snok mam Yerusalem. Tna raa Kristen ro mhau mam Yerusalem mmah meen kʼana. (Raa weto oh mi raabis ro Yesus wAit, raa ro
msya raa Kristen taro ye.) Paulus ysya Barnabas mkyas bo ro Allah yno to. Mawe ja ana mamo mkyas Yesus yasom, tna raa rabin roto, ro Yahudi fee, ana to mawat mama smot Yesus ye.
Menohe raa ro
baro ro smot Yesus mari bo reto ye. Ana mari feto tna masen mros mawe, “Raa ro Yahudi fee, ro mama smot Yesus ye oh to,
ana ye! Tna nbis ana kro Watum ro Musa ye!”
Raabis weto msya raa
taro hre su mkyas bo reto mawe, “Allah yawe kbe raa beta
ku sme wana fe mfe a?”
Ana hre mkyas bo reto baro kait ye oh. Tna Petrus yasen yros yawe, “Taja nsya tao na; anu nhar nwe tiwya Allah ysok jõ tbam kʼanu mkah bo jõ tamo tkyas Bokyas ro Moof
kʼraa mana roto makin. Yno afo re ana mama smot Yesus ye.
Allah yhar raa mhaf mato beta. Tna Ait yawe Ait ksoh ana ye. Tna yoo Har rAit yse kʼana ye mnan fi Ait yse Har rAit yse kʼanu raa ro Yahudi to. Yno re kbe anu bhar bwe Ait ksoh ana weto ye.
Allah ysok anu hayah tna ana hayah fee. Ana smot Yesus tibyo Ait yisoh ana mhaf mato wana moof ye.
Kaket anu! Sanet Allah ma! Anu besait bsya hohos wanu hrowyõ bhai kro bo mafa ranu kaket to. Fyi re anu nnaut nwe Ait ksoh raa rabin roto masom bo fanes reto ye?
Riof ro anu bkai to mbam boatmof ro
Yesus
rAit sai. Mbam bo mafa ramu to fee! Tna ana weto mkai riof mam iso ro bosmot ye mnan anya!”

Tna Paulus ysya Barnabas masen mkyas bo. Ana mkyas mawe “Allah yoo yatak rAit yee kʼamu mbewok re nno bo ro msai. Amu sair bo ro hnah re kbe raa mana roto mmat tna mhar Ait yase rait.” Raa ro siret weto hre shait sai mari.
Paulus ysya Barnabas mkyas bo wana mkak. Tna fo Yakobus yasen yawe, “Taja nsya tao na; nri oh!
Simon-Petrus riwai ykyas bo ro tna sai tinyi rau! Ait betoo yawe Allah yatmof tna ysok raa taro mbam raa mana roto mamo raa wAit ye.
Bo reto mamo mamyot bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
na mama mkom mawe,
‘Meen Jõ thah te tama tisoh samu
ro Daud rait. Samu rait reto tiwya matu tna kbe te sgi u. Bombra ro tiwya nsasi beta meen me mros matak.
Jõ tno feto afo re raa ro Yahudi, tna msya raa ro rabin roto beta kbe saso Jõ. Ana weto tiwya wase Jõ. Menohe jõ ttu ana weto ye, tawe ana mamo ku woJõ to. Kbe meen ana saso Jõ ye.
Allah yesait ykyas bo reto.
Tiwya tinyi ykyas bo reto beta re kbe raa mhar.’”
Tna Yakobus yawe, “Feto to jõ tnaut tawe, raa ro rabin roto weto, anu bbis bwe ana kro bo mafa wanu beta ma, ana ksoh rana sai. Kbe anu bno bo ro nririt wa iso kʼana mama mo kʼAllah to ma.
Jõ tnaut tawe anu bkom aam sau tee kʼana. Bkom aam bwe:
1. Sohmaam bo ro raa moo msan
oh to ma.
2. Tna nwyah bo to ma ye.
3. Nbo kak kwiyan ro mees mhau fares to ma.
4. Nta mees ro kak raa ktan to ma.
⌞Soh ana kro bo mafa wanu weto sai to, kbe moof. Kbe anu ro Yahudi hrenaut fee. Tna kbe anu biranya moof sai.⌟

Watum ro Musa mkyas mawe bo weto beta raa ro Yahudi mbau. Mam woyõ-woya sai tiwya bose oh, ja raa wanu bkyas bo reto. Feto to raa mhar oh. Tna anu raa ro Yahudi bmat bokyas reto mam samu skabuk wanu ye. Anu bmat bokom reto mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
yoyo.”
Tna fo raabis ro
wAit, raa
msya raa ro ja smot
taro ye, ana beta hre mkyas bo su. Tna ana mawe msok raa mabo baro mbam ana makin weto tna mbis ana mamoʼt
ro Antiokhia. Ana msok raa manes mabo ewok: Yudas-Barsabas ysya Silas. Tna mbis ana mbewok kro Paulus ysya Barnabas mhah me mamoʼt Antiokhia.
Tna ana weto sor mkom aam sau mee kʼYudas ysya Silas mbewok mbo makah mamo. Aam reto mkyas mawe,
“Taja, tme, tao, tano na ro nbam raa mana roto; amu nkom aam refo nee kʼanu ro nhau mam Antiokhia, tna ro nhau mam remo taro mam
ro Siria, msya
ro Kilikia ye. Meen oh kʼanu beta.
Amu nri raa mabo baro mama mo kʼanu, tna ana mkyas bo ro mno anu nrok susit ye. Amu aro nbis ana nwe ana mama mkyas bokyas feto fee.
Riwai amu nhau mam Yerusalem to, siret su tna nkyas bo reto. Tna amu nsok Yudas-Barsabas ysya Silas tna nbis ana mbewok refo mama mo kʼanu. Ana kro Paulus ysya Barnabas, ro ja amu ksoh to, mama.
Yudas ysya Silas ja mros mana matim mno bo ro
ybis kʼana sai.
Feto oh mi amu nbis ana mbewok mamo mo kʼanu to. Ana oh mi kbe mama mkyas watum ramu reto kʼanu kait mamyot si aam ro amu nkom refo fo.
Amu hawe bo nbis anu nno bo ro samyoh. Tna Har ro
mkyas bo reto kʼanu ye mnan anya. Feto to amu nsi bo wefo kʼanu sai:
1. Sohmaam boit ro raa moo msan
oh to ma.
2. Nta mees ro kak raa ktan to ma.
3. Nbo kak kwiyan ro mees mhau fares to ma.
4. Tna nwyah bo to ma ye.
Bokom wamu kebet sai oh mefo, mkah bo watum anu afo re anu nberhasyoh raa ro Yahudi to ma. Meen oh kʼanu beta.”
Amu hawe bo nbis anu nno bo ro samyoh. Tna Har ro
mkyas bo reto kʼanu ye mnan anya. Feto to amu nsi bo wefo kʼanu sai:
1. Sohmaam boit ro raa moo msan
oh to ma.
2. Nta mees ro kak raa ktan to ma.
3. Nbo kak kwiyan ro mees mhau fares to ma.
4. Tna nwyah bo to ma ye.
Bokom wamu kebet sai oh mefo, mkah bo watum anu afo re anu nberhasyoh raa ro Yahudi to ma. Meen oh kʼanu beta.”
Raa Kristen ro mhau mam Yerusalem weto ana mmah meen kʼana mabo jiit reto. Tna fo ana masen mamoʼt Antiokhia.
Raa mabo jiit reto snok mam Antiokhia. Tna ana mtu raa Kristen beta ro mhau mam beto sor mawe mama siret beta. Tna ana m
aam reto kʼana beta.
Raa mari bokyas ro aam reto to, ana simaut mase.
Yudas ysya Silas to, mbewok
ro ja Allah ybis mkyas bo wAit to ye. Tna wore wo ana mhau mam beto to, ana mkyas bo kʼraa ro smot Yesus. Bo ro mbewok mkyas reto to, mno bosmot wana matak.

Ana mbewok mhau mam Antiokhia ti baro firwas. Tna ana masen mawe hah me mamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna raa Kristen mmah meen kʼana mbewok tna mawe kbe ana mbewok mmah meen kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam Yerusalem ye. Tna mawe mayoh asik mase kʼraa ro mbis ana mbewok mama to ye. [
Menohe Silas yawe ait yhau wia fares mam Antiokhia.]
Paulus ysya Barnabas mhau mam Antiokhia ti baro naut mkah bo mkyas watum ro
kʼraa ro mhau mam beto ye. Tna raa Kristen mawat taro ye mkyas watum ro
mam beto ye.
Mhau ti baro naut tna Paulus yawe kʼBarnabas yawe, “Anu mbewok hah be bmoʼt
ro tiwya bkyas
yasom sor to no. Tawe anu be bmo bmat raa ro mama smot Yesus tna sor to. Feto kbe anu bhar soh ana mhau smot Yesus matak fe mfe a?”
Barnabas ait ksoh ymen Yohanes ro ja raa mtu yasom Markus tait, kro ana mamo ye.
Tiwya Markus yasen sikba ana mam Pamfilia. Feto oh mi Paulus ait hawe bo ymen Markus kro ana mamo u fee.
Feto tibyo Paulus ysya Barnabas kmo anya toni tibyo ana mbetne-tna anya: Sait yasen yamo hayah-hayah. Barnabas ait ymen Markus kro ait maut wiak
mamoʼt sato ro Siprus.
Tna Paulus ymen Silas kro ait mamo ye. Tna raa ro Kristen weto skabuk
afo re bouum rait mhau matam ana mbewok.
Paulus ysya Silas mbewok mamo mur mtan mam
ro Siria msya
ro Kilikia. Ana mkyas watum ro
reto kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam rabin weto sor to, tibyo bosmot wana mrok matak ye.

Paulus yasen yamoʼt remo ro Derbe tna fo yamoʼt remo ro Listra ye. Mam weto ait fri ku ro sme sait yasom Timotius. Timotius ja smot Yesus. Ait yme, fnya mbam fnya mana ro Yahudi. Tna fai au reto smot Yesus ye. Timotius, ait yaja ybam raa mana ro Yunani.
Raa ro ja smot Yesus ro mhau mam Listra msya Ikonium to, ana ksoh Timotius, mawe ait raa ro ja yno bo moof ye.

Paulus ksoh yawe Timotius kro ait mamo ye. Menohe raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi ana mhar mawe Timotius yaja tait, ybam raa mana ro Yunani. Tna ana mhar mawe soh Timotius ynan anya ysya raa ro Yahudi, raa ro Yahudi kbe ksoh mari bo ro ana mkyas. Feto tibyo Paulus
Timotius wia.
Tna Paulus, Silas, ysya Timotius masen mamoʼt
makin. Mamo mmat raa ro smot Yesus. Ana mbo aam raabis
ro Yesus msya
tiwya mkom mam Yerusalem. Tna mkyas aam reto kʼraa
weto mawe, “Ana mbis mawe anu kro bo mafa raa ro Yahudi ja mno beta ma, kro bo ro raa mkom mam aam refo sai tna nbo nno ye.”
Tibyo raa ro smot Yesus sor fo, bosmot wana mrok matak. Tna rabu ti wawa to raa roto taro mama smot Yesus ye.
Har ro
mkyas kʼPaulus, Silas, ysya Timotius mawe, “Nmo nkyas Watum ro Allah mam rabin ro Asia ma!” Feto tibyo ana mamo twat sai mkyas Watum ro Allah mam rabin ro Frigia msya
ro Galatia sai.
Ana mama snok mam kitana
ro Misia tna ana sik twok mam
ro Bitinia ye menohe Har ro Yesus mno wa mawe, “Ntwok mam
reto ma!”
Feto tibyo ana mamo miwrek
ro Misia iti tna mamoʼt remo ro Troas.
Mti reto Paulus ait yjin smi ymat raa ro Makedonia sait yros tna soh-soh ait yawe, “Paulus: Nasen namaʼt
ro Makedonia nmat amu ye!”
Paulus ymat bo reto, tna amu
srau nwe Allah ybis amu nsen nmo nkyas watum rAit kʼraa ro Makedonia ye. Feto tna amu siwyan bo wamu tna nsen nmoʼt Makedonia.
Amu sikba remo ro Troas tna nuut
nhoh nmoʼt sato ro Samotrake. Tna rabu ti to amu nmo nuut
nmo renti nmoʼt remo ro Neapolis ye.
Tna nbam Neapolis nsen nmoʼt Filipi,
ro mase tinyi mam
ro Makedonia reto.
ro Filipi to,
Roma mbo.) Amu nhau ti baro mam beto ye.
Ayõ ro raa ntmoh
to, amu nsen nmoʼt aya sau ro kene mam
reto makit. Amu nnaut nwe raa ro kro
Yahudi ja mamo skabuk su mam yuk reto. Tibyo amu nmo hre su nsya fnya sor ro riwai mamo matim tna hre su mam yuk reto wea. Hre tna nkyas bo nsya ana.
Ana weto, sau masom Lidia. Fai au mbam remo ro Tiatira. Au ja mkah bo mtaus hawee ro mkek. Lidia ja smot Allah. Au hre mari Paulus ykyas Yesus yasom. Tna
yno au mrok mhaf smot Yesus ye.
Lidia msya raa ro amah rau mawe raa
ana. Tna au mawe kʼamu mawe, “Anu nhar nwe jõ smot Yesus. Soh feto to, nma, kbe anu njin mam samu ramu ye, mbau a.” Fai au matak sai mawe amu nma. Tibyo amu nmo nhau mam amah rau.

Ati sau amu nmoʼt yuk ro raa skabuk. Tna amu fri ku sau. Ku au reto raa awe. Awe reto ja kabes mbo tna au mkyas bo ro meen btek mai kʼraa. Tna ja raa mama mtu tane bo kʼau ye. Pitis ro raa moo mee reto, ku au mbo fee, moo mee kʼbobot wau. Awe reto ja moo pitis mawat mee kʼbobot wau ye.
Ati reto to, awe reto kro Paulus ysya amu mam tis. Tna mmai wer mawe, “Raa wefo fo raabis Allah ro yase wAit! Ana mama merif iso ro kbe raa mamo tna mkai riof ro mase!”
Ti mawat ye oh ku au reto mno feto yoyo sai. Tna Paulus ynaif fasa yari bo ku au reto mtu feto. Tna ait haberek yawe kabes ro mbo au reto yawe, “Mkah
Yesus yasom: Jõ tikyak nyõ tawe nfrok nbam ku au reto namo!” Feto si to kabes reto sikba ku au, frok mamo.
Tna bobot ro ja mtos ku au sor to, kmo mawe, “Nno fyi meto! Wore kbe amu tru pitis aro u fee oh?” Tna ana mfot Paulus ysya Silas mamoʼt
msan ana mbewok kʼraa ro sbe.
Tna ana makah Paulus ysya Silas mamo msan renti kʼaban mana ro mbo
reto. Ana sioh maun boun mawe, “Raa ro Yahudi wefo fo mno raa ro befo mrok mnin-nin.
Ana sobu mawe anu bno bo mafa wana. Mawe ksoh anu bno bo miwer watum ro Roma, miwer
ja mbis!”
Raa ro berur su weto mari feto tna ana mrok mamus Paulus ysya Silas ye. Tna aban mana ro mbo
reto mbis raa mhah ratan wana mbewok mbam ana metsu tna mbis raa moo too mok-mak ana mbewok ye.
Ana mbewok raa mmok-mak mkak. Tna makah mamo mbu mam
Aban mana ro mbo
mbis raa kmot ana mbewok matak toni.
Tibyo raa sbe ro kmot ana ybu ana mbewok mam amah hawar ro mhau masuf susai. Tna make ana mbewok maa ye.
Arin masuf to, Paulus ysya Silas mbewok skabuk tna mji howes ye kʼAllah. Tna raa taro sor mhau mam
reto ye. Ana weto hre mari bo ana mbewok skabuk tna mji howes feto si fo
iin ro msai frok sin amah reto. Mato beta mrok masoh maa. Tna bo ro raa make to mrok hri-hra beta ye.
Raa sbe ro kmot ana yrok yasen. Tna ait ymat he mato ro
reto mrok masoh maa beta. Ait ynaut yawe raa ro ait kmot weto beta frok msam mamo oh. Tibyo yayõ tfo rait yawe takoh ait. Ait ynaut yawe yhau ma kbe
Kaisar ybis raa mame ait yajat ye.
Menohe Paulus ytu mkah ymai ro mase yawe, “Ntakoh nyõ ma! Amu beta nhau fares mefo!”
Tna raa sbe retait yayoh tafoh tna ybo yhoh yamoʼt
mato. Yamo yo kʼPaulus ysya Silas to, ait tetet tna ysit yimna mam tabam.
Tna yasen yakah ana mbewok frok mne. Tna ytu yawe, “Jõ tno bawya re kbe jõ tkai riof ro mase?”
Paulus ysya Silas mawe, “Smot
Yesus afo re kbe nyõ nkai riof ro mase. Tna raa wonyõ ye: Soh ana smot
to, kbe ana mkai riof ro mase ye.”
Tna Paulus ysya Silas betoo Watum ro
kʼraa sbe retait ysya ana ro mhau mam amah rait beta.
Mti reto ye ait yyon tna yisoh yaaf wana ye. Tna ait ysya raa wait ro mhau mam amah rait beta mawe ana mbewok
ana ye.
Tna fo bi ait yakah Paulus ysya Silas yamoʼt amah rait, tna yasyõ boit yama yee kʼana mbewok mait ye. Ait ysya raa wait smot Yesus tibyo ana simaut mase toni syok.
Rabu momo to aban mana
ro Filipi sor mbis raa sbe wana mamoʼt
tna tufrok Paulus ysya Silas re ana mamo bana.
Tna raa sbe ro kmot ana mbewok retait ykyas bo reto kʼPaulus yawe, “Aban mana ro
refo sor riwai mbis mawe raa tufrok anu mbewok nmo. Feto to nmo oh. Tna meen oh kʼanu.”
Menohe Paulus yawe si kʼraa sbe ro riwai mama weto yawe, “Amu mbewok fo raa ro Roma. Nmo nkyas bo reto kʼaban mana weto. Nwe ana mesait miwer watum ro
Roma: Taa ana mbis raa mmok-mak amu mam wore raa makin mmat. Tna mbu amu mam
ye. Mno feto menohe mtu srah ranu mbewok fefares! Bo ro ana mno reto mkair toni! Tna mfo refo ana mawe mbis amu nmo shait sai a? Feto to amu hawe ye. Amu nwe kbe aban mana ro mbo
refo mesait makah mabo kait mamaʼt befo afo re tufrok amu to saah.”
Raa sbe weto hah me mamo mkyas bo weto kʼaban mana weto. Ana weto mari he Paulus ysya Silas ana
Roma, feto tibyo aban mana weto mrok waa.
Tna mesait mamo mo kʼana mbewok mam
Tna makah ana mbewok frok mamo, tna soh-soh ana ye mawe, “Nmo frok nbam
ramu oh!”
Tna fo Paulus ysya Silas mamoʼt amah ro fai Lidia rau. Ana fri raa ro smot Yesus taro ye mam beto. Ana mbewok mkyas bo moof kʼraa weto. Tna fo mbewok masen mamo renti.
Paulus ysya Silas masen mamo renti naut. Ana mamo iti snok mam remo ro Amfipolis msya remo ro Apolonia. Tna fo ana mbewok snok mam
ro Tesalonika. Samu skabuk raa ro Yahudi sau mhau mam beto ye.
Mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
to, Paulus ja yamoʼt samu skabuk reto, ykyas Bokom ro Allah. Tiwya yno bo reto mfi bo mafa ro ja ait yno sor to, yno muhrin tuuf oh. Tna mam ayõ reto ye Paulus yamoʼt samu skabuk ye.
Ait yasen betoo Watum ro Allah kʼraa ro Yahudi weto. Yawe, “Bokom ro Allah mkyas
Mkyas mawe kbe Ait ykai bo ro samyoh: Raa mame Ait yajat. Tna mam ti ro tuuf to, kbe Ait yrok yasen ye.” Ykyas Bokom ro Allah ro ana mhar oh reto. Tna betoo afo re ana srau mawe Yesus tait
to.

Bokyas ro Paulus matak toni. Tibyo raa ro hre mari weto to, taro mama smot Yesus: Raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye, raa ro ja smot Allah mbam raa mana ro Yunani mawat ye, msya fnya manes mawat ye. Ana mama smot Yesus tna kro Paulus ysya Silas ye.
Menohe raa ro Yahudi ro hawe smot Yesus fee to, ana mmat feto tibyo mrok mhaf mkek. Tna ana mamoʼt
tna saso raa ro mkair. Saso raa ro ja mira mboh-bah sai. Tna mtu ana ro ja mamo-ama sai mama. Raa ro Yahudi weto mbis ana ro mkair weto mamo mno raa ro
reto beta mrok mnin-nin. Tna fo raa mkbair reto mamo twok mam amah bi sait ro yasom Yason. Ana mawe saso Paulus ysya Silas re mfot tna makah mamo msan kʼraa.
He mfe, ana mbewok marak. Tibyo ana kmo mfot Yason ysya raa ro Kristen mabo baro ye. Mfot tna makah mkuk mamo msan kʼaban mana ro ja mbo
ro Tesalonika reto. Raa ro berur su weto maun kair ana. Mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Raa weto ja mno bo ro mkair mam woyõ-woya sai! Tna ana mawe mama mno bo ro mkair mam
ranu ye!
Yason fi ja yiranya ysya ana weto. Tna yoo ana yse mam amah rait ye. Raa ro Kristen ana mno bo ro mkair miwana bo ro
Kaisar yawe. Tna ana mkyas mawe Raa sait ro yasom Yesus yamo
ro yase.”
Raa ro Yahudi weto mkyas feto mno raa mrok mnin-nin. Aban mana ro ja mbo
reto kmo ye.
Tna ana mbis Yason ysya yafoh wait mabo ewok weto moo pitis aro mamo make safo reto. Tna fo raa bitsre ana mamo bana.
Raa ro Kristen waa kbe raa mno bo ro mkair mai kʼPaulus ysya Silas. Feto to mti reto ana mberuk ana mbewok, mbis ana masen mamoʼt remo ro Berea.
Paulus ysya Silas mamo snok mam Berea to, mbewok mamoʼt samu skabuk raa ro Yahudi.

Raa ro Berea to ja mno bo ro moof. Ana mfi raa ro Tesalonika to fee. Raa ro Berea ksoh toni mari Paulus ysya Silas mkyas Yesus yasom. Rabu ti wawa to raa weto mmat Bokom ro Allah. Mawe mmat re kbe ana mhar bo ro Paulus ykyas to, mamyot mfi Bokom ro Allah fe mfe a.
Tna raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi mawat mama smot Yesus. Tna raa manes mbam raa mana ro Yunani msya fnya manes wana taro mawat mama smot Yesus ye.

Menohe raa Yahudi ro mhau mam Tesalonika mari he Paulus ykyas Watum ro Allah mam remo ro Berea ye. Feto tibyo ana baro masen mamoʼt remo reto. Snok mam Berea ana mkyas kair Paulus. Ana mno raa kmo Paulus. Tna mawe kʼraa makin mawe, “Nri bokyas rait ma!”
Raa mana ro Kristen mari feto tna sobu Paulus mawe, “Nasen nsam wai namoʼt Atena wia.” (Atena to
sau ro mhau kene mam aya sawan maam.) Silas ysya Timotius mawe ana mbewok mhau akus mam Berea wea.
Tna raa betne Paulus yamo snok
ro Atena tna Paulus yawe kʼana yawe, “Hah ne nmoʼt Berea nbis Silas ysya Timotius mama srot mrof jõ.” Tna ana ro riwai betne Paulus weto hah me mamoʼt Berea.
Wore Paulus ste ana wea mam Atena to, ait sraujin toni ymat bo raa ro
reto ja smot
msis.
Tna re ait yamoʼt samu skabuk ykyas bo ysya raa ro Yahudi tna msya raa rabin roto ro ja smot Allah ye to. Tna rabu ti wawa Ait ykyas bo ysya raa ro ait fri mam
to ye.
Tna ait ykyas bo ysya
ro ja kro bonaut ro bi Epikuros tna ysya

ro ja watum bonaut wana mam samu sau ro masom Stoa ye. Paulus santri bo ysya raa ro kro bonaut weto to tna ana baro mawe kair ait mawe, “Bi ait refi yhar bo bawya ee? Ait yhar bo kebet baro sai menohe ait yasoh mase toni syok!” Ana taro mnaut mawe, “Ait ykyas kabes raa ro rabin roto taro meto.” (Paulus ykyas Yesus kʼana yawe Ait yrok yasen oh mi raa mkyas bo reto.)
Tna raa mfot Paulus makah mamo msan kʼraa ro beah srah mam Faut ro Areopagus. Mam weto ana mawe kʼait mawe, “Sik nkyas bokyas ro tna reto kʼamu re amu nri ye.
Bo ro nyõ nkyas reto to, bokyas ro tna fares. Sik betoo maja rau afo re amu nri tna nhar.”
(Raa ro Atena beta msya raa srim ro mhau mam beto to ana ksoh mari tna mkyas bo ro tna rioh sai.)
Paulus yasen yros mam wore raa siret mam Faut ro Areopagus reto yawe, “Anu raa ro Atena; jõ tamo te mam
ranu to, tna tmat
msis. Jõ trok tawe anu to raa ro mur-mur smot
sor. Tna jõ tmat wohat mkah bo anu nsan bosan
weto ye. Tna mam wohat sau raa mkom: ‘Wohat refo fo mkah raa msan bosan kʼallah sau ro ja raa wase.’ Allah ro anu smot menohe wase fares retait oh mi mfo refo Jõ tkyas kʼanu nri mefo.
Paulus yasen yros mam wore raa siret mam Faut ro Areopagus reto yawe, “Anu raa ro Atena; jõ tamo te mam
ranu to, tna tmat
msis. Jõ trok tawe anu to raa ro mur-mur smot
sor. Tna jõ tmat wohat mkah bo anu nsan bosan
weto ye. Tna mam wohat sau raa mkom: ‘Wohat refo fo mkah raa msan bosan kʼallah sau ro ja raa wase.’ Allah ro anu smot menohe wase fares retait oh mi mfo refo Jõ tkyas kʼanu nri mefo.
Allah ro yase retait, Ait yase yfen arin aso msya bombra beta, Ait oh mi yase ybo tabam msya ayoh to. Ait yhau mam samu ro raa sgi fee!
Bo rAit ro yse to aro mabut fee. Ait yayoh bo kʼraa sai fee. Ait oh mi yoo roon yee kʼraa. Ait oh mi yoo mafos rana yee kʼraa beta. Ait oh mi yoo bombra beta yee to.

Tiwya tinyi Allah yfen Adam wia. Tna mbam Adam Ait yfen raa mana beta. Yno ana betru tabam refo beta to. Ait oh mi ybis yawe anu raa sait-sait bhau mam makyon wore wo ait yme mabe ait. Tna yno raa mana mhau mam oo wana hayah-hayah wore ana mhau bo to.
Allah yfen raa afo re kbe ana saso Ait. Ait ksoh yawe raa ro saso Ait to. Yawe anu raa bkai Ait saah. Raa tru Ait saah. Ait yros rit fee.
Ait oh mi yoo yatak rAit yee tibyo anu baam, anu bnah to. Tna yno re anu bhau bno bo wanu ye bo to. Tiwya raa wanu ro ja sair bomna baro mawe, ‘Anu wefo beta ku ro Allah wAit ye.’
Anu fo ku ro Allah wAit beta tna anu baam tna bnah-nah ye. Feto to jõ tkyas kʼanu tawe Allah, ro yare anu to, Ait raa ro yaam ye tu oh. Nnaut nwe Allah tait yfi
ro raa mfen mbam fraa,
msya
bo ma.
Raa ro tiwya tinyi wase Allah to, ana mno-na bo sai. Tna Allah yros sayõ. Menohe mfo refo Ait ybis raa ro tabam refo beta yawe ana mashana tna smot Ait beta oh.

Allah ymah oon yawe meen ait yama ytu srah raa ro tabam refo beta. Raa sait ro tiwya Ait ysok to, meen yasen ytu srah yari. Ait retait yhar raa mhaf wana beta tna kbe yno bo rAit moof mnan si. Bi Ait retait tiwya yhau mam tabam refo. Tna raa mame yajat. Menohe Allah yno Ait retait yrok yasen. Yno Ait yrok yasen afo re raa beta kbe mhar mawe Ait retait Raa ro Allah ysok.”
Ati ro Paulus yawe raa retait yrok yasen feto, raa taro masah. Menohe ana taro mawe, “Amu ksoh nwe nyõ nama nkyas bo refo kʼamu u.”
Tna Paulus sikba ana yamo.

Raa ro mari bo ro Paulus ykyas reto, baro kro bonaut rait tna ana mama smot Yesus ye. Ana wefo fo sait yasom Dionisius, (Ait retait raa manes ro ja mtu srah mam Faut ro Areopagus.) ysya fai au ro masom Damaris, tna raa baro naut msya ana ye.
Tna fo Paulus sikba
ro Atena yamoʼt
ro Korintus.
Mam weto ait fri raa ro Yahudi sait yasom Akwila. (Ait raa mabe mam
ro Pontus.) Akwila ysya yfain Priskila raa srim. Ana mamaʼt Korintus mbam
ro Italia. (Ati reto to,
yase ro yasom Klaudius ybo Italia. Ait knait raa ro Yahudi tna ybis ana beta frok mbam
Roma mamo.
ro Roma mhau mam rabin rait ro Italia ye.) Ti ro Paulus ybam Atena yama to, ait yamo yo kʼana mbewok.
Bo ro ja ana mbewok mkah to, ana mfen
mnan bo ja Paulus ykah ye. Feto to ait yhau ysya ana mbewok tna ana mkah bo su.
Tna mam ayõ ro raa ntmoh
yoyo to, ja Paulus yamoʼt samu skabuk ykyas Yesus yasom. Raa ro Yahudi msya raa ro Yunani mama hre mari bo ro ait ykyas. Tna ait tomer yoo ana mhaf afo re ana smot Yesus ye.
Tna Silas ysya Timotius mbam Makedonia mama. Tna Paulus yitsre bo ro ja ykah. Yitsre bo yfen
tna ykyas Yesus yasom rabu ti wawa. Ait ykyas kʼraa ro Yahudi yawe, “Yesus tait

Menohe ana ro mbam raa mana ro Yahudi hawe mari bokyas ro Yesus. Ana kmo tna mamus Paulus. Feto tibyo ait yasen yamo. Tna ait yitut bohasyaf mbam ratan rait reto. Yno feto re kbe ana mhar mawe ait yitsre yatem kʼana yawe, “Soh bo ro mkair btek mai kʼanu to kanyin sai oh! Jõ tasom isti reto fee. Mfo refo jõ tamo tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin.”

Tibyo Paulus frok sikba samu skabuk reto tna ykyas bo mam weto u fee. Tna ait yamoʼt samu ro Titus-Yustus ro yhau kene mam weto. Bi Titus-Yustus tait raa ro ja smot Allah. Menohe ait raa mana ro Yahudi fee. Tna Paulus ykyas Yesus yasom mam samu rait reto.
Raa ro mhau mam Korintus, taro hawe smot Yesus. Menohe taro mawat ksoh mari bokyas ro Paulus ykyas reto. Ana weto mama smot Yesus tna mawe raa
ana ye. Ro mrok smot Yesus weto, raa sait yasom Krispus. Ait raa ro Yahudi. Tna ait yamo aban mana ro ja ybo samu skabuk ro
Yahudi mam
ro Korintus reto ye. Ait ysya raa ro mhau mam amah rait to, ana beta mama smot Yesus.
Ti sau fo Paulus yjin smi. Tna ait yari Allah ykyas bo kʼait yawe, “Waa ma. Jõ kbe tatam nyõ yoyo. Feto to nkyas Yesus yasom renti sai, shait ma. Raa mawat mam
refo fo raa woJõ. Feto kbe raa sait bo yno bo ro mkair mai kʼnyõ fee.”
Ti sau fo Paulus yjin smi. Tna ait yari Allah ykyas bo kʼait yawe, “Waa ma. Jõ kbe tatam nyõ yoyo. Feto to nkyas Yesus yasom renti sai, shait ma. Raa mawat mam
refo fo raa woJõ. Feto kbe raa sait bo yno bo ro mkair mai kʼnyõ fee.”
Tna re Paulus yhau mam Korintus
sau hariyah tna ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa.
Tna fo Galio yamo
mam
ro Akhaya reto. Tna raa ro
Yahudi mawat mkyas bo ro mkair mai kʼPaulus. Tna ana makah ait mamoʼt samu ro ja bi Galio ytu srah to.
Ana makah Paulus mamo mo kʼbi Galio tna maun boun kʼait mawe, “Bi ait refi yber safo mai kʼamu raa ro
Yahudi! Ait ykyas bosmot roto sau. Ait yno raa mawat miwer Watum ro Musa!”
Paulus yawe yros saak wa ait, menohe bi Galio sbi hri wa, yawe bo kʼraa ro Yahudi yawe, “Paulus yno safo fee. Tna ait yiwer
ro Roma fee ye. Fyi re anu nakah ait nma no kʼjõ fo?
Bo ro anu santri anya to bo ranu ro
Yahudi sai. Soh ait yiwer Watum ranu meto mi, anu nesait beah srah refo! Jõ hre susai ttu safo ro mnan feto fee!”
Tna fo ait yikyak ana frok mbam samu mato reto wore ja raa hre beah srah.

Tibyo raa ro Yahudi weto kmo. Ana beta haberek saka bi Sostenes to mai ait mam bohra samu reto. (Bi Sostenes fi aban mana ro ybo samu skabuk rana.) Tna bi Galio ymat rof bo raa mafa sai, yno wa bo fee ye.
Paulus yhau ti baro naut mam

ro Korintus. Tna fo ait ymah meen kʼraa ro Kristen akus. Tna Paulus, ysya Priskila msya Akwila masen mamoʼt remo ro Kengkrea. Mam Kengkrea Paulus yawe skabuk yoyo. Feto tna ait ymur yana mawyan. (Yno mamyot bo mafa raa ro Yahudi ja mno soh ati ro ana mawe skabuk kaket.) Tna ana mabo tuuf maut
mamoʼt
ro Siria.
Ana mamo snok mam
ro Efesus. Mam beto Paulus sikba ana tna ait yesait yamoʼt samu skabuk ykyas bo ysya raa ro Yahudi.
Raa ro Yahudi weto ana ksoh mari bo ro Paulus yawe. Ana mawe mabe ait mawe, “Namo ma! Nhau baro kait mam befo!” Menohe ait yawe, “Mfe, ayõ mkak oh.
Soh
ybis mi, meen jõ thah te tama to kʼanu u to.” Ait ymah meen kʼana akus tna yasen yaut
sikba Efesus yamo.
Tna Paulus yaut
yamoʼt
ro Kaisarea. Tna ait yroh mam beto yamo yaa iso mne yamo yut. Paulus ymah meen raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto sor. Tna fo yasen yamo renti yamo sia
ro Antiokhia.
Ait yhau mam Antiokhia ti baro. Tna fo ait yasen yamo ymat raa Kristen ro mhau mam
ro Galatia msya rabin ro Frigia. Yamo ymat
sor ykyas bo yno bosmot wana matak.
Tna raa ro Yahudi sait yasom Apolos yamoʼt Efesus. Ait raa mabe mam
ro Aleksandria. Apolos raa ro ykyas bo yasoh mnan-nan tna yhar Watum ro Allah kaket.
Tiwya raa mkyas Yesus yasom kʼait. Menohe ait yhar watum ro Yohanes
sai, yhar bokyas ro Yesus mabut-abat sai fares. Apolos ksoh toni ykyas Yesus yasom. Ait betoo kʼraa yawe Yesus tait
ro yoo riof ro mase yee kʼraa. Ait ykyas bo reto kaket ye.
Ti sau Apolos yros ykyas bo mam samu skabuk raa ro

Yahudi. Ait waa fee. Tna Priskila msya Akwila msya raa taro hre mari bo ro ait ykyas. Menohe ana mbewok mawe kʼanya mawe, “Bi ait refi yhar bokyas ro Yesus mnan fefares.” Tibyo ana mbewok masen sobu ait tna mmen ait ysya ana mamoʼt amah rana. Mam weto ana mbewok hre mbetoo Iso ro Yesus kaket kʼait. Tna bi Apolos ait hre shait sai, ksoh yari. Ait kmo fee.
Tna Apolos yawe ksoh yamoʼt
ro Akhaya. Tna raa Kristen ro mhau mam Efesus fo ana ksoh ye. Feto to ana mkom aam sau kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam Akhaya. Aam reto mkyas Apolos kʼana mawe ait raa ro yoof. Tna mbis raa
mam Akhaya mawe kbe ana mitrah amah wana tna mawe ait yhau ysya ana. Ana mee aam kʼApolos ybo. Tna ait sikba Efesus yamoʼt Akhaya.
Apolos frok mam Akhaya. Tna ykyas watum ro
mam beto. Ykyas bo kaket tna raa weto mari bo ro ait yawe. Mari tibyo mrok mhar boatmof ro Allah tna bosmot wana mo matak renti.
Apolos yamo yros mam wore raa makin mmat tna santri bo ysya raa ro
Yahudi ye. Tna ait betoo Bokom ro Allah kʼana kaket afo re ana mhar mawe Yesus tait
oh metait.
Wore wo Apolos yhau mam
ro Korintus fares, Paulus yamo iso safom twat snok mam
ro Efesus. Paulus snok mam Efesus to, ait fri raa ro ja smot Yesus baro.
Tna ait ytu kʼana yawe, “Anu smot Yesus oh, tna Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu ye fe mfefares a?” Menohe ana mawe si mawe, “Fefares. Amu ja nri raa mkyas Har rAit aro kʼamu fefares.”
Tna Paulus ytu kʼana yawe, “Feto tiwya raa
anu to, anu kro bokyas ro mbam kʼawya?” Menohe ana mawe, “Bokyas ro mbam Yohanes
Tna Paulus betoo makit rau yawe, “Tiwya Yohanes
raa ro mashana tna smot Raa sait ro kbe yama. Raa retait yasom Yesus.”
Ana mari feto tibyo mawe raa
ana mam
Yesus yasom.
Tna Paulus yoo yatem ytor abyõ kʼana skabuk. Tna Har ro Allah mroh mbo ana. Tibyo ana mmai mai ro ana wase fares mkyas bo ro Har merif kʼana tna mkyas watum ro mbam kʼAllah ye.
Raa sme weto beta mabo trion 12 bo feto.
Tna ja Paulus yamoʼt samu skabuk raa ro
Yahudi tna ykyas bo. Ait waa fee. Ait ykyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Ait yno feto mamo snok snyi trion tuuf. Ait yros santri bo ysya raa ro Yahudi weto, ykyas bo kaket.
Menohe ana baro beswan bo ro ait ykyas to. Ana mana mase sai tna hawe bo smot Yesus ye. Ana baro mkyas kair bokyas ro Paulus reto mawe, “Yesus tait

fee! Paulus yerif iso ro meen raa mkai riof ro mase meto fee ye!” Ana mno feto tibyo Paulus yasen sikba ana, tna ysya raa Kristen taro mamoʼt amah ro Tiranus rait. (Amah reto ja raa hre mkom bo ye. Amah reto mase toni.) Rabu ti wawa to ait hre ykyas bokyas ro Yesus mam beto.
Paulus yhau yno bo reto mamo snok

trion ewok. Tibyo raa ro mhau mam rabin ro Asia reto to, ana beta mari bokyas ro Yesus. Raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye msya raa mbam raa mana ro Yunani ye beta mari. Tna taro smot Yesus, tna taro smot fee ye.
Allah yoo yatak rAit yee kʼPaulus tibyo Paulus yno bo ro msai toni.

Tna raa mbo bo mabat ro ja Paulus ybo mam yatem karu yimyoh to, msya bo mabat ro ja ybin yaka bo sor to, mbo, makah mamo mee kʼraa ro kiyam to mbo. Tna Har ro Allah mno kiyam rana marak. Tna kabes ro mhau kʼana to frok msam sikba ana ye.
Raa botkif ro Yahudi mabo ngkrema ja mamo mam woyõ-weya sai. Mamo mikyak kabes frok mbam raa ro kiyam. Ana weto to ku mabo krema ro mao kʼanya, ku ro bi Skewa wait. (Bi Skewa tait
yanes ro Yahudi sait.) Ana weto mari he Paulus tkif raa mkah Yesus yatak rait. Tibyo ti sau ana weto mawe ana mikyak kabes frok mbam kʼraa ro kiyam mkah
Yesus yasom ye. He mfe: Ana mbis kabes sau mawe,

Yesus ro ja Paulus ykyas tait, mkah yasom rAit amu nikyak nyõ frok nbam raa retait!” Menohe ana mabo ngkrema weto smot Yesus fefares, tibyo ana mbo tak rAit fee ye. Ana mkyas feto menohe kabes reto mhau kʼraa retait tna mno raa retait yatak tna safo toni. Tna kabes reto mawe “Jõ thar Yesus ysya Paulus. Ana weto matak mikyak jõ saah. Menohe anu ntak fee!” Tna kabes reto frok fee.
Raa botkif ro Yahudi mabo ngkrema ja mamo mam woyõ-weya sai. Mamo mikyak kabes frok mbam raa ro kiyam. Ana weto to ku mabo krema ro mao kʼanya, ku ro bi Skewa wait. (Bi Skewa tait
yanes ro Yahudi sait.) Ana weto mari he Paulus tkif raa mkah Yesus yatak rait. Tibyo ti sau ana weto mawe ana mikyak kabes frok mbam kʼraa ro kiyam mkah
Yesus yasom ye. He mfe: Ana mbis kabes sau mawe,

Yesus ro ja Paulus ykyas tait, mkah yasom rAit amu nikyak nyõ frok nbam raa retait!” Menohe ana mabo ngkrema weto smot Yesus fefares, tibyo ana mbo tak rAit fee ye. Ana mkyas feto menohe kabes reto mhau kʼraa retait tna mno raa retait yatak tna safo toni. Tna kabes reto mawe “Jõ thar Yesus ysya Paulus. Ana weto matak mikyak jõ saah. Menohe anu ntak fee!” Tna kabes reto frok fee.
Raa botkif ro Yahudi mabo ngkrema ja mamo mam woyõ-weya sai. Mamo mikyak kabes frok mbam raa ro kiyam. Ana weto to ku mabo krema ro mao kʼanya, ku ro bi Skewa wait. (Bi Skewa tait
yanes ro Yahudi sait.) Ana weto mari he Paulus tkif raa mkah Yesus yatak rait. Tibyo ti sau ana weto mawe ana mikyak kabes frok mbam kʼraa ro kiyam mkah
Yesus yasom ye. He mfe: Ana mbis kabes sau mawe,

Yesus ro ja Paulus ykyas tait, mkah yasom rAit amu nikyak nyõ frok nbam raa retait!” Menohe ana mabo ngkrema weto smot Yesus fefares, tibyo ana mbo tak rAit fee ye. Ana mkyas feto menohe kabes reto mhau kʼraa retait tna mno raa retait yatak tna safo toni. Tna kabes reto mawe “Jõ thar Yesus ysya Paulus. Ana weto matak mikyak jõ saah. Menohe anu ntak fee!” Tna kabes reto frok fee.
Tibyo ait ro kabes mbo refi tbat yfot raa mabo krema ro mao na kʼanya wefo. Kabes kmo mukah ana mkah yaaf tna mhah ratan wana ro myum ye. Tna ana nsro raa msam frok mamo mbam amah reto.
Raa ro Yahudi msya raa ro Yunani ro mhau mam Efesus beta mari bo reto tibyo mrok waa. Tna
Yesus yasom rAit, raa mbo faram yoyo.

Raa ro smot Yesus to, ana mawat mama mras iro wana abyõ, mkyas mam wore raa masu makin mmat to mawe, “Mfo refo amu nashana oh. Botkif ro mkair tiwya amu nno to, amu noo mbeak fari. Mfo refo anu smot Yesus.”

Tna ana ro tiwya matak mari botkif taro sor fo, makah bokom ro botkif wana ro tiwya mmat. Makah mama mse tna raa mkah mait mam wore raa mawat mros mmat. Botkif ro raa mkah mait weto to, ja mabyoh maut toni, pitis trion 50
bo feto.
Bo weto syohor kʼraa beta mari. Tna watum ro
Yesus mrok matak oh meto.
Bo weto mkak tna fo Paulus yawe, “Har ro Allah mbis mawe jõ tasen tamoʼt
ro Yerusalem. Jõ tawe tamo iti mam
ro Makedonia msya
ro Akhaya. Tna fo kbe jõ tamoʼt
ro Yerusalem. Kbe thau mam Yerusalem ti baro tna tawe tamoʼt
ro Roma ye.
Tna jõ ksoh tafoh ajõ Timotius ysya Erastus mbewok matim wia mamoʼt rabin ro Makedonia. Jõ tesait thau akus ti baro naut mam befo.” Tna Paulus yhau ti baro mase mam rabin ro Asia fares.
Wore weto raa taro ro mhau mam Efesus mawe ana smot
Yesus. Bosmot ro
reto mno raa ro
reto mrok mnin-nin.
Raa sait ro yhau mam
reto yasom bi Demetrius. Ait ja yoo
yfen
mkah bo raa smot. Raa makin ro mhau mam
ro Efesus to ana ja smot
Artemis. Tibyo bi Demetrius ysya yafoh na wait ja masim
ro Ait yfen weto to, moo pitis mawat ye.
Tna Demetrius ytu yafoh wait sor mama siret su msya raa ro ja mfen bo ro
Artemis taro sor. Tna ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Tao na: Amu ja fri bomafer mbam bo ro anu bfen refo mawat oh.
Menohe Paulus ait beswan yawe, ‘Bo ro raa mfen reto to,
meto, bo ati meto fee! Raa ro smot
Artemis to wase bo fares!’ Tna raa mawat mari bokyas ro Paulus. Ait sioh yno raa ro mhau mam Efesus to mesait aran fee. Raa ro mhau mam rabin ro Asia refo beta mari bokyas rait ye!
Kbe meen raa hartu bo ro anu bfen to u fee ye. Kbe raa hawe bo ro amu ja nsim. Tna kbe raa miwana samu sahfra ro
Artemis reto ye. Raa ro mhau mam rabin ro Asia refo tna raa ro mhau mam arin aso beta ja smot
Artemis ye. Nno be raa mbaut
ranu reto u fee. Nno be kbe raa mawe Artemis to
ro mase fee! Safo refo kbe msai toni!”
Raa weto mari bo ro Demetrius yawe, tibyo ana mrok kmo toni. Ana masen hawyõn
rana mmai wer mawe, “Asik mase
Artemis. Au fo
raa ro Efesus!”
Bo ro raa mno mnin-nin syohor mamo snok raa ro mhau mam

reto beta mari ye. Tna raa mawat mhoh mamo kait yuk ro raa hre siret reto tna mmat. Ana mawe saso Paulus mfot, menohe mkai ait fee. Tibyo ana mfot Gayus ysya Aristarkhus, Paulus yafoh na wait. (Ana mbewok mbam Makedonia kro Paulus mama.) Raa ro Efesus mfot ana mbewok makah mamoʼt yuk reto.
Paulus yari feto tna yawe yamo yrof ana mbewok mam yuk ro raa siret reto. Menohe yafoh na wait taro mabe ait mawe, “Namo ma!”
Raa mase ro mamo aban mana mam rabin ro Asia to mabo baro ja miranya msya Paulus ye. Ana mawe kʼraa sait mawe, “Namo nawe wa kʼPaulus, nawe kbe yamoʼt yuk ro raa siret reto ma.”
Raa ro siret weto to mmai mnin: Taro mmai wer mawe fefo, tna taro mmai wer mawe fno. Raa ro mama siret mam weto taro wase bo masmair rau ro misti re ana mamo siret sor mam yuk reto to ye.

Tna raa ro Yahudi baro mama siret mam yuk reto ye. Ana baro myum bi Aleksander yatim to, mbis bo kʼait mawe, “Nasen saak anu wa afo re raa mhar mawe anu, raa ro Yahudi to bisti bo refo fee!” Tna Aleksander yasen yros tna yawe raa makin shait beta, re kbe ana mari bo ro ait yawe. Menohe raa taro mmat ait yasen yros to, ana mnaut mawe ait oh mi yisti safo reto.
Raa makin weto mrok mhar he ait fi raa ro
Yahudi. Feto tibyo ana masen mtu mkah mmai ro mase mawe, “Asik mase
Artemis! Au oh mi
raa ro Efesus to!” Ana mtu baro kait feto ye oh.
Tna raa mase ro mbo
Efesus sait yasen yros yawe, “Tao na; shait oh! Waa ma. Raa beta mhar mawe anu ro bhau mam Efesus fo, ja kmot sahfra ro
Artemis. Raa mhar mawe fraa ro mhau mam sahfra ramu to, fraa ro mbau. Fraa reto mfi
Artemis, tiwya btek mbam ayoh.
Tna raa sait bo kbe ywaar bo reto fee ye. Feto to, knar oh! Nno bo mnin-nin toni ma!
Anu nbo raa mabo ewok reto nkah nmaʼt befo nno fyi! Ana mbewok riwai mawe kair
ranu fee. Tna ana msyõf bo mbam sahfra ro
Artemis aro bo fee ye.”
Tna bi yabi retait yawe kʼDemetrius ysya raa wait ro mfen
yawe, “Soh anu nwe nuun boun raa to, nmoʼt samu ro ja raa mtu srah! Raa ro ja mtu srah to, ana huwya mari safo ro raa makah mamo mkyas kʼana. Kbe ana hre susai mtu safo refo mari ye.
Soh anu nwe nkyas safo roto taro to, nmo nkyas mam siret ro raa beta hre mari ye.
Soh nyõ nisti re raa mrok mnin-nin fefo, kbe raa maun anu mawe anu besait oh mi bno bo ro mkair. Kbe anu huwya saak wa anu bwe bawya no? Bo ro kbe anu bwe aro fee ye!”
Raa ro yase retait ykyas bo weto mkak. Tna ybis raa weto mamo bana.
Raa ro mnin-nin to mrok mnem. Tna Paulus ytu raa Kristen ro mhau mam
ro Efesus yawe ana mama siret su. Tna ait ykyas bo kʼana yawe, “Jõ ksoh anu beroh smot
kaket!” Paulus ykyas bo mkak tna ymah meen kʼana akus. Tna ait yasen yamoʼt
ro Makedonia.
Paulus yamo yur ytan mam rabin ro Makedonia tna ykyas bo kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam beto sor. Yawe ana bito smot
Yesus matak sai. Tna fo ait yasen yamoʼt rabin ro Yunani.
Paulus yhau mam rabin reto snyi trion tuuf. Tna ait siwyan yawe yaut
yamoʼt
ro Siria, he mfe. Ait yari he raa ro Yahudi saim bo mawe mame ait. Feto tibyo ait yamo yaut
reto fee. Ynaut yawe yamo iso mne sai. Feto tibyo ait yhah ye yamo yur mam Makedonia wia tna fo snok mam Siria.
Menohe yafoh na wait taro beroh maut
reto mamo. Ana weto oh mi: Sopater ro ybam remo ro Berea (ait ku ro bi Pirus yare), Aristarkhus ysya Sekundus (ana mbewok mbam
ro Tesalonika), Gayus (ait ybam remo ro Derbe), Timotius, tna Tikhikus ysya Trofimus ye (ana mbewok mbam rabin ro Asia).
Ana mabo krema reto maut
matim wia. Tna ana ste amu
ro nmo iso mne wea mam remo ro Troas.
Tna amu fo nmo naa sai nmo snok mam Filipi. Amu nhau mam beto nkyõ Korat
ro
Marak. Tna fo amu nsen nuut
nmo renti. Amu nmo mam aya sawan ti trion maat tna snok mam Troas. Mam Troas amu fri amu nfoh wamu mabo krema ro matim wia tna ste amu mam beto. Tna amu nhau mam
reto ti trion krema naut.
Mam ayõ ro
amu raa ro Kristen nmo siret su. Amu nkyõ Korat ro Niit
afo re amu nnaut Yesus ro tiwya raa mame yajat. Tna Paulus yawe menrabu rabu ait yamo. Feto to amu nhau tna nri ait ykyas bo kait. Ykyas bo mamo snok mti reto arin masuf.
Tna raa mno tafoh mawat mse mait ye. Amu hre mam amah reto ntakor ro tuuf.

Tna mere sait yasom Eutikhus hre mam hroh ro amah kri-kri fo. Paulus ykyas bo miyõ toni. Tibyo mere retait yut yjin maka fee. Ait yrok yjin tu sorni ait tibyo ytek ybam hroh reto, yamo yai mte tibyo yajat. Raa tubat mere retait he ait yajat oh.
Tna Paulus yroh yamo mam te tna yaka ybo mere retait. Yaka ybo tibyo ait yrok yasen. Tna Paulus yawe, “Waa ma. Ait yhai fee.”
Paulus hah ye yaut u yamoʼt amah hawar reto. Ait haber
ftah aro rau-rau tna yee kʼana beta mait. Korat reto mkak tna Paulus ykyas bo naut u kʼana mamo snok nyah msan. Tna ait yasen yamo.
Tna raa mamo bana beta, msya mere ro riwai yhai tna yrok yasen ye. Ana tne mere retait yamoʼt amah rait ye. Tna raa weto sraujin u fee, ana simaut mase sai.
Amu nesait nuut
ntim joh ro Asos ste Paulus wea. Taa ait yawe ait yesait yamo iso mne, tna yawe kʼamu yawe amu kbe nryot nsio ait mam weto.
Ait yama snok si kʼamu mam Asos to, yaut
ramu tna amu beta nmoʼt joh ro Metilene.
Tna
reto mhoh renti. Rabu ti fo amu snok si mam sato ro Khios. Rabu ti naut to, amu nhoh nmo kene kait mam sato ro Samos, tna rabu ti naut to, amu snok mam remo ro Miletus.

Tna Paulus yawe kʼamu yawe, “Anu bmo tkia iti mam Efesus ma. Soh bwe tkia iti mam Efesus to, kbe ti mkak sai mam Asia. Anu bmo fooh sai afo re kbe bmo snok wia mam Yerusalem mam ati ro raa makyõ Korat ro Pentakosta.”
Mam joh ro Miletus to, Paulus ybis raa sait yamo ytu
ro
Efesus mama mo kʼait.
Ana mama tna Paulus yawe kʼana yawe, “Tao na; tiwya jõ thau tsya anu ooh-oh. Tna anu nhar jõ kaket.
Anu nhar nwe ja jõ tno bo ro
ybis mkah thaf ro sneh yoyo. Tna jõ tukan btek yoyo ye. Tna jõ tkai bo ro samyoh mbam raa ro Yahudi ro saim mame jõ tajat ye.
Menohe jõ beroh tkyas watum ro Yesus kʼanu kaket. Jõ tber kait bo maja taro fee ye. Jõ terif bo kʼanu mam woyõ-woya sai tna mam amah wanu bo ye.
Wore weto to, tkyas bo kʼraa ro Yahudi msya raa ro Yunani ye. Ja rabu ti wawa jõ tkyas bo kʼana to, tawe ana mashana, tna mama mo kʼAllah, tna smot
Yesus ye.
Tna mfo refo Har ro Allah mbis jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna jõ wase bo bawya ro kbe btek mai kʼjõ mam beto ye.
Menohe woyõ-woya sai jõ tamo to, Har ro Allah mkyas kʼjõ wia mawe kbe meen raa mfot jõ tna mbu mam
Tna kbe bo ro mkair roto taro btek mai kʼjõ ye.
Menohe jõ te tnaut tetsu ajõ bo fee ye. Tna jõ waa fee ye. Bo ro ati to, jõ beroh tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
. Beroh tkyas tawe Allah yatmof raa tibyo yoo riof ro mase yee kʼana. Au oh mi bo ro
Yesus ybis Jõ tno mamo snok tabi thai si fo.
Ja jõ thau tsya anu tkyas raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo. Tna mfo refo jõ thar tawe meen anu nmat jõ tasu u fee.
Feto to jõ thar tna tawe kʼanu tawe soh meen anu aro nkai riof ro mase fee, jõ wase ye. Jõ tasom isti reto fee.
Tiwya jõ beroh tkyas Watum ro Allah kʼanu. Jõ haweboh fee. Jõ tber kait bo maja taro fee ye.
Nhau kmot netsu wanu kaket. Tna kmot raa
ranu ro mhau mam Efesus kaket ye. Ana oh mi tiwya Har ro Allah mee kʼanu mkah bo anu kmot ana to. Feto to, kmot ana kaket mfi bo ja raa kmot
wana kaket ye to. Allah kwiyat ana mkah mees ro Ku rAit
Yesus oh.
Jõ tamo. Tna thar tawe raa ro mno bo mkair-kar kbe mama. Ana weto meen mno bo ro mkair kʼanu, mfi mtah rbyoh ro ja mafit
to.
Raa weto mesait fee: Anu nkin wefo taro meen nsen nkyas bokyas ro mkair, bokyas ro ntrot fee. Ana taro mam
ranu mesait kbe moo raa mhaf afo re ana mari tna kro Yesus u to fee. Raa weto ksoh mawe kbe raa mari tna kro ana mesait.
Bo reto jõ tkyas kʼanu tawe matim wia afo re kbe anu nhar tna nnaut kaket kmot anu. Tna nnaut nwe ro tiwya
trion tuuf muuf to, rabu-reha to jõ tkyas bo wefo kʼanu yoyo. Ti aro-aro jõ sraujin tna tawia ye.
Tna mfo refo jõ skabuk tsan anu

Jõ skabuk re kbe Ait yatam anu, tna yno bosmot wanu mrok matak mkah watum rAit. Anu nri watum rAit to, kbe Ait yoo bouum ysan kʼanu. Bouum reto Ait yuumto kʼanu nkin wefo nesait fee. Meen Ait yuumto bouum reto kʼraa ro Ait ysok mamo raa wAit beta.
Anu nhar nwe ja jõ taam bo raa fee. Jõ tasu mase saso
msya ratan bo fee ye.
Menohe jõ tesait tkah bo wojõ afo re bo ro tse to mabut fee. Feto tna raa ro ja kro jõ to, bo wana ro mse to mabut fee ye.

Bo ro tno to, weto beta Jõ tno afo re anu nmat tna re nhar bo moof re kbe anu nesait nbo nno feto ye. Feto to, nkah bo wonyõ nesait kaket ye. Nno kaket afo re kbe anu ntai natmof raa ro kinyah ye. Nnaut bokyas ro Yesus: Tiwya Ait yawe, ‘Ro moof to anu noo bo nee kʼraa anya. Nmo nyoh bo yoyo ma.’”
Paulus ykyas bo mkak. Tna ana beta maka ntmi mimna tabam tna skabuk.
Ana beta sraujin saku Paulus mawia tna mmah meen kʼait yamo oh.
Ana sraujin toni mnaut bo ro Paulus yawe kʼana; yawe ana meen me mfri ait u fee. Tna ana makah Paulus mamo betne yaut
yamo.
Amu nmah meen tna bitsre ana. Amu nuut
reto nhoh nmoʼt sato sau ro masom Kos. Rabu ti fo amu snok mam sato ro Rodos, tna nbam Rodos to amu nmo renti mam remo ro Patara.
Mam Patara to amu nroh nbam
reto tna fri
sau ro mamoʼt ati jaro. Mamoʼt rabin ro Fenisia. Tna amu nuut
reto nmo.
reto mamo tna amu nmat sato ro Siprus mhau mam ati ro ntem taa, tna amu niwrek iti sai nmoʼt
ro Siria. Amu nmo feto tibyo snok mam
ro Tirus. Tna raa ro mkah bo mam
reto mwia bosatoh ro masyõ mamo mkah bo kbe raa masim mam beto.

Mam Tirus amu nroh tna nmo nirer raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto. Amu nhau mam beto ye ti trion krema. Har ro Allah mkyas bo kʼraa Kristen ro mhau mam beto, ⌞mawe kbe bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼPaulus mam Yerusalem.⌟ Feto to ana mawe wa kʼPaulus mawe, “Namoʼt Yerusalem ma.”
Ti weto mkak. Tna amu nwe nuut
reto nmo renti. Raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto, fnya wana msya kukek wana, ana beta ye masen mama betne amu mam
makit. Tna mam aya sawan maam fo amu beta nka tmi nimna tabam tna skabuk su.
Tna amu nuut
, tna ana hah me mamo si bana.
Amu nbam Tirus nuut
nmo snok mam
ro Ptolemais. Amu nroh mam beto nmah meen nsya raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto sor. Tna amu njin nsya ana ti sau mam beto ye.
Tna rabu ti fo amu nsen nuut
nmo renti tna snok mam

ro Kaisarea. Mam beto amu nmoʼt samu ro Filipus tna nhau nsya ait. Filipus fi raa ro ja yamo ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro mari bokyas rAit fefares. Ait sait ybam kʼana mabo krema ro tiwya raabis ro Yesus msok mam Yerusalem.
Filipus ku wait ro fnya fain mabo jiit.
yuumto bouum kʼana tna re ana ja mari mai ro mbam
tna mkyas bokyas rAit reto kʼraa mfi raa ro
Amu nhau mam Kaisarea ti baro ye. Tna Allah ybis
sait yasom Agabus ybam
ro Yudea yama.
Ait yama snok kʼamu tna yoo hotom ro Paulus rait tna yesait yake ait yaa oo yatem bo tna yawe, “Har ro
mawe fefo: ‘Raa ro hotom rait refi fi, kbe raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi huwya make ait mam Yerusalem tna mawah msan kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto.’”
Amu nri feto tibyo amu nsya raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto to, nwe nbe Paulus. Amu soh-soh ait nwe, “Namoʼt Yerusalem ma!”
Tna Paulus yhaf hri yawe, “Mkah bawya re anu nwia tna nno jõ thaf roon toni fo. Jõ tawe tno bo ro
ybis kʼjõ yoyo sai. Soh raa mfot mbu jõ tna mame jõ tajat ye, bo weto moof beta ye. Jõ beroh tamoʼt Yerusalem.”
Paulus yari bo ro amu nkyas fee. Tibyo amu soh-soh ait u fee, nwe kʼanya nwe, “Anu bsan ait
sai oh.”
Amu nhau ti baro mase mam
ro Kaisarea. Tna amu nsen siwyan bo wamu mkah bo nmoʼt Yerusalem.
