Raa ro Kristen mabo baro mbam Kaisarea msya amu nmo ye. Amu nmo tna raa ro Kaisarea weto mawe amu njin nsya ana mafoh sait. Ait retait yasom Manason. Ait raa mabe mam sato ro Siprus tna ait smot Yesus ooh-oh. Tna amu nhau iti nsya ait mam samu rait.
Amu snok mam Yerusalem to, tna raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto mmah meen kʼamu mkah mhaf ro moof toni.
Rabu ti to, Paulus ysya amu nmo nmat Yakobus. Tna
taro beta mama siret su ye.
Paulus ymah meen kʼana tna fo betoo bo maja sau bitsre-bitsre beta kʼana. Ait ykyas bo ro Allah yno wore ait yamo ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto.

Ana mari feto tibyo mawe, “Tao; amu nri feto ksoh toni tibyo nyoh asik mase kʼAllah. Menohe raa wamu ro Yahudi taro mari feto to, kbe ana mrok kmo! Mam Yerusalem fo, raa ro Kristen msis-sas mbo Watum ro Musa ykom to, matak fares ye.

Ana mhar mawe nyõ ja nkyas bo kʼraa ro mhau mam rabin roto makin. Nkyas bo kʼraa mana makin to, nkyas kʼraa mana ranu ro Yahudi ye. Tna ana weto baro mamus nyõ. Ana sioh mawe, ‘Paulus ybis raa wanu weto, yamo yawe kʼana yawe, “Kro Watum ro Musa to ma. Nbo nno ma.
kukek wanu ma. Tna kro bo mafa wanu ja bno soo to, ma ye.”’
Tna mfo refo fyi? Ana mari bo nyõ namaʼt befo fo, kbe ana mama mfot nyõ! Kbe anu bno bo bawya afo re bno wa ana?”
Tibyo
weto mnaut bo reto mamo-me tna mawe kʼPaulus mawe, “Raa ro Yahudi mabo jiit ro smot Yesus mros ye wefo fo. Ana mawe kbe ana myon metsu rana mamyot bo mafa ranu mkah bo skabuk
kaket. Amu nwe nyõ nno fefo:

Nyõ kro ana nmo nyon netsu wanu. Tna nmur nana mawyan ye. Tna noo pitis nee kʼana mabo jiit kbe maren raa ro ymur ana mana mawyan wana to. Nno feto re kbe raa beta mmat tna mhar mawe bo ro riwai ana mari to, mabo fee. Kbe ana mhar mawe nyõ ja kro Watum ro Musa matak fares.
Tiwya amu nkom aam sau nee kʼraa Kristen ro mbam raa mana roto oh. Amu nkom bobis baro kʼana weto. Amu nwe kbe ana kro bo mafa raa mana ro Yahudi beta ma, mhau sai. Aam reto mkyas mawe:
1. Sohmaam boit ro raa moo msan
oh to ma.
2. Nta mees ro kak raa ktan to ma.
3. Nbo kak kwiyan ro mees mhau fares to ma.
4. Tna nwyah bo to ma ye.”
Ana mkyas bo weto mkak tna ana mamo bana.
Paulus yari bo ro

weto mawe. Rabu ti naut tna ait yakah raa mabo jiit weto. Tna ana mabo maat myon metsu wana. Tna raa mmur mana mawyan wana ye. Ana mno mamyot bo mafa raa ro Yahudi ja mno. Mno bo weto afo re ana moof mnan si skabuk Allah. Ana mno bo weto mkak tna mamo twok mam Samu ro Allah tna mawe
mawe, “Ti baro naut tna bo ro amu nno refo mkak. Tna fo amu sait-sait kbe nkah bosan nma nee kʼAllah.”
Ti trion krema to, Paulus yno bo reto kene wore mkak oh tna yhau mam Samu ro Allah. Tna raa ro
Yahudi baro mbam rabin ro Asia mmat ait. Ana weto kmo tna masen mfot ait. Ana mawe kʼraa makin mawe,

“Raa ro Israel: Nma bfot Paulus! Ait fi ja yamo woyõ-woya sai ykyas bo kʼraa yno re ana mber hasyoh anu. Yno ana miwer Watum ro Musa ykom. Yno re raa miwana Samu ro Allah refo ye. Bi ait mefi! Mfo wefo ait yakah raa mbam raa mana ro Yunani baro twok mam Samu ro Allah mato ye. Bo reto anu bbau, kbe mno Samu ranu refo mkair!”
(Taa ana mmat Paulus yiranya ysya Trofimus, raa ro mbam Efesus. Feto to ana mnaut mawe Paulus yakah ait yamo twok mam Samu ro Allah mato ye.)
Mari feto to raa mrok kmo Paulus. Ana beta mhoh mama. Mama mfot ait tna mikyak ait frok mbam Samu ro Allah. Tna raa muut mato Samu ro
reto wa ye.
Raa ro Yahudi hre saim bo mawe mame Paulus yajat. Menohe raa mamo mkyas kʼraa sbe ro Roma. Mkyas kʼaban mana raa ro sbe mawe
ro Yerusalem to, raa mmai mnin-nin toni oh.
Aban mana yari feto tna yasen ybis raa sbe ro mase yawe, “Ntu raa kinyah wonyõ baro. Nma, anu bsen broh bmoʼt
fooh! Raa makin mam weto mnin-nin!” Raa makin ro mnin-nin weto mmat raa sbe weto mama fo, tna bitsre mai Paulus fee.
Tna aban mana retait yamo yfot Paulus tna ybis raa sbe wait moo
ewok make ait yatem. Tna ytu kʼPaulus yawe, “Nyõ awya? Bo ro nyõ nno fo bawya mefo?”

Menohe raa msis-sas weto taro kmo mmai wer mawe, “Ait yno bo rno!” Tna taro mmai wer mawe, “Ait yno bo rau!” Raa mnin-nin feto tibyo aban mana retait yari bo masmair rau kaket fee ye. Tibyo ait ybis raa sbe makah Paulus mamoʼt snek rana.
Ana makah ait mamo snok si mam barit fo raa mawat mjor beak-ak anya tibyo raa ro sbe wefo tubat Paulus katar abyõ.
Raa mawat ro hyu kro ait kmo mmai wer mawe, “Nno ait retait yasu marak to!”

Paulus raa makah twok mamoʼt snek raa sbe. Tna ait ytu bo kʼaban mana retait mkah mai ro Yunani yawe, “Nbis jõ tkyas bo kʼnyõ kebet baro wia, mbau a?” Tna bi refi yrok ktak yawe, “Nyõ nhar mai ro Yunani ye oh a?

Feto nyõ fi raa ro Mesir fe mfe a? Riwai jõ trok tawe nyõ fi raa ro Mesir ro taa yno safo tait. Ait retait taa ysya raa wait mabo trion 4000 mama. Ana weto mbo sbe ymok ana mafa msya raa wamu. Tna fo ana msam mamoʼt yuk ro riamo!”
Paulus yawe, “Mfe, jõ fi raa ro Yahudi.
ajõ to Tarsus, ro ja masom ye mam
ro Kilikia. Jõ soh-soh nyõ nbis jõ tkyas bo kʼraa wefo sor.”
Bi ait ybis. Tna Paulus yros mam barit reto tna yawe raa makin shait beta, re kbe ana mari bo ro ait yawe. Tna ait ykyas bo kʼana mkah mai ro Ibrani yawe,
“Tao msya taja na; nri ro jõ tkyas saak jõ wa refo wia.”
Raa msis-sas weto mari Paulus ykyas bo mkah mai rana ro Ibrani. Feto tibyo ana mrok mnem beta. Tna ait yawe,
“Jõ fi raa ro Yahudi. Tna fnya mabe mam
ro Tarsus ro mhau mam rabin ro Kilikia to. Menohe jõ raa mtos thau tabi mam
refo. Tiwya

ajõ bi Gamaliel. Ait yber jõ kaket. Ait ykyas Watum ro Musa kʼjõ msya bo mafa anu hohos wanu ja mno ye. Tna bo weto mame kʼjõ thaf. Jõ raa ro mur-mur kro Watum ro Allah. Tiwya tkyas tna mno mnan mfi bo mfo refo anu nbo nkyas ye fo.
Tiwya jõ sikowah raa ro kro Iso ro
Yesus ye. Bo ro tno misti re raa Kristen baro mhai. Jõ tfot raa sme msya fnya ye tawah tbu mam
ye.
Bo weto to,
Yahudi ro yase ysya raa wait ro ja mtu safo raa ro Yahudi sor to, ana mmat mkah masu rana oh. Ana mhar mawe jõ sioh fee. Tiwya ana oh mi mkom aam baro mee kʼjõ tbo. Tbo aam weto tamoʼt
ro Damsyik tawe tfot raa Kristen ro mhau mam beto. Tawe tfot tna tbo takah ana nmoʼt Yerusalem fo, tna raa mtu srah tna mmit safo kʼana ye.
Ati reto baas fares tna tamo mam iso, kene mam Damsyik to, tna bo sau mfi naar mkek mait mbam ayoh btek mama mame mur mtan mam wore jõ tros.
Tna jõ btek tawe tai tabam tna jõ tari mai sau mame kʼjõ timara mawe, ‘Saulus; nyõ sikowah Jõ nno fyi?’
Jõ te ttu si tawe, ‘
; Nyõ awya metait?’ Ait yawe, ‘Jõ fi Yesus raa ro Nasaret, ro ja nyõ sikowah.’
Raa ro kro jõ nmo su mmat nar reto. Menohe mai ro mkyas to, ana mari fee.
Tna fo jõ ttu
tawe, ‘
; kbe jõ tno bawya?’ Ait yawe kʼjõ yawe, ‘Nasen oh! Tna namoʼt Damsyik. Mam beto to, kbe raa sait yama ykyas kʼnyõ. Ykyas bombra ro meen nyõ nasom beta.’
Riwai naar btek mame mam wore jõ tros. Tna kek mawyah rau mno tasu mti. Tmat bo fee. Tibyo ana ro kro jõ nmo to, mbo jõ tatem makah nmoʼt Damsyik.
Mam Damsyik raa sait yasom Ananias yama yo kʼjõ. Ait refi ja waa Allah tna kro Watum ro Musa yoyo. Tibyo raa Yahudi ro mhau mam beto to, ana beta ja hartu bi ait.
Ait yama yros kait kʼjõ tna yawe, ‘Saulus; tao ajõ: Nasu mrok maah oh!’ Mam weto si fo jõ tasu maah tna tmat Ananias ye.
Tna ait yawe, ‘Allah ro tiwya anu hohos wanu smot tait, yawe ysok nyõ mkah nno bo ro Ait yawe. Tna yno re nyõ nmat Yesus tna nari bo ro Ait ykyas ye. Yesus tait raa ro yato mboh.
Ait yawe kbe nyõ namo nkyas bo ro riwai nyõ nmat, tna bo ro nyõ nari reto ye.
Bawya re nyõ ntane mamo-me to? Nasen oh! Nawe raa
nyõ. Tna kbe
yyon iro wonyõ ye.’
Tno bo weto tna fo Jõ thah tamoʼt Yerusalem. Tna ati sau jõ skabuk mam Samu ro Allah kri-kri to Har ro Allah mber beroh-roh msya jõ tamos ajõ.
Tna jõ tmat
ro ykyas bo kʼjõ. Ait yawe, ‘Nasen sikba Yerusalem fooh tna frok namo! Ja nyõ nkyas bo ro Jõ tno kʼnyõ. Tna raa hawe. Ana, mawe bo reto mabo fee, mawe nyõ sioh sai.’
Menohe Jõ tawe, ‘
raa ro Yerusalem ja mhar oh, mawe jõ fi tiwya tamoʼt samu ro skabuk aro-aro tna tfot raa ro smot Nyõ. Ana mhar mawe ja tfot ana tna tawah tbu mam
tna sikowah ana ye.
Tiwya Stefanus ykyas Nyõ nasom. Tna raa kmo tna mame ait yajat to. Ati reto to, jõ srau sau tsya ana tna tros kmot ratan raa ro mame ait to ye.’
Menohe Allah beroh yawe, ‘Namo oh! Mfo refo Jõ tbis nyõ frok namo fari. Namo nkyas Jõ tasom kʼraa ro mhau mam rabin roto.’”

Raa ro Yahudi mari bo ro Paulus ykyas mamo snok mam bokyas tis refo. Ait yawe Allah ybis ait yamo ykyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro mhau mam rabin roto; kʼraa ro Yahudi fee weto. Ana mari feto tna kmo mmai tis. Raa mawat weto beswan bo ro ait yawe. Ana mawe, “Nme ait yajat! Paulus ye yhau kait mam tabam refo ma!”
Raa weto mmai mnin fares sai tna mrus ratan wana ro ja ana myum mne to, mai maut tna mabah bohasyaf beak maut mam uu ye.

Feto tibyo aban mana raa sbe retait ybis raa wait makah Paulus twok mam snek rana. Aban mana ro sbe retait, ait wase bo ro Paulus yno re raa ro Yahudi kmo mmai wer mamus ait. Tibyo ybis raa mtu bo kʼPaulus tna sie ait afo re kbe ait yasbrah safo ro ait yber reto.

Raa sbe baro make Paulus yatem mkak tna mawe mmok ait. Menohe Paulus yawe bo kʼraa sbe ro yase sait yawe, “Fyi, watum ro Roma ja mbis raa ranu mmok raa ro Roma wia matim menohe raa mtu srah rait fefares a?”
Raa sbe ro yase retait yari feto tibyo yawe kʼraa wait yawe, “Nros wia!” Tna yamo yo kʼaban mana raa sbe retait tna yawe, “Bo refo oh kbe nyõ nno meto a? Paulus yawe ait
Roma: Raa ro bi Kaisar ja ybo kmot!”
Tibyo aban mana retait yamo yo kʼPaulus ytu yawe, “Nawe kaket, nyõ fi raa ro Roma tu a?” Menohe Paulus yawe, “Ae, mabo oh!”
Tna ait yawe, “Jõ tiwya twok tamo raa ro Roma to, jõ too pitis namabyoh ro mase toni tee
Kaisar!” Menohe Paulus yawe, “Jõ tno bo ro mfi feto fee! Jõ fi raa manat. Jõ fi raa ro Roma yum. Jõ taja ait raa ro Roma!”
Ana mari feto si fo raa sbe weto bitsre ait tna mayõ ana fooh mamo. Tna bi yabi refi simbyar yrok yhar yawe riwai ait ybis sre raa make Paulus yatem fo tibyo ait yrok waa ye.
Aban mana retait yawe yhar bo ro raa Yahudi mkyas mai kʼPaulus. Rabu to, ait ytu raa mabi ro
Yahudi mama siret su. Ana ro mama to,
manes msya raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa wana sor to. Tna ait ybis raa wait yawe, “Namo tufrok Paulus ybam
Tna nakah ait nama re kbe amu nkyas bo ro ait yno!”
Paulus yasu yrom raa manes ro Yahudi weto sor tna saak ait wa yawe, “Tao na: Allah yhar yawe jõ fi raa ro ja tno bo ro Ait yawe to, tno mkah thaf ro moof sai yoyo.”
Paulus ykyas bo feto tibyo
ro yase ybis raa ro mros kene mam Paulus to, yawe mai ait yasoh.
ro yase retait yasom Ananias.

Tna Paulus yawe kʼAnanias yawe, “Allah kbe yai nyõ ska riryõn! Nyõ hre mam befo beah srah ajõ mkah Watum ro Musa ykom. Menohe nyõ nesait niwana Watum reto mkah bo nbis raa mai jõ. Nyõ namo sroyõ sai meto!”
Raa ro mros mam weto mawe kʼPaulus mawe, “Ait retait
yase ro Allah ysok! Nawe kair ait ma!”
Tna Paulus yawe, “Kmo ma; jõ wase. Jõ thar tawe bi ait yamo
ro yase fee. Bokom ro Allah mawe,
‘Nmus aban mana ro ja ybo anu to ma.’”
Keluaran 22:28
Paulus yhar yawe raa ro hre ytu srah rait weto, bonaut wana to hayah-hayah. Ana taro mbo bonaut raa ro
tna ana taro mbo bonaut raa ro
Tna ait yhar yawe ja ana miranya fee. Feto to ait yawe, “Tao na wojõ; jõ fi raa ro
tna jõ taja tait raa ro
ye. Jõ tkyas bo tawe raa ro mhai to meen me mrok masen. Bonaut reto oh mi raa mfot jõ mtu srah fo!”
Ait yawe bo feto si fo raa ro
msya raa ro
mayõ mafa anya. Tibyo raa makin wefo mrok mitwat mkbair ewok ye.
(Raa ro
matak sai mawe raa ro mhai to meen mrok masen fee. Tna mawe ja
aro fee ye. Tna mkyas mawe ja kabes aro msya har aro bo fee ye. Menohe raa ro
ana mawe bo weto beta mabo ye.)
Ana santri bo weto mno mmai mnin-nin toni. Tna raa
mabo baro ro mamo
ro Yahudi ye to, masen mros. Tna mkyas bo matak kʼana ro mtu srah mawe, “Bi ait refi yno bo ro mkair aro fee! Nno be har soh mfe,
bo aro mkyas bo kʼait!”
Raa masen mmak msai toni tibyo aban mana raa sbe retait yrok waa ynaut yawe, “Ayoh ee! Kbe raa mai-a Paulus bo ye.” Tibyo ybis raa sbe yawe, “Nmo nbo Paulus nkah ait nmo truk snek mato oh!”
Rabu ti naut
Yesus frok nenat yros mam Paulus yajoh jaro. Tna yawe, “Waa ma. Tiwya nyõ nkyas Jõ tasom mam Yerusalem. Tna kbe nyõ namo nkyas Jõ tasom mam Roma ye.”
Rabu ti to raa ro Yahudi baro saim bo mawe, “Nma, anu bme Paulus yajat. Tna anu beta bhau bo biit ye. Bhau bo biit mamo snok ati ro anu bme ait. Tna fo anu biit bo msya bta aya bo u.”
Ana ro saim bo su weto mabo 40 bo feto.
Ana masen mamo mo
manes ro
Yahudi, msya raa mabi wana mawe, “Amu saim bo nwe nme Paulus yajat. Tna amu beta nwe kbe amu niit bo aro fee tna nta aya fee ye. Kbe amu nyas bo niit mamo snok ati ro amu nme ait yajat.

Feto to amu nwe anu nsya raa manes ro ja mtu safo raa Yahudi to, anu nkom aam sau ntim mamoʼt aban mana raa sbe. Nkom nwe ait yakah Paulus yama yo kʼanu u. Nwe anu nisoh nmat srah reto kaket. Nkom feto tna amu huwya mam iso ro mamoʼt snek rana reto. Tna kbe raa makah Paulus mama mbam snek. Ana snok mam befo fefares, amu huwya nme ait yajat wia.”
Menohe Paulus yamu ro yano mabe sait yari bo raa ro Yahudi saim feto. Tna ku retait yamoʼt tok raa ro sbe reto tna ykyas bo reto kʼyamu Paulus.
Paulus yari feto tibyo ytu raa sbe ro yase sait yama tna yawe kʼait yawe, “Nakah ku refi namo no kʼaban mana ranu. Ku ait refi yawe ykyas bo kʼbi ait.”
Raa sbe retait yakah ku ait yamo yo kʼaban mana raa ro sbe tna yawe, “Paulus ro yhau mam
yawe jõ takah ku refi tama to kʼnyõ re yber kait bo aro kʼnyõ.”
Aban mana retait ybo ku retait yatem yakah yamoʼt amah majoh jaro tna ytu bo kʼait yawe, “Nyõ nawe nkyas bo bawya kʼjõ?”

Ku retait yawe, “Raa ro Yahudi saim bo mawe kbe mame Paulus yajat. Mawe kbe mama mayoh kʼnyõ re menrabu nyõ nbis raa makah Paulus mamo sia no kʼraa manes wana ro ja mtu srah. Ana sioh mawe mtu ait yamo mkah bo mtu srah rait reto kaket ye.

Menohe ana mabo 40 saim bo mawe mmyõt mam iso maka huwya mame Paulus meto. Feto nari bo ro raa weto mawe ma! Ana beta saim bo mawe soh ana mame Paulus fefares to, masi mawe ana mait bo fee ye. Mfo wefo ana siwyan wea oh, huwya mari bo kʼnyõ sai.”
Aban mana retait yawe ku tna retait yawe, “Nkyas bo refo kʼraa aro ma. Tna nkyas nawe bo nyõ nama mam befo tna nber kait bo refo kʼjõ oh to ma.” Tna aban mana retait ybis ku retait hah ye yamo bait.

Tna fo aban mana raa sbe retait ytu raa sbe ro mase mabo ewok yawe mama. Ana mama tna ait ybis ana yawe, “Nmo nbis raa sbe wanu mabo trion 270 siwyan ana. Nbis ana weto mabo 200 moo sawya wana mbo. Tna nbis ana mabo 70 maut
Nbis ana siwyan bo wana fooh mkah bo anu nsen nmo. Tna mti refo mam ayõ ro krenjiit to, nmoʼt
ro Kaisarea.
Nkah Paulus nmo kaket. Nkah ait nmo no
Feliks mam Kaisarea. Tna noo
sau mkah bo kbe Paulus yaut ye.”
Aban mana raa ro sbe retait yasom Klaudius Lisias. Tna ait ykom aam sau mawe fefo:
Feliks ro yase: Jõ tmah meen kʼnyõ.
Raa refi yasom Paulus. Ait refi fi raa ro Yahudi saim mfot tna mawe mame. He mfe. Jõ tari he ait raa ro Roma. Feto tibyo jõ tsya raa sbe ro jõ tbis to, nmo nno wa.
Jõ tawe saso thar safo masmair ro raa maun ait kaket. Tna re jõ takah ait tamo to kʼraa manes ro ja mtu srah raa ro Yahudi weto to.
Jõ hre tari bo ana mtu srah rait. Ana maun Paulus mawe yiwer Watum ro
rana sai. Tnaut tawe ait yiwana watum ro Roma aro fee. Ana mawe jõ tbis raa mno bo ro mkair mai kʼait. Mawe jõ tbu ait mam
tna tbis raa mame ait yajat. Menohe jõ tkai safo aro re tmit kʼait fee.
Tna fo jõ tari raa ro Yahudi saim mawe mame ait yajat. Au oh mi jõ too ait beruk yama yo kʼnyõ fo. Tna jõ tbis ana ro maun boun kʼait weto mama mkyas bo kʼnyõ ye.”
Aban mana raa sbe ykom aam reto mkak. Tna mam wore wo mamur, ait ybis raa ro sbe masen makah Paulus mamo mno bo riwai ait ybis kʼana. Mti reto ana mamo snok si remo ro Antipatris.
Tna rabu ti fo, raa sbe ro mamo maa sai mhah mamoʼt snek raa ro sbe. Tna raa sbe ro maut
msya Paulus mamo renti mamo.
Ana wefo mamo snok si mam Kaisarea. Tna moo aam reto mee
Feliks tna moo Paulus msan kʼait ye.
Feliks ymat aam reto mkak. Tna ytu kʼPaulus yawe, “Nyõ ja nhau mam oo ro hayo?” Tna Paulus yawe, “Jõ fi raa ro Kilikia.”
Tna Feliks yawe, “Feto kbe soh raa ro maun boun kʼnyõ mama snok si mam befo to, kbe jõ ttu srah anyõ.” Tna ait ybis raa sbe wait makah Paulus mamo kmot ait mam amah mase ro
Herodes.
Ti ro maat tna raa
Yahudi ro maun baun kʼPaulus mbam Yerusalem mamo sia tna snok mam Kaisarea. Ana weto oh mi
rana ro yase tait yasom Ananias, ysya raa mabi ro Yahudi taro sor, msya raa sait ro yasom Tertulus. Ait yamo raa ro ja ykyas bo soko raa mabi ro Yahudi. Snok mam Kaisarea tna ana beta mamo mo
Feliks. Ana mkyas bo ro ana maun boun kʼPaulus.
Bi Feliks hre ytu sas safo to, tna ait ybis raa mamo mmen Paulus makah mama. Tna fo Tertulus yasen yaun Paulus yawe kʼbi Feliks yawe, “Bi
ro anu hartu; nyõ nbo rabin refo moof toni. Rabin refo kbum sai: Raa ro mamo byoh mama mame anya msya anu fee. Tna ja nyõ nbis raa misoh remo wanu sor to, reto moof toni ye.
Bo weto beta to ro nyõ nisoh mam woyõ-woya to, amu nyoh asik mase toni kʼnyõ.
Jõ tkyas bo miyõ fee. Jõ soh-soh nyõ re nari bo ro jõ betoo kʼnyõ to baro rere.

Amu nnaut nwe Paulus refi yno bo ro mkair toni. Mam woyõ-woya sai ait yamo to, ait yno raa ro Yahudi mrok kmo. Tna ait yamo aban mana raa mkbair sau ro kro Yesus ye. Yesus, Ait raa ro ybam remo ro Nasaret.
Tna ait yawe yber hasyoh Samu Allah ro mbau reto ye. He mfe amu nfot ait fooh. Tna amu nwe ntu srah rait mamyot watum ramu raa ro Yahudi.
Menohe mfe, aban mana raa sbe ro yasom Lisias yno wa. Ait ytak Paulus tna ybis amu ro nuun boun kʼait to, yawe nma no kʼnyõ mam befo.
Mfo refo amu ksoh nyõ nesait ntu safo ro amu nuun boun kʼait to, nari. Tna kbe nyõ nhar bo mabo ye.”
Raa Yahudi taro ro hre mam beto to masen tna mkyas bo maun Paulus ye. Tna ana mawe bo ro Tertulus riwai ykyas to, mabo oh.
Raa ro

Yahudi weto mkyas bo mkak. Tna bi Feliks yawe Paulus ykyas bo riryõn. Tna Paulus yawe, “Taja; jõ thar tawe nyõ namo raa ro ja hre susai ntu srah mam rabin refo fo, tii ooh-oh. Feto oh jõ ksoh bo saak ajõ tama betoo kʼnyõ fo.
Nyõ nhar nawe tiwya ti trion 12 wia to, jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem tawe skabuk.

Tna raa ro Yahudi wefo ana sait bo fri jõ tno bo ro mkair aro fee ye: Jõ santri bo tsya raa fee. Tna jõ tno re raa mno mnin-nin bo fee ye. Ana mmat jõ tno bo ro mkair mam Samu ro Allah fee ye. Tna tno raa mam samu watum kmo fee ye. Thau mam Yerusalem iti to, tna tno raa mnin-nin mam woyõ-woya sai aro fee ye.
Ana maun jõ menohe ana mmat tna mhar mawe bombra ro ana mkyas mai kʼjõ weto to, sau mabo fee ye!

Jõ tawe kʼnyõ abyõ tawe, jõ smot Allah ro amu hohos ramu ja smot ye. Menohe Jõ kro iso ro bi Yesus tiwya yerif. Reto oh mi mno ana kmo. Raa ro Yahudi wefo mawe jõ tno mkair meto. Menohe jõ kro Watum ro Musa beta kaket tna tari bokom ro Allah ybis
wAit mama mkom beta to, tbo tno kaket fares ye.
Jõ smot Allah mnan anya ye mfi ana wefo ye. Jõ tsya ana beta ninaut nwe raa beta ro mhai to, meen Allah yno re anu be brok bsen: Raa ro mno bo mkair ye, msya raa ro ja mno bo moof ye.
Feto oh mi ja jõ thau tisoh jõ kaket afo re thaf moof tsya Allah yoyo tna thaf moof kʼraa anya yoyo bo ye.
Tii ooh-oh jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem fee. Tna fo jõ tamoʼt beto mkah bo takah pitis baro tee kʼraa Yahudi ro kinyah. Tna tawe tamo tsan bosan kʼAllah ye.

Feto to jõ twok mam Samu ro Allah. Mam wore jõ tno bo weto kri-kri to, raa ro Yahudi baro mama. Ana mama mfri jõ mam Samu ro Allah. Tno bo wojõ mam Samu ro Allah reto to, riwai jõ tyon tetsu ajõ mamyot bo mafa ramu raa ro Yahudi oh to. Tna mam weto ye tesait thau kar. Raa aro makin msya jõ bo fee. Tna raa aro mno mmai bo fee ye. Tna tnaut tawe raa ro Yahudi mabo baro mbam rabin ro Asia mama mam ati reto ye. Ana weto mamus jõ saah. Bokyas rana oh mi misti re raa mmai to.
Soh ana weto mamaʼt befo mi, ana oh mi kbe maun jõ tna mkyas bo kʼnyõ.
Menohe ana weto mama fee. Feto nbis raa ro hre mam befo mesait mkyas safo bawya ro tber mai kʼana meto! Taa wore raa manes ro Yahudi ytu srah to, ana mkai safo makan aro fee!

Tnaut tawe ana kmo bo sau ro jõ tkyas kʼana tawe, ‘Jõ smot tawe raa ro mhai to, meen me mrok masen.’ Au oh mi raa maun boun kʼjõ fo. Bokyas reto mno re ana kmo anya tibyo ana mesait mrok mkyas mnin-nin!”

Tiwya bi Feliks yari Yesus yasom oh. Tna ait yyum srah reto matim tna yawe, “Srah ro jõ ttu fo mnan oh. Jõ ksoh tawe bi Lisias ro yamo aban mana raa sbe kbe yesait yama ybam Yerusalem. Tna fo jõ tkyas srah refo mkak oh.”
Tna ait ybis raa sbe ro yase sait yawe, “Nabe Paulus menohe nbu ait mnan-nan sai. Tna raa ro mama moo bo mee kʼait to, nno wa ana ma.”
Ti baro firwas tna bi Feliks yama ysya yfain. Au masom rau Drusila. Tna au to fnya ro Yahudi. Feliks ybis raa sait yamo ytu Paulus yama. Paulus yama tna ykyas Yesus
yasom rAit. Paulus ykyas bosmot rait reto tna Feliks hre yari.

Tna Paulus betoo iso ro Allah yno raa mamo mato mboh. Tna yawe Allah yawe raa misoh ana kaket tna re mno-na bo ma. Tna ykyas wore meen Allah beah srah kʼraa beta. Yari bo weto to, Feliks yrok waa yawe, “Mnan oh, namo oh. Ti aro tna kbe jõ ttu nyõ hah nama nkyas bo kʼjõ u.”
Mam weto ye Feliks ait srau ynaut yawe, “Kbe Paulus yoo pitis aro yee kʼjõ fe mfe a?” Feto oh mi yhau ysuk ytu Paulus yama ysya ait mkyas bo to.
Paulus raa mbu
trion ewok oh. Tna fo Perkius Festus yamo
mam rabin ro Kaisarea shauk yuk ro Feliks riryõn. Feliks yawe yoo raa ro Yahudi mhaf rana. Feto to ait sayõ Paulus yhau sai mam
Festus snok mam
reto. Ait yhau ti tuuf tna ait ybam
ro Kaisarea yamo yut
ro Yerusalem.
Mam weto to
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa mabi wana sor mama mo kʼbi ait tna mkyas Paulus. Ana maun boun Paulus tna mayoh kʼFestus mawe,
“Bi yabi: Amu ksoh nyõ nbis Paulus raa makah mamaʼt Yerusalem.” (Raa weto ana saim bo mawe kbe raa huwya mame Paulus yajat iti mam iso maka).
Menohe Festus yawe, “Mfe, Paulus mfo refo raa mbu mam Kaisarea. Kbe jõ tesait hah te tamoʼt beto ye.
Feto to, nbis raa manes wanu baro kro jõ. Tna bmo sia Kaisarea btu srah refo kʼPaulus mam beto. Soh ait yber safo to, kbe too safo mana tmit kʼait.”
Festus yhau mam Yerusalem ti baro krentuuf
saa bo feto. Tna ait hah ye yamoʼt Kaisarea. Rabu ti fo ait ytu srah tna ybis raa mamo mmen Paulus makah mamaʼt samu ro srah reto.
Ati ro Paulus yama snok mam beto to, raa Yahudi ro mama mbam Yerusalem sor to, mros mur mtan kait tna maun boun ro fanes mawat mai kʼait. Menohe ana aro mtai mros merif boun mabo sau kaket bo fee ye.
Tna Paulus saak ait wa yawe, “Jõ tno bo ro mkair aro tber hasyoh Watum ro Musa fee. Jõ tiwana Samu ro Allah aro fee. Tna tiwana bi Kaisar fee ye.”
Menohe Festus yawe yayoh raa ro Yahudi mhaf tibyo ait ytu kʼPaulus yawe, “Fyi, nyõ ksoh namoʼt Yerusalem tna kbe jõ beah srah anyõ mam tno fe mfe a?”
Menohe Paulus yawe si yawe, “Mfe, jõ fi
Roma: Raa ro bi Kaisar ja ybo kmot. Feto to yuk refo oh mi mnan oh mkah bo raa mtu srah ro kʼjõ to; tabam raa ro Yahudi fee. Taja, nyõ nesait nhar oh jõ tno bo ro mkair aro mai kʼraa ro Yahudi fee.

Soh jõ tber safo ro mkair afo saah feto ee, jõ too tetsu ajõ tsan kʼraa mame tajat rof fea! Menohe boun ro raa maun jõ to, mabo aro fee. Feto kbe raa mbis jõ kbik-kbak msan kʼraa ro Yahudi to ma, re kbe ana mtu srah ro kʼjõ fee saut ye. Jõ tayoh
Kaisar ro yase afo re kbe ait yesait ytu srah refo.”
Bi Festus ykyas bo su ysya raa manes wait. Tna ait yawe kʼPaulus yawe, “Nyõ nayoh nawe bi Kaisar yesait oh kbe ytu srah anyõ to, feto to jõ tbis nyõ namoʼt Roma afo kbe bi Kaisar ytu srah refo.”
Ti baro naut fo
Agripa ysya yfain fai Bernike mbewok mamaʼt Kaisarea tna mmah meen
Festus.
Ana mbewok mhau ti baro mam beto. Tna Festus ykyas srah ro Paulus kʼana yawe, “Raa ro tiwya
Feliks ybu sait yhau mam
fares.
Ati ro jõ tamo thau mam Yerusalem to,
manes ro
Yahudi msya raa mabi wana maun ait. Tna mawe jõ tno bo ro samyoh mai kʼait ye.

Menohe jõ tawe kʼana tawe, ‘Amu raa ro Roma ja nno feto fee. Raa mtu srah raa retait wia. Tna kbe ait retait saak ait wa re kbe raa ro maun ait mari wia. Tna fo raa moo safo mana mmit. Ana mno bo weto mkak wia. Tna fo ana moo raa retait msan kʼraa ro maun boun to, sikowah ait.’
Tawe feto, tna raa manes ro Yahudi weto mawe kro jõ mamaʼt befo. Tna rabu ti fo jõ tbis raa mamo mmen Paulus makah mama yros saak ait wa wore amu beta hre nri.
Jõ trok tawe kbe ana maun ait retait mkah safo ro samyoh toni, menohe mfe.

Raa mros maun ait to, mkyas bosmot rana sai; bonaut Paulus ysya ana to hayah sai. Tna ana mkyas bi sait ro yasom Yesus ye. Raa retait tiwya yajat oh. Menohe Paulus yatak sai yawe bi retait yhai tibyo fee. Yawe Ait ye yrok yasen oh.
Jõ tnaut mamo-me ye tawe, ‘Fyi re kbe jõ ttu safo refo thar fo?’ Tibyo jõ ttu kʼPaulus tawe, ‘Nyõ ksoh namoʼt Yerusalem tna kbe jõ beah srah anyõ mam
reto fe mfe a?’
Menohe Paulus yayoh yawe safo reto ait yakah yaut yamoʼt samu srah ro uu naut. Tna yawe ait yhau mam
mam befo wea ste
Kaisar ro yabi ytu srah rait. Feto jõ tbis ait twok
tna jõ saso wore mre aro afo re tbis ait yamo yo kʼbi Kaisar mam Roma.”
Tna
Agripa yawe
Festus yawe, “Jõ ksoh tari bo ro bi retait ykyas ye.” Tna Festus yawe, “Menrabu jõ ttu ait yama ykyas bo kʼnyõ nari.”
Rabu ti fo
Agripa ysya yfain fai Bernike myum bosnyam wana. Tna bewok masen mamoʼt amah ro raa mtu srah reto mato. Tna raa manes ro
Kaisarea msya raa sbe ro mase to, mama ye. Ana beta hre. Tna bi Festus ybis raa makah Paulus mama ye.
Tna Festus yawe,

Agripa ysya raa ro mama siret mam befo msya amu sor fo: Nmat bi ait refi. Raa ro Yahudi beta kmo ait. Raa Yahudi ro mhau mam Yerusalem msya raa ro mhau mam befo ye; ana mama mo kʼjõ tna mtu-tu mkah mai ro mase mawe, ‘Kbe Paulus yhau kait mam tabam refo ma! Nme ait yajat to!’
Menohe jõ tkai safo makan ro misti re ait yasu marak to, aro fee. Tna fo ait yesait yayoh yawe safo rait refo ait yakah yaut yamo yo
Kaisar ro yase. Feto to, tawe kbe tbis raa makah ait mamoʼt Roma.

Agripa, rabu refo jõ takah Paulus tama befo fo; sik nyõ nsya raa ro hre mam wefo beta ntu bo kʼait. Jõ tawe tkom aam sau tiim bi Kaisar to, kbe betoo safo refo maja rau kʼait. Menohe jõ srau tnaut safo makan rau ro kbe jõ tkom to aro kaket fefares ye.
Soh jõ tiim Paulus yamo yo kʼbi Kaisar ytu srah rait, menohe jõ tkom aam ro maun ait aro fee, kbe raa masah jõ sai.”
Agripa yawe bo kʼPaulus yawe, “Nasen nkyas bo saak nyõ wa.” Tna Paulus yros yawe,
“Taja; nyõ nno bo moof. Jõ simaut mase tesait tkyas bo kʼnyõ kait. Jõ saak jõ wa boun ro raa Yahudi maun jõ refo. Nyõ nhar
ro Yahudi tna nhar bo mafa wamu ro nno soo oh. Nyõ nhar bo weto kaket tna nhar bo mabo rau ro ja amu nno santri anya bo ye oh. Jõ soh-soh kʼnyõ tawe hre wia nari bo ro jõ saak wa jõ refo. Hrowyõ ma.
“Taja; nyõ nno bo moof. Jõ simaut mase tesait tkyas bo kʼnyõ kait. Jõ saak jõ wa boun ro raa Yahudi maun jõ refo. Nyõ nhar
ro Yahudi tna nhar bo mafa wamu ro nno soo oh. Nyõ nhar bo weto kaket tna nhar bo mabo rau ro ja amu nno santri anya bo ye oh. Jõ soh-soh kʼnyõ tawe hre wia nari bo ro jõ saak wa jõ refo. Hrowyõ ma.
Tiwya tinyi jõ thau tsya raa mana wojõ mam Yerusalem. Feto to raa Yahudi beta mhar jõ, tna mhar bo ro ja jõ tno taban tkek ye oh.
Ana tiwya mhar jõ ooh-oh. Mhar mawe jõ kro bonaut raa ro
ye. Tna amu, raa ro
to, ja nhau nbo
wamu ro Yahudi matak toni. Tna soh ana ksoh to, kbe ana mkyas bo weto kʼnyõ ye, mawe mabo.
Jõ tinaut tawe bo ro Allah tiwya ysi kʼamu hohos wamu akus to, meen Ait ybo yno. Bosi
reto to, tbo tna tnaut yoyo. Tna au oh mi jõ tasen tros tasom srah refo fo.
Raa mana wamu 12 beta ja mnaut bosi reto ye. Amu ja skabuk baas mti yoyo. Amu samyoh wer nno bo ro Allah yawe.
Agripa, jõ tinaut tawe bosi reto to, bo ro ati. Tna au oh mi raa wojõ ro Yahudi masen kmo jõ.
Tao na; fyi re anu ntu sioh ye nwe, ‘Allah yatak re yno raa ro mhai mrok masen fee!’”
Tna Paulus yawe, “Tiwya jõ knait raa ro Kristen tawe tno bo ro mkair mai kʼana. Tiwya jõ takit, srau tna thaf mnan anya msya anu nkit tna nhaf wanu sor feto ye.
Reto oh mi tiwya jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem to. Tna
manes wanu mkom aam sau moo matak wana mee kʼjõ. Ana mbis tna tamo tfot raa ro Allah wAit. Tna takah ana mawat tbu mam
Tna jõ tsya raa roto su tawe raa mame ana majat ye.

Ti aro-aro jõ sikowah ana. Tamoʼt woyõ-woya sai saso raa ro Kristen. Jõ saso ana mam samu skabuk sor ye. Soh tkai aro to, tfot tna tbis raa sikowah ana. Jõ tawe tno re ana mwaar Yesus tna beak bosmot wana makus. Jõ kmo ana msai toni tibyo jõ tasen tamoʼt rabin roto ye tna sikowah raa ro Kristen mawat.”
Paulus yawe
Agripa yawe, “Ati sau to,
manes mbis jõ tamoʼt
ro Damsyik saka sikowah raa ro Kristen.

Tna wore baas ayõ mros susai bo feto to, jõ tamo mam iso maka kri-kri fo, jõ tmat naar ro kren mroh. Naar reto mawyah toni syok miwrek ayõ ro mafit to ye. Naar reto mroh mame mur mtan wore wo jõ tros msya raa ro kro jõ mros to ye.

Amu beta ntek nwe ni mam tabam. Tna jõ tari mai sau mame kʼjõ timara mkah mai ro Ibrani mawe, ‘Saulus, Saulus; fyi re rabu ti wawa nyõ nno bo ro mkair sikowah jõ yoyo sai feto to? Nyõ nno feto to nyõ nesait nari nyõ nham ai ye meto.’
Tna jõ ttu si tawe, ‘Nyõ fi awya?’ Menohe
yawe, ‘Jõ fi Yesus ro ja rabu wawa nyõ sikowah.
Nasen oh! Jõ terif Jõ kʼnyõ tawe tsok nyõ namo sryan aJõ. Kbe nyõ nno bo woJõ. Jõ tsok nyõ mkah namo nkyas bo ro riwai nyõ nmat wefo msya bo ro meen Jõ terif kʼnyõ naut ye.
Jõ tbis nyõ namo nkyas Jõ tasom kʼraa ro Yahudi msya raa mana roto ye. Meen ana mfot tna sikowah nyõ ye. Menohe Jõ kbe titsre nyõ nbam ana matem, tno riof kʼnyõ.

Namo nkyas Jõ tasom kʼana feto tna kbe ana masu maah. Mbam wore wo mamur to, kbe ana mamo mhau mam arin ro moof. Tna kbe kabes yabi (Iblis) yase ybo ana u fee. Tna kbe ana mamo raa ro Allah ybo riryõn. Namo nkyas Jõ tasom kʼana afo re ana smot Jõ. Mkah bosmot reto kbe Allah yyon iro wana. Tna meen Ait yoo riof ro mase ysan kʼana ye. Ysan kʼana ysya raa ro Ait ysok mamo raa wAit beta ye.’”
Tna Paulus yawe
Agripa yawe, “Bo ro tiwya Allah ybis jõ tno reto oh mi jõ tari tna tbo tno sai.
Feto to tinyi rau to, jõ tasen tamo tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa Yahudi ro mhau mam
ro Damsyik. Tna fo tamo to kʼana ro mhau mam Yerusalem, msya ana ro mhau mam

ro Yudea beta. Ana beta to mbam raa mana ro Yahudi. Tna fo jõ tamo tkyas bo kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye. Jõ tkyas kʼana beta tawe, ‘Nashana oh! Nma no kʼAllah. Nno bo ro moof sai tna kbe raa taro mmat mhar mawe anu weto nashana tna nmo no kʼAllah oh.’
Tkyas feto oh mi raa ro Yahudi taro hawe. Ana mfot jõ mam Samu ro Allah mawe mame jõ tajat.
Menohe Allah yatmof jõ re jõ thau fares fo. Tibyo jõ thau tkyas Ait yasom kʼraa beta. Tkyas kʼraa kinyah ye tna kʼraa ro mase ye. Tna bo ro jõ tkyas wefo fo mamo mamyot bokyas ro tiwya Allah ybis
na msya Musa mama mkyas wia ye. Tiwya ana mawe,
‘Meen
yama. Tna kbe raa sikowah Ait tna mame Ait yajat ye. Tna fo kbe Ait yrok yasen. Ait tait Raa ro kbe yrok yasen to, tinyi wia yatim. Kbe yakah kek ro
yama. Tna raa mana rAit ro Yahudi msya raa mana roto ye kbe mmat kek reto.’”
Yesaya 42:6, 49:6
Paulus betoo bo weto saak wa ait kri-kri fo, tna Festus yawe mkah ymai ro mase yawe, “Paulus; nyõ nker meto a? Ja nyõ nkom bo wer. Tna bohar mawat ro nhar weto mno re nyõ nker meto a?”
Menohe Paulus yawe, “Taja ro yase, jõ takit ajõ moof sai. Bo ro jõ tkyas fo mabo tu oh.
Agripa ait yhar bo ro jõ tkyas refo ye oh. Feto tna tkyas bo refo abyõ kʼbi ait fo. Bo wefo tiwya raa mno wai fee. Raa beta mmat tna mhar oh. Bi ait yari bo weto ye oh.
Agripa; fyi: Ja nyõ nari bo ro tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mama mkyas fe mfe a? Jõ thar tawe nyõ niwana bokyas wana weto fee.”
Agripa yawe kʼPaulus yawe, “Nyõ nnaut nawe bo ro nyõ nkyas fo, kbe mno jõ tawe smot tna kro Yesus ye a?”

Paulus yawe, “Jõ skabuk Allah afo re nyõ haberek namo raa ro Kristen. Tna raa ro mari bokyas ajõ fo ye. Soh ana mamo raa ro Kristen mam mfo wefo moof ye. Tna soh ana mamo mnan jõ meen rere bo to moof ye. Menohe jõ hawe bo ana raa mfot mbu mfi jõ tiwya raa mfot mbu to.”
Paulus ykyas bo weto mkak. Tna
Agripa,
Festus ysya Bernike msya raa makin ro hre msya ana su weto beta masen mamo.
Wore ana frok kri-kri to, ana mkyas bo kʼanya mawe, “Paulus retait yno bo ro mkair fee. Bo ro yno to safo fee. Nno be raa moo safo mmit kʼait ma. Nno be kbe raa mame ait yajat ma!”
Tna
Agripa yawe
Festus yawe, “Paulus yno bo ro safo aro fee. Feto to, jõ ksoh bitsre ait yamo sai bait. Menohe mfe, ait yawe yakah safo refo yaut oh. Soh feto to bi Kaisar yesait aran ro yatak bitsre ait sai.”
Festus ysan Paulus kʼraa sbe sait ro yasom Yulius mkah kmot ait. Yulius tait raa sbe ro yase sait ro mbam raa sbe mkbair ro
Kaisar ja ybo. Bi Festus ybis Yulius yawe ait ybo Paulus ysya raa ro mhau mam
baro to, kmot ana. Kmot ana tna yakah ana mamoʼt
ro Italia. ⌞Tna meen raa mmit safo wana weto mam
ro Roma.⌟ Feto to, ti baro naut amu
nsen nmo nuut
Amu nuut
sau ro mbam joh ro Adramitium mama. Tna kbe mamoʼt joh aro iti-iti mam rabin ro Asia to mamo. Bi sait ro yasom Aristarkhus ysya amu nmo ye. Ait tait raa
ro Makedonia sait ybam
ro Tesalonika.
reto masen mamo masyõ amu.
Tna rabu ti fo, amu snok mam joh ro Sidon. Yulius fi yno bo moof kʼPaulus: Ati ro
reto mros mam beto to, ait bitsre Paulus yroh yamo ymat yafoh na wait wea. Tna yafoh wait weto moo bo mee kʼait. Tna Paulus hah ye yamoʼt
Tna
reto masyõ amu nbam Sidon nmo fo, foos mase mfi mama. Tibyo raa ro mbo
reto makah amu nmo nwyan sato ro Siprus afo re figyõm ro sawan mai
fee.
Tna fo amu nhoh nmo sawan maam
ro Kilikia msya rabin ro Pamfilia to nmo tna snok mam joh ro Mira mam
ro Likia.
Amu nroh mam remo Mira. Tna raa sbe ro mbo amu ykai
sau mbam
ro Aleksandria kbe mamoʼt rabin ro Italia. Ait ybis amu nmo nuut mam
reto.
ro masyõ amu nmo rere sai. Amu nmo, nmo. Tna raa ro mbo
reto mawe nmo kene mam
ro Knidus. He mfe. Foos mase mfi msai toni tibyo amu nmo to hrowyõ nhai. Tna ana makah
mamo iso ro ana mawe mamo reto tu fee: Amu nmo twat aya mastu ro Salmone afo kbe sato ro Kreta burut wa foos.
Amu hrowyõ oh nmo niwrek tabam makit reto tna nmo snok mam yuk ro masom 'Joh ro Moof' to kene mam remo ro Lasea.
Amu nhau mam beto ste foos mnem wia. Amu nhau, nhau tna ti ro Korat ro
firwas. Tna amu nhau mam joh reto fares. Mam snyi reto to, ja foos msya figyõm mase toni. Tna Paulus yawe kʼraa ro mbo
reto yawe,
“Tao na; soh anu beroh bmo renti to, kbe anu bkai bo ro msai toni mam sawan. Kbe figyõm ro mase refo mno bosatoh msya
refo surun marak. Tna kbe anu bsu bkak ye!”
Menohe raa sbe ro ybo ana tait, yari Paulus fee. Ait yari ana mbo
reto mkyas sai.
reto foos msya figyõm mase toni. Tna ana mhar mawe joh reto mnan fee. Feto to ana makin ro mbo
reto mawe, “Kbe anu bito bmo renti tna snok mam remo ro Feniks tna bhau mam beto mam wore nsoo ro foos mfi to.” Remo ro Feniks mhau mam sato ro Kreta mam ati ro burut wa foos.
Tibyo ati ro foos mfi mbam ati ro
to ana mawe, “Nbis raa skur too ro
! Anu bsen bhoh bmo naut!” Feto tibyo amu nsen nhoh sawan maam ro sato Kreta to nmo.
Ana mamo baro kait fee, tna oof ro mase toni syok mfi mbam tabam ati ro
to frok mama.
Oof mfi mbam ati ro
mamo to. Oof reto mai
tibyo amu bito nmo fee ye. Feto to amu bitsre
reto mhau soso mamo-me sai.
Amu soso nmo kene mam sato maku sau ro masom Kauda. Sato reto burut wa foos. Tna raa hrowyõ mhai tubat
ro raa make mne to, tubat maut mse mam
mato refo.
Ana tubat
reto mse mam
mato. Tna fo ana moo too make
mne reto kaket matak afo re kbe figyõm mai renti habah ma. Tna ana waa mawe kbe
soso mamo tna mai habah mam snik mana ro Sirtis. Ana smyoh bo mabat ro mi
reto tna mitsre, afo re foos mai
reto soso mamo rere baro sai.
Figyõm reto mai amu msai toni. Tna rabu ti fo raa masen tubat bosatoh ro
reto masyõ. Bosatoh weto mkah kbe raa masim fo, raa tubat beak mam aya afo re
mnan-nan.
Tna ti ro tuuf fo ana tubat
mtai-ta taro beak mam aya ye.
Amu nhau ti baro mase ye oh to, snyi mboh fee ye, tna sken mkek fee ye. Foos aya msya figyõm to mai tu feto oh. Amu nrok nwyan marak nwe kbe amu nsu nkak bamu sai oh.
Ti baro ye oh raa weto mait boit fee. Tna Paulus yros susai kʼana yawe, “Tao na; taa anu nri bo ro jõ tawe mi anu bsen bhoh bbam Kreta bmo bkai bo ro msai toni mam sawan fefo fe kbe
refo mkai bo msya bosatoh wanu surun marak oh.
Menohe waa ma, kbe anu sait bo ysu fee, soh
refo saah.
Allah ja ybo jõ tna jõ tari tno bo rAit. Ti sai Ait ybis
sau mama mo kʼjõ mawe,
‘Paulus; waa ma. Nyõ kbe namo no
Kaisar. Allah yatmof yno re nyõ nsya raa wefo beta kbe nkai riof ye.’
Feto to, waa ma. Jõ smot Allah tna thar tawe bo ro yawe to, kbe mabo.
Anu beta kbe nkai riof. Menohe
refo kbe foos mai mso mamoʼt sato sau tna kbe mako mam fraa.”
Figyõm mai amu ti trion 14 mkak oh. Tna amu soso nmo-ne sai mam sawan ro Adria to fares. Tna mam arin masuf raa ro mbo
reto mari he ana mamo snok kene mam mne oh.
Tibyo ana moo too mi fraa tna mbero mam aya, mawe mnit uun rau. Tna ana mmat he aya sawan mam yuk reto to, uun 40
sai. Ana hre baro tna masen moo fraa ro mi too reto mbero mnit aya naut u. Tna mmat he aya uun rau 30
bo feto.
Ana waa mawe nno be
reto mamo mako mam fraa. Tibyo ana tubat
trion jiit mam
tis, mruk mam aya. Tna ana hre mnaut mawe bo mno re reen fooh ee a.
Tna raa ro ja mkah bo ro
reto to, baro saim mawe msyõf
reto masen msam wai sikba
reto mamo. Ana tubat
reto mse mam aya tna sioh mawe, “Amu nuut
refo nmo bero
mbam
mana wia.”
Menohe Paulus yawe bo kʼbi Yulius ysya raa sbe wait yawe, “Soh raa ro mbo
reto masen msam mamo to, kbe anu raa ro bhau mam
refo fo sait bo ykai riof fee ye.”
Feto to, raa ro sbe ofo masen sbi too ro
reto afo re
reto mso mamo makus.
Rabu konok to, Paulus yawe kʼana yawe, “Niit boit oh! Ti trion 14 mkak oh anu nhau waa yoyo sai, tibyo anu niit bo aro kaket fee ye.
Tawe anu niit boit kebet baro afo re kbe ntak. Tna waa ma. Anu bsu marak bo fee ye.”
Paulus ykyas bo weto mkak si fo yasen yoo
tna yayoh asik mawat
mam wore ana masu mmat beta. Tna ait haber
reto yait.
Ana mmat feto mrok simaut baro tna hre mait boit ye.
Amu ro nhau mam
mato reto nbo trion 276.
Ana mait boit mhaf matu oh. Tna fo raa masen tubat
ro mhau fares mkah kbe raa masim to, beak mam aya afo re
reto mnan-nan mamo.
Rabu momo to, ana mmat sawan maam ro snyik mana kene oh. Menohe ana wase rabin reto fares. Ana mawe makah
reto mamoʼt mne reto.
Raa weto masen sbi too ro
fo, tibyo
sruf akus mam aya. Mam weto ye ana misoh miin
reto, mno re mamo trot. Tna moo too make bo mabat ro
reto
mros abyõ afo re foos moo
refo beak mamoʼt mne.
Menohe
reto mamo mako mam snik mana sau.
mana rau mako tibyo mnah baro bo fee ye, tna figyõm mai
tis fo habah.
Raa ro sbe weto masen saim bo mawe kʼanya mawe, “Anu bsen bme raa ro frok mbam
weto beta majat! Bi yabi retait ybis amu kmot ana kaket, re kbe ana aro msam mamo fee. Soh ana sait bo yasen kni yamo to, kbe bi ait yame anu bjat ska riryõn!”
Menohe Yulius ksoh Paulus tna yawe, “Nno feto ma!” Tna ait ybis yawe, “Awya ro yhar bo kni to, busyok yame aya kni yatim wia yaut mne.
Tna anu taro nbo
ftah kni nrof.” Tibyo ana kni beta mamo maut mam mne mkah riof beta.
Amu beta nmo snok mne nkai riof oh. Tna amu nrok nhar nwe sato reto to, sato ro masom Malta oh meto.
Raa ro mhau mam sato reto mno bo moof toni syok kʼamu. Ana huwya mtar amu tna misoh amu kaket ye. Arin mkair re amu nfos toni. Tna ana mko tafoh re kbe amu nmo nni foos ye.
Paulus soo roko thauk tna yamo yawah roko weto yko abyõ mam tafoh. Ait yno feto kri-kri fo, tafoh mafit aban sau ro mhau mato fo tibyo mham frok, tna mafit Paulus yatem.

Raa ro sato reto mmat aban reto mafit Paulus yatem kro feto, tibyo mawe bo kʼanya mawe, “Tnaut tawe raa refi fi ja yame raa majat, menohe ait ykai riof sai mam sawan sai. Tna kabes sayõ ait yhau yaam fee.”
Paulus bes-baas aban reto mamo mait mam tafoh, tna Paulus yari ait yham bo baro fee tum.

Raa ro sato refo mnaut mawe rere baro feto Paulus yatem mrok mtun mase, tna kbe ait yatu btek yai mam tabam yajat. Ana mhau mwof baro kait oh. Menohe yatem moof sai; bo ro ana mnaut reto to, mabo aro fee. Tibyo ana me mnaut mawe, “Nno be bi ait retait kabes sait!”
Raa ro yase mam sato reto yasom Publius. Tna tabam rait mhau kene mam beto. Ait yitrah amah rait kʼamu tna yno bo moof kʼamu ti trion tuuf.
Mam ati reto to, Publius yaja kiyam. Ait yetsu mbe tna ysyõ ksoh ye. Paulus yamo ymat raa ro kiyam retait. Tna skabuk yatem ytor abyõ kʼbi ait. Tibyo bi ait yrok kiyam marak ye.
Paulus skabuk raa retait yrok bros feto, tna bokyas reto raa mari faram ye. Tna raa kiyam taro beta mamo mo kʼPaulus tna ait skabuk ana mrok bros beta ye.
Tibyo raa ro Malta mno bo moof toni kʼamu tna mayoh asik mase kʼamu ye. Amu nhau mam sato reto snyi tuuf. Tna mam wore amu siwyan nuut
roto to, raa ro sato reto makah boit msya bo roto taro ye mama mee kʼamu niit mam
sau ro tiwya mama mbam
ro Aleksandria soso mam sato reto mam soo ro foos mfi reto ye.
reto tiwya raa mfen mana rau mfi
wana mabo ewok mawyan rana.
mabo ewok ro ja ana smot weto to, masom Dioskuri. Tna amu nsen nmo nuut
nmo renti.
Tibyo raa ro Malta mno bo moof toni kʼamu tna mayoh asik mase kʼamu ye. Amu nhau mam sato reto snyi tuuf. Tna mam wore amu siwyan nuut
roto to, raa ro sato reto makah boit msya bo roto taro ye mama mee kʼamu niit mam
sau ro tiwya mama mbam
ro Aleksandria soso mam sato reto mam soo ro foos mfi reto ye.
reto tiwya raa mfen mana rau mfi
wana mabo ewok mawyan rana.
mabo ewok ro ja ana smot weto to, masom Dioskuri. Tna amu nsen nmo nuut
nmo renti.
reto nhoh nmo snok mam joh ro Sirakusa tna soso nhau ti trion tuuf mam beto.
Amu nbam beto nsen nmo renti nmo nwyan tabam reto snok mam joh ro Regium. Rabu ti fo, foos mfi mbam ati ro
tna ti ro ewok to amu snok mam joh ro Putioli.
Mam Putioli to, amu nroh tna nkai raa Kristen baro ye. Ana mabe amu nhau nsya ana mam beto ti trion krema. Tna fo amu nsen nmo iso mne nmoʼt
ro Roma.

Raa Kristen ro mhau mam Roma mari bo amu nma kri-kri fo, tna baro masen mamaʼt remo ro Apius (yuk reto ja raa mama masim bo) mkah bo mtar amu. Tna raa Kristen taro mamaʼt remo ro Tres Taberne mkah bo mtar amu ye. Paulus ymat raa weto mama to, ait simaut mam yhaf mato tna yayoh asik mawat kʼAllah ye.
Amu nmo snok mam
ro Roma to raa ro
matmof Paulus mbis ait yhau mam amah sau ysya raa sbe sait ro kmot ait. Mbis ait yhau mam
fee.

Paulus yhau masno tuuf tna ait ytu raa manes ro Yahudi mama siret su. Tna Paulus yawe kʼana yawe, “Raa wojõ sor: Jõ to tno bo ro mkair aro mai kʼraa wanu fee. Tna tber kait bo mafa ranu ja hohos wanu mno soo bo to fee ye. Menohe raa mfot jõ mam Yerusalem msan kʼraa ro Roma. Tna makah jõ mamaʼt befo.
Raa mase mtu srah ajõ tna mkai safo mabo ro ana maun boun kʼjõ to, aro fee ye. Tibyo ana mawe bitsre jõ tamo. He mfe.
Raa ro Yahudi matak wa sai. Feto oh mi jõ te takah srah refo taut tamo to
Kaisar tna kbe ait ytu srah ajõ fo. Menohe jõ tawe abyõ tawe jõ tamaʼt befo taun boun anu raa ro Yahudi fee.
Feto oh mi riwai jõ ttu anu nma no kʼjõ fo. Tawe betoo bo refo kʼanu. Anu raa ro Israel ja bwe
ro Allah ysok yoo riof yee kʼraa to, kbe yama. Jõ tnaut tawe feto ye. Tna au oh mi raa mfot jõ makah mamaʼt befo fo.”
Tna raa ro Yahudi weto mawe, “Amu nkai aam ro mbam rabin ro Yudea mkyas bo mkair ro nyõ nno bo aro fee ye. Tna raa sait ybam raa wamu wefi bo yama ykyas bo mkair ro nyõ nno bo to fee ye.
Menohe amu nri raa beta mawe kair bosmot raa ro Kristen oh. Tna amu huwya nri bo ro nyõ nesait nkyas.”
Tna ana mmah oon mawe ti aro ana mama siret su u.
Tna mam rabu ro oon sboh to, raa msis-sas mamaʼt amah ro Paulus yhau. Paulus huwya betoo bo kʼana. Ait ykyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Ait ykyas bo kʼana mamo snok hreha. Tna ait ykyas Yesus kʼana ye. Yawe Ait
ro tiwya Watum ro Musa msya
na mkyas ye.
Tna ana taro mari bo ro ait ykyas to, smot bokyas reto mawe mabo oh. Tna ana taro to, hawe smot bokyas reto ye.
Ana mhaf wana hayah-hayah sai. Tna santri anya. Tibyo Paulus yasen ykyas bo ro tiwya Allah ykyas
Yesaya:

“Nasen namo no kʼraa wefo. Tna nawe kʼana nawe, ‘Anu ja nri bo menohe anu srau nnaut bo ro anu nri reto fee. Anu nmat bo menohe mfi bo anu nhar bo reto fee. Anu hawe bo smot Jõ. Tna anu nimara mtuk, hawe nri Jõ fee. Tna nsu wanu mti, wase bo ye. Menohe mfi bo anu hah nma no kʼJõ to, soh anu nhaf smot Jõ to, kbe tno re anu nrok noof; kbe anu nimara nri bo, tna nsu wanu to, kbe nmat bo tna nhar ye.’”
Yesaya 6:9 - 10
Paulus yawe, “Tiwya Har ro
mkyas bokyas reto
Yesaya. Ait ykom bo reto tna ykyas kʼanu hohos na wanu ye. Tna bokyas mbam kʼHar ro
reto mabo oh mefo!” Paulus ykyas bo reto mam tis tna raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi masen mbrir-brar mbam siret refo mamo.
Ana mhaf wana hayah-hayah sai. Tna santri anya. Tibyo Paulus yasen ykyas bo ro tiwya Allah ykyas
Yesaya:

“Nasen namo no kʼraa wefo. Tna nawe kʼana nawe, ‘Anu ja nri bo menohe anu srau nnaut bo ro anu nri reto fee. Anu nmat bo menohe mfi bo anu nhar bo reto fee. Anu hawe bo smot Jõ. Tna anu nimara mtuk, hawe nri Jõ fee. Tna nsu wanu mti, wase bo ye. Menohe mfi bo anu hah nma no kʼJõ to, soh anu nhaf smot Jõ to, kbe tno re anu nrok noof; kbe anu nimara nri bo, tna nsu wanu to, kbe nmat bo tna nhar ye.’”
Yesaya 6:9 - 10
Paulus yawe, “Tiwya Har ro
mkyas bokyas reto
Yesaya. Ait ykom bo reto tna ykyas kʼanu hohos na wanu ye. Tna bokyas mbam kʼHar ro
reto mabo oh mefo!” Paulus ykyas bo reto mam tis tna raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi masen mbrir-brar mbam siret refo mamo.
Ana mhaf wana hayah-hayah sai. Tna santri anya. Tibyo Paulus yasen ykyas bo ro tiwya Allah ykyas
Yesaya:

“Nasen namo no kʼraa wefo. Tna nawe kʼana nawe, ‘Anu ja nri bo menohe anu srau nnaut bo ro anu nri reto fee. Anu nmat bo menohe mfi bo anu nhar bo reto fee. Anu hawe bo smot Jõ. Tna anu nimara mtuk, hawe nri Jõ fee. Tna nsu wanu mti, wase bo ye. Menohe mfi bo anu hah nma no kʼJõ to, soh anu nhaf smot Jõ to, kbe tno re anu nrok noof; kbe anu nimara nri bo, tna nsu wanu to, kbe nmat bo tna nhar ye.’”
Yesaya 6:9 - 10
Paulus yawe, “Tiwya Har ro
mkyas bokyas reto
Yesaya. Ait ykom bo reto tna ykyas kʼanu hohos na wanu ye. Tna bokyas mbam kʼHar ro
reto mabo oh mefo!” Paulus ykyas bo reto mam tis tna raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi masen mbrir-brar mbam siret refo mamo.
Tna ait yawe kʼana yawe, “Nri oh! Nhar oh: Riof ro Allah yoo yee reto to, mfo refo Ait yoo yee kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye. Tna ana weto to, kbe mari tna moo riof rAit reto mse kʼana to.” [
Paulus yawe bo weto mkak. Tna raa ro Yahudi weto taro mrok kmo. Ana beta masen mamo tna santri bo kʼanya iti ye.]
Tna Paulus yhau
trion ewok muuf mam samu ro ait kwiyat reto. Ja ait ksoh huwya ykyas bo ysya awya sai ro yama yo kʼait.
Yhau to, ait ykyas bo abyõ sai ykyas wore wo Allah yamo
ybo raa mana rAit. Tna ait ykyas
Yesus
yasom rAit ykah yatak tna raa aro mno wa bo fee ye.
Romans: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus. Jõ tamo sryan ro
Yesus. Tiwya Allah ytu jõ yawe tamo raabis rAit. Ysok jõ yse hayah yawe kbe tno bo wAit. Au oh mi tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Allah.
Bokyas ro Moof reto, tiwya Allah ysi yawe kbe ykyas kʼraa ro tabam refo. Tinyi ybis
wAit mama mkom Bokyas ro Moof reto mam watum rAit wia. Mkom bokyas reto mam wore wo Yesus yarak fares.
Bokyas ro Moof reto mkyas Yesus, Ku ro Allah yare. Ait fi Allah yare oh tna haberek yamo raa tu ye. Yusuf, ro tiwya ytos Yesus mam wore yhau mam tabam refo to, ait retait ybam kube ro
Daud.
Feto to raa mawe Yesus tait ybam kube ro
Daud ye.
Yhau yamo snok Ait yabi. Tna raa mame yajat. Tna Allah yno Ait yrok yasen mamyot matak Har ro Allah. Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen afo re raa beta mhar mawe Yesus
tait raa tu sai fee. Yno feto yerif yawe
ranu retait yfi Allah ye. Yamo Ku ro Allah yare metait.
Tna mkah bo ro Yesus yno oh mi Allah yatmof jõ. Yatmof jõ re tamo raabis
ro Allah tna tkyas yasom rAit kʼraa makin ro mhau mne, ana ro
Yahudi fee. Jõ tasen tamo to kʼana ro mne weto tna ttu ana re kbe ana mama smot
. Re kbe ana smot, tibyo mari bo ro Ait yawe, mbo mno kaket. Tis rau to, kbe raa mmat bo ro ana weto mno tna raa weto mama bibi Yesus ye.
Anu ro Roma ye nsya raa roto taro ro mhau mne ye to, Allah ytu anu yawe nmo raa ro kro Yesus
Taja, tme, tao, tano na ro nhau mam
ro Roma; jõ tkom aam refo tiim mamoʼt kʼanu ro Allah ytu nmo raa wAit oh. Allah yhafri anu beta. Jõ skabuk kʼanu Bja Allah, re Ait ysya
Yesus
kbe matmof anu tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok sai.
Anu ro
Roma smot Yesus matak oh. Tna raa ro tabam arin aso beta mari oh, tna mkyas bosmot ranu refo. Tibyo mam tinyi rau fo, jõ tayoh asik mase kʼbi Allah mam Yesus
yasom:
Jõ mur-mur tno bo ro Allah yawe tna tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Ku rAit, Yesus. Tna Ait yhar yawe ati ro jõ skabuk to jõ skabuk anu yoyo ye.
Jõ skabuk re kbe jõ tama to kʼanu. Tiwya ooh-oh jõ tawe tama to kʼanu. Tna soh Ait ksoh to, kbe jõ tama tmat anu.
Jõ ksoh toni tawe tama to kʼanu. Tawe tama re kbe tinyan bouum ro mbam Har ro
Tna kbe bouum reto mno re anu nros ntak smot Allah kaket.
Au oh mi jõ tama to kʼanu to, kbe bosmot ajõ mno bosmot wanu mo matak. Tna kbe bosmot wanu mno bosmot ajõ mo matak ye.
Tiwya ooh-oh jõ tawe tama to kʼanu. Menohe bo mburut wa jõ. Jõ tawe tama tkai make aro mam Roma beto. Anu to, nbam raa mana ro Yahudi fee. Tiwya jõ tamoʼt remo roto tkyas bo kʼraa ro wase
Yahudi ye. Tna tkai make aro mam wore weto. Tna mfo refo jõ tawe tama to kʼanu feto ye.
Allah ybis jõ tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof refo kʼraa mana roto makin. Yawe tamo tkyas kʼana ro mkyas bo mkah mai ro Yunani ye tna ro mkyas bo mkah mai roto ye, kʼana ro mhar bo ye tna ro wase bo to ye.
Reto oh mi jõ ksoh tama tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus refo kʼanu ro nhau mam Roma ye.

Allah yno re Bokyas Moof ro Yesus reto to, matak moo riof ro mase mee kʼraa. Thar mafer rau reto tibyo jõ ksoh tamo tkyas Bokyas reto. Jõ twaa fee. Awya ro yari Bokyas reto tibyo smot Yesus to, kbe ykai riof: Tinyi rau to, raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi, tna msya raa mbam raa mana roto makin ye.

Tna Bokyas Moof reto to, mafer moof. Bokyas ro Moof reto mbetoo iso ro raa mkai riof. Mkyas mawe, kbe raa smot Yesus wia tibyo Allah ymat mees rAit yawe ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Iso ro bosmot reto sau aran. Au oh mi Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Raa ro smot Allah oh mi raa ro Ait yawe ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Feto kbe ana mhau mroon.”
Habakuk 2:4

Tna mafer Bokyas ro Moof reto sau naut ye: Bokyas reto mkyas mawe Allah kmo raa ye. Allah yhau mam sawro rAit tna ymat raa ro mno iro to, tibyo kmo ana beta. Raa mno iro mai kʼAit tna mai kʼraa anya ye tibyo Ait kmo ana weto. Bo ro ana mno mkair reto mberkait bo ati ro mbam kʼAllah. Tibyo Ait yoo safo mana ymit kʼana weto.
Allah yerif bo rAit ro ati to kʼana oh. Ana beta mhar bo ro ati mbam kʼAllah reto oh.

Ti tinyi rau tabam refo Allah yfen. Tna mamo snok mam mfo refo to, raa mmat bombra ro Allah yfen. Raa mahni Allah yabo rAit to menohe raa mmat bo ro bi Ait yfen. Tna bo ro Ait yfen weto merif Ait yase rAit tna merif Ait yatak rAit ro mroon ye. Raa mmat tibyo ana srau mnaut mhar mawe Ait tait Raa ro yatak toni tna yase toni ye. Meen ati ro Allah ymit safo kʼraa ro hawe bo smot Ait to, kbe yawe kʼana yawe, “Sioh anu ai to ma. Tiwya anu nmat bombra ro Jõ tno beta oh, reto mnan oh re anu nrok nhar Jõ ye.”
Raa weto to, srau mhar Allah oh. Menohe ana hawe bo mbaut Ait. Tna hawe bo mayoh asik mase kʼAit ye. Tibyo ana mnaut-nat bo ro mafer marak. Tna srau wana to mrok mabuf.
Ana mawe ana mhar bo menohe ana mrok manyiya.
Ana hawe bo smot Allah ro yroon, tna yoof toni retait. Menohe ana ksoh mfen
aro ro mafos fee; bo ro masu mnaif mnan raa, taro mnan ruu, mnan kak, aban bo to. Ana mfen tna smot
wana weto.

Raa weto mhar bo ro ati mbam kʼAllah baro oh. Menohe ana hawe bo smot bi Ait. Feto to Ait yatam ana fee. Ait sayõ rof bo ro ana mno to tibyo ana mno bo bawya ro ana mesait ksoh sai. Ana mhaf mamur tibyo ksoh mno bo ro mkair toni. Ana srau oot-oot maus-as bo sai. Ana to sikowah metsu wana oh meto.

Bo ati ro mbam kʼAllah to, ana mhar mam mhaf mato wana. Menohe bo ro ati weto ana mbeak makus. Mbeak makus tna ana mawe mari bo sioh. Ana sioh ana ai oh meto. Allah oh mi yfen tabam refo beta. Rau ro moof raa bibi Allah yesait aran sai tna mno bo ro bi Ait yawe mamo snok mam hame wajin.
: Mabo oh! He mfe, raa weto to miwana Allah. Tna smot bo knik-knak ro Ait yfen sai.

Ana mno feto tibyo Allah yatam ana fee. Ait sayõ rof ana sai. Tna ana weto taro mawat srau oot-oot mno bo ro mkair toni, mno bo ro mti hrenaut: Fnya wana taro hawe bo msya raa sme wana: Fnya mjin su mjah fnya anya.

Tna raa sme taro hawe bo mjah fnya wana. Raa sme srau oot-oot anya tibyo mjin su mjah raa sme anya wana ai. Ana mno bo ro mkair feto oh mi Allah yno bo ska kʼana riryõn. Tna kair matu mai kʼana metsu wana.

Ana mmat sas bo ro Allah yno. Mmat bo ro ati reto. Mhar oh menohe hawe bo mfot bo reto tna mse mam kʼana mhaf wana fee. Mawe mafer aro fee. Allah ymat he ana miwana Ait. Feto to Ait yatam ana fee. Ait sayõ rof ana. Tna ana mhau mhaf mamur. Mhaf mato wana to mkair tibyo ana mno bo ro mti safo.

Ana to mno iro mai kʼAllah yoyo. Tna ana mno safo aro rau-rau mai kʼraa anya ye. Ana masu mase sai mkah bo ro raa. Ana ja mno bo ro mkair-kar, maam bo raa anya, mame raa anya, mmak msya raa anya, sioh-sah anya, mhaf mato wana saim safo ro mkair yoyo, ntoo anya.
Ana mawe kair anya, ana knait Allah, miwana raa anya, tna tawyõ ana ai. Ana to safuk mawe ana uu kar yoyo ye. Tna ana ksoh bo msair safo rouu yoyo. Tna hawe bo mari bo kʼraa mabi wana.
Ana makit marak. Ana to srau ewok, ksoh raa roto fee, matmof raa anya to fee ye.

Ana mhar mawe Allah yawe awya ro wyahte Watum rAit feto kbe raa mame ait to yajat. Menohe ana mesait beroh mno bo ro mkair weto. Tna ana msya mafoh na ro miwana Allah mfi feto ye to, ana mbibi anya ye.

Tna anu bhar bwe iro ro raa mno feto to, kbe Allah ymit kʼana tu oh. Menohe anu bsait fyi? Mfi bo anu bmat raa roto tibyo mam bhaf mato wanu bwe safo btek kʼana. Menohe anu bsait ja haberek bno bo mkair mnan anya mfi ana feto ye. Anu bsait oh mi bwe safo btek mai kʼanu oh meto! Anu bhar bwe kbe Allah ymit safo weto kʼanu mnan si tu oh! Kbe raa aro yban anu fee saut! Kbe anu bsam bmo fari re Allah yahni iro wanu fee ye!

Tna anu bhar bwe iro ro raa mno feto to, kbe Allah ymit kʼana tu oh. Menohe anu bsait fyi? Mfi bo anu bmat raa roto tibyo mam bhaf mato wanu bwe safo btek kʼana. Menohe anu bsait ja haberek bno bo mkair mnan anya mfi ana feto ye. Anu bsait oh mi bwe safo btek mai kʼanu oh meto! Anu bhar bwe kbe Allah ymit safo weto kʼanu mnan si tu oh! Kbe raa aro yban anu fee saut! Kbe anu bsam bmo fari re Allah yahni iro wanu fee ye!

Tna anu bhar bwe iro ro raa mno feto to, kbe Allah ymit kʼana tu oh. Menohe anu bsait fyi? Mfi bo anu bmat raa roto tibyo mam bhaf mato wanu bwe safo btek kʼana. Menohe anu bsait ja haberek bno bo mkair mnan anya mfi ana feto ye. Anu bsait oh mi bwe safo btek mai kʼanu oh meto! Anu bhar bwe kbe Allah ymit safo weto kʼanu mnan si tu oh! Kbe raa aro yban anu fee saut! Kbe anu bsam bmo fari re Allah yahni iro wanu fee ye!

Mfo refo Ait yoo safo ymit kʼraa to fefares. Allah tait Raa ro kanyin sai. Ait tait Raa ro yhaf ase. Allah ksoh yawe raa mashana. Feto to Ait bitsre rere baro feto tna re kbe raa mashana. Nno be anu aro niwana boatmof rAit reto to ma. Beroh nno bo ro mkair ma, re kbe meen Allah yno bo ro mase mai kʼanu.

Anu to, nna mase tna hawe bo nashana. Anu to beroh nno iro. Feto to anu nno Ait kmo renti. Tna kbe meen Ait yno bo ro mase mai kʼanu. Nnaut oh: Meen, ati sau to, kbe Ait yoo srah ymit kʼraa beta. Wore Allah yoo safo ymit kʼraa ro mno safo to, yno bo ro mnan si oh meto. Tna kbe raa beta mmat mawe Ait yno bo mnan si yum.
Allah kbe ska bo kʼraa sait-sait mamyot si bo ro ait retait yno:

Raa ro beroh mno bo ro moof to, mno re Allah yhaf mnan. Ana weto to raa ro ja saso roon ro hame. Mam wono to ana weto ksoh re Allah yoo ana yse hre abyõ mam yuk ro moof, tna kbe raa mmat ana ye. Ana ro saso bo weto oh mi meen Allah yno afo re fri roon ro hame.

Menohe kbe Allah kmo raa ro ja mno bo ro moof mkah ana mesait ai sai. Kbe Allah kmo raa ro ja mmat raa anya fee. Kbe Ait kmo raa ro hawe bo mari bo ati ro mbam kʼAit, tna raa ro ja mber safo. Tibyo meen ana weto mkai bo ro mkair.
Meen kair mai kʼraa beta ro ja mno bo mkair: Raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi wia tinyi tna msya raa mbam raa mana roto ye. Kbe ana mbewok ye srau wana hri.

Menohe meen Allah yno bo ro moof kʼraa ro ja mno bo ro moof. Meen Allah yoo ana weto yse hre abyõ mam yuk ro moof tna mam wono to, kbe raa mmat ana ye. Tna ana weto meen mhau mhaf tnok ye: Raa ro Yahudi wia tinyi tna raa mbam raa mana roto makin to ye.
Allah ymat raa beta to, yawe mnan anya sai. Ysok raa sait fee.

Tna raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi to, ana mhar Watum ro Allah yoo yee kʼMusa. Tna soh ana mno bo mnan si Watum reto to fee, kbe yoo safo mana ymit kʼana. Tna raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin to, ja wase Watum ro Musa. Menohe soh ana mno iro miwer Watum reto to, meen ana safe mkak ye.

Allah tait yhaf mnan kʼawya? Ait hawe raa ro mhar Watum ro Musa sai menohe mbo mno beta fee. Ait yhaf mnan raa ro mari Watum reto tna mbo mno beta. Allah ymat sas ana weto tna meen yawe ana oh mi raa ro mhaf moof ati.
Raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin weto, ana wase Watum ro Musa reto. Menohe ana baro mno bo moof mfi bo ana kro Watum reto. Watum maja rau reto ana mhar mam mhaf mato wana ai sai.

Bo moof ro ana weto mno to, merif mawe Allah yno re mhaf mato wana to, mti bonaut kʼana. Mti bonaut kʼana re mhar Watum reto maja rau. Ana mesait mnaut bana re mhar mno bo ro moof mamyot Watum reto. Tna soh ana mno bo ro mkair to mhaf wana bhah ana ye.

Meen, ati ro Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa sait-sait to, kbe ymat sas raa mhaf mato wana. Ymat sas tibyo yhar bo beta ro tiwya ana mno wai. Tna yhar soh raa kro Bokyas Moof ro Yesus to, tna mno mnan si, fe mfe a. Tna fo
Yesus yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa. Bokyas Moof reto oh mi ja jõ tkyas kʼraa.
Anu taro nwe, “Jõ fi raa ro Yahudi. Tna amu nnaut nwe Watum ro Musa reto to, matak re mno amu nhaf moof ati tibyo nkai riof ro mase.” Tna anu weto to safuk nwe anu niranya nsya Allah oh.
Tna anu nwe anu nhar bo bawya ro Ait yhaf mnan. Tna anu nhar Watum ro Musa tibyo anu nhar bo ro moof msya nhar bo ro mkair.
Anu to, nwe anu nsu maah re mbefatu raa. Mbefatu raa tna nerif iso ro Allah kʼraa ro masu mti fares. Anu nwe anu to, nbo kek nmo nram raa ro mhau mam wore mamur fares.
Anu nwe Watum ro Musa mno re anu nhar bo ro ati. Tna anu nwe anu nhar Watum ro Allah beta mnan si oh to. Nwe nhar oh tibyo nerif bo kʼraa ro wase bo ye tna nmo
ro ja watum bo kʼraa ro mfi ku kinyah fares ye.
Soh anu nwe nhar bo weto beta oh to, fyi re anu nbo tna nno bo weto fee! Rau ro moof to, anu nesait nri bo ro ja anu watum kʼraa. Anu nkyas nwe, “Nsyõf bo ma!” Fyi, anu nesait ja nsyõf bo fe mfe a?
Anu to, nkyas nwe, “Nwyah ma!” Fyi, anu nesait nwyah ye fe mfe a? Anu nkyas nwe, “Amu knait
bo to.” Fyi re anu nmoʼt yuk ro raa msan bo
weto, tna nsyõf bosan ro raa mse
weto!
Anu safuk nwe anu nhar Watum ro Allah yoo yee kʼMusa oh. Menohe anu nno bo miwer Watum rAit reto. Anu nno bo bawya meto ee? Soh anu niwer Watum rAit to, anu niwana Allah oh meto.
Feto oh mi Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Anu, raa ro Yahudi, oh mi nisti re raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin mamus Allah ranu to.”
Yesaya 52:5
Anu raa ro Yahudi to, ja nkom tohmi

Anu nkom anya feto, afo re kbe raa mhar mawe anu to, raa ro Allah wAit. Soh anu weto nri tna kro Watum ro Musa weto beta mnan si to, kbe bo mafa ro nkom tohmi reto mafer moof ye. Soh anu nkro Watum ro Musa weto beta to fee, anu weto nnan anya nsya raa mana roto sai, ro raa mkom fee. Anu nkom to, mafer marak.
Feto ye: Ana ro raa mkom tohmi fee; mfi bo ana weto mari Watum ro Musa mbo mno kaket to, kbe Allah ymat ana mfi raa wAit ye, mnan anya msya raa ro raa mkom oh.

Raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin to, ja mkom fee. Menohe soh ana ja mno bo mamyot Watum rAit to, Allah yhaf mnan ana ye. Menohe anu ro raa mkom oh tna nhar Bokom ro Allah ye to; soh anu niwer Watum rAit reto to, meen Allah yoo safo ymit kʼanu. Ymit safo kʼanu tna kbe raa ro mne mros mmat mawe, “Ae, amu ksoh ye.”
Anu ro Yahudi nwat to nwe kro bo mafa ro hohos na wanu. Tibyo anu raa mkom tohmi oh. Anu raa mkom feto oh mi misti anu weto nnaut nwe anu nesait ku ro Allah wAit to, ku ro ati to. He mfe.
Mfi bo anu raa mkom, tna mfi bo anu kro bo mafa raa ro Yahudi to, bo ati meto fee. Watum ro Musa to, matak misoh raa mhaf wana moof to fee. Soh Har ro
misoh anu nhaf wia to, kbe anu nmo raa ro Allah wAit ro ati to. Kbe raa ro tabam refo bibi anu u fee. Menohe kbe Allah bibi anu.
Amu fo raa mana ro Yahudi. Amu raa mana ro Yahudi bkai mafer bawya? Amu fo raa mkom oh to, mafer rau to miyo?
Mafer rau to mawat: Bokyas ro Allah to, tii Ait yehau oh kʼamu hohos na wamu.

Bo ro Allah yawe tna yno to, mhau bau yum. Menohe raa Yahudi baro hawe smot Allah. Ana miwana bo ro bi Ait yawe. Bo ro ana mawe tna mno to, kbe mburut wa Bokyas ro Allah makus fee saut. Ebokmi raa ro tabam refo beta sioh raa anya. Menohe Allah tait sioh raa fee. Bokom ro Allah mawe,

“Meen raa masu maah tna mrok mhar mawe ana mno bo mkair. Tibyo ana manwaruk mawe, ‘Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu to, yno bo mnan si oh meto.’ Tna raa taro kbe maun Allah mawe yno safo. He mfe, kbe safo btek Ait aro fee.”

Bo ro Allah yawe tna yno to, mhau bau yum. Menohe raa Yahudi baro hawe smot Allah. Ana miwana bo ro bi Ait yawe. Bo ro ana mawe tna mno to, kbe mburut wa Bokyas ro Allah makus fee saut. Ebokmi raa ro tabam refo beta sioh raa anya. Menohe Allah tait sioh raa fee. Bokom ro Allah mawe,

“Meen raa masu maah tna mrok mhar mawe ana mno bo mkair. Tibyo ana manwaruk mawe, ‘Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu to, yno bo mnan si oh meto.’ Tna raa taro kbe maun Allah mawe yno safo. He mfe, kbe safo btek Ait aro fee.”
Mazmur 51:6

Raa taro ye hafrah jõ mawe, “Amu nnaut nwe, ‘Allah yoo safo ymit kʼanu raa ro bno iro to, Ait yno bo moof mnan si oh meto. Menohe fyi meto? Soh anu raa ro ssafo fee re btek mam iro beta, fyi re Allah ymit safo mana weto kʼanu? Allah yber safo oh meto! Rau ro moof to, meen Ait sayõ rof bo ro raa mno sai, tna yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu to ma!’” Ana weto mkyas bo mamyot raa ro tabam sai, bonaut rana reto to mabuf.
Bokyas mkair toni meto! Ana ro jõ tkyas weu to, mkyas bo ro sre. Allah tait Raa ro yhaf moof ati. Soh mfe to, fyi re meen Ait yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa ro tabam refo beta?

Ana weto hafrah jõ u mawe, “Karik raa mmat he amu fo raa ro sioh raa. Menohe ana mmat Allah to, mawe Ait Raa ro ja sioh fee. Ait yno bo ro mnan si yum. Mmat bo weto tibyo ana bibi Allah, mawe bo ro Ait yno to moof miwer. Tis rau to sioh ramu to mafer moof. Feto to kbe Allah ymat iro wamu yoo safo mana ymit kʼamu fyi meto?”
Raa taro to sioh mawe, “Paulus yawe fefo: ‘Nma, bno iro re kbe ro moof to, frok mbam iro reto!’” Raa ro mkyas bo feto, ana beta to raa ro masoh mase. Maami Allah yoo safo ymit kʼana weto.

Feto to fyi? Allah ynaut yawe amu raa ro Yahudi to, raa ro ati niwrek raa mana roto, fe mfe a? Mfe saut! Riwai jõ tkom tawe raa beta mno iro oh: Raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye tna msya raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye. Tibyo kbe Allah yawe safo btek kʼana beta.
Feto ye, Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro tabam refo sait bo yhaf moof ati fee.
Tna raa ro tabam refo to bohar wana beta mabuf. Bonaut rana msya bokyas wana to mafer marak. Tna sait saso Allah fee ye.
Raa beta haberek kbor kʼAllah. Ana beta to mafer marak sai. Tna sait bo yno bo ro moof fee.”

“Mbam srau wana to, raa mkyas bo ro mnis, mfi hai ro mhai tna raa sama fefares to, kbe mnis ye. Tna hrea wana mkyas bo to sioh. Tna masoh anif wana mkyas tna saraf-saraf raa. Mfi abboh ro ja saraf raa majat.”
Mazmur 5:9; 140:4
“Tna ana mhaf knait raa yoyo tibyo masoh wana to mhau mamus raa yoyo ye.”
Mazmur 10:7
“Tna maa wana to, mhoh mamo mame-ama raa sai.
Woyõ-woya ana mamo to ana sikaut-kat bo raa ye, tna sikowah raa ye.
Ana to wase bo miranya ye.”
Yesaya 59:7,8
“Tna ana to wase bo waa Allah ye.”
Mazmur 36:2

Nnaut oh: Bokom weto to, tiwya Musa ykom mam Watum rait. Tna bokom beta ro mhau mam Watum ro Musa to bo ro Allah ykyas kʼraa ro Yahudi. Allah yoo Watum reto yee afo re kbe raa mhar bo ro moof tna mno, tna bo ro mkair to mno ma. Feto tibyo ati ro Ait yoo safo ymit kʼraa to, kbe raa beta mhar mawe bo ro moof to miyo. Tna kbe raa sait bo fee yasen ywaar yawe, “Jõ twase bo reto!” Kbe raa sait saak ait to fee ye. Bo ro bi Ait yawe to, meen raa ro tabam refo beta to, mari tna manwaruk.

Allah yawe raa beta ro mhau mam tabam refo to, sait yhaf moof ati fee. Raa baro siko mbo Watum ro Musa mno mnan si. Menohe Watum reto to, matak mno re raa mamo mhaf moof ati to fee. Allah ymat ana weto yawe ana weto to raa ro ja mber safo ye. Watum reto to, mafer rau oh mi mno re raa mhar mawe ana raa ro ja mno iro.
Mfo refo Allah yerif iso roto sau kʼanu re kbe Ait kmo anu u fee yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Watum ro Musa to matak re misoh raa mhaf moof ati fee. Menohe Watum reto msya bokyas ro Allah ybis
wAit mkom to, tiwya mkyas iso ro tna refo matim oh.
Iso ro tna reto oh mi: Raa smot Yesus
tibyo msam wai kʼAit
to. Allah yawe awya ro smot Yesus feto to, kbe Allah ymat mees ro Yesus tibyo yawe ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati oh. Raa ro Yahudi ye tna msya raa ro
Yahudi fee ye mamo iso reto saah. Beta mnan anya sai.
Raa beta to mno iro. Menohe Allah tait Raa ro yase. Ait yno bo ro moof toni. Bo moof beta ro anu raa bno to moof mnan Ait fee. Mabut fares sai.
Tna Allah ksoh rAit sai yatmof anu. Yatmof anu tna
Yesus yfes anu. Tibyo Allah ymat mees ro Yesus tibyo yawe anu bfi raa ro bhaf moof ati. Bhaf mkair aro u fee.

Raa ro tabam refo mno iro. Tna ja Allah yawe safo btek mai kʼraa awya ro yno iro oh. Tibyo meen Ait sikowah ana. Menohe anu taro to, meen Allah sikowah anu wefo fee. Fyi? Ait ysan Yesus tna raa sikowah Ait, mame Ait riryõn. Ait shauk anu oh meto. Raa beta mmat raa mame Ait to. Yesus yake anu raa ro bno iro weto mkah mees rAit oh meto. Tibyo Allah yhaf mnan raa ro smot Yesus. Anu smot Yesus tna nhar bo ro Ait yno reto bo mabo. Tna raa ro tiwya mno iro, ati ro Yesus raa mame fefares to, Allah sikowah ana wia fee. Ait kanyin sai bait fares. Soh Yesus shauk yuk wana to fee, kbe raa mawe kair Allah mawe, “Fyi re Nyõ natmof raa ro mno iro ee? Nyõ nkro Watum aNyõ fee meto. Bo mkair oh meto!” He mfe, Allah yse Yesus shauk yuk wana oh. Yno feto yerif yawe Allah tait Raa ro yno bo mnan si oh.

Tna mfo refo ye; Allah ymat raa ro smot Yesus mawe bo ro Ait yno to, mabo oh. Allah yawe ana weto mfi bo raa ro mhaf moof ati. Allah ysan Yesus afo re raa mmat tna mhar mawe Allah fi Raa ro yno bo moof mnan si.
Feto to kbe anu raa safuk bo bawya? Mfi bo anu bri Watum ro Musa tna ja bbo bno to, kbe Allah ymat anu yawe anu to raa ro bhaf moof ati fe mfe a? Mfe: Anu beta bno iro oh. Menohe anu smot
Yesus bwe bo ro yno weto to mabo oh. Anu smot Yesus feto sai afo re kbe Allah ymat mees rAit tibyo yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati.
Anu bhar bwe, mkah bosmot
reto oh mi Allah ymat anu yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Anu bri Watum ro Musa bbo bno to, kbe mno anu bhaf moof ati to fee.
Anu raa ro Yahudi nnaut nwe Allah yawe anu nesait aran nma no kʼAit a? Mfe, Ait ksoh yawe raa mana roto makin mama mo kʼAit ye fea!
Anu bhar bwe Allah sait aran metait. Tibyo ysaim iso sau aran re kbe raa mama mo kʼAit: Raa Yahudi ro smot
Yesus, mhaf mse bo ro Ait yno to, kbe Allah yawe ana beta to mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati meto. Tna msya raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye; ana beta ro smot
Yesus tna mhaf mse bo Ait yno to, kbe Allah yawe ana to mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati meto ye.
Feto to fyi? Bosmot mirare Watum ro Musa a? Mfe. Anu smot
Yesus to anu bros tis Watum ro tiwya Allah yoo yee kʼMusa maja rau oh meto.
Nnaut bi Abraham. Ait tait anu hohos ranu, raa ro Yahudi. Tiwya ait yhau mam tabam refo tna ykai bo bawya?

Allah ymat Abraham yawe ait tait yfi raa ro yhaf moof ati. Bombra ro Abraham yno oh mi mno re ait yrok yhaf moof ati fe mfe a? Mfe. Soh mabo to, kbe ait safuk re kbe raa bibi ait saah. He mfe; ait ytai yno bo aro re kbe Allah bibi ait to fee.
Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Bo ro Allah ykyas kʼAbraham reto to, ait yari tna smot
Smot yawe bo ro Allah yawe reto to meen mabo. Au oh mi Allah yawe Abraham tait raa ro yhaf moof ati.”
Kejadian 15:6
Soh raa sait ykah bo raa to, kbe raa moo boren maren ait to. Tna boren reto to, raa mawe 'bouum' fee. Boren rait sai meto.
Tna raa mawe 'bouum' soh raa moo bo mee sai kʼait; mee kʼait ebokmi ykah bo rana aro fee. Feto ye Allah ksoh yuumto haf ro moof kʼraa ro smot
Ait. Yawe ymat raa mfi ana mhaf moof ati oh to, au oh mi bouum ro Ait yuumto kʼraa to. Ait ja yuumto bouum refo kʼraa ro mhaf mkair.
Tiwya
Daud yhar bo reto ye. Yhar yawe, ksoh rAit sai, Allah ysan haf ro moof kʼraa baro. Ana mno bo aro wia fee re kbe Allah yno feto. Yoo sai. Kbe ana weto simaut.
Daud yhar bo reto tibyo ykom fefo:
“Raa taro to, ana miwer Watum ro Musa menohe Allah skur re ana masom iro weto u fee. Tna iro ro ana mno to, Allah yyon beta. Allah yno bo moof kʼana weto oh.
Safo mana wana to, Allah ymit kʼana fee. Allah yno bo moof kʼana weto oh.”
Mazmur 32:1-2
Raa ro Allah ymat yawe raa weto raa ro mhaf moof ati to, kbe ana simaut. Ana weto to awya? Raa Yahudi ro tiwya raa mkom tohmi
oh mesait, tna msya raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye fe mfe a? Ja anu bwe Allah ymat bosmot
ro Abraham tibyo Allah yawe ait yfi raa ro mhaf moof ati.
Nnaut tija Allah yawe Abraham raa ro yhaf moof ati? Raa
ait matim wia oh fe mfe a? Mfe. Ti ro Allah yawe Abraham raa ro yhaf moof ati to, Abraham tait raa
fefares.
Allah ymat bosmot
ro Abraham tna yawe ait yfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Yawe feto tna ti baro firwas raa
ait. Raa
ait afo re kbe raa mhar mawe ait yhaf moof ati. Feto ye mkah raa ro raa
fee: Awya sai ro smot
Allah to, Allah ymat ait yawe ait tait yfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Ait yhaf moof ati ynan fi Abraham tiwya yrok raa ro yhaf moof ati. Tibyo raa mawe ait yfi ku ro Abraham.
Feto ye, raa ro Yahudi, ana ro raa
oh: Soh ana smot Allah mnan anya mfi Abraham tiwya smot Allah to, ana mamo ku ro Abraham wAit ye.
Tiwya Allah yawe yuumto tabam refo beta kʼAbraham ysya kube wait. Fyi re Ait ysok Abraham? Tiwya Abraham kro Watum ro Allah mnan si tibyo Allah ysok ait, fe mfe a? Mfe, bosmot
ro Abraham oh mi Allah yawe ait yfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tibyo Allah ysok ait.

Feto ye, soh Allah ysok raa ro kro Watum ro Musa sai, tna ysan bosan kʼana mhaf mse to, kbe bosmot ranu mafer marak sai. Tna bo ro tiwya Allah yawe kʼAbraham reto to, mafer marak ye! He mfe, mafer rau mhau kʼanu fares.

Woyõ-woya raa mhar Watum ro Musa to, kbe raa miwer watum reto. Tna soh raa miwer Watum reto kbe Allah kmo ana. Tibyo yno bo mbtek mai kʼana. (Tna wore Watum reto raa wase to, kbe raa miwer Watum reto fee ye!)
Feto to Allah yawe raa mrok mhaf moof ati mkah bo mamo mam iso ro bosmot

. Ait ksoh rAit sai yuumto haf ro moof kʼanu feto. Iso reto Ait yuumto bo kʼraa ro Yahudi mesait kar fee. Yuumto bo kʼawya-awa sai ro smot Allah ynan fi tiwya Abraham smot Allah feto. Kbe yuumto bouum reto tu oh. Tna Abraham tait anu bja ranu beta.
Mam bokom ro Allah, Ait yawe kʼAbraham yawe,
“Jõ tno re raa mana mawat aro u kbe mawe, ‘Abraham tait bja ranu.’”
Kejadian 17:5
Tna bo ro Allah yawe reto Abraham ynaut mamo-me fee. Ait yhar yawe Allah tait Raa ro yno raa ro mhai to, mrok masen. Tna Allah yhar bombra beta ro marak fares, tibyo ykyas raa ro ysair fefares ye.
Abraham tait yabi oh ati ro Allah yawe kʼait to yawe,
“Meen nyõ kube wonyõ to msis-sas. Kbe ana rembes mamo raa mana mawat aro u.”
Kejadian 15:5
Bo ro Allah yawe reto to, Abraham ynaut maut-mroh fee. Yhar yawe bo ro Allah yawe yno to, kbe mabo tu oh. Abraham
bo feto oh. Menohe bosmot
rait mroh fee. Ait yhar yawe yetsu rait saf-safo u fee. Tna yfain Sara to, mhaf ku rau to msyit oh. Menohe yinaut sai yawe kbe ana mabe ku.
Abraham tait yabi oh ati ro Allah yawe kʼait to yawe,
“Meen nyõ kube wonyõ to msis-sas. Kbe ana rembes mamo raa mana mawat aro u.”
Kejadian 15:5
Bo ro Allah yawe reto to, Abraham ynaut maut-mroh fee. Yhar yawe bo ro Allah yawe yno to, kbe mabo tu oh. Abraham
bo feto oh. Menohe bosmot
rait mroh fee. Ait yhar yawe yetsu rait saf-safo u fee. Tna yfain Sara to, mhaf ku rau to msyit oh. Menohe yinaut sai yawe kbe ana mabe ku.
Bo ro Allah yawe to, Abraham ynaut maut-mroh fee. Bosmot rait mo matak renti. Bo reto mabo fefares Abraham ybaut bo yase ro Allah rAit.
Ait yhar yawe Allah yatak yno bo ro Ait yawe reto mabo.
Bokom ro Allah mawe, “Abraham yari bo ro Allah yawe, yfot yse kʼait. Au oh meto Allah yawe Abraham tait raa ro yhaf moof ati.”
Bokom reto mawe Abraham yfi raa ro yhaf moof ati. Bokom reto mkah Abraham yesait kar fee.
Bokom reto mkah anu ye. Soh anu smot Allah, ro yno
ranu Yesus yrok yasen to, kbe Allah yawe anu fo bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati ye.

Anu bno iro. Menohe Allah sikowah anu fee. Ait ysan Yesus yawe Ait raa sikowah tna mame riryõn. Yno feto yake anu ro bno iro mkah yetsu rAit. Tna Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen re kbe yerif yawe bo ro Yesus yno to, mnan si oh. Yno re kbe Allah ymat anu yawe anu to, bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati to.
Feto to
ranu Yesus
yno re Allah ymat bosmot ranu tibyo yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Mafer rau sau to anu brok biranya bsya Allah oh meto.

Mafer sau naut to, anu smot bo ro Yesus yno tibyo Ait tubat anu. Tubat yse anu hre mam wore wo moof. Tna wore weto to, ja Allah yatmof anu yoyo. Tna mafer sau naut to, mfo refo ja anu simaut mase binaut bwe meen bmat bo yase ro Allah rAit tna bkai bo yase rAit reto baro kʼanu ye.

Reto sai fee: Mam wore anu bkai bo ro samyoh matu mai kʼanu to anu simaut mase ye. Anu bhar bwe kbe mafer rau to moof. Anu bhar bwe bo mama matu mai kʼanu weto to mno re anu bmo raa ro btak, raa ro kanyin sai.
Anu bito bsom bo ro matu mai kʼanu to, mno re anu raa ro bhaf ntrot renti. Anu bhau bhaf ntrot to, mno re anu raa ro binaut bwe meen bhaf bse bo yase ro Allah siwyan kʼanu.

Allah yawe Ait yhafri anu toni. Ait yhafri anu tibyo ysan Har rAit to mjin kʼanu bhaf mato wanu. Tna Har reto mno re anu bhar bwe Allah yhafri anu. Tibyo binaut bwe bo ro Allah yawe siwyan kʼanu reto to, kbe mabo tu oh. Kbe anu hrenaut fee.
Tna tiwya Allah ysok oon ro
yama. Oon reto to, Allah ymat yawe anu raa ja hawe bo bri bo ro Ait yawe. Tna ymat yawe anu raa ro saf-safo fee ye. Feto tna
yama ysan Ait kʼraa mame yajat re yno riof kʼanu.
⌞Bo ro

yno reto yuan fee. Awya ro ksoh yiryõ ait? Tnaut tawe raa ro tabam refo sait bo kbe yawe ait yesait raa mame riryõn fee.⌟ Mfi bo raa sait yno safo aro fee, tna raa mawe mame yajat to: Awya ro yawe, “Nme ait retait ma! Nma nme jõ riryõn re riof kʼait!” Ja raa aro mawe bo feto fee. Tna mfi bo ait ro yhaf moof sait tait, tna raa mawe mame ait ro yhaf moof retait yajat to: Kbe fyi? Karik sait roto yawe yasen shauk.
Menohe
yno bo reto. Ymat anu wore wo ja bno iro. Tna yama tna ysan Ait raa mame yajat. Reto oh mi anu bhar bwe Allah yhafri anu.

yawe raa mame Ait yajat rof. Ysan Ait yesait mkah bawya? Afo re mfo refo Allah ymat anu yawe mees ro Yesus rAit reto mno anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Feto to meen ati ro Allah kmo tna ymit safo kʼraa ro tabam refo to, kbe Ait kmo anu fee. Boatmof rAit msai meto! Kbe anu bkai riof. Allah ymat bo ro tiwya Yesus yno kʼanu to. Ymat tibyo kbe Ait ymit safo aro kʼanu fee!

Wore wo anu bhoh byoh kʼAllah fares to, Ait ybis Ku rAit yama tna raa mame yajat. Ait yajat re kbe mees rAit misoh iranya ranu bsya Allah. Tnaut tawe Ait yhafri anu toni sai. Tna Yesus yrok yasen tna yhau yaam fares. Feto to thar tawe anu bhau biranya bsya Ait. Meen anu brok bsen ye to. Kbe bkai riof ro mase.
Anu bkai riof ro mase ye tna anu safuk bo ro Allah yno kʼanu ye. Bwe, “Yesus
ranu yisoh iranya ranu bsya Allah. Yisoh tibyo mfo refo anu biranya bsya Allah to.”

Mfo refo anu biranya bsya Allah. Menohe tiwya tinyi to iro ntwok mamaʼt tabam refo. Twok mam ati ro Adam yno iro ro tinyi. Tibyo iro msair bo raa mhai ye. Tna bo raa mhai to, mamo mbet raa beta. Tibyo raa beta mno iro ye. Tibyo raa beta mhai ye. Tna Adam oh mi yisti.
Allah yoo Watum rAit yee kʼMusa fefares to, raa ro tabam refo wase bo miwer Watum reto. Menohe ana ja mno iro soo oh.

Maban mam wore Adam yhau mamo snok mam wore Musa yhau to, raa beta mno iro tibyo mhai. (Ebokmi iro ro ana mno to hayah, tna iro ro Adam yno to hayah ye. Adam yiwer watum sau ro tiwya Allah yawe kʼait. Ana roto to wase Watum ro Allah fares. Bo ro ana miwer to, marak fares. Ana mno iro sai.) Adam ro yatim ysya Yesus ro kro mam tis to, mbewok mnan anya baro.
Menohe mafer mbam bo ro ana mbewok mno to, hayah toni. Adam tait yno iro tibyo yisti kair kʼraa mawat. Tna
tait yno bo merif mafer ro moof kʼraa mawat. Tiwya raa sait yiwer bo ro Allah ybis. Tibyo yisti raa beta mhai. Tna Raa roto sait yuumto boatmof ro Allah kʼraa mawat. Ait oh mi Yesus
. Bo moof ro Ait yno to mase toni miwrek safo ro Adam yber.

Bo ro Adam yno to, misti kair. Reto to mnan anya msya boatmof ro Allah yuumto kʼanu to fee. Adam tait yno iro sau tibyo Allah ytu srah tna ymit safo mana rait reto kʼraa mawat. Mfo refo raa miwer watum ro Allah to mawat. Menohe anu ro smot Yesus to, Allah ymat anu yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Feto oh mi boatmof ro Yesus yuumto kʼanu reto to, misti bo ro moof kʼanu raa mawat.
Raa sait yno iro. Tibyo kbe raa beta mhai. Menohe bouum ro Allah to, mase miwer. Ait yuumto boatmof rAit kʼanu. Yno mkah bo ro Raa sait yno. Ait retait oh mi Yesus
. Ait yno re anu fo, bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tibyo kbe anu bhau broon tna biranya bsya Ait. Tna kbe anu bmo raa ro ati hre su bsya Ait mam yuk rAit ro mase tno.
Tiwya Adam yiwer bo ro Allah yawe sau. Bo reto oh misti re Allah ymit safo kʼraa beta. Tna
yno bo ro moof sau tibyo Allah ymat raa beta yawe ana to, mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Mafer rau to, kbe raa mhau mroon.
Tiwya raa sait hawe bo yari watum ro Allah yawe. Tibyo ait yisti re raa mawat masen mno iro. Feto ye Raa sait yari bo Allah yawe. Tibyo raa mawat kbe mrok mamo raa ro mhaf moof ati.

Tna Allah yoo Watum ro Musa yee kʼraa afo re ana miwer bo ro Allah yawe. Raa miwer Watum ro Musa reto mawat. Menohe wore wo raa miwer watum ro Allah mawat to, Allah yuumto boatmof rAit kʼana to mawat miwer.
Allah yuumto boatmof rAit msis kʼanu oh. Tinyi rau to, iro make raa matak. Feto tibyo raa beta kbe mhai. Feto ye mfo refo boatmof ro Allah ybo anu matak.
ranu Yesus
yama yno re anu bhaf moof ati tna kbe meen bhau broon.
Feto to fyi? Kbe anu bno iro renti re kbe boatmof ro Allah reto mninon kʼanu u fe mfe a?
Mfe saut! Anu to raa ro tiwya smot
oh tibyo anu raa
oh. Nnaut oh: Raa
anu to, fret bo mawe anu bsya
su to, raa tiwya mame bjat oh. Tiwya tak mkair sau mbo anu misti re anu raa ja bno iro to. Menohe ati ro anu bhai su bsya
to, tak mkair reto mitsre anu tna mbo anu u fee. Reto oh mi anu hawe bo bno iro renti u fee.
Mfe saut! Anu to raa ro tiwya smot
oh tibyo anu raa
oh. Nnaut oh: Raa
anu to, fret bo mawe anu bsya
su to, raa tiwya mame bjat oh. Tiwya tak mkair sau mbo anu misti re anu raa ja bno iro to. Menohe ati ro anu bhai su bsya
to, tak mkair reto mitsre anu tna mbo anu u fee. Reto oh mi anu hawe bo bno iro renti u fee.
Raa
anu to, fret bo mawe anu bjat, tna anu raa sama bsya
. Raa mame yajat tna Yaja mkah yase rAit, yno re
yrok yasen. Feto ye mkah yase rAit reto yno re anu bmos wanu to mrok maam. Reto oh mi tak mkair reto mbo anu renti u fee. Tibyo anu kro iso ro tna to.
Soh anu bsya Ait tiwya bjat oh to, kbe anu brok bsen bsya Ait tu oh.
Tiwya tak ro mkair reto mbo anu re anu ja bno iro. Menohe anu bhar bwe, anu bsya Yesus to raa mame afo re tak reto mbo anu u fee. Tibyo anu bmo sryan ro bri tak reto u fee ye.
Tna awya ro yajat ysya
to, Allah yawe ait retait yrok yhaf moof ati oh. Tibyo tak mkair reto mbo ait u fee. Tna misti ait yno iro u fee.
Soh tiwya anu bhai bsya
to anu bhar bwe meen anu brok bsen bsya Ait fea!
Anu bhar bwe
yrok yasen to. Tibyo meen ye yhai u fee. Yesus sbi hri wa hai matak rau reto. Ait yase yiwer. Kbe hai mbo Ait u fee.
Ait yajat mun sau aran sai. Yajat to sbi hri wa tak mkair ro ja misti raa mno iro reto. Tna mafer bo ro
yno reto to, meen mhau matak yum oh. Tna Ait yrok yasen to, yhau mkah yno bo ro Allah wAit.
Feto to nnaut nwe anu bhai bsya
Yesus oh. Tibyo tak ro mkair reto mbo anu u fee. Menohe anu bnaut anu bwe anu baam bsya Allah su oh mefo. Anu bhau mkah bno bo ro Allah wAit.
Feto to anu bhau raa sai mam tabam refo baro fares to, anu beroh bri tak ro mkair reto u ma. Nno wa be nmo sryan ro tak reto tibyo bo ro ja raa msrau oot-oot mno to, kbe anu kro nno ye.

Tna anu netsu wanu to, mfi bo sbe ye. Kaket anu nsoh wanu, ntem wanu, nhaf wanu to! Noo anu nsan kʼtak ro mkair reto nmo sbe rau to ma. Kbe tak reto misti re anu nno bo ro mkair-kar. Menohe anu nfi raa ro mhai oh. Tna Allah yno re anu nmos ranu mrok naam u. Feto nsan netsu wanu beta kʼAllah ybo mkah nmo sbe rAit. Feto to kbe Ait ybo anu nno bo ro moof ati to.
