Watum ro Musa mbo anu u fee. Mfo refo to, boatmof ro Allah mhau mkyar anu. Tibyo kbe anu nmo sryan ro tak mkair reto u fee.
Watum ro Musa mbo anu u fee. Tna Allah ymat mees ro
tibyo yatmof anu yoyo. Feto to, mfo refo anu bno iro mbau a? Mfe saut!

Anu bhar bwe, soh anu bitsre anu bsan kʼraa roto mbis to, ja anu bmo sryan rait oh meto. Anu fo nmo sryan ro awya rait? Soh nwe nri tak ro misti iro to, kbe anu nhai. Menohe soh nwe nri bo ro Allah yawe to, kbe yawe anu nfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Nksoh ranu to ryo?

Tiwya anu nmo sryan ro tak mkair reto, tibyo nhau nno iro yoyo. Menohe Allah tubat anu. Tna raa wAit merif watum ro ati kʼanu. Tna mfo refo anu nri watum rAit reto tna nbo matak oh. Feto to jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah.
Allah yno re tak ro mkair reto mbo anu u fee. Mfo refo anu nmo sryan ro Allah rAit. Tibyo anu nno bo ro moof ati.

Riwai tkyas raa ro mamo sryan. Anu raa sai. Feto to tkyas bofret reto afo re anu nhar bo ro jõ watum kʼanu to kaket. Nnaut nafos wanu: Awya ro ybo? Tiwya anu ntem, nkit, nsoh wanu bo to mno bo masmamo tna anu niwer watum ro Allah. Reto oh mi anu ksoh nmo sryan ro tak mkair reto. Tna mfo refo jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Nno bo ro moof ati mkah anu ntem, nkit, nsoh wanu bo to. Anu nmo sryan ro Allah wAit oh meto. Tna mafer rau to, anu nhau nno ro bo ro Allah wAit yoyo sai.”
Wore wo tak ro mkair reto mbo anu fares to, Allah ybo anu re nno bo moof ati to fee.
Ati ro anu nnaut bo ro tiwya anu nno weto to, anu saban. Bo ro anu nno wore weto to, mafer rau to bo bawya? Bo weto misti re raa mhai tibyo.

Menohe Allah skur anu re tak ro mkair reto mbo anu u fee. Tna mfo refo anu nmo sryan ro Allah wAit oh. Mafer rau to, anu nhau nno ro bo ro Allah wAit yoyo sai. Tibyo meen tis rau to anu nhau hame wajin ye.
Soh raa mno iro to, Allah yawe boren ro yaren ana weto to: Ana mhai tibyo. Menohe Allah yatmof anu: Ait yuumto roon ro hame kʼraa ro smot
Yesus,
ranu.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; anu beta nhar watum ro tabam refo fo fea! Tna wore raa mhau maam fares to mako hawe sai ana mari watum ro tabam refo.
Nnaut fai sau msya maa: Watum reto mawe mako hawe sai au mhau msya ait yesait sai mamo snok ati ro ait yhai. Menohe ati ro maa yhai to, watum reto mbo fai au u fee.

Mfi bo fai au mamo msya raa roto mam wore maa yhau fares; au mwyahte maa oh meto. Menohe soh maa retait yhai wia oh to, tna au mawe msya raa rouu to au miwer watum fee oh meto. Reto to au mwyahte maa meto fee. Watum reto mawe wa bo ro au mno reto fee.
Mfi feto ye, jõ fret bo tkyas anu bsya Watum ro Musa. Tiwya Watum ro Musa mbo anu matak. Menohe ati ro anu bhai bsya
oh to, anu bros hayah bbam Watum ro Musa. Feto afo re anu bmo bsya Raa roto sait. Raa roto retait oh mi
. Ait yrok yasen. Tna anu bmo bsya Ait afo re kbe anu bno bo ro Allah yhaf mnan to.

Tiwya, anu fo raa ro hawe bo bri Allah, bwe bhau bno bo ro besait ksoh sai to. Bhaf ranu ksoh mawe bno iro. Bo bawya ro Watum ro Musa mawe wa to, bo weto oh mi anu beroh bno. Feto to Watum ro Musa mno re anu nksoh bno iro renti. Iro to misti hai.
Tiwya Watum ro Musa mbo anu matak. Tna anu betsu wanu ro mno iro to mhai. Tibyo Watum reto mbo anu u fee. Anu mbros oh. Mfo refo anu bmo sryan kʼbobot ro tna. Anu bmo sryan ro bri Har ro
tna bno bo ro Har reto mbis. Bri Bokom ro Musa bbo bno u fee.

Anu bnaut bwe Watum ro Musa reto mkair fe mfe a? Mfe. Raa ro kro Watum reto mno iro meto fee. Mafer to Watum reto to, Watum reto mbo kek tna mram thaf mato ajõ tna re jõ thar iro ro jõ tno. Watum reto mkyas mawe, “Naam bo raa ma!” Feto oh mi thar tawe tno bo reto ma. Iro meto.

Watum reto mawe, “Naam bo raa ma!” Menohe tak mkair ro ja misti raa mno iro reto to, mno re jõ taam bo raa aro rau-rau. Misti jõ tno iro oh meto. Feto to, Watum ro Musa siwyan iso re tak ro mkair reto misti anu bno iro meto. Soh iso reto siwyan fee, tak mkair reto misti anu bno iro fee ye.

Tiwya jõ twase Watum reto fares to, thau tna twase bo tawe jõ fi raa ro tno iro. Menohe jõ tari Watum reto tibyo tasu maah. Tibyo thar tawe jõ fi raa ro tiwer Watum reto. Jõ fret bo tawe, “Ti reto to, iro mrok maam.
Iro mrok maam menohe jõ thai.” Tiwya tnaut tawe, “Watum ro Musa reto mno re jõ tkai roon ro hame.” He mfe, Watum ro Musa to misti jõ thai oh.

Tak mkair reto moo Watum ro Musa tna miwro jõ. Miwro jõ mawe soh tari Watum ro Musa reto, kbe mno riof kʼjõ. He mfe. Watum reto moo safo mana mmit kʼjõ tna misti re kbe jõ thai. Tibyo jõ fret bo tawe, “Iro msya Watum reto mame jõ tajat.”
Feto to Watum reto mesait to moof. Watum reto mbam kʼAllah mama. Tna bombra ro Allah yawe to, watum weto beta bo ro ntrot bau yum tna bo ro moof bau oh.

Fyi, bo ro moof reto misti jõ thai a? Mfe saut! Tak mkair ro misti iro oh mi mno jõ thai to. Tak mkair reto moo Watum ro Musa tna mame jõ to. Jõ hawe tari watum ro Allah tibyo jõ beroh tari tak mkair reto tibyo tno iro renti. Feto oh mi anu bhar bwe tak mkair reto to, mkair-kar toni!
Watum reto to moof bau. Watum reto to mbam Har ro
. Menohe jõ fi raa sai tibyo amah mato ajõ to mti sai. Tna tak ro mkair reto moo jõ mbu tamo sryan rau. Tibyo tari tak reto tna tno iro.
Fyi re tno bo ro jõ tno fo? Jõ ksoh tawe tno bo ro moof menohe jõ tno fee. Tibyo tno bo ro mkair. Tna bo ro mkair reto to, jõ hawe bo tno ye.
Soh jõ tno bo ro mkair, bo ro jõ hawe tno to, jõ sraujin. Reto to merif mawe jõ thar mam thaf ajo tawe Watum ro Musa reto moof. Jõ besboh bo ro Watum reto mkyas to fee.
Feto to jõ tesait oh mi tno iro fee. Tak ro mkair reto mjin mam jõ thaf. Tibyo tno iro.
Jõ thar tawe jõ fi raa sai. Tna bo ro moof mjin mam thaf ajõ aro fee. Jõ ksoh tno bo ro moof. He mfe, tno bo ro moof to fee.
Bo moof ro jõ ksoh tno oh mi jõ tno fee. Menohe bo ro mkair ro jõ hawe tno oh mi jõ tno renti.
Soh jõ tno bo ro mkair, bo ro jõ hawe tno to, jõ tesait oh mi tno iro reto fee. Tak ro mkair reto mjin mam jõ thaf. Au oh mi tno iro meto.
Jõ tkai bo maja sau oh mefo. Jõ thaf ajõ ksoh mawe tno bo ro moof. Menohe tno bo ro mkair fares.
Mam thaf mato jõ hasu watum ro Allah toni tawe ksoh tbo tno.
Menohe tetsu ajõ ja mawe mno bo ro mkair fares. Feto to tak ro mkair reto tna thaf ajõ to, mbewok sarok anya. Tna tak ro mkair reto to, make jõ matak toni.
Tibyo jõ kmo jõ ai tna sraujin toni. Bo ro mbtek mai kʼjõ tasom to, samyoh toni fo! Kbe awya yama tna skur tak mkair ro make jõ reto re kbe riof kʼjõ?
Yesus

ranu oh mi Raa ro meen skur jõ. Tibyo jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Feto to mam thaf mato ajõ to, tamo sryan rAit. Tawe ksoh tari watum ro Allah tbo tno. Ebokmi wore tetsu ajõ refo mhau fares to, kbe tak mkair reto mbo jõ tetsu fares ye.
Feto to mfo refo anu bhai su bsya
Yesus oh. Tibyo Allah kbe yno safo mana ymit kʼanu aro fee.
Tiwya tak ro mkair reto make anu misti anu ja bno iro. Tibyo meen bhai. Menohe mfo refo anu bhai su bsya
Yesus oh. Tibyo Har ro
mno re tak ro mkair reto make anu matak u fee. Har ro
mno re anu bmo mam iso ro moof. Meen anu bhai fee, bhau hame wajin.

Anu raa sai. Feto to bhaf wanu beta tiwya mkair. Tna Watum ro Musa matak mno anu boof fee. Matak misoh iranya ranu bsya Allah fee ye. Feto to Allah yesait yisoh yiranya ysya anu. Ybis Ku rAit haberek yamo raa sai yfi raa makin ro ja mno iro. Tna yroh yama tabam refo. Yama yake iro wanu, raa ro bno iro. Yake mkah yetsu rAit. Allah yno safo mana wanu ymit kʼYesus oh meto.
Tna Yesus yroh afo re Ait kro Watum ro Musa mnan si ye. Yno feto afo re bombra ro Watum reto msi kʼanu bno to, Ait yno beta oh kʼanu. Mfo refo anu raa ro ja bri bo Har ro
mbis bno. Tna anu bri tak ro mkair reto u fee. Tna anu bhau bno bo ro tabam sai u fee ye.
Raa ro tabam refo to, ja ana makit wana mnaut bo ro tabam refo sai. Menohe raa ro Har ro
mbo to, ja ana makit wana mnaut bo ro Har reto ksoh.
Tna raa ro makit wana to, ja mnaut bo ro tabam refo sai to, ana weto meen mhai tna mkai kair. Menohe raa ro makit wana to, ja Har ro
mbo matak to, kbe ana mhaf tnok tna meen mhau hame wajin ye.
Tna ana ro ja mnaut bo tabam refo to ana mhoh byoh kʼAllah. Tna ana weto mtai kro Watum rAit fee tibyo ana hawe bo mari Watum rAit ye.
Feto oh mi raa ro tabam refo to mtai mno Allah yhaf mnan fee.
Menohe soh Har ro
mhau msya anu to, Har rAit mbo anu ye. Anu fo raa ro tabam sai fee. Soh Har ro
mhau msya raa to fee, ana weto to raa ro
wAit fee ye.
Iro misti re raa beta metsu wana to, kbe mhai. Menohe soh Har ro
mhau mam anu nhaf mato to, kbe netsu sai aran mhai. Allah ymat mees ro
tibyo yawe anu to nfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tibyo Har rAit meen mno anu naam mamo snok hame wajin.
Allah yno re Yesus yrok yasen. Tna soh Har rAit mhau msya anu to, kbe bi Ait yno anu netsu wanu ro mhai to, mrok masen ye. Allah ro yno re
yrok yasen to, kbe yno re anu nrok nsen ye. Yno feto mkah Har rAit ro mhau msya anu to.
Tao na wojõ: Riwai tkyas tawe, “Tiwya tak ro mkair reto mbo anu misti re anu nno bo ro tabam sai. Menohe mfo refo anu nmo sryan ro tak reto u fee.”
Awya ro ja yno bo ro tabam sai to meen yhai tibyo. Menohe soh anu bitsre bo knik-knak ro mkair-kar to, beak fari mkah tak Har ro
to, kbe meen anu nhau hame wajin.
Awya sai ro yari bo ro Har rAit mkyas tna ybo yno to ait oh mi ku ro Allah rAit.
Allah yayõ anu ytos. Tibyo anu btu Ait bwe, “

Bja!” Mfo refo anu ksoh bmo bo kʼAllah mfi ku sait ja ksoh yamo yo kʼyaja. Har rAit mno re anu to waa bo nmo no kʼAit to fee. Tiwya anu bmo sryan ro tak mkair reto mbo. Tibyo anu waa bo meen bhai tibyo. Menohe mfo refo anu waa u fee.
Anu bhaf wanu mhar mawe anu fo ku ro Allah wAit oh. Tna Har rAit mkyas mnan anya ye mawe kʼanu mawe anu ku ro Allah wAit tu oh.
Soh anu bmo ku ro Allah wAit to, kbe anu bhaf bse bo yase rAit ye. Bo yase reto kbe Ait ysan
tna ysan kʼanu ye. Tna bo ro samyoh mai kʼanu ye mnan anya msya bo ro samyoh ro tiwya mai
to ye. Anu bsom bo ro samyoh feto tibyo kbe anu bkai bo yase rAit reto ye.
Tna jõ tnaut tawe bo samyoh ro matu mai kʼanu weto to bo maku sai. Menohe bo yase ro Allah rAit to, ro kbe anu fri to, bo msai toni.
Bombra beta ro Allah yfen mam tabam refo to, mhau sraujin mawe tija fooh Allah yasbrah ku wAit yoo bo yase rAit yse kʼana baro.

Tiwya tinyi to, Allah sikowah-kawah bombra ro Ait yfen beta. Kak msya, safom, ora, syoh bo to, Ait yno bo mbtek mai bo weto beta. Tibyo bo weto taro kbe mhai, taro to kbe rabo, tna taro to kbe mnis-nas feto ye.

Tna mfi bo bombra beta weto mkyas bo to, kbe ana mawe kʼanu mawe ana hawe bo ro Allah yno btek sikowah-kawah ana reto. Menohe Allah yno oh mamyot ksoh rAit sai. Tna mfo refo to, bombra weto beta ste minaut mawe meen Allah yitsre bo weto mbam bo ro btek mai reto ye. Tibyo bo weto mbros tna msya ku ro Allah wAit su to, kbe mkai bo yase ro Allah ye.

Tiwya tinyi to, Allah sikowah-kawah bombra ro Ait yfen beta. Kak msya, safom, ora, syoh bo to, Ait yno bo mbtek mai bo weto beta. Tibyo bo weto taro kbe mhai, taro to kbe rabo, tna taro to kbe mnis-nas feto ye.

Tna mfi bo bombra beta weto mkyas bo to, kbe ana mawe kʼanu mawe ana hawe bo ro Allah yno btek sikowah-kawah ana reto. Menohe Allah yno oh mamyot ksoh rAit sai. Tna mfo refo to, bombra weto beta ste minaut mawe meen Allah yitsre bo weto mbam bo ro btek mai reto ye. Tibyo bo weto mbros tna msya ku ro Allah wAit su to, kbe mkai bo yase ro Allah ye.

Anu bhar bwe bombra beta ro Allah yfen to ste wea. Bo weto mwof ti ro ana mbros mbam bo ro make ana. Tiwya tinyi mamo snok mfo refo to, bombra weto to, sraujin tna mkai bo fares. Reto mfi fnya ja mari kborham wia tna mawe fooh re mabe ku to!

Bo weto mesait aran sai mawe fooh to fee. Anu beta bwe fooh re Allah yoo bo weto ysan kʼanu ye. Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu oh. Yse kʼanu matim wia afo re anu bhar bo yase ro Allah kebet wia matim. Tibyo anu ste ati ro Ait yoo bo yase rAit ro msis yuur beta. Feto tibyo anu bwia mam anu bhaf mato tna srau kero bwe fooh re anu, ku ro Allah yayõ to, bmo bhau bsya Ait tna kbe bkai betsu wanu ro moof.
Mbam ati ro tiwya anu smot
tibyo bkai riof rAit oh to, mamo snok mfo refo to anu ste binaut bwe meen anu bkai bombra ro Ait siwyan kʼanu. (Mfi raa mkai bo ro ana nksoh oh to, kbe ana beroh minaut bo reto aro u fee.)
Menohe anu bkai bo weto fefares. Feto to mfo refo anu beroh bsom bo ro samyoh tna ste binaut bombra ro meen Allah siwyan kʼanu meto.

Wore arin mkair tibyo bmos wanu ssafo fee to, rau ro moof anu binaut bo ro meen Allah siwyan kʼanu meto. Wore weto to, anu wase skabuk bkyas bo bawya kʼAllah. Menohe Har rAit mhar bonaut wanu oh. Tibyo Har mesait skabuk anu kʼAllah kaket miwrek ja anu raa btai skabuk to.
Allah ja ymat sas anu bhaf, srau mato wanu to. Tna yhar bo ro Har rAit soh-soh mawe to ye. Feto to anu, raa ro Allah wAit to, Har rAit ja skabuk anu mamyot bo ro Allah yhaf ksoh yno kʼanu ye.

Anu bhar bwe: Awya ro yhafri Allah tna Allah ysok ait yamo raa wAit oh to, Allah ysaim bo bawya ro kbe mama mo kʼraa retait ye. Bo ro moof ye tna bo ro matu mai kʼait ye. Allah ysaim bo weto kaket re kbe makit rau to moof kʼraa retait.

Tabam refo Allah ysair fefares to, Ait ysok raa ro kbe yatmof. Ysok ana feto yawe ana weto oh mi meen mamo mnan fi Ku rAit, Yesus. Allah yawe Ku bum rAit yatim wia. Tna raa rouu mawat mamo ku ro Allah wAit ye. Meen mamo mrof mhau msya Ait mnan fi raa mana sau su.
Tna raa ro Allah ysok weto oh mi Ait ytu mama mo kʼAit. Tna ana weto oh mi Ait ymat mees ro Yesus yawe ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tna ana weto oh mi meen mkai bo yase rAit ro mninon.
Allah yno bo ro moof kʼanu mninon. Feto to anu bhar bwe Allah yros tis yban anu meto. Feto to kbe awya yatak yiwer anu?
Allah yhaf mabe Ku rAit to fee. Ysan Ait yroh yama yajat mkah yfes anu beta. Feto to anu bhar bwe Ait yatmof anu. Kbe anu bhau to bo mabut fee. Tibyo meen ysan bonaut rouu beta kʼanu ye tu oh.
Tna Allah oh mi ymat mees ro Yesus yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Feto to awya ro yaun boun kʼanu raa ro Allah ysok oh to? Kbe ait retait yatak fee.
Anu oh mi bno iro. Menohe

Yesus yesait raa mame yajat. Ait yoo yetsu rait yake iro wanu beta. Tna fo Ait yrok yasen ye. Yrok yasen tna yaut yamo hre ysya Allah mam sawro rAit. Hre ysya Allah mam hroh ro tem ati; hroh ro mase reto. Yesus yhau mam tno yban anu. Feto to awya ro ymit safo kʼanu to, yatak fee.
Bo bawya kbe mno wa hafri ro
kʼanu to? Kbe Ait yhafri anu yum! Kbe bo mama mai kʼanu taro, menohe
yhafri anu to fares. Mfi bo make anu oo, bo mno yoot anu oo, haisre mama mai kʼanu oo, ratan ro byum marak oo, safo mama mai kʼanu oo, raa mame anya bo to, kbe
tait yhafri anu fares.
Tiwya raa skabuk Allah mam Bokom rAit mawe fefo:
“Amu kro Nyõ oh mi raa taro kmo amu yoyo, mawe mame amu njat. Amu fo nnan anya sai nnan
ro ja raa ktan.”
Mazmur 44:23
Bo bawya ro mai kʼanu to bnaut yyi ma. Bhar bwe
yhafri anu fares. Tna
yatak rAit mno re tis rau to anu bros btak abyõ.
Reto oh mi jõ thar tawe bo aro matak re mno Allah yitsre anu to fee. Mfi bo anu bhai oo, bhau baam bo to, kbe Ait yitsre anu fee.

oo, kabes bo to matak fee. Bombra ro mama mai kʼanu mkah ayõ ro ifo tna ayõ ro meen mama wono beta to, kbe mno re Ait yitsre anu fee. Bo ro matak toni mam tabam refo aro kbe mno anu to, Ait yitsre anu fee ye.
Bo ro mhau mam uu matak re mno Ait yitsre anu fee. Bo ro mhau mam tite to, matak fee ye. Bo ro Allah yfen beta to aro matak miwer Ait fee ye. Allah yhafri anu yum.
Yesus fi
ranu. Anu bmat bo ro
yno tibyo bhar bwe Allah yhafri anu toni syok.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; bo ro jõ, Paulus, tkyas kʼanu fo jõ sioh fee.
ysya Har ro Allah to mhar mawe jõ tkyas bo refo mkah thaf ro moof. Bo tkyas to mabo yum.
Jõ tnaut raa ro Israel,
raa mana wojõ to, jõ sraujin toni yoyo. Jõ tawe soh Allah ksoh mi yno ayoh mroh kʼjõ rof re jõ tkai kair tna ana weto mkai riof to jõ ksoh. He mfe.
Jõ tnaut raa ro Israel,
raa mana wojõ to, jõ sraujin toni yoyo. Jõ tawe soh Allah ksoh mi yno ayoh mroh kʼjõ rof re jõ tkai kair tna ana weto mkai riof to jõ ksoh. He mfe.

Tiwya Allah ysok ana, raa mana ro Israel to, yse hayah tna yno bo moof kʼana ye. Ait yayõ ana re ana mamo ku wAit. Ait yerif bo yase rAit kʼana. Ait ysi bo kʼana. Ait yoo Watum ro Musa yee kʼana. Ait yerif iso re ana skabuk Ait mam Samu rAit ro mbau. Tna Ait yawe kbe yno bo ro moof kʼana ye.
Raa ro Israel, hohos wana to, raa ro masom.
Tna
tait raa ro Israel ye. Yme msya bi ro tiwya ytos Ait to, wore wo
yamaʼt tabam refo: Ana weto to raa ro Israel ye.
tait Allah ro ybo bombra beta. Tna kbe raa mbaut bi Ait mamo snok mam meen hame wajin.
: Mabo oh!

Feto to tiwya Allah yawe yno bo ro moof kʼraa ro Israel. Yatem roro re yno fe mfe a? Yatem roro fee! Menohe raa mana ro Israel beta mamo raa ro Allah wAit ro wotur fee. Allah ysok raa to, ymat raa mana sai aran fee. Ana ro Ait ysok oh mi mamo raa wAit to.
Nmat kube ro Abraham yabe: Ana beta to Allah ytu yawe ‘Abraham yare na ro wotur fee’. Allah yawe kʼAbraham yawe,
“Kbe jõ tmat kube wonyõ ro Ishak yabe, ana mesait aran oh mi ttu ku woJõ.”
Kejadian 21:12

Au oh mi ku ro Abraham wAit beta mamo ku ro Allah fee. Tiwya Allah ysi bo kʼAbraham yawe meen ait yabe ku sait. Ku ro tii ysi retait tait oh mi ku ro krek waan ro yaja. Yao ro yabi fee. Feto ye mfo wefo to raa ro tii Allah ysi weto oh mi Ait ytu yawe ku wAit.
Tiwya Allah ysi bo kʼAbraham yawe,
rouu Jõ thah te tama to kʼnyõ. Kbe tama tmat ku mees sait. Ku ait ro nyõ nsya Sara nbe oh.”
Kejadian 18:10
Nmat kukek ro Ishak yabe ye: Ishak tait anu hohos ranu ye. Ait yoo Ribka tna au mhaf. Tna mabe ku mabo ewok mam ayõ sau reto ye.
Fai au mabe ku weto fefares tna Allah yawe kʼau yawe,
“Ku ro nabe ytek yatim to, kbe yamo sryan ro yari bo kʼait ro ytek tis yrof.”
Kejadian 25:23

Ku mabo ewok reto au mabe fefares. Ana mno bo ro moof aro fefares tna bo ro mkair aro fefares ye. Menohe Allah ysok ku sait. Ysok Yakub to ku retait ja yno bo moof fe mfe a? Mfe. Allah ysok Yakub fyi? Ysok Yakub mamyot si bonaut rAit sai. Allah yhar bo rAit oh.
Fai au mabe ku weto fefares tna Allah yawe kʼau yawe,
“Ku ro nabe ytek yatim to, kbe yamo sryan ro yari bo kʼait ro ytek tis yrof.”
Kejadian 25:23

Ku mabo ewok reto au mabe fefares. Ana mno bo ro moof aro fefares tna bo ro mkair aro fefares ye. Menohe Allah ysok ku sait. Ysok Yakub to ku retait ja yno bo moof fe mfe a? Mfe. Allah ysok Yakub fyi? Ysok Yakub mamyot si bonaut rAit sai. Allah yhar bo rAit oh.
Reto oh mi Allah ykyas mam bokom rAit yawe,
“Jõ tatmof Yakub tna Jõ knait Esau.”
Maleakhi 1:2-3
Feto ye, tiwya Allah yawe kʼMusa yawe,
“Jõ tsok raa taro tawe tatmof ana. Soh tawe tsok raa weto tno bo ro moof kʼana to, kbe tno sai.”
Keluaran 33:19
Feto to anu bkyas bwe Allah yno bo ro mkair fe mfe a? Allah yno bo ro mkair fee saut!
Maleakhi 1:2-3
Feto ye, tiwya Allah yawe kʼMusa yawe,
“Jõ tsok raa taro tawe tatmof ana. Soh tawe tsok raa weto tno bo ro moof kʼana to, kbe tno sai.”
Keluaran 33:19
Feto to anu bkyas bwe Allah yno bo ro mkair fe mfe a? Allah yno bo ro mkair fee saut!
Allah ksoh ysok raa ro kbe mamo ku wAit to, ysok ana mamyot bo ro ana mno to fee. Ana hamer mamo raa wAit oh mi Ait ysok ana fee ye. Allah ysok tna yatmof raa mamyot Ait ksoh rAit sai.
Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Tiwya Allah yawe
ro Mesir yawe, ‘Jõ tno re nyõ namo aban mana nbo raa ro Mesir beta. Tna Jõ tisti bo msai mbtek mai kʼnyõ. Jõ tno feto oh mi kbe raa beta mmat tna mhar tatak aJõ. Mhar mawe Jõ fi raa ro tase tbo
ye tna tbo raa beta ye. Tibyo kbe raa mamo mkyas Jõ tasom aJõ kʼraa ro tabam refo beta.’”
Keluaran 9:16
Feto to anu bhar bwe Allah ysok raa taro yawe Ait yatmof ana. Tna taro ysok to, yno re ana mimara mtuk mnan fi
ro Mesir retait.

Menohe anu sait santri bo ysya jõ yawe feto rauk, yawe: “Aha! Soh Allah ksoh rAit sai yno raa taro mimara mtuk to, tibyo mako hawe sai bo ro Allah yawe to mabo tu. Tis rau Ait ymit safo mana kʼraa weto yno fyi?”

Nkyas bo feto to ma! Anu raa tuu ro tabam refo sai. Anu to raa ro Allah yfen. Bofen ro ait sait yfen to ja masen hafrah bo si kʼait ro yfen bo reto to fee. Nno be bo ro yfen reto mhafrah mawe, “Nyõ nfen jõ mfi fefo fyi?”
Nnaut raa ro ja mabah koh tna mfen
bo

Mfi bo raa sait yamo yabah koh baro. Yoo tna yihabah yse mam kbair ewok. Tna kbair ro sau to, yoo yfen bo ro moof. Tna kbair ro ewok to, ait yoo yfen bo ro mkair-kar sai. Yfen bo mamyot bawya ro ait ksoh sai mam yhaf mato rait.

Feto ye Allah oh mi yfen anu raa. Ait yfen raa taro to, yawe Ait kmo ana. Yhar yawe meen yno bo ro msai mbtek mai kʼana yum. Ait yase yno bo kʼraa mamyot Ait ksoh rAit sai. Menohe Ait yhau kanyin toni wia sai.

Ait kanyin wia afo re kbe raa taro mmat bo yase rAit. Mmat bo yase rAit ro miwer toni. Raa beta to, mkbair ewok. Ait ysok mkbair sau to yawe yatmof ana. Yatmof ana tibyo mkai riof ro mase. Mkbair ro mkai riof reto to, mhar mawe mkbair jaro mkai bo ro mkair-kar. Tibyo mkbair ro mkai riof mrok mhar mawe bo yase ro Allah to mase toni syok.
Tna anu oh mi mkbair ro Allah yatmof reto. Ait ytu anu bbam raa mana ro Yahudi taro ye tna anu bbam raa mana roto taro ye. Yawe anu beta kbe bmat bo yase rAit.
Tiwya Allah ykyas bo reto mam bokom ro
Hosea yawe,
“Raa ro tiwya raa woJõ to fee, meen jõ ttu ana re kbe ana mama mo kʼJõ tna mamo raa woJõ ye. Tna raa ro tiwya jõ thafri fee, meen jõ thafri ana ye.”
Hosea 2:22

“Tiwya Allah yawe kʼraa ro mhau mam rabin sau to yawe, ‘Anu to raa mana woJõ to fee!’ Menohe meen kbe Ait yawe kʼraa weto yawe, ‘Jõ fi Allah ro yaam. Tawe kʼanu tawe, “Mfo wefo anu nmo raa mana woJõ.”’”
Hosea 1:10
Tna
Yesaya ykyas raa ro Israel yawe,
“Ku be ro bi Israel to, msis bia mfi snyik makan ro ftau mboh mam sawan maam. Menohe ana kebet aran sai kbe mkai riof.
Kbe Allah ymit safo kʼraa ro tabam refo. Yno bo mbtek mai kʼana mnan si. Yno bo mbtek mai kʼana abut sai. Tibyo kube ro bi Israel kebet aran sai kbe mkai riof.”
Yesaya 10:22-23
Yesaya yawe tinyi yawe kbe Allah yatmof raa ro Israel baro, yawe,
“Allah tait yase ybo bombra beta. Oos Ait maami yno raa wanu baro bhau, maami anu beta safe mkak bnan fi raa ro Sodom msya Gomora bo oh.”
Yesaya 1:9
Feto to, anu bhar bwe fefo, “Raa ro wase
Yahudi to, tiwya ana saso iso re mamo mhaf moof to fee. Ana saso fee, menohe ana smot
tna mkai mhaf ro moof mam iso reto: Allah ymat mees ro Yesus tibyo yawe ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati meto.
Tna raa ro Israel tomer kro Watum ro Musa re kbe Allah ymat ana yawe ana raa ro mhaf moof. Menohe mfe. Ana mkai fee. Allah ymat ana yawe ana mhaf moof to fee ye.”
Fyi re ana weto mamo mhaf moof to fee? Ana mamo iso ro sre: Ja ana mnaut mawe ana kro Watum ro Musa kaket tibyo mkai riof. He mfe. Iso ro raa smot
to, ana hawe bo kro. Raa fret bo mawe fraa sau burut wa iso ro ana mamo. Tibyo ana wasim tna mbtek mawe.
Tna bo reto to, mabo oh mnan si tiwya Bokom ro Allah mkyas matim wia:
“Jõ too fraa sau tse mam Sion. Fraa reto mburut iso wa. Tna raa ro Yahudi wasim fraa reto tibyo mbtek mawe. Menohe raa ro smot ‘Fraa’ reto to, meen manwaruk fee.”
Yesaya 28:16
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ tnaut raa ro Israel to, srau hri. Tna jõ skabuk soh-soh Allah tawe yoo riof yee kʼana ye.
Jõ thar tawe ana safo triar mno bo ro ana mnaut mawe Allah ksoh. Menohe ana wase bo ro Allah ksoh.

Allah yno iso re kbe Ait yawe raa mamo mhaf moof. Menohe raa wase iso rAit reto. Tna ana siko mamo mhaf moof mkah mamo mam iso rana mesait, iso roto. Tibyo ana hawe bo mamo mam iso ro Allah yerif kʼana re mamo mhaf moof.
Ana ro Israel weto siko kro Watum ro Musa mawe kbe ana mesait misoh mhaf wana. Menohe anu fo smot
. Reto oh mi Allah ymat mees ro Yesus tibyo yawe anu fo, bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati oh. Tibyo awya sai ro smot
sai to, kro Watum ro Musa u fee.
Tiwya Musa ykom yawe,
“Awya ro ksoh yhaf moof mkah bo kro Watum ro Musa to, yako hawe sai kbe yari tna kro Watum ro Musa reto beta, ybo yno mnan si.”
Imamat 18:5
Menohe mfo refo anu smot

tibyo Allah ymat anu yawe anu fo raa ro bhaf moof mnan si oh meto. Kbe anu bno bawya naut u? Anu fo raa tu ro tabam refo sai. Mfi bo tiwya watum ro Allah mawe, anu sait ytai yamoʼt sawro ro Allah tna saso
fee. Tna ybis Ait yroh yamaʼt tabam refo fee ye. Raa sait aro ytai yno feto fee.
Tna anu sait ytai yroh yamoʼt sawro ro hai mam ti no tna saso
re tubat Ait to fee ye. Raa sait aro ytai yno feto fee.
Bokom ro Allah mawe, “Bokyas ro Allah reto mhau nkene sai. Tna bokyas reto anu nkyas ye tna anu nhar mam nhaf mato wanu ye.” Tna bokyas reto amu nbo nkyas ye nwe kbe raa smot Yesus.
Au oh mi awya sai ro hrenaut fee, menohe ykyas abyõ kʼraa yawe, “Yesus tait yamo
ro ybo jõ.” Tna soh ait yhar mam yhaf mato yawe, Yesus yajat tna Allah yno Ait yrok yasen; kbe meen ait retait ykai riof.

Jõ tkyas u tawe soh raa sait ksoh yawe Allah ymat ait yfi raa ro mhaf moof to, kbe ait yno bo bawya? Soh ait smot Yesus mam yhaf mato rait to, kbe Allah yawe ait yfi raa ro mhaf moof. Tna soh ykyas abyõ yawe, “Yesus yamo
ro ybo jõ.” ykyas mam wore raa mros mmat to, kbe meen ait ykai riof.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas reto ye mawe,
“Awya sai ro smot Ait to, meen yanwaruk fee.”
Yesaya 28:16
Allah ymat raa to, raa ro Yahudi ye msya raa mana roto makin ye. Ymat ana yawe ana mnan anya beta sai. Raa sait hayah fee. Raa mkbair ewok weto ye mamo mo kʼAllah mam iso sau reto. Tna Yesus yamo
ybo ana mkbair ewok weto ye. Ro mayoh kʼAit to, kbe bi Ait yno bo moof msis soh kʼana beta.
Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Awya sai ro yamo yo
Allah tna ytu yawe ‘
noo riof nee kʼjõ ye!’ to, kbe meen ait ykai riof.”
Yoel 2:32

Menohe raa ro smot Ait fefares to, kbe mayoh bo kʼAit fyi? Tna soh ana wase Ait yasom fefares to, fyi re kbe ana smot Ait? Tna soh raa mamo mkyas Yesus yasom kʼana fefares to, fyi re kbe ana mhar Ait yasom?
Tna soh Allah ybis sryan aro mamo fefares to, fyi re sryan mamo mkyas Yesus yasom kʼana? Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Raa ro makah Bokyas Moof mama mkyas to mno bo moof toni.”
Yesaya 52:7
Menohe tiwya Allah ybis raa mamo mo kʼraa ro Israel. Tna raa weto mkyas Bokyas ro Moof kʼana oh. Raa mamo mkyas oh menohe raa ro Israel msis hawe bo smot. Tiwya
Yesaya ykyas bo refo yawe, “
; awya oh mi yari tibyo ybo yno bo ro amu nkyas to?”
Feto to anu bhar bwe, “Ja raa mari Bokyas ro Moof
reto to wia matim. Mari Bokyas Moof ro
reto tna fo ana mhaf mse Bokyas reto tibyo smot
Raa ro Israel weto to mari Bokyas reto oh fe mfe a? Mari oh! Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Bokyas rana reto to, raa mkyas mamo snok mam tabam refo beta oh. Mamo snok mam arin aso beta oh.”
Mazmur 19:4
Fyi, raa ro Israel srau mnaut bo ro ana mari reto to, kaket fe mfe a? Mhar oh. Allah yawe kʼMusa yawe,
“Kbe Jõ tno bo moof kʼraa roto taro. Raa weto tiwya Jõ tsok fee. Tibyo anu, raa woJõ to, kbe nmat tibyo nrok kmo. Kbe jõ tatmof raa mana ro wase Jõ. Feto oh mi tno anu fo nrok kmo.”
Ulangan 32:21
Feto ye, Allah ybis Yesaya ykom bo ro mai kʼraa ro Israel sau. Tibyo Yesaya waa fee. Tna ykom bo ro Allah ykyas raa ro mne weto yawe,
“Raa ro Yahudi fee ja ana saso Jõ fee. Menohe ana mkai Jõ oh. Ana mayoh bo kʼJõ fee. Menohe Jõ terif Jõ kʼana tibyo ana mhar Jõ.”
Yesaya 65:1
Menohe ykyas raa ro Israel yawe,
“Jõ ttu ana mama mo kʼJõ. Tiwya ttu ooh oh. Menohe ana hawe. Ana to mana mase. Ana raa ro mari bo meto fee.”
Yesaya 65:2
Feto to fyi? Tiwya Allah yawe
Israel
to raa wAit. Karik Allah yikyak ana fe mfe a? Mfe saut. Nnaut oh: Jõ fi raa ro
Israel ye. Bi Abraham tait hohos ajõ. Tna jõ tbam ku mbair ro bi Benyamin.
Allah yikyak raa wAit ro tiwya Ait ysok to fee! Nnaut bokom Allah ro mkyas
Elia to. Mkyas mawe
Elia ati ro ait skabuk. Tiwya ait skabuk yaun raa ro Israel yawe,
; raa ro Israel to mame
woNyõ oh. Ana mirarin wohat woNyõ oh. Wohat ro raa sgi mkah moo bo mko muum kʼNyõ. Jõ tesait aran thau smot Nyõ fares. Tna mfo refo ana saim mawe mame jõ ye fo.”
Tna Allah yawe si yawe, “Nyõ nesait kar fee. Jõ tehau raa ro Israel to, mabo 7000 to, smot Jõ fares ye. Tna kabes sau ro masom Baal to, ana mabo 7000 weto smot fee.”
Mfo refo to mnan feto ye. Raa ro Israel msis hawe bo smot Allah. Menohe ana, raa ro Israel kebet baro to, Allah ysok tibyo yatmof ana fares.

Ait yatmof ana weto fares. Tibyo ysok ana re ysan riof kʼana. Riof reto Ait ysan kʼraa mamyot bo ro moof ja ana mno to fee. Ait yatmof ana sai meto. Soh Ait ymat bo moof ro ja ana mno to, kbe bwe riof to boren ro Ait yaren raa. He mfe.

Feto to fyi? Raa ro Israel msis mkai bo ro ana saso reto to fee. Kebet aran mkai riof sai: Ana ro Allah ysok sai aran mkai riof reto. Tna raa ro Israel msis weto to, Allah yno re ana mrok mana mase tibyo hawe bo mari Watum rAit.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas bo reto ye. Mawe,
“Allah yno re ana mhaf mti. Tibyo ana masu mmat bo fee. Tna ana mimara wana mari bo ro Allah yawe to fee. Tna raa ro Israel mhau feto mamo snok mfo refo ye.”
Ulangan 29:4; Yesaya 29:10
Tna
Daud yawe,
“Allah, ska bo kʼana weto: Mam wore raa weto makyõ bokyõ to, nabah kayah tna saro ana re kbe ana mbtek mam kayah reto. Tna sna ana mam wore ana simaut mase.
Nno re ana masu mti rof re kbe mhar bo toni ma. Nno re ana masom bo fanes tibyo.”
Mazmur 69:23-24

Feto to fyi? Raa mana ro Yahudi, Israel to, ana hawe bo smot Yesus. Tibyo Allah beak ana makus. Reto mfi bo ana wasim fraa, tibyo mbtek mawe. Anu nnaut fyi? Allah ymat iro ro ana mno tibyo beak ana mhau makus tibyo fe mfe a? Mfe saut. Ait yawe yno feto afo re riof ro Ait siwyan kʼraa ro Yahudi to, raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin mkai riryõn. Ana weto masen mamo mo kʼAllah. Tibyo meen raa mana ro Yahudi mmat tibyo mhaf sarok tna mashana ye. Raa mana ro Yahudi mashana tibyo meen mesait saso riof ro Allah rAit ye.

Raa mana ro Israel miwer bo ro Allah yawe kʼana. Menohe mafer rau to, raa mana roto fri. Raa mana roto weto mkai riof. Tna soh raa mana ro Israel kbe misoh iranya rana msya Allah to, moof ati. Kbe mafer rau to, moof miwer.

Anu to, nbam raa mana roto. Tna jõ fi, raa ro Allah ybis tama to kʼraa mbam raa mana roto makin. Tamo to kʼraa mana ro Yahudi fee. Tna bo ro jõ tasom refo fo, jõ tbo akah-akah sai. Tna re tkyas bo baro kʼanu mefo:

Raa mana ro Yahudi to raa mana ajõ. Menohe jõ tama to kʼanu ro nbam raa mana roto wefo. Jõ tinaut tawe kbe raa ro Yahudi weto mmat he anu nkai riof. Tna ana mesait mnaut mamos wana. Tna kbe ana maam bo riof ro moof reto. Feto kbe ana taro nksoh saso riof ro Allah reto ye.

Allah yikyak raa mana ro Israel. Bo ro yno reto misti re ytu raa mbam raa mana roto makin mama mo kʼAit. Tna yisoh iranya wana msya Ait ye. Bo ro Allah yno reto samyoh kʼraa mana ro Israel. Menohe misti mafer ro moof kʼraa mana roto makin. Tna soh raa mana ro Israel kbe haberek mawe Allah yisoh iranya wana msya Ait ye to, fyi? Moof toni! Yoo raa mana ro Israel me mamo raa wAit u. Tna meen, ati ro oon sboh to, kbe Allah tubat raa wAit ro mhai beta mrok masen.
Raa mana ro Israel ja mno
to, ana moo baro msan kʼAllah wia.
Mawe
bi Allah rAit. Soh ana mse
baro hayah mkah Allah to, Ait yawe yno re
ro mhau fares to, ja ana mait oh mi
ro moof ye. Tna “Mfi bo ara mair to moof, kbe ara ngkre rau to, moof ye.”
Jõ fret bo tawe raa ro Israel beta to mfi ara

ro moof sau. Tna bi Abraham ysya kube wait ro tiwya tinyi smot Allah to mfi bo mtis ro ara reto. Tna ngkre to, mfi bo raa. Menohe mfo refo kube ro Abraham mawat renti (au oh mi raa mana ro Israel) to, hawe bo smot
. Tibyo Allah yoo ana beak fari mfi bo raa beska ara ngkre tna mbeak ye. Tna raa mana roto makin to mfi bo ara
roto sau. Tna ara reto to mkair, mesait mo mam safom sai. Tiwya anu ro nbam raa mana roto to nfi bo ngkre sau mam ara ro mkair reto. Tna anu baro smot

. Tibyo yoo anu tna yake nrat nsya raa wAit ro mbam raa mana ro Israel ye. Raa mana ro Israel weto to, ku wAit ro wotur. Tibyo anu nsya ana nhaf nse bo yase ro Allah siwyan mkah raa mana ro Israel. Anu beta bhaf bse bo yase weto su.
Menohe bibi anu abyõ kʼraa ro Israel to ma. Nnaut oh: Anu fo nfi ara
ngkre wau sai. Tna ja ngkre wau weto to mros kar fee. Anu oh mi swior ara
mtis rau to fee. Mtis matam anu oh mi anu nhau naam.

Feto to anu ro nbam raa mana roto to, kbe anu nwe, “Ngkre raa mana ro Israel weto, Allah beska beak makus. Allah beak ana weto afo re yoo amu raa mana roto yse shauk yuk ana raa mana ro Israel mhau to riryõn.”
Bo ro anu nkyas reto to, mabo oh. Menohe nnaut oh: Raa ro Israel weto to ana hawe bo smot
. Tibyo Allah beska ana beak. Tna anu fo smot
. Tibyo Ait yoo anu yse nrat nsya mtis reto. Feto to anu safuk anu nwe anu raa ro noof to ma. Rau ro moof to, anu kaket anu tna waa bi Ait.
Nnaut oh: Raa ro Israel weto to kube bi Abraham ro wotur. Menohe Allah yatmof ana fee. Ana smot
fee tibyo Ait beska ana beak. Yno mnan fi raa msot ara ngkre ro mkair. Feto to, kaket anu! Soh anu hawe bo smot Ait to, kbe Ait yatmof anu fee ye. Kbe Ait beska anu mbeak ye.
Feto to anu bmat bwe: Allah tait Raa ro yatmof raa taro ye. Tna Raa ro kmo raa taro ye. Tiwya raa ro mbam raa mana ro Israel taro hawe bo smot
. Tibyo Allah kmo ana. Menohe Ait yatmof anu raa ro nbam raa mana roto weto. Feto to, niwana boatmof rAit ma! Beroh smot Ait renti. Soh mfe to kbe Ait ysot anu beak nkus ye.
Feto ye mfi bo raa mana ro Israel haberek tna mama smot Ait to, kbe Ait yoo ana ymit mrat mam mara rau u. Allah tait yatak yno bo reto mabo ye.
Anu fo nfi ara ngkre ro mbam ara
roto taro sai. Tna ara reto mkair, mesait mo mam safom sai. Menohe Allah yno bo ro msai: Ait yoo anu ymit mam ara
rAit reto. Ait ksoh yno bo reto sai. Feto ye kbe Ait ksoh toni yoo ara kre ro tiwya wotur weto ye ymit u mam ara mara rau reto to tu!

Taja tme tao, tano na; Allah ymat raa mana ro Israel hayah tna ymat raa mana roto makin hayah ye. Jõ tkyas bo refo kʼanu afo re anu nhar kaket. Re kbe anu tawyõ anu ai to ma. Bokyas refo fo, tiwya Allah ymyõt kʼraa. Bo ro Allah ymyõt kʼraa reto oh mi raa mana ro Israel to, mfo refo ana msis to, mhaf matak. Tna raa mana roto to, Allah ytu ana mawat kbe mama. Ytu ana mabo mnan si mama wia tna kbe Allah ytu raa mbam raa mana ro Israel mama mrof naut.
Reto oh mi raa ro Israel beta to, kbe mamo mo kʼAit tna kbe meen mkai riof rAit. Bokom ro Allah mkyas bo reto mawe,
“Meen Raa Sotak sait ro yoo riof yee kʼraa yama. Yama ybam Sion, sawro rAit, yama. Yama yo kʼanu, kube ro Yakub wait. Tna yno re anu niwana Ait u fee.”
Yesaya 59:20
“Mam ti weto to Jõ tno bo moof ro tiwya tawe tno kʼana. Au oh mi Jõ skur iro wana beta.”
Yeremia 31:33-34

Raa ro Israel ja miwana Bokyas Moof ro Yesus. Tibyo mamo byoh kʼAllah. Allah yno feto afo re anu ro nbam raa mana roto kbe nkai mafer ro mase. Menohe tiwya Allah ysi bo kʼAbraham, Ishak, ysya Yakub to. Ana mamo hohos kʼraa ro Israel. Tibyo Allah ysok ana ro Israel tna Ait yhafri ana fares.
Allah ja ysok raa ro kbe yoo riof yee. Tna riof ro tiwya yawe ysan kʼraa to, Ait yhaf mabe fee. Yno mabo yum oh.
Tiwya anu ro nbam raa mana roto to, beswan-swan bo ro Allah yawe. Menohe mfo wefo fo, raa ro Israel beswan-swan bo ro Ait yawe. Tibyo Ait yatmof anu.
Mfo refo ana beswan-swan Ait. Tibyo Ait yatmof anu oh. Feto ye kbe meen Ait yatmof ana ye. Kbe Ait yatmof ana mnan anya Ait yatmof anu ye.

Allah yfot ybu raa beta su yawe, “Raa ro tabam refo beta beswan-swan Jõ: Raa mana ro Israel ye msya raa mana roto ye.” Yawe feto re kbe meen, ati ro Ait yerif boatmof rAit kʼana to, kbe ana safuk ana fee. Kbe ana beta mhar mawe boatmof rAit sai aran yno riof kʼana.
Allah tait raa ro yoof toni! Iso ro Ait yatmof anu to bo msai! Kta ranu oh meto.
“Bo ro Ait yhar to mase. Ait Raa ro srau miyõ toni ye. Tna bo ro Ait saim yno to, raa aro bo hre mmat sas fee. Awya oh mi yhar iso ro Ait yno bo weto to?”
Yesaya 55:8
Allah yesait oh mi yfen bombra weto beta to. Tna yatak rAit oh mi bombra weto beta mhau fares. Ait ksoh rAit sai yfen bombra weto beta afo re raa mmat tibyo bibi Ait yase rait. Tibyo
“Awya oh mi yhar
yakit rAit? Awya oh mi watum bo kʼAit to?”
Yesaya 40:13
“Awya ro ja yoo bo yee
tna ye yawe bi Ait yoo bo sroh to?”
Ayub 41:11
Nma, anu bmat sas bo yase rAit tibyo bbaut Ait mamo snok mam meen hame wajin!
: Mabo oh!
Yesaya 55:8
Allah yesait oh mi yfen bombra weto beta to. Tna yatak rAit oh mi bombra weto beta mhau fares. Ait ksoh rAit sai yfen bombra weto beta afo re raa mmat tibyo bibi Ait yase rait. Tibyo
“Awya oh mi yhar
yakit rAit? Awya oh mi watum bo kʼAit to?”
Yesaya 40:13
“Awya ro ja yoo bo yee
tna ye yawe bi Ait yoo bo sroh to?”
Ayub 41:11
Nma, anu bmat sas bo yase rAit tibyo bbaut Ait mamo snok mam meen hame wajin!
: Mabo oh!
Yesaya 55:8
Allah yesait oh mi yfen bombra weto beta to. Tna yatak rAit oh mi bombra weto beta mhau fares. Ait ksoh rAit sai yfen bombra weto beta afo re raa mmat tibyo bibi Ait yase rait. Tibyo
“Awya oh mi yhar
yakit rAit? Awya oh mi watum bo kʼAit to?”
Yesaya 40:13
“Awya ro ja yoo bo yee
tna ye yawe bi Ait yoo bo sroh to?”
Ayub 41:11
Nma, anu bmat sas bo yase rAit tibyo bbaut Ait mamo snok mam meen hame wajin!
: Mabo oh!

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; Allah yatmof anu toni. Feto oh mi anu ro nkit maan to, nno bo bawya? Allah yatmof anu feto tibyo jõ sobu anu tawe noo nhaf, srau wanu bo beta nsan kʼAllah ybo. Anu raa wAit to, nhau nno bo wAit sai. Noo nhaf, srau wanu nsan kʼAit fefo fo tna nhau nno bo wAit to, kbe Ait yhaf mnan anu. Tna anu nbaut Allah oh meto ye.

Ja raa ro tabam refo tko anu kro iso rana su. Nri ana ma! Kaket anu yoyo re kro iso ro tabam refo ma. Menohe nsan nkit msya bonaut wanu to beta kʼAllah yoyo. Nsan kʼAit to, kbe yno bonaut wanu weto to, haberek mrok moof renti. Tibyo kbe nhar bo nno bo mnan si Ait yhaf, srau mato rAit to: Au oh mi anu nhar bo bawya ro Ait yawe moof to. Kbe anu nhar bo bawya ro Ait yhaf ksoh. Kbe anu nhar bo bawya ro moof toni syok.
Allah tubat jõ tamo raabis rAit. Tibyo ybis jõ yawe tamo tkyas watum rAit fo kʼanu beta. Tawe anu to yok-yok anu toni to ma. Anu smot
tibyo Allah yuumto bouum
kʼanu oh. Bouum weto Allah ynit kaket saim kʼanu raa sait-sait tna kʼfnya sau-sau feto. Bo ro anu nhar nno kaket to, bouum ro mbam kʼAllah mama. Feto to yok-yok anu toni to ma.

Bouum weto mnan fi raa yetsu rait. Raa yetsu rait to sau aran sai. Menohe yatem oo, yaa oo, yana bo to mrat mam yetsu rait reto. Tna yetsu haber rau to aro hayah-hayah. Tna haber makin weto to, ja mno bo rau hayah-hayah ye.
Feto to anu ye. Anu ro kro
to bsis bia. Menohe anu beta bsya anya bhau su. Mnan fi anu fo betsu sau aran tna anu haber anya. Anu bnah su tna bnaut raa anya ye.
Anu aro sait-sait fri bo ro mbam kʼAllah. Ait yuumto bouum kʼanu sait-sait hayah-hayah ye. Allah yoo tak yee kʼraa taro re ana mari mai ro mbam
tna mkyas bokyas rAit reto kʼraa mfi raa ro
Anu weto to nkyas kaket! Nkyas mamyot si bosmot ranu reto.
Tna anu taro to, Allah yoo tak yee re anu ja nno bo aro rau-rau re nbet raa. Anu weto nsen nbet raa oh! Tna anu taro to, Allah yoo tak yee re anu nmo
Anu weto nsen nerif bo kʼraa oh!

Tna anu taro to, soh raa aro sraujin to, ja anu nkyas bo moof afo re ana sorni sraujin wana. Anu weto: Nsen nno feto renti! Tna anu taro to, Allah yno re anu nse bo mawat. Anu weto to natmof raa ro mse bo mabut. Natmof ana mkah nhaf ro mbyõ oh! Tna bi Ait yoo tak yee kʼanu taro re anu nmo aban mana. Anu weto kaket anu re mur-mur nno bo reto oh! Tna anu taro nhar bo nmat raa ro masom bo ro samyoh. Kbe anu weto to natmof ana weto tna nros tis ana mkah simaut mase.
Nhafri raa anya to kaket. Nno mkah wan-wan to ma. Tna nsok bo ro nwe moof to kaket. Bo ro mkair-kar to, beak fari. Bo ro moof to, nbo nno.
Nhafri anya mnan fi ja raa hafri mao mano na wana. Tna nmat anya to kaket ye. Nmat anya mnan fi ana fo raa ro ati miwer nyõ.
Hawe boh to ma! Nno bo ro
rAit to nno mur-mur mkah nhaf myoh.
Tna ninaut nwe bombra ro Allah yawe kʼanu to meen mabo. Bo weto oh mi anu simaut mase. Mam wore bo ro samyoh mai kʼanu to, kanyin nsom sai oh. Tna beroh nros skabuk yoyo ye.
Soh anu nmat raa ro Allah wAit tna bo ro ana mse aro mabut to, noo bo nee kʼana. Tna nitrah amah wanu kʼraa ye.
Wore raa mno bo mai kʼanu to, skabuk Allah re yno bo moof aro kʼana. Nwe kbe ayoh mroh mai ana to ma.
Wore raa simaut mase to, simaut su nsya ana ye. Tna mam wore raa sraujin tna mawia to, hre nwia su nsya ana ye.
Nhau nhaf sau su nsya anya. Nnaut nwe anu raa ro nse niwrek raa taro to ma. Niranya nsya raa kinyah. Nnaut nwe anu nhar bo niwer raa taro to ma.
Tna soh raa aro mno bo mkair mai kʼanu to, nno bo ska si to ma. Nhau nno bo ro raa beta mnaut mawe moof.
Tna nmak nsya raa roto to ma. Saso niranya nsya raa beta. Menohe soh raa aro kmo fares tna hawe me miranya msya anu su to, mhau oh. Kbe anu nisoh iranya reto fyi?
Tafoh na wojõ; raa ro mno bo mai kʼanu to, anu nesait ska bo to ma. Mhau kbe Allah kmo ana tna yoo safo mana ymit kʼana weto. Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Jõ oh mi ska bo tna tno bo ro samyoh mai to. Bo woJõ kbe tno.”
Ulangan 32:35
Anu nesait ska bo to ma. Menohe nno bo ro moof kʼraa ro mhoh byoh kʼanu. Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Raa ro mamo byoh kʼanu to, soh ana mhai sre to, noo boit nee kʼana mait. Tna soh mhai sbit to, noo aya nee kʼana mata. Soh anu nno feto to, kbe ana hrenaut.”
Nno ma be bo ro raa mno mkair to, miwro anu re kbe anu nno safo ye. Rau ro moof to, beroh nno bo ro moof. Feto kbe tis rau to safo mroh mam mte. Tna bo ro moof to, mros abyõ matak.
Tna
ro mase to, anu to sait-sait nri bo
ro mbo anu to mawe.
weto beta to mesait mbrah ai fee. Allah oh mi yoo yatak yee
weto tibyo ana mros.
ro mfo refo to ye, Allah oh mi yesait tubat sawyah to.
Feto to awya ro beswan bo maja ro
to, ait beswan bo maja ro Allah oh meto. Tna awya ro yari bo ro
mawe to fee, kbe Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼait retait.
Awya ro yno bo moof to ait waa fee. Yhar yawe
kbe mmit safo mana kʼait aro fee. Menohe ait ro ja yno bo mkair saah ait waa. Kbe
mmit safo mana kʼait tu oh. Soh anu hawe bo waa
to, nno bo ro moof tibyo
kbe bibi anu.
Raa ro
to sryan ro Allah ybis to afo re ana mno bo moof kʼanu. Menohe mfi bo anu nno safo to,
to mi anu waa to.
mros matak re kbe mmit safo kʼraa ro mno safo. Tna Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo tak reto yee
Feto to nri bo ro
mawe. Nri afo re
mmit safo kʼanu fee. Tna nri ye afo re anu nhaf ranu bhah anu fee.
Reto oh mi anu bero namabyoh nee
Raa ro
to sryan ro Allah ybis mkah armato ro
Bo bawya ro
msi mawe anu ktan to noo nee oh: Namabyoh ye tna
ye. Tna raa ro mamo aban mana mbo anu to, nri bo ro ana mawe tna nbo nno kaket. Tna raa ro manes to, nmat ana beta kaket ye.

Anu aro bo nno bo fyah kʼawya-kawa bo ye ma. Menohe bo sau noo nee kʼraa yoyo: Au oh mi noo nhaf anyõ nee kʼraa yoyo. Awya ro yatmof raa anya, ait tait raa ro yno Watum ro Musa maja rau mnan si oh meto. Feto to tawe kʼanu tawe beroh natmof raa anya yoyo.
Watum ro Allah mawe,
“Nwyah ma. Nme raa ma. Nsyõf bo raa ma. Naam bo raa ma.”
Keluaran 20:13-17
Tna Watum taro sor to, maja wau weto mberur beta mnan anya. Au oh mi:
“Natmof raa anya kaket mnan fi anu ja natmof netsu wanu mesait ai.”
Imamat 19:18
Raa ro matmof raa anya to mno bo ro mkair mai kʼraa anya to fee meto. Feto to awya ro ja yatmof raa anya, ait yno Watum ro Allah maja wau mnan si oh meto.

Tii tinyi, ati ro anu nashana smot Yesus to, tii oon sboh rau mama fefares. Menohe mfo refo anu bhar bwe ti ro anu bkai riof to mama ngkene baro oh. Feto to hawe boh to ma! Nrok nsen tna nbo bo riwai tawe kʼanu to, nno weto beta kaket.

Mti ngkine mwo mamo oh tna reen fo mama. Bo ro mkair raa mno to, ja ana mno mam wore wo mamur fares. Feto to nma, nitsre bo mkair ro anu nno to beak makus. Tna nno bo ro Allah ksoh. Bno feto kbe anu bno wa bo ro mkair mnan fi raa ro sbe ja myum ratan ro
. Myum ratan ro
feto, tibyo raa mama mame ana majat fee.

Nma, bno bo mfi ja raa ro mhau mam wore wo maah. Nkyõ bokyõ mnin-nin to ma. Nbisir to ma. Nus-as bo ma. Nsrau oot-oot fnya raa oo ku ano bo to tna nno ana to ma. Nhau ntoh anya to ma. Tna naam bo ro raa to ma.
Rau ro moof to, anu nhau srau sau, nhaf sau su nsya
Yesus
ranu. Tna kaket anu be kbe nri bo ro nasmamo weto to tibyo nno.
Raa taro smot
, menohe bosmot wana matak fefares. Ana weto mawe bo aro mbau kʼana fares. Nitrah nhaf wanu tna niranya nsya ana. Nhau hafrah bo ro ana mnaut weto to ma.
Raa taro to, sohmaam bo knik-knak sai mkah mhaf ro moof. Tna taro to, bosmot wana matak fefares. Ana mbau bo mabo kak aro rau-rau. Ja ana mabat bobat mkah boit sai.

Allah ymat tna yiranya ysya ana mbewok ye. Feto to anu aro nno nnan fi bi Ait ye fea! Anu ro ja sohmaam bo knik-knak to, niwana ana ro mabat bobat sai to ma! Tna ro nbat bobat sai to, nmat ana ro sohmaam bo knik-knak beta weto to, nwe ana mno iro meto to ma!
Allah oh mi Raa ro ybo ana. Anu fee! Ana weto mros matak soh mfe mbtek to, bo ro
rAit sai! Tna Ait fi yatak yno re ana mros matak tna smot Ait kaket.

Tna raa taro mnaut mawe ayõ aro to, mbau tibyo raa mamo mkah bo fee tna ayõ aro to mbau fee. Tna raa taro mnaut mawe ayõ ro mbau to aro u fee. Rau ro ati to, anu nno bo ro nhaf mato wonyõ mesait mbis.
Ro mnaut mam mhaf mato mawe, “Ayõ sau to hayah, ayõ reto to mbau.” Bo ro ana mno reto, ana mno mkah bo mbaut
. Tna taro mnaut mawe, “Allah yoo kak yee re jõ tabo. Tibyo tayoh asik mase kʼbi Ait.” Bo reto ait yno mkah bo mbaut
ye. Tna raa taro to ja mabo kak fee. Mno feto mkah bo mbaut
ye. Ana weto mawe, “Allah yoo bobat wefo yee kʼanu nbat. Tibyo amu nyoh asik mase kʼbi Ait ye.”
Wore wo anu sait-sait bhau mam tabam refo fo,
oh mi ybo anu ybis. Tna wore anu sait-sait bhai to
oh mi ybo anu ybis. Anu bhau bno bo ro anu besait ksoh to fee.
Anu bhau baam to, tomer bno bo ro
yhaf mnan. Tna mamo snok mam ati ro anu bhai to, anu ksoh bno bo ro
yhaf mnan yum ye. Wore anu bhau fares tna wore anu bhai to,
oh mi Raa ro ybo anu.
Reto oh mi
yhai tna yrok yasen to: Yno feto re Ait yamo
tna anu beta bmo sryan wAit ro bri bo Ait ybis kʼanu. Feto mam ati ro anu raa bhau fares ye tna mam ati ro anu bhai ye.
Feto to mfi bo ro riwai tkyas raa taro mnaut mawe bo sau to mbau. Tna anu nmat tibyo anu hafrah ana. Anu hafrah sryan ro
wAit weto to, nno fyi meto ee! Mkah bawya anu nmat raa anya ro kro
to, nwe bo ro ana mno reto to iro meto! Allah yesait oh mi meen ytu srah ranu aro sait-sait.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas bo ro meen mabo mawe,
ro yaam tait yawe yum oh yawe, ‘Kbe meen raa sait-sait yamo yjit yimna tna heyut ymat Jõ. Tna raa sait-sait kbe yhar tna yawe, “Mabo oh, Nyõ fi Allah.”’”
Yesaya 45:23
Allah yawe feto to, anu bhar bwe meen anu fo sait-sait bras abyõ kʼAllah bwe, “Ae, tiwya jõ tno bo wefo beta.”
Feto to anu nuun-an anya nkyas bo ro mbau aro u to ma. Nuun-an bo weto ma be kbe anu ro kro
to nwe kair anya nwe, “Bo ro nno reto to iro meto!” Nno be anu nno wa iranya raa msya Allah meto.
Jõ fi raa ro thaf, srau sau su tsya
Yesus. Tna thar tawe bo sohmaam aro to mbau kʼanu fee. Menohe soh anu sait ynaut mam yhaf mato rait yawe, “Boit refo fo mbau kʼjõ.” Nhar nwe boit reto mhau mbau kʼait fares meto.
Mfi bo anu ja sohmaam bo sau, menohe bo sohmaam reto to, ja mbau kʼraa taro ro kro
. Soh anu beroh sohmaam bo reto mam wore wo raa weto mmat to, anu nno bo mkair mai kʼana oh meto. Nno feto to, anu natmof raa weto kaket fee.
yajat afo re yyon iro wana weto ye. Nno be anu nisti tna ana me mbtek mam iro.
Bo ro anu nwe moof weto to, Allah yawe anu nno saah. Menohe ro moof to, anu nno ma re kbe raa ro ja mbau bo reto to, kbe mkyas-kas anu fee.
Anu bhau mam raa mana ro Allah yamo

ybo to, ro ati oh mefo: Anu to bhau bhaf sau su bsya Har rAit. Tibyo bhau bhaf ranu moof, bhau bhaf wanu to tnok, tna simaut mam anu bhaf mato wanu ye. Bo bawya ro sohmaam msya bo ro bta to bo ro ati fee.
Raa ro ja mhau mhaf wana mnan feto to, mno bo ro
rAit oh meto. Kbe Allah yhaf mnan ana ye tna kbe raa mhaf mnan ana ye.
Feto to, nma: Anu bno re raa ro kro
to miranya kaket. Tna bno re anu tubat bosmot wanu beta ye.

Bo sohmaam beta to Allah yawe moof. Yawe anu sohmaam saah. Menohe raa taro mhar bo reto mam mhaf mato wana to fefares. Soh ana mmat bo ro anu niit to karik kbe ana mbtek mam iro. Allah yno re ana mama smot Ait oh. Nno be tis rau to, bo ro anu sohmaam to misti re bosmot rana reto sasyõ.
Anu taro ja nbo kak tna nta
maya. Soh nno bo weto nisti re raa anya ro kro
taro mbtek mawe to, beroh nno bo weto ma. Bo bawya ro mno re raa mbtek mawe to, beroh nno ma.

Nkyas bo weto tna sohmaam bo weto mam wore wo raa weto mahni sai. Nno bo weto mam wore Allah yasu ymat tna raa mahni. Niwana bo ro Ait yawe kʼanu ma. Niwerek bo ro anu nhaf nwe moof to ma. Tna kbe Allah yno bo moof kʼanu.
Tna awya ro ynaut maut-mroh mam yhaf mato to, menohe beroh sohmaam bo reto to, ait yno mkair meto. Soh anu nno bo ro miwana bosmot ranu to, Allah yawe anu nno iro oh meto.
Feto to fyi? Anu to smot
matak re bwe boit bo to ro mbau to aro u fee. Menohe anu bmat anu besait sai to ma. Anu tam-tam raa wanu ro bosmot rana sne fares ye.
Rau ro moof to, anu sait-sait bno bo ro raa anya mhaf mnan. Au oh mi anu bno bo moof kʼraa anya ro ja tubat bosmot rana mrok matak ye.
Tiwya
yno feto ye. Ait yno bo afo re kbe Yaja yhaf mnan. Ait saso bo ro Ait yesait yhaf ksoh to fee. Bokom sau mkyas bo ro tiwya
yawe kʼyaja Allah yawe,
“Allah, tiwya raa mamus Nyõ tna Jõ tros tkai riryõn.”
Mazmur 69:10

Anu sorni ma. Bo bawya sor ro tiwya raa mkom mam Bokom ro Allah to, Ait ybis ana mkom afo re anu bmat tna bhar bo weto ye. Tibyo bo ro anu bmat mam Bokom ro Allah to, ja tubat bosmot ranu re anu binaut bhar bwe meen anu bkai riof ro mroon tu. Tna bo sau naut: Bo ro anu bmat mam Bokom ro Allah to merif mawe kbe anu bito bsom bo ro matu mai kʼanu to. Bo weto mno re anu binaut roon ranu ye. Binaut bwe meen anu bkai riof ro mroon reto.
Allah Ait oh mi ja yoo yatak yee kʼanu re anu bito bsom bo ro matu mai kʼanu to. Tna Ait oh mi ja tubat bosmot ranu ye. Jõ skabuk tayoh
afo re kbe anu beta nhau nhaf sau su. Nno reto mnan fi bo ja
Yesus yhau yhaf sau su ysya anu to.
Nhau nhaf sau su tibyo kbe anu nbaut Allah mkah nhaf sau su ye. Allah fi Yesus
ranu Yaja.
Feto to jõ tawe kʼanu ro nhau mam Roma to, tawe beta nitrah nhaf wanu kʼanya re niranya kaket. Tiwya
ymat anu beta. Soh raa mmat he anu nmat raa anya mnan fi Ait yno feto, kbe ana mbibi Allah.
Nnaut oh,
yama yo kʼamu, raa mana ro Yahudi to, re kbe
yno bo moof kʼamu yfi bo sryan sait ja yno bo raa. Yno feto afo re kbe raa mhar mawe bo ro Allah yawe to, ybo yno tu oh. Au oh mi: Tiwya Allah yawe kʼAbraham ysya kube wait to yawe kbe Ait ybis
yama yo kʼamu.
Tna
retait yama re kbe yatmof raa ro mbam raa mana roto ye. Yama tibyo ana ro mbam raa mana roto to, kbe mbaut Allah ye. Bokom ro Allah far-far refo mkyas bo ro
Daud yawe kʼAllah yawe,
“Jõ tji howes tna bibi Nyõ nasom aNyõ mam wore wo raa mana roto makin mmat.”
2 Samuel 22:50
Tna mam far-far roto bi sait yawe kʼana ro mbam raa mana roto to, yawe,
“Nsen simaut! Anu ro nbam raa mana roto to, simaut su nsya raa wAit ro mbam raa mana ro Yahudi ye!”
Ulangan 32:43
Tna far-far roto sau naut ye mkyas mawe,
“Jõ tawe kʼanu ro nbam raa mana roto weto beta to, tawe, ‘Bibi
ramu ye!’ Jõ ksoh raa beta bibi Ait!”
Mazmur 117:1
Tna mam far-far roto sau naut Yesaya ykom yawe,
“Bi Isai, kube rait sait meen yama. Yasen yamo
tna ybo raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin beta. Raa weto to, kbe mhar tna minaut mawe meen
retait yoo riof yee kʼana.”
Yesaya 11:10

Allah ja yno re anu bhar tna binaut bwe bo beta ro Ait yawe to, kbe mabo tu oh. Tna jõ skabuk anu re kbe nhau nwai kʼbi Ait kaket. Nwai kʼbi Ait feto tibyo Ait yno anu nhau nhaf tnok yoyo, tna simaut mam anu nhaf mato wanu yoyo ye. Tna skabuk re Har rAit mno anu ninaut renti nwe bo ro bi Ait yawe to, kbe mabo. Kbe yno mkah tak ro Har rAit.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; Jõ thar tawe anu to, raa ro ja nno bo moof tna ja nhar bo mnan si ye. Tna anu nhar bo watum kʼanya ye.
Menohe Allah yatmof jõ yoo bouum yee kʼjõ. Bouum reto yee afo re
Yesus ybis jõ tamo raabis rAit tamo to kʼanu. Anu to nbam raa mana ro Israel fee. Anu to, nbam raa mana roto makin. Tama to kʼanu to, tama tkyas Bokyas Moof
ro Allah. Tama tfi

ro ja ykyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah. Anu nri tna Har rAit moo anu msan kʼAllah re nno bo wAit. Au oh mi jõ too anu tsan anu kʼAllah. Tsan anu kʼAit mnan mfi raa msan bosan roto taro kʼAit. Tna Allah yhaf mnan yoo anu. Allah yoo bouum reto yee kʼjõ to, tibyo jõ tkom watum refo kʼanu, tkyas abyõ kʼanu sai. Kmo ma. Tkom bo wefo tee afo re anu nnaut bo wefo u, sorni ma.
Menohe Allah yatmof jõ yoo bouum yee kʼjõ. Bouum reto yee afo re
Yesus ybis jõ tamo raabis rAit tamo to kʼanu. Anu to nbam raa mana ro Israel fee. Anu to, nbam raa mana roto makin. Tama to kʼanu to, tama tkyas Bokyas Moof
ro Allah. Tama tfi

ro ja ykyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah. Anu nri tna Har rAit moo anu msan kʼAllah re nno bo wAit. Au oh mi jõ too anu tsan anu kʼAllah. Tsan anu kʼAit mnan mfi raa msan bosan roto taro kʼAit. Tna Allah yhaf mnan yoo anu. Allah yoo bouum reto yee kʼjõ to, tibyo jõ tkom watum refo kʼanu, tkyas abyõ kʼanu sai. Kmo ma. Tkom bo wefo tee afo re anu nnaut bo wefo u, sorni ma.
Feto to jõ bibi
ati ro jõ tno bo ro Allah ybis jõ tno.
Jõ tamo tkyas

yasom kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin. Yesus yno re bo ro jõ tkyas tna bo ro jõ tno weto to, mafer moof. Tibyo ana weto mari bo ro Allah yawe oh. Kbe jõ tyok-yok bo ro mfi fefo ro mama mbam kʼAit sai. Jõ wa tyok-yok bo roto fee.
Har rAit moo tak mee kʼjõ re tno bo ro hnah tna bo ro msai aro sor. Jõ tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus mnan si oh mbam
ro Yerusalem mamo snok mam
ro Ilirikum.
Ati ro tkyas Bokyas Moof ro
refo to, jõ tomer tamo tkyas mam wore wo raa mari mbo Bokyas refo fefares. Tkyas bofret sau: Mfi bo raa ro ja sgi amah. Soh ait roto sait yatim yati sankaf to, jõ hawe tama sgi amah reto riryõn.
Menohe jõ ksoh tno bo mnan fi
Yesaya tiwya ykom,
“Raa ro wase bokyas rAit to, meen kbe raa mama mkyas
yasom kʼana weto re ana mari tna mhar ye.”
Yesaya 52:15
Au oh mi jõ thau mam oo refo fares. Allah ybis jõ tkyas
yasom kʼraa mam befo wia. Tawe tama tmat anu ro nhau mam Roma, menohe tama fefares.
Tkah bo mam oo wefo mkak oh. Mfo refo jõ rero tama to kʼanu. Tii
mawat oh jõ tawe tama tmat anu.

Bonaut ajõ to tamoʼt Spanyol. Tna jõ tinaut tawe kbe tmat anu mam Roma iti. Jõ tama thau tsya anu ti baro afo re anu bkai anya mam beto. Tna jõ ksoh anu noo bo ro jõ tnaut to baro nee kʼjõ re tasen tamo renti.
Menohe mfo refo to tamoʼt Yerusalem wia. Takah bo tamo tee kʼraa ro Allah wAit mam
reto wia.
makin ro mhau mam
Makedonia msya
Akhaya to, taa ana mawe ana ksoh mberur moo pitis mee. Ana moo pitis reto mee re kbe jõ takah tamo tee kʼraa kinyah ro Allah wAit mam Yerusalem.

Ana mawe mno bo refo. Mawe rau ro moof to, ana moo bo aro mee kʼraa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi weto. Tiwya ana ro mbam raa mana roto weto to, smot Bokyas Moof ro Yesus tibyo mkai mafer ro moof ye. Bokyas Moof ro Yesus frok mbam raa mana ro Yahudi wia. Tibyo raa ro mbam raa mana roto mam befo mbibi ana ro Yahudi mawe asik mase. Feto tna ana ro mbam raa mana roto to, mawe ana mbo pitis baro tiim sroh si kʼana ro Yahudi weto.

Jõ tesait tawe takah pitis reto tamo tna tee kʼana ro kinyah mam Yerusalem weto. Jo kaket re ana mkai bouum ro moof reto wia. Ana mkai mkak, tna fo kbe tamoʼt Spanyol. Tna tama iti tmat anu mam Roma beto ye.
Jõ thar tawe tamo to kʼanu to, kbe
yno bo ro moof toni kʼanu beta.
Taja, tme, tao tano na; Anu beta fo raa ro kro
Yesus
. Tna Har ro Allah mno re anu beta batmof anya kaket. Feto to jõ soh-soh anu tawe ntomer nros tis kʼjõ: Skabuk jõ nsan kʼAllah yatem rAit.
Mfo refo to arin ro mkair mam
Yudea. Raa ro hawe smot
to saim jõ mawe mame. Feto skabuk re Allah ywas jõ. Tna skabuk re pitis ro jõ too tee kʼana ro Allah wAit mam
Yerusalem to, kbe ana fri pitis weto mkah mhaf ro moof.
Skabuk feto afo re kbe jõ tama to kʼanu, soh Allah ybis. Tibyo kbe jõ tama tirer anu tna kbe simaut tsya anu ye su.
Allah oh mi yno re anu bhau bhaf tnok. Tna jõ skabuk re kbe Ait yatam anu ye.
: Mabo oh.
Tna jõ tkyas fai Febe baro kʼanu afo re ati ro au mama to, kbe anu ntam-tam au. Au to raa wanu sau ye. Tna au mamo
mam
rau ye.
reto mhau mam
ro Kengkrea. Kbe au mamo mmat anu mam Roma.
Nmat au kaket mnan fi bo anu ja nmat raa ro Allah wAit makin to. Tiwya au mmat jõ kaket feto ye tna au mmat raa mawat sor ye. Tna wore au mhau msya anu to noo bo ro au mnaut aro to, nee kʼau ye.
Nmah meen kʼPriska msya maa Akwila. Ana mbewok to,
Yesus ybis mkah bo rAit su msya jõ ye.

Tiwya, ana mbewok mno wa raa ro mhoh byoh kʼjõ to, mame jõ fee. Mno feto kene wo raa mame ana majat he mfe. Ana mbewok mno bo feto tibyo tayoh asik mase kʼana. Jõ tesait sai fee; raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye.
wana beta mayoh asik mase kʼana mbewok ye.
Nmah meen kʼana msya
ro ja siret skabuk su mam amah rana mbewok ye.
Tna nmah meen kʼEpenetus. Ait fi raa ro jõ thafri. Ait fi raa ro tinyi mamo kro
mam rabin ro Asia.
Tna nmah meen kʼfai Maria ye. Fai au to mur-mur mno bo moof kʼanu yoyo.
Tna nmah meen kʼAndronikus ysya Yunias. Ana mbewok to tiwya kro
ro Yahudi ye. Ana mbewok tiwya mamo kro
matim wia, tna fo jõ. Ana smot
mi raa mbu ana mam
mato msya jõ ye. Ana mbewok weto to, raabis ro
ye. Raa mawe ana to raabis wAit ro moof.
Nmah meen kʼAmpliatus ye. Ait tait raa ro kro
. Tna jõ thafri ait.
Nmah meen kʼUrbanus ye. Ait tait
ybis ykah bo rAit ysya jõ ye. Tna nmah meen kʼStakhis. Ait tait raa ro jõ ksoh ye.
Nmah meen kʼApeles ye. Bosmot rait to matak. Tiwya ait smot
tibyo raa sikowah ait. Menohe bosmot rait matak fares. Tna nmah meen
ro ja skabuk mam amah ro Aristobulus.
Tna nmah meen kʼHerodion. Ait tait tiwya raa ro Yahudi ye. Tna nmah meen kʼNarkisus ysya raa wait beta ro kro
ye.
Nmah meen kʼfai Trifena msya fai Trifosa. Ana mbewok mur-mur mkah bo ro
. Tna nmah meen kʼfai Persis. Au to mur-mur mkah bo ro
yoyo ye. Tna jõ ksoh au ye.
Nmah meen kʼRufus ysya yme. Ait tait raa ro
ysok. Tna fai au to mnan fi jõ tme ye.
Nmah meen kʼAsinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas msya raa ro kro
taro sor tna skabuk su msya ana.
Nmah meen kʼFilologus ysya Yulia, kʼNereus ysya yano, tna kʼOlimpas ye. Tna nmah meen kʼraa ro Allah wAit mam beto ye beta.
Anu nmah meen kʼanya ye tna hana anya.
ro kro
beta sor mmah meen kʼanu ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ sobu anu tawe, kaket anu. Kbe raa mama mkyas bokyas roto taro kʼanu. Anu nhar bokyas moof ro
oh to. Mfi bo raa mkyas bo ro mamyot bokyas ro
reto to fee, niranya nsya ana weto ma. Nmat sas wa ana weto. Bokyas rana reto mno wa re raa smot Allah matak fee, tna mno re raa mbrir-brar mam
Raa ro mfi feto to, mkah bo ro

ybis to fee. Ana mno bo ro mhaf wana ksoh sai. Ana weto mhar bo mkyas kaket, re raa ksoh mari bokyas rana. Menohe ana mkyas bo sioh. Raa mhaf reo mari bo ro ana mawe tna mnaut mawe bo mabo, he mfe. Ana ja miwro raa feto.

Raa beta mhar mawe anu nri Bokyas Moof ro Yesus oh tna nbo nno. Jõ tari bo ro anu nno feto tibyo jõ simaut mase ye. Jõ ksoh tawe anu nhau nsu maah re nhar bo ro moof tna nbo nno. Tna ksoh tawe anu wase bo nno bo mkair-kar ye.
Allah oh mi yno re anu bhau bhaf tnok. Kbe Ait yno fooh re Ait yber kabes yabi tait (Iblis) hasyoh mam anu naa ti te. Tna jõ skabuk
ranu Yesus
re yatmof anu.
Timotius ja ykah bo su ysya jõ. Ait ymah meen kʼanu beta. Tna Lukius, Yason ysya Sosipater mmah meen kʼanu ye. Ana mabo tuuf tiwya raa ro
Yahudi mfi jõ ye. Menohe mfo refo amu nmo raa ro kro
Jõ ro tkom aam refo tasom Tertius. Jõ fi raa ro kro
, tna tmah meen kʼanu ye.
Gayus ymah meen kʼanu ye. Raa
mam befo to ja siret skabuk su mam amah rait. Tna jõ, Paulus, mfo refo tjin tsya ait ye. Bi Erastus yamo
refo. Ait ymah meen kʼanu. Kwartus tait raa ro kro
sait, ymah meen ye.
[Jõ skabuk
ranu Yesus
re yatmof anu beta.
: Mabo oh!]
Tna bibi Allah! Bi Ait oh mi yatak yno anu nros smot Yesus matak. Yno mkah Bokyas Moof ro jõ tkyas
Yesus oh meto. Bokyas reto to, tiwya Allah ymyõt bose bau. Yasbrah fee.
Menohe Allah saim yawe mfo refo Ait yasbrah oh. Tibyo amu nhar tna mbetoo bo ro tiwya Ait ybis
wAit mama mkom. Allah ro yhau yawyos ybis jõ tamo tkyas Bokyas refo kʼraa mana beta. Allah saim jõ tamo tkyas feto afo re kbe ana mhar tna smot Ait. Ana smot tibyo mari bo ro Ait yawe, mbo mno kaket.
Jõ skabuk re kbe anu bmat Yesus
tibyo anu bbaut bo yase ro Allah rAit mfo refo mamo snok mam hame wajin! Allah yesait aran yhar bo toni.
: Mabo oh!
I Corinthians: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus. Tiwya Allah ytu jõ yawe tamo raabis
ro
Yesus rAit. Jõ tsya bi Sostenes nmah meen kʼanu. Sostenes tait raa ranu ro ja kro
Aam refo amu nkom tna tiim kʼanu, raa
ro Allah mam
ro Korintus. Allah ymat anu nsya
su tibyo Allah yoo anu nmo raa ro ja mno bo wAit sai. Ait ytu anu nmo raa wAit nsya raa magin ro mamo mo kʼYesus
oh to ye. Yesus
tait
ro ybo anu bsya raa ro kro
beta ro mhau mam woyõ-woya ye.
Amu mbewok skabuk Bja Allah, re Ait ysya
Yesus
matmof anu tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok ye.
Anu nmo no
Yesus oh. Allah yatmof anu oh. Feto to jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah yoyo.
Anu nma no
Yesus oh. Tibyo Allah yoo bouum ro mase yee
ranu: Yno re anu nhar bo knik-knak kaket, tna yno re anu ntak nkyas bo kaket moof ye.
Ait yoo bouum rAit yee kʼanu mi raa mhar mawe bokyas ro
tiwya amu mbewok nkyas kʼanu to bokyas ro mabo.
Mfo refo anu nhau ste
ranu, Yesus
ro kbe yama mun ro ewok. Anu ste Ait yama to, anu nhaf nse bouum
ro Allah yuumto kʼanu to, aro mabut fee.
Tna bi Ait kbe yban anu snok mam tis rau reto. Yban anu afo re anu nros ntak tu. Tna meen ati ro
ranu, Yesus
yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa to, kbe yawe anu nber safo aro fee.
Allah ymen anu oh yawe anu bma biranya bsya Ku rAit,
ranu Yesus
Tna bo ro Ait yawe to, kbe ybo yno tu oh.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; raa ro Kloe mawe kʼjõ mawe anu riwai nfa anya. Jõ soh-soh kʼanu mam
ranu, Yesus
yasom tawe, “Nfa anya ma! Tawe nhau nhaf sau su tna bonaut ranu sau su.”
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; raa ro Kloe mawe kʼjõ mawe anu riwai nfa anya. Jõ soh-soh kʼanu mam
ranu, Yesus
yasom tawe, “Nfa anya ma! Tawe nhau nhaf sau su tna bonaut ranu sau su.”
Anu taro nwe, “Jõ fi kro Paulus!” Tna taro nwe, “Paulus fee, jõ kro Apolos!” Tna taro nwe, “Jõ kro Kefas-Petrus!” Tna anu roto taro nwe, “Jõ kro
aran sai!”
Anu nno fyi meto?
yetsu rAit sau aran sai! Jõ oh mi raa mame tajat fee! Jõ too riof ro mase tee kʼanu to fee! Raa
anu aro to mkah jõ tasom ajõ to fee ye!
Jõ hawe bo raa mnaut mawe, “Paulus ja
raa mawat afo re kbe ana ksoh kro ait!” Tiwya jõ tesait
Krispus ysya Gayus, mbewok aran sai. Tibyo jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah.
Jõ hawe bo raa mnaut mawe, “Paulus ja
raa mawat afo re kbe ana ksoh kro ait!” Tiwya jõ tesait
Krispus ysya Gayus, mbewok aran sai. Tibyo jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah.
(Tna tiwya jõ tesait
Stefanus ysya raa wait ye. Jõ
ana weto sai aran.)
Mhau raa roto
raa.
ybis jõ tkyas Bokyas ro Moof
rAit sai. Tiwya
yajat mam ara warok afo re raa fri riof ro mase. Tna bokyas reto oh mi bokyas ro matak toni. Jõ hawe bo bokyas ajõ ro moof mi mayõ raa tibyo ana ksoh mama mo
Menohe bo ro
yno reto oh mi kbe mayõ raa mhaf wana to bo ro ati. Jõ thar bo tkyas kaket fee. Ara warok reto au oh mi merif Allah yhaf rAit kaket matak.

Raa taro mamo iso ro mkair. Meen Allah yno ana safe mkak. Ana weto mari amu nkyas nwe, “Yesus raa mame yajat mam ara warok afo re kbe raa fri riof ro mase.” Mari feto to, ana mnaut mawe amu wase bo. Menohe anu ro bkai riof ro mase to, bhar bwe bokyas reto to matak toni.
Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro makit maan to, meen Jõ tno re ana mamboi. Bombra ro ana mhar reto to, meen Jõ sibrir marak.”
Yesaya 29:14
Raa ro makit maan to, Allah yawe, “Ana wase bo.” Raa ro mnaut mawe ana mhar bo kaket tna mamo
to, Allah yawe, “Bonaut rana to mabuf sai.” Raa ro mhar bo tna hre mkyas iso ro raa mnaut bo to, Allah yawe, “Bo ro ana mhar to mafer aro fee.”
Allah yno re raa ro makit maan to, bombra ro ana mhar to, iso ro raa mkai riof to fee. Menohe yno re Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
ja amu nkyas reto mi merif iso ro raa mamo mo kʼAit tna mkai riof ro mase. Raa ro wase Allah to mnaut mawe amu ro ja nkyas Bokyas
reto to, raa ro wase bo. Menohe Allah ysan riof ro mase kʼraa beta ro mari Bokyas reto tna mse kʼana mhaf.
Mfi bo amu nkyas ara warok ro

to, raa mana ro Yahudi ja mari fee. Ana weto mawe mmat bo hnah wia tna fo ana smot bokyas ramu reto. Tna raa mana ro Yunani mnaut mawe kbe ana mkai Allah mkah bonaut rana sai. Feto to raa ro Yahudi mnaut mawe Yesus tait
rana fee, mnaut mawe bokyas ramu mamyot bo ro ja ana smot fee. Tna raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin to, mnaut mawe ana saso bohar ro ati. He mfe. Tna ana mnaut mawe amu wase bo! He mfe ye.
Mfi bo amu nkyas ara warok ro

to, raa mana ro Yahudi ja mari fee. Ana weto mawe mmat bo hnah wia tna fo ana smot bokyas ramu reto. Tna raa mana ro Yunani mnaut mawe kbe ana mkai Allah mkah bonaut rana sai. Feto to raa ro Yahudi mnaut mawe Yesus tait
rana fee, mnaut mawe bokyas ramu mamyot bo ro ja ana smot fee. Tna raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin to, mnaut mawe ana saso bohar ro ati. He mfe. Tna ana mnaut mawe amu wase bo! He mfe ye.
Menohe raa taro Allah ymen yawe, “Nma smot
!” Ana taro to raa mana ro Yahudi ye. Tna Ait ymen raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin ye. Ana weto smot
. Ana mhar mawe
oh mi Allah yatak rAit. Tna ana mhar mawe
oh mi bohar rAit ye.

Raa ro tabam sai ana mnaut mawe iso ro Allah yerif re raa mamo mkai riof reto to, iso ro mkair. He mfe. Bo ro ana weto mhar to mabuf sai. Bohar ro Allah reto to mase miwer. Tna raa ro tabam sai mnaut mawe ana mesait to raa ro matak. He mfe. Ana raa ro sne sai. Allah tait raa ro yatak tna raa ro tabam refo aro matak fee.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; nnaut nwe: Tiwya raa mnaut mawe anu nkin nhar bo kebet aran sai. Raa ro wase Allah mnaut mawe anu nkin to raa ro nse fee. Raa ro wase Allah mnaut mawe anu nkin to raa manes fee. Tna fo Allah ytu anu yawe, “Nma smot

Menohe Allah ysok raa ro tiwya wase bo to, yawe ana mamo mo kʼAit. Tna yno re ana mhar bo miwrek raa tabam ro ja mhar bo tna mamo mo kʼAllah fee. Yno feto afo re ana ro tabam refo to hrenaut. Tna Allah ysok raa ro ssafo fee to, ytu ana mamo mo kʼAit. Tna yno re ana matak miwrek raa ro ja matak. Yno afo re ana ro hawe mamo mo kʼAit to hrenaut ye.
Tna bombra ro ati fee, msya bombra ro ja raa hawe to, bo weto to, bi Ait ysok tna yawe bo weto to bo ro ati meto.
Allah yno feto afo re raa safuk ma. Raa taro mawe, “Jõ fi raa ro thar bo. Feto to Allah ysok jõ yawe tamo raa wAit sait.” He mfe. Allah hawe bo raa mkyas feto, bokyas reto to, bokyas ro sre.
Bi Ait yesait oh mi yno re anu nhau nsya
Yesus su. Nhau nsya
su tibyo Allah ymat anu yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tna Allah yawe anu nhau nno bo wAit sai. Tna
yoo yetsu rAit yfes anu.
Feto to Allah yno re bo beta ro anu bhar to,
oh mi sair to.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Safuk bombra ro anu nno to ma. Rau ro moof to, nnaut bombra ro
yno kʼanu sai, tna safuk bibi Ait.”
Yeremia 9:24
Rau ro moof to, kbe anu nri bokom ro Allah reto.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya jõ tama tkyas bo ro Allah yawe kʼanu to tkyas bo reto mkah mai ro moof kaket fee. Tna jõ tkyas bo mfi raa ro ja mhar bo toni to fee ye.
Bo ro jõ tkyas kʼanu oh mefo: “Yesus
tiwya raa mame yajat mam ara warok oh.” Jõ tkyas bo ro mase aro kʼanu fee.
Jõ tama tinyi to kʼanu to, jõ waa tna tetet thai.
Ati reto to, jõ tkyas mfi raa ro mhar bo mbetoo mase fee. Menohe Har ro
mno re ati ro jõ tkyas to, raa mari tna mawe bokyas ro jõ tkyas to mbam Allah.
Har ro
mno feto afo re anu nhar nwe bo ro jõ tkyas reto mbam bonaut raa sai fee, menohe mbam Allah yatak rAit. Jõ tkyas feto tibyo anu nrok smot Ait.
Raa ro kro
taro to bosmot wana matak oh. Tna ati ro amu mbewok hre nsya ana weto to, kbe amu nkyas maja ro

mase kʼana. Tna bo bawya ro amu nkyas refo mbam kʼAllah, mbam kʼraa ro makit maan mam tabam refo fee. Tna bawya ro amu nkyas reto mbam kʼraa manes ro tabam refo fee ye. Meen ana mkah bohar wana weto to msat marak sai.
Tinyi rau to, bombra ro Allah yhar to, Ait ymyõt fares. Tinyi rau Ait yfen tabam refo fefares to, Allah siwyan bohar reto wia oh. Yawe kbe yoo yee kʼanu mam wore wo anu bkai bo yase rAit.
Raa manes ro tabam refo, ana mhar bohar reto fee. Mfi bo tiwya ana mhar bohar reto oh to,
Yesus ro ja anu bibi tait mi kbe ana mfot mame Ait yajat mam ara warok to fee.
Raa manes weto wase bohar refo. Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe fefo:
“Meen Allah yno bo ro moof toni kʼraa ro hafri Ait kaket. Bo weto to, raa aro mmat fefares. Tna mari fefares. Tna mhar bo weto fefares ye.”
Yesaya 64:4
Har rAit mmat sas bombra beta. Mhar bo ro Allah ymyõt fares ye. Mhar tna masbrah bo weto kʼanu raa ro kro
oh.

Mfi raa sait ynaut bo mam yhaf mato rait to, raa aro mhar bonaut rait fee. Ait yesait aran yhar bait. Tna raa aro mhar bombra ro Allah ynaut mam yhaf mato rAit fee ye. Har rAit mesait aran mhar bombra ro Allah rAit.
Tna Har ro mjin kʼanu bhaf to har ro mbam tabam refo fee. Har ro mbam kʼAllah oh mi mjin kʼanu bhaf ranu to. Har rAit mjin mam anu bhaf ranu afo re anu bhar bombra ro Allah yuumto kʼanu.
Feto to bo ro amu nkyas tna mbetoo kʼraa to bohar ro mbam kʼraa ro tabam refo fee. Menohe Har ro
mjin kʼamu nhaf ramu tibyo amu nhar tna nkyas bohar ro ati mbam kʼAllah. Har rAit oh mi mno re amu nkit wamu maan afo re amu ntai nkyas bohar ro mbam Allah kaket.

Raa ro wase Allah to, ana mhar bombra ro mbam Har rAit fee. Anu bkyas bo weto to, ana mnaut mawe anu wase bo. Har rAit mjin kʼana mhaf rana to fee, tibyo ana weto mtai mhar bo ro mbam kʼAllah to fee ye.
Menohe anu to, Har rAit mjin kʼanu bhaf wanu, au oh mi anu bhar bo ro mbam kʼAllah weto. Menohe raa taro mhar maja rau ro anu bkyas to fee.
Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Awya oh mi yhar
yhaf msya yakit rAit? Tna awya oh mi ytai ykyas watum kʼAit to?”
Yesaya 40:13
Amu fo nhaf sau su nsya
tna nhar bo rAit reto.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya wore wo jõ tama tmat anu to, tmat he anu to raa ro kro
oh. Menohe bosmot ranu to matak fefares. Tibyo jõ tkyas bo kʼanu mnan fi tkyas kʼraa ro ksoh bo ro tabam sai. Anu nfi ku mees fares.
Feto to jõ tkyas maja
ro msai aro kʼanu fee. Anu nfi ku mees ro mata sis maya sai fares. Anu ntak niit boit nfi raa mabi to fefares.
Anu ja ksoh bo ro tabam refo sai fares. Jõ tari he anu taro naam bo raa anya fares. Tna anu nmak nsya raa anya fares ye. Feto to jõ tnaut tawe anu nfi raa ro tabam refo sai fares.
Anu taro nkyas nwe, “Jõ fi kro Paulus!” Tna anu taro nwe, “Paulus fee, Jõ fi kro Apolos!” Soh anu nkyas feto to, jõ thar tawe anu nfi raa ro tabam refo sai. Anu nfi raa ro kro
fee.
Jõ tsya Apolos fo sryan ro
wAit sai. Amu mbewok ja nno bo ro bi Ait ybis sai. Ait oh mi ybis amu mbewok nkyas Yesus yasom kʼanu tna re anu nri tna nsam wai
Bokyas ajõ reto to, mfi kake makan sau ro jõ tyum. Tiwya jõ tyum kake makan reto mam anu nhaf mato wanu. Tna Apolos ywyan aya ytu. Menohe Allah Ait oh mi yno re moo to.
Raa ro myum tna msya raa ro mwyan aya mtu weto to raa ro ati fee. Allah tait raa ro ati, ro yno re bo moo.

Raa ro yyum ysya raa ro ywyan aya ytu to, ana mbewok to mnan anya sai. Mbewok mkah bo mana sau su. Menohe kbe boren ro Allah yaren ana to, aro rait hayah-hayah. Meen ait yaren bo kʼana mamyot bo samyoh aro rait-rait.
Amu mbewok nfoh kʼanya tna nkah armato ro Allah rAit to su. Anu,
ro Korintus fo, nnan fi armato ro Allah rAit.
Tna anu fo nfi samu ro Allah rAit ye.
Allah yoo bouum yee kʼjõ: Ait yno re jõ thar tamo tkyas Yesus
yasom kʼraa kaket re ana mama smot bokyas rAit. Bo ro jõ tno reto mfi jõ sgi samu sau: Tinyi rau to, jõ tati sankaf mros. Tna fo raa roto mama sgi renti. Anu ro sgi renti to, sgi kbik-kbak to ma!
Yesus
tait yfi sankaf ro ati. Sgi samu abyõ mam sankaf roto taro to ma!
Kbe raa moo bo aro rau-rau makah mama misoh sgi mam sankaf reto to abyõ. Raa misoh sgi amah reto mkah bo ro moof mfi
fraa ro moof aro rau-rau ye. Tna taro moo bo ro mkair mfi ara
bosafom ro ngkaat bo to ye.
Meen ayõ ro
yama to, kbe Ait sanet bo ro raa sait-sait rait yno. Sanet mkah tafoh ro mait. Sanet re yhar soh ait yno bo rait kaket fe mfe a?
Meen
yoo tafoh yuus bo ro raa sgi. Ana taro to mno bo wana kaket wore wo ana mhau mam tabam refo. Bo ro ana mno kbe mberoh mros matak tibyo
yaren ana.

Tna raa taro to, mno bo wana kaket fee wore wo ana mhau mam tabam refo. Bo ro ana mno to, kbe mait mkak beta. Hrowyõ rana to makus. Kbe ana mkai boren aro fee. Kbe ana mabo rana mkai riof, menohe kene wo tafoh mait ana.
Nnaut oh: Anu raa magin ro kro
beta to samu ro Allah rAit. Tna Har ro Allah mjin kʼanu nhaf wanu beta.
Wore wo Allah yhau to, yuk ro mbau meto. Anu beta to samu ro Allah rait oh meto. Mfi bo raa aro mitrah samu ro Allah reto, kbe Allah yno ana safe mkak ye.
Raa ro tabam refo ro mhar bo to, Allah ymat ana tna yawe, “Ana wase bo.” Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:

“Raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe, ‘Anu bhar bo!’ Ana mawe feto tna mamo mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai. Menohe Allah yno re bo ro ana mawe mno to, mabo fee. Allah yaka boka yse mam iso wore raa mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai.”
Ayub 5:13
Tna Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro mhar bo to,
ymat bonaut wana tna yawe, ‘Bonaut wana weto to mabo aro fee.’”
Mazmur 94:11

Mfi bo raa ro tabam refo fo mnaut mawe, “Anu fo raa ro bhar bo.” Jõ tnaut tawe ana weto sioh ana ai sai. Raa ro mhar bombra ro mbam kʼAllah kaket to, ja raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe ana wase bo. Nnaut oh: Rau ro moof to, anu nri bohar ro mbam kʼAllah to. Mfi bo anu nno feto, kbe raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe anu weto wase bo. Menohe Allah ymat anu to, yawe anu raa ro nhar bo. Feto to nitsre raa ro tabam refo mnaut feto rof!
Raa ro tabam refo ro mhar bo to, Allah ymat ana tna yawe, “Ana wase bo.” Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:

“Raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe, ‘Anu bhar bo!’ Ana mawe feto tna mamo mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai. Menohe Allah yno re bo ro ana mawe mno to, mabo fee. Allah yaka boka yse mam iso wore raa mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai.”
Ayub 5:13
Tna Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro mhar bo to,
ymat bonaut wana tna yawe, ‘Bonaut wana weto to mabo aro fee.’”
Mazmur 94:11

Mfi bo raa ro tabam refo fo mnaut mawe, “Anu fo raa ro bhar bo.” Jõ tnaut tawe ana weto sioh ana ai sai. Raa ro mhar bombra ro mbam kʼAllah kaket to, ja raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe ana wase bo. Nnaut oh: Rau ro moof to, anu nri bohar ro mbam kʼAllah to. Mfi bo anu nno feto, kbe raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe anu weto wase bo. Menohe Allah ymat anu to, yawe anu raa ro nhar bo. Feto to nitsre raa ro tabam refo mnaut feto rof!
Raa ro tabam refo ro mhar bo to, Allah ymat ana tna yawe, “Ana wase bo.” Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:

“Raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe, ‘Anu bhar bo!’ Ana mawe feto tna mamo mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai. Menohe Allah yno re bo ro ana mawe mno to, mabo fee. Allah yaka boka yse mam iso wore raa mno bo wana mamyot bo ro ana mesait mhar sai.”
Ayub 5:13
Tna Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro mhar bo to,
ymat bonaut wana tna yawe, ‘Bonaut wana weto to mabo aro fee.’”
Mazmur 94:11

Mfi bo raa ro tabam refo fo mnaut mawe, “Anu fo raa ro bhar bo.” Jõ tnaut tawe ana weto sioh ana ai sai. Raa ro mhar bombra ro mbam kʼAllah kaket to, ja raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe ana wase bo. Nnaut oh: Rau ro moof to, anu nri bohar ro mbam kʼAllah to. Mfi bo anu nno feto, kbe raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe anu weto wase bo. Menohe Allah ymat anu to, yawe anu raa ro nhar bo. Feto to nitsre raa ro tabam refo mnaut feto rof!
Feto to bibi raa sai toni to ma. Nwe raa sait yhar bo toni tibyo anu nwe kro-kro ait to ma. Bombra beta to mhau mkah merif mafer ro moof kʼanu, raa ro Allah wAit.

Jõ tsya Apolos tna tsya Kefas-Petrus ye, amu nbo tuuf nkyas watum mkah merif mafer ro moof kʼanu. Tna bo bawya ro anu nkai mam tabam refo; mam wore anu nhau fares ye, tna wore anu aro nhai ye, tna bombra ro meen mama ye to, Allah yno re bo weto beta merif mafer ro moof kʼanu ye:
Tna anu weto beta to raa ro
wAit. Tna
tait Ku ro Allah rAit.
Jõ tsya Apolos nmo sryan ro
Tna bi Allah ysan bohar rAit kʼamu mbewok nbo yawe amu mbewok nmo mbetoo bohar rAit reto kʼraa renti. Bohar reto to, raa ro tabam refo wase fares.
Mfi bo raa mawe moo bo wana mee kʼraa taro sait yse wea to, ja ana mamo saso raa sait ro yhaf makin fee. Ja ana saso raa ro kbe kmot bo reto kaket.
Jõ tari he anu nnaut nwe jõ tno bo ro mkair. Nwe jõ srau ajõ ewok tama tkah armato ro
Jõ tnaut mamo snok mam wore anu nkyas weto fee. Jõ tesait wase thaf ajõ ai!
yesait aran oh mi Raa ro hre susai tna ymat sas bo ro jõ tno. Jõ tnaut tawe thaf ajõ to moof sai. Menohe bo ro jõ tesait tnaut mam thaf mato ajõ to bo ro ati meto fee. Bo ro
ynaut yawe to, rau ro ati oh meto.
Feto to, anu nesait nuun boun kʼanya wia to ma. Nhau meen

yesait yama yoo safo yerif raa sait-sait tiwya yno to. Bi Ait yhar bo beta ro ja raa mmyõt wai to. Yhar bo ro raa mnaut mam mhaf mato wana ye. Meen Ait yama yasbrah bo beta ro mhau mam raa mhaf mato wana beta ye. Ati reto kbe Allah bibi raa sait sait ro yhaf moof.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; ti tinyi raa sait yawe, “Nno bo niwrek maja ro Allah yawe kʼanu to ma.” Tna jõ ksoh betoo u sai kʼanu. Au oh mi jõ tkom bofret riwai
reto kʼanu tawe, “Apolos ysya jõ mbewok nkah armato ro Allah su.” Nnaut oh; raa ro mnaut mawe raa sait yase yiwrek raa taro to, ana weto miwrek maja ro Allah oh meto.
Anu to raa ro Allah yfen beta. Anu taro ja nmat raa taro nwe, “Nyõ to raa ro ati fee!” Mkair feto! Bawya oh mi anu sait safuk yawe ait yase yiwrek raa taro to! Bombra beta ro anu nkai to mbam kʼawya?
Anu taro ja nnaut sre-sre nwe, “Amu fo bobot oh. Feto to amu hawe nri watum ro anu, raabis ro Allah ja nkyas u to ma! Amu fri bobot mninon oh. Amu nnaut bawya u? Amu nfi
oh!” Mfi bonaut ranu reto mabo oh kbe amu simaut mase nsya anu ye. Tna amu ksoh kro anu to, bsen bmo
bbo raa ye! He mfe.
Jõ tnaut tawe Allah yno re raa ksoh mama horit amu, raabis
wAit. Raa horit amu mfi bo amu to raa ro safe mkak. Tna raa msya
mawe mama mmat bo ro mbtek mai kʼamu.
Amu fo mur-mur nri
tibyo raa taro mnaut mawe amu fo raa ro wase bo. Anu
ro Korintus to, anu baro ja tawyõ bo nwe anu to raa ro kro
tna nhar bo. Ja anu nnaut nwe amu fo raa ro ssafo fee. Tna anu safuk nwe anu raa ro ja ntak. Ja anu nnaut nwe amu fo raa kair sai tna ja anu safuk nwe anu to raa ro manes.
Ja amu nhai sre, nhai sbit, tna ratan wamu to ro mrat mam amu netsu wamu sai. Tna raa mai amu. Tna wore amu njin to aro kaket fee. Tna amu nmo ninya sai mam tabam.
Tna amu ja mur-mur saso boit wamu nesait sai. Soh raa mamus amu to, amu nno bo moof kʼana sai. Tna soh raa sikowah amu to, amu kanyin sai.
Mamo snok mfo refo to, raa mkyas-kas amu to, amu kmo ana si fee. Amu nkyas kʼana mkah nhaf ro sneh sai. Tna raa mnaut mawe amu fo nfi bo ro mnis ja raa mbeak makus sai.
Jõ tkyas watum riwai reto kʼanu, tawe mti hrenaut kʼanu fee. Tno afo re kbe anu nnaut, tna kaket anu. Anu to nfi ku wojõ ro jõ ksoh.
ro mbetoo bo ro
kʼanu to magin. Menohe jõ oh mi tama tna tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼanu tatim wia tibyo anu nhaf smot
Yesus. Feto to jõ fi tfi anu nja ranu. Jõ fi anu nja sait aran.
Reto oh mi jõ tkyas watum reto tawe, “Anu nmat bo ro ja jõ tno to, tna anu kro nno ye.”
Ja jõ tamo iso ro
kaket. Reto oh mi riwai jõ tbis Timotius yamo yo kʼanu: Kbe ait ye ykyas iso ro ja jõ tamo reto kʼanu re anu ne nnaut u. Timotius ynan fi ku ajõ ro ksoh. Ait tait ja mur-mur kro
Kbe ait snok
ro Korintus teto tna ykyas iso ro
kʼanu. Bokyas reto ja jõ tkyas woyõ-woya jõ tamo, mam
magin.
Jõ tari he anu taro safuk nwe anu to raa ro nhar bo. Ana weto mnaut mawe, “Kbe Paulus yama u yo kʼanu fee.”
Raa ro mhau mam raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, ja anu bhar ana. Ja bo ro ana mno to, ana mno mkah tak ro Allah rAit. Raa roto taro ja mkyas mkah masoh sai. Bo ro ana mno to, mkah matak rana sai. Feto to, kbe jõ tama fooh to kʼanu, soh
yiserar tamos ajõ miyõ rere. Tama tmat anu ro safuk weto. Tna kbe thar soh anu ja nno bo nkah tak ro Allah, fe anu ja nno bo nkah tak ranu nesait sai.
Raa ro mhau mam raa mana ro Allah yamo
ybo to, ja anu bhar ana. Ja bo ro ana mno to, ana mno mkah tak ro Allah rAit. Raa roto taro ja mkyas mkah masoh sai. Bo ro ana mno to, mkah matak rana sai. Feto to, kbe jõ tama fooh to kʼanu, soh
yiserar tamos ajõ miyõ rere. Tama tmat anu ro safuk weto. Tna kbe thar soh anu ja nno bo nkah tak ro Allah, fe anu ja nno bo nkah tak ranu nesait sai.
Anu ksoh ranu sai: Mfi bo anu nno bo ro moof to, kbe jõ tama tkyas bo kʼanu mkah thaf ro sneh. Tna mfi bo anu beroh nno bo ro mkair weto kbe jõ tama tkyas watum kʼanu mkah kmo.
Jõ tari he raa ro
ranu sait ja yaus yaja yfain. Bo ro ait wyahte reto to, mkair toni! Ja raa ro wase Allah to, ana hawe bo ro mnan feto mno. Fyi re raa ro kro
sait yasen yno bo feto!
Fyi re anu nsen safuk nwe, “Amu raa to nno bo moof!” Anu hrenaut tna sraujin fea! Raa ranu sait yno bo mkair wyahte to fyi re anu nbe ait nwe yhau ysya anu? Rau ro moof to, anu nikyak ait frok ybam
ranu too!
Jõ tabo fo thau fari tsya anu menohe thaf ajõ fo mrat msya anu. Jõ thau to tnaut anu yoyo. Jõ thau mam tefo to, jõ too safo mana tse kʼraa retait oh.
Mam
Yesus yasom rAit to, jõ tbis
ranu tawe anu nmo berur siret su tna nkyas safo reto. Siret su tna nno bo mnan mfi bo jõ tsya anu hre su ye. Tna kbe
Yesus yatak rAit yatam anu ye.
Jõ tbis anu tawe, “Noo safo mana nmit kʼait retait oh! Tufrok ait ybam
