ranu reto! Tna nsan ait kabes! Nsan ait kabes yabi (Iblis) re kbe bo mkair mbtek mai kʼait. Soh yetsu rait ro masmamo marak to, kbe yamos rait mkai riof mam ati ro
yama.”
Anu ja safuk nwe, “Amu raa ro nno bo moof.” He mfe. Anu nmo sre. ⌞Raa ro
ranu sait yhau yno bo ro mkair fares, menohe anu sayõ rof sai! Nno feto ma!⌟ Anu nhar bofret refo fe mfefares a? Raa fret bo mawe:
kebet to, raa mno
to mase.”
Tufrok raa retait ybam
ranu mnan fi raa ro Yahudi ja beak
wana wore ana makyõ Korat ro
Tufrok ait retait fooh re kbe anu to nhau noof. Tna kbe iro ro ait yno to mbet anu fee! Nnaut raa ro Yahudi: Korat ro
to, ja ana ktan
Ana ktan
to mno tibyo ana mkai riof. Menohe anu raa ro kro
to bnaut bwe
tait tiwya raa mame yajat.
raa mame yajat tibyo riof ro mase mama kʼanu.
Nma, anu simaut mnan mfi bo ja raa simaut wore wo ana makyõ korat reto. Tna nitsre kmo msya iro ro ja raa mno to. Beak iro makus mfi bo raa ro Yahudi ja beak
ro raa mno mkah
to makus ye. Tna anu bmo raa ro ja srau makin fee. Bmo raa ro bhaf wanu to moof ati.
Aam ro tiwya jõ tkom tiim kʼanu to tawe, “Anu to niranya nsya raa ro maus-as bo to ma.”
Au oh mi jõ bhah anu tawe, “Niranya nsya raa ro kro
tna ja maus-as bo to ma!” Raa ro wase
fares to mawat toni. Tna ana weto to ja soo oh maus-as bo, tna masmamo, besruf raa, tna smot kabes fares sai. Woyõ-woya anu raa ro ja kro
nmo mam tabam refo to, raa ro mimara mboh to mhau mam wore weto ye. Kbe anu fri ana tna nkah bo nsya ana su fares.
Jõ tkom aam refo tiim kʼanu tawe, “Raa mawat mkyas mawe ana mamo raa ro kro

oh. Menohe ana taro to maus-as bo fares, tna masmamo, tna smot kabes fares, tna mkyas-kas raa, tna bisir-basar, tna besruf raa. Raa weto oh mi jõ tawe wa kʼanu tawe, ‘Niranya nsya ana weto ma!’” Raa ro mkyas mawe ana raa ro kro
menohe ja mno bo ro mkair to, tawe anu niranya nsya ana weto ma. Tna hre niit boit su nsya ana weto ma!
Jõ fi tase re tse srah kʼraa ro wase
to fee! Meen Allah yesait aran ymit safo mana kʼana weto. Menohe raa ro kro
to, tbis anu tawe, “Raa ro
ranu to anu nesait betoo srah wanu kʼanya!” Bokom ro Allah to mawe bau fefo yum oh:
“Nikyak raa ro mber safo to frok mbam
ranu.”
Ulangan 13:5
Jõ fi tase re tse srah kʼraa ro wase
to fee! Meen Allah yesait aran ymit safo mana kʼana weto. Menohe raa ro kro
to, tbis anu tawe, “Raa ro
ranu to anu nesait betoo srah wanu kʼanya!” Bokom ro Allah to mawe bau fefo yum oh:
“Nikyak raa ro mber safo to frok mbam
ranu.”
Ulangan 13:5
Anu raa ro Allah wAit to, nkyas safo to, nno kaket. Mfi anu sait yno safo mai kʼanu roto sait to, nmo no kʼraa ro wase
tna nwe ait hre susai to ma! Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Anu saso raa ro Allah wAit sait re kbe ait hre susai tna ymat sas safo ranu reto.”

Nnaut oh: Meen anu raa ro Allah wAit to meen bkyas safo raa ro tabam refo beta. Soh meen anu btai bkyas safo wana weto to, mfo refo anu besait btai hre susai bkyas bo sre maku ro raa wanu aro mno fea! Ja bo ro ana mno mkair to bo ro samyoh fee.
Nnaut oh: Meen anu to btu safo ro
aro mno to ye. Safo ro ja raa mno mam tabam refo to mase fee. Anu bhar bkyas safo weto saah. Bo samyoh fee!
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Mfi bo raa wanu aro mno bo ro mkair to, anu nesait hre nkyas bo reto. Saso raa manes ro ja kro
raa kinyah wanu ro ja kro
sai. Ana mbewok ye mhar bo mnan si re kbe hre susai mtu srah ro raa wanu aro mno to.”
Anu nsis nhar bo. Feto to anu nesait nisoh bo mkair ro anu aro nno to! Menohe ja anu nno feto fee. Tibyo jõ bhah anu, afo re anu hrenaut!
Jõ tari he anu raa ro kro
to, ja nmo no kʼraa ro wase
tna ait hre susai ykyas bo mkair ro anu nno. Jõ tari feto tna hawe. Anu nno bo fyi meto!
Rau ro moof to, anu nisoh niranya fooh. Menohe anu mbrir-brar mam
ranu fares. Bo ro anu nno reto to mkair. Rau ro moof to, mfi bo raa wanu mno bo mkair mai kʼanu tna besruf anu to, ska si to ma! Ana mno feto rof sai, tna anu kanyin sai.
Menohe jõ tari he anu ja besruf anya tna nno bo mai kʼraa anya ro ja kro
Nnaut oh! Sioh anu ai to ma! Raa ro ja mno-na bo to, meen mamo mhau mam sawro ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee. Raa ro maus-as bo, msya raa ro smot kabes, msya raa ro mwyah, msya raa sme ro ja haberek mnan fnya tna soo bo maus,
msya raa ro msyõf bo, msya raa ro masmamo, msya raa ro bisir-basar, msya raa ro mkyas-kas raa, tna msya raa ro besruf raa: Ana weto beta to, meen mamo mhau mam sawro ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee.
Tiwya anu baro nno bo mfi feto ye. Menohe Yesus yyon iro wanu oh. Tna yoo anu ysan kʼAllah re nno bo wAit sai. Tibyo Allah ymat anu tna yawe anu nfi raa ro mhaf moof ati sai.
Yesus
yno feto mkah Har ro Allah matak rAu.
Jõ tari he raa ro kro

taro ksoh mno-na bo fares. Tna ana mkyas mawe, “Soh watum aro mawe wa bo ro tno reto fee; kbe tno bo bawya sai ro jõ ksoh!” Menohe nnaut nwe bombra taro to mafer marak. Watum ranu mkyas mawe bo aro mbau kʼanu fee. Feto to jõ saah tno bombra weto beta; menohe jõ hawe bo tno. Nno be bo ro mkair aro mbo jõ.

Anu taro nwe, “Allah yfen anu bhaf wanu tna yno re anu biit bo. Tna yfen boit re kbe raa mait. Menohe anu bhaf wanu msya boit ro anu biit to, meen Allah yno sasyoh sai.” Anu saak-saak anu feto nwe, “Nno bo bawya ro anu ksoh sai.” Anu nwe fyi meto! Bokyas ranu reto mnan anya msya bokyas sre ro kro refo:
yfen anu betsu wanu to re anu bus-as bo bsya fnya to saah.” He mfe!
yfen betsu wanu to re anu bno bo ro Ait ksoh. Tna
yatak ybo anu betsu wanu reto ye.
Tna meen yno anu betsu wanu refo me mrok masen. Yno mkah yatak rAit mnan fi tiwya Ait yno
Yesus ye yrok yasen to.
Nnaut oh: Anu netsu wanu to
yetsu rAit jaro oh meto. Anu aro nkah netsu ro
rAit reto to, njin nsya fnya ro ja mwyah to ma!
Nnaut oh: Raa sait ysya fnya ro ja mwyah sau mjin su to, mbewok mrat mkah kwiyan sau. Bokom ro Allah mawe fefo:
“Raa ro yjin ysya fnya to, mbewok mrat mkah kwiyan sau.”
Kejadian 2:24
Awya ro yrat ysya
to, kbe Har ro
to mrat msya raa retait matak tu oh.

Feto oh mi jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Bitsre wyah to mbeak fari!” Iro roto taro to ja mno raa metsu wana mesait ai mkair to fee. Menohe raa ro yaus-as bo to, yno iro ro sikowah yetsu rait yesait ai oh meto.
Sorni bo refo to ma: Anu netsu ranu to amah. Tna Har ro
ja mjin mam amah weto. Har ro
mhau mam anu nhaf mato wanu. Tibyo anu netsu ranu to, bo ranu nesait aran nbo to fee.
Anu fo Allah bain mhai oh mkah mabyoh ro msai. Anu fo raa ro bi Ait rAit. Feto to anu nkah netsu nhaf wanu to nno bo ro moof afo re raa mmat tna bibi Allah.
Riwai anu nkom aam tiim kʼjõ tna ntu bo kʼjõ nwe, “Paulus; nyõ nkyas watum kʼamu tna betoo nawe soh amu, raa ro kro
nwe nmen fnya to fyi?” Tna jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Soh raa yawe yhau semana sai bait feto to moof.
He raa mawat mhau muut bo maus fee. Tibyo ana maus-as bo sai. Rau ro moof to fefo: Fai sau to msya raa sait tna bi sait ymen fai sau; tna kbe ana mbewok to mhau su.”
Raa sme ysya yfain to ana mbewok mjin su soo oh. Soh anu sait ksoh yjin su ysya yfain to, kbe fai au miwana maa ma. Tna soh anu sau ksoh njin su nsya naa to, kbe ait yiwana anu ma ye.

Nno be fai sau mkyas kʼmaa mawe, “Jõ tetsu ajõ fo bo ajõ kar!” Raa ro au msya to, au metsu rau to bo rait oh. Tna nno be raa sme sait ykyas kʼyfain yawe, “Jõ tetsu ajõ fo bo ajõ kar!” Fnya ro ait yoo to, ait yetsu rait to bo rau oh.
Anu nwe wa kʼanya ma. Anu mbewok njin hayah to ma. Anu mbewok ja nsya anya njin su oh. Menohe soh anu mbewok nnaut nwe njin hayah ti baro re anu skabuk

to, anu mbewok hre su nkyas wia, tna anu njin hayah ti baro. Njin hayah ti baro feto tna anu mbewok hah ne nsya anya u. Nno feto afo re anu mbewok srau oot-oot toni to ma. Tna kbe kabes yabi (Iblis) yiwro anu re anu nus-as bo to ma.
Bo ro riwai jõ tkyas weto to, tawe tbis kʼanu fee. Tkyas watum ajõ sai.
Tnaut tawe rau ro moof to, raa mhau semana mfi jõ fefo sai. Menohe raa sait-sait fri bo mbam Allah to aro rait hayah-hayah. Taro to mawe moo fnya, taro to mawe ana moo fnya fee.
Tna jõ tkyas watum kʼraa ro moo fnya fefares to, tna kʼfnya ro msya raa fefares ye, tna kʼsemit to ye tawe, “Rau ro moof to, anu to nhau kar nfi jõ.
Soh anu aro nuut fee to, anu nsya anya rof. Soh mfe to, kbe anu srau oot-oot tibyo anu mbtek mam iro.”
Tna jõ tbis fnya ro msya raa oh to tawe,
ysi bo kʼanu yawe, ‘Anu aro to sikba naa tna nhau hayah to ma!’

Soh fnya sau sikba maa mamo to, au me mamo msya raa roto to ma. Mfi bo au mesait hawe mhau kar to, au hah me u msya raa rau riwai sai.” Tna tbis raa sme ro yoo fnya oh to, tawe, “Anu aro hawe fnya wanu tna nbis frok to ma!”
Tna jõ tkyas watum ajõ kʼanu taro to tawe, “Mfi bo anu, raa ro kro
sait, tiwya noo fnya ro kro
fee, tna soh au reto mawe mhau msya nyõ matak to; kbe nyõ nbis au frok to ma!” (Watum riwai reto mbam kʼjõ sai,
ybis fee.)
Tna mfi bo anu fnya ro kro
aro tiwya nsya raa ro kro
fee, tna soh ait retait yawe yhau su ysya nyõ to tawe kʼnyõ tawe, “Nyõ nako ait yakus ma!”
Soh raa ro kro
fee yoo fnya ro ja kro
oh, au misti Allah yno bo ro moof kʼau maa ye. Tna soh fai ro kro
fee msya maa ro kro
oh, ait yisti Allah yno bo moof kʼait yfain ye. Ana mno feto tna ku wana ro tiwya mkair to, Allah yno bo ro moof baro kʼana ye.
Fyi rau re anu fnya ro kro
nhar raa ro anu nsya to, kbe ykai riof ro mase ye fe mfe a? Tna ro sme to, fyi rau re anu nhar fai ro noo to, kbe mkai riof ro mase ye fe mfe a? Menohe Allah yawe anu, raa ro kro
to siko nhau nsya raa tna niranya sai. Feto to mfi bo fai ro kro
fee sau mako maa ro kro
tna mawe sikba ait to anu nbe au to ma. Tna mfi bo raa ro kro
fee sait yako yfain ro kro
to yawe sikba fai au to anu nbe ait to ma.
Fyi rau re anu fnya ro kro
nhar raa ro anu nsya to, kbe ykai riof ro mase ye fe mfe a? Tna ro sme to, fyi rau re anu nhar fai ro noo to, kbe mkai riof ro mase ye fe mfe a? Menohe Allah yawe anu, raa ro kro
to siko nhau nsya raa tna niranya sai. Feto to mfi bo fai ro kro
fee sau mako maa ro kro
tna mawe sikba ait to anu nbe au to ma. Tna mfi bo raa ro kro
fee sait yako yfain ro kro
to yawe sikba fai au to anu nbe ait to ma.
Tiwya
saim tna yno re anu raa fo aro bno bombra wanu to aro rau-rau. ⌞Raa taro mamo bobot tna
yno re raa taro mamo awe. Tna
yno re raa taro mhau semana bana tna taro to yawe moo fnya.⌟ Tna mfo refo Allah ymen anu nmo raa ro kro
oh. Tna jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Anu aro yhau yno bombra rait mnan si bo bawya ro tiwya Allah ysan kʼait yno. Ybo yno renti.” Bo refo ja jõ tkyas mam
aro-aro beta.
Soh anu aro raa ro Yahudi tna tiwya raa
anu oh to, tna fo Allah ymen anu nmo kro
to; mbau a, anu netsu ranu mhau feto oh. Tna soh anu aro to, raa
fefares to, tna fo Allah ymen ait yamo kro
to, anu saso raa
ait to ma.
Raa mana taro to, bo mafa rana to ja raa
ku sme wana. Tna raa mana taro to ja
ku sme rana to fee. Bo mafa raa mana taro ja mno feto to bo ro ati fee. Rau ro ati to anu nri bo ro Allah ybis kʼanu tna nbo nno.
Rau ro moof to, anu aro nhau nkah bo wanu mnan mfi bo bawya ro tiwya tinyi rau anu nno wia wore wo Allah ymen anu nma kro
Anu taro to, ati ro anu nma kro
to, nmo sryan boh wia oh. Sraujin bo reto ma. Nhau nno bo ro bobot wanu mbis to renti. Menohe mfi bobot yawe bitsre anu sait yawe, “Frok namo nno bonyõ sai.” Feto moof toni, nyõ snok oh!
Tna jõ tawe kʼanu ro ja nmo sryan ro bobot fares to tawe, “Simaut oh! Nnaut nwe ati ro
ymen anu nmo kro Ait to,
yno tibyo anu nmo sryan ro ja kabes mbo to u fee!” Tna jõ tawe kʼanu raa ro bobot tawe, “Anu nmo kro
to, anu nmo sryan rAit!”
Allah fi bain anu mhai oh. Ait bain anu mkah mabyoh ro msai oh. Mfo refo Allah ybo anu. Feto to nri Ait abyõ raa ro tabam refo.
Tao, tano na; tiwya tinye wore wo Ait ytu anu nmo kro
fefares to, anu aro sait-sait ykah bo hayah-hayah ye. Tna mfo refo anu kro
. Rau ro moof to, bo ro tiwya anu nkah to, nhau nkah renti sai.
Tna fo jõ tkyas raa sme msya fnya ro msya anya fefares to baro kʼanu: Bo ro anu ntu reto to, jõ tari bokyas mbam
fefares. Bo ro jõ tkyas fo mbam kʼjõ sai.
yatmof jõ yno re jõ thar bo. Feto to nri bonaut ajõ fo:)
Mfo refo to wer ro mkair toni mam
ranu. Feto to jõ tkyas watum refo tawe, “Nhau nfi ja anu nhau to fares:
Anu ro nmen fnya oh to, nhau nsya fnya wanu fares. Hawe fnya wanu ma. Tna nbis au frok mamo mhau hayah to ma. Tna anu ro nmen fnya fefares to, saso fnya noo fooh to ma.”

Ana ro msya anya oh to ja masom bo ro samyoh mam tabam refo. Tna jõ hawe bo anu nsom bo ro samyoh. Au oh mi jõ tkyas watum ro riwai reto kʼanu. Raa ro mmen fnya oh to, bo ro ana mno reto to, mkair fee. Tna fnya ro msya raa oh to, bo ro ana mno reto mkair ye fee ye.
Tao, tano na; ayõ aro u fee oh. Mfo refo anu ro tiwya noo fnya oh to, tawe anu to nhau nnan mfi bo anu noo fnya fefares.

Tna anu ro sraujin tna nwia to, nnaut nwe, “Ayõ aro u fee re kbe jõ hre tawia sai.” Tna anu ro simaut to, nnaut nwe, “Ayõ aro u fee re jõ hre tasah sai.” Tna anu ro nse bo mawat to, nnaut nwe, “Bo wojõ wefo to, kbe mhau kʼjõ kait fee.”
Tna anu ro nkah bo to, nnaut bo ro anu ja nno mam tabam refo toni to ma. Nno be kbe bo ro tabam refo mbo anu matak. Bo ro anu bmat mam tabam refo fo kbe msat marak beta.
Jõ hawe anu sui toni nno bo ro tabam refo. Raa ro ymen fnya fefares to, kbe ait ynaut bo ro
sai. Yhau rero yno bo ro Allah ksoh.
Menohe raa ro yoo fnya to, srau rait ynaut bo ro tabam, yhau yno bo ro yfain ksoh.
Kbe ait srau ewok. Mnan feto ye, fnya ro msya raa fefares to rero mno bo ro
ksoh sai: Au mhau rero ti wawa mnaut
tna mno bo ro
ksoh. Ro msya raa oh, ja sui mno bo ro maa ksoh.
Jõ tkom bo ro riwai reto tawe tifah anu fee. Tkom afo re anu nhau noof, tna nhafri
to kaket, srau ewok fee.
Tna mfi bo raa sait ykir fnya sau, tna ait yhau yut mkah bo yaus fee, ro moof to, ait yoo au. Ait yoo au to iro meto fee.
Tna mfi bo raa sait kaket ait tna ksoh yhau bait semana sai, bonaut rait reto to moof ye. Ait yoo fnya reto ma.
Feto ait sait ro yoo fnya to yno bo moof. Tna raa ro yoo fnya fee; ait yno bo moof toni.
Tna jõ tawe kʼfnya ro msya raa oh to tawe, “Nhau nrat nsya raa wanu oh.” Tna soh meen maa yhai to, au mhau mrero me msya raa rouu ro ja kro
ye; reto to au ksoh rau sai. Au me msya raa ro kro
fee to ma.
Menohe tkyas watum refo kʼfai ro maa yhai oh to, tawe, “Soh anu ne nsya raa rouu fee; kbe anu nhau moof sai banu.” Tna tnaut tawe watum ro jõ tkom kʼanu refo to mbam Har ro Allah.
Tna fyio jõ tkyas kak ro ja raa moo msan

wia. Tkyas bo reto baro kʼanu: Anu beta to raa ro nhar bo oh. Tna jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: “Kaket anu; re kbe bo ro anu nhar reto mno re anu safuk anu ai to ma.” Raa taro to safuk ana ai mawe ana mhar bo toni. Bohar ro ja ana safuk reto to, ja tubat raa taro to fee. Nnaut nwe: Anu natmof raa anya to bo ro ati. Iso reto oh mi anu tubat raa anya to.
Mfi bo raa sait tait safuk tna ynaut yawe, “Jõ fi thar bo.” Ait retait yhar bo ro ati fefares.
Raa ro ja hafri Allah to, ana weto oh mi raa ro Allah yhar.
Kbe anu, raa ro kro
nbo kak ro raa riwai moo msan
wia to fe mfe a?
ro raa mfen to, anu bhar bwe
weto to Allah meto fee. Allah yesait aran yum. Allah roto aro magin fee.
Raa taro smot bombra aro rau-rau ro mhau mam tabam refo tna mam ayoh ye. Bombra ro ja raa smot msya kabes aro ro mbo raa to msis. Tna raa taro mari kabes weto mnan fi
rana.
Menohe anu bhar bwe Bja ranu Allah tait yesait aran yase tna yatak yum. Tiwya Ait yfen bombra beta. Tna anu bhau mam tabam refo mkah bo bbaut Ait. Tna anu bhar bwe Yesus
yesait aran tait
ro ybo anu. Yesus yesait yfen bombra beta mkah Allah yatak rAit. Tna Yesus yatak rAit reto oh mi mno re anu bhau baam mam tabam refo fo.
Menohe bo reto to, raa taro to wase fares. Tiwya ana weto mamo kro
fefares to, ana smot
weto ye. Tna ana weto mnaut mawe kak ro raa moo msan
to mbau. Ana mnaut feto fares. Tna mfi bo ana weto mnaut mamo-me fares menohe mberoh mabo kak reto to, ana mnaut mawe ana mno iro meto.

Boit aro ja misoh iranya ranu bsya Allah to fee. Tna boit aro ja mno re iranya ranu bsya Allah to mkair fee ye. Tna mfi bo anu bhau biit boit aro to, bo ro bno feto to misoh iranya ranu bsya Allah to fee ye.
Anu fo boo bo bawya-bawa biit sai saah. Menohe raa taro to, ana mnaut mamo-me fares. Feto to kaket anu afo re bo ro anu ksoh bno to mno re raa taro mbtek mam iro fee. Bo reto to, bo ro ati.
Anu weto, taro smot Yesus kaket matak oh. Tna taro nhaf smot Ait matak fefares. Mfi bo anu taro ro nhar bo to nmo twok mam samu ro
sau tna hre niit bo to, tna raa sait yamo twok to, kbe fyi? Mfi bo ait ro yama retait ynaut mamo-me fares tna ymat bo ro anu nno to, kbe ait yait boit reto ye.
Kaket anu! Soh raa ro yhaf rait smot Yesus matak fefares ymat he nyõ nait bo reto to, bo ro nyõ nhar tna nno reto kbe tko ait retait tibyo ait ynaut yawe yno iro. Nno be anu sait yisti meto.
Ait tiwya yajat afo re ana weto mkai riof ye.
Anu ja biit bo bawya-bawa sai saah. Tna raa taro mamo kro

oh menohe ana mnaut boit ro mait mamo me fares. Mfi bo anu sait to beroh yait bo bawya sai wore raa ro ynaut mamo-me fares to hre ye, fyi? Nyõ ntko ait re yno bo ro ait ynaut yawe mkair to, nyõ nesait nno iro meto. Nyõ nno iro mai kʼait retait. Tna nyõ nno iro mai
ye oh meto.
Feto to jõ hawe bo tko raa ro kro
yabo kak ro ait ynaut yawe mbau to. Nno be jõ tisti re ait yno iro. Mfi bo tafoh ajõ sait waa yabo kak ro raa msan
wia to, kbe jõ tabo kak u fee saut.
Raa taro msi mawe jõ kro tno bo mafa rana. Menohe bo mafa wana weto mbo jõ matak fee. Jõ fi raa ro ana mbis fee. Jõ fi raabis
ro
rAit. Tiwya jõ tmat Yesus to mkah tasu ajõ. Tna ati ro jõ tama tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼanu mnan fi
ybis to anu haberek tna nmo kro
Feto to anu nhar nwe jõ fi raabis ro
tu oh. Menohe raa taro mkyas mawe jõ fi raabis ro
fee.
Raa taro msi mawe jõ kro tno bo mafa rana. Menohe bo mafa wana weto mbo jõ matak fee. Jõ fi raa ro ana mbis fee. Jõ fi raabis
ro
rAit. Tiwya jõ tmat Yesus to mkah tasu ajõ. Tna ati ro jõ tama tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼanu mnan fi
ybis to anu haberek tna nmo kro
Feto to anu nhar nwe jõ fi raabis ro
tu oh. Menohe raa taro mkyas mawe jõ fi raabis ro
fee.
Raa taro hafrah jõ. Feto to jõ tkyas bokyas refo tawe saak wa jõ:
Jõ tsya Barnabas, amu mbewok fo raabis ro
Feto to rau ro moof to, anu noo boit nee kʼamu niit sai.
Tna raabis ro
roto taro ksoh mmen fnya to, tna wore wo ana mamo to, au nkro su msya ana ye saah. Raabis taro to mno feto. Tna Yesus yao na ro tis taro ja mno mfi feto ye. Tna Kefas-Petrus tait yno mfi feto ye.

Raabis taro to ja ana mkah armato wana u fee. Ana msui mkyas watum. Tna raa mawe moof meto. Menohe jõ tsya Barnabas to, ja anu nisoh nmat amu kaket fee. Tibyo amu mbewok nesait saso boit wamu ro niit to kar sai.
Ja raa sbe ro mamo mafa msya raa mana roto taro to, aban mana ro ybis ana mamo to, kbe ait yoo boren yaren ana fea! Tna mfi bo raa sait yyum
mara mam armato rait to, meen
mara reto make to, kbe bi ait yait
make reto taro fea! Tna raa ro ja yhau kmot
to, ait ksoh rait yoo sis maya ro
weto yata sai!
Bo mafa weto to, ja raa mno. Tna Watum ro mbam Allah mkyas mnan anya msya bo mafa weto ye.
Watum ro tiwya Musa yoo ybam Allah reto to, mawe rau ro moof to, raa yisoh ymat
wait ro mkah bo msya ait to ye:
“Ati ro
mkah bo su msya anu mam armato ranu kri-kri to, anu nke
reto masoh to ma. Feto to anu mbitsre
reto mabat
baro sai.”
Ulangan 25:4
Allah ykyas
mam Watum rAit mkah bawya? Watum rAit to Ait yoo yee mkah yisoh anu raa fea!
Allah ykyas bo ro
reto yawe,
mnan anu raa fyi?” Ja soh raa mkah bo mam armato to, ana minaut mawe meen ana moo make rau tna mait: Ait ro yabah tabam reto ye, ait ro tusnok pasa mbam
rau ye, tna
ro mkah bo su msya raa mam armato reto ye, beta minaut mawe meen ana moo make baro tna mait. Watum riwai reto mkyas anu, raabis wAit ye.

Ati ro Barnabas ysya jõ nkyas watum kʼanu to, mnan fi bo amu nso naf. Tna anu fo mnan fi armato. Ja soh raa ykah bo mam tabam refo to, ait yinaut yawe meen ait yoo bo ro ait ynaut re yhau mam tabam refo ye. Ynaut boit ro yait, ratan ro yyum, msya samu ro yjin bo to. Bo ro Barnabas ysya jõ nkah to armato ro Allah. Rau ro moof to, anu beta noo bo ro amu mbewok nnaut mam tabam refo to, nsaim kʼamu riryõn.
Raa roto mama mkyas
yasom kʼanu tna ja anu nmat ana tna noo boit ro mait nee kʼana ye. Rau ro moof to, anu nmat amu mbewok mnan ana ye. Menohe ja amu mbewok nyoh boit ro niit mbam kʼanu beta fee.
yawe amu mbewok nyoh feto, menohe amu hawe. Amu nnaut nwe, “Mfi bo amu mbewok nyoh boit ro niit to, kbe anu hawe nri bokyas ro amu nkyas.” Feto to tiwya amu mbewok nma nkyas Bokyas ro
kʼanu to, amu nyoh bo aro kʼanu fee. Boit ro amu niit to mnan fee. Menohe amu kanyin sai. Amu mbewok nnaut nwe, “Nno be ana hawe bo mari bokyas ro amu nkyas.”
Nnaut nwe: Ati raa ro
Yahudi mawe msan bo kʼAllah to, ana moo bo sohmaam makah mamoʼt samu ro Allah msan bo reto. Tna Allah ybis
moo bo reto baro kʼana mkah bo kbe ana mesait sohmaam ye. Tna ati ro raa Yahudi moo
msya,
bo to mawe msan kʼAllah to, ja
ktan tna yoo haber jaro yse mam wohat ro Allah rAit
tna yoo jaro kʼait yesait yabo. Yno bo reto mnan fi bi Ait ybis oh.
Feto ye Allah ybis yawe raa ro mkyas Bokyas ro Yesus to, kbe ana moo bo ro mait mbam raa ro mari bokyas rana reto.

Allah yawe amu, raa ro ja nkyas bokyas rAit to, noo bo ro niit mbam raa ro mari bokyas ramu. Menohe jõ hawe tno bo reto. Tna jõ tkom aam refo tayoh bo kʼanu fee. Feto jõ thai sai rof. Jõ safuk tawe, “Allah ybis raa mawsse ana moo bo mee kʼjõ, menohe jõ tawe, ‘Mbau a, jõ hawe bo raa moo bo mee kʼjõ.’”
Allah ysi bo kʼjõ yawe jõ tamo tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus reto. Tibyo jõ tari tna tno sai. Feto jõ tyok-yok jõ fee. Soh jõ tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus reto to fee, kbe ayoh mroh kʼjõ!
Mfi bo jõ ksoh ajõ tamo tkyas Bokyas reto maami raa moo bo maren jõ saah. He mfe! Jõ tfi sryan ro Allah ybis sai tibyo tamo tkyas Bokyas reto kʼraa. Ja raa moo boren maren sryan wana to fee.
Riwai jõ betoo tawe Allah ybis yawe raa moo bo mee kʼjõ soh jõ ksoh. Menohe jõ hawe bo raa maren jõ.
Feto to raa moo boit msya pitis bo to maren jõ fee. Menohe tkyas Bokyas ro
kʼraa tna raa moo pitis mee kʼjõ aro fee. Tna jõ thaf mnan meto. Jõ tayoh boren aro fee.

Raa aro moo pitis maren jõ fee. Tna raa mfot jõ mbis jõ tamo sryan rana to fee. Jõ ksoh raa mawat mari tna mbo bokyas ajõ reto, tibyo tamo tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa to. bo mafa raa make jõ matak fee. Menohe jõ thaf reo kro bo mafa ranu weto afo re anu nri tna nbo bokyas ajõ reto. Jõ ksoh ajõ sai tamo tnan sryan raa beta.

Jõ tamo tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa mam wore woyõ-woya to, bo mafa rana to hayah-hayah. Ati ro jõ tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa mana ro Yahudi to jõ tno bo mnan fi raa ro Yahudi ja mno to ye. Tno feto afo re kbe ana weto ksoh mari bokyas ajõ mhaf reo. Mari tibyo ana mawat mawe ana smot tna kro Yesus. Tna ati ro jõ tkyas kʼraa ro ja matak mari Watum ro Musa yoo mbam Allah to, jõ tari kro Watum reto ye. Tno feto afo re kbe ana weto mari bokyas ajõ tibyo ana mawat mawe smot tna kro Yesus ye. (Menohe ati ro jõ tesait thau kar to, trero tari Watum ro Musa reto fee.)
Tna ati ro jõ tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro wase Watum ro Musa reto to, jõ tnan ana weto ye. (Menohe jõ tari tna tno bo ro Allah ysya
mbis kʼjõ matak to fares.) Tno feto re kbe raa msis ksoh mari bokyas ajõ tibyo smot tna kro Yesus ye.

Tna ati ro jõ tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa ro mhaf wana mamo-me fares to, jõ kaket jõ afo re jõ tno bo ro ja ana mhar mno mkah mhaf ro moof sai. Tno feto afo re kbe ana mari bokyas ajõ tibyo smot tna kro Yesus ye. Jõ tamo tkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa mam wore woyõ-woya to, ja jõ kro bo mafa wana ye. Tno feto afo re ana taro mari bokyas ajõ tibyo smot tna kro Yesus ye.
Jõ tawe tno bo reto beta afo re raa mari Bokyas ro
Tno feto tna anu beta bkai bo ro moof mbam Bokyas reto.
Mfi bo raa baro santri anya mhoh to, ana beta mhoh mamoʼt makit rau to. Menohe sait aran ro snok wia tinyi to, kbe yoo bouum ro raa siwyan muum kʼait. Tna tawe kʼanu tawe, “Anu nmo nhoh iso ro
rAit to, nhoh kaket oh! Re kbe anu nkai bouum ro
siwyan yum kʼanu feto ye.”
Anu nhau nno bo ro

ybis kʼanu to siko nno kaket. Sanet anu nesait nfi raa ro santri anya yhoh ja sanet yetsu rait yesait: Rabu wawa ait yhoh tna yait boit ro moof yawe yno ait yetsu rait mrok matak. Ait yno bo feto tna yinaut yawe yoo bouum ro kbe raa moo mee kʼait. Bouum reto to mhau kait fee.
Menohe bouum ro anu, raa ro kro
kbe boo to, meen mhau mawyõs.
Feto to jõ thoh-hah fee. Jõ hamer thoh tamo iso ro
rAit to kaket. Tna raa ro
ja yhar yai raa kaket, yai sre fee. Feto ye jõ thau tno bo ro
ybis jõ to tomer tno kaket ye.
Jõ kaket jõ tna thoh thoh thai afo re jõ tetsu ajõ matak. Jõ fi ja tkyas kʼraa roto tna terif iso ro
kʼana. Nno be jõ tesait tamo sre-sre tibyo meen
yoo boren yaren jõ fee!
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; sorni bo ro hohos wanu tiwya mno to ma: Raa mana ro Yahudi weto beta tiwya frok mbam tabam ro Mesir. Ana frok mbam Mesir to,
ro ybo Mesir to saka ana. Menohe Allah yno iso re ana frit aya sawan ro masom
tna mkai riof. Tna Allah yhau mam barmabyõ sau ro sbyah ana wa.
Tiwya hohos wanu weto beta kro Musa tibyo raa mawe barmabyõ reto msya aya sawan reto
ana.
Tna Allah yno bo ro msai: Ait yoo boit yee kʼana mait mam iso. Tna ana beta mait boit reto ro masom
Tna Allah yno bo msai re aya snok mbam fraa sau. Tna ana beta mata aya reto. Fraa reto fret bo mawe
Tiwya Ait yatam ana yamo.
Raa magin reto to, beta mmat bo ro hnah weto ro Allah yno. Menohe ana beta mno Allah yhaf rAit to mnan fee. Tibyo ana mawat mhai akus mam yuk ro riamo reto.
Tna bokyas reto raa mkom afo re anu bmat tna bhar tna bisoh anu kaket. Nno be anu bno bo ro mnan fi hohos wanu weto tii mno to ma. Ana weto masmamo tna saso bo ro mkair-kar.
Tna ana taro mbaut
Kaket anu re anu aro nbaut
nnan ana ma! Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Raa ro Israel sohmaam bo tna ana smar simaut tna mbaut
ro ana mfen.”
Keluaran 32:6
Nus-as bo nnan fi ana taro to ma. Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Raa ro Israel mabo 23.000 mno bo ro feto tibyo mhai mam ayõ sau.”
Bilangan 25:1-18
Sanet
ranu ma, mnan fi ana taro tiwya mno. Ana taro sanet
tibyo Ait ybis aban mafit ana weto majat.
Kmo Allah tna nmai wer mnan fi ana taro to ma. Tiwya ana weto baro mno mai mawe, “Anu bhau mam yuk ro riamo mam befo to, tna boit ro moof aro fee!” Tibyo
sau mama mame ana weto majat.
Bo weto mbtek mai kʼana afo re anu bmat tna bisoh anu kaket. Anu bmat bokom ro Allah reto tna bnaut kaket re kbe anu bno bo mnan fi ana tiwya mno to ma. Anu mfo bhau mam ti sboh rau oh mefo.
Raa ro yawe, “Jõ fi smot Yesus matak. Jõ ja tno iro fee saut!” Rau ro moof to, ait retait yisoh ait yno kaket re kbe ait ytek mam iro to ma.

Ati ro bo aro mama sanet anu re anu kene wo mbtek nno iro to, nnaut oh: Bo weto mama sanet raa beta. Allah kbe yerif iso kʼanu frok nmo re kbe anu nno iro fee. Tna Ait yhar anu ntak wanu to mamo snok woyõ. Ait yno wa re bo weto tko anu toni to ma. Bo ro Allah yawe yno to, kbe ybo yno tu oh.
Feto to noo
msya bombra ro tabam refo tiwya anu smot to, mbeak fari.
Anu to nnan raa ro srau manes oh. Anu nesait nnaut nwe bo ro jõ tkyas refo mabo fe mfe a:
Anu, raa ro kro
ja bkyõ Korat ro Biit
Su. Tna anu byoh asik mase kʼAllah tna bta
maya baro.
Anu bta
maya reto to, tna bhaf sau, srau sau bnaut Yesus mees rAit, ati ro raa mame yajat. Tna
ro anu biit reto to, fret bo mawe Yesus tait kwiyan rAit oh meto. Anu sohmaam korat reto to, anu bhaf sau su bnaut Yesus ati ro raa mame yajat.
reto to, sau aran tna anu sait-sait beta biit
reto su. Anu bhaf sau, srau sau, bonaut sau feto to, anu beta to betsu ranu sau aran.
Nnaut raa mana ro Israel: Ana moo
, msya boit bo to, makah msan kʼAllah mam wohat

ro mhau mam Samu ro Allah. Ana moo bo weto msan kʼAllah mnan si iso ro bi Ait ybis oh. Tna Allah yawe ana weto moo bo reto baro kʼana mesait mabo ye. Ana mhaf sau su msya anya tna msya Allah to, mbaut bi Ait meto.
Tna jõ tkyas kak msya bombra ja raa moo msan
: Raa taro smot
sor mnan fi
wana. Menohe
weto to ara,
fraa bo to sai. Tna bosan ro raa msan weto to kak msya bo ro sei sai, bo ro mbau fee.

Bo weto to, ana msan kʼAllah fee. Ana weto wase Allah. Bo ro ana msan weto to, ana msan kabes sor. Ana miranya msya kabes aro rau-rau oh meto. Tna jõ hawe anu aro niranya nsya kabes. Feto to, jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Anu nsya ana hre su tna nbo kak ro ana msan kabes to ma! Mfi bo anu nno bo feto to, anu niranya nsya kabes ye meto.”
Anu nkyõ Korat ro Niit
Su to mkah bo niranya nsya Allah. Anu ja nta
maya tna niit
mkah bo nnaut
Nkyõ korat ro kabes tna niranya nsya kabes ye to ma!
Kbe
yawe, “Anu kro Jõ oh! Anu kro jõ tna kabes mnan anya to fee saut ye!” Bo msai meto!
tait yatak yiwer, kbe Ait kmo anu!
Raa ro kro

taro to ksoh mno-na bo fares. Tna ana mkyas mawe, “Soh watum aro mawe wa bo ro tno reto fee; kbe tno bo bawya sai ro jõ ksoh!” Menohe jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Bombra taro merif mafer aro fee, tna bombra taro tubat raa anya to fee.”
Saso bo ro moof mkah netsu wanu nesait sai to ma. Rau ro moof to, anu nno bo ro moof mkah raa anya beta.
Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Tabam refo msya bombra beta to bo ro
wAit.”
Mazmur 24:1
Feto to, ati ro anu nmoʼt
nwe noo kak to, ntu bo kʼraa ro masim kak wia to ma. Nwe, “Kak refo riwai raa msan
to fe mfe a?” to ma. Noo kak bawya ro anu nksoh noo sai. Noo mkah nhaf ro moof sai.
Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Tabam refo msya bombra beta to bo ro
wAit.”
Mazmur 24:1
Feto to, ati ro anu nmoʼt
nwe noo kak to, ntu bo kʼraa ro masim kak wia to ma. Nwe, “Kak refo riwai raa msan
to fe mfe a?” to ma. Noo kak bawya ro anu nksoh noo sai. Noo mkah nhaf ro moof sai.
Mfi bo raa sait ro kro
fee to ymen anu yawe, “Nma biit boit su mam amah ajõ.” Nmo oh tna niit mkah nhaf ro moof. Niit bo bawya ro ait saruk yse kʼanu niit. Ntu nwe “Boit refo riwai raa msan
to fe mfe a?” to ma.
Menohe mfi bo anu hre su niit boit tna raa sait yawe kʼanu yawe, “Boit refo riwai raa msan
wia oh.” Yawe feto anu nhar nwe raa retait yhaf rait yawe wa. Feto niit boit reto ma.
Jõ tkyas bo ro ait retait ynaut yawe sai. Anu nesait nhar nwe bo ro mbau aro fee. Menohe Ait retait ynaut yawe boit reto to mbau. Feto to anu nmat ait. Niit boit reto ma!
Raa taro hawe bo mmat raa anya tna mawe, “Ja jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah ro yoo boit yee kʼjõ tait. Boit aro mbau kʼjõ fee. Fyi re raa mkyas jõ, mawe jõ tno bo ro mkair?” Nno feto ma!
Bo ro anu niit tna aya ro nta tna bo beta ro ja anu nno to, nno kaket re kbe raa mbibi Allah.

Mfi bo anu hre su nsya raa ro Yahudi to, kaket anu re kbe anu nisti ana mno iro to ma. Tna mfi bo anu hre su nsya raa ro Yunani to, kaket anu re kbe anu nisti ana mno iro to ma. Tna mfi bo anu hre nsya raa anya ro kro
to, kaket anu re kbe anu nisti ana mno iro to ma.
Ja jõ tno feto ye. Bo bawya ro jõ tno to jõ hamer tno bo ro moof mkah raa beta. Jõ saso bo ro moof kʼjõ tesait sai fee. Tno feto re kbe ana fri riof ro mase ye.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Anu boti iso ajõ, mnan fi jõ boti iso ro
Anu rabu wawa ja nnaut jõ yoyo. Tna watum ro yum bau oh, ro tiwya jõ tkyas kʼanu to ja anu nri. Anu nno moof meto.
Tna jõ tkyas bo sau kʼanu naut: Nnaut oh: Allah tait yase abyõ
Tna
tait yase abyõ kʼanu raa sme aro sait-sait. Tna raa sme sait-sait tait yase abyõ kʼyfain.
tait yase abyõ raa sme. Feto to mfi bo raa sme sait skabuk soh mfe ykyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah kri-kri to, tna ait sbyõ watau rait fares to, ait retait yiwana
meto.

Tna raa sme sait-sait tait yase abyõ kʼyfain. Feto to mfi bo fai sau mawe skabuk soh mfe mkyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah to ja au moo hawee mai mana wa to. Soh au moo bo sbyõ mana wa to fee, au miwana maa ro yase kʼau meto. Fai reto to, mti saban mnan fnya ro mmur mana mawyan.

Mfi bo fnya hawe moo bo sbyõ mana wa to fee, fai reto mamo ktan mana mawyan mabuf sai rof. Fnya ro ktan mana mawyan mabuf soh mfe mmur mana to, fai reto mno bo ro mkair tna mno au hrenaut ai ye. Ro moof to fnya ja sbyõ bo.

Taja nsya tao wojõ na; Allah yfen anu ynan fi Ait yesait. Anu ro sme merif bo yase ro Allah rAit. Raa mmat anu tna bibi Allah. Feto to ati ro anu skabuk soh mfe ati ro anu nkyas bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah to, sbi bo mam nna wanu to ma. Reto to bo ro kmun fee. Menohe fnya sbyõ bo mana wana wa to, ana merif maa yase rait oh meto.
Tiwya Allah yfen raa sme mbam kʼfnya to fee. Yfen fnya mbam kʼraa sme.
Raa sme to Allah yfen mkah bo mban fnya to fee. Fnya saah Allah yfen mkah bo mban raa sme.
Reto oh mi fnya ja moo hawee mai mana: Re raa mmat au to mhar mawe maa tait yase ybo au. Tna
ro mmat bo ro fai au mno to, mmat mawe bo reto au mno moof ye.
tait yase abyõ kʼanu. Feto to fnya wanu mesait mros kar fee. Tna raa sme nesait nros kar fee ye.
Tii tinyi to Allah yfen fnya mbam kʼraa sme. Tna mfo refo raa sme snok mbam fnya ro mabe ana. Tna bombra beta mama mbam kʼAllah.
Nesait nnaut banu sai nwe, “Ati ro fnya skabuk Allah to, mfi bo au moo bo sbyõ wa mana rau to fee, reto to bo ro kmun fe mfe a?”
Mfi bo raa mmat raa sme sait betau yana mawyan miyõ to, ja mnaut mawe reto to, bo ro kmun fee ye.
Fnya to, mana rana miyõ to mfi bosnyam rana. Allah yno mana mawyan wana to burut wa mana wana. Feto to bo mafa ro ja amu nno to oh mefo: Fnya wamu to ja betau mana rana miyõ.
Soh anu aro santri watum riwai reto, jõ tawe, “Amu nsya
ro Allah taro to, ja amu nno bo mafa sau aran reto.”
Tna jõ tkyas bo ro mtan to, jõ bibi anu meto fee: Anu siret su to, mafer rau to mkair. Tibyo jõ bhah anu.
Ro sau to, jõ tari he anu siret su to, anu baro nhau hayah-hayah tna nmak anya ye. Bo ro raa mkyas weto to, jõ thar tawe baro mabo.
Fyi,
yhaf rAit mhau kʼanu ro ati ryo?
Ati ro anu hre su nkyõ Korat ro Niit
reto to, anu ja nhaf sau su nnaut Yesus mees rAit fee!
Anu aro sait-sait safto sohmaam bo mase. Tibyo boit mkak tna raa taro to mhau muut mhai sre. Tna taro to, mata
maya toni tibyo bisir.
Bo ro ja anu nno feto to mkair! Mfi bo anu nno feto kbe raa sret
ro Allah. Tna anu niwana raa kinyah wanu meto tna nno re ana hrenaut. Ro moof to mi ati ro anu nma to, anu sait-sait sohmaam bo wia mam amah wanu.
Bo ro
tiwya yawe kʼjõ to, jõ te tkyas kʼanu u. Mti ro Yudas besruf Yesus reto to,
Yesus yoo
sau.
Yoo tna skabuk yayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Tna Ait haber
reto yee kʼana beta mait. Tna yawe, “Nmat
refo. Tetsu aJõ ro tsan mkah anu oh mefo. Niit oh. Tna kbe nno fefo u re nnaut Jõ.”
Ana sohmaam bo mkak tna Ait yoo hawereh tna yno mnan feto u yawe,
maya refo to, mees aJõ mefo. Kbe Jõ raa mame tna Allah ysair bosi ro tna kʼanu oh meto. Anu nta bo refo renti to, nnaut Jõ.”
Feto oh mi anu ja nkyõ Korat ro Niit
. Ati ro anu niit
reto tna nta
maya reto to, anu beta nkyas u nwe
raa mame yajat' oh meto. Nno korat refo mfi bo mafa ro ja anu nno to, nno u mamo snok ati ro meen
hah ye yama u.
Reto oh mi awya ro yakyõ Korat reto to, tna yait kbik-kbak sai, yno iro meto. Ait retait yiwana
yetsu rAit msya mees rAit oh meto.
Feto to ati ro anu nwe niit Korat reto to, nisoh nhaf wanu sait-sait to wia matim.
Awya ro ynaut
yetsu rAit wia fee, menohe yait Korat reto sai to, kbe
yoo kair mbtek mai kʼait.
Mabo oh! Reto oh mi raa
ranu taro mawat kiyam, ssafo fee, tna taro mhai oh to.
Soh anu bisoh anu bhaf mato wanu wia to, kbe
yoo kair mbtek mai kʼanu to fee.
Ja
yoo kair mbtek mai kʼanu, raa ro kro
to fyi? Yno afo re anu bmat sas bhaf mato wanu tna bisoh anu. Anu bisoh bhaf mato wanu wia to, meen tis rau to, ati ro Ait ymit safo mana kʼraa ro tabam refo to, kbe ymit safo mana kʼanu fee.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; anu nma nkyõ Korat ro Niit
reto tna sohmaam bo kbik-kbak sai to ma. Nma tna hre sne raa ro
beta mama wia, tna beta sohmaam korat reto su.

Mfi bo anu aro nhai sre to, niit boit wia mam amah wanu. Niit boit wia tna nmo siret su re kbe anu aro nhai sre fee. Tibyo niit Korat reto tna nasmamo fee. Soh anu niit Korat reto mkah nhaf wanu ro moof to, meen
yoo safo mana ymit kʼanu fee.
Kbe meen jõ tama to kʼanu u to, kbe jõ terif bo roto taro kʼanu u.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tna fo jõ tkyas bouum
Har ro
moo muumto kʼanu. Jõ betoo bouum weto aro rau-rau afo re anu nhar kaket. Har ro
moo bouum wefo muumto kʼanu afo re anu tubat anya tna smot Allah kaket.
Nnaut tiwya tinyi weno to, wore anu wase Allah fares to, anu nbaut
sor
Bawya mno re anu nbaut
weto ro wase bo mkyas a? Tiwya raa besruf anu tibyo anu smot
weto.

Ati ro anu nri raa mkyas bo to, fyi re anu nhar nwe bokyas reto mbam kʼAllah fe mfe a? Tawe kʼanu tawe mfi bo anu nri raa sait ykyas Yesus yawe, “Kbe ayoh mroh kʼAit!” Anu nhar nwe Har ro Allah mjin kʼraa retait yhaf rait fee. Tna mfi bo anu nri raa sait yawe, “Yesus tait
ro yase.” Kbe anu nhar nwe Har ro Allah mjin kʼait yhaf rait.
Bouum to aro rau-rau, menohe weto beta to, Har rAit oh mi moo muumto kʼanu to.
Tna anu bno bo aro rau-rau re tubat raa
wanu. Menohe bo ro anu ja bno weto beta to, anu bno mkah
Yesus yasom rAit.
tait sait aran.
Tna Allah yno re anu tubat raa mhaf wana to, mkah iso aro rau-rau. Menohe Ait ro yno bo weto tait sait aran ye.
Tna Har rAit moo bouum aro rau-rau muumto kʼanu beta mkah bawya? Mno mkah anu, raa ro kro
to, kbe bisoh anya, teta anya tna bno raa makin rAit beta moof.
Tna bouum Har ro Allah moo muumto kʼanu raa ro kro
to, au oh mefo: Mno re raa taro mhar bo watum raa kaket. Tna Har reto moo bohar muumto kʼraa taro re ana mhar maja ro
kaket.
Tna Har reto mno re raa taro smot
kaket matak. Tna mno re raa taro to skabuk raa ro kiyam to re mrok moof.
Tna Har reto moo matak mee kʼraa taro to, afo re ana mno bo ro msai.
Tna moo matak mee kʼraa taro re ana mari mai ro mbam
tna mkyas bokyas rAit reto kʼraa mfi raa ro
Tna moo matak mee kʼraa taro re ana mhar har aro rau.
Ana weto mari raa mkyas bo tna mmat sas bokyas reto tna ana mhar mawe bokyas reto mabo mbam
fe kabes a. Tna Har ro
moo matak mee kʼraa taro re ana mkyas mkah
(Ana mkyas mai aro rau hayah-hayah ro ja ana mesait wase.) Tna moo matak mee kʼraa taro re ana mhar mai weto. Kbe ana me mkyas bokyas riwai reto kʼraa
ro hre mam weto to mkah mai rana. Tibyo raa ro
beta mari tna mhar ye
Har sau aran oh mi moo bouum
ro riwai jõ tkyas weto beta muum kʼraa. Har reto moo tak aro rau-rau tna saim kʼraa aro sait-sait mkah ksoh rAu mesait sai.
Raa yetsu rait to sau aran sai. Menohe yatem, yaa, msya yana bo to mrat yetsu rait reto. Yetsu rait haber to msis bia. Tna anu, raa ro
wAit to bsis bia ye. Menohe anu beta brat su bsya Ait tibyo bmo raa mana sau su. Au oh mi raa fret bo mawe anu fo bnan yetsu rAit.
Anu beta to bsis tna anu fo raa aro rau hayah-hayah ye: Anu taro to raa ro Yahudi tna taro to raa ro Yunani. Anu taro raa kinyah bmo sryan boh tna taro to sryan boh fee. Menohe Har sau aran
anu beta. Au oh mi Har ro moof mjin mam anu bhaf wanu beta oh to. Tna mno re anu beta smot
Tna Har reto oh mi Har ro mbam kʼAllah.
Raa yatem, yaa, yana bo to mrat yetsu rait reto. Raa yetsu rait to haber sau aran fee; haber msis.
Mfi bo jõ taa maban ajõ mkyas mawe, “Jõ fi Paulus yatem sau fee. Feto to jõ hawe bo trat tsya yetsu rait!” Kbe mabo a? Mfe. Mako hawe sai, jõ taa reto to, mhau mrat jõ tetsu ajõ fares.
Tna mfi bo jõ timara ajõ to mawe, “Jõ fi Paulus yasu rait fee. Feto to jõ hawe bo trat tsya yetsu rait!” Kbe mabo a? Mfe. Mako hawe sai jõ timara reto to, mhau mrat jõ tetsu ajõ fares.
Mfi bo jõ haber beta haberek mamo tasu to, kbe jõ tari bo fyi? Tna mfi bo jõ haber beta haberek mamo timara to, feto kbe jõ tasan bo ro sawer to fyi? He mfe.
Allah yfen betsu wanu to Ait yfen haber aro hayah-hayah yse kʼanu betsu. Yfen yse mam yuk ro betsu aro rau-rau mkah bonaut rAit sai.
Mfi bo anu betsu wanu haber msis fee, anu betsu ranu to fyi?
Anu raa fo haber msis menohe betsu sau aran sai.
Mfi bo jõ tasu ajõ to mkyas kʼtatem mawe, “Natem, nyõ to bo ro ati fee!” Tna mfi bo jõ tana to mawe kʼjõ taa ajõ to mawe, “Naa, nyõ to bo ati fee!” Reto to mkair meto!
Tna anu haber aro ro sne oh mi haber ro ati syok.
Ja anu hawe raa mmat betsu wanu haber taro to fee. Anu hrenaut. Haber wanu weto taro anu bwe moof fee. Feto to anu kaket haber wanu weto. Tna haber wanu weto anu byum ratan wa re raa mahni.
Menohe haber wanu ro moof weto, ja anu kaket haber weto fee; mhau rof raa mmat. Allah yesait yfen anu tna yse haber beta mhau su. Tna haber wanu ro ja anu nwe mkair to, Ait yawe haber ro ati oh meto.
Yno feto afo re haber wanu aro to twat hayah-hayah fee. Beta bisoh bmat anya kaket to moof.
Mfi bo raa haber sau mham to, kbe ait yetsu rait beta mkair. Mfi bo haber sau raa mbaut to, kbe ait yetsu rait beta simaut ye.
Raa magin ro kro
to, anu fo yetsu rAit. Tna anu beta to haber aro rau-rau ro brat bsya Ait.
Allah ysok yawe anu bfi haber ro
yetsu rait aro rau-rau. Tna fo jõ ntuu haber wAit weto taro:
1. Raabis wAit
ro Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit.
ro mbetoo bokyas ro Allah maja rau.
4. Raa ro mno bo ro msai.
5. Raa ro skabuk raa ro kiyam tibyo ana weto mrok moof.
6. Raa ro ja mbet raa anya.
7. Raa ro mamo aban mana.
8. Raa ro mkyas bo mkah
Menohe ja raa beta mamo raabis ro Allah fee. Tna raa beta mamo
wAit to fee. Beta mamo
ro ja mbetoo bokyas ro Allah maja rau to fee. Beta mno bo ro msai to fee.
Beta skabuk raa ro kiyam tibyo ana weto mrok moof to fee. Beta mkyas mkah
to fee. Tna raa beta
weto tna me mkyas bokyas riwai reto kʼraa
to fee ye.
Har ro
muumto bouum
weto kʼraa. Rau ro moof to, anu hamer fri bouum ro moof ati.
Tna fo jõ terif iso ro moof ati kʼanu:
Mfi bo jõ tkyas bo mkah mai aro rau hayah-hayah: Mai ro tabam refo beta ye tna mai ro ja
mkyas to ye. Mfi bo jõ thar mai weto beta menohe ja jõ tatmof raa anya to fee, kbe mafer marak sai.
Tno mnan feto to, jõ fi tnan ain ro raa mai kaket fee. Tna jõ tnan bo ro mawia mho menohe mafer rau marak.
Soh jõ wase bo tatmof raa anya menohe jõ thar tari mai ro mbam

tna tkyas bokyas rAit reto kʼraa to, kbe tno mkah bawya? Mafer rau to miyo? Mfi bo jõ wase tatmof raa anya menohe bonaut ajõ maah tibyo thar bo maja ro samyoh beta kaket to, kbe bo reto tis rau to, meen mafer aro fe mfe a? Tna mfi bo jõ smot bi Ait kaket matak to tna tbis atu sau mirenti mamo mros mam yuk roto to, tibyo atu reto mirenti mamo oh. Kbe mafer rau to miyo? Rau ro ati to jõ tatmof raa anya. Mfi bo jõ tno bo riwai weto beta, menohe tatmof raa anya to fee, kbe mafer marak.
Mfi bo jõ too bombra wojõ beta saim kʼraa ro mse bo aro fee to, mafer rau to miyo? Mfi bo raa ro ja ngknait raa magin ro kro
to, mfot jõ tna mko tajat rof, mafer rau to miyo? Mfi bo jõ tatmof raa anya fee to, kbe mafer marak.

Raa ro mhar bo matmof raa anya kaket to, ja ana mbi-ba to fee. Raa ro mhar bo matmof raa anya to, ja mhaf sneh. Raa ro matmof raa anya to, wase bo maam bo raa, tna ana wase safuk mawe ana uu kar, tna ana wase bo tawyõ ana mesait.
Tna raa ro mhar bo matmof raa anya to, ja mmat raa anya, tna ja mbat mkyas bo msya raa anya taro to fee, tna ja mbo kmo fooh mam matem to fee, tna ja wase botoh ye.
Mfi bo raa mhar bo matmof raa anya to, ati ro ana mmat bo mkair to, ana mrok sraujin. Tna ati ro ana mmat bo ro moof to, ana ksoh simaut.

Tna raa ro mhar bo matmof raa anya to, ja ana kmot raa anya re bo mbtek mai kʼraa weto fee. Tna raa ro mhar bo matmof raa to, ja mari bo ro Allah ysi kʼana to, tna mse kʼana mhaf. Tna ja ana beroh minaut mawe bo weto kbe meen mabo tu. Ana mnaut maut-mroh fee ye. Tna raa ro mhar bo matmof raa anya to, bo bawya sai ro mama mai kʼraa weto to ana beroh siko masom sai.
Kbe raa hafri
ysya raa anya yum. Menohe meen raa
u fee. Tna meen raa mkyas bo mkah
to u fee. Tna bohar ro raa mhar to, kbe saef ye.
Mfo refo anu bhar bo mnan si fee. Tna raa ro mkyas bokyas ro Allah to, bohar wana to mnan si fee ye.
Meen Allah yno bombra beta mrok moof mnan si. Tna bombra ro mnan si fee to, kbe saef beta.
Ti tinyi to jõ tkek fares, tna jõ tkyas tfi ku mkek ja mkyas fares tna tnaut bo mnan fi ja ku mkek mnaut bo to ye. Tna mfo refo jõ tabi oh tibyo tno bo mnan fi kumkek ja mno to u fee.

Mfo refo anu bhar bo kaket fefares. Mnan fi raa sait ymat yasu rait mam bowane ro mkair to, tibyo ymat yasu rait kaket fee. Menohe anu meen bhar bombra beta kaket. Mfo refo jõ thar bo mabut fares. Menohe meen jõ thar bo kaket mnan si. Mnan fi Allah ja yhar jõ mnan si to.
Tna jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Bo tuuf refo meen saef fee: Kbe raa smot
renti yoyo. Tna kbe raa minaut mawe bo moof ro meen mabo to yoyo. Tna kbe raa hafri
ysya raa anya yoyo mamo snok woyõ-woya sai ye. Bo tuuf refo to, meen mhau mawyõs. Tna raa matmof raa anya to, bo ro mase miwer bombra beta.”
Rau ro ati to, anu natmof raa anya kaket. Ja Har ro
moo bouum aro rau-rau muumto kʼraa ro kro
Siko nkai bouum weto! Bouum
ro mase toni to raa
Raa ro mkyas bo mkah
to mkyas bo kʼraa meto fee. Mkyas bo kʼAllah sai meto. Raa roto mhar mai ro ana mkyas reto fee. Mamos wana mkyas bo kʼAllah. Tna Ait yesait yhar bo ro ana mkyas reto.
Menohe awya ro yari mai ro mbam
tna ykyas bokyas rAit reto kʼraa
mkah mai rana to, ja bokyas rait reto raa mari tna mhar. Raa taro mari tibyo bokyas reto mno re ana smot
kaket. Taro mari tibyo misoh ana re kro
kaket. Tna taro mari tibyo sraujin u fee.
Ait sait ro ykyas mkah
to tubat ait yesait aran. Menohe ait ro
mkah mai ro raa mhar to tubat raa ro
beta oh meto re ana smot Allah kaket ye.
Rau ro moof to, anu beta nkyas mkah
Menohe soh anu beta nri mai ro mbam
tna
mkah mai ranu nesait to, reto merif mafer kʼraa msis. Feto to bo reto moof miwer. Ait ro
retait raa ro ati yiwer ait ro ykyas mkah
Menohe mfi raa aro mhar
to. Kbe Har ro
mno re ait yhar
weto re ytai ye ykyas
mkah mai rana. Tibyo raa
mari tna mhar bokyas ro mbam Har riwai raa mkyas reto ye. Feto to moof miwer.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; mfi bo jõ tama to kʼanu tna tkyas bo mkah
sai to, mafer aro kʼanu fee! Menohe

aro rau ro Har msan kʼjõ to, kbe merif mafer kʼanu: Mfi bo jõ tkyas soo ro mbam kʼAllah kʼanu mkah mai ranu to, kbe merif mafer kʼanu. Tna mfi bo jõ tkyas watum ro mbam kʼAllah mkah mai ranu to, bo reto kbe merif mafer kʼanu ye. Tna mfi bo jõ
to, kbe bo reto merif mafer kʼanu ye. Tna soh jõ tasyah anu mkah mai ranu to, mafer aro kʼanu ye.
Oor msya kerombi-
bo to, bo ro maam fee. Menohe bo weto mmai saah. Mfi bo raa sait yfi oor soh mfe yai kerombi-
kaket fee, kbe raa wase bobaut ro ait retait ysom reto fee. Kbe raa mamboi, tna msya ait mbaut bobaut reto su fee.
Tna mfi bo raa sait yfi saa kaket fee, kbe raa mnaut mawe, “Raa retait yfi-fa sai a?” Tibyo mama fee.
Feto ye ati ro anu nkyas mkah mai aro rau hayah-hayah to. Mfi bo raa wase mai ro anu nkyas to, kbe ana mari tna mhar fe mfe a? Mai ranu weto marak sai. Bokyas reto merif mafer aro kʼraa fee.
Mai ro tabam refo fo msis bia. Tna raa aro mhar mai rana-rana.

Menohe jõ thar mai weto beta fee. Ati ro raa srim mkyas to, jõ tari tna tnaut tawe mnan fi ana mmai-ma sai. Jõ tari saah menohe tamboi sai. Tna raa srim mhar mai ro jõ tkyas fee ye. Ati ro ana mari jõ tkyas to, mnan fi jõ tmai-ma sai. Ana mari saah menohe mamboi sai.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ thar tawe Har ro
msan bouum kʼanu oh tna anu ksoh toni. Rau ro ati to, anu sait-sait siko nkai bouum aro ro misoh raa ro
ranu.
Feto to awya ro ja ykyas bo mkah
to, rau ro moof to, ait skabuk ye. Skabuk yayoh kʼAllah re ybis Har ro Moof mno re ait yhar mai ro riwai ait ykyas reto. Tna re kbe ait ye ykyas bo reto
mkah mai rana
afo re ana mari tna mhar ye.
Mfi bo jõ skabuk mkah
to, kbe tamos ajõ fri mafer saah. Menohe jõ twase bo ro jõ skabuk to bawya meto.
Soh feto to jõ kbe tno fyi? Rau ro moof to, jõ tno ewok ye: Tamos ajõ skabuk mkah
ye tna jõ skabuk mkah mai ajõ ye afo re bonaut ajõ fri mafer ye. Tna jõ tamos ajõ tbaut bobaut mkah
ye. Tna jõ tbaut bobaut mkah mai ajõ ye afo re bonaut ajõ fri mafer ye.
Mfi bo nmos ranu mbibi Allah tna nyoh asik mase kʼAit mkah
to, kbe raa ro hre su skabuk msya anu to wase bo ro anu nkyas reto tna ana msya anu mbibi Allah fyi? Tna mfi bo ana wase bo nyõ nayoh asik mase meto fee. Fyi re kbe ana mawe, “
Nyõ nayoh asik mase kʼAllah mkah
to moof. Menohe bokyas anyõ reto misoh raa roto taro fee.
Jõ ksoh tkyas mkah
tna ja jõ tno bo reto mase miwer anu beta. Har ro Moof msan bouum reto kʼjõ tna jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah.
Menohe ati ro
siret skabuk su to, jõ hawe tkyas bo wer mkah
to. Mfi bo jõ tkyas bo mabuf sai kʼraa mkah mai ro ana mhar to mafer rau to moof miwer.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ hawe bo anu nhar bo mabuf mnan fi ja kumkek sai to ma. Rau ro moof to, anu nhar bo kaket mnan fi raa ro mabi. Menohe ku mees ja wase-wasa bo mno safo. Tna ro moof to, anu ye wase bo mno safo mfi ku mkek feto ye.
Watum ro Musa mkyas mawe:
“Meen Jõ tbis raa ro srim mamo mkyas bo kʼraa mana refo. Tna raa ro mmai hayah to, kbe mama mkyas bokyas aJõ kʼana ye. Menohe ana hawe bo mari sai fares.”
Yesaya 28:11,12
Har ro Moof mno re raa taro mkyas mkah
to, mno mkah raa ro smot Yesus oh fee. Mno afo re raa ro wase Yesus kbe mari tna mrok. Mno afo re ana weto mhar mawe bo ro ana mari reto to, bo ro msai mbam kʼAllah. Tna Har ro Moof muumto bouum
roto kʼraa taro re ana
mkah mai ro
ja mhar oh. Bouum reto oh mi merif mafer kʼraa ro smot Yesus wia oh.
Feto to, mfi bo
ranu berur skabuk su, tna anu beta nkyas mkah
to fyi? Mfi bo raa ro smot Yesus fee mama twok to, kbe ana mrok mawe anu beta nker.
Menohe mfi bo anu beta
mkah mai ranu to fyi? Soh raa sait ro smot Yesus fee tait yama to, kbe ait yari bokyas ro mbam
Bo ro anu beta nkyas reto merif iro ro ait yno. Ait yari tna bokyas reto mame kʼait yhaf tibyo ait yashana.
Anu beta nri mai ro
feto tibyo bo ro anu nkyas reto sibrer bo ro ja ait ynaut mam yhaf mato rait. Tibyo yanwaruk tna ybaut Allah yawe, “Mfo refo thar tawe Allah yhau ysya anu oh.”
Ati ro anu siret su skabuk
to, kbe anu nno fyi? Rau ro moof to, anu taro nbaut bobaut, tna anu taro nkyas watum, tna anu taro nkyas soo ro mbam kʼAllah, tna taro nkyas mkah
tna Har mno re raa taro
riwai raa mkyas to, ne nkyas
mkah mai rana, re ana mari tna mhar. Bo ro anu nno weto to, nno beta re kbe
fri mafer ro moof.
Mfi bo raa mawe mkyas mkah
to, raa mabo ewok o tuuf sai aran bo feto. Sait ykyas wia tna kbe sait naut yasen ykyas. Tna Har mno re raa sait taro
mai ro riwai raa mkyas weto. Ait yasen ye ykyas bokyas riwai reto
mkah mai rana re ana mari tna mhar.
Mfi bo raa ro ja
(ye ykyas bokyas riwai reto
mkah mai rana) to yarak, kbe anu aro nsen nkyas mkah
to ma. Nhau shait sai. Tna nesait nkyas sai mam nhaf mato wanu nsya Allah.
Tna

ro ja Allah ybis mama mkyas bo wAit to: Rau ro moof to, ana mabo ewok, tuuf bo to, masen mkyas sai bo feto. Sait ykyas kri-kri to, ana taro to, hre mari kaket. Mari bokyas reto tna mnaut mawe, “Bokyas ro ati meto, fe mfe a?”
Anu nkin hre nri bo reto nkri-kri to, tna mfi bo anu sait yari bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah tna yawe yasen ykyas to,
ro ykyas nkri-kri to shait yari wia. Tna ait retait ro yari bokyas ro mbam kʼAllah tait, yasen ykyas bokyas reto ye.
Mkah iso reto anu aro sait-sait nkyas bokyas ro Allah, tibyo raa ro
beta nri watum reto. Tna watum reto to, mno anu nros ntak.
Ati ro Allah ybis
wAit mkyas bo to, ja Ait ybo ana matak afo re ana sorni ana to fee. Ait ybis sait yros ykyas bo to, kbe ybis ana roto hre mbo ana re shait wia.
Allah tait hawe bo raa mno bo mnin-nin. Yawe anu nno bo kbik-kbak to ma.
Watum ro jõ tkyas kʼfnya na mnan si Watum ro Musa ykom yee kʼraa ro Yahudi to. Ati ro raa
mama skabuk su to, fnya masen mros mkyas bo to ma. Kbe ana hre shait sai tna mmat raa sme. Bo refo ja jõ tkyas mnan anya kʼraa ro Allah wAit mam
aro-aro beta.
Mfi bo fnya wase bo ro raa sme mkyas to, kbe ana shait wia. Tna rere ana mamoʼt amah tna fo mtu bo reto kʼmaa. Fnya mkyas bo mam ati ro
mama hre siret su to ma; ana hrenaut fea!
Fyi re anu hawe nri bokyas riwai reto? Bokyas reto to, Bokyas ro Allah. Fyi re anu ro nhau mam
ro Korintus nnaut nwe anu nhar bo miwer raa anya ro Kristen taro! Anu tna sai nmo kro
Rau ro moof to, anu nri watum ro Allah ykyas
taro ye.
Anu taro nwe, “Allah ybis jõ tamo
wAit sait.” Tna anu taro nwe, “Har muumto bouum
roto taro kʼjõ.” Soh mabo to, Har reto mno re anu nhar bo. Tibyo anu nhar nwe bo ro jõ tkom wefo to, mbam kʼAllah yum bau oh.
Mfi bo raa sait hawe bo yari bokom ajõ refo to, nmat ait to ma.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; raa mari watum mam mai rana mesait to bo ro ati. Feto to, bouum ro ja Har msan kʼanu raa ro kro
to, rau ro mase toni to au oh mefo: Mno re raa taro
Rau ro moof to, saso bouum reto. Tna bhah raa ro mkyas bo mkah
to ma.
Menohe bo bawya ro anu nno to nisoh nno beta kaket, nno kbik-kbak to ma!
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; ne nnaut Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
tiwya jõ tkyas kʼanu. Tiwya anu nri tna smot Bokyas reto tna ja anu nbo Bokyas reto matak fares.
Mfi bo anu nri Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
nse kʼanu, tna nbo matak renti yoyo to, anu nkai riof ro mase. Soh mfe to, Bokyas reto mraun sai, kbe anu nkai riof reto fee.
Tiwya jõ tari Bokyas ro Yesus refo tna jõ tama somya kʼanu. Rau ro ati to, anu smot nwe
yajat re yyon iro wanu. Bo reto tiwya mayir matim mam Bokom ro Allah oh.
Tna raa moo ajat rAit mse mam isra sau. Tna ti ro tuuf to Allah yno Ait yrok yasen. Bo reto to mayir matim mam Bokom ro Allah wia oh.
Ait ye yrok yasen tna yerif Ait Kefas-Petrus, tna yerif Ait kuber wAit mabo 12 to ye.
Tna yerif Ait u kʼraa ro kro
mabo trion 500 bo feto mam siret rana. Ana weto mawat taro mhau fares tna raa taro to mhai oh.
Yerif Ait kʼana weto tna yerif Ait kʼYakobus ye. Tna yerif Ait kʼraabis wAit
beta ye.
Ttis rau to, yerif Ait kʼjõ ye. Yesus yerif Ait kʼJõ tis beta, tna jõ fi raa ro ati fee. Jõ tnan ku mees ro fnya mabe myoh.
Tiwya jõ tamo saka raa ro kro
to simoyot-mayat. Feto jõ tanwaruk tna tnaut tawe jõ fi raa ro mase fee. Jõ tari he raa mawe jõ fi raabis ro Allah to, tnaut tawe jõ thaf moof mnan si fee. Jõ tnan raa kinyah sai.

Jõ fi raa ro tno bo mkair menohe Allah yatmof jõ. Yatmof jõ tibyo tamo raabis rAit. Tna boatmof rAit reto merif mafer ro moof. Mno re jõ safo tno bo ro Ait ybis kʼjõ to kaket miwer raabis rAit roto taro. Bo reto jõ tno mkah tatak ajõ meto fee. Tatak reto mbam kʼAllah yesait boatmof rAit ro ja matam jõ.

Awya oh mi tiwya yama ykyas Bokyas ro Yesus reto kʼanu re anu nri tna smot to? Jõ tesait soh mfe raa taro a? Anu bsom ranu to bo ro ati fee. Ro ati to anu nri bokyas ro ait ykyas reto tna nfot, nse kʼanu.
Amu, raabis rAit to, ja nkyas nwe,
yajat tna Allah yno re Ait yrok yasen.” Mfi bo anu smot bokyas reto to, fyi re anu taro nwe, “Aha, raa ro mhai to meen ana mrok masen fee!”
Anu taro to srau ewok nwe “Raa ro tii kro
oh tna mhai to meen mrok masen fee.” Menohe anu nnaut nwe tii
yajat tna yrok yasen fe mfe a?
Tna mfi bo anu nnaut nwe
yajat tna yrok u fee, bo ro amu nkyas kʼanu reto to, mafer aro fee. Mfi bo reto mabo fee, anu smot
mkah bawya? Soh feto to, bosmot ranu reto mabo marak ye.
Ja amu nkyas nwe, “Allah yno

yrok yasen.” Mfi bo Allah yno feto fee, bo ro amu nkyas to sioh-sah sai. Anu nnaut nwe amu nma besruf anu fe mfe a? Mfe saut! Ana ro mkyas mawe, “Raa ro mhai meen mrok masen fee.” Ana weto mkyas bo ro Allah to mweh!
Mfi raa meen mrok masen to fee, ana mnaut mawe bawya? Mawe,
yrok yasen fee ye tna Ait yhai tibyo.” Bonaut rana reto sre!
Mfi bo
yrok fee, maami bosmot ranu to mkai mafer aro fee ye. Tna mfo refo to iro wanu mbo anu matak fares.
Mfi bo reto mabo aro fee maami, raa ro tiwya kro
tna mhai oh to meen fri riof fee ye.

Mfi bo ro ana mkyas reto mabo to, fyi re anu binaut bwe, “Kbe Ait yerif riof kʼanu.” Mfi bo ro anu binaut reto mater mam wore anu bhau mam tabam refo sai to, meen bhai tna kwiyan wanu to sari-sara sai. Mfi bo reto mabo to, anu raa ro kro
to mamboi toni miwrek raa roto taro sor!
He mfe: Allah yno
yrok yasen tu oh!
yrok yasen yatim wia tna meen raa ro mhai to, kbe Allah yno ana mrok masen ye.
Ja raa beta to, kbe bhai. Tna raa sait aran yisti.
Adam tait hohos anu raa beta. Tna ait yno iro. Feto to anu raa kbe bhai beta. Feto ye
tait ynan fi hohos anu beta ye. Tna Ait yrok yasen oh. Feto kbe anu meen brok bsen u ye.
Raa beta meen mrok masen beta mam ayõ sau su fee: Tiwya
yrok yasen tinyi wia yatim. Tna oon ro Ait yama tabam refo u to, meen raa wAit beta mrok masen ye.
Tna tabam haberek. Tna ana ro mamo byoh
to, kabes beta, aban mana, bobot, raa ro matak, msya raa ro mase bo to, kbe
yno ana beta safe mkak.
yamo
tna ybo raa mamo snok ati ro Ait yber hasyoh raa beta ro mamo byoh kʼAit.
kbe yhau abyõ ybo bombra beta. Tna tis rau to yno re kbe raa waa bo mhai u fee. Tna yoo yatak rAit ysya hroh rAit reto yee kʼYaja.
Tna tabam haberek. Tna ana ro mamo byoh
to, kabes beta, aban mana, bobot, raa ro matak, msya raa ro mase bo to, kbe
yno ana beta safe mkak.
yamo
tna ybo raa mamo snok ati ro Ait yber hasyoh raa beta ro mamo byoh kʼAit.
kbe yhau abyõ ybo bombra beta. Tna tis rau to yno re kbe raa waa bo mhai u fee. Tna yoo yatak rAit ysya hroh rAit reto yee kʼYaja.
Tna tabam haberek. Tna ana ro mamo byoh
to, kabes beta, aban mana, bobot, raa ro matak, msya raa ro mase bo to, kbe
yno ana beta safe mkak.
yamo
tna ybo raa mamo snok ati ro Ait yber hasyoh raa beta ro mamo byoh kʼAit.
kbe yhau abyõ ybo bombra beta. Tna tis rau to yno re kbe raa waa bo mhai u fee. Tna yoo yatak rAit ysya hroh rAit reto yee kʼYaja.
Bokom ro Allah mawe Allah yoo
yse abyõ ybo bombra beta.
Bokom reto mawe 'bombra beta'. Menohe Allah tait, kbe
ybo fee. Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo bombra weto beta yse kʼYesus.
yber hasyoh raa beta ro mamo byoh kʼAit mkak to tna Ait ysan bo beta kʼYaja. Tna
yesait yawe Yaja yase ybo Ait ye. Feto to tis rau to, Allah yesait aran ro yase toni tna ybo bombra beta.
Raa baro mnaut raa wana ro mhai oh. Tibyo ana ksoh raa m
ana. Mfi bo raa ro mhai meen mrok masen fee, raa mno bo reto mkah bawya?
Amu ja nkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa tibyo raa taro kmo amu yoyo, mawe mame amu njat. Mfi bo ro amu nkyas to, bo ro mabo fee; mkah bawya amu beroh nmo nkyas bokyas refo renti?
Jõ tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus reto tibyo raa taro to knait jõ. Ti wawa raa saim bo mawe mame jõ tajat. (Bo ro jõ tkyas reto mabo tu oh!) Tna anu haberek smot
Yesus
ranu tibyo jõ simaut. Bo reto mabo tu oh!

Jõ thau mam Efesus fo, wore tiwya raa ro kmo jõ to mama mafa msya jõ. Ana weto safo mfi kak rbyoh. Mfi bo raa ro mhai kbe mrok masen to fee, kbe jõ bitsre bokyas refo rof. Jõ bitsre bo refo afo re raa kmo jõ u fee. (Menohe

yrok yasen to mabo oh, sioh fee! Tna meen raa wAit beta kbe mrok masen ye.) Feto to nri raa ro hawe bo mari Allah to ma! Ana taro mkyas mawe, “Mfi bo anu menrabu kbe bhai to, nma, ifo biit bo wer, bta jyõ wer! Mbau a! Tnaut tawe raa mamos wana mhau mawyõs fee. Fyi re anu kaket anu bno bo ro moof? Mafer marak!”
Nri bokyas rana reto ma! Ana weto mkyas bo sioh-sah. Nnaut oh: “Mfi bo raa sait yiranya ysya raa ro mimara mboh to, kbe ait retait yasen yno bo mnan ana ye.” Bokyas reto to mabo oh.
Feto to nisoh nhaf wanu nno bo ro moof. Nno iro u to ma. Anu baro nhar Allah fefares. Bo reto tawe kʼanu afo re anu hrenaut tna nanwaruk.
Raa taro mtu bo mawe, “Raa ro mhai to, kbe meen mrok masen fyi? Metsu wana weto to meen mnan bawya?”

Anu wase bo a? Metsu raa ro meen mrok masen to moof miwer. Ati ro anu nyum ⌞yafrun⌟ to makan weto sari mam tabam wia tna kmoh moo maut. Feto ye raa metsu rana ro mhai to, msya metsu rana ro mrok masen to, kbe hayah, mnan anya fee.
⌞Yafrun⌟ makan ro anu nyum weto mnan mara rau ro kbe moo to fee. Bobat manaf rau ro tinyi raa myum to maku sai fares.

Menohe Allah yno bo makan aro sor to haberek tna moo maut mkah bonaut rAit sai. Bo makan masu aro rau to hayah-hayah. Allah yno re bo ro ja raa myum aro hayah-hayah to moo maut mse make aro hayah-hayah.
Tna bo knik-knak ro maam to beta mnan anya fee: Raa metsu wana to mnan anya msya kak to fee ye. Tna ruu to metsu rau to hayah ye. Tna syoh to metsu rau to hayah ye.

Tna bombra ro mhau mam ayoh uu to bo weto mnan anya msya bombra ro mhau mam tabam refo fee. Bombra ro mhau mam ayoh uu weto moof wau to hayah, tna bombra ro mhau mam tabam refo to moof wau to hayah ye.
Ayõ msya snyi msya sken to mnan anya fee. Bo weto moof beta. Tna sken weto to aro rau-rau hayah ye.
Feto ye mkah raa ro mhai tna meen mrok masen. Hai ro raa sama to, kbe mnis. Tna metsu ro meen mrok masen reto to hayah, kbe meen mhau mroon.
Hai ro raa sama to moof fee tna matak fee. Menohe metsu ro meen mrok masen to hayah. Anu raa betsu wanu ro meen mrok masen reto kbe matak tna moof ye.
Anu raa betsu ranu to mtai mhau mam tabam refo sai. Anu bhai tna hai ranu raa sama. Menohe anu betsu wanu ro meen mrok reto to hayah. Betsu wanu ro tna to, meen matak mhau mawyõs mam sawro ro Allah.
Wore anu bhau mam tabam refo fares to Allah yfen anu betsu wanu mfi betsu wanu wefo. Tna kbe meen Allah ysan betsu ro tna kʼanu.
Bokom ro Allah mawe, “Allah yfen Adam yasen yamo raa ro maam tinyi wia.
” Menohe 'Adam ro Ttis' tait hayah. Ait fi
Tna Ait yno re anu bfos ranu maam.
Raa betsu wanu ro tinyi fo matak mhau mam tabam refo sai. Tna fo meen bi Ait ysan betsu ro meen mhau mroon to kʼanu.
Raa ro tinyi tait, Allah yoo koh yfen. Tna Raa ro Ttis tait yfen mkah koh sai fee. Ait ybam sawro ro Allah yama.
Raa ro tabam refo to mnan hohos ranu, Adam. Tna raa ro meen mhau mam sawro ro Allah to, kbe ana mnan fi
Anu ro bhau mam tabam refo fo betsu wanu to bnan Adam. Tna meen anu fri betsu ro mnan Ait ro yama ybam sawro ro Allah.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, raa betsu wanu wefo to, Allah yfen yno kwiyan msya mees sai. Tna betsu wanu wefo ro kbe mhai tna sari to, meen mhau mam sawro ro Allah yamo
ybo to fee. Sawro rAit reto to, bombra beta mamo mhau tno fee: Bo ro mhai tna bo ro sari to, meen mhau tno fee.
Nri a? Bo ro tkyas kʼanu refo ja raa mhar kaket fefares. Anu beta meen bhai fee. Menohe anu beta kbe haberek.
Meen, ati ro raa mfi saa buk ro ttis mawia to, bo reto kbe frok tubor. Tna raa ro mhai to, ana mse metsu wana ro mroon. Tna mrok masen. Tna anu betsu wanu beta to, kbe haberek ye.
Betsu wanu mam tabam refo to, sne tna kbe mhai. Menohe meen anu bse betsu wanu ro tna. Betsu wanu weto to matak. Tna kbe mhau mroon, mhai fee.
Meen anu brus betsu wanu ro bose wefo tna haberek bse betsu wanu ro matak weto. Tna mam wore weto to raa mhai u fee. Kbe anu bros btak. Tna ati reto to, kbe bokom ro Allah refo mabo:
“Oon ro raa mhai to maum oh. Mamo snok mam mfo refo fo, Ait ro yase tait yros abyõ mam bombra beta!”
Yesaya 25:8
“Ait sait yhau abyõ bombra beta mefi! Kbe raa mhai u fee. Ait fi yhau abyõ tibyo raa sraujin bo kbe ana mhai to u fee!”
Hosea 13:14
Raa ro mno iro kbe mhai. Tna Watum ro Musa yoo mbam Allah oh mi mno re raa mhar mawe ana mno iro to. Tibyo anu raa to ja waa bo anu bhai.
Menohe Allah ybis
ranu Yesus
yama yoo riof yee kʼanu. Ait yno feto tibyo anu waa bo meen bhai to aro u fee. Kbe anu bros btak. Tibyo byoh asik mase kʼAit.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na ro jõ ksoh; Allah ysan riof kʼanu oh. Feto tibyo jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Bito nros tu. Tna smot bi Ait kaket renti mamo snok tis rau. Susu ma. Nno bo ro
ysi kʼanu to, nno kaket. Anu nhar nwe bombra ro anu nno weto to, kbe meen saef fee.”
Tna ro mtan to, tkyas pitis ro anu noo nsan kʼraa kinyah ro Allah wAit. Tiwya jõ tawe
mam
ro Galatia weto tawe, “Ayõ ro
yoyo to, anu aro sait-sait yoo pitis wait baro yse hayah wia.” Tna jõ tawe anu beta nno bo mnan raa ro
mam Galatia weto tii mno ye: Anu sait-sait kbe tufrok pitis wanu mamyot bo ro ja anu nkai to, noo baro nsan. Siwyan pitis wanu to wia re ati ro jõ tama to, kbe anu nhoh-hoh saso to ma.
Tna ro mtan to, tkyas pitis ro anu noo nsan kʼraa kinyah ro Allah wAit. Tiwya jõ tawe
mam
ro Galatia weto tawe, “Ayõ ro
yoyo to, anu aro sait-sait yoo pitis wait baro yse hayah wia.” Tna jõ tawe anu beta nno bo mnan raa ro
mam Galatia weto tii mno ye: Anu sait-sait kbe tufrok pitis wanu mamyot bo ro ja anu nkai to, noo baro nsan. Siwyan pitis wanu to wia re ati ro jõ tama to, kbe anu nhoh-hoh saso to ma.

Nsok raa ro ja mno bo moof baro re ana moo pitis ranu reto to, makah mamo mee kʼraa ro Yerusalem. Jõ tama tna kbe tkom aam sau tee kʼana weto makah mamo ye. Tkom aam reto tkyas pitis ro anu nee reto afo re
ro Yerusalem mhar ana weto ro mbam
ro Korintus mama to awya sya.
Soh anu ksoh to, kbe jõ tsya ana nmo su
ro Yerusalem ye.
Meen jõ tbam Yerusalem tama frit Makedonia, tna tama to kʼanu mam Korintus.
Tna thau
baro soh mfe snyi baro tsya anu mam beto. Twase fares. Karik jõ thau snyi ro foos mfi to ska wia. Tna kbe anu noo bo ro jõ tnaut to baro nee tna re tasen tamo iso renti.
Jõ hawe bo tama thau ti mabuf sai. Soh
ybis to, jõ ksoh thau kait baro tsya anu.
Jõ tawe thau mam Efesus fo baro rere mamo snok mam korat ro Pentakosta wia.
Raa mawat mam befo beswan bokyas ajõ. Menohe
yerif iso afo re jõ tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼraa tna mafer rau to moof.
Tna soh Timotius yama yo kʼanu to, nmat ait kaket. Tna nmen ait nse yhau ysya anu mam amah wanu re ait waa ma. Ja ait ykah bo ro
ybis to, ynan jõ ye.
Nitrah nhaf wanu kʼait. Niwana ait to ma. Tna ati ro ait snok ybam
ranu yamo to, noo bo nee kʼait afo re ait yamo kaket. Jõ tsya raa ro kro
taro to, ste ait kbe hah ye yamaʼt Efesus.
Tna ro mtan to, jõ tkyas bfoh ranu, Apolos kʼanu. Riwai jõ tbis ait kro raa ro smot
taro to mama mmat anu. Jõ soh-soh ait ysya ana mamo. Menohe ait yako. Yawe ait sui. Yawe meen ti aro to tna ait yama.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Nhau kaket anu. Bito nros ntak tu. Tna smot
matak snok mam tis rau. Waa ma.
Bombra beta ro anu nno to, nno mkah nhaf ro natmof raa anya.”
Anu nhar nwe Stefanus ysya raa wait weto to, ana raa ro tinyi smot
mam
ro Akhaya. Ana moo mhaf wana mee
tna mfo refo ja ana mhau mbet raa anya ro Allah wAit. Ana weto to mamo sryan kʼanu beta.
Tna tawe kʼanu tawe, “Niwana ana ma. Nmat ana to, tna nri bo ro ana mawe kʼanu to kaket.” Ana weto mur-mur mkah bo ro
kaket. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Nri bo kʼawya sai ro ja mboti iso ro Stefanus ysya raa wait mno to.”
Stefanus, Fortunatus ysya Akhaikus mama mo kʼjõ oh. Tibyo jõ simaut toni. Anu
ro Korintus to nhau mam tabam ro fari tna anu ntai nma no kʼjõ fee. Feto to ana mabo tuuf weto mama mkah bo msya jõ su.
Ana mno re jõ simaut. Mnan fi tiwya ana mno anu simaut ye. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Nyoh asik mase kʼraa ro mnan feto.”
ro Asia weto mmah meen kʼanu. Akwila ysya Priskila msya
ro siret skabuk su mam amah rana to mmah meen kʼanu beta ye.
Raa ro kro
to ro mhau mam befo beta to mmah meen kʼanu ye. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Hana anya tna nmah meen kʼanya.”
Tna jõ tmah meen kʼanu beta ye. Jõ tesait tkom aam refo tiim kʼanu.
Awya ro hawe bo yhafri
to, kbe ayoh mroh mai kʼait.
nama fooh sai!
Jõ skabuk afo re
Yesus yatmof anu beta.
Tna
Yesus yno re jõ thafri anu beta ye.
II Corinthians: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus. Allah ksoh tibyo jõ tamo raabis
ro
Yesus rAit. Jõ tsya Timotius nmah meen kʼanu. Timotius fi raa ranu ro ja kro
ye. Amu mbewok nkom aam refo nee kʼanu
ro Allah, mam
ro Korintus. Amu nkom aam nee kʼanu nmat wia tna nwe anu nee kʼraa ro mhau mam remo makin sor mam
ro Akhaya.
Nee kʼana ro Allah wAit re ana beta mmat aam refo ye.
Amu mbewok skabuk Bja Allah nyoh re kbe Ait ysya
Yesus
matmof anu beta tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok sai.
Nma anu bibi Allah! Ait tait Yesus
Yaja. Yesus
tait
ranu. Tna Allah tait anu Bja ranu beta ro smot Yesus to ye. Boatmof beta to mbam bi Ait yesait aran yum. Tna ati ro anu sraujin to, Ait ykyas bo kʼanu, yno re anu sorni sraujin wanu weto.

Ti aro-aro bo knik-knak ro mkair-kar mama mai kʼanu. Tna raa mno bo ro mkair-kar mai kʼanu ye. Tibyo anu sraujin. Menohe Allah yno re anu sorni sraujin wanu weto. Yno re anu bhaf wanu me simaut u. Yno bo reto afo re anu bhar bno bo reto kʼraa roto ye. Bo knik-knak ro mkair ja mama mai kʼraa. Tna mfo refo soh anu bmat he raa sraujin to, anu bmo bkyas bo moof kʼana bno re ana sraujin u fee. Bno ana me simaut u. Anu be bno bo ro tii Allah yno kʼanu feto.
tii ykai bo ro mkair-kar mawat. Tna Allah yno re Ait sorni sraujin rAit reto. Anu kro

tibyo anu fri bo ro mkair-kar mawat mnan fi Ait ye. Reto mnan fi kair ro mama mai kʼYesus msis-sas hofyat tibyo mama mai kʼanu ye. Menohe Allah ja yno re anu be bnaut sraujin wanu u fee. Yno feto kʼanu mnan fi tii yno
ye.

⌞Amu mbewok nkyas riof ro mase kʼraa.⌟ Tibyo ti aro aro kair mama mai kʼamu. Tna ti aro rau-rau Allah ykyas bo moof kʼamu nhaf wamu ye. Ait yawe, “Waa ma. Sraujin ma. Nnaut yyi ma. Bito ntak oh!” Ait yno amu nhaf mnem feto. Yno amu sraujin toni fee. Amu fri kair ye, tna Allah yno amu nhaf wamu me mnem u. Bo ewok weto Allah ybis afo re anu nros ntak smot Yesus. Anu raa ro kro

to, ja fri bo ro mkair, mnan fi bo mkair ro mbtek mai kʼamu mbewok feto ye. Tna Allah ykyas bo moof kʼanu nhaf wanu ye. Yno anu sraujin u fee feto. Ait yno anu nhaf mnem feto. Tis rau to, ati ro anu nkai bo ro samyoh to, anu ntai ntak beroh nsom kair reto.
Ja bo ro mkair-kar mbtek mai kʼanu ye, mnan fi bo mkair ro ja mbtek mai kʼamu mbewok feto ye. Menohe amu nhar nwe kbe Allah yno anu sraujin u fee. Yno feto mnan ja Ait yno kʼamu mbewok ye.

Raa wamu sor: Amu mbewok nkyas bo baro kʼanu, afo re anu nhar arin ro mkair tii amu nkai mam rabin ro Asia Kecil. Ati reto to, raa mno bo ro mkair toni mai kʼamu. Tibyo amu ntak nsom bo ro fanes reto to fee. Amu ntai fee. Tibyo amu nnaut nwe kbe amu nhai.

Ti reto to, amu nnaut nwe ayõ ro amu nhai to kene oh. Menohe amu nhai fee; amu nhau sai. Allah ybis arin ro mkair reto mama afo re amu nhar nwe amu nesait ntak nno riof kʼamu ai fee. Allah yno amu nfos wanu miyõ fares afo re amu nhar nwe Ait oh mi Raa ro yatak yno riof kʼraa tna yatak yno raa ro mhai to, mrok masen.

Wore weto to bo ro msai toni mama mai kʼamu. Tibyo amu kene wo nhai. Menohe ati reto to, Allah yno riof kʼamu. Tna mam wore wo bo ro mkair-kar meen mama to, amu nhar nwe kbe Ait yno riof kʼamu sai ye.

Sik ma nros tis amu mbewok mkah bo skabuk amu. Kbe Allah yari boyoh wanu tibyo yno amu nhau fares. Feto tibyo raa mawat mmat bo ro moof Allah yno kʼamu mbewok. Soh Ait yno re amu nhai fee, kbe ana mayoh asik mase kʼAit sai.
Amu mbewok simaut toni nwe amu ja nno bo beta mkah nhaf ro moof sai. Wore amu nhau mam tabam refo to, amu nhau nno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Bo ro ati reto. Tna amu nno bo ro moof kʼanu ro nhau mam
ro Korintus to, amu sioh anu aro fee ye. Raa ro tabam refo mnaut mawe, “Amu nno bo feto fee; Paulus ysya Timotius wase bo.” He mfe, Allah yatmof amu oh mi amu ntak nno bo ro moof sai.
Amu mbewok nkom aam kʼanu to, amu nkyas bo abyõ sai, re kbe anu srau nhar kaket. Amu nmyõt bo aro fee. Tna jõ tawe ksoh re kbe anu nhar nwe
amu mbewok to raa ro nhaf moof. Anu nhar amu kaket fefares. Menohe kbe anu nhar amu kaket. Tna meen ati ro
Yesus yhah yama u to, kbe anu bibi amu, nwe amu nno bo ro moof syok. Ati reto to, kbe amu mbewok bibi anu beta feto ye.
Tii jõ tnaut tawe,
ro mhau mam
ro Korintus to, ana ksoh jõ. Feto to, ana ksoh mawe jõ tamo tmat ana.” Tibyo tawe tamoʼt

ro Makedonia to, tna tawe tama tmat anu wia. Tii tawe tamo iti tmat anu ro nhau mam Korintus. Tna thah tama to, tawe tmat anu iti u. Tna mun ro ewok reto to, tawe kbe anu noo boit aro, noo bo ro jõ tawe bo to baro nee kʼjõ, re kbe tbo tamo renti mam
ro Yudea. ⌞Tawe tamo, tama tna tkyas watum ro

kʼanu u.⌟ Tawe kbe tno bo moof reto kʼanu muhrin ewok. He mfe. Tii tama mun ro ewok reto fee. ⌞Ati reto to, jõ ksoh tawe tama. Menohe tnaut myum-yam mam thaf mato tawe anu taro hawe jõ. Anu nhar jõ kaket fefares. Anu wase jõ thaf moof sai. Mno tibyo tawe rau ro moof to, tyum ati ro tama u.⌟ Feto to tii tama tmat anu muhrin ro ewok reto fee.
Tii jõ tnaut tawe,
ro mhau mam
ro Korintus to, ana ksoh jõ. Feto to, ana ksoh mawe jõ tamo tmat ana.” Tibyo tawe tamoʼt

ro Makedonia to, tna tawe tama tmat anu wia. Tii tawe tamo iti tmat anu ro nhau mam Korintus. Tna thah tama to, tawe tmat anu iti u. Tna mun ro ewok reto to, tawe kbe anu noo boit aro, noo bo ro jõ tawe bo to baro nee kʼjõ, re kbe tbo tamo renti mam
ro Yudea. ⌞Tawe tamo, tama tna tkyas watum ro

kʼanu u.⌟ Tawe kbe tno bo moof reto kʼanu muhrin ewok. He mfe. Tii tama mun ro ewok reto fee. ⌞Ati reto to, jõ ksoh tawe tama. Menohe tnaut myum-yam mam thaf mato tawe anu taro hawe jõ. Anu nhar jõ kaket fefares. Anu wase jõ thaf moof sai. Mno tibyo tawe rau ro moof to, tyum ati ro tama u.⌟ Feto to tii tama tmat anu muhrin ro ewok reto fee.

Tii tnaut tawe tama to kʼanu. Menohe tama fee; tyum ati ro tama u. Tibyo anu hre nnaut ntu banu nwe fyi? Nno be anu nnaut nwe ja tno tfi raa ro tabam refo sai. Ana weto ja srau ewok. Ana weto ja mawe, “Ae, kbe tno bo reto.” Menohe ana ja mno bo ro ana mawe reto fee.
Bo ro Allah yawe yno to, Ait kbe yno tu oh. Tna Watum rAit ro amu nkyas kʼanu to, ja sioh fee ye.
Tii jõ tsya Silwanus, ysya Timotius nma nkyas Yesus
yasom kʼanu. Ait fi Ku ro Allah yare. Yesus tait Raa ro srau makin-akan fee. Ait ja ykyas bo mabo rau sai aran. Tna bo ro yawe yno to, Ait yno yum.
Allah ysi bosi mawat. Tna
tait Raa ro yno bo weto beta. Au oh mi raa ro kro Yesus ja bibi bo yase ro Allah rAit. Tna anu bwe, “
: Mabo oh!”
Nnaut nwe Allah oh mi Raa ro ysok anu tna yawe anu bmo raa wAit. Tna Ait oh mi Raa ro yno amu nsya anu bros btak smot

Ait yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu afo re raa mmat tna mhar mawe anu fo raa wAit yum oh. Tna yoo Har rAit yse mjin mam anu bhaf mato wanu ye. Allah yoo Har rAit reto yse matim wia. Yno afo re kbe anu bhar bwe Ait kbe yno bombra sor ro yawe meen mama mrof. Meen yno yum feto oh.
Jõ hawe bo tama bhah anu. Tto bo mkah Allah yasom tawe reto oh mi jõ thah te tamaʼt
ro Korintus fefares to.
Amu ro nmo raabis ro Allah rAit to, amu hawe bo nbis-baas anu, tko-tka anu nwe, “Smot fefo!” Amu nno feto fee! Nnaut bo reto ma! Amu nhar nwe anu ja nros ntak smot
matak oh. Tna amu ksoh nros tis tna nban anu afo re anu simaut mase.
Tiwya tama to kʼanu to, tna bhah anu. Bokyas ajõ mno anu sraujin. Tna mno jõ sraujin ye. Jõ hawe bo tno feto u. Feto to ati reto te tama tmat anu mun ro ewok reto fee. Tyum ti aro.
Mfi bo jõ tama tno anu sraujin to, kbe awya oh mi ye yno jõ simaut u to? Kbe raa aro fee. Kbe anu beta sraujin sai.
Jõ hawe tama bhah anu. Tibyo tiwya tkom aam sai ro bhah anu.

Tesait tama fee. Tkom aam reto to, ⌞re kbe raa ro tii mno bo ro mkair weto to, kbe mari tna manwaruk. Manwaruk tna me mno bo ro moof.⌟ Jõ hawe bo tama tkyas bo ro mno anu sraujin. Feto to tama fefares, tyum ti aro. Soh anu ne nno bo ro moof to, tna re ne simaut u to, reto mno jõ simaut mase ye. Anu nhar nwe ati ro jõ simaut mase to, anu ja simaut mase ye.
Tako hawe sai tkom aam reto bhah anu. Jõ ksoh anu toni sai tibyo tkom. ⌞Tkom afo re anu nanwaruk, tna ne saso
⌟ Tii tkom aam reto to, jõ srau mham tna yukan mbtek ye, menohe jõ beroh tkom. Jõ hawe bo bokom ajõ mno anu sraujin. Menohe tkom re kbe anu nhar nwe jõ thafri anu.
Raa ro
ranu sait tii yno bo ro mkair. Bo ro yno reto mno jõ sraujin. Tna mno anu ro
Korintus reto beta sraujin toni. Bo ro tawe reto to, jõ tkyas tiryõ ye fee.
Anu nwat nifah ait. Reto mas mafer ro ati kʼait: Tibyo ait yashana oh. Mnan oh. Bhah ait renti u ma.
Mfo refo ntu ait yama tna nbo yatem tna ne niranya nsya ait u. Nkyas bo rere kʼait afo re ait sraujin toni fee. Nno be ait sraujin toni, ⌞tibyo yitsre bosmot rait.⌟
Tawe nkyas bo kʼait nwe anu natmof ait fares, afo re kbe ait sraujin toni fee.
Aam ro tii tkom tee kʼanu reto to, sanet anu. Tkom afo re kbe thar tawe soh anu nri bo ro tawe beta to, fe mfe a?
Soh anu sorni bo ro ait yno tna ne nbo ntem nsya ait to, kbe jõ sorni bo ro ait retait yno to ye. (Ebokmi jõ kmo ait u fee: Safo ro yno reto to mai kʼjõ fee.)
ymat tna yhar yawe jõ tnaut anu tibyo kmo raa retait u fee.
Anu bhar bwe ja kabes yabi (Iblis) hawe bo anu biranya bsya raa anya. Ait saim bo yawe anu bhaf kair. Feto to, ne nbo raa retait yatem afo re kbe kabes yabi retait besruf anu fee.
Tiwya tamoʼt remo ro Troas. Tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof ro
Tamo tna
yno re raa ro mhau mam remo reto ksoh mari bo ro jõ tawe.
Titus tait anu bfoh ranu mam

Tnaut tawe Titus yatim wia oh, tna ste jõ mam tno. He mfe; ait yarak fares. Tibyo jõ tnaut yyi ait. Yarak fares feto, tibyo thau kait mam remo ro Troas fee. Tmah meen kʼraa weto, tna tasen tamo bojõ mam
ro Makedonia.
Amu mbewok kro
Ait yamo aban mana ramu. Tna amu noo nhaf wamu nee kʼAit oh. Reto mfi bo Ait yatim wia yamo. Tna amu simaut mase kro Ait mam tis. Allah yno
yase yros yatak abyõ. Tna amu nros ntak su nsya Ait ye. Tna raa ro byoh mhau mte. Tayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Mam woyõ-woya amu mbewok nmo to, amu nkyas Bokyas Moof ro
kʼraa. Amu nkyas Ait yasom afo re ana mhar Ait ye. Bokyas Moof reto to, mfi bo ro sawer moof.
Amu mbewok nkyas Bokyas ro Moof reto. Amu nkyas bo reto tna Allah ksoh. Soh
yesait ysan bo kʼAllah to, Ait ksoh bo reto toni. Amu mno bo ro
ybis yawe. Feto to ati ro amu nno bo weto to, reto mnan fi

yesait ysan bo ro sawer kʼAllah ye. Tna ntwe rau to, raa ro mkai riof ro mase to, ana masan ye. Tna raa ro mamo mam iso ro mkair to, ana masan ntwe rau to ye. Menohe ana hawe. Tibyo kbe ana safe mkak to.

Raa ro mkai riof to, ana masan ntwe reto mnaut mawe, “Bo ro sawer reto to! Bo moof ro mno riof kʼamu.” Menohe raa ro kbe safe mkak to, ana masan ntwe rau to, mnaut mawe, “Bo mnis! Bo ro meen mno amu safe mkak!” Amu raabis ro Allah fo, nesait ntak nno bo ro msai refo to fee. Anu beta fo raa tu sai. Anu aro besait btak bkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus fee.
taro mno bo ro mkair. Ana mawat saso pitis sai tna reto oh mi ana mkyas bokyas ro Allah. Menohe amu fo raa ro srau ewok fee. Allah oh mi ybis amu nkyas bokyas rAit to. Tibyo amu nfi sryan ro
wAit nmo nkyas bokyas refo. Amu nhar nwe Allah yros ymat sas amu.
Ti aro-aro to,
ro srim mama ⌞mawe mkyas watum ro Allah mam
ranu.⌟ Ana ja bibi ana ai afo re anu nnaut nwe ana to raa ro mhar bo. Tna
ro srim weto to, baro mama moo aam
mee kʼanu nmat. ⌞Aam wana weto to mbam
wana ro mhau fari. Raa manes mam
wana mam wono tii mkom aam weto. Mkom aam bibi
weto. Bibi ana afo re kbe anu nhar nwe ana weto to raa ro moof.⌟ Menohe anu ro nhau mam
ro Korintus nhar amu mbewok oh. Feto to amu nma bibi amu nesait ai fee. Tna amu nma nerif aam
kʼanu feto fee ye.
⌞Tiwya anu wase

Tna amu nma nkyas Ait yasom kʼanu. Tibyo anu nashana. Au oh mi anu nhar nwe amu fo raabis ro Allah tu oh.⌟ Tna raa beta soh ana mmat anu to, mmat he mfo refo anu nhaf, srau wanu to moof. Mmat feto tibyo ana weto mhar mawe bo reto mbam bokyas ramu ro anu beta nri. Feto mi ana mhar mawe amu fo raabis ro Allah to ye. Mhar mawe tii amu nkyas watum rAit kʼanu kaket. Anu beta nhar bo ro amu ja nno oh. Feto to, amu nbo aam
aro noo nee
ranu nmat to fee. Amu nno mkah bawya? Tna amu nyoh nwe anu nkom aam ro bibi amu fee ye. Amu nwe nbo aam re kbe
roto mmat to mkah bawya? ⌞Amu nno bo nfi
ro anu wase fares weto fee.⌟ Amu nhar mam amu nhaf mato wamu to, nwe mfo refo anu kro
Anu nrok smot
Tna raa mmat he anu nhaf, srau wanu to mrok moof. Reto mnan fi

yesait ykom aam sau. Amu mbewok oh mi ro tiwya nma nkyas Ait yasom kʼanu. Reto mnan fi anu nesait oh mi 'aam' ro Ait ykom reto. Aam reto mkyas amu ye mawe amu oh mi raabis wAit. Allah tait Allah ro yaam. Tna Har rAit oh mi
yoo yama ykom aam reto. Yoo bokom msya
ykom abyõ mam aam fee. Ykom abyõ mam fraa fee ye.
Ait yse watum rAit mam anu nhaf mato. (Reto mnan fi Ait ykom yno mayir abyõ mam raa mhaf mato.)
⌞Amu mbewok nhar nwe anu nrok smot
tu oh. Tna Har ro Allah mama mhau mam anu nhaf mato ye.⌟
oh mi yno re amu nhar bo weto. ⌞Feto to amu nhar nwe Allah oh mi ybis amu nmo nkyas Bokyas ro Moof reto kʼanu.⌟
Amu nkah armato ro
mkah tak ramu ai fee. Allah oh mi yno bo aro sor ro amu nkah to, tufrok mafer ro moof.

Allah yno amu srau tna ntai re kbe mbetoo Bosi ro Tna kʼanu. Bosi ro Tinyi reto tii Allah ykom mam fraa. ⌞Au oh mi Watum ro Musa.⌟ Tna soh raa miwer bobis aro ro ybis tinyi weto to, misti re raa weto mhai. Menohe Bosi ro Tna reto to, Allah ykom mam fraa fee. Har rAit yesait mno re raa srau watum rAit. Har rAit matak mno afo re meen raa mhau hame wajin. Feto oh mi Allah yawe amu mbetoo Bosi ro Tna reto kʼanu. ⌞Au oh mi Bokyas Moof (
) ro Yesus.⌟
Tiwya Allah ykyas Watum ro Tinyi kʼMusa. Tna ykom yiir abyõ mam fraa. Tna Musa ymat bo yase ro Allah rAit, tibyo Musa yesait yasu ynaif mrok mawyah.

Bosi ro Tinyi reto misti re raa mhai. Menohe Bosi reto to, matak tna mbetoo Allah yase rAit ye. Ti baro firwas tna Musa yasu ynaif ro mawyah reto to, kren rau mroh maku baro. Maku baro menohe raa ro Israel mtai mros sayõ ait yasu rait kaket fefares. Yasu rait kren toni fares.

Bosi ro Tinyi reto mbetoo Allah yatak rAit. ⌞Menohe Bosi reto to, matak misoh raa mhaf, srau wana to fee.⌟ Tna misti re raa mhai. Menohe mfo refo Allah yno bo wAit mkah Har rAit. Reto mbetoo bo yase ro Allah rAit to moof miwer.

Bosi ro Tinyi reto to, moo safo mana mmit kʼraa. Menohe Bosi reto mbetoo bo yase ro Allah rAit ye. Mfo refo Har rAit mbetoo Iso ro Tna. Iso ro Tna reto to, Allah ⌞ymat mees ro Yesus tibyo⌟ yawe raa mhaf moof ati oh. Tibyo Allah ymit safo kʼraa ro mhaf moof weto fee. Iso ro tna refo fo, mbetoo bo yase ro Allah rAit reto moof miwer Bosi ro Tinyi reto.
Jõ tmat Bosi ro Tinyi reto tna Iso ro Tna refo to, tnaut tawe ro Tinyi to, merif bo yase ro Allah rAit to, kaket fee. Tna Iso ro Tna refo merif bo yase ro Allah rAit reto kaket.
