Tii Musa yasu ynaif mrok kren toni. Ti baro firwas tna kek reto mawyah maku sai baro. ⌞Au oh mi anu bhar bwe Watum ro Tinyi matak rau to mroh kebet-kebet.⌟ Menohe Iso ro Tna reto merif bo yase ro Allah rAit mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tibyo mase rau to moof tna matak toni.
Amu mbewok ninaut nwe Iso ro Tna refo meen mhau mamo snok mam hame wajin. Amu nhar bo reto, tibyo amu nkyas Iso refo yoyo. Amu shait fee. Amu waa fee.

Tii Musa yoo hawee mabuf tna burut wa yasu ynaif. Ait yhar yawe kek reto mroh mroh tibyo burut wa yasu ynaif. Ait ksoh raa ro Israel mnaut mawe kek reto mhau fares. Ait hawe ana mmat bo kek reto mroh mamo marak. Menohe amu nno feto fee.

⌞Amu nhar nwe Bosi ro Tna, matak rau reto meen mhau tibyo hame wajin. Kbe mroh marak fee.⌟ Menohe tiwya raa ro Israel weto to srau bokyas ro Allah fee. Ana makit mbin. Tna mamo snok mam mfo refo ye, raa ro Israel mmat Bokom ro Musa fares ye menohe srau Bosi ro Tinyi reto fefares. Bo sau burut wa ana makit wana. Tibyo ana wase Allah. Bo reto mnan fi hawee ro mno wa. Tibyo raa mahni bo yase ro Allah rAit.
yesait aran oh mi Raa ro ytai matak yrus hawee reto afo re raa srau Bokyas ro Allah.
Mamo snok mfo refo, ati ro raa ro
Yahudi mmat Bokom ro Musa reto, bo burut wa ana makit wana, afo re ana srau bokom reto fee.
Menohe soh raa haberek tna mamo mo
to, kbe Ait yrus hawee reto.
tait Har. Soh Har rAit reto mjin mam raa mhaf wana to, kbe ana mamo mo kʼAllah to, bo aro burut iso reto wa u fee.
⌞Amu nfi Musa fee. Tii Musa yoo hawee mabuf tna burut wa yasu rait.⌟ Menohe anu bmat bo yase ro
rAit. Anu bmat Iso ro Tna mase rAu. Tna Har rAit moo bo yase rAit baro mse kʼanu ye. Tibyo ati ro raa mmat anu to, ana mmat bo yase ro
rAit oh meto. Anu bfi bowane oh meto.
tait Har. Har rAit ja mhau misoh anu. Misoh, misoh anu fo, mno anu haberek bmo bfi Yesus. Reto oh mi Har rAit reto mno bo yase ro
rAit ro mse kʼanu oh to, mawyah rau maut, maut mase renti.

⌞Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼraa mhaf wana.⌟ Yno feto tibyo amu mbewok nmo tna nkah bo wAit, nmo nkyas Bosi rAit ro Tna reto. Amu hrowyõ saah, menohe amu beroh nkah bo wAit. Bitsre fee. Ait yatmof amu. Tibyo amu ntai matak nmo nkyas Bosi rAit ro Tna renti.

⌞Raa taro mawe amu mbewok ja besruf raa.⌟ He mfe. Amu hawe bo nno bo ro mkair, hawe bo besruf raa. Amu nkyas bokyas ro Allah to, amu sioh niryõ maja aro fee ye. Amu nkyas watum rAit to, nkyas abyõ sai. Allah ja yros ymat sas bo ro amu nno. Feto kbe raa mhar mawe amu nkyas bo refo mabo.

Raa taro to, bo sau ja burut wa ana masu wana afo re ana wase Allah. Bo reto mnan fi hawee ro mno wa. Tibyo masu mti. Ana weto mhar Allah kaket fee. Tibyo ana kbe mari bo ro amu mbewok ja nkyas to fee. Ana weto srau Bokyas Moof refo fee. Tna meen ana mkai riof fee ye.
Kabes yabi (Iblis) tait yfi
ro ybo tabam refo. Tna ait besruf ana weto beta. Ait burut wa masu wana afo re mmat bo yase ro
rAit fee. Au oh mi yno re ana mari tna srau Bokyas Moof ro
reto
fee. Kbe ana srau wase bo
tait ynan fi Allah. Masu maah fee.
Amu mbewok nmo, nmo to, ja nkyas amu nsom wamu fee. Amu nmo to, nkyas nwe Yesus
tait
ro yase ybo raa. Yesus ybis yawe amu nma nkah armato rAit mam
ro Korintus. Ybis yawe amu nma nros tis sai tna nban anu.
Ati ro Allah yfen tabam refo fo, Ait yawe sai yawe, “Maah!” Tna mabo: Maah mbrah nenat mama.
Ait oh mi Raa ro yno kek mawyah mram anu bhaf mato wanu ye. Yno bsu maah re bhar bo yase ro Allah rAit. ⌞Anu bmat kek reto mam Musa yasu rait fee;⌟ bo yase ro Allah rAit reto anu bmat mam
yasu rAit.
⌞Amu nhar Bokyas ro Moof reto

.⌟ Nhar nwe bo reto to, bo ro mabyoh maut toni, mfi bo satoh. Menohe amu mbewok fo raa sei sai. Amu nse nfi Allah fee. Allah yerif yase rAit kʼamu raa sei sai, ro ja ntak fee. Tak rAit reto yse kʼamu. Reto mnan fi raa moo bosatoh ro mabyoh maut to, mse mam kusia mato. Ja kusia to matak fee, mhau kait fee. Allah yno bo refo afo re raa mhar mawe tak rAit ro msai toni reto to, mbam kʼamu fee, mbam kʼAllah yesait.

Amu fo raa sai. Amu ntak fee. Tna kbe meen amu netsu wamu nhai ye. Tna bo ro mkair ja mai kʼamu mbewok. Bo aro rau-rau mama mai. Menohe amu btek nwe fee. Ti aro bo mno amu namboi, tibyo amu wase bo bawya ro kbe amu nno. Menohe amu beroh nno bo ro moof sai.
Raa mawat knait amu. Menohe Raa sait yhau yatam amu fares. Raa ro byoh mai amu tibyo amu btek nwe. Menohe amu njat fee, amu nhau naam fares.

⌞Amu mbewok smot Yesus tibyo ja nmo, nmo nkyas yasom rAit. Nkyas yasom rAit yoyo tna raa taro hawe bo mari.⌟ Ana weto mno bo mkair-kar mai kʼamu mbewok. Amu nhau mam tabam refo to, ja bo ro mkair-kar mai kʼamu, mnan fi tii bo ro mkair-kar sor mai kʼYesus ye. Ait raa mame yajat ye oh. Menohe yrok yasen. Amu raa sai. Tna kbe meen amu netsu wamu nhai ye. Menohe amu nhar nwe tak ro mno Yesus yrok yasen reto to, ja mros tis mban amu fo ye. Mban amu afo re amu beroh ⌞smot Ait tna nkyas yasom rAit renti.⌟ Amu nno feto afo re kbe raa mmat yatak rAit ro yse kʼamu. Soh raa mmat yatak rAit ro yse kʼamu to, kbe ana mhar mawe Ait yesait yhau yaam fares ⌞tibyo smot Ait ye. Raa taro hawe bo mari amu nkyas Yesus yasom.⌟ Tibyo ana ja mayõ hre saim-sam bo mawe mame amu njat. ⌞Menohe amu nhau naam fares tna beroh nkyas yasom rAit renti.⌟

⌞Amu mbewok smot Yesus tibyo ja nmo, nmo nkyas yasom rAit. Nkyas yasom rAit yoyo tna raa taro hawe bo mari.⌟ Ana weto mno bo mkair-kar mai kʼamu mbewok. Amu nhau mam tabam refo to, ja bo ro mkair-kar mai kʼamu, mnan fi tii bo ro mkair-kar sor mai kʼYesus ye. Ait raa mame yajat ye oh. Menohe yrok yasen. Amu raa sai. Tna kbe meen amu netsu wamu nhai ye. Menohe amu nhar nwe tak ro mno Yesus yrok yasen reto to, ja mros tis mban amu fo ye. Mban amu afo re amu beroh ⌞smot Ait tna nkyas yasom rAit renti.⌟ Amu nno feto afo re kbe raa mmat yatak rAit ro yse kʼamu. Soh raa mmat yatak rAit ro yse kʼamu to, kbe ana mhar mawe Ait yesait yhau yaam fares ⌞tibyo smot Ait ye. Raa taro hawe bo mari amu nkyas Yesus yasom.⌟ Tibyo ana ja mayõ hre saim-sam bo mawe mame amu njat. ⌞Menohe amu nhau naam fares tna beroh nkyas yasom rAit renti.⌟
Feto tibyo amu wase nwe tija kbe amu njat. Menohe amu nsom bo ro fanes reto afo re anu kbe meen nkai riof ro mase reto.
Mam Bokom ro Allah raa sait ykyas yawe, “Jõ smot Allah. Tibyo tkyas kʼraa tawe, ‘Jõ fi raa ro smot Allah.’”
Amu mbewok smot Allah ye. Tna nhar nwe meen Ait yno amu nrok nsen. Tibyo amu nkyas bokyas rAit reto ye.
Amu mbewok nhar nwe tii Allah yno Yesus yrok yasen. Tna nhar nwe meen Allah yno amu nrok nsen mfi feto ye. Anu to raa mana ro
ye. Feto kbe meen Allah yno anu beta nrok nsen ye. Meen yakah anu beta yamo yo kʼAit. Yse anu bros su mam wore wo Ait yhau.

Amu nsom bo mkair ro mama mai kʼamu. Nsom sai afo re anu nsya raa taro nri Bokyas Moof ro Yesus. Tna re kbe raa mawat mkai boatmof ro Allah rAit ye. Raa mkai boatmof rAit reto to, tna ana mkyas yasom rAit, mbo faram renti. Tna fo raa roto fri boatmof rAit ye. Tis rau to, raa msis-sas mayoh asik mase kʼAllah tna mkyas yase rAit ye.
Feto to, amu mbewok nkyas

yasom rAit renti feto. Amu nkah bo wAit fo, bo mkair-kar aro sor mbtek mai kʼamu. Tna amu nrok hrowyõ ye. Menohe amu nhau nkah bo mam armato rAit renti fares. Bitsre fee. Amu netsu wamu hrowyõ-rawa. Netsu wamu wefo kbe meen mkair tna fo amu nhai. Ti aro rau-rau amu sraujin ye. Menohe ti firwas ti
yisoh amu nmos wamu fo, yno re me matak.

Mfo wefo bo ro mkair-kar sor mai kʼamu. Menohe amu nnaut nwe, “Mbau a; bo ro mkair weto mai kʼamu rof, kbe meen mhau kait fee. Kbe meen amu nhaf nse bo ro moof miwer mamo snok mam hame wajin.” Soh amu nnaut tna nnit bo ewok reto to, amu nnaut nwe, “Bo mkair-kar ro mai kʼamu mam tabam refo fo, bo ro samyoh kʼamu fee. Bo weto to mfi bo ro mnan-nan sai; bo ro ati fee. Kbe marak fooh. Tna bo samyoh ro amu mfo refo beroh nsom weto to, kbe mno mafer ro moof. Meen amu nhaf nse bo yase ro Allah wAit mase miwer.”

Amu nmat sas bo ro ja raa mahni, bo ro amu nsu nmat fefares. Au oh mi amu beroh nnaut bo moof ro meen mama. Amu nnaut bo weto yoyo. Bo weto to meen mhau mamo snok mam hame wajin. Bo ro ja amu nmat mam tabam refo fo kbe mhau waor sai.

Anu betsu wanu mfi amah ro manyah tibyo mantrat. Amu mbewok nhar nwe, kbe meen amu nhai tna amu netsu wanu wefo mnis makus. Reto bo ro ati fee. Meen anu beta sikba tabam refo. Menohe Allah siwyan wore wo meen anu bhau mam sawro rAit oh. Reto mnan fi amah ro matak. Mnan fi amah ja raa mfen fee. Tna 'amah' wanu weto meen mhau mroon mamo snok mam hame wajin.
Anu bnaut bwe bhau mam tabam refo fares to, bo ro samyoh toni. Anu bwia tna srau kero bwe bse betsu wanu ro tfia. Anu bnaut bwe, “Fooh re
yoo anu bestu wanu ro moof, yee kʼanu.”
Meen anu bhai tna bmo bhau mam sawro ro Allah to, kbe anu bmos wanu mesait aran mhau fee. Meen Allah yoo betsu ro tna yee kʼanu.

Mam tabam refo fo, anu betsu wanu wefo matak fee. Kbe bhai. Menohe anu hawe bo bhau betsu marak sai. Feto to anu bwia tna srau kro bwe bse betsu wanu ro tna. Reto mfi 'amah' ro matak. Anu betsu wanu ro tna to, meen mhai fee. Betsu wanu ro tna weto kbe mhau mamo snok mam hame wajin.
Allah yesait oh mi yawe ksoh kbe meen yoo betsu wanu ro tna weto yee kʼanu byum. Tna mfo wefo Ait yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu. Yse wia matim afo re anu bhar bwe bo ro yawe meen yno reto to, kbe yno tu oh!
Amu mbewok nhar nwe bo refo meen mabo. Tibyo amu waa fee. Tna amu nhar nwe wore wo amu nhau mam netsu wamu wefo fo, amu nhau mam tabam refo fares. Amu nmo nhau su nsya
mam sawro rAit fefares.
Amu nhau mam tabam refo to, amu nahni tna nwe bo reto mabo fefares. Menohe amu nhar nwe bo reto meen mabo tu oh.
Nhar bo reto tibyo amu waa fee. Amu nnaut nwe soh amu nhai to moof. Feto kbe amu nmo nhau su nsya
mam sawro rAit. Nhau mam wore weto to moof miwer amu nhau mam tabam refo.
Rau ro ati to, amu beroh nno bo ro moof afo re kbe ja Ait yhaf mnan kʼanu. Amu ksoh nno bo ro moof yoyo; mam tabam refo ye tna meen mam sawro rAit ye.
Bko hawe sai meen anu beta bmo bo
Tna Ait ytu srah wanu. Tna ymit safo kʼraa ro mno bo ro mkair mam tabam refo. Tna ysan bo moof kʼraa ro mno bo ro Ait ksoh, bo ro Ait yhaf mnan.
Amu mbewok nhar bo reto. Feto to amu waa

tna nkyas Ait yasom. Amu nwe kʼraa nwe, “Nashana oh!” Allah yhar amu nhaf mato. Tna jõ ksoh tawe anu nhar amu nhaf mato ye: Nhar nwe amu nma no kʼanu to, mkah nhaf wamu ro moof. Amu raa ro srau ewok fee.
taro miwana amu, mawe amu mbewok nwe besruf anu. Menohe mfe. Ana wase amu nhaf wamu.⌟ Ati ro

weto mnit raa to, ana ja mmat raa metsu mne sai. Ana mmat raa yasom rait, msya bobot rait bo to. Mmat bo weto sai, tna mawe ana mesait raa ro moof. Tibyo ana miwana amu mbewok. Amu nkom aam refo nkyas amu fefo afo re anu nhar amu kaket. Tna re anu nhar nwe kbe ne nkyas bawya kʼraa ro miwana amu. Amu ksoh nwe anu nhar amu kaket afo re anu nhar nwe amu nhaf wamu moof. Amu ja hawe bibi amu ai fefo. Menohe sik ma nri amu bibi amu wia. Amu nnaut nwe soh anu nhar amu kaket to, kbe anu nksoh amu tna nros tis kʼamu kaket ye.

Soh raa mamus amu, tna mawe amu nkit mkair to, mbau a. Bo ro ana mnaut mawe to, bo ro ati fee. Thar tawe bo ro ja amu mbewok nno weto to, bo ro Allah ybis yawe. Raa taro mawe amu nkit moof. Nnaut nwe bo ro amu ja nno to, nno afo re mafer moof kʼanu.
Amu nhar nwe
yatmof amu. Au oh mi amu ksoh nwe nno bo bawya ro Ait ybis. Amu nhar nwe Ait yajat tna mafer mawat kʼraa beta. Raa sait aran yajat menohe reto mnan mfi raa beta mhai oh ye meto.
yajat afo re mafer moof kʼraa beta. Yno afo re raa ro mhau mam tabam refo fares to,
kbe mno bo ro moof kʼana mesait aran u fee. Tna kbe mno bo ro ana mesait aran ksoh mno to fee ye. Yajat afo re ana mhau mno bo ro
yhaf mnan. Tii Ait yajat tna yrok yasen. Reto oh mi mno re kbe mafer msis kʼana weto.
Tiwya amu mbewok nwase

fares to, amu bonaut wamu mfi raa ro tabam sai. Tna ati reto, soh amu mbewok nnit raa to, amu nnit kaket fee: ⌞Ati reto amu nmat raa yasom rait tna msya bobot rait bo feto sai.⌟ Menohe mfo refo amu nhar nwe, ⌞rau ro ati to: Anu raa kbe bhau bno bo ro

ksoh.⌟ Feto to, mfo refo ati ro amu nnit raa to, ⌞amu nmat sas raa mhaf mato wana.⌟ Tiwya soh amu mbewok nnit raa to, ja nmat ait mkah amu nsu wanu sai. Tibyo amu nnit bo ro yetsu mne sai. Tii amu nnit
feto ye. ⌞Ati reto to, amu nnaut nwe Ait tait raa sei sai.⌟ Menohe mfo refo amu nnit Ait feto u fee. ⌞Mfo refo amu nhar nwe Ait tait
ro ybam Allah yama.⌟ Tna mfo refo soh amu nwe nnit raa to, ⌞amu nwe nhar ait yhaf mato rait.⌟
Raa ro tabam refo to, ja mhaf wana to mkair. Menohe awya ro kro
to, kbe yamo srau sau, yhaf sau su ysya Ait. Allah yno ait yhaf rait to, haberek. Raa retait yhaf ro tii tinyi mkair reto to, haberek mamo moof kaket. Feto to, awya ro kro
to, yfi bo Allah ye yfen yhaf, srau rait u. Ro tinyi to mamo firwas. Raa retait yhaf, srau rait masen mfi
yhaf, srau rAit ye. Bombra ro tii ro wia smut marak beta. Allah yno yhaf rait mrok tna sai.
Allah oh mi yno bo ro moof weto beta to. Yno anu be biranya bsya Ait. Ait ysan
Tna yitsre raa mame yajat afo re anu be biranya bsya Ait. Tna Ait ybis amu mbewok yawe amu nmo nkyas bo weto kʼraa.
Amu nkyas nwe,

yno iso ro tna. Tna Allah ytu raa beta yawe ana mamo mam iso reto re kbe me miranya msya Allah. Ait ysan Yesus tna raa mame Ait yajat. Yno feto tna safo ro raa mno to, meen ait ymit kʼana fee.” Ait ybis amu nmo nkyas bokyas reto kʼraa.
Tna re amu nmo raabis ro ja mkyas
yasom kʼraa. Reto mnan fi amu nsoh wamu nkyas bo ro Allah yawe kʼanu. Amu soh-soh anu nwe nnaut bo ro
yno reto to, tna nse mam nhaf mato wanu oh! Allah yawe anu ne niranya nsya bi Ait.
Nnaut nwe
tait Raa ro yno iro aro fee. Menohe Allah yatmof anu tibyo ybis
yama. Yama tna Allah yno
yasom iro wanu ro bno. Tii yama yno bo reto re kbe meen Allah ymit safo aro kʼanu fee. Allah ymat mees ro
tibyo yawe anu bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati.
Amu mbewok nkah armato ro Allah su nsya anu. Amu nkyas watum refo kʼanu nwe, “Anu fri boatmof rAit oh to. Tna boatmof reto to, nbo sibosom-bosam sai to ma!”
Tii mam aam ro
Yesaya to, Allah ykyas wore wo Ait ysan riof kʼraa. Yawe:
“Mam wore wo Jõ ksoh tawe tatmof anu to, Jõ tari bo ro anu skabuk. Mam ati ro Jõ ksoh tawe tno riof kʼanu to, Jõ tama tban anu.”
Yesaya 49:8
Tna amu mbewok nwe kʼanu nwe, “Nri oh: Allah siwyan oh yawe yatmof raa. Masno ro tii yawe ysan riof kʼraa to, mfo refo mama oh. ⌞Ait yno iso reto oh.”⌟

Amu mbewok nkah armato ro Allah rAit to, ja amu nno kaket. Amu nno bo ro moof sai, afo re raa mmat tna ksoh mawe smot Yesus ye. Mfi bo amu nno bo ro mkair to, kbe raa mkyas-kas amu. Tna ati ro amu nkyas Yesus yasom to, kbe raa hawe bo mari.

Amu mbewok fo raabis ro Allah. Nmat bo ro amu nno, afo re anu beta nhar nwe amu ksoh nno bo wAit sai. Bo bawya ro Ait yawe to, amu nri tna nno: Ti aro amu mbewok nsom bo ro samyoh. Ti aro bo ro mkair-kar mbtek mai kʼamu. Bo ro msai mama mai kʼamu, tna amu beroh nno bo ro Ait yawe.
Tii raa moo too mmok amu ye. Tna ti aro-aro to, raa mfot amu, mbu mam
mato. Raa hafrah bo ro amu nwe ye tna mno raa mafa. Amu ja nkah bo mawat, tna njin kaket fee. Tna boit ro niit mnan fee ye.

Bo weto mai kʼamu menohe amu ja nhau nhaf moof sai: Amu nhau nto mboh sai ye, tna amu mur-mur nri tna nhar bo ro Allah yawe. Tna amu nhau nno bo ro moof sai kʼraa. Tna mam wore kair mama mai kʼamu to, amu kanyin sai. Har ro
mjin mam amu nhaf wamu ye. Tna amu ja natmof raa ye, mkah srau ewok fee; mkah srau sau sai.

Amu mbewok ja nkyas watum ro Allah: Amu nkyas bo mabo yum oh. Tna Allah yatak rAit mhau kʼanu. ⌞Raa ro byoh mamus amu.⌟ Menohe amu fo nhau nhaf moof sai bamu. Amu nhau nno bo ro Allah yawe sai. Amu mbewok nhau nhaf moof sai bamu. Reto mnan fi 'sbe' ro Allah yse kmot wa amu. Tna reto mfi bo sbe ro bewas wa bokyas ro mkair-kar ja raa mkyas mai kʼamu. Amu nhau nhaf wamu moof to, reto mban wa raa ro mhoh byoh mama.

Ti aro to, raa miwana bo ro amu nwe. Ti aro raa maun amu mawe amu fo besruf raa sai. He mfe; amu ja nkyas bo abyõ sai, nkyas bo mabo yum oh. Fyi-fya sai raa mamus amu to, ⌞amu mbewok ja nri bo ro Allah yawe tna nno sosor.⌟ Raa taro mawe amu fo noof. Raa taro bibi amu.

Amu raa ro nsom marak. Raa taro wase amu. Menohe raa taro mnaut mawe amu raa ro nse. Rabu wawa raa kmo amu. Ana saim mawe kbe mame amu njat. Menohe mamo snok mfo refo amu mbewok nhai fefares. Bo ro samyoh weto sor mai kʼamu. Menohe amu nhau naam sai bamu fares mefo.
Bo mno amu sraujin ye, menohe ja amu simaut fares ye. Amu fo raa kinyah sai, ro nse bo kebet sai. Menohe

yoo bohar rAit ysan kʼamu mbewok. Bohar reto mnan fi bo satoh ro mabyoh maut. Amu ja nkyas watum ro Allah reto kʼraa mawat. Amu nsan bo satoh refo saim kʼraa mawat oh meto. Tibyo ana beta masen bobot. Amu nse bombra aro fee. Menohe amu fri bo ro moof mbam
Reto moof miwer toni sai.
Raa wamu ro nhau mam
ro Korintus; riwai amu mbewok nkyas bo abyõ sai. Amu nkyas feto afo re anu nhar amu nhaf srau wamu.
Amu noo nhaf wamu mbewok nee kʼanu oh. Menohe anu to noo nhaf wanu nee kʼamu fee.
Jõ tkyas bo refo kʼanu mfi fo anu beta ku wojõ ro jõ tatmof. Jõ ksoh tawe anu noo nhaf wanu nee kʼamu si ye.
Raa ro smot Yesus fee to, nno irat ranu nsya ana to matak ma. Raa ro ja mari bo ro
yawe, tna msya raa ro ja mno bo ro mkair-kar to, ewok weto to mnan anya fee. Raa ro mhau mam kek ro
to, mhaf wana sau su msya raa ro mhau mam wore wo mamur to fee.
yhaf rAit mnan anya msya Belial fee.
Yhaf rAit hayah sai. Feto ye raa ro smot
ja mhaf wana to mhau hayah msya raa ro smot Ait fee.
msya bo ro tabam ja raa skabuk to hayah. Tna Samu ro Allah reto hayah. Mfo refo anu beta fo haberek bmo samu ro Allah yhau oh meto. Allah tait Allah ro yaam.
Tiwya
Allah yawe,
“Meen Jõ thau su tsya raa woJõ. Jõ oh mi tesait thau tatam ana. Ana weto meen smot Jõ. Tna kbe ana mamo raa mana woJõ.”
Yehezkiel 37:27
Feto to Allah yawe,
“Tufrok mbam raa ro wase Jõ. Nhau su nsya ana weto ma. Nbo bo wana ro mkair aro ye to ma. Nno feto tna Jõ thaf reo to, titrah thaf tawe Jõ ksoh anu nma no kʼJõ.”
Yesaya 52:11
Allah tait Raa ro yase ybo bombra beta. Tna Ait yesait ykyas yawe,
“Nno feto tna kbe Jõ tfi anu Nja ranu ye. Tna kbe anu nfi ku sme woJõ msya ku ro ano woJõ ye oh meto.”
2 Samuel 7:14

Raa wamu, ro amu mbewok ksoh; tii Allah ysi bo weto kʼanu oh. Yawe Ait yfi anu Bja ranu. Feto to nisoh nhaf, srau wanu kaket. Bo knik-knak ro mno anu netsu wanu mkair to, beak fari. Bo ro mkair sor ro anu nno to, nitsre makus oh! Nisoh netsu wanu ye, nhaf wanu ye. Anu beta waa Allah. Feto to, nisoh nisoh anu re nhau nno bo wAit yoyo sai.
Noo nhaf wanu nee kʼamu mbewok. ⌞Raa taro mawe amu fo raabis ro

fee. Nri ana ma.⌟ Ana mamus amu, mawe amu nno bo ro mkair. Mawe amu saso pitis sai tibyo besruf raa sai mefo. Menohe mfe. Amu nhaf mato wamu moof toni sai, amu sikowah tna besruf raa fee. Amu ja sioh raa aro fee.
Tkyas bo refo besus kʼanu fee. Amu mbewok ksoh anu toni. Mam wore wo amu nhau mam tabam refo fares to, amu nnaut anu yoyo. Soh fyi-fya sai to, kbe amu njat su nsya anu ye tu oh.
Thar tawe anu ro nhau mam

ro Korintus to, kbe nhau nno bo ro moof sai. Tna jõ bibi anu. Tkyas bo reto kʼraa roto ye. Bo mkair mawat mama mai kʼamu mbewok mam befo fares. Menohe tari he anu ne nno bo ro moof tna jõ trok simaut mase toni.
Woyõ-woya sai amu mbewok nmo to, amu fri bo ro mkair. Ati ro amu twok mam
ro Makedonia to, kair mai kʼamu mbewok ye: Raa hafrah bo ro amu nkyas. Tna amu nnaut yyi tna waa ye.
Allah tait Raa ja yisoh raa ro mnaut yyi tna sraujin. Yno re ana mnaut yyi u fee, tna sraujin u fee. Ait yno feto kʼamu mbewok ye: Yno re Titus frok mam
ro Makedonia refo. Allah yno re amu nhaf wamu tnok oh meto.
Amu ne sraujin u fee. Amu simaut mase nmat Titus u. Ait ybam

ranu ro Korintus yama. Tna bo ro ait yama ykyas to, mno amu simaut mase toni: Yawe anu ksoh jõ tama to kʼanu u. Yawe anu sraujin. Yawe ⌞anu nri bo ro tii jõ tkyas kʼanu. Nri tna nashana. Tna mfo refo anu nhar nwe bo ro tii anu nno reto to, mkair toni.⌟ Jõ simaut mase toni tari he anu nfot bo ro tii tawe reto tna nno. Titus yawe anu ne nros tis kʼjõ. Bo reto mno Titus ye simaut u tna mno re jõ sraujin u fee ye.
Tii tkom aam tna bhah anu.

Tna anu nmat aam reto nrok sraujin. Reto mno re jõ sraujin ye. Menohe anu sraujin tibyo fee. Bo ro tawe kʼanu to, mafer rau to moof sai. Mfo refo anu sraujin u fee ye. Tna jõ aro bo sraujin anu u fee ye.
Jõ hawe bo tno re anu sraujin. Menohe bo mafer rau to, anu nwe nashana to. Bo ro tkom to, mno anu sraujin wia. Tna Allah yno re tis rau to, anu sraujin ranu reto misti bo ro mkair aro fee.

Ti aro raa sraujin bo ro mkair ana mno. Sraujin tibyo masahana tna mkai riof. Raa mrok takoh srau feto to moof. Allah yno tis rau to mafer moof: Raa mkai riof. Raa ro Allah wAit soh sraujin to, ja me mari bo ro Allah yawe. Tibyo mafer rau to, Allah yno ana mhaf, srau to me moof u. Menohe raa taro mrok takoh srau fee. Mamo mo kʼAllah ye fee. Tibyo ana sraujin kait mamo snok mhai si. Raa sraujin kait mfi feto to mkair. Raa ro tabam refo fo, ja ana sraujin feto.
⌞Tiwya raa wanu sait yno safo.

Tna anu nastako ait fee. Menohe anu sayõ rof safo reto. Anu noo safo mana nmit kʼait fee ye. Anu nesait nno bo mkair oh meto. Menohe tiwya jõ bhah anu tna anu nri bo ro tawe.⌟ Sraujin mfi feto to moof. Allah yno re mafer ro moof frok: Anu nashana bo ro mkair tii anu nno. Au oh mi anu nsen noo safo mana nmit kʼait oh. Reto moof. Mfo refo anu ksoh toni nno bo moof. Tna re raa mhar mawe
ranu reto me mno bo ro moof sai. Jõ tari bo beta ro anu nno weto to, tna thar tawe anu nri bo ro jõ tkom mam aam ro tii tkom tee kʼanu reto.

Tii tkom aam reto fyi? Tkom tawe bhah ait ro yisti safo reto fee. Tna tkom tkyas raa ro ait yno reto sai ye fee. Tii tkom aam reto afo re anu nesait nrok nhar nhaf wanu. Nhar nwe anu noo nhaf wanu nee kʼamu. Allah ksoh yawe anu nhaf sau su nsya amu mbewok.
Mfo refo amu nhar bo anu ne ksoh amu mbewok tna ne nri bo ro amu nwe. Tibyo amu mbewok ne sraujin u fee. Titus ymat anu mam
ro Korintus tna hah yama. Tna ait simaut ye. Tna amu ksoh toni nmat he ait simaut toni. Anu nno ait yhaf rait me simaut u.

Tii Titus yama yo kʼanu mam Korintus fefares to, Jõ tkyas anu kʼait. Tkyas bo ro moof. Tna ait yama yo kʼanu to, ymat yawe bo ro jõ tawe reto mabo oh meto. (Mnan anya msya bombra beta ro ja jõ tkyas kʼanu oh. Ja jõ tkyas bo ro mabo sai.) Tis rau bo ro tii tkyas kʼait to, yesait ymat yawe mabo. Tibyo jõ hrenaut fee.
Mam ati ro Titus yama yo kʼanu reto to, anu nitrah nhaf wanu tna nri bo ro ait ykyas. Ait ynaut yawe anu waa tna hartu ait. Tibyo ait ksoh anu toni ye.
Mfo refo thar tawe anu ksoh nno bo ro moof. Tibyo jõ simaut mase.
Raa wamu sor; amu mbewok nwe nkyas
sor ro mhau mam
ro Makedonia kʼanu. Allah yatmof ana. Yoo tak yee kʼana.
Tibyo ana me matmof raa anya. Mam wore wefo fo kair toni mai kʼana weto. Tna ana mse bo kebet sai. Menohe ana simaut mase fares. Tna ana matmof raa ro smot Yesus, ro mhau mam
ro Yerusalem mkah mhaf ase toni. Tibyo ana msan bo ro msai kʼraa weto.
Thar tawe raa ro Allah wAit mam
ro Makedonia weto to, mse pitis kebet sai. Menohe ana ksoh moo pitis kebet ro ana mse weto to, msan kʼraa kinyah ro Allah wAit mam
ro Yerusalem. Ana ro mhau mam Makedonia weto mnaut ana mesait ai sai fee.
Ana mhar mawe

roto taro ye mawe kbe moo pitis mee kʼraa kinyah weto. Tna ana mawe kʼamu mbewok mawe, “Amu ro nhau mam Makedonia fo, nesait ksoh toni nno bo reto ye.” Raa aro bo mbis ana mawe msan pitis wana ye fee. Ana mhaf mbyõ sai.
Raa ro mhau mam Makedonia weto to, moo mhaf wana mee kʼAllah wia matim. Tna mari bo ro Allah yawe. Tibyo ana moo mhaf wana mee kʼamu ye. Ana mno bo moof reto miwer bo ro tii jõ tnaut tawe ana mno.
ro wia raa ro mhau mam Makedonia weto mno bo reto. Tna tii Titus yama ykyas raa ro Yerusalem weto kʼanu ro nhau mam

ro Korintus ye. Yawe ana mhau bo marak sai. Ati reto to, anu nwe natmof ana. Ati reto to, anu nwe nsan pitis kʼana. He mfe. Anu bitsre bo ro anu nwe nno reto. Anu nno fefares! Feto to, mfo refo amu nbis Titus nwe ait hah yama yo kʼanu mam

ro Korintus u. Amu nbis ait yama yawe kʼanu ye yisobu anu yawe, “Pitis ro anu tii nwe nsan kʼraa ro kinyah to, anu nsan fefares! Anu natmof raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem fe mfe a! Nsan pitis wanu mnan si tiwya anu nwe feto oh!”
Anu raa
ro Korintus to, ja nno bombra sor kaket: Bosmot ranu ja matak. Anu nkyas maja ro

kʼraa moof toni ye. Anu nkit maan tna nhar bo ye. Anu ja ksoh nno bo ro moof. Tna anu nhafri amu ye. Bombra wanu beta weto to mninon oh. Feto to, jõ tisobu anu tawe, “Natmof raa ro mhau mam Yerusalem oh! Nno mkah nhaf ase ranu ye.”

taro msan pitis kʼraa ro kinyah. ⌞Tii Titus yama yo kʼanu mam Korintus. Tna anu nwe anu natmof raa ro kinyah ye. Nwe anu ksoh nsan bo kʼraa kinyah ro mhau mam Yerusalem.⌟ Tna jõ tkom aam kʼanu tawe sanet boatmof wanu. Tawe tbis bo kʼanu fee. Tkyas afo re raa mhar boatmof ranu reto ye. Anu ja natmof raa anya kaket ye fe mfe a?
Nnaut nwe
ranu Yesus

yatmof anu beta toni ye. Tiwya bo wAit ro yse to mninon oh. Menohe Ait yatmof anu. Tibyo Ait yitsre bo yase rAit msya bosatoh wAit beta tna yroh yama tabam refo. Yama yhau mam tabam refo ynan raa ro suawe sai. Yno bo reto afo re anu nsen bobot sor ye meto. Feto tibyo tawe ne natmof raa kinyah makin sor to, mkah nhaf ase nfi Ait feto ye oh!
ro wia anu nwe anu ksoh nsan pitis kʼraa kinyah wanu ro mhau mam
ro Yerusalem. Anu fo
masmair ro nwe nno bo reto. Ati weto to,
roto aro moo pitis mee kʼraa ro Yerusalem weto fefares.
ro wia, anu aro noo pitis wanu baro berur su oh. Tna fo anu bitsre bo moof ro tii anu nwe nno reto. Anu nno mkak fefares. Jõ tnaut tawe ro moof to, ne makrau pitis wanu u.
Mfo refo noo pitis wanu berur su to, nno mkak oh! Tii anu hre nkyas su oh, nwe anu ksoh natmof raa ro mhau mam
ro Yerusalem. Bo ro tii ksoh nno to, nno mamo snok mkak oh! Nno mkah simaut ranu tii ro wia reto yum oh. Awya ro yatem miyõ, kbe ysan pitis mawat. Tna awya ro yatem mabuf, kbe ysan kebet sai.
Soh raa ksoh moo bo wana msan kʼraa mamyot si bo ro ana mse to, kbe Allah yhaf mnan. Mfi bo ana mse pitis kebet sai, tibyo msan pitis kebet sai to; kbe Allah yhaf mnan raa weto ye.
Tkyas bo refo kʼanu to, tawe tse bo samyoh kʼanu nsom to fee. Jõ hawe bo anu nfi raa ro kinyah afo re ana weto mse pitis mawat. Tawe feto fee! Jõ ksoh anu mkbair ewok nse bo mnan anya sai.
Mfo refo anu fo nhau to bo mninon. Tna ana mhau bo marak. Meen soh anu nhau bo marak to, kbe ana me matmof anu feto ye. Ro moof to anu nsya ana nhau to nse bo mnan anya sai.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas bo reto. ⌞Mkyas ati ro raa wAit tufrok tabam ro Mesir. Tna boit ro ana mait to marak.⌟ Mawe:
“Raa sait yanyah boit ⌞
⌟ mawat. Tna bo ro kbe yait to mnan si. Yait mkak tna aro mhau fee. Tna raa sait roto yanyah bo kebet sai. Menohe kbe bo ro ait retait yait to mnan si ye feto.”
Keluaran 16:18
Amu mbewok nyoh asik mase kʼAllah. Ait yno re Titus yhaf rait mnan anya msya jõ thaf ajõ: Ait ksoh yawe yros tis yban anu ro nhau mam
ro Korintus ye.
Amu nkyas kʼait nwe amu ksoh ait hah yama yo kʼanu u. Tna ait yawe ait yesait ksoh toni yawe yno bo reto.
Kbe Titus yesait yama fee.
sait kbe kro Titus yama.
retait, raa ro
magin mhar ait oh, tna mawe ait fi raa ro yoof. Ja ykyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus kʼraa kaket.
(Tii
sor msok

retait tna mbis ait mawe meen yamo su ysya amu mbewok nmoʼt Yerusalem ye. Mfo refo ait kro Titus yama. Meen ait kro jõ tsya Timotius ye, nmoʼt Yerusalem. Ati reto to, amu nbo tuuf kbe nmo su noo pitis ro anu siwyan reto, nkah nmo nee kʼraa
mam Yerusalem reto. Kbe raa mmat bo ro amu nno refo tna bibi
Tna kbe raa mhar mawe amu nesait ksoh natmof ana mam Yerusalem ye.
Amu hawe bo raa mkyas mawe amu noo pitis reto tna nmo nno-na bo. Feto to, amu nwe amu nbo tuuf kbe nmo su nsan pitis mase reto.
Bo ro amu nno to, amu nno abyõ sai. Bosan reto amu nisoh nbo kaket. Amu ksoh
ymat sas bo ro amu nno refo, tna yawe amu nno bo refo kaket. Tna kbe raa mmat bo ro amu nno refo ye, tna mawe amu nbo bo refo kaket ye.)
Tna amu mbewok nbis nfoh ramu sait naut kbe yama ysya ana mbewok mo kʼanu mam

ro Korintus ye. Ait retait tait amu sanet oh: Ti ro wia sor to, ait yno bo ro amu nwe to, ja ksoh yno beta kaket sai. Tna mfo refo ait ksoh toni yawe yama yo kʼanu. Ait yhar yawe anu ksoh nno bo ro moof.
Nnaut nwe Titus tait ja ykah bo su ysya jõ. Tna amu nfoh mabo ewok reto, raa ro
sor taro msok ana mbewok. Msok ana mbewok tna mbis ana mama su kro Titus ye. Raa mmat bo moof ro ja ana mbewok mno tna bibi
Natmof raa weto. Tna
taro sor kbe mmat bo moof ro anu nno reto. Mmat tna mhar mawe bo tii tkyas kʼana to, bo mabo. Mhar mawe anu ja nno bo ro moof.
Jõ tkyas pitis ro anu nwe nsan kʼraa ro Allah wAit mam Yerusalem. Menohe tkyas u fyi?
Thar tawe anu ksoh toni noo pitis reto nee kʼana. Tna tkyas anu kʼraa ro Allah wAit mam
ro Makedonia oh. Tawe kʼana tawe, “Raa ro mhau mam
ro Korintus msya raa taro ro mhau mam
ro Akhaya weto to, ana ksoh moo pitis mee kʼraa ro pitis marak.
ro wia ana ksoh berur pitis wana oh.” Ana mari bo reto tna mawat mawe ana ksoh berur pitis wana msan kʼraa ro Yerusalem weto ye.
Jõ tbis Titus ysya amu nfoh mabo ewok weto mama mo kʼanu. Ana mama re kbe mmat soh raa

ranu siwyan pitis reto wea oh fe mfefares a. Ja amu bibi anu; nwe kʼraa ro Makedonia nwe anu ksoh nno bo ro moof refo. Meen soh ana baro msya jõ nma no kʼanu to, kbe ana mmat mawe bosan reto anu siwyan oh. Mnan fi bo jõ tawe kʼana wia oh.
Pitis tii anu nwe ksoh nsan reto to, soh amu nma tna ana mmat he anu siwyan pitis reto fefares to, kbe amu hrenaut ye tna anu hrenaut ye.
Reto oh mi jõ tbis ana mabo tuuf weto matim wia mama mo kʼanu. Kbe ana mama mros tis mban

ranu. Mban anu siwyan bo ro nsan reto wea. (Jõ bibi anu, anu nwe noo pitis mawat nee kʼraa ro Yerusalem weto to, tawe anu raa ro nhaf moof toni.) Pitis ro anu nwe ksoh nsan to, soh anu siwyan pitis reto wea oh to, reto moof. Tna fo jõ tama mam tis. Soh feto to, kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe anu nesait ksoh nno bo ro moof reto. Tna mhar mawe raa tko anu re nsan bo reto fee.
Nnaut oh; raa mawe,
“Awya ro furere ⌞sfo⌟ makan kebet sai to, meen yatu kebet sai. Tna awya ro yoo furere mase to, meen yatu mase ye.”

Ro moof to, anu beta nnaut pitis mabyoh jya ro kbe nsan. Nnaut mnan mam nhaf mato wanu aro sait-sait wia matim. Tna nesait nhar nwe kbe noo pitis mabyoh jya nee. Tna fo noo nee. Nno be raa tko anu nsan bo wanu. Tna anu ro hawe bo nsan pitis kʼraa to, kbe nsan ma. Nno be anu nsan pitis mkah nhaf ro mkair meto. Allah ksoh yawe raa msan bo mkah mhaf ro simaut mase.

Tna Ait yatak re kbe yoo bouum mninon yee kʼanu. Ait yatak yno re anu nse bombra beta mnan, aro mabut fee. Ja yoo bo mninon yee kʼanu yoyo afo re anu natmof raa anya ye. Afo re anu nno bo moof aro rau-rau kʼraa ye.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Ait ja yoo bombra saim kʼraa. Ait yoo bo yee kʼraa ro mse bo aro fee. Yhaf rAit moof yum mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Mazmur 112:9

Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo ⌞sfo⌟ manaf yee kʼraa furere to. Yno ⌞sfo⌟ manaf reto mo miyõ tna manes. Tna Allah yoo boit yee afo re raa mait ye. Ait yno re anu nse bo mnan. Yno bo wanu ro nkah to, mafer mninon ye. Tna yno re kbe anu nmo raa ro mhaf moof ati miwer bo ro ti ro wia ye.

Ait kbe yoo bobot aro rau-rau yee kʼanu. Yno bo reto afo kbe anu noo bo nee kʼraa mkah nhaf wanu ro mbyõ sosor. Amu nbo tuuf kbe nkah bosan ro anu nsan reto nmo nee kʼana mam tno. Tna tis rau to, ana weto kbe me mayoh asik mase kʼAllah.
Anu nsan pitis kʼraa ro mse bo aro fee weto. Reto kbe mno bo ro moof trion ewok: Kbe raa ro Allah wAit weto mse bo mnan ye. Tna mno re kbe raa simaut mase mayoh asik mase kʼAllah ye.
Anu nsan pitis mawat kʼana ro mhau mam Yerusalem. Bosan sor ro anu nsan weto mno raa bibi bo yase ro Allah rAit. Tna kbe raa mhar mawe ja anu nri Bokyas Moof ro Yesus tna nbo nno ye.
Raa ro smot Yesus mam Yerusalem weto to, mhar mawe Allah yatmof anu toni. Tna boatmof rAit oh mi mno re anu nno bo moof kʼana si. Feto to, ana mhafri anu tna skabuk anu kʼAllah ye.
Allah ysan bo ro moof miwer toni kʼanu ye.
Nma, anu byoh asik mase kʼAit.
Jõ fi Paulus, ⌞raabis ro
⌟ Anu nhar nwe
tait Raa ro ja yhaf sneh. Tna jõ soh-soh anu mam
yasom rAit, tawe ⌞nri bo ro jõ tawe kʼanu.⌟ Tiwya, ati ro jõ tama to kʼanu to, ja tkyas bo mkah thaf sneh ye. Menohe ati ro jõ thau fari tna tkom aam ro tee kʼanu to, jõ tkyas bo ro matak toni.
Raa ro
ranu mam

ro Korintus to, taro mamus jõ. Tawe soh ana mari bo ro jõ tawe fee, kbe jõ bhah ana tu oh! Jõ hawe bo tkyas bo tbait ktan-ktan. Menohe ana weto maun amu mbewok mawe amu nhaf ranu mkair, mnan fi raa ro wase Allah. Ana maun mawe amu raa ro saso bo ro tabam refo sai. Meen jõ tama to kʼanu to, tna soh jõ tari bo ana mkyas bo reto fares to, kbe jõ bhah ana tu oh!
Ae; amu mbewok nhau mam tabam refo fares. Menohe amu ⌞nmak, soh mfe⌟ nme anya nsya raa mfi raa ro tabam refo ja mno to fee.
Amu ja safo nsom sbe mfi raa ro tabam refo ja mno to fee. Mkah Allah yatak rAit oh mi amu ntai beswan bo ro mbam kabes. Mkah Allah yatak rAit amu nmo simoyot snek ro kabes sor to brir-brar marak.

Raa taro miwana Allah tna safuk mawe ana u kar. Tna raa taro mkyas Allah to, menohe mkyas maja ro sre. Bo ro ana mkyas reto to, bo mabo fee. Bokyas rana ro sre reto oh mi mno wa re kbe raa mhar Allah kaket fee. Raa ro beswan Allah weto to, Ait yoo tak yee kʼamu afo re amu ntak nikyak bonaut wana ro sre weto makus sai. ⌞Amu nno mkah tak ro Allah,⌟ tibyo kbe ana ksoh mari bo ro
yawe. Kbe ana ksoh mhar Allah kaket tna msya mhar maja rAit ro ati reto.
Tawe beroh nri bo ro
yawe kaket! Nri tna nbo nno oh! Tna meen kbe amu mbewok nhar awya ro ja yari bo ro
yawe, tna nhar awya ro yari Ait fee. Meen amu nma to, kbe amu nsen bhah awya ro hawe yari bo ro
yawe. Tna kbe amu nmit safo mana kʼait retait.
Awya raa ro
rAit? Soh anu nmat sas raa to, nmat bo ro mne sai ma! Soh anu nnaut nwe anu fo raa wAit to, nnaut nwe jõ fi raa rAit sait feto ye. ⌞Raa taro santri mawe, “Paulus tait raabis ro
fee.” Ana mawe ana mesait oh mi raabis ro
Menohe ana weto mmat sas raa tna mnit ana kaket fee. Ana ja mmat bo ro raa mno tna mmat ratan ro myum msya raa masom wana, tna msya bombra ro raa mse bo to sai. Ana mmat raa mhaf mato wana fee.⌟
Riwai jõ tesait tkyas tak ro
yoo yee kʼamu mbewok. Tkyas amu feto jõ bibi amu ai. Menohe jõ hrenaut fee.
ybis amu nma afo re nti bonaut kʼanu. Ybis amu nma nros tis anu. Amu hawe nma nmit safo mana mai kʼanu.
Jõ tkom bo tna bhah anu mkah aam to fyi? Aam ro tii tkom tee kʼanu to, msya aam ro tkom refo ye to, tkom tee afo re anu waa jõ to fee.

Raa taro mamus jõ mawe, “Ati ro Paulus ykom aam yee kʼamu to, ait ykyas bo ro ktan-ktan toni kʼamu. Ait bhah amu toni afo re amu waa ait. Menohe ati ro yama yo kʼamu, tna yros ykyas su ysya amu to, reto hayah: Yama ykyas bo ysya amu to, aro mfi feto fee ye! Amu nmat he ait raa ro yatak fee. Raa ro mase ja mhar mkyas bo mmai moof kaket, menohe Paulus yhar feto fee! ⌞Tibyo ja amu nri bo ro ait yawe fee ye.⌟”
Meen ati ro jõ thah tama to kʼanu u to, tama hafrah raa ro mamus jõ. Kbe tkyas bo rere kʼana weto u fee. Kbe tama thaf sneh to fee. Tama hafrah ana weto mkah tak ro
Bo ro ja jõ tkom tee kʼanu mam aam sai, kbe tkyas abyõ. Tna kbe ana weto mhar mawe jõ fi raa ro sne-sna sai fee.

ro mhau msya anu baro safuk mawe, ⌞“Amu oh mi raa ro nse, raa ro Allah ybis.”⌟ Ana mawe ana mase abyõ miwer awya? Ana mnit ana mase rana reto, mmit msya ana mesait aran sai. Mno feto to ana wase bo sai. ⌞Ana weto safuk tna mkyas bo miwer bo ro ana mesait mno. Ana mkyas bo miwer.⌟ Amu aro ja nno mfi feto fee.

Amu mbewok nkah bo mam wore wo Allah ybis kʼamu sai aran. Amu maum mamo snok mam wore weto sai. Amu nmo fari nmo niwer to fee. Ait ybis amu nma no kʼanu tna nkyas bokyas rAit. Amu safuk ⌞nwe amu nisoh bosmot wanu kaket. Bosmot wanu taro mo matak oh.⌟ Raa ro mhau mam remo roto taro to, Allah ybis re
roto taro mkyas bokyas rAit kʼana. Allah ybis amu mbewok nmo no kʼana weto fee. Tibyo amu oh mi safuk nwe amu nse nbo
weto to fee.
Tiwya amu mbewok nma no kʼanu mam
ro Korintus, tna nkyas Bokyas Moof ro
reto. Amu raa ro tinyi ntim wia nma fari snok mam
ranu. Feto to amu safuk anu to, saah. Reto miwer bo ro Allah ybis kʼamu mbewok nmo nno to fee. Tna ati reto to, amu nmo nkyas watum ro
mam remo ro miwrek
ro Korintus majoh ro tino fefares.
Allah ybis raa roto taro mamo mkyas ⌞Yesus yasom⌟ kʼraa ro mhau mam remo roto taro.
mam remo weto to, mnan fi armato ro
roto mkah. Allah ybis amu mbewok nmo nkah bo mam remo weto fee. Tna amu safuk nwe amu nisoh bosmot raa weto fee ye.
ranu mam
ro Korintus reto oh mi mnan mfi armato ro
ybis yawe amu nkah. Feto to amu safuk nwe, “Raa ro mhau mam
ro Korintus to, mfo refo ana smot

ye.” Amu safuk nkyas feto to, bo ro mkair meto fee. Amu ksoh ⌞anu nri bo ro amu nwe. Soh anu nri bo kʼamu to, amu ninaut nwe kbe⌟ bosmot ranu mo matak. Tna kbe amu ne nti bonaut ro mase naut u kʼanu ye. Tibyo bosmot wanu mo matak.
Tna fo meen amu mbewok nmo nkyas Bokyas ro Moof mam rabin roto taro. Mam rabin weto to raa aro mkyas Bokyas Moof reto fefares. Amu hawe bo nmo nkah bo mam yuk ro raa mkyas Yesus yasom oh. Allah ybis
roto taro mamoʼt wore weto oh. Tna kbe ana safuk armato ro ana mesait mkah weto saah. Amu safuk nkyas armato ro amu nesait nkah sai.
Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Soh raa safuk to, rau ro moof to, kbe ana mawe, ‘Nmat bo moof ro
yno refo!’”
Yeremia 9:24
Ati ro raa mesait bibi ana ai to, bo ro ana mawe weto to bo ati fee. Bo ro ana mkyas mawe reto to, kbe mno
bibi ana fee. Rau ro ati to,
oh mi ynaut yawe anu aro bno bo ro moof to!
yhaf mnan raa weto.
Taja, tme, tao tano na; sik nri bo ro jõ tawe refo: Kbe tkyas bo tfi raa ro wase bo hrenaut wia. ⌞Kbe jõ bibi jõ tesait ai.⌟ Thar tawe ja anu nri bo ro tawe.
Jõ thafri anu, mnan fi Allah yesait yhafri anu. ⌞Jõ takah tayun anu rere tibyo anu nmo kro

Tna jõ tros wa kmot anu afo re anu smot Ait kaket.⌟ Nmo su nsya Ait kaket. Re kbe raa aro mno anu fee. Jõ tnan fi raa sait ro ytos ku rait ro ano. Tna tbis raa sait, tawe yoo ku au. Tna jõ kmot ku au kaket re kbe meen ati ro ait yama ymen au to, au mhau mato mboh fares.
Menohe raa taro mama besruf anu. Jõ waa be kbe anu nri bo ro ana mawe tna anu nmo kro ana. (Mno mfi tiwya tinyi aban ro srau wer reto besruf Hawa mam armato ro Eden.) Nri ana ma. Anu nmo su nsya
oh. Nros ntrot nsya Ait. Smot Ait yesait aran. Srau ewok ma.

Tii amu mbewok nma nkyas Yesus yasom kʼanu to, amu nkyas kaket. Tna fo raa taro mama mawe ana raabis ro Allah. He mfe. Bo ro ana mkyas to, mnan anya msya bo ro amu nkyas to fee. Hre nifra sneh nri bo ro ana mkyas reto to ma! Ana mkyas Yesus ye, menohe ana mkyas bo miwer. Bo ro ana mkyas aro mnan si msya bo ro Yesus tii ykyas fee. Har ro tii mama mjin mam anu nhaf mato wanu to Har ro ati. Menohe ana weto mkyas har roto aro. Tii anu nri Bokyas Moof ro amu nkyas kʼanu. Iso reto to, iso sau mesait aran ro raa mamo tna kbe mkai riof. Menohe
weto merif iso roto, iso ro sre. Ana sioh mawe raa kbe mkai riof mam iso ro ana merif reto.
⌞Raa weto sioh mawe ana to raabis
ro mbam Allah mama. He mfe. Ait ro ybis ana mama fee. Tna ana mawe⌟ ana raa ro mase toni. Menohe ana mase miwer jõ fee. Jõ fi raa ro Allah ybis yawe tkyas Bokyas ro Moof reto kʼanu.
Jõ tkyas bo to, ja tasoh mnan-nan fee sai. Menohe takit maan tna thar bo ro Allah miwer ana. Nnaut wore wo tii jõ betoo maja ro Allah kʼanu: Anu nhar nwe bo ro tii tawe to, bo weto beta to, bo mabo.
weto to mhar bo mkyas mayoh mno raa mhaf. Menohe ana mhar maja ro Allah kaket fee.
Ati ro jõ tama tkyas Bokyas Moof kʼanu to, tawe kbe anu noo boren nren jõ fee. ⌞
sor ja maren boren kʼraabis ro mama mkyas watum ro
kʼana.⌟ Menohe jõ tawe anu kbe noo pitis aro nren jõ fee. Anu nnaut nwe jõ tno bo ro mkair meto? Tawe tno feto afo re anu nhar nwe jõ ja hartu anu. ⌞Watum ro
jõ tkyas kʼanu mno anu nsen bobot tna⌟ jõ tfi sryan ranu sai. ⌞Nno be anu aro nnaut nwe bokyas ajõ ja mafer marak, tna reto oh mi tawe kʼanu tawe anu nren boren kʼjõ fee: Nnaut bo reto ma!⌟
Tii jõ tama thau tsya anu to, tna
roto oh mi maren boren kʼjõ. Anu raa ro Korintus to noo boren nren jõ fee. Reto mfi bo jõ ttak bo wana weto, afo re tama tno bo moof kʼanu.
Tii thau tsya anu to, boit msya bo ro tse aro mabut. Tna raa ro smot
mbam
ro Makedonia mama. Ana oh mi moo pitis, bo to mee kʼjõ. Tibyo bo ro tse to mnan. Jõ hawe bo tno anu aro nsui. Tibyo tii tayoh pitis kʼanu ro Korintus fee. Tna meen tayoh bo aro kʼanu fee ye.
Jõ safuk tawe jõ tkyas watum ro
kʼanu menohe ja tayoh pitis kʼanu fee. Wore wo jõ tamo mam
ranu ro Akhaya to, kbe tno feto ye: Kbe tawe kʼraa tawe, “Noo boren nren jõ ma.” Jõ smot
tibyo anu nhar nwe bo ro jõ tawe refo to bo mabo tu oh.
Jõ tatmof anu. Menohe jõ hawe bo too pitis ro anu nwe nee kʼjõ. Allah yhar yawe jõ tatmof anu.
ro mkair taro weto bibi ana mesait ai mawe ana weto ja mno bo mnan anya mfi bo ro amu mbewok ja nno. He mfe. Jõ tkah bo ro
to, ja jõ tayoh pitis kʼanu fee. Tna meen tama tkyas watum ro
kʼanu to, kbe tayoh bo aro kʼanu fee ye. Tno feto to tno wa
weto. Tno afo re anu nhar nwe
weto to hayah. Ana mnan anya mfi amu fo fee.
ro bibi ana mesait ai weto to, mawe ana raabis
ro
ye. Menohe mfe: Ana weto to raa ro mamo wan-wan sai. Ana mawe ana mkah bo mam armato ro
he mfe. Ana besruf anu.
Nrok tna ktak ma! Kabes yabi (Iblis) tait ja yamo wan-wan ye. Ait besruf raa tibyo raa taro mnaut mawe ait ynan fi
ro moof sau. Yamo wan-wan haberek yfi
ro moof.

Feto to nrok tna ktak ma! Nnaut nwe soh kabes yabi ja besruf raa to, kbe raa ro mari ait ja mno feto ye fea! Ana mamo wan-wan ye. Kaket anu! Bokyas rana siroyõ-raya. Tis rau to, kbe Allah ymit bo kʼraa ro ja mno bo feto fea!

Riwai jõ tawe, “Nnaut nwe jõ fi raa ro wase bo hrenaut to ma!” Nnaut nwe jõ hawe bo bibi jõ ai. Tako hawe sai mfo refo tkyas bo baro ro tiwya jõ tno. Sik hre sai nifra sneh nri bo ro tawe refo. ⌞Tkyas bo wefo afo re anu nhar nwe jõ fi raabis ro
tu oh.⌟
Ja
hawe bo raa mesait bibi ana ai. Menohe mfo refo tkyas bo feto tfi raa ro wase bo sai.

Raa mawat bibi ana mesait ai. Ana safuk mawe ana raa ro mase mam tabam refo. Feto kbe jõ tfi ana weto tna tkyas bo baro mfi ana weto wia ye. ⌞Menohe jõ tnaut tawe bo ro ana safuk mawe mkyas reto to, bo ro ati fee.⌟
Anu nnaut nwe anu raa ro nhar bo. Tna re anu ja sayõ rof raa ro wase bo mkyas bo.
Tmat bo anu sayõ rof raa awya sai ro yhau ysya anu. Anu hre nri bo ro

aro sor beta mawe. Anu ja nri bo kʼana ro moof tna nri bo kʼana ro mno bo mkair ye. Kaket anu! Ana taro mbis-bas anu weto nfi sryan boh wana sai. Tna ana mayoh bo mawat kʼanu. Ana besruf anu. Ana mawe ana raa ro mase miwer anu. Ana mamus anu ye. Reto mnan fi ana mai-a anu mkah bokyas rana.
Menohe amu mbewok ja nno bo feto kʼanu fee. ⌞Amu ja nhaf sneh. Feto to raa taro mkyas mawe amu fo raabis ro Allah fee.⌟
weto ja mesait mkyas mase rana. Feto to, tako hawe sai, mfo refo jõ tesait tkyas bo wojõ baro feto ye. Tkyas re kbe anu nri bo kʼjõ ye. (Ja raa ro wase bo hrenaut mesait aran bibi ana mesait sai.)

Ana weto tawyõ mawe ana raa ro Ibrani. (Au oh mi raa mana ro tiwya Allah ysok.): Jõ fi raa ro Ibrani ye. Ana weto mawe ana ku renti ro bi Abraham. (Ait oh mi raa ro tii Allah ysok.): Tna jõ fi ku renti ro bi Abraham ye. Ana weto mawe ana raa ro Israel: Feto tna jõ fi raa ro Israel ye.
Ana mawe ana mamo sryan ro
Tna jõ tamo sryan rAit ye. Menohe jõ tno bo ro bi Ait ybis yawe to, tno moof miwer. (Tako hawe sai, jõ bibi jõ ai fefo, tfi raa ro mamboi!) Jõ tno bo ro
ybis to, au oh mi bo mkair mawat mai kʼjõ: Jõ tkah bo rAit to, samyoh toni. Ana weto to mno bo rAit kaket fee. Tkyas
yasom oh mi tii raa mfot jõ tna mbu mam
mato mun aro firwas-firwas to. Ana weto to, raa mfot mbu mam
mato fee. Ti aro to, raa hawe bo jõ tkyas
yasom. Tibyo ana mfot jõ tna mmok-mak jõ. Menohe
weto to, raa mfot tna mmok-mak to fee. Tna ti aro firwas-firwas to, raa sikowah jõ ye maami jõ thai. Menohe thau fares. Ana weto to, aro mnan jõ feto fee.
Tna muhrin maat raa ro Yahudi mfot jõ tna moo too mmok-mak jõ. Ti wore weto to, ana mok-mak jõ muhrin mawat (39).
Tna raa mfot jõ muhrin tuuf to, mfot jõ tna mai-a jõ mkah armuk wana. Mai-a jõ mfi ja ana mai raa ro yber safo sait. Tna ti sau to, raa moo fraa mai jõ ye. Tna jõ taut mam
thoh mam sawan to, tna muhrin tuuf
ro masyõ jõ weto fri bo ro mkair. Tna
sau reto hoh. Tibyo ti sau, ayõ sau jõ soso sai abyõ mam aya mata. Menohe tkai riof sai.
Ja jõ tamoʼt rabin ro fari so oh. Tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus

. Wore weto to, jõ tkai bo msai roto aro ye: Jõ tamo mam iso tna frit aya tamoʼt ati jaro tna kene wo tsu. Ti aro raa ro msyõf bo mfot jõ mtak bo wojõ. Ti aro to, raa wojõ mbam raa mana ro Yahudi to, kmo jõ. Tna ti aro raa ro mbam raa mana roto to, kmo jõ ye. Bo ro msai mai kʼjõ mam wore jõ thau mam

ye. Tna bo ro msai mai kʼjõ mam wore wo tamo mam yuk ro riamo ye. Bo msai mai kʼjõ mam wore wo jõ taut wiak thoh mam aya sawan ye. Tna ti aro raa mamo wan-wan tna mawe ana raa ro kro Yesus ye. Tna mawe ana mafoh wojõ. He mfe. Tis rau to ana besruf jõ, mno bo ro mkair mai kʼjõ.

Jõ tkah bo wojõ ye tna timyoh mbtek. Jõ hrowyõ thai ye. Ti aro tkah bo wojõ ti ro miyõ mamo snok mam reen, tna tjin fee ye. Ti aro jõ thai awyah ye, thai sbit ye. Ti aro amah ro tjin to marak. Tna ratan ro tyum to mabut-abat ye, tibyo tfos toni.
Bo ro msai weto beta mai kʼjõ oh. Tna jõ thafri anu mam
beta ye. Tibyo jõ tnaut yyi tawe skabuk anu beta yoyo. Reto mnan fi jõ tasom bo ro samyoh toni yoyo.
Soh anu aro kiyam, netsu ssafo fee to, reto mno jõ tfi bo tesait kiyam ye tsya anu. Tna soh raa mno re anu aro mbtek mam iro to, reto mno jõ sraujin su tsya anu ye.
Jõ tkyas bo weto beta afo re anu nri bo kʼjõ kaket ye. Tna nri bo ro
weto mkyas ma. Jõ hawe bo tesait bibi jõ ai. Feto to, jõ safuk tkyas bo roto taro kʼraa. Tkyas bo ro ja mai jõ sai. Kbe anu nri bo wefo tna nhar nwe jõ tesait tatak fee.
Allah yhar yawe bo ro jõ tkyas refo to, bo mabo. Jõ sioh fee. (Allah tait
Yesus Yaja. Rau ro moof to, kbe raa bibi Ait mamo snok mam hame wajin.)
Tna tkyas kʼanu tii wore wo tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof reto
mam
ro Damsyik: Ati reto
Aretas ybo tabam reto. Tkyas Bokyas Moof reto mno raa kmo jõ. Tibyo tsam snok tamo tbam
reto wai. Tawe tsam tamo wai menohe aban mana ro ybo
reto ybis raa wait kmot iso wa. Ana hre mwan
reto makit rau. ⌞Remo reto raa mtan mur mkah
ro matak toni.⌟ Tna raa kmot iso beta wa. Raa ste wa mam
kitana re huwya mfot jõ. Tibyo jõ frok tamo fyi?
⌞Tamoʼt samu sau ro mhau mam
makit rau. Tna mti to, tafoh wojõ moo
maboh sau. Moo tna mbis jõ hre mam
reto mato rau.⌟ Tna moo
reto, mruk jõ wai mam hroh ro
reto sau. Feto tibyo jõ frok mbam
reto tna aban mana ro
reto to, yfot jõ fee.
Soh raa mesait bibi ana ai to, mafer aro fee. Ja tno feto fee; menohe tako hawe sai, tkyas bo wefo kʼanu renti ⌞afo re anu nhar nwe jõ fi raabis ro Allah tu oh.⌟ Mfo refo jõ tkyas ati ro
ybo jõ. Ybo tna yno re tari bo ro msai, tna yerif bo kʼjõ ye. Yerif bo ro Ait ja ymyõt.
Jõ thar raa ro kro
sait.

14 ro wia to, ait yaut yamoʼt sawro ro Allah. Allah yakah ait yamoʼt sawro rAit ro mhau abyõ mam u reto. (Sawro rAit ro tuuf reto. Allah ybo yetsu rait yaut yamo, soh mfe yakah yamos rait sai yaut to, jõ wase ye. Reto to Allah yesait aran yhar bait.)
Thar tawe raa retait Allah yakah yaut yamoʼt sawro ro moof reto. (Allah yakah ait yetsu rait yaut yamo, soh mfe yakah yamos rait sai yamo to, jõ wase ye. Allah yesait aran yhar sai bait.)
Yaut yamoʼt sawro tna yari bo ro msai. Yari bo ro ja raa mhar fee. Bo weto to msai toni. Allah ja ymyõt bo reto. Tna Ait yawe wa yawe raa aro me mkyas bo weto ma.
Jõ safuk raa retait, bo ro ymat saah. Menohe soh tkyas jõ tesait to, tkyas bo weto fee. Tkyas bo roto taro sai. Tkyas tawe jõ ja ssafo fee sai. Jõ ksoh raa mhar mawe jõ tesait tatak fee.

Menohe soh jõ ksoh raa bibi jõ to, kbe tkyas bo naut u. Tna soh jõ ksoh tawe tkyas bo weto renti to, bo weto beta to bo mabo ye. (Raa ro mkyas bo miwer maja rau to, raa ro wase bo oh meto.) Menohe jõ hawe tkyas bo moof ro jõ tno. Ro moof to, raa mesait mmat bo ro ja tno, tna mesait mari bo ro ja tawe. Feto tna soh ana mesait mawe bibi jõ to, saah.

Allah ybis re bo sau mama sikowah jõ. Yno afo re jõ tnaut tawe jõ fi raa ro taku sai. Tii Allah yerif bo ro msai kʼjõ, menohe Ait hawe bo reto mno jõ bibi jõ. Ait hawe jõ tnaut tawe jõ fi raa ro tase tiwer raa taro. Feto to Ait yitsre kabes yabi (Iblis) ybis kabes roto sau mno jõ, sanet jõ. Bo yno reto sanet jõ yoyo mnan fi bo abumun mami jõ.
Tna jõ skabuk Allah muhrin tuuf oh. Jõ soh-soh Ait tawe, “Mnan oh! Natmof jõ. Nno re bo reto sikowah jõ u fee.”

Menohe Ait yawe si kʼjõ yawe, “Mfe, bo reto kbe mno nyõ renti. Menohe nnaut nawe Jõ tatmof nyõ yoyo. Boatmof aJõ reto to, aro mabut fee. Ati ro nyõ natak fee, ati ro nyõ ntai marak to, kbe nyõ nnaut nawe tak aJõ mnan si oh.” Yawe feto tna thar tawe soh jõ safuk bo samyoh sor ro mno re jõ sne-sna to, kbe raa mhar mawe
yatak rAit ja matam jõ yoyo oh meto. Feto oh mi jõ simaut fo. Feto oh mi jõ safuk tkyas wore wo jõ tatak ajõ to mabut.

Ae; ebokmi bo ro mkair mama mai kʼjõ to, tna jõ tatak fee, tna raa mamus jõ, tna jõ tasom bo ro fanes to, tna raa mno bo ro mkair mai kʼjõ, tna bo ro msai mama mai bo to, menohe ja jõ tnaut yyi fee. Jõ waa fee. Jõ thaf mnem fares. Thar tawe ati ro jõ tatak fee, kbe
ysan tak rAit kʼjõ. Yno afo re kbe raa mmat tna smot
ro riwai tkyas weto to, ana taro mnaut mawe ana raabis

ro Allah. Tna ana miwana jõ, mawe, “Paulus tait raa ro yase fee.” Ana weto to matak miwer jõ fee. Menohe anu taro nri ana. Au oh mi, tako hawe sai, jõ tesait tkyas jõ ai tfi raa ro wase bo. Ro moof to, anu oh mi bibi jõ; jõ tesait ai fee. Ro moof to, anu teta jõ, tna nros tis nban jõ; jõ tesait ai fee.
Nnaut nwe tii ati ro thau tsya anu to, tno bo ro msai, tna jõ sair bo ro hnah.
Ati reto to, jõ beroh tno bo weto sor afo re anu nhar nwe, “Bo mabo. Paulus tait raabis ro Allah tu oh.”
Anu taro nnaut nwe Jõ tno bo moof
roto taro, tna bo ro mkair kʼanu sai. Anu nkyas bo reto, nno mkah fyi? Tii thau tsya anu to, tno bo mnan anya msya bo ja jõ tno wore wo thau tsya
roto ye. Menohe jõ tayoh pitis kʼanu weto aro fee.

Tna jõ siwyan tawe tama to kʼanu u. Tama muhrin ro tuuf refo fo, tna kbe tayoh pitis kʼanu fee. Menohe jõ tayoh tawe anu noo nhaf wanu sai nee kʼjõ. Tawe noo pitis nee kʼjõ ma. Anu to nfi ku wojõ. Tna kukek ja moo pitis mee kʼmaja, mme na wana fee. Raa mabi oh mi ja moo pitis mee ku wana to.

Jõ ksoh too bo tee kʼanu. Jõ tawyan marak anu. Tibyo too thaf ajõ tee kʼanu tna tawe too bo wojõ ro tse beta tiryõ kʼanu ye. Anu nhar nwe Jõ tatmof anu. Reto mno re anu taro hawe bo noo nhaf wanu nee kʼjõ fe mfe a?
Anu nhar nwe ja tayoh pitis aro kʼanu fee. Menohe jõ ksoh tatmof anu. Fyi, anu taro nwe jõ besruf anu oh meto a? Pitis ro jõ tawe anu nsan kʼraa kinyah weto to, jõ too aro kʼjõ feto fee.
Raa ro jõ tbis mama mo kʼanu to, ana aro besruf anu fe mfe a?
Tii tbis Titus ysya nfoh ramu sait mamo mo kʼanu. Ait besruf anu fe mfe a? Mfe, ait yhaf rait moof mnan anya mfi amu mbewok nhaf wamu. Tna bo ro amu mbewok ja nno to, mnan anya ye.

⌞Amu aro ja nno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu fee.⌟ Feto tna amu nkom aam refo nwe saak-saak amu fee. Feto fee. Amu nkom aam refo mkah bo betoo amu ai kʼanu to fee. Amu nkom aam refo mkah mti bonaut wanu. Amu nkom aam refo afo re nno bosmot ranu kbe matak. Allah yhar yawe amu nhaf wamu sau su nsya
Tna amu ksoh anu toni. Bo bawya ro amu nno to, amu nno afo re bo reto nban anu tis oh meto.
Meen ati ro jõ tamaʼt

ro Korintus to, anu nnaut nwe kbe jõ bibi anu. Menohe jõ waa be kbe tama tna tmat he anu nhau nno bo ro mkair fares. Nno be anu ngo-ngat anya, tna naam bo raa, kmo anya, nnaut bo ro netsu wanu ai, nyi-ntoo raa, nkyas-kas raa, bibi anu ai, tna nno-na bo kbik-kbak sai. Soh jõ tama tna tmat he anu nno bo ro mkair weto to, kbe tkyas tna tno bo bawya u kʼanu? Jõ tako tama te bhah anu.

Tiwya jõ bibi anu. Menohe jõ waa be kbe te tama u to, tmat he anu taro nno bo ro mkair-kar fares: Tiwya anu taro nasmamo, taro nus-as bo tna taro ntak fnya mabi raa bo ye. Soh jõ tama tna tmat he anu nwat ne nashana fefares to, kbe jõ sraujin tna hrenaut. Allah ymat bo ro anu nno to, yawe, “Ja Paulus bibi raa ro Korintus fyi?”
Nnaut nwe Bokom ro Allah mawe:

“⌞Soh raa sait yaun baun yawe raa roto sait yber safo to, nmit safo kʼraa retait wia ma:⌟ Nko hawe sai raa mabo ewok, soh mfe tuuf mama tna hre su: Raa mabo ewok, soh mfe tuuf ro mesait mmat bo reto to, ntu ana mama. Tna ana weto kbe hre mkyas bo ro ana mmat. Soh ana beta mmat bo mnan anya, mawe raa retait yno bo ro mkair reto, feto tna fo raa moo srah mmit kʼraa retait.”
Ulangan 19:15
⌞Nko hawe sai hre su tna nkyas safo reto, tna nke oh!⌟ Kbe tama to kʼanu mun ro tuuf.
Tii wore tamoʼt

ro Korintus mun ro ewok to, tawe wa kʼanu tawe, “Ati ro jõ hah tama to kʼanu u to, kbe tmit safo kʼanu.” Mfo refo thau fari tna tkom bo reto u kʼanu beta: Tkyas kʼanu ro tii nno iro ye, tna kʼanu taro sor ye.
Menohe anu nnaut maut-mroh nwe, “Paulus tait raabis ro Allah fee. Ait ykyas bo ro
yawe to fee.
tait Raa ro yatak. Bi Ait yatak re ymit safo kʼraa. Menohe Paulus tait raa ro yatak fee sai.”
Nnaut nwe tiwya

yroh yama tabam refo to, Ait haberek yamo raa sai ro yatak fee. Ait yama yfi raa ro yhaf sneh sai. Yitsre yatak rAit tna yajat mam ara warok. Menohe Allah yatak rAit mno Ait yasen yaam u. Jõ thaf sau su tsya
Tibyo titsre tatak ajõ reto ye: Tii tama to kʼanu tfi raa ro thaf sneh sai, tfi raa ro tatak fee. ⌞Wore weto jõ bhah anu fee.⌟ Menohe Allah yno re jõ tatak re kbe tama tisoh bosmot wanu.
Tawe kʼanu aro sait-sait tawe, “Nmat sas nhaf mato wanu. Anu ja smot Yesus

kaket fe mfe a? Bo ro yawe to, anu nnaut maut-mroh fe mfe a? Anu nnaut nwe bo ro ysi to, ja Ait ybo ye fe mfe a? Ati ro nmat sas anu nhaf mato wanu to, soh anu nkai bosmot ro matak to, anu nhar nwe Ait yhau ysya anu tu oh.”

Ati ro nmat sas anu nhaf mato wanu to, jõ ksoh tawe anu nkai bosmot ro matak. Tii jõ tama tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus kʼanu. Tna mfo refo bosmot wanu mo matak oh. Soh bosmot wanu matak feto to, anu nhar nwe amu mbewok oh mi tii nti bonaut kʼanu to. Tibyo nhar nwe amu mbewok fo raabis ro
tu oh.
Amu mbewok skabuk anu kʼAllah. Amu nyoh re kbe anu nno bo ro mkair aro u fee. Soh anu nno bo ro mkair to, kbe raa taro mmat tna mnaut mawe amu raabis ro
fee. Menohe bo ro ana mnaut mawe reto to, bo ro ati fee. Fyi-fya sai raa mnaut mawe amu mbewok fo raa ro nkair to, rau ro ati to, anu nhau nno bo ro moof yoyo.

Kbe amu mbewok nma no kʼanu u. Tna soh amu nmat he anu niwana watum ro Allah to, kbe amu bhah anu wa. Menohe soh amu nmat he anu nri bo ro ati mbam kʼAllah reto, tna nbo nno kaket fares to, amu nban tis anu fea! (Amu fo raa ro ja nno wa bo ro moof to fee.)

Soh amu bhah raa fee, kbe raa taro mnaut mawe amu ntak fee. Feto to raa taro mnaut mawe amu fo raabis ro Allah fee. Bo ro ana mnaut mawe reto to, bo ro ati fee sai. Soh amu nma tna nmat he anu nros ntak fares to, kbe amu simaut mase sai. Tii anu taro nno bo ro mkair. Tna re amu skabuk Allah nyoh re kbe Ait yisoh anu nhaf wanu me mrok moof.
Jõ tarak fares tna tkom aam refo tiim kʼanu. Tkom aam refo afo re meen, ati ro tama to, kbe jõ thafrah bo ro anu nno fee. Jõ hawe bo bhah anu mkah tak ro
yoo yee kʼjõ.
ybis jõ tama tno re bosmot wanu mo matak. Ait yoo tak yee kʼjõ afo re kbe tisoh bosmot wanu. Yoo yee afo re tno bosmot ranu kbe mbraun to fee.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; meen oh kʼanu! Simaut mase oh! Nisoh anu nhaf wanu moof. Nri bo ro jõ tawe wefo beta. Nhau nsya anya to, nhaf msya nkit sau su. Niranya nsya raa anya kaket. Allah tait Raa ro yatmof raa tna yno anu nhau nhaf tnok ye. Jõ skabuk re Ait yatam anu yoyo.
Nmah meen kʼanya ye tna hana anya. Raa ro Allah wAit mam befo to, beta mmah meen kʼanu ye.
Jõ skabuk re kbe
Yesus
ysya Allah matmof anu beta. Tna re kbe Har rAit mno anu beta niranya kaket tna nhau nhaf sau su ye.
Galatians: Aam refo fo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus. Jõ fi raabis ro Yesus
ysya Allah. Yesus
tiwya yajat menohe Yaja Allah yno re Ait yrok yasen. Ana mbewok oh mi mbis jõ tamo tkyas watum refo. Raa ro tabam refo aro mbis jõ fee.
Jõ tsya raa makin ro kro
nmah meen tna tiim aam refo kʼanu,
makin ro nhau mam
ro Galatia.
Amu skabuk Bja Allah, re Ait ysya
Yesus
matmof anu tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok ye.
Tiwya
ymat iro wanu tibyo yoo yetsu rAit ysan yawe raa mame Ait yajat. Reto oh mi Ait yake safo wanu. Mfo wefo fo arin mkair toni: Raa ro wase Ait to ja mno-na bo sai. Arin mkair tibyo Bja Allah yawe
yama yoo riof yee kʼanu.
Nma, anu bbaut Bja Allah mamo snok mam hame wajin.
: Mabo oh!
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; anu fo tna sai kro
Allah ytu anu mkah boatmof ro
yawe anu nmo raa wAit. Menohe mfo refo jõ tari he anu nri bokyas roto sau. Ayoh ee! Anu haberek kbor kʼAllah! Tna jõ waa: Anu nri bokyas reto mfi Bokyas ro Moof
meto. Ebokfi bokyas reto bokyas ro sre meto.
Bokyas ro anu nri reto to, mnan si Bokyas Moof ro
meto fee! Raa mkbair sau mama mkyas bokyas roto reto kʼanu. Ana mama ksoh mno re anu nantutu. Tibyo anu nnaut mamo-me tna wase bokyas ro ati to miyo! Bo ro ana mkyas reto to, miwer Bokyas Moof ro
Ana mkyas bo ro mabo fee.
Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe, “Mfi raa sait yama yo kʼanu tna ykyas bokyas roto kʼanu yawe, ‘Bokyas ajõ refo to Bokyas Moof ro Yesus!’ Nri ait ma!” Mfi bo meen amu nesait soh mfe,
ro mbam sawro ro Allah mama mkyas bokyas roto, nri bo kʼana weto ma! Awya sai ro ykyas bo sre tait, kbe Allah yno ayoh mroh kʼait!

Tna bo ro riwai reto to, jõ tawe te tkyas u kʼanu tawe, “Mfi bo raa awya sai ykyas bokyas roto kʼanu tna yawe, ‘Bokyas ajõ refo Bokyas Moof ro Yesus!’ Nri ait ma! Mfi bokyas rait reto miwer Bokyas ro Yesus tiwya anu smot meto; meen Allah yno ayoh mroh kʼait!”

Jõ tkyas bo mabo sai tna raa taro hawe jõ. Anu nnaut fyi? Jõ tno bo re kbe raa mhaf mnan jõ to fe mfe a? Mfe, jõ tno bo ro moof re kbe Allah yhaf mnan jõ. Mfi bo jõ tkyas bo tna tno bo afo re raa mhaf mnan jõ to, soh tno feto jõ tnan sryan ro tno bo ro mfi raabis ro
rAit to fee.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; nhar oh, nnaut oh: Bokyas ro
tiwya tkyas kʼanu to, mbam raa ro tabam refo meto fee.
Bokyas reto raa ro tabam refo mkyas kʼjõ tinyi fee. Mama mbam
aro fee ye. Menohe Yesus
oh mi yasbrah Bokyas reto kʼjõ to.
Tiwya weto to, tmat bokom raa ro
Yahudi to kaket. Bo mafa msya bosmot weto to, amu hohos na wamu tiwya mbo mno ye. Tna jõ mur-mur kro bo mafa wana miwer tafoh wojõ na. Tna jõ somya
reto mamo renti ye.
Feto to jõ safo toni saka raa ro kro
Anu nri bo ro jõ tno oh: Tiwya jõ simoyot raa ro kro
Tna jõ siko tawe tno
ro Allah safe mkak.
Tiwya weto to, tmat bokom raa ro
Yahudi to kaket. Bo mafa msya bosmot weto to, amu hohos na wamu tiwya mbo mno ye. Tna jõ mur-mur kro bo mafa wana miwer tafoh wojõ na. Tna jõ somya
reto mamo renti ye.
Feto to jõ safo toni saka raa ro kro
Anu nri bo ro jõ tno oh: Tiwya jõ simoyot raa ro kro
Tna jõ siko tawe tno
ro Allah safe mkak.

Menohe tiwya wore jõ thau mam tme mhaf fares to, Allah ysok jõ oh. Tamo snok tanes tna wase tawe Yesus tait Ku ro Allah yare metait fefares. Tna mam ati ro Allah ksoh to, Ait yatmof jõ, ytu jõ tna yawe tamo tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus.
Yatmof jõ, tna yasbrah Ku rAit kʼjõ re kbe jõ thar he Yesus yamo

ranu. Thar tawe Ait oh mi Raa ro Allah ysok yamo raa sotak ranu. Allah yasbrah Ku rAit kʼjõ afo re tasen tamo tkyas Ait yasom. Raa mana ro Yahudi to, tkyas Ait yasom kʼana fee. Tkyas Ait kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin. Tamo tkyas kʼana tawe, “Yesus tait Ku ro Allah yare.” Ati reto to, jõ tasen tamo fooh ttu bo kʼraa ro tabam refo wia fee.
Tamoʼt Yerusalem to kʼraabis
roto taro fee ye. Ana mamo raabis ro
wia matim tna mhar bo oh, menohe jõ tamo ttu bo kʼana wia fee. Jõ tasen tamo to kʼraa ro mhau mam oo ro Arab wia tna hah te tamoʼt
ro Damsyik u.
trion tuuf firwas tna tasen tamoʼt Yerusalem. Jõ tamo hre su tsya Kefas (Petrus)
tna tsya ait thau ti trion 15 bo feto.
Thau mam tno to, jõ fri
Yesus yao Yakobus ye. Menohe jõ fri raabis roto aro fee. Fri ana mbewok aran sai.
(Bawya ro jõ tkom kʼanu refo to mabo tu oh. Allah yhar yawe jõ sioh anu fee.)
Tna tbam Yerusalem jõ tasen tamoʼt
ro Siria msya
ro Kilikia.
Ati weto to, raa
ro kro
mam
ro Yudea to, ana mmat jõ mkah masu fefares.
Ana mari raa mkyas jõ sai mawe, “Paulus ro tiwya simoyot raa ro kro
to, mfo yesait smot
tna ykyas yasom rAit kʼraa.”
Ana to mari bo jõ tashana smot Yesus feto tibyo mbaut Allah.
trion 14 firwas tna jõ thah te tamoʼt Yerusalem. Tamo tsya Barnabas tna tmen Titus ye.
Allah yasbrah bo kʼjõ, ybis jõ tasen tamoʼt Yerusalem. Jõ tamoʼt Yerusalem tna tamo siret su tsya raa manes ro kro
Jõ hre su tsya ana tna betoo tawe, “Bokyas ro

refo ja jõ tamo tkyas kʼraa mana roto makin. Raa mana ro Yahudi to, tkyas kʼana fee.” Jõ tkyas bo tsya raa manes weto mesait aran wia. Jõ waa be kbe ana ro mase weto hafrah tna hawe bo raa mkyas Bokyas ro
kʼraa mana roto. Tno feto be kbe raa mnaut mawe watum ro tkyas kʼraa mana roto reto to mafer marak.

He mfe; raa manes weto mhaf mnan bo ro ja tamo tkyas kʼraa mana roto makin reto. Raa manes weto to mbam raa mana ro Yahudi. Tna Titus tait ybam raa mana ro Yunani. Menohe ana mmat ait tna mbis ait raa mkom tohmi
to fee. Bo mafa rana raa ro Yahudi sai aran meto.
Tiwya raa mkbair roto taro mawe wa bokyas ajõ. Tna ana mawe mbis Titus ykom tohmi. Raa mkbair reto sioh mawe ana kro
he mfe.
Ana weto baro ja mama wan-wan skabuk su msya amu. Ana mhar mawe ja amu kro bo mafa raa ro Yahudi fee. Tna re ana mama mmat tan amu. Ana mnaut mawe bko hawe sai, anu raa ro kro
bbo Watum ro Musa tna bno bo mafa raa ro Yahudi beta ye. Menohe anu bhar bwe bo mafa weto to make anu u fee.
Feto to amu aro ja nri bo ro raa mkbair reto mawe kebet bo fee saut! Amu nros tu nkyas Bokyas Yesus ro ati. Amu nwe nkyas Bokyas reto kʼanu raa ro kro
mam
ro Galatia. Amu nros ntak afo re Bokyas ro ati mhau kʼanu matak yum.
Tiwya, amu nbo tuuf nsen nmoʼt Yerusalem. Tna ati ro amu hre su nsya raa manes ro kro

mam tno to, ana hre mari bo ro jõ tkyas. Mari tna tgyõt bokyas roto aro fee. (Raa ro tabam refo mmat ana to, mawe ana raa manes. Menohe Allah ymat raa ro mase msya raa ro kinyah to, yawe mnan anya sai. Tna jõ tnaut tawe feto ye.)
Ana weto mawe tgyõt bokyas roto aro fee. Ana makit sau su mnaut mawe, “Bokyas ro Paulus refo mnan si. Amu nnaut nwe Allah ysok ait tna ybis ait yamo ykyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼraa ro wase
Yahudi. Ait ysok Paulus refi mnan si tiwya ysok Petrus ye. Petrus tait, Allah ybis yamo ykyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼraa mana ro Yahudi.”
Ae, Allah yoo yatak rAit yse kʼPetrus yamo raabis rAit yamo yo kʼraa mana ro Yahudi. Feto ye bi Ait oh mi yoo tak yse kʼjõ, yawe jõ tamo to kʼraa mana roto makin.
Tna ati reto to, Yakobus, Kefas (Petrus), msya Yohanes ana mawe, “Esre.” Tna ana mfot matem msya jõ tna msya Barnabas. Ana mabo tuuf reto to, mamo aban mana mam

ro Yerusalem. Ana weto mfot matem msya amu tna mawe, “Anu fo bkah bo mana sau su. Amu nhar nwe Allah yoo bouum yee kʼanu mbewok, ybis anu nmo no kʼraa mana roto makin, raa mana ro Yahudi fee. Tna ybis amu nmo no kʼraa ro Yahudi.”
Tis rau to ana msi bo kʼamu mbewok mawe, “Sorni ma: Nmat tna natmof raa kinyah ye!” Tna jõ ksoh tno bo reto ye. Tna amu mbewok nsen sikba Yerusalem tna nsen nmo bamu.
Raa ro kro
mbam raa mana roto to, tiwya Kefas (Petrus) ja hre yait bo su ysya ana. Tna yiranya ysya ana ye. Menohe ti baro firwas tna Yakobus yafoh wait baro mama snok mam
ro Antiokhia. (Ana weto mbam raa mkbair ro ja mnaut mawe, “Raa beta ro kro
mako hawe sai, kbe ana kro bo mafa ranu, raa mana ro Yahudi to beta!”) Tna Kefas (Petrus) tait waa ana. Tibyo yari tna kro bo ro ana mawe. Feto tna ait hawe bo yiranya ysya raa mana roto ro kro
u. (Ait sesa ait feto to, ait yari Bokyas ro Yesus ybo yno fee.) Tna Barnabas ysya raa Yahudi ro kro
beta to mmat bo ro Kefas (Petrus) yno. Tibyo ana mari bo mbam raa mkbair reto ye. Mari tibyo sesa ana ye tna miranya msya raa mana roto ro kro
u fee ye. Ana beta masen sioh ana sai oh meto. Feto to ati ro jõ tmat Kefas (Petrus) to, jõ bhah ait tawe, “Nyõ sesa nyõ to, nno bo ro mkair meto!”
Raa ro kro
mbam raa mana roto to, tiwya Kefas (Petrus) ja hre yait bo su ysya ana. Tna yiranya ysya ana ye. Menohe ti baro firwas tna Yakobus yafoh wait baro mama snok mam
ro Antiokhia. (Ana weto mbam raa mkbair ro ja mnaut mawe, “Raa beta ro kro
mako hawe sai, kbe ana kro bo mafa ranu, raa mana ro Yahudi to beta!”) Tna Kefas (Petrus) tait waa ana. Tibyo yari tna kro bo ro ana mawe. Feto tna ait hawe bo yiranya ysya raa mana roto ro kro
u. (Ait sesa ait feto to, ait yari Bokyas ro Yesus ybo yno fee.) Tna Barnabas ysya raa Yahudi ro kro
beta to mmat bo ro Kefas (Petrus) yno. Tibyo ana mari bo mbam raa mkbair reto ye. Mari tibyo sesa ana ye tna miranya msya raa mana roto ro kro
u fee ye. Ana beta masen sioh ana sai oh meto. Feto to ati ro jõ tmat Kefas (Petrus) to, jõ bhah ait tawe, “Nyõ sesa nyõ to, nno bo ro mkair meto!”
Raa ro kro
mbam raa mana roto to, tiwya Kefas (Petrus) ja hre yait bo su ysya ana. Tna yiranya ysya ana ye. Menohe ti baro firwas tna Yakobus yafoh wait baro mama snok mam
ro Antiokhia. (Ana weto mbam raa mkbair ro ja mnaut mawe, “Raa beta ro kro
mako hawe sai, kbe ana kro bo mafa ranu, raa mana ro Yahudi to beta!”) Tna Kefas (Petrus) tait waa ana. Tibyo yari tna kro bo ro ana mawe. Feto tna ait hawe bo yiranya ysya raa mana roto ro kro
u. (Ait sesa ait feto to, ait yari Bokyas ro Yesus ybo yno fee.) Tna Barnabas ysya raa Yahudi ro kro
beta to mmat bo ro Kefas (Petrus) yno. Tibyo ana mari bo mbam raa mkbair reto ye. Mari tibyo sesa ana ye tna miranya msya raa mana roto ro kro
u fee ye. Ana beta masen sioh ana sai oh meto. Feto to ati ro jõ tmat Kefas (Petrus) to, jõ bhah ait tawe, “Nyõ sesa nyõ to, nno bo ro mkair meto!”
Jõ tmat he ana miwer Bokyas Yesus ro ati oh meto. Feto to wore wo raa
ro Antiokhia beta siret su to, jõ tawe Kefas (Petrus) tawe, “Fyi! Nyõ fi raa mana ro Yahudi fe mfe a? Menohe anu smot
tibyo nyõ bitsre bo mafa raa ro Yahudi oh, tna nasen nno bo mnan raa mana roto sai. Nyõ nno feto moof. bo mafa weto to, make nyõ u fee. Menohe mfo refo nyõ nbis raa Yahudi ro mfo refo kro
oh, nawe ana miranya msya raa mana roto to ma. Nbis bo reto mkah bawya!”

Tna tawe kʼPetrus tawe, “Nyõ nsya jõ fo, anu mbewok bbam biin raa mana ro Yahudi. Tibyo anu raa ro bhar Watum ro Musa nteet. Menohe raa ro mbam raa mana roto to, ana wase Watum reto. Feto to raa ro Yahudi, ja mnaut mawe raa mana roto weto beta to ‘raa ro mno iro’.
Menohe anu ro kro
oh bhar bwe, ‘Watum reto mtai mno raa mhaf mato moof ati to fee.’ Allah ymat raa ro mari Watum ro Musa ja mbo mno to, tna yawe ana weto to, raa ro mhaf moof ati to fee. Awya ro smot
Yesus oh mi Allah ymat tna yawe ana weto raa ro mhaf moof ati to. Watum ro Musa reto matak meto fee. Tiwya, ati ro anu brok bhar bwe bo reto mabo to, anu bashana tna smot
Yesus. Tna anu bsen kro Ait oh.
Feto to, anu raa Yahudi bitsre Watum ro Musa. Anu ksoh bwe Allah ymat anu yawe anu bhaf moof ati mfi raa ro wase mno iro. Feto to, anu bsen smot
oh. Menohe raa ro Yahudi mmat he anu bitsre Watum ro Musa tibyo ana mkyas kair amu. Ana mawe, ‘Aha! Paulus na mno iro meto! Ana mnan anya mfi raa ro mbam raa mana roto!
yisti re ana mno iro!’ He mfe:
yisti re raa mno iro fee saut! Raa bitsre Watum ro Musa to iro meto fee.

Jõ fret bo tawe Watum ro Musa to mnan anya msya amah ro rabo. Tna jõ titrah amah reto oh. Fyi re jõ haberek tbo ara ro rabo reto tna sgi amah reto u? Mfi bo jõ te tisoh jõ thaf moof mkah bo haberek tna tari Watum ro Musa tbo tno u to, jõ tno iro oh meto.

Tiwya jõ thau tari Watum ro Musa to tbo tno. Menohe mfo refo jõ thar tawe Watum reto misoh irat ajõ tsya Allah moof to fee. Feto to jõ bitsre Watum reto afo re tno bo ro Allah yawe. Allah yawe jõ smot bo ro
yno. Jõ smot tawe raa mame Ait yajat mam ara warok. Tibyo yisoh iranya ajõ tsya Allah.
Thau mam tabam refo tesait thau kar fee.
yamos rAit ysan kʼjõ. Feto to thau tno bo kar u fee.
yamos rAit mjin mam jõ thaf ajõ. Thau mam tabam refo fo, thau smot Ku ro Allah yare. Safo ajõ to Allah ymit Ku rAit
Feto oh mi
yajat raa mame mam ara warok. Reto mnan bo jõ tesait tajat raa mame su tsya Ait ye. Au oh meto Allah ymat jõ to, yawe yoo riof yee kʼjõ. Ku ro Allah yare tait yatmof jõ tna ysan yetsu rAit shauk jõ.

Jõ hawe bo haberek kro Watum ro Musa u. Maami jõ tiwana Allah boatmof rAit oh meto. Bo ro Yesus yno oh mi Allah ymat jõ tna yawe jõ tfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Watum ro Musa to matak re misoh jõ thaf moof ati to fee. Mfi bo Watum reto matak mnan si maami tiwya
ysan yetsu rAit fee!”
Ayoh ee! Anu raa

ro nhau mam Galatia fo, tnaut tawe raa sioh mno anu. Tibyo anu namboi tna nwe kro Watum ro Musa! Anu nno fyi sai meto ee? Tiwya tkyas Bokyas ro Yesus kʼanu to. Tawe Yesus tait raa mame yajat oh. Tna jõ betoo maja rau to kaket.
Jõ ttu bo sau kʼanu tawe, “Tiwya anu nkai Har ro
to fyi? Anu kro Watum ro Musa tibyo nkai fe mfe a? Mfe, anu nri Bokyas ro Yesus tna smot
Bokyas reto nwe bo mabo. Tibyo nkai Har ro
fea!

Tinyi rau to, Har rAit misoh iranya ranu nsya Allah. Mkah bawya anu ne nwe anu nesait ntai ntak nisoh iranya ranu nsya Allah feto! Mfo refo anu tomer nisoh iranya reto renti mamo snok tis rau to, mkah tak ranu nesait ai a? Anu wase bo toni sai meto a?
Tiwya anu smot Bokyas ro Yesus. Tna bosmot ranu reto mno re raa sikowah anu. Tna mfo refo anu ksoh nwe bitsre bosmot ranu tna mbeak makus fe mfe a?” Jõ tinaut tawe anu nno feto ma.
Tna te ttu bo kʼanu u tawe, “Fyi re Allah ysan Har rAit kʼanu to? Fyi re Allah yno bo ro hnah mam
ranu to? Anu kro Watum ro Musa mi Ait yno meto, fe mfe a?” Mfe! Anu nri Bokyas ro Yesus tna smot
nwe Bokyas reto mabo.
Nnaut Abraham: Tiwya tinyi ait yari bo ro Allah yawe tna smot
Smot yawe bo ro Allah yawe reto to meen mabo. Tna Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Bo ro Allah ykyas kʼAbraham reto to, ait yari tna smot
Smot yawe bo ro Allah yawe reto to meen mabo. Au oh mi Allah yawe Abraham tait raa ro yhaf moof ati.”
Kejadian 15:6
Feto to, nri oh, nhar oh: Raa ro smot Allah feto, ana mnan fi ku ro Abraham yabe.

Bokom ro Allah tiwya mkyas raa ro mbam raa mana roto ye. Mawe ana ro smot Ait kbe Ait ymat ana mfi raa ro mhaf moof ati. Tna Allah ykyas Bokyas Moof reto matim wia tinyi wore bo weto mabo fefares. Bokyas ro Moof
reto to, Allah ykyas kʼAbraham matim wia. Yawe,
“Mkah nyõ to, meen Jõ tno bo ro moof kʼraa mana roto makin.”
Kejadian 12:3
Feto to, anu bhar bwe raa ro mari tna smot Allah to, kbe Allah yno bo moof kʼana weto. Yno bo moof kʼana mfi tiwya Ait yno bo moof kʼAbraham wia.
Abraham tait, raa ro smot Allah. Bo ro Allah yawe to, ait ynaut mamo-me fee. Ja yari tna yawe bo mabo.
Raa taro mnaut sre mawe, “Amu ja nri Watum ro Musa, feto kbe meen amu nkai roon ro hame.” Menohe Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Raa ro beroh mari Watum ro Musa tna mbo mno bo weto beta to fee, meen ayoh mroh kʼana weto. Hawe sai kbe ana mbo mno maja beta renti.”
Ulangan 27:26
Awya ro mtai mno bo weto beta? Raa aro mtai mno feto fee. Raa matak mari tna mbo mno bo weto beta mnan si to fee. Feto kbe ayoh meen mroh kʼana weto beta.
Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Raa ro smot Jõ oh mi raa ro mhaf moof ati to. Tibyo meen Allah yoo roon yee kʼraa weto.”
Habakuk 2:4

Au oh mi Allah yawe Ait yoo roon yee kʼraa ro smot Ait. Feto to anu bhar bwe, “Awya ro kro Watum ro Musa tibyo yawe Watum ro ait kro reto mno re yhaf rait moof ati to, ait yawe bo ro sre meto. Awya ro kro Watum reto menohe smot Allah to fee; sait bo yhaf moof ati to fee.”
Ati ro Allah yoo Watum reto yee kʼMusa to, Ait ykyas bo yawe bawya? Ykyas bosmot
aro fee. Bokom ro Allah mawe,
“Kbe ayoh mroh kʼawya sai ro ybo yno bo weto beta mnan si to fee.”
Imamat 18:5
Soh raa mawe mamo raa ro mhaf moof mamyot Watum ro Musa to, mako hawe sai kbe mari bo beta ro Watum reto msi kʼana mbo mno sau-sau mnan si.
Feto kbe meen ayoh mroh kʼanu, raa beta, fe mfe a? Anu beta biwer Watum ro Musa oh. Rau ro moof to, Allah kmo anu yno ayoh mroh kʼanu beta. Oos maami
yfes anu. Watum ro Musa mawe,
“Allah kmo yno ayoh mroh kʼawya sai ro raa mame yajat mam ara warok.”
Ulangan 21:13
raa mame mam ara warok tibyo ayoh mroh kʼAit oh. Yno feto mkah anu riryõn, afo re kbe ayoh mroh kʼanu to fee. Ait yfes anu oh meto.
Tiwya Allah ysi bosi akus kʼAbraham yawe yno bo ro moof kʼait ysya kube wait. Ti baro firwas tna Ait bitsre bosi reto kʼanu, raa ro nbam raa mana roto ye. Au oh mi Allah yno re
yfes anu. Anu smot
Yesus tibyo Ait yno bo ro moof kʼanu ye:
Ait yoo Har ro Allah to mhau matam anu ye. Ysan Har ro Allah kʼanu mnan fi bo tiwya Ait yawe to ye.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; mam tabam refo to, ati ro bi yabi sait yuumto bombra wait ku rait sait to, ja raa roto taro mari tna kro bo ro bi retait yawe. Bo ro ait yawe to, kbe mabo tu. Raa roto mno wa ku retait fee. Ait yesait oh mi krek waan ro yaja yuumto reto. Raa aro yirenti fee. Tna bo ro Allah yawe yuumto kʼAbraham to mnan feto ye. Ait yawe yum, kbe yno tu oh.
Allah yawe,
“Meen Jõ tuumto bo kʼAbraham kube wait sait.”
Kejadian 17:19
Bokom ro Allah far-far reto mkyas mawe yuumto bo kube ro Abraham 'magin' to fee. Menohe Bokom refo mkyas kube rait sait aran sai. Tna Ait retait oh mi
to.
Nhar oh! Nnaut oh: Allah ykyas bo kʼAbraham wia matim yawe kbe yuumto bo kʼait. Tna
trion 430 firwas tna Allah yoo Watum yee kʼMusa. Tna bo ro tiwya Allah yawe yuumto kʼAbraham to, yawe yum oh. Allah ynaut tna ybo fares. Watum ro Musa reto mno wa bo ro Allah yuumto kʼAbraham to fee.

Allah yawe yuumto bo reto kʼraa ro kro Watum ro Musa fe mfe a? Mfe. Tiwya yawe kbe yuumto bo reto kʼAbraham ysya kube wait. Allah ysi bosi akus tna bo ro Ait yawe yno to, kbe ybo yno tu oh. Tna bosi reto oh mi Ait yatmof Abraham.

Soh Allah ksoh rAit sai mi Ait yuumto bo kʼraa to, Ait yoo Watum yee kʼMusa mkah bawya? Yoo afo re mbam Watum reto raa mrok mhar bo ro moof to miyo tna ro iro to miyo. Allah ksoh yawe raa kro Watum reto tibyo fee. Yawe raa kro Watum reto mamo snok ati ro Raa sait yama sai. Tiwya ati ro Allah ysi bo kʼAbraham to, Ait ykyas kube ro Abraham sait. Ait retait oh mi
Tiwya Allah ybis
wait moo Watum reto mamo mee kʼMusa. Tna Musa yros susai yoo Watum reto yamo yee kʼraa ro Yahudi.

Mfi bo raa mabo ewok santri bo to, ja raa sait yros susai ana mbewok weto. Raa retait yno re kbe ana mbewok mrok makit sau su to. Tiwya, ati ro Allah yoo Watum reto yee kʼraa to, yno mnan feto ye: Musa yros susai ykyas bo ysya Allah tna ysya raa. Menohe tiwya Allah yesait aran ysi bosi reto kʼAbraham. Ait yno bo reto ai. Ybis Abraham yno bo aro fee. Rau ro ati to, Abraham smot bo ro Allah yawe meen mabo. Ait ynaut bo reto maut-mroh to fee.
Tiwya Allah ysi bosi yawe yuumto riof kʼanu raa. Feto to fyi? Watum reto santri bo msya bosi reto fe mfe a?
Mfe: Watum ro Musa matak re kbe mno anu bhaf moof to fee. Watum reto Allah yoo mkah yoo riof yee kʼraa to fee. Mfi bo Watum reto matak re mno anu bhaf moof to, maami Allah yno sai ye mfi feto.
Bokom ro Allah mawe raa beta mno iro. Menohe Allah ysi bosi kʼanu, raa ro mno iro to, re kbe yyon iro wanu: Yawe raa beta ro smot Yesus
tna msam wai kʼAit to, kbe Ait yyon iro wana tna ysan riof kʼana.
Tiwya wore anu wase bo smot Yesus to, Watum ro Musa kmot anu. Kmot anu wa re kbe anu bno iro kbik-kbak to fee.
Watum reto kmot anu wa mamo snok Allah yerif iso ro bosmot
reto.
Tiwya Watum ro Musa reto mnan mfi
ro mber anu re bma bo
Afo re anu bsam wai kʼAit. Anu smot Yesus feto tna Allah ymat bosmot ranu reto tibyo yawe anu to bfi raa ro mhaf moof ati.
Mfo wefo anu smot
Tna Watum ro Musa mamo
ranu u fee.
Mfo refo fo anu smot
Yesus tna nsam wai kʼAit. Tibyo anu nmo ku ro Allah wAit oh meto. Anu to, Allah
oh. Au oh mi Ait yawe anu nhaf sau su nsya
to.
Mfo refo fo anu smot
Yesus tna nsam wai kʼAit. Tibyo anu nmo ku ro Allah wAit oh meto. Anu to, Allah
oh. Au oh mi Ait yawe anu nhaf sau su nsya
to.
Feto to raa mbam raa mana ro Yahudi msya anu raa ro nbam raa mana roto makin ye, anu beta bmo bhaf sau, srau sau, bkit sau su bsya
Yesus oh. Anu ro mamo sryan boh ye, raa ro ja mros kar tna mamo sryan fee ye, raa sme ye, msya fnya ye to: Anu beta bmo bhaf sau, srau sau, bkit sau su bsya
Yesus oh. Tibyo Allah ymat anu yawe anu nnan anya sai.
Tna soh anu beta smot
oh to, anu fo nmo raa wAit. Anu beta to kube ro Abraham ye. Tibyo Allah ysi bosi yawe yuumto bouum kʼanu weto ye.

Bi ro krek waan sait yhai. Mfi bo yhai tna ku rait ro yabe sait to ykek fares to, bi roto sait kbe yayõ ku retait ytos. Tna bi refi yoo waan ro yaja tii yhai to, yoo yse wia. Kbe ku retait yabi tna ye yrof yoo waan rait bi ait ro yse. Tii ykek fares ait ynan fi sryan boh: Bi retait ybis-baas ku retait, tna ait yse bo aro fee ye. Ebokmi bo wait to bo beta ro yaja tiwya krek ye. Ku retait yabi tna bi ait yoo waan rait yee. Tna yhar yawe bo wait.
Wore ait ykek fares to, raa roto ytos ait. Tna bi retait ybo waan rait mamo snok mam ayõ ro ku retait yanes oh, mnan tiwya yaja ysi oh.
Feto ye mnan amu raa ro
Yahudi: Ati ro amu nkek fares mamo snok mam ayõ ro tiwya Allah Bja ranu ysi oh to, amu nri Watum ro Musa tna nno bo mafa raa ro
Yahudi fares. Bo ro tabam weto mbo anu matak fares. Bo ro tabam weto mbo amu mnan fi raa bobot sait ybo sryan boh wait.
Menohe oon sboh, tna Allah ybis Ku rAit yama. Fnya ro sai mabe Ait. Fnya ro mabe Ait ysya raa ro ytos Ait to, ana mbewok raa ro
Yahudi. Tibyo Allah yno re Yesus tait raa ro yari Watum ro Musa ye.
Allah ybis Ku rAit yama re kbe yfes amu. Yama yfes amu, raa ro tiwya nri Watum ro Musa. Yfes amu raa re Allah yayõ amu tibyo nmo ku wAit, tna kbe noo bo beta ro Ait ysan kʼamu.
Tna anu nmo ku wAit ye. Tibyo Allah ybis Har ro Yesus mama mabum mam anu nhaf wanu ye. Har rAit mno re anu bkyas bo kʼAllah mam bhaf mato wanu bwe, “
Taja!” Tna anu bhafri bi Ait bnan fi Ku rAit Yesus yhafri Yaja ye.
Feto to, anu sait-sait nnan fi sryan boh to u fee. Allah yno re anu nmo ku wAit oh. Tibyo anu krek waan ranu ro Allah yuumto kʼanu oh.
Tiwya anu nhar Allah fefares to, anu nri tna kro bo ro tabam sor. Bo weto to mnan Allah fee. Bo weto matak fee ye.
Menohe mfo refo to anu nhar Allah to, Ait ro ati oh. (Rau ro ati to, Ait yhar anu ye!) Anu ne nri bo ro tabam refo to, nno fyi meto! bo mafa raa ro
Yahudi msya Watum rana to mfi bo ro tabam sai. Bo weto to matak fee. Anu nri bo weto to mafer marak. Anu ksoh nwe bo weto mbo anu u to, nnaut nwe fyi meto!
Tna fo jõ tari he anu nkyõ bokyõ ro
Yahudi ye. Watum rana mkyas ayõ aro rau-rau msya snyi msya
wore ana makyõ korat wana. Tna mfo refo anu kro nkyõ bokyõ weto mnan ana ye. Anu nnaut nwe nno feto tibyo nisoh iranya wanu nsya Allah oh meto. He mfe.
Tiwya jõ thau tsya anu to, jõ hrowyõ thai tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus kʼanu. Tna mfo refo to, jõ tnaut yyi tawe hrowyõ ajõ reto mafer aro fe mfe a?

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya jõ bitsre Watum ro Musa tna jõ tnan fi anu. Feto to jõ soh-soh anu tawe, “Nitsre Watum reto tna nhau nnan fi jõ ye.” Tiwya jõ thau tsya anu to, anu nno bo ro mkair mai kʼjõ fee.
Anu nhar nwe bo ro mno re jõ tamo to kʼanu to, jõ kiyam. Ti reto to, jõ kiyam tibyo jõ tamo thau mam beto. Thau tsya anu tna tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
kʼanu ye.
Tna kiyam ajõ reto mno anu nsui. Menohe anu natmof jõ, tna anu nashoho fee, anu nikyak jõ fee ye. Menohe anu nisoh jõ moof. Anu nitrah nhaf wanu kʼjõ mnan fi anu nmat
ro mbam kʼAllah. Anu nno bo moof kʼjõ mfi bo anu nmat
Yesus yesait bo ye.
Mam ati reto anu nhaf mnan kʼjõ. Anu nmat jõ to nhaf mbyõ. Tna anu ksoh ntufrok nsu mauf wanu nhaut mam jõ tasu ajõ ro mkair. Menohe mfo refo simaut ranu reto miyo?
Mfo refo tkyas bo he anu nri fee sai. Bo ro tkyas abyõ reto to mabo ye.
Bo ro tkyas refo sioh fee. Tna mfo refo bokyas ajõ reto mno anu nrok nwe jõ tamo byoh kʼanu a?
Raa mkbair reto masen mamo mo kʼanu tna mkyas bo matak.
Ana weto mkyas bo re kbe anu kro ana. Menohe ana mkyas bo mkah bonaut rana ro mkair. Ana mawe mno re kbe anu twat nsya jõ, re kbe anu nsen nmo nkro ati rana. Nri bokyas rana ma.
Mfi bo raa matak mkyas bo ro moof, tna anu nri bokyas rana to, jõ ksoh. Wore thau tsya anu ye tna wore jõ tarak ye to, jõ ksoh tawe anu nmur-mur nri tna nno bo ro moof yoyo.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; anu to nfi ku wojõ ro jõ ksoh. Tiwya tama tkyas Yesus yasom kʼanu to, tetsu mham-ham mfi fnya ro kborham tna mabe. Anu smot Yesus tna nsam wai kʼAit oh, menohe bosmot ranu matak fefares. Feto to jõ tnaut yyi tna tari kborham u. Tawe fooh re bosmot ranu matak. Fooh re anu nrok nhaf sau su nsya
yhaf rAit.

Tna ksoh tawe tama thau tsya anu u, tna re tkyas bo kait tsya anu. Jõ hawe bo bhah anu. Jõ ksoh tawe tkyas bo rere tsya anu tna tisoh betrot bo wanu ro nno. Menohe thau fari ntefo tna kbe tno bawya u kʼanu?
Ayoh ee! Watum ro Musa anu nhar oh. Menohe maja rau to, anu nhar kaket fefares. Anu kro Watum ro Musa reto re kbe meen anu nkai riof a? Ebokfi mabo fee!
Bokom ro Allah mawe, “Tiwya Abraham yabe ku sme wait mabo trion ewok: Sait ybam Hagar ro mamo sryan boh,
tna sait ybam yfain fai Sara ro mamo sryan ye fee.”
