Menohe Allah ranu yatam amu. Tna amu nsen nmo no kʼanu mam
ro Tesalonika. Tna raa mama mno anu. Menohe amu beroh nkyas
kʼanu, amu waa fee.
Watum ro
amu nma nkyas kʼanu to, bo ro ati. Amu nkyas watum rAit to, nkyas sre fee. Amu nkyas bokyas reto mbam nhaf wamu ro moof. Amu besruf anu fee.
Allah yawe amu noof tna yoo Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
yehau kʼamu to, yawe amu nmo nkyas to. Amu nmo nkyas
afo re raa nksoh amu to, fee. Amu ja nno bo afo re Allah ksoh amu. Bi Ait oh mi Raa ro ja sanet amu nhaf mato wamu.

Anu beta nhar nwe amu nhaf mato wanu to moof sai. Amu nkyas bo nsoh moof sai fee. Menohe amu nkyas bo abyõ sai kʼanu. Amu nmyõt bo aro fee. Amu nsu mase mkah pitis wanu fee. Allah ja ymat tna yhar bo ro amu nkyas reto. Yhar yawe amu sioh anu fee.
Amu nwe anu bibi amu fee! Amu hawe anu nsya raa roto bibi amu. Menohe amu fo raabis
ro
Feto to amu nse re nbis anu feto. He mfe, amu hawe. Tibyo ja amu nbis-bas anu fee.
Amu fo raabis ro
wait menohe amu sneh sai nhau susai nsya anu. Amu nhaf sneh nfi fnya ro misoh ku mkek wau ye.
Amu natmof anu oh mi amu nma nkyas Bokyas Moof ro Allah reto kʼanu. Amu nksoh anu toni sai oh mi amu nhau niranya nsya anu ye.
Wore weto to, amu nkyas
kʼanu ye, tna nkah bo wamu nesait to ye. Nnaut nwe rabu-reha ja amu nimyoh marak nkah bo ramu nesait. Amu nesait saso boit mkah bo amu niit bo to, re kbe amu nno anu beta hrowyõ nmat amu fee.

Amu nhau nsya anu ro smot Yesus to, anu nmat amu nhaf oh. Wore weto to, amu nhau nno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Amu ja nno bo ro Ait ksoh sai. Amu wase nber safo ye. Ja Allah ysya anu nesait nmat nhar bo reto oh.
Nnaut nwe amu nhau nsya anu tna nisoh anu aro sait-sait mfi bi sait ro yisoh ku wait.

Amu nkyas watum kʼanu re kbe nisoh bosmot ranu. Ja amu nkyas bokyas mas mafer ro ati kʼanu. Amu nno feto afo re anu nhau nno bo mamyot bo ro Allah ksoh anu bno. Bi Ait ytu anu meen nmo nhau mam sawro ro Ait yamo
ybo. Mam tno to, kbe anu nhar bo yase rAit kaket ye.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; bo roto sau naut ro mno amu nyoh asik mawat kʼAllah yoyo to fefo: Bokyas ro tiwya amu nkyas kʼanu to, anu nri tna nwe watum ro mbam kʼAllah oh meto. Anu nhar nwe bokyas reto to, bokyas ramu nesait sai fee. Anu nri watum rAit reto tna nfau nse kʼanu nhaf wanu sait-sait. Watum reto matak re misoh anu nhaf wanu. Watum ro Allah kbe mas mafer ro ati kʼanu ro smot Yesus
Anu beta nnan raa Kristen ro mhau mam
ro Yudea.
ro Allah weto mkai bo ro mkair mbam raa wana mesait ye.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; bo roto sau naut ro mno amu nyoh asik mawat kʼAllah yoyo to fefo: Bokyas ro tiwya amu nkyas kʼanu to, anu nri tna nwe watum ro mbam kʼAllah oh meto. Anu nhar nwe bokyas reto to, bokyas ramu nesait sai fee. Anu nri watum rAit reto tna nfau nse kʼanu nhaf wanu sait-sait. Watum reto matak re misoh anu nhaf wanu. Watum ro Allah kbe mas mafer ro ati kʼanu ro smot Yesus
Anu beta nnan raa Kristen ro mhau mam
ro Yudea.
ro Allah weto mkai bo ro mkair mbam raa wana mesait ye.
Raa wana ro Yahudi oh mi tiwya mame
Yesus ysya
na majat to. Tna ana mikyak amu ye to. Bo ro ana mno weto to, Allah knait. Tna ana mamo raa ro byoh kʼraa beta ye.
Ana hawe amu nkyas Watum ro

kʼraa mana roto. Ana hawe raa ro mbam raa mana roto makin mkai riof ro mase. Ana mno wa amu nkyas Bokyas Moof reto to, iro ro samyoh oh meto. Feto oh mi Allah kmo tna yno bo ro mkair btek mai kʼana ro Yahudi to.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya anu betne anya, amu nmo si tna anu nhau akus si mam beto to. Anu betne anya mno amu sraujin toni tna amu nnaut anu yoyo sai. Amu nwe fooh aro re amu hah ne nma nmat anu u.
Amu nhau to, nnaut nwe hah ne nma nmat anu. Tiwya jõ tawe thah tama tmat anu menohe mfe. Kabes yabi (Iblis) yno wa.
Amu nwyan marak awya? Awya ro mari Bokyas Moof mbam kʼamu tna re mno amu simaut mase. Anu, raa ro Tesalonika fea! Meen ati ro
Yesus hah yama u to, kbe amu safuk anu fea! Kbe anu beta bros su bsya
Yesus.
Ati ro amu naut anu to, amu safuk tna simaut mase.

⌞Amu nbo tuuf nri he bo ro mkair mama mai kʼanu ro nhau mam Tesalonika.⌟ Amu srau kero anu beta ntu nwe anu nhau fyi? ⌞Amu wase fares. Feto to amu nbis Timotius yama yo kʼanu.⌟ Tna amu mbewok nesait nhau akus sai mam
ro Atena.
Timotius tait amu nfoh ramu ro ja ysya amu ykyas Bokyas Moof ro
ye. Amu nbo tuuf refo ja nhau nno bo ro Allah ybis yawe amu nno. Amu nbis Timotius yama yawe kʼanu yawe, “Waa ma. Nnaut yyi ma. Bito ntak sai.” Ykyas feto re kbe anu nhau smot
kaket matak.

Tiwya anu nesait nhar oh nwe kbe bo ro mkair mama mai kʼraa ro Kristen beta. Bo ro mama mai kʼanu reto to, Allah oh mi ybis mama meto. Tna mfo refo mabo oh. Feto to amu mbewok nbis Timotius yama ykyas bo kʼanu re kbe anu nros tu. Tna bito nsom sai, ne susu ma.
Tiwya amu nhau nsya anu beta fares to, amu nkyas bo refo kʼanu wia matim ye. Amu nwe kbe raa mama mno anu beta. Tna anu nesait nhar nwe bo reto mabo oh.
Jõ waa tnaut tawe kabes yabi (Iblis) sioh yno anu kawi. Be kbe kabes yabi sanet anu, yno re anu smot Yesus u fee. Be kbe yno anu beak Bokyas Moof
ro tiwya amu nkyas kʼanu. Feto oh mi jõ thau ste kait fee; jõ tbis Timotius yama yo kʼanu fooh. Jõ tbis ait yama ymat bosmot ranu. Tawe ymat anu tna hah yama ykyas kʼjõ.

Tna sai Timotius hah yama. Tna jõ simaut mase tari bokyas rait. Yawe bosmot ranu matak fares. Tna ait yawe anu ja beta natmof anya ye. Yawe anu nnaut amu yoyo ye, nwe soo aro fooh re anu beta nmat amu nsu nnaif, ja nahni ooh oh. Tna amu ksoh nma nmat anu beta ye.
Mfo refo bombra ro mkair-kar sor mama mai kʼamu mam befo. Menohe amu nri bo ro Timotius yama ykyas reto. Yawe bosmot wanu beta matak fares. Amu nri feto tna amu nnaut yyi anu u fee.
Amu nhar nwe anu smot
matak fares. Feto to amu nhau to, nhaf wanu tnok sai.
Allah yari skabuk wamu oh. Yno bo moof kʼanu oh meto. Amu simaut mase tna nyoh asik mase kʼbi Ait ye.
Rabu-reha to, amu skabuk Allah, nyoh nwe amu hah nma no kʼanu u, mkah bo nisoh bosmot wanu ro mabut fares.
Amu skabuk Allah, anu Bja ranu, ysya Yesus
ranu. Amu nyoh nwe Ana misoh iso ramu; mno re amu nma fri anu beta u.
Tna amu skabuk re kbe Ait yno anu natmof anya myum mase, tna yno anu natmof raa roto beta ye. Nno feto mfi bo amu ja natmof anu beta ye.
Meen
Yesus yama u ysya raa wAit beta. Tna anu beta bros bmat Allah; anu Bja ranu. Kbe
ytu safo wanu yari. Tna amu nyoh bi Ait afo re Ait yisoh anu nto wanu mboh. Yisoh anu feto tibyo ymat anu yawe anu nber safo aro fee.

Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya amu watum kʼanu nkyas iso ro Allah ksoh anu nkro re kbe Ait yhaf mnan anu. Tna amu nhar nwe anu ja nhau kro iso reto. Tna mfo refo amu ne sobu anu nwe kro iso reto kaket renti. Amu soh-soh anu feto mkah
Yesus yasom rAit.
Iso ro tiwya amu nbis anu nkro reto to, anu nhar oh. Tna mkah
Yesus yatak rAit to, amu nbis anu nkro iso reto.
Bo sau ro Allah ksoh anu nno to, yawe nhau nfi raa wAit ro mato mboh sai. Au oh mi mbeak wyah bo to fari.
Ait ybis anu raa sme aro sait-sait yoo fnya rait tna yhau su, yjin su ysya au mesait aran sai. Iso ro raa makin mawe moof meto. Tna raa ro mhau mno bo ro Allah wAit sai to, ja nkro iso reto ye.
Srau oot-oot fnya raa to ma. Nno bo nfi raa ro wase Allah to ma. Ana weto ja masmamo.
Soh raa sme aro yno-na bo to, ait yno bo ro mkair mai yafoh rait oh meto. Nnaut nwe kbe
yno bo ro samyoh btek mai kʼraa sme ro yno bo mkair mfi feto to.
Allah ysok anu bma bo kʼAit to, yawe anu bno bo ro mkair to ma tna bwyah ma. Ait ybis anu bhau bno bo wAit sai to.
Awya ro hawe bo yari bo refo fo, ait yiwana raa fee, yiwana Allah ro yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu oh meto.
Anu raa Kristen ja natmof raa anya. Bo reto anu beta nhar oh. Bo reto anu nri kʼAllah yesait. Feto to amu ne nkom bo reto nwe afat fee.
Jõ thar tawe anu natmof raa Kristen ro mhau mam
ranu ro Makedonia reto beta. Menohe amu ksoh nwe anu ne nno u hair sai.
Nhau nsya raa anya knar sai. Nbet nkyas bo ro raa mati to ma. Nhau to, nesait nkah bo wanu sai mfi bo tiwya amu nkyas kʼanu to.

Nhau nno bo reto afo re raa ro mne mmat anu to, mawe, “Raa ro Kristen weto, ja raa ro mno bo ro moof sai.” Tna nhau nkah bo wanu feto re kbe anu nhau bo marak fee, tna kbe anu aro nwof bo ro raa roto mno mati fee ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; nnaut raa Kristen ro mhai oh to, sraujin toni ma. Nhar nwe meen ana me mrok masen. Menohe raa ro smot Yesus fefares to, soh raa wana mhai to, kbe ana sraujin tu oh.
Anu bhar bwe
Yesus tiwya yhai tna ye yrok yasen. Feto anu bhar bwe Allah meen yno raa ro msam wai kʼYesus tna mhai to, kbe mrok masen ye. Mrok masen tna msya Ait mhau su ye.
Tiwya
yesait yawe kʼanu yawe meen anu ro bhau fares ati ro Ait yama to, kbe anu bsen bmo tru Ait wia fee.
Ati reto to, raa mari mai maboh mbam
ro mase sau, tna raa mari saa buk-buk ro Allah mfi ye. Tna
yesait yroh ybam sawro rAit yama. Tna raa beta ro smot
Yesus tna mhai wia to, kbe ana mrok masen maut mamo mo kʼAit matim wia.
Tna fo anu ro bhau baam mam tabam refo fares to, kbe Allah tubat anu buut bmo ye. Meen anu buut bmo bsya ana ro mhai tna mrok masen wia ye. Tna anu beta bmo bkai
Yesus mam ayoh skes abyõ tna bmo bhau bsya Ait mamo snok mam hame wajin ye.
⌞Soh anu aro nhai to,⌟ nnaut tna nkyas bokyas refo kʼanya. Bokyas refo kbe mno re anu sraujin toni fee.
Wore wo
hah yama u to, amu ne nwe kʼanu u nno fyi?
Anu nhar oh nwe wore wo Ait hah yama u to, kbe yama tubor. Kbe raa siwyan fefares tibyo ana mrok. Reto mnan fi wore wo raa mama msyõf bo ti sai. Ja raa siwyan fefares ye.
Tna raa ro wase
fares to, taro mawe, “Arin moof sai. Kbe bo mkair-kar aro mai kʼamu fee. Kbe amu nhau riof sai.” He mfe. Mam wore weto kbe
yno bo ro mkair btek mai abut kʼana. Kbe ana mkai riof fee. Mnan mfi fnya ro mhaf to. Au mhau, mhau to, tna wase wore wo au kborham tna kbe ku rau mbtek.
Anu fo raa ro Kristen. Anu nhau mam wore wo mamur u fee. Anu nhar nwe kbe meen tabam haberek tna
hah yama u. Nhar oh. Feto kbe ati ro Yesus hah yama u to, kbe anu nrok fee. Raa roto kbe mrok. Kbe mrok mnan mfi ja raa mrok mam ati ro raa mama msyõf bo wana ti sai.
Anu fo raa ro nhau mam wore wo maah. Anu fo nfi raa ro mhau mam wore mamur fee. Anu nhau mam mti fee.
Menohe raa taro wase bo ro
Ana mfi raa ro mjin tu sorni ana sai. Menohe anu fo bhau siwyan yoyo wea sai. Bhau bkit wanu maah. Bhau btak bisoh anu kaket ye.
Raa ro mjin to, ja mjin mti. Tna raa ro bisir bo to, mbisir mti ye.
Menohe anu fo hayah. Anu ja bhau mam wore wo maah. Feto to anu ja bnaut anu re bno-na bo fee. Tna anu beroh smot
ye. Anu beroh bhaf moof kʼanya ye. Anu bno bo weto to, bno wa re kbe anu aro btek bwe mam iro fee. Anu bfi raa ro sbe. Ana myum bo wa mawe mno riof kʼana. Raa ro sbe ja myum ratan ro
mkah bo mno wa kbe raa mama mame ana majat fee. Tna anu bmo wai
Yesus, kbe yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu. Reto mfi raa sbe ja sbyõ watau ro
Ana myum bo wa mawe mno riof kʼana.
Allah ysok anu fo. Ysok tna ksoh yawe meen yno bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼanu to fee. Bi Ait ysok anu tna ksoh yawe Yesus
ranu yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu.
Tiwya Ait yhai. Yhai afo re kbe anu bhai tibyo fee. Yawe anu ro bhau baam mam tabam refo fares tna bsya anu ro bhai wia oh, meen anu bsen beta bmo bhau su bsya Ait ye.
Nkyas bokyas ro moof weto kʼanya re kbe anu nhau smot Yesus matak. Nkyas bo moof kʼanya re kbe anu aro waa fee. Tna sraujin fee. Tna nnaut yyi fee ye. Thar tawe anu ja nno bo weto, nno kaket oh.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; hartu raa ro Allah yse mbo anu. Ana weto ja mur-mur mkyas
Yesus yasom kʼanu. Tna ana ja watum bo kʼanu ye.
Ana mno bo ro moof feto. Tibyo natmof ana tna hartu ana ye. Nhau to, niranya kaket nsya raa anya ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; soh raa wanu aro ja yno bo kbik-bak to, nmo nastako ait. Tna soh raa ro sraujin aro to, nmo nkyas bo moof kʼana re ana sorni sraujin wana. Tna ana ro smot
kaket fee, nmo nkyas bo re nno bosmot rana me matak u. Tna sneh-sneh nsya raa anya beta ye.
Kaket anu: Soh raa mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu to, ne nno bo ro mkair ska mai si kʼana ma. Nno bo moof kʼraa wanu ro smot Yesus ye. Tna nno bo moof kʼraa roto taro ye.
Nhau to, simaut mase yoyo sai.
Tna skabuk yoyo ye.
Anu fo raa ro smot
Yesus. Allah ksoh yawe bo bawya sai ro mama to, nyoh asik mase kʼbi Ait.
Tna soh Har ro
mkyas bo kʼanu to, nri kaket, niwana bokyas reto ma.
Bokyas ro
ykyas kʼraa (mfi raa ro
to, niwana bokyas rAit reto ma.
Tna bokyas ro raa mkyas kʼanu to, sanet wia. Ntu tna nmat sas kaket wia. Bokyas ro moof to, nbo nno.
Bo ro mti safo to, beak fari.

Allah tait Raa ro yatak yno raa mhaf tnok. Amu nyoh kʼAit re yama yatam anu re nhau nno bo wAit yoyo sai. Yno anu nhaf, srau wanu beta to mhau moof mfi raa ro wase mber safo. Amu nyoh kʼAit re yatam anu feto mamo snok mam oon ro Yesus
hah ye yama to.
Allah ysok anu ytu yawe nma no kʼAit. Tna bo ro Ait yawe yno to, kbe yno tu oh.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; skabuk amu nbo tuuf ye.
Nmah meen kʼanya ye tna hana anya ye.
Mkah
yatak rAit, amu nbis anu nwe
aam refo kʼraa ro Kristen beta ro mhau mam Tesalonika, afo kbe ana mari beta ye.
Amu skabuk Allah re
ranu Yesus
yatmof anu.
II Thessalonians: Aam refo mbam kʼamu Paulus, Silas ysya Timotius. Amu nmah meen kʼanu
ro Tesalonika. Anu smot Allah, anu Bja ranu ysya
Yesus
Amu skabuk Allah, anu Bja ranu, nyoh re Ait ysya
Yesus
kbe matmof anu tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok sai.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; ja anu smot Yesus
kaket renti naut. Tna anu natmof raa anya to, ja nno matak renti naut ye. Tibyo amu nyoh asik mase kʼAllah yoyo.
Bo weto oh mi amu nkyas
ranu kʼraa. Wore wo amu nmo nirer
Allah roto to, amu nkyas anu. Amu nwe, “Ja bombra ro samyoh mama mai
ro Tesalonika. Tna raa sikowah ana ye. Menohe bosmot rana matak sai fares.”
Anu smot Yesus oh mi bo mkair ja mbtek mai kʼanu. Allah ymat he anu beroh nsom bo mkair-kar feto. Tibyo yawe anu noof nmo nhau mam sawro ro Ait yamo
ybo. Anu bmat bo weto to, tna bhar bwe ati ro Allah hre susai ytu srah to, Ait soko raa sait ye fee. Ja yno bo ro moof sai.
Allah ja yno bo moof toni. Tna meen Ait yno bo ro mkair ska kʼraa ro mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu to, riryõn.
Tiwya raa mno bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼanu menohe Allah kbe yoo riof yee kʼanu riryõn, tna yoo riof yee kʼamu ye. Meen Ait yno bo weto beta mam ati ro
Yesus hah ye yama ybam sawro rAit. Yama mkah yatak rAit ro mase. Kbe yama ysya
wAit mroh mama mam tafoh ro mait warah to.
Tna Ait kbe yno bo ro mkair ska kʼraa ro wase Allah msya raa ro hawe mari tna kro Bokyas Moof
ro
Yesus ranu.
Bo ro samyoh meen mbtek mai kʼana mamo snok hame wajin. Tna
kbe beak ana frok mbam kʼAit mamo mhau hayah. Meen ana weto mahni tak msya bo yase rAit ye.

Bo weto beta meen mabo mam ati ro Ait hah yama. Yama to, kbe raa wAit mbaut yase rAit. Tii anu nri bokyas ro amu nkyas kʼanu to, nfot nse kʼanu. Tibyo meen anu bibi Ait su nsya raa wAit beta ro ja smot Ait.

Amu nnaut bo weto tna re amu skabuk anu yoyo. Amu skabuk re kbe Allah ymat anu yawe anu noof tna ytu anu nmo raa mana rAit ro ybo. Mfo refo anu nwe nno bo ro moof. Anu smot Yesus tibyo nwe nkah bo wAit ye. Tibyo amu nyoh kʼAllah re kbe yoo yatak rAit yee kʼanu re anu nno bo weto kaket. Re kbe yno bo weto beta mrok moof.
Raa mmat anu, raa ro Kristen to. Tna amu skabuk bo ro riwai weto, afo re raa ro mmat anu to, mmat bo yase ro
rAit ye. Re kbe raa bibi
Yesus. Tna re raa mmat bo ro anu nno mam ait yasom to, kbe bibi anu ye. Boatmof ro Allah ranu ysya
Yesus
oh mi yno bo weto beta mabo.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; jõ tkyas baro kʼanu betoo wore wo meen
ranu Yesus
kbe hah ye yama tabam refo u. Tkyas wore wo Ait yakah anu yamo yse mberur su bhau mam wo sau bysa Ait to.
Amu nri he raa baro mkyas kʼanu mawe

Yesus hah yama u oh. Waa ma, bo reto mabo fefares! Soh raa mawe Har ro Allah merif bo reto kʼana to, nri ana ma! Soh raa mawe amu nkom bokyas reto mam aam to ye, nri ana ma! Amu nkyas bo feto fee. Nnaut yyi ma. Bo reto mabo fefares.
Soh fyi-fya sai to, nri bo ro raa mkyas sioh anu to ma. Wore wo Ait hah yama fefares to, bo ewok kbe matim wia: Ro sau to, raa mawat ro ja kro
to, kbe haberek kbor tna hawe kro Ait u. Tna ro ewok to, raa ro yetsu mnis safo sait yama wia. Ait refi Allah siwyan mkah bo yamo yait mam tafoh ro mroon.
Ait retait kbe safuk tawyõ ait uu kar yiwrek bo taro sor ro ja raa smot mfi allah ye. Tna ait bito yaut yamo hre mam Samu ro Allah tna yawe ait tait Allah.
Nnaut nwe mam wore tiwya jõ thau tsya anu to, bo wefo beta jõ tkyas kʼanu oh.
Bo ro mno wa re ait ro yetsu mnis safo retait frok yama fefares to, anu nhar oh. Tna meen ati ro Allah ybis to, kbe ait retait frok yama.
Tak mkair ro ja misti raa mno iro to, mno bo rau oh. Tak reto mhau mno bo rau to, mno wai sai fares. Menohe raa sait ririt tak reto fares. Meen
ybis tna ait ro ririt tak ro mkair reto kbe bitsre tak reto.
Tna kbe raa mmat ait ro yetsu mnis safo retait frok yama. Menohe ati ro Yesus
hah ye yama to, Ait kbe yame ait ro yno safo retait mkah yafos rAit. Tna fo Yesus frok yama to, tna yase rAit yno raa retait yajat ye.

Raa ro yetsu mnis safo retait meen frok yama. Tna wore wo yhau mam tabam refo to, kbe yno bo ro msai mkah yatak ro kabes yabi (Iblis) rait. Kbe yno bo ro msai, tna sair bo ro hnah afo re raa mhar yatak rait. He mfe. Bo ro ait ysair weto to bo sioh beta.

Wore weto to, raa msis kbe hawe mari watum Allah ro ati. Soh raa ksoh mari tna mbo watum ro Allah reto, kbe ana mkai riof ro mase. Menohe ana weto to, hawe. Ana weto to, meen mait mam tafoh ro mroon reto. Ana ksoh smot bo mkair-kar. Ait ro yetsu mnis safo retait ja sioh ana sai.
Reto oh mi Allah ybis bo ro mkair reto mama sioh ana. Tna ana mari ait ro yetsu mnis safo retait tna mfot bokyas rait mse kʼana.
Ana weto mari bokyas ro sioh feto. Ana miwana watum ro
Raa weto to, ja nksoh mno iro. Tna kbe
yno safo mana ymit kʼana weto beta.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na ro

ksoh; tiwya tinyi Allah ysok anu oh yawe yoo riof yee kʼanu. Har rAit misoh anu re nhau nno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Tna anu nri watum rAit tna nhar nwe bo mabo. Au oh mi Allah yoo riof yee kʼanu. Feto oh mi rabu ti wawa to, amu nyoh asik mawat kʼAllah.
Bokyas Moof
ro amu nkyas kʼanu refo oh mi iso ro bi Ait ytu anu nma no kʼAit to. Allah ytu anu nma no kʼAit to, yawe anu nsya raa wAit taro, kbe nhaf nse bo yase ro
ranu Yesus
rait to.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; reto oh mi amu nwe kʼanu nwe, “Nros ntak!” Ja amu nkyas watum kʼanu, tna nkom aam tiim kʼanu ye. Nbo watum ramu reto kaket matak ye.

Amu skabuk Allah Bja ranu. Ait ja yatmof anu. Yatmof anu tna ykyas bo moof kʼanu mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tna Ait yno re anu binaut sne Yesus hah yama u mkah simaut ro mase ye. Amu nyoh re kbe Allah ysya
ranu Yesus
mkyas bo ro moof kʼanu re kbe anu nhau smot Yesus matak. Amu nyoh kʼAna mbewok re kbe Ana moo matak rAna mee kʼanu. Feto kbe anu ntak nkyas bokyas ro moof yoyo tna nno bo ro moof yoyo ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; tiwya tinyi amu nkyas watum ro
kʼanu. Tna anu nri tna nse mam nhaf mato wanu. Mfo refo jõ tawe anu beta skabuk amu afo re watum ro
kbe amu nkyas renti mam rabin taro sor ye. Skabuk re kbe raa mari watum reto tna mawe mbo mno kaket ye.
Raa makin sor ro mari watum refo to, ana taro smot fee. Ana weto baro mimara mtuk. Taro saim bo mkair-kar mai kʼamu. Feto to, skabuk amu afo re Allah kmot amu wa.
tait yoof toni. Bo ro bi Ait yawe to, kbe yno tu oh. Kbe Ait yno re bosmot ranu matak. Tna kbe Ait kmot anu ye mbam bo mkair ro kabes yabi (Iblis) yno mbtek mai kʼanu to.
Amu nhar nwe
yno re anu ja nbo nno bo beta ro amu nkyas kʼanu. Tna amu nhar nwe kbe meen anu nbo nno bo weto ye. Kbe anu susu fee.
Amu skabuk re kbe anu nhar boatmof ro Allah rAit. Tna mam wore wo bo mkair mai kʼanu to, amu skabuk re kbe anu bito nsom bo reto, tna susu fee. Menohe nros ntak nfi bo tiwya Yesus
yros yatak tna bito yasom bo ro mbtek mai kʼAit to ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; amu nbis kʼanu mkah
Yesus
yasom rAit nwe, soh raa wanu aro haweboh tna mari watum ro amu nkyas kʼanu fee, kbe niranya nsya ana weto ma. Sesa anu sai.
Anu nhar nwe, tii wore wo amu nhau nsya anu to, amu haweboh fee. Amu nesait safo nkah bo wamu. Anu beta nesait nmat bo ro amu nno feto. Tna tawe anu kro nno mfi bo tiwya amu nno feto ye.
Tiwya amu sohmaam bo raa to, makus fee. Amu noo pitis nee. Mti baas to, amu nsafo nkah bo wamu afo re amu nno anu hrowyõ ma.
Amu nesait nkah bo wamu sai feto amu raabis ro
wAit. Ja raa
moo boit mee kʼamu niit sai, he mfe. Amu safo nkah bo wamu nesait sai nimyoh marak. Amu nno feto afo re anu nmat bo moof ro amu nno to, tna kro nno bo mfi bo amu ja nno feto ye.
Tiwya wore amu nhau nsya anu fares to, amu nkyas kʼanu nwe, “Awya ro haweboh to, ja ykah bo fee to, noo boit nee kʼait retait yait ma!”
Raa mawe kʼamu mawe raa taro ro mhau msya anu sor to, ja haweboh. Ana mkah bo aro kʼana fee. Ana mhau mkyas bo ro raa mati sai. Reto oh mi amu nkyas bo weto kʼanu.
Mkah Yesus
yasom rAit, amu nbis raa weto nwe, “Nhau knar! Tna nkah bo aro kʼanu nesait. Re kbe anu sohmaam mafer mbam bo ro anu nesait nkah to.”
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; beroh nno bo ro moof. Ne hrowyõ ma.
Mfi bo raa
ranu, taro hawe mari bo ro amu nkom wefo fo, sesa anu sai. Nhau niranya nsya ana ma, re kbe ana hrenaut.
Menohe nmat ana mfi raa ro byoh to ma. Watum ana rere sai, mfi bo nao na kʼanya bo feto ye.
tait yatak yno re anu bhau bhaf tnok. Tna amu skabuk nyoh re anu nhau nhaf tnok mam bombra beta ro anu nno. Tna amu nyoh re kbe Ait yhau yatam anu beta yoyo ye.
Meen mbam kʼjõ Paulus. Aam refo mbam kʼjõ. Anu nhar bokom ajõ to mfi fefo.
Amu skabuk Allah re Yesus
ranu yatmof anu beta. Au oh meto.
I Timothy: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus. Allah tait Raa Sotak ranu. Tna anu bhaf wai
Yesus. Ana mbewok mbis jõ tamo raabis ro Yesus rAit.
Timotius; jõ tkom aam refo tiim kʼnyõ. Tii jõ betoo bosmot refo kʼnyõ. Tna nyõ nrok smot Yesus ye. Feto to jõ tawe nyõ nfi ku ajõ. Jõ skabuk Allah, Bja ranu, ysya
ranu
Yesus afo re ana mbewok matmof nyõ tna mno re nyõ nhau nhaf tnok sai.
Tiwya jõ sikba nyõ tamoʼt oo ro Makedonia to, jõ tbis nyõ nhau wea mam
ro Efesus.
ro mkyas watum ro
mam
reto to, baro mkyas sre. Feto to tawe nyõ nhau mam beto tna nawe wa
weto nawe, “Nkyas watum ro
to, nkyas maja rau kaket!”
Nawe wa raa nawe, “Nkyas mna ro ti ro wia ma! Nkyas masmair biin wanu yoyo to, mnan oh.” Raa ro mkyas bo weto to, saso mak sai meto. Mafer marak sai. Menohe watum ro
to, kbe raa mari tna smot Ait tibyo mkai mafer ro moof.

Bo ro Allah ybis mam watum rAit reto, mafer rau oh mi raa matmof anya. Soh raa mhau mato mboh, tna mhau mhaf moof tna mhau smot Yesus kaket; mkah srau sau sai, mkah srau ewok fee; kbe ana weto ja matmof raa anya ye.
Raa taro me haberek, mhau moof feto fee. Ana weto mamo mweh iso ro mkair sau hayah. Tna ja mkyas bokyas ro mafer marak sai.
Ana mawe mamo
Yahudi. Ana mbetoo Watum ro Musa kʼraa. Menohe ana wase Watum reto. Ana mbetoo Watum reto mfi ana mhar kaket menohe ana mesait srau maja rau kaket fee.
Anu bhar bwe, soh raa kro Watum ro Musa reto, mbo mno kaket to, kbe ana fri mafer.

Tna Allah yoo Watum reto yee afo kbe misoh raa ro ja mno bo ro mkair fo: Raa ro miwer Watum reto ye, msya raa ro ja hafrah raa ro mase ye, tna msya raa ro miwana Allah ye, raa ro mno iro ye, raa ro wase bo skabuk Allah fee ye, tna msya raa ro mame raa majat, ro mame maja, mame mme majat ye. Allah yoo Watum yee re kbe raa weto mmat tna waa.
Tna raa ro mwyah ye, tna msya raa sme ro msya anya ye, tna msya raa ro ja mfot raa mabu ye, raa ro sioh-sah ye, tna awya sai ro yiwana watum ro
roto aro ye. Watum rAit to moof mkah anu raa bbo bno to.
Tna Watum rAit reto mamo mamyot si Bokyas Moof ro Allah
ye. Tna Allah ro ja anu bbaut tait, sair
rAit ro msai reto. Tna
rAit reto, Ait yehau kʼjõ tbo tkyas renti.
Jõ tayoh asik mase
Yesus,
ranu ro yoo yatak yee. Ait yawe jõ raa ro thaf ntrot tibyo ybis jõ yawe tamo tno bo rAit.
Tiwya jõ fi raa ro tamus bi Ait. Tna jõ safo tno bo mkair mai kʼraa wAit ye. Menohe Yesus yatmof jõ. Ti weto to, jõ smot Ait fefares tna jõ wase bo ye. Au oh mi Yesus yatmof jõ.
ranu yatmof jõ toni. Jõ smot
Yesus tibyo Ait yno jõ smot Ait kaket. Tna yno jõ thafri raa anya ye.
Bokyas ro mrof refo fo bo ro ati. Feto to nri nbo kaket:
Yesus yama tabam refo mkah yoo riof yee kʼraa ro ja mno iro.”
Tna jõ fi tno iro mase miwer raa weto beta.
Menohe
yatmof jõ: Jõ fi tno iro mase sai feto tna
yatmof jõ. Yno re kbe raa mmat tna mhar mawe
Yesus tait raa ro yhaf sneh. Kbe raa mmat feto tna smot Ait. Tna mkai riof ro mase ye. Meen ana weto mhau hame wajin ye.
Jõ ksoh raa beta waa kʼAllah. Ait tait
ro yatak ybo tabam refo. Ybo ti ro wia mamo snok mam hame wajin. Ait meen yhau yroon yum. Ait raa mmat fee ye. Tna Ait sait aran ro yase. Nma, anu beta hawyõn tna bbaut Ait mamo snok mam hame wajin.
: Mabo oh!

Timotius, ku ajõ; jõ tsi bo kʼnyõ: Nari bo ro jõ tkom kʼnyõ refo beta. Tiwya raa mkyas bo kʼnyõ, mkyas bo ro mbam kʼAllah. Tna bo ro jõ tsi refo mamyot bo ro tiwya ana weto mkyas ye. Kbe meen bo mama mai kʼnyõ. Tna soh nyõ nnaut bokyas reto to, kbe nyõ nros natak tna beroh nno bo ro
Kbe nyõ nhau to smot Ait kaket. Tna kbe nyõ nhar mam nhaf anyõ nwe ja nyõ nno bo ro moof ye. Raa taro to, ana mhar bo ro moof menohe ana haberek tna hawe bo mbo mno u fee. Tna tis rau to ana smot
Yesus fee ye: Ana bitsre bosmot rana sai makus.
Himeneus ysya Aleksander mno feto oh: Bosmot wana ana beak makus sai. Tibyo jõ tsan ana kabes yabi (Iblis) afo re ana waa tna mashana tna kbe mamus Allah u ma.

Ro sau to, jõ tkyas bo skabuk: Ati ro anu skabuk to, skabuk bo aro rau-rau: Nyoh boyoh ye tna skabuk raa beta ye. Soh-soh bi Ait re kbe yban anu mam bo beta ro anu nno, tna nyoh asik mase kʼbi Ait ye:
Skabuk
na sor msya raa ro mase taro beta re misoh raa wana kaket. Afo re anu bhau kbum, mam arin ro moof. Skabuk re kbe anu bhau bno bo ro Allah ksoh, tna waa bi Ait ye.
Allah, Raa Sotak ranu, ksoh yawe anu skabuk feto.
Ait ksoh yawe raa beta kbe mkai riof ro mase. Tna ksoh yawe raa beta mhar watum rAit ro ati.
Au oh mi: Allah tait sait aran yase. Tna
Yesus yamo Raa Sotak, yros susai masuf ysya Allah tna ysya anu ye. Yesus fi Raa ro
ysan yetsu rAit mkah raa mame. Anu raa beta bno iro. Menohe Yesus bitsre Ait raa mame riryõn. Yesus yno bo reto mam ati ro Allah yawe.
Tna Allah ybis jõ tama tkyas bo refo. Yawe jõ betoo bosmot ro ati refo kʼraa mana ro Yahudi to fee. Yawe jõ tamo tkyas kʼraa mana roto makin sai. Bokyas refo mabo, jõ sioh fee.
Jõ tkyas kʼraa sme beta tawe, “Nisoh anu re nhau nno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Nisoh anu wia feto, tna tubat ntem wanu abyõ skabuk nkyas bo kʼAit. Tna kmo anya to ma. Ntoh anya to ma.”
Tna jõ tkyas kʼfnya beta tawe, “Nyum ratan ro kmun. Nyum ratan ro mabyoh maut afo re raa mmat tna mbibi anu to, ma. Nyum ratan ro afo sai. Naya nana toni ma. Fayir anu toni ma.
Anu ro nwe anu ja nhau nrat nsya Allah to, nhau nno bo ro moof sai.
Ati ro
skabuk su to, anu fnya hre shait tna knar nri watum sai. Nsu heyut tna nri raa ro mase mbo anu.
Soh anu fnya nmo
to, nwatum raa sme to ma. Nbis-bas bo kʼraa sme to ma. Shait sai nri bo ro ana mawe.”
Tiwya tinyi rau to, Allah yfen Adam wia yatim tna yfen Hawa.
Tna kabes yabi (Iblis) besruf Adam fee. Fnya oh mi Iblis besruf tna au mbtek mam iro to.
Ro moof to, fnya mhau smot Yesus, tna matmof raa anya, tna mhau mno bo ro Allah wAit sai, tna mbo ana kaket to. Soh fnya mbo bo weto mno to, kbe mabe ku tna mkai riof mbam Allah.
Bokyas refo fo bo ati: “Raa ro yawe yamo
to, ait ksoh yaut hre mam hroh ro moof.”
Anu nsok raa ro yamo

wanu sait to, nsok kaket. Nsok raa ro wase mber safo be kbe raa mkyas-kas ait. Nsok raa ro ja yno bo mfi fefo: Raa ro yoo fnya sau aran sai, ro yiramu ait rere, ro ynaut ait re yno-na bo fee, ro ja yitrah amah rait kʼraa, tna ro yhar bo watum raa ye.
Ro ksoh yata
fee, ro kmo yoyo fee, ro sneh sai, ja yiranya ysya raa roto ye, tna yasu mase mkah pitis fee ye.
Nsok ait sait ro ja yisoh fnya rait msya ku wait kaket moof. Tna ybo ku wait kaket re ana waa ait tna mari bo ro ait yawe.
(Soh ait tait wase ybo fnya msya kukek wait kaket fee to, kbe ait yisoh
Allah to fyi?)
Nsok raa ro yashana smot Yesus tna sai to ma. Soh ait tna sai yamo raa ro Kristen to, tna yamo
to, kbe ait tawyõ ait ai tna btek yno iro mnan tiwya tinyi kabes yabi (Iblis) yno ye. Feto to nsok raa sait ro smot Yesus ooh oh.
Nsok raa ro yasom rait to moof kbe yamo
. Raa retait ja raa ro mne mhar ait tna mawe ait yasom rait to moof ye. Soh mfe to, kbe raa maun, tna ait btek mam kayah ro kabes yabi saro to.
Raa ro mamo
to, nsok raa ro ja mfi fefo: Raa ro waa Allah, ro srau ewok fee, ro ksoh mata
fee, ro srau mnaut bosatoh re kbe mno bo mkair fee ye.
Raa ro mbo bosmot ranu matak. Bosmot ranu refo to, maja rau taro samyoh. Tna raa ro mamo
to, nsok raa ro mhar bo maja weto tna mhar mam mhaf mato mawe bo mabo.
Raa ro mawe mamo
to, nsok ana fooh ma. Nsanet raa weto wia. Tna soh ana mhau mno bo ro moof to, kbe nsok ana nse mamo
mno bo ro
Nmat sas raa retait yfain ye.
yfain to, fnya ro ja waa Allah, ro ja mkyas mun-mun raa fee, ro miramu au rere, tna raa taro mmat au, tna mhar mawe bo bawya ro au mno to ja mno bo moof. Au wase bo sioh raa.
Raa ro mamo
to yoo fnya sau aran sai. Raa ro ja yisoh kukek msya raa wait kaket moof ye.
Soh
yno bo ro
kaket moof to, kbe raa hartu ait. Tna ait yhar yawe bosmot rait to, bo ro ati. Tibyo ja ykyas
Yesus yasom msya bosmot rait to, ykyas kʼraa kaket ye.
Bo wefo beta jõ tkom tiim aam refo kʼnyõ. Jõ tksoh tama tmat nyõ fooh, tna tiim aam refo matim wia kʼnyõ ye.
Soh jõ tarak fares to, nmat aam refo re kbe nhar iso ro
mhau mno bo ranu. Anu fo raa ro Allah wAit. Allah ro yaam. Anu raa
to, ja nros tubat watum rAit ro ati. Anu ja nros kaket nbo watum rAit matak. Anu nfi sankaf ro mros matak ja tubat amah rau ye.
Bosmot ranu maja rau baro samyoh: Ja raa srau mnaut fooh to fee ye. Menohe anu ro smot Ait to bhar bwe:
“Yesus yama tabam refo. Yama tna yetsu rAit yfi raa sai. Tna Har ro
mawe Ait raa ro wase yber safo. Tna
sor mmat Ait ye. Tna raa mkyas Ait yasom kʼraa mana ro mhau mam tabam refo beta. Tna raa smot Ait. Tna Allah tubat Ait yakah yamoʼt sawro rAit.”
Har ro
mawe ayõ ro meen wono to, raa ro ja smot
baro kbe haberek kbor wana tibyo smot Ait u fee. Ana me mari har ro besruf raa, tna kro bokyas ro kabes.
Bokyas wefo mbam kʼraa ro hren ksuk. Raa weto mamo wan-wan sai. Ana mkyas bo siroyõ. Ana mhaf mkair. Soh Har ro
mbesi bo kʼana to, ana mari fee.

Ana weto mawe wa kʼraa mawe, “Noo fnya ma!” Mawe raa mhau sai semana bana. Mawe fnya mhau bana seren sai. Tna raa weto mawe wa mawe, “Nbo kak ma!” Nri ana weto ma. Nnaut nwe kak to, tii Allah yfen mkah bo raa mabo. Kak weto Ait yfen mkah bo anu raa Kristen to bbo. Anu ro smot
fo bhar iso rAit ro ati re ja anu byoh asik mase kʼAllah tna bbo sai.
Bombra ro Ait yfen to weto beta moof. Soh raa mayoh asik mase kʼAllah mkah bo ro ana mabo to, bo sohmaam ro mbau to, aro fee.
Watum ro Allah msya skabuk ranu to, mno bo weto beta to, bo ro Allah yawe moof sai.
Timotius; soh nyõ betoo bo ro riwai weto beta kʼraa Kristen mam weto to, reto moof. Nyõ nno bo ro
Yesus ybis kʼnyõ nno to, kaket oh meto. Nno feto to, nyõ nkro iso ro bosmot ranu kaket, tna ja nari maja rau ro ati kaket ye.
Nnaut oh: Bokyas mna ro mafer marak to, mbeak fari. Nari ma. Beroh nhau nrat nsya Allah.
Mfi bo raa mur-mur yno yetsu rait yrok yoof to, mafer reto mabuf sai. Menohe raa beroh mhau mrat msya Allah to, mafer mase mkah bombra beta; mfo refo ye tna meen mkah makyon rouu ye.
Nari oh: Bokyas refo bo ro ati!

Anu fo bsam wai kʼAllah. Ait tait Raa Sotak ranu, Allah ro yaam. Anu bhar bwe bo ro Ait yawe to, meen mabo. Ait yawe yoo riof yee kʼraa beta. Anu bsam wai kʼYesus tibyo ait ysan riof kʼanu beta. Au oh mi anu safo bkah bo rAit.
Timotius; nkyas tna mbetoo bo wefo beta
⌞ro Efesus reto.⌟

Soh raa miwana nyõ tna mawe nyõ mere fares to, hrenaut ma. Nhau nbo kek mram iso ro moof kʼraa Kristen taro: Nkyas bokyas ro moof sai. Nno bo ro moof. Natmof raa, smot Yesus kaket, tna waa kʼAllah re kbe nno iro fee. Soh raa
reto mmat bo ro nyõ nno weto to, kbe ana mno mfi bo nyõ nno feto ye.
Tna wore nyõ nhau ste jõ tama to, nmur-mur
Bokom ro Allah
Tna betoo maja rau kaket re kbe raa mari mbo mno ye.
Tiwya
skabuk nyõ. Ana mawah matem wana mse kʼnyõ abyõ. Tna
na mawe Allah yoo bouum ysan kʼnyõ. Bouum reto mno kbe nyõ nno bo ro
kaket. Feto kbe nmur-mur nno bo weto kaket!
Beroh nno bo weto kaket afo kbe raa beta mmat mawe bo ro nyõ nkah weto moof miwer bo ro tiwya nyõ nno ye.
Hamer nkyas watum ro Allah maja rau ro ati. Beroh nno bo wefo beta kaket afo kbe nyõ nesait nkai riof tna nsya raa makin ro mari nyõ to, kbe mkai riof ye.
⌞Mfi bo raa yabi sait yno bo mkair to,⌟ bhah ait ma. Hartu bi ait tna nerif iso ro moof kʼait yfi bo nyõ naja anyõ ye. Nmat raa sme ro tna mfi bo nao na ye.
Nmat fnya mabi mfi bo nme anyõ ye. Tna nmat ku ro ano mfi bo nano na sai ye. Nmat ana to, waa Allah re nno iro to ma.
Nkyas kʼraa
reto nbis nawe ana mmat fnya semit ro mesait mhau kar. Nno be ana weto mhau bo marak.
Semit ro ku wana aro mhau fares, soh mfe semit ro matat wana mhau fares to, nbis raa wana weto kbe mmat semit rana. Mmat ana to, sroh bo ro tiwya fai au mno kʼana to. Reto to, Allah ksoh.
Semit taro mesait mhau kar. Raa ro mmat ana aro fee. Ana msam wai kʼAllah ro ymat ana sai. Mti-baas to ana skabuk Allah tna msan ana kʼBi Ait ymat.
Menohe semit roto taro mhau mnaut bo ro tabam sai. Ana mnaut Allah fee. Ana wefo mhau maam fares. He mamos wana ro smot Allah to, mhai oh.
Nkyas bo wefo beta kʼraa
ye. Soh ana mno bo moof kʼsemit wana to, kbe raa mkyas-kas ana fee ye.
Tna mfi bo raa sait hawe ymat raa wait to, bhah ait nawe, “Raa ro smot
fee mno bo mkair rof, mbau a. Menohe nyõ beak bosmot anyõ nno-na bo feto to, nno bo ro mkair toni meto!”
Nmat semit mam
ranu. Nsok semit taro tna nkom ana masom mam
Semit ro kbe
mmat to, semit mfi fefo: Semit ro
maut yut. Tna ro tii msya raa sait aran sai.

Nsok semit ro ja raa mhar oh. Mhar tna mawe au ja mno bombra ro moof: Tii au misoh kukek wau kaket. Tna semit reto ja mitrah amah rau kʼraa ye. Raa ro Allah wAit mbam remo roto mama to, au mmat ana, kamus maa wana bo to. Semit reto ja moo bo mee kʼraa ro bo marak. Nsok semit ro mur-mur mno bo moof aro rau ye. Tna nkom ana masom wana mam
reto.
Semit ro fnya fain fares to, nkom ana masom mam
reto ma. Kbe ana mawe mamo msya raa u. Tna kbe ana mnaut
kaket fee.
Ana weto kbe msya raa rouu tna miwana bo ro tii ana mawe.
Nno be
mmat semit ro fnya fain fares to, tna fnya weto haweboh sai. Kbe ana hre mam amah mafoh na wana sai. Hre msya ana rabu wawa tna mkyas raa. Kbe ana mkyas bo raa mati, tna mkyas-kas bo ro mkair-kar ye.
Reto oh mi jõ tawe ⌞nkom ana masom mam
reto ma.⌟ Ro moof to semit ro fnya fain fares mamo msya raa u. Tna mabe ku, tna mhau msui misoh amah wana msya kukek wana. Feto kbe raa ro hawe anu to, kbe mkyas-kas anu raa ro Kristen bsom ranu fee.
Semit baro hah me kro iso ro kabes yabi (Iblis) oh.
Semit to, nbis kukek wana mesait mban semit wana wia. Menohe semit ro mesait mhau kar to, kbe
mban ana mesait sai aran. Afo re
msui fee.
ro ja misoh
kaket to, nbis raa
nawe, “Hartu raa weto.” Tna
ro mur-mur mkyas tna betoo watum ro Allah to, nbis raa
nawe, “Hartu raa weto kaket matak!”
Bokom ro Allah mkyas mawe,
“Wore
mkah bo wanu to, nke masoh rau to ma, nhau au mait bo.”
Ulangan 25:4
Tna,
“Raa ro ykah bo wanu to, nren ait tu oh.”
Soh raa sait yaun boun
to, nari boun ro ykyas reto ma. Soh raa mabo ewok, tuuf mkyas feto ye, kbe nari tna nkyas bo reto.
Raa ro mno iro to, bhah ana wore raa
mari ye, afo re raa taro mrok waa ye.
Nari bobis riwai wefo fo kaket. Ati ro nyõ nhau susai ntu srah to, nno ntrot sai. Soko raa sait bo ma. Bo ro jõ tbis nyõ nno wefo fo, Allah yros ymat ye,
Yesus yros ymat ye tna
ro Allah ysok to, ana mmat ye.
⌞Ati ro nyõ nsas raa sait yamo
to, srot-srot nsok raa sait ma.⌟ Srot-srot tubat natem nse kʼraa retait to ma. Tna kaket nyõ: Soh raa taro mno iro to, nsya ana nno-na bo ye to ma. Kaket nyõ tna waa Allah re nno iro fee
(Timotius; ntkif nhaf anyõ ro ja mham to. Nata aya mesait kar sai ma. Nata
maya kebet ye.)
⌞Nsok raa ro mamo
to, kaket.⌟ Iro ro raa mno taro to, raa mhar tetara. Tna raa mtu srah wana fefares. Iro ro raa mno taro to, ana mno wai. Tna mamo muktis rau to raa mhar tis ye tu oh.
Feto ye bo moof ro raa mno to, taro kbe raa mhar ye. Bo moof ro raa mno taro to, raa mno mmyõt wai menohe kbe raa mhar ye tu oh.

Raa Kristen ro mamo sryan boh kʼbobot wana to: Waa tna nri bobot wanu kaket. Hartu ana afo re raa ro Kristen fee kbe mmat anu nhaf mato ro moof to. Feto kbe ana mkyas-kas Allah ranu yasom to fee. Feto kbe ana mkyas kair bosmot ranu fee ye.

Soh bobot wanu raa ro Kristen fee, hartu ait retait ye. Tna soh bobot wanu raa ro Kristen to, hartu ait retait ye. Ait ynan fi anu nao ranu. Feto to, niwana ait ma. Hartu tna nri bo kʼbobot retait kaket. Nno bo rait kaket ye. Bobot ro mkai bo ro moof mbam kʼanu to, ait smot Yesus ye. Tna Allah yatmof bobot retait ye.
Timotius; nkyas bokyas refo
ye. Nbis nawe ana mbo mno.

Raa taro mkyas watum ro Allah to, menohe mkyas maja rau to, kaket fee. Ana miwer maja rau ye. Ana sioh miryõ bonaut wana ye. Raa taro to, mno mkair feto. Soh raa sait ykyas watum ro Allah to, menohe yisnak maja ro Allah feto to, ait wase iso ro
ranu Yesus
Ait srau rait ha-hayah. Ait yerif iso ro mkair. Yerif iso ro moof ati to fee.

Ait retait wase bo. Ait bibi ait yesait sai ai, tna ait tri-tri santri bosmot sininya ro mayõ raa mmak ye. Raa santri bo feto to, ana mno re raa mhaf mkair, ja mno raa maun boun kʼanya ro mkair, tna mbat-bat anya ye.
Raa ro mkyas bo mweh feto to, mno raa ngko-ngkat anya miyõ kait. Ana weto mhaf, srau wana mkair, ana wase watum ro ati. Tna ana mnaut mawe mbam bosmot ranu ro Kristen to, kbe mbobot.
Raa baro ja mno bo ro Allah ksoh tna mawe mhaf wana mnan oh meto. Ana weto mkai mafer ro moof ati mbam bosmot ranu.
Tiwya ati ro anu fnya wanu mabe anu to, anu bbo bo aro frok fee. Tna meen anu frok bbam tabam refo bbo bo aro bmo fee ye.
Feto to, soh anu bkai boit ro biit, msya ratan ro byum baro to, bo weto mnan sai oh.
Raa ro saso bobot sai, srau wana ro mkair ja miwro ana. Tibyo ana mamo mam iso ro mkair tna mbtek mam kayah mato. Bo ro msai mbtek mai kʼana.

Raa ro ja srau mnaut pitis sai to, kbe bonaut reto misti re ana mweh iso ro mwak. Tna ana kro iso ro bosmot ranu u fee. Tibyo mno bo ro mkair-kar msis. Tiwya raa ro Kristen mabo baro mamo mam iso ro mkair reto oh. Tibyo bombra ro mkair mbtek mai kʼana.
Menohe nyõ fo raa ro Allah rait. Feto to nhau toto mam bo ro mkair riwai to beta. Tomer nno bo mfi fefo: Nno bo ro moof, bo ro Allah ksoh sai. Smot
kaket. Natmof raa. Beroh nros nasom bo mkair-kar ro mbtek mai kʼnyõ. Tna nno bo mkah nhaf ro sneh sai yoyo.

Nhau smot Yesus matak. Beroh smot Ait nfi raa ro santri anya mhoh to. Ana ja beroh mhoh mamo snok si tis rau feto ye. Beroh tna mkai roon ro meen hame wajin. Reto oh mi tiwya Allah ytu nyõ yawe namo no kʼAit. Tna tii reto to, nyõ nkyas kʼraa makin nawe nyõ kro Yesus to ye.
Mfo refo jõ tsi bo kʼnyõ. Tsi bosi wefo mam wore Allah ymat ye, tna mam wore wo
Yesus ymat ye: (Allah oh mi Raa ro yoo yafos yum kʼraa msya bombra wofo beta. Tna
tiwya ykyas bosmot ro ati refo wia kʼPontius Pilatus ye.)
Tsi tawe: “Nari tna nno bo ro jõ tkom mam aam refo. Nno bo weto beta kaket. Nno bo mkair ma be kbe raa mkyas-kas nyõ. Nhau nno bo weto yoyo mamo snok mam ati ro
ranu Yesus
hah yama u.”
Meen Yesus hah yama u mam ati ro Allah yawe. Allah tait yase yiwrek raa beta. Anu bbaut bi Ait. Ait tait
ro yase tna ybo
ro mhau mam tabam refo beta. Tna Ait Bobot ro yase yiwer bobot taro sor beta.

Ait yesait aran yhau yroon, bi Ait meen yhai fee. Tna Ait yhau mam wore kek ro maah tna kren-kran toni. Raa aro mamo mros kait mmat Ait fee. Nama, anu heyut bi Ait ro ybo bombra beta mkah yatak rAit ro meen mhau hame.
: Mabo oh.

Nkyas kʼraa ro bobot to, nawe ana safuk mawe ana u kar to ma. Kbe bosatoh ro ana mse mam tabam refo to mno riof kʼana fee. Bosatoh mhau kait fee. Kbe meen bo weto mhau akus mam tabam refo. Ro moof to, ana msam wai kʼAllah sai ro yoo bombra msis-sas yee kʼanu bhaf bse.
Nkyas kʼana nawe bo moof ro ana mno to, bo ro ati miwrek bosatoh ro ana mse. Ro moof to, ana msan bo kʼraa. Tna saim kta wana mkah mhaf wana ro ase.
Feto oh mi ana mame kta ro meen mhau hame. Feto oh mi ana siwyan bo matim wia mkah meen wore wono. Feto oh mi ana mkai roon tna mhau hame wajin.
Timotius; Allah yoo watum rAit yehau kʼnyõ nbo kaket. Nirit nyõ nkah bokyas mkair ro mafer aro fee ye. Nhau toto mam bo santri ro mno raa mhar bo fee. Bo santri reto to mkair.
Bo santri reto misti re raa mabo baro sikba bosmot ranu ro Kristen.
Jõ skabuk Allah afo re Ait yatmof anu.
II Timothy: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ, Paulus.
Allah ksoh tibyo jõ tamo raabis ro
Yesus rAit. Tna Ait ysi yawe anu ro biranya bsya Yesus to, kbe meen bhau hame wajin.
Timotius; jõ tksoh nyõ nfi ku ajõ. Jõ skabuk Bja Allah, re Ait ysya
ranu
Yesus matmof nyõ tna moo riof mee kʼnyõ. Tna jõ skabuk re ana mno anu nhau nhaf tnok sai.
Jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah. Jõ tno bo ro Ait ybis yawe. Tno bo wAit mkah thaf ro moof mfi hohos wojõ tiwya mno ye. Jõ tnaut nyõ tna skabuk nyõ yoyo ye.
Tiwya ati ro jõ sikba nyõ tamo to, tnaut nyõ sraujin toni. Tnaut tawe nyõ nawia ye tna jõ tksoh hah te tama to kʼnyõ afo re jõ simaut mase.
Jõ thar tawe nyõ smot Yesus matak. Nyõ smot Ait matak mfi fai Lois, matat anyõ msya nme Eunike. Ana mbewok smot bi Ait matim wia tna fo nyõ smot Ait ye.
Tii jõ too tatem ttor kʼnyõ abyõ to, skabuk nyõ. Tna
yoo bouum yuumto kʼnyõ. Nnaut bouum reto to, nsorni ma.
Nnaut nwe Har ro
mno re anu waa ma. Har reto mno anu bros btak. Mno anu batmof raa anya ye. Tna mno anu bnaut anu re bno-na bo fee ye.
Feto to, nkyas
ranu yasom rAit to, kaket. Hrenaut ma! Jõ tkyas
Yesus yasom ye, tibyo raa mfot jõ. Tna jõ twok
mam befo. Menohe saban jõ fo ma. Nsan nyõ to, nkro nno nfi jõ ye. Kbe anu mbewok bkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus
. Tna mkah Allah yatak rAit to, kbe anu mbewok bros bsom bo mkair-kar ro mai kʼanu ye.

Ait oh mi yoo riof ro mase yee kʼanu tna ytu anu bmo raa wAit. Yawe anu bhau fares fo, bhau bno bo moof ro Ait ksoh. Bo ro bi Ait yno kʼanu wefo fo, anu bno bo moof kʼAit wia fee. Bi Ait ksoh rAit sai oh mi Ait yatmof anu. Tiwya tinyi yfen tabam refo fefares to, Ait yawe yatmof anu tibyo ybis
Yesus yama.
Tna Allah yno boatmof rAit mabo mam wore wo
Yesus yama sbi hri wa tak ro mkair. Tak reto ja mno raa mhai to.
Yesus tait raa sotak ranu. Bokyas ro Moof
mkyas bo reto. Bokyas ro Moof reto mfi kek ro merif iso. Au oh mi meen anu bhau hame wajin, kbe bhai fee.
Tna Allah ysok jõ yawe tamo raabis rAit. Ait yawe tbo Bokyas ro Moof
reto tamo tkyas tna betoo kʼraa ye.
Jõ tkyas Yesus yasom oh mi jõ tkai arin mkair refo. Menohe jõ saban ⌞thau mam

refo⌟ fee. Jõ smot bi Ait. Tna thar tawe Ait yatak re kbe kmot Bokyas ro Ait yoo yee kʼjõ reto. Thar tawe Ait kbe kmot Bokyas rAit, maja rau ro ati reto. Kmot mamo snok mam ati ro tabam refo haberek u.
Bokyas ro jõ tkyas reto to, maja rau to mnan si. Feto to noo bokyas reto nbo nkyas kaket. Nkyas mamyot bokyas ro nyõ nari kʼjõ reto ye. Tna nhau smot
Yesus matak. Nhau natmof raa ye.
Kmot Bokyas ro Moof
ro Allah yoo yee kʼanu bkyas to.
reto to, mfi kta ro moof ati. Har rAit ro mhau kʼanu mbewok to, kbe mno nyõ natak nno bo reto.
Nnaut nwe raa ro Kristen mikba jõ akus. Ana ro mbam rabin ro Asia Kecil to, masen haberek kbor bana. Figelus ysya Hermogenes ro ja mban jõ to, ana mbewok mikba jõ ye.
Menohe Onesiforus ysya raa wait rabu ti wawa fo, ana mros tis kʼjõ. Jõ skabuk
re kbe bi Ait yatmof ana. Jõ twok mam
to, tna ait yawe hrenaut aro bo fee, ait beroh yama sai.
Ati ro ait yama snok
ro Roma to, ait safo saso jõ. Tna fo ykai jõ.
Nnaut bo knik-knak ro moof tiwya ait yno kʼjõ mam
ro Efesus ye. Jõ skabuk
re kbe yatmof ait mam ati ro Ait yama yros susai ytu srah kʼraa beta.
Timotius; nyõ nfi ku ajõ. Jõ tkyas watum refo kʼnyõ afo re nyõ nros natak mkah boatmof ro
Yesus.

Tiwya tkyas bo kʼnyõ mam wore wo raa msis mros mari ye to. Nbo bokyas reto tna ne nkyas kʼraa ro ja mros tu smot Allah; raa ro kbe susu fee. Nehau bokyas ajõ reto kʼraa ro mhar bo. Tna kbe ana me mkyas bokyas reto kʼraa roto taro renti ye.
Anu kro
Yesus tibyo bo mkair-kar mai kʼanu to. Kbe anu siko bsom sai, mfi raa sbe ja siko masom bo mkair-kar ro mbtek mai kʼana.
Raa ro sbe to, ja ana mkah bo wana mesait fee. Ana mhau mrero sai. Ana mhau siwyan mari mno bo ro bi yabi ybis yawe sai.
Tna raa ro wareet msom kakas to, soh ait hawe kro bo maja rau to, kbe raa mse boren kʼait fee.
Tna raa sait ro ymur-mur ykah bo mam armato rait to, kbe ait yait make ro tinyi mbam bo wait ro ykah reto tu oh.
Timotius; nnaut bokyas ro jõ tkyas weto, tna kbe
yno nyõ nhar bo weto beta.
Nnaut oh: Bokyas Moof
ro jõ tkyas refo mkyas Yesus
ro yhai tna yrok yasen. Ait tait Kube ro
Daud.
Jõ tkyas Bokyas ro Moof
refo oh mi jõ tkai bo ro mkair. Raa mfot make jõ tfi raa ro ja yno safo. Menohe raa aro mtai mfot make watum ro Allah reto ye fee.
Jõ tksoh tawe raa ro Allah ysok to, kbe ana beta mkai riof ro Ait ysan mbam
Yesus. Tna kbe mkai bo yase rAit ye. Bo yase ro
rAit to meen mhau hame wajin ye. Feto oh mi jõ siko tasom bombra beta ro mama mai kʼjõ.
Bokyas ro mrof refo bo ati:
“Soh anu bhai bsya Ait su to, kbe meen anu bhau su bsya Ait ye.
Soh anu bhau smot bi Ait matak to, meen anu bsya bi Ait su bbo bombra ye. Soh anu bwaar Ait to, kbe Ait ywaar anu ye.
Soh anu haberek kbor banu tna bhaf makin to, ja Ait yros tu fares, susu fee. Kbe Ait ywaar Ait fee saut.”
Timotius; nkyas bo weto

ro Efesus wono. Ne nkyas bo weto beta afo re ana sorni bo riwai jõ tkom weto ma. Allah ymat bo beta ro anu bno mam tabam refo. Raa baro ksoh hre santri bokyas aro rau. Mno bo reto to, mafer marak. Kbe ana sorni maja ro Allah tna bitsre maja ro ati. Tibyo kair mama mai kʼana. Nawe wa kʼana nawe, “Nno feto ma!”
Nmur-mur nno bo ro Allah wAit. Nkyas Bokyas ro Ati maja rau kaket re raa mhar. Nyõ nno feto to, kbe nyõ saban bo aro fee. Tna kbe Ait yawe nyõ nno bo ro moof.
Bokyas ro mafer marak to, nros nari ma. Bokyas reto mno raa mari Allah fee, mno raa mimara mboh renti sai.
Bokyas mkair reto mbet-bat raa renti mfi abet kair ro ja mabah re kbe mrok mase renti. Himeneus ysya Filetus, ana mbewok mkyas bokyas ro mkair mfi feto ye.

Bokyas ro ati reto to, ana mbewok mkyas fee. Ana mkyas bokyas ro mweh. Ana mkyas mawe, “Anu brok bsen beta mam tabam refo oh.” Raa Kristen baro mari bokyas reto tibyo ana me haberek bitsre bosmot rana reto mrok marak.
Menohe bokyas ro Allah rAit to, mros matak sai. Kbe raa aro mtai mitrah fee. Bokom rAit mkyas mawe,
yhar raa wAit.”
Bilangan 16:5
tna
“Awya sai ro yawe ana smot
to, yako hawe sai ait bitsre iro ro ait yno.”
Amah ro mase to, ja bombra aro rau-rau mhau. Bo weto raa mfen mbam
msya
Tna taro ye raa mfen mbam ara msya koh uun ye. Bo wefo fo, taro mkah bo raa mno bo ro ati kaket, tna taro raa mno bo ro sei sai ye.
Awya ro yisoh yhaf rait moof tna beak bo mkair ro ait yno to, ait retait kbe Allah ysok re yno bo ro ati. Ait yhau yno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Raa retait yhau siwyan yawe yno bawya sai ro moof.
Mere msya ku maut ja ana mhaf myoh mawe mno bo masmamo. Nno feto ma! Tomer nno bo ro Allah ksoh sai. Beroh smot
matak. Natmof raa. Niranya nsya raa ro ja soh-soh
yatam ana tna mhau mhaf moof ye.
Raa taro to ksoh mno bo santri. Ana mkyas bo ro mafer marak. Hre nsya raa ro ksoh mno bo santri feto ma. Nyõ nhar nawe bokyas mfi feto kbe sie raa mafa anya.
Raa ro yamo sryan ro
to, ja yno bo moof kʼraa beta. Ait yhar bo betoo watum ro
kʼraa. Tna raa mno bo mai kʼait to, ait ja yhaf sneh sai kʼana. Masi ma ait yafa ysya raa fee.
Soh raa beswan-swan bo ro ait ykyas to, kbe ait betoo maja rau kʼana rere. Betoo rere tna ynaut yawe kbe
yno ana mhaf mrero, re kbe ana mashana tna fo mari watum ro ati reto.
Raa weto to, kabes yabi (Iblis) yfot ana oh. Ait yake ana matak tna yiwro ana afo re ana mno bo ro ait yawe. Menohe sryan ro
retait ynaut yawe soh raa weto haberek tna mari watum ro
to, kbe ana snok mbam sna ro Iblis, tiwya ana mber.
Nnaut oh, meen wono to, kene wo tabam haberek to, kbe bo ro mkair-kar toni mama mai kʼraa.

Wore weto to, raa kbe mno bo mkair wefo: Kbe ana mnaut metsu wana mesait sai, ana nksoh mame kta, ana masoh mase, tawyõ ana toni, mbat-bat kʼraa, mari bo raa mabi mawe kʼana fee, wase bo mayoh asik mase, ana waa Allah fee,
ana matmof raa fee, hawe bo miranya msya raa fee, ntoo raa, misoh ana kaket fee re mno-na bo, marmtuk, knait bo ro moof,
hren serek, srot-srot mkyas bokyas tna mnaut ttis fee, bibi ana ai sai. Tna ana ksoh bo ro tabam refo sai, ksoh Allah fee.
Ana mamo wan-wan: Ana mno bo raa ro smot Allah ja mno to, menohe ana moo mhaf wana mee kʼbi Ait fee. Mno feto tna ana wase Allah yatak rAit. Niranya nsya raa ro mno bo mkair weto ma.
Raa weto taro mamoʼt amah aro-aro tna besruf raa. Ana mkyas bokyas ro sioh. Tna ana miwro-wra fnya ro bosmot wana matak fee. Fnya weto ksoh mno bo ro mkair tibyo mbtek mno iro mawat.
Fnya weto hre mari watum yoyo menohe ana ntru watum ati ro mbam Allah reto fee.
Tiwya tinyi to Yanes ysya Yambres beswan-swan Musa. Raa weto beswan watum ro ati reto feto ye. Bo ro ana mnaut weto mkair sai. Tna bosmot wana to, Allah knait.
Kbe ana mkyas bo ro sioh tna tinyi rau raa mari. Menohe ti baro firwas tna raa beta mhar mawe ana weto wase bo mfi bo tiwya Yanes ysya Yambres ye.
Timotius nyõ nari watum ro
ja jõ tkyas, tna nyõ nse mam nhaf mato anyõ oh. Tna nyõ nmat bo ro jõ tno. Nyõ nhar jõ thaf ajõ ye. Nyõ nhar nawe jõ smot
Yesus matak. Tna ja thaf tnok sai thau twof bo ro kbe mama. Tna tatmof raa ye. Tna jõ beroh tros tasom bo mkair-kar ro mbtek mai kʼjõ ye.
Jõ raa sikowah-kawah tna bo mkair-kar mbtek mai kʼjõ ye; mfi bo ro tiwya mai kʼjõ mam
ro Antiokhia, remo ro Ikonium tna mam remo ro Listra ye. Menohe
kmot jõ, yno riof kʼjõ.
Raa beta ro kro
Yesus tibyo ja mhau mno bo ro Allah ksoh to, kbe raa mno-na ana tu oh.
Tna raa ro marmtuk msya raa ro siroyõ to, kbe meen ana mno safo renti naut. Ana siroyõ raa roto tna kbe raa roto siroyõ ana ye.
Menohe nyõ nhaf anyõ to, mnan anya msya ana weto fee. Nyõ nhar watum ro
Nyõ nhar mam nhaf mato nawe bo ro ati reto. Tawe nhau nbo watum ro ati reto kaket. Amu ro tiwya nkyas watum reto kʼnyõ to, ja nkyas bo siroyõ fee.
Naban tinyi nkek fares to, raa mkyas Bokom ro Allah kʼnyõ. Bokom reto mno nyõ nhar bo afo re nyõ smot
Yesus. Tibyo nyõ nkai riof ro mase.

Bokom ro Allah reto beta to, Ait yesait besi kʼraa, yawe mkom. Bokom ro Allah reto moof mkah bo mkyas tna betoo kʼraa, afo re ana mhar maja rau kaket. Soh raa mno bo ro mkair aro to, kbe Bokom ro Allah mifah ana. Tna Bokom ro Allah merif iso ro moof re raa mhar tna mno bo ro Allah ksoh. Bokom ro Allah matak re misoh raa mhaf ro mkair to mamo moof ye.
Soh raa ro Allah wAit mmat Bokom rAit to, kbe ana mhau siwyan mno bombra beta ro moof.
Meen
Yesus hah ye yama tabam refo u. Tna ytu safo kʼraa beta. Ytu safo raa ro mhai oh ye msya raa ro mhau fares ye. Yama to, yamo
ybo raa wAit. Reto oh mi jõ tbis bo refo kʼnyõ. Tna Allah ysya
Yesus mros mari tna mmat ye.

Tbis tawe, “Nkyas Watum ro Allah kʼraa. Rabu wawa to, nhau siwyan nkyas Watum ro Allah. Raa mari, soh mfe raa hawe to, beroh nkyas sai. Nawe wa kʼraa nawe, ana mno bo ro mkair to ma. Tna nerif iso ro moof kʼana. Nkyas Watum ro Allah kʼana rere re nisoh mhaf wana msya bosmot rana kaket matak.”
Meen wono to, kbe raa taro hawe mari ⌞bokyas ro Allah⌟ maja rau ro ati. Kbe ana saso
ro mkyas bokyas ro ana nksoh mari sai. Tna ana mtu
weto mama.
Raa weto hawe mari bokyas ati reto, tna ksoh mari bokyas ro mna sai.
Kaket nyõ. Nhau to nno bo srot-srot fee. Beroh natak sai mam arin kair. Nkyas Bokyas ro Moof
Tna nno bo ro
ybis kʼnyõ to beta.
Jõ too tetsu ajõ tsan kʼAllah. Tnaut tawe baro feto tna raa mame jõ tajat.

⌞Jõ tkyas Yesus yasom oh feto⌟ tno bo ro Allah ybis to, beta mkak oh. Tna jõ tomer tno bo reto kaket moof tamo snok si tis rau. Tno mkak oh. Reto mfi raa ro santri anya mhoh to. Ait yhoh yamo snok si tis rau reto ye. Tna jõ smot
matak feto fares ye.
ymat jõ yawe jõ fi raa ro wase tber safo. Tna Ait siwyan boren mkah bo meen yaren jõ oh.

kbe hre susai ytu srah to, tna Ait soko raa sait ye fee. Meen ati ro tabam refo haberek to, Ait ysan boren reto kʼjõ tesait aran fee. Kbe ysan boren reto kʼraa beta ro ste minaut mawe bi Ait meen hah ye yama u.
Fooh re nyõ nama no kʼjõ.
Demas ait saso bo ro tabam refo sai. Tibyo yasen sikba jõ yamoʼt
ro Tesalonika. Tna Kreskes yamoʼt
ro Galatia. Tna Titus yamoʼt rabin ro Dalmatia.
Tna Lukas yesait aran yhau ysya jõ. Nmen Markus tna nakah ait nama. Ait ja mur-mur ysya jõ nno bo.
Jõ tbis Tikhikus yamoʼt
ro Efesus oh.
Ati ro nyõ nama to, noo ratan ro tyum tetsu ajõ ro foos to, nakah nama. Ratan reto tiwya jo sikba akus mam amah ro Karpus rait mam remo ro Troas. Tna noo aam ro bokom wojõ ye. Nsorni ma aam bokom ro
wojõ nakah nama ye.
Bi Aleksander ro ja yfen
tait yno bo mkair-kar mawat mai kʼjõ oh. Kbe
ska ait riryõn mnan si bo ro mkair ait yno kʼjõ feto.
Nyõ kaket ait ye. Ait ja safo yikyak bokyas ro anu bkyas.

⌞Raa ro Yahudi maun jõ. Ana mnaut mawe raa mkyas Yesus yasom to, mber safo meto.⌟ Ati ro raa mkyas safo ajõ tinyi rau to, raa aro mros tis mban jõ fee. Raa beta sikba jõ mamo. (Skabuk Allah re kbe Ait yoo bo mkair reto yee kʼana masom fee.)
Menohe
yatam jõ tna yoo yatak rAit yee kʼjõ re tkyas Bokyas Moof reto beta. Tibyo raa ro wase
to, ana beta mari ye. Raa mtu srah ajõ to,
yno riof kʼjõ. Reto mfi bo jõ snok
masoh rau ro nsibyõ jõ. He mfe.
Tna
kbe yitsre jõ tbam bo ro mkair-kar ro mama mai kʼjõ beta ye. Kbe Ait yno riof kʼjõ, yakah jõ yamoʼt sawro ro Ait yamo
ybo. Ro moof to, raa mbaut Ait hame wajin.
: Mabo oh!
Jõ tmah meen kʼPriska msya Akwila. Tna msya Onesiforus ysya raa wait beta ye.
Erastus yhau akus mam
ro Korintus. Tna bi Trofimus kiyam yhau akus mam remo ro Miletus.
Nama wia fooh wore wo arin ngkanam fee wefo. Ebulus ymah meen kʼnyõ. Pudes, Linus, Klaudia msya raa Kristen beta ro mhau mam befo mmah meen kʼnyõ ye.
Jõ skabuk
afo re yatam nafos anyõ tna yatmof nyõ ye.
Titus: Aam refo mbam kʼjõ Paulus, sryan ro Allah tna raabis ro Yesus
Allah ybis jõ tamo tkyas watum rAit ro ati kʼraa ro Ait ysok. Tkyas watum kʼana afo re bosmot rana matak. Feto kbe ana mhar mno bo ro bi Ait ksoh.
Ana weto minaut mawe meen ana mhau hame wajin. Allah ja ykyas bo sioh fee. Tiwya tinyi Ait ysi yawe kbe raa wAit meen mhau hame. Yawe bo reto tiwya tinyi, wore wo yfen tabam refo fefares.
Bi Ait tait Raa Sotak ranu. Tna oon ro Ait ysok to, Allah yerif Bokyas rAit reto kʼraa: Ait yehau Bokyas Moof reto kʼjõ tna ybis jõ tamo tkyas.
Titus; jõ tkom aam refo tiim kʼnyõ. Bosmot wanu mbewok mnan anya; feto nyõ nfi ku ajõ. Jõ skabuk Bja Allah re Ait ysya Yesus
Raa Sotak ranu, matmof nyõ tna mno re nyõ nhau nhaf tnok ye.
Jõ sikba nyõ nhau akus mam sato ro Kreta mkah nisoh bo ro
Tiwya jõ tbis nyõ nsok raa ro mamo
mam remo wana sor.
Nsok raa ro mfi fefo: Raa ro wase mber safo. Raa ro moo fnya sau aran sai. Tna ku wana to, smot
tna mno-na bo fee. Tna ku wana ja mari bo ro ana mawe.
Ait ro yamo
to, kbe yisoh
ro Allah. Feto to, nsok raa ro wase mber safo. Au oh mi nsok raa ro ja mbibi ana mesait fee, kmo yoyo fee, nksoh mata
fee, mafa msya raa yoyo fee, tna sioh raa mkah bo saso pitis fee.

Feto to nsok raa ro ja yno bo mfi fefo: Ait ksoh yitrah amah rait kʼraa. Ait ksoh yno bo moof. Ait ynaut ait kaket re yno bo ro kbik-kbak fee. Ait ja yno bo ro Allah ksoh. Ait yhau yno bo wAit sai. Tna ait yatak ybo ait yesait re yno bo moof yoyo sai.
Saso tna nsok raa ro ybo watum ro
tna yerif kʼanu kaket. Afo re ait ykyas watum reto kʼraa ro
Afo re ait betoo mkah maja rau ro ati. Tna kbe yisoh mhaf rana msya bosmot rana kaket matak. Ait yhar watum ro
kaket to, kbe ait yatak yawe wa raa ro beswan-swan watum ro ati reto tna yerif iso ro moof kʼana.
Raa ro
Yahudi mawat to, ja mana mase tna mikyak bokyas ranu. Ana mkyas mawe, “Allah ybis yawe raa wAit beta kro bo mafa ro
Yahudi.” Nri ana ma. Ana weto mkyas bokyas ro mafer marak. Bokyas reto besruf raa.
Nkyas kʼana nawe ana shait sai. Ana mkyas bosruf. Raa Kristen msya fnya, kukek wana baro mari bokyas rana oh. Tibyo kro bokyas wana ro mkair weto. Raa ro
Yahudi weto mkyas bokyas feto saso pitis sai.
Tiwya
sait ybam sato ro Kreta ykyas ana yawe:
“Raa ro Kreta to ja sioh-sah raa. Ana mno-na bo mfi fane rbyoh. Ana srak bo tna hawe boh ye.”
Bokyas reto bo ati. Ait ykyas sioh fee. Feto to bhah raa
nawe, “Nri bokyas mkair reto ma. Soh anu kro bo mafa ro
Yahudi to, reto misoh bosmot ranu fee.”
Nawe wa kʼraa Kristen weto afo re ana mari bo mna raa ro Yahudi ja mkyas to, fee. Nawe wa kʼana re kbe ana mari raa weto fee. Raa ro
Yahudi weto, ana mikyak bokyas ro Yesus. Ana mikyak bokyas ro ati meto.

Anu raa ro smot Yesus to, Allah ymat anu yawe anu nfi raa ro mhaf moof oh. Bo ro mbau kʼanu to aro u fee. Menohe raa taro to, smot Yesus fee. Tna mhaf mato wana mkair fares. Ana to ja mawe bo ro mbau to mawat. Ana mhau bo weto menohe mkai mafer aro fee ye. Ana mhaf mkair tna bonaut wana mkair ye.

Ana weto mamo wan-wan mawe ana mhar Allah kaket. Menohe soh anu bmat bo ro ana mno to, anu bhar bwe ana wase bi Ait. Allah knait bo ro ana mno weto. Ana hawe mari bo ro bi Ait yawe. Ana matak mno bo ro moof aro fee.
Titus; nkyas bokyas ro Allah, maja rau kaket.
Nkyas kʼraa sme ro mabi nawe, “Nbo anu nesait kaket re nno bo ro moof yoyo sai. Nno bo moof afo re raa beta heyut anu. Nnaut anu re nno-na bo ma. Nbo watum ro
maja rau kaket. Natmof raa. Tna nros ntak smot bi Ait mam wore wo arin mkair.”
Feto ye, nkyas kʼfnya ro mabi nawe, “Nhau to, nno bo ro Allah wAit sai. Ntoo raa ma. Nksoh nta
to ma. Nkyas bo kʼraa to, betoo bo ro moof.”
Nkyas feto kʼfnya ro mabi. Tna kbe ana mkyas bo moof kʼfnya ro tna mawe, “Natmof naa msya ku mkek wanu.

Nnaut anu re nno-na bo ma. Nhau to nto mboh. Nisoh amah wanu moof. Nno bo moof kʼraa. Tna nasu heyut naa.” Soh fnya mno bo ro moof weto beta to, kbe raa mmat. Kbe ana mhar mawe anu ro kro Bokyas ro Allah, ja bno bo ro moof sai. Tna kbe ana mkyas-kas anu fee.
Feto ye sobu ku sme ro tna nawe, “Nhau to, nno bo ro kbik-kbak ma.”
Titus; rau ro ati to, nyõ nesait nno bo ro moof beta. Afo re raa mmat bo ro nyõ nno moof to, mawe mno mfi nyõ nno feto ye. Nkyas watum ro
to, maja rau kaket.
Nkyas bo ro moof. Nkyas feto tna kbe raa ro knait anu to, mmat he anu bno bo ro mkair-kar aro fee. Tibyo ana weto hrenaut.
Nkyas kʼsrian boh sor nawe, “Nri bombra beta ro bobot wanu mbis mawe. Ne nkyas si ma. Tna kbe bobot wanu ksoh anu, sryan ro Kristen.
Niswak bo ma. Nhau nhaf wanu ntrot sai. Tna kbe bobot wanu mhar mawe anu ja nno bo ro moof sai. Soh anu nno feto to, kbe raa ro mmat anu ksoh mhar watum ro Allah ye. Ksoh mhar Raa Sotak ranu ye.”
Tiwya Allah yatmof anu tibyo ybis Yesus yama. Yno feto afo re raa beta mhar boatmof rAit. Re kbe ana mkai riof rAit ro mase.

Ait yerif iso ro moof kʼanu afo re anu bno bo ro bi Ait ksoh. Anu saso bo ro tabam refo to, mnan oh. Anu bnaut boatmof rAit reto bwe beak bo ro mkair weto to. Tna boatmof rAit mno anu bnaut anu re bno-na bo fee. Anu fo ja wase bber safo ye. Anu bhau mam tabam refo fo bno bo ro Allah ksoh. Boatmof ro Allah reto mno anu fri mafer mawat oh meto.
Meen anu bhau hame. Anu bkah simaut mase sne wore wono. Ati reto kbe anu bmat bo yase ro Allah rAit. Kbe bmat Raa Sotak ranu Yesus
yama.
Tiwya Yesus yoo yabo rAit yee raa mame mfi bofes. Yno afo re yoo riof yee kʼanu ro ja bno iro. Ait yno anu bhaf wanu moof. Tibyo anu bmo raa mana rAit. Anu fo raa ro ksoh bno bo ro moof.
Titus; nkyas bo refo beta
Nbo ana susu afo re ana mari mno bo refo. Nkyas bo moof kʼana afo re ana smot
kaket. Tna nawe wa kʼana ro hawe mari mno. Nyõ nase nno feto. Nno afo re kbe raa aro miwana nyõ fee.
Titus; nbis raa
reto nawe, “Nri
msya raa mase ro mbo anu mam tabam refo. Nno bo ro ana mawe. Nhau siwyan re nsen nno bombra ro moof.
Mbat-bat raa ma. Ngko-ngkat anya ma. Niranya nsya raa mkah nhaf ro sneh sai.”

Tiwya anu bhar Yesus fefares to, anu wase bo ye: Anu bri bo ro raa mawe fee. Tii raa besruf anu ye. Anu srau wanu oot-oot bo ro tabam refo aro rau-rau. Tna bo weto mkyar anu. Tii weto to anu saim-sam bo ro mkair mai kʼraa. Tna baam bo raa. Raa knait anu. Tna anu knait anya ye.
Anu bhaf wanu mkair feto, mamo snok mam ayõ ro Allah yerif boatmof rAit kʼanu. Ait yatmof anu. Tna Ait yamo Raa Sotak ranu.

Bi Ait yoo riof yee kʼanu. Anu tiwya bno bo moof kʼAit wia fee. Bi Ait ksoh rAit sai oh mi Ait yatmof anu. Ait yyon iro wanu mkah Har rAit. Tna Har rAit mno anu brok boof. Anu bfi ku rAit ro Har rAit msair mkah bhaf ro moof. Anu bfi ku mees ro fnya mabe tna.
Allah yno bo mninon kʼanu. Ait ybis Yesus
Raa Sotak ranu yama. Yesus
sotak anu, tibyo Allah yoo Har rAit yse kʼanu.
Anu raa ro bno bo mkair menohe Ait yatmof anu yawe anu bfi ku wAit ro wase mber safo. Yno feto afo re anu bmo ku wAit. Afo re anu binaut bwe kbe ysan roon ro hame kʼanu.
Bokyas riwai reto to, bo ati. Nkyas bokyas reto kʼraa
Nkyas kaket afo re raa ro smot Allah kbe tomer mno bo ro moof to kaket. Awya sai ro mari bokyas refo tna mbo mno to, kbe fri mafer moof.
Raa taro hre santri bo ro mafer marak, mfi bokyas mair ro raa mabe ana (
). Tna raa taro hre mkyas
Yahudi msya Watum ro Musa ykom. Bokyas rana reto mno raa saso-sasa tna mno raa mmak. Nri bokyas rana reto ma. Bokyas reto mafer marak-arak sai.
Soh raa
aro yisti bo re raa brir-brar mam
to, bhah ait. Bhah ait muhrin sau snok ro mun ewok to. Tna soh ait yari bo ro nyõ nkyas fee, nawe wa raa ro Kristen me miranya msya ait ma.
Ait retait yno iro meto, yamo tit yno-na bo sai. Yhar iro ro yno to misti re kbe ait ykai bo, menohe ait beroh yno fares.
Nhau mam sato ro Kreta tno wea. Kbe jõ tbis Artemas soh mfe to Tikhikus yama yo kʼnyõ. Ait snok to, nyõ safto nama no kʼjõ mam remo ro Nikopolis. Kbe tamoʼt remo reto thau mamo snok wore wo hwyõm.
Zenas, ro yhar
retait, ysya Apolos to, mbewok masen sikba ⌞Kreta⌟ ye. Nisoh ana kaket mkah iso ro ana mbewok mamo to, re kbe ana mbewok bo marak mam iso ma.
Jõ ksoh tawe raa wanu mur-mur mno bo moof. Feto kbe ana mmat raa anya tna moo bo mee kʼraa ro bo marak. Ana mno feto, kbe mamos rana mafer moof.
Raa beta ro mhau msya jõ mam befo mmah meen kʼnyõ. Amu nmah meen kʼraa Kristen ro matmof anu. Tna jõ skabuk
afo re Ait yatmof anu beta.
Philemon: Aam refo mbam kʼamu mbewok; jõ Paulus tsya Timotius.
Jõ ja tkyas
Yesus yasom rAit tibyo raa mfot jõ tna twok mam
mam befo. Tna Timotius tait, anu bao ranu mam Yesus
Amu mbewok nkom aam refo tiim kʼanu nbo tuuf; Filemon, Apfia msya Arkhipus, tna msya raa
taro ro ja mama skabuk mam amah ranu. Filemon tait amu nfoh ramu, ro ja ykah bo su ysya amu. Fai Apfia to, anu bno ranu mam Yesus
Tna Arkhipus tait anu bfoh ranu ro ja ysya anu beroh yasom bo ro
ybis ait yno.
Aam refo mbam kʼamu mbewok; jõ Paulus tsya Timotius.
Jõ ja tkyas
Yesus yasom rAit tibyo raa mfot jõ tna twok mam
mam befo. Tna Timotius tait, anu bao ranu mam Yesus
Amu mbewok nkom aam refo tiim kʼanu nbo tuuf; Filemon, Apfia msya Arkhipus, tna msya raa
taro ro ja mama skabuk mam amah ranu. Filemon tait amu nfoh ramu, ro ja ykah bo su ysya amu. Fai Apfia to, anu bno ranu mam Yesus
Tna Arkhipus tait anu bfoh ranu ro ja ysya anu beroh yasom bo ro
ybis ait yno.
Amu mbewok skabuk Bja Allah, re Ait ysya
Yesus
matmof anu tna mno re anu nhau nhaf tnok ye.
Filemon; raa mkyas mawe nyõ smot
Yesus matak. Tna mawe nyõ natmof raa ro Allah wAit beta ye. Jõ tari feto tna ti wawa jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah ro jõ smot.
Filemon; raa mkyas mawe nyõ smot
Yesus matak. Tna mawe nyõ natmof raa ro Allah wAit beta ye. Jõ tari feto tna ti wawa jõ tayoh asik mase kʼAllah ro jõ smot.
Tna jõ skabuk re anu bhaf sau su. Anu mbewok smot
Yesus tibyo biranya moof. Jõ skabuk re anu bhaf sau su bsya bi Ait ye afo re anu bhar bouum ro
ysan kʼanu beta. Re kbe anu bhar bo reto kaket tna bhaf bse bo weto beta.
Raa mawe nyõ nkyas bo moof kʼraa ro Allah wAit. Nyõ nno ana sraujin fee, tna waa fee meto. Tibyo ana mhaf me mnem. Jõ tari nyõ ja natmof raa wAit feto tibyo bokyas reto mno jõ simaut mase.
⌞Jõ fi raabis ro

rAit⌟ feto to jõ tatak re tbis bo sai kʼnyõ. He mfe, jõ thar tawe nyõ ja natmof raa Kristen tibyo jõ tsi bo refo kʼnyõ fee; jõ soh-soh nyõ sai. Tawe natmof jõ ye: Nnaut nawe jõ fi tabi oh. Tna jõ tkyas
Yesus yasom tibyo raa mfot jõ mbu.
⌞Jõ fi raabis ro

rAit⌟ feto to jõ tatak re tbis bo sai kʼnyõ. He mfe, jõ thar tawe nyõ ja natmof raa Kristen tibyo jõ tsi bo refo kʼnyõ fee; jõ soh-soh nyõ sai. Tawe natmof jõ ye: Nnaut nawe jõ fi tabi oh. Tna jõ tkyas
Yesus yasom tibyo raa mfot jõ mbu.
Feto to, jõ soh-soh nyõ tawe natmof Onesimus. ⌞Ait retait sryan boh anyõ ro tiwya yasen ysam wai yamo.⌟ Wore wo jõ thau mam
befo to, Onesimus yama yari jõ tkyas Yesus yasom. Tna ait haberek yamo raa ro Kristen. Mfo refo jõ ksoh ait yfi ku ajõ. Jõ tayoh kʼnyõ tawe natmof ait.
Tii ait raa ro ati kʼnyõ fee; bombra ro ait yno to, nyõ nkai mafer ro ati fee. Menohe mfo refo ait raa ro yafer moof, kbe ait yno bo ro moof kʼanu mbewok.
Filemon; jõ tawyan marak Onesimus. Menohe jõ tbis ait ybo aam refo tna hah ye yama yo kʼnyõ.
Maami, jõ tksoh tawe tabe ait yhau mam befo. Soh ait yhau ysya jõ mam befo to, kbe ait sroh yuk anyõ. Kbe ymat jõ tna yno bo wojõ mam wore wo jõ thau mam
fares fo.
Menohe, jõ hawe tno bo feto. Soh nyõ nbis tain. Thau tari bokyas mbam kʼnyõ wia. Jõ tksoh nyõ nbis ait hah yamo yo kʼjõ mkah ksoh anyõ sai.
Tii ait ybam amah anyõ ysam yamo yhau toto baro wia. Tnaut tawe
ybis afo re kbe ait hah ye yama yhau ysya nyõ tibyo.
Jõ ksoh Onesimus. Tna tnaut tawe kbe nyõ ksoh ait ye miwer jõ. Mfo refo ait yamo sryan anyõ sai fee. Ait yamo raa ro Allah rAit ye. Tibyo ait yfi nyõ nao anyõ mam
ye.
Filemon; ja nyõ nawe anu mbewok bfoh kʼanya mam
Soh nyõ nawe natmof jõ to, jõ soh-soh nyõ tawe nitrah nhaf anyõ kʼsryan boh ranu Onesimus. ⌞Kmo ait ma.⌟ Nitrah nhaf anyõ kʼait mnan anya mfi bo ja nyõ nitrah nhaf tna nmat jõ ye.
Soh ait tiwya yno bo mkair, yiswak bo aro to, kmo ait ma. Tawe jõ tesait tasom safo rait reto.

Jõ tkom aam refo re nyõ nhar kbe jõ sroh bo wonyõ ⌞ro ait ysyõf to.⌟ Nnaut oh, ⌞jõ oh mi tkyas Bokyas Moof ro Yesus kʼnyõ. Tibyo nyõ namo raa ro Kristen to.⌟ Soh nyõ nari boyoh ajõ refo to, reto sroh bo moof ro tiwya jõ tno kʼnyõ reto.
Tafoh ajõ; anu mbewok smot
Natmof jõ. ⌞Jõ waa be kbe Onesimus hah yama to, kbe nyõ kmo ait toni.⌟ Menohe soh nyõ nmat ait mkah nhaf ro moof to, kbe nyõ nno bo ro
ksoh oh meto. Tna kbe nyõ nno jõ te simaut mase.
Bo ro jõ tayoh kʼnyõ refo fo, jõ thar tawe kbe nyõ nno tu oh. Tnaut tawe kbe nyõ nno bo moof miwrek boyoh ajõ refo ye.
Jõ tnaut tawe
yari skabuk ranu. Tna kbe baro feto jõ frok
tna tama to kʼnyõ. Siwyan yuk mam samu anyõ mkah kbe jõ tama tjin wea.
Epafras ymah meen kʼnyõ. Ait tait raa Kristen ro yhau su ysya jõ ye mam
refo.
Tna jõ tafoh na wojõ taro ro ja mkyas Yesus yasom ye, ana mmah meen kʼnyõ ye. Ana masom wana to Markus, Aristarkhus, Demas ysya Lukas.
Jõ skabuk afo re
Yesus
yatmof anu.
Hebrews: Mam masno ro wia to, Allah ykyas bo kʼraa wanu; raa ro Yahudi.
Ait ybis
wAit mama mkyas bo wAit. Mama mkyas bo kʼanu hohos na wanu mam ti aro rau-rau tna mkah iso aro rau-rau ye.

Menohe mam masno ro tis refo to, Ku rAit Yesus oh mi Raa ro ykyas bo ro mbam kʼAllah kʼanu. Allah ysya Ku rAit Yesus yfen ayoh msya tabam refo msya bombra beta. Tna Allah ysan bombra weto beta Ku rAit.

Bo yase ro Ku rAit to mnan anya msya Yaja yase rAit ye. Soh anu bmat tna bhar Ku rAit Yesus, reto mnan anya msya anu bmat tna bhar Yaja Allah ye. Yesus yhau ybo bombra beta. Ait yno mkah bokyas rAit ro matak toni. Tiwya Ait ysair iso ro yyon iro raa. Tna fo yaut yamoʼt sawro. Allah tait
ro yase toni. Tna Yesus yaut yamo hre ysya Ait mam ati ro yatem ati; hroh ro mase toni reto.
Feto oh mi anu bhar bwe Yesus tait yase toni yiwer
sor. Tna bhar bwe yasom rAit 'Ku ro Allah' reto to, yase toni ye.
Tiwya Allah yawe:
“Nyõ fi Ku aJõ oh. Ifo fo Jõ tamo Nyõ Naja.”
Mazmur 2:7
Tna Allah yawe:
“Jõ fo tamo Ait Yaja. Tna Ait tait Ku aJõ.”
1 Tawarikh 17:13
Ja Allah ytu
aro yawe ku wAit to fee.
Tna Allah ybis Ku bum rAit yamaʼt tabam refo. Ati reto Allah ybis
wAit beta yawe:
“Nmo nbaut Ait.”
Mazmur 97:7
Tna Allah ykyas
yawe:
“Tno
woJõ mnan fi foos. Tna tno sryan woJõ mnan fi tafoh.”
Mazmur 104:4
Menohe Allah yawe Ku rAit yawe,
“Nyõ fi Allah ro nase. Tna namo
nbo raa msya bombra beta mamo snok mam hame wajin. Nyõ ja nbo raa woNyõ mkah nhaf ro moof ati.
Bo ro raa mno moof to, Nyõ ksoh. Tna bo mkair ro ana mno to, Nyõ knait. Feto oh mi Jõ tsok Nyõ namo
Tna ttu
mam nana aNyõ. Tno afo re raa mhar mawe Jõ tsok Nyõ tna teta Nyõ. Tawe, ‘Simaut mase oh; tse Nyõ mam hroh ro mase miwer raa roto beta.’”
Mazmur 45:7-8
Tna Allah yawe
Yesus u yawe,
tiwya tinyi Nyõ oh mi nfen tabam refo tna natem aNyõ nfen ayoh reto ye.
Ayoh msya tabam refo meen marak. Menohe Nyõ kbe nhau hame wajin. Ayoh msya tabam refo meen bose tna mkair, mnan fi ratan ro bose ja mhah hri marak ye.

Meen Nyõ mbewakom ayoh msya tabam refo mnan fi raa mrus ratan ro bose oh, tna beak makus. Tna raa moo ratan ro tna, myum. Meen Nyõ nfen tabam msya ayoh ro tna shauk riryõn ye. Menohe Nyõ nesait ja nros tu. Nyõ nhau moof mnan si mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Mazmur 102:25-27
“Nama, hre nsya Jõ mam tajoh ro tatem ati.
Hre wea oh. Tna raa ro mamo byoh kʼNyõ to, meen tno ana mbtek mam mte. Kbe Nyõ naa nber ana weto. Tna Nyõ nros natak abyõ ana, nbo ana.”
Mazmur 110:1
Menohe Allah yawe bo feto
wAit fee.
weto to, mase mfi
Yesus fee. Allah yfen ana weto to, mbis ana mno bo wAit, ana to sryan wAit. Tna Ait ybis ana mama mbet raa wAit ro kbe fri riof ro mase.
Yesus tait yase. Watum rAit to matak miwer watum taro sor. Feto to, bo ro tiwya anu nri kʼAit to, nbo tna kro kaket! Nno be kbe anu ne nmo tit.
Tiwya Allah ybis
wAit mroh mamo mkyas Watum rAit kʼMusa. Allah ybis yawe kbe raa mari Watum rAit reto, tna mbo mno kaket tu oh. Soh raa miwer Watum ro
yoo yee kʼMusa reto to, Allah yno re bo mama mai kʼana tu oh.
Menohe

Yesus yerif iso roto kʼanu re bkai riof. Tiwya Yesus ykyas riof ro mase reto kʼraa baro wia matim. Tna fo ana ro mesait mari bo ro Ait ykyas reto, me mkyas riof reto kʼanu. Soh anu biwana riof ro mase reto to, kbe Allah yoo safo mana reto ymit kʼanu tu oh.
Ja Allah yno bo ro msai sor, tna sair bo ro hnah ye. Tna Allah ysok bouum
aro yoo yuumto kʼraa mkah Har rAit ye.
Ait ksoh yno bo weto afo re raa mmat tna mhar mawe bokyas ro Yesus to, bokyas ro ati, bokyas ro merif riof ro mase.
Wore wo meen raa mkai riof ro tkyas reto to, kbe awya yase tna ybo bombra sor? Allah ysan hroh reto
fee.
Au oh mi raa mkyas Allah mawe:
“Amu fo raa ro tabam refo sai. Fyi re Nyõ ro nase ja nmat amu ro nku sai? Tna fyi re Nyõ nmat ku ramu ye?”
“Mam masno ro anu raa bhau mam tabam refo fo,
ro Allah sor to, mase miwer raa. Nyõ noo bobot nee kʼraa; tna re bombra taro sor hartu mmat anu raa. Nyõ noo bo weto naren raa, mnan fi boren ro ja raa maren.
Tna Nyõ nawe, ‘Mam tabam refo to, aro mase miwer raa fee. Menohe masno refo fo mhau kait fee.’”
Mazmur 8:5-7
Bokom reto mawe: “Allah yno raa mase mbo bombra beta.” Menohe anu bmat feto to fefares.
Tiwya Yesus yama tabam refo tna yhai. Yhai afo re riof kʼraa. Allah yno Yesus yamo raa sai ro yhau mam tabam refo. Yesus yhau mam tabam refo mamo snok
baro to, yhau ynan fi raa sai, ro ja mase miwer

sor fee. Mam tabam refo raa sikowah Ait tna mame yajat. Feto oh mi Allah teta Ait, yoo yase yee. Tna yno re bombra beta hartu Ait. Allah yatmof raa tibyo ybis feto. Yatmof raa re bitsre Yesus raa mame riryõn. Tna mafer rau moof kʼraa beta.

Allah ybis Yesus haberek yamo raa, tna yama mam tabam refo. Ybis afo re Yesus yhar bo ro ja mai kʼraa to, yhar mnan si, aro mabut fee. Ait bitsre bo ro mkair mbtek mai kʼYesus, tna raa mame yajat. Yesus sair iso ro tna oh meto. Tna yakah raa mawat mamo mam iso reto tna re mkai riof. Allah yno bo moof meto. Allah oh mi yfen tna ybo bombra beta. Yfen afo re bombra beta bibi Ait.

Yesus oh mi yoo raa ysan kʼAllah re mno bo wAit. Anu bmo ku ro Allah wAit feto. Tibyo Yesus ysya anu to, Bja sait su. Tibyo bwe Allah tait Bja ranu. Tna Yesus hrenaut anu fee. Ytu anu yawe anu fo yao, yano na to.
Yesus yawe kʼYaja yawe,
“Allah; kbe Jõ tkyas Nyõ nasom aNyõ kʼtao, tano na woJõ. Tna tsya ana nji howes nbaut Nyõ.”
Mazmur 22:23
Tna Yesus yawe,
“Jõ smot Allah toni.”
Tna yawe,
“Jõ thau mam befo tsya raa ro Allah yoo yee kʼJõ.”
Yesaya 8:17-18

Yesus yama tabam refo afo re bo ro kabes yabi (Iblis) yno to rarin beta. Tiwya kabes yabi yatak yno re raa mno iro. Yno wa raa mkai riof oh meto. Menohe Yesus haberek yfi raa. Tna yhau ynan fi raa sai. Yhau tna yhai ynan fi ja raa mhai ye. Yno feto afo re kabes yabi yhau mte. Tiwya kabes yabi yatak yno wa re kbe raa mkai riof fee. Menohe Yesus tait yatak yiwer.
Ja raa beta waa bo kbe meen mhai. Menohe Yesus yno riof kʼraa wAit. Tibyo ana waa bo mhai to u fee.
Tiwya Yesus tait yatmof
fee. Ait yatmof raa. Tna yhau yban tis anu raa ro Yahudi.
Yawe yban tis anu feto oh mi tiwya Ait yamo raa ynan fi anu. Anu bmo yao yano na. Tiwya Ait yhau mam tabam refo tna ykai bo ro ja raa mkai to ye. Yesus yhar anu kaket re kbe Ait yamo
yase ro ja yatmof anu tna mur-mur yno bo ro Allah yawe. Tna Ait ysan bosan re kbe Allah yyon iro raa to ye.

Tiwya yhau mam tabam refo fares to, raa msya bo ja tko Ait ye, ksoh mawe Ait yno iro. ⌞Menohe yno iro aro fee.⌟ Tna raa sanet Ait ye. Feto to Ait yhar yawe anu raa bhau mam tabam refo to, bo min toni, mnan-nan fee. Tibyo Ait yhar bo yban tis anu kaket to ye.
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; anu bmo raa ro Allah wAit. Tna ytu anu meen bkai roon mam sawro rAit ye. Nnaut Yesus ysya bo ro yno: Ait yamo raabis
ro Allah. Tna yamo
ranu ro yase ye. Tibyo anu bhar bwe Ait oh mi ro yisoh bosmot ranu. Hre nnaut bo reto kaket.
Tiwya Musa yno bo beta ro Allah ybis. Tna Yesus yno bo beta ro Allah ybis Ait feto ye. Ana mbewok ye mur-mur mno bo ro Allah yawe. Ana bewok mfi sryan ro ja kmot amah ro bobot rait kaket.
Mfi bo raa sgi amah ro moof to, kbe raa bibi ait ro ski amah reto. Ana bibi amah ro ait sgi reto fee. Musa yno bo moof. Menohe Yesus yno bo moof toni. Feto kbe anu bibi Yesus yiwer.
Raa mawat mhar bo sgi amah. Menohe Allah yesait aran yfen bombra beta to.
Tiwya Musa yno bo ro Allah yawe: Ait mur-mur ymat raa ro Allah wAit. Tna ykyas bo ro Allah yawe meen mama mrof ye. Yawe meen Raa sait yama ykyas Bokyas ro Ati.
Menohe
tait Allah yare to. Ait yban tis raa ro Allah wAit, tna ymur-mur yno bo ro Allah yawe reto yfi sryan sai fee. Ait oh mi yase ybo raa ro Allah wAit. Soh anu bros tu smot
tna bhau binaut bwe bo ro Ait yawe to, kbe mabo to. Soh anu bhau bbo bno feto mamo snok mam oon sboh rau to, kbe anu bmo raa wAit tu oh.
Feto to, Har ro
mkyas kʼanu mawe, “Nri bo ro Allah yawe!” Tna Allah yawe:
“Mfo wefo to,
niwana bokyas aJõ to ma, mnan fi tii hohos wanu mno ye! Nros tna nri mai aJõ! Tiwya raa mana ro Israel mhau mam yuk ro riamo tna sanet Jõ. Ana mari bo ro Jõ tawe to fee. Ana to, mana mase sai.
Anu hohos wanu mhau moof mam yuk ro riamo reto
trion 40. Mhau to mmat bo msai ro Jõ tno. Menohe ana moo mhaf wana mee kʼJõ fee. Ana sanet Jõ ⌞tna mawe, ‘Kbe Ait kmo anu to fee! Kbe Ait ymit safo kʼanu fee.’⌟
Au oh meto Jõ kmo hohos wanu weto. Tna tawe, ‘Ana weto to, ja kro Jõ fee. Ana weto wase iso ro Jõ terif kʼana.’
Feto to Jõ kmo ana. Tawe, ‘Tiwya Jõ tawe kʼana tawe, kbe ana mhau mam wore wo raa hrowyõ u fee.’ Menohe Jõ tto boto tawe, ‘Kbe ana mamo mhau mam wore weto fee saut!’”
Mazmur 95:7-11
Taja, tme, tao, tano na; nhau nisoh nhaf wanu afo re kbe anu smot Allah kaket. Kaket anu be anu aro hawe smot Ait. Hawe smot Ait feto, tibyo haberek nwaar Allah ro yaam to ma.
Ti wawa to, sobu raa anya, nwe, “Nno iro u to ma! Soh nyõ nno iro renti to, kbe nyõ besruf nyõ ai. Niwana bo ro Allah ykyas kʼnyõ ma.”
Nnaut maut-mroh to ma. Menohe ne smot
kaket mnan fi tiwya tinyi anu smot wia to. Soh anu beroh smot Ait mamo snok mam tis sboh rau to, anu fo raa wAit tu oh.
Bokom ro Allah riwai jõ tkyas kʼanu to mawe:

“Mfo wefo to, niwana bokyas aJõ to ma, mnan fi tii hohos wanu mno ye! Nri mai aJõ! Tiwya raa mana ro Israel mhau mam yuk ro riamo tna sanet Jõ. Ana mari bo ro Jõ tawe kʼana fee. Ana to, mana mase sai.”
Mazmur 95:7-8
Awya oh ana weto to? Tkyas raa mana ro Israel. Tii Musa yakah ana frok mbam rabin ro Mesir. Tna Allah ykyas bo kʼana. Menohe ana miwana bokyas rAit. Ana mno Allah kmo meto.
Tii Allah kmo awya? Ait kmo ana ro mno iro weto. Ait kmo ana mamo snok 40
Tna ana weto beta mhai mam yuk ro riamo.

Tiwya Allah yto boto yawe bawya? Ait yto boto yawe, “Raa mana ro Israel to, ja mari bo ro Jõ tawe to, fee. Feto tibyo tawe kbe ana mhau mam wore wo tiwya Jõ tsi kʼana to fee saut! ‘Wore wo raa hrowyõ u fee’, kbe ana mkai fee saut.”
Tna anu bhar bwe ana weto smot Allah fee. Au oh mi ana mamo mhau mam wore weto fee.
Tiwya Allah ykyas wore wo meen raa wAit hrowyõ u fee. Tna bo ro ysi reto to, Ait ynaut tna ybo fares. Feto to, nisoh anu kaket re kbe anu beta nkai bo ro Ait ysi reto.
Tiwya raa mkyas Watum ro Allah kʼraa mana ro Israel. Ana mari bokyas reto, menohe mse mam mhaf wana fee. Tibyo bokyas reto mafer marak kʼana weto. Tna anu to, raa mkyas Bokyas Moof ⌞ro
⌟ kʼanu ye. Feto to smot Ait tna nse bokyas rAit mam anu nhaf wanu.
Anu ro smot Yesus tibyo nbo Bokyas Moof reto kaket to, anu oh mi kbe nmo nhau mam wore wo raa wAit hrowyõ u fee meto. Tiwya Allah yawe,
“Jõ tkyas wore wo kbe raa hrowyõ u fee. Menohe Jõ kmo raa ro Israel toni. Tibyo tbo boto tawe, ‘Kbe ana mamo mhau mam wore weto, fee saut!’”
Mazmur 95:11
Allah yfen tabam refo tna siwyan wore wo raa wAit meen hrowyõ u fee ye. Siwyan mkak oh. Menohe raa ro Israel weto tii mkai wore weto fee.
Bokom ro Allah mawe:
“Ti ro ntamam Allah yfen bombra ro tabam refo to beta mkak. Tna ti ro ngkrema to, Ait yitsre bo ro yno beta. Ayõ ro Allah hrowyõ fee oh meto.”
Kejadian 2:2
Nnaut nwe Bokom ro Allah riwai mkyas ‘wore wo raa wAit hrowyõ u fee’ mawe: “Kbe ana mamo mhau mam wore weto fee saut!”

Raa mana ro Israel tiwya mari bokyas ro moof sau wia, menohe ana mbo mno bokyas reto fee. Feto tibyo ana weto mkai wore weto fee. Anu bhar bwe wore wo Allah siwyan reto to, mhau fares. Kbe raa roto taro mkai wore weto.
Tiwya raa mana ro Israel mamo mhau mam wore weto fee. Tibyo Allah ysok ti sau naut yawe 'mfo refo'. Masno aro rau firwas tna Daud ykyas yawe:
“‘Mfo refo’ to, nros tna nri mai ro Allah. Niwana bokyas rAit to ma!”
Mazmur 95:7-8

Tiwya Yosua yakah raa ro Israel mamoʼt tabam ro Kanaan. Menohe mbam Bokom riwai reto to, anu bhar bwe bo ro Yosua yno reto to mabut fares. Tna masno ro kbe raa ‘hrowyõ u fee’ to, sboh fefares. Mabu rau mhau fares. Bhar bwe far-far mam Bokom ro Allah reto mkyas masno roto.
Feto to anu bhar bwe raa ro Allah wAit meen mhaf mse bo ro Ait yawe reto. Masno ro ykyas reto to, mnan ayõ ro ja raa ntmoh tna hrowyõ mno bo wana to fee. Mnan ayõ ro ngkrema to,

tiwya Allah yitsre bo ro yno beta. Ayõ reto to ayõ ro Ait hrowyõ u fee ye. Allah siwyan wore sau re kbe meen raa wAit hrowyõ u fee ye. Awya ro meen yhaf yse wore wo Allah siwyan reto to, kbe yitsre bo rait ro yno beta ye.
Nma, anu tomer re bkai wore weto. Tiwya raa mana ro Israel mari bo ro Allah yawe fee. Tibyo mkai fee. Niwana Allah mnan fi ana weto to ma, be kbe anu aro nkai wore weto fee ye.

Bokyas ro Allah to bo ro mawyõs, bo ro matak toni. Bokyas ro Allah mhar raa mhaf mato wana ye tna mhar bombra beta ro raa mnaut mam makit, srau wana to ye. Bokyas ro Allah to mfi tfo ro maan toni: Mnan tfo ro mame raa mhaf mato ye, tna mitwat raa makor msya mtai bo ye. Tna Bokyas ro Allah ja mmat sas bo ro raa mnaut mam srau wana tna mmat sas bo ro raa makit saim mno ye.

Tiwya tinyi Allah yfen bombra beta ro mhau mam tabam refo tna mam ayoh skes to ye. Allah ymat tna yhar bombra beta. Bo bawya sai ro raa mno to, Allah yasu ymat. Ymat bo beta ro ja raa mmyõt wai to ye. Meen mam wore Ait yros susai ytu srah yari to, anu raa kbe bros bkyas safo wanu beta ro anu bno.
Yesus tait Ku ro Allah yare. Ait yamo
ranu ro yase. Ait yase re yamo ykyas boyoh wanu kʼAllah mam sawro rAit. Feto to nma, anu bros btak tna bbo bosmot ranu reto kaket!

ranu ro yase retait yhar yawe anu raa sai. Ait yhar yawe anu raa bhau mam tabam refo to, bo min toni, mnan-nan fee. Tiwya yesait yamo raa tna raa tko mawe Ait yno iro. Raa sanet Ait, tna bo ro samyoh mbtek mai kʼAit ye. Menohe Ait yno iro fee.

Yesus yhar yawe ja raa matak mnan fee. Feto kbe Ait ykyas anu kʼAllah kaket ye. Nma bmo bo kʼAit. Waa ma. Anu bhar bwe Allah ja yatmof anu. Wore wo bombra sor mama mai anu to, anu bhar bwe Yesus yban tis anu. Anu bhar bwe Allah ksoh yoo tak rAit yee kʼanu.
⌞Tiwya ati ro Yesus yama fefares to,⌟ ja Allah ysok raa sait yawe yamo
ro yase mam
Yahudi. Tna raa ro yamo
