mana rau. Tna masu mnaif rau to, mawyah mnan fi ayõ, tna maa rau mnan fi bo tafoh mara ewok.
Tna mam matem rau mbo aam maku ro bewakom sau. Aam reto betrat oh.
reto mros tna maa rau ro matem ati mber mam aya sawan. Tna maa rau ro ti tem taa to mber mam tabam mne ye.
Tna au mkyas mkah mai ro mase mnan fi
ro masen mho.
reto mkyas si fo barmabyõ trion krema mji si tna mkyas bo.
Jõ tari barmabyõ weto mji si fo jõ tawe tkom bokyas ro jõ tari reto. He mfe; mai sau mbam sawro ro Allah mawe kʼjõ mawe, “Bo ro barmabyõ krema weto mkyas to, nmyõt rere, nkom ma!”
Tna jõ tmat
ro riwai mros maa sau mber mam aya sawan tna maa sau to mber mam tabam mne.
reto tubat matem ati rau

tna mawe, “Allah yhau yroon mamo snok mam hame wajin. Tna bi Ait yfen ayoh msya bombra beta ro mhau abyõ mam ayoh reto. Yfen tabam refo msya bombra ro mhau mam tabam refo beta ye. Tna yfen aya sawan msya bombra ro mhau mam aya sawan reto beta ye. Jõ tama tkyas bo mam Ait yasom rAit, tawe: ‘Oon ro mama to, Allah yyum u fee ye, kbe Ait ye yirenti fee ye!
Bo ro Ait saim yawe meen mama to, ja raa wase. Menohe tiwya Allah ykyas bo reto
wAit ro ybis mamo mno bo wAit.
ro krema reto kene wo mfi saa rau. Tna bo ro Allah saim reto kbe mabo mnan si tu oh.’”
Tna mai mbam sawro ro Allah riwai jõ tari reto to, mkyas kʼjõ u mawe, “Namo no
ro mros maa sau mber mam aya sawan tna maa sau mber mam tabam mne reto.
reto mbo aam sau mam matem rau. Mbo betrat oh. Nasen namo noo aam ro
reto nbo.”
Tna fo jõ tamo to
reto tayoh kʼau tawe, “Noo aam ro maku reto nee kʼjõ.”
reto moo mee kʼjõ tna mawe, “Noo aam refo nabat. Nabat mam nasoh to, nari maya msu mnan fi kum. Niya mroh mamoʼt srau to, kbe nari mrok mtah.”
Tna jõ too aam maku reto tabat. Tabat to tari maya msu mfi kum. Menohe tiya mroh mamoʼt srau mato to tari he mtah.
Tna raa mbis jõ mawe, “Namo nkyas watum ro

u. Nkyas bo ro kbe mama. Bi Ait yasbrah bo wefo kʼnyõ matim wia tna ybis nyõ yawe namo nkyas bo refo kʼraa ro mhau mam rabin mawat taro sor ye. Namo nkyas kʼraa mana taro mawat, nkyas kʼraa ro mkyas mai ro mawat aro rau ha-hayah ye, tna msya
na mawat ye.”
Tna raa moo bo mnan fi tbyor mara sau to, mee kʼjõ tna mbis mawe, “Namo nnit Samu ro Allah reto msya wohat
rau mkah tbyor mara reto. Tna ntuu raa ro skabuk mam Samu ro Allah reto to mabo jya.
Menohe bohra ro mne rau to, nnit ma. Bohra reto to, mhau kʼraa ro mbam raa mana roto makin. Kbe raa weto mamoʼt
ro Yerusalem. Tiwya Allah ysan
rAit reto to kʼanu, raa mana wAit sai. Menohe raa roto kbe twok mhau mam beto mamo snok snyi marak trion 42 muuf. Ana mno re
ranu mkair, tibyo anu smot Allah mam
ranu reto u fee.”
Tna bi Ait yawe, “Kbe Jõ tbis
mabo ewok mamo mkyas bombra ro kbe mama. Ana mbewok weto ja mkyas Jõ tasom aJõ. Tna tbis ana mbewok myum ratan ro mkair-kar
tna mamo mkyas bokyas aJõ kʼraa mamo snok ti trion 1260 muuf.”
mabo ewok reto to, raa fret bo mawe ana mnan fi ara
mara ewok ro moo mam wore wo
yasu. Tna mawe ana mnan si sawe ro
trion mara ewok ro mhau mam ati ro
yasu rAit ye.
tait yatak ybo tabam refo beta.)
Tna soh raa ro byoh mno bo ro mkair mai kʼana mbewok reto to, kbe ana mbewok mame raa weto majat. Mame majat mkah tafoh ro kbe frok mbam kʼana masoh tna mait raa weto majat.
Wore wo

mabo ewok weto mkyas bokyas ro Allah to, ana mbewok matak mbo ayoh msya tabam refo. Matak mbo ayoh wa re oom mais fee. Tna ana matak mno aya haberek mamo mees. Ana matak mno kair ro mase aro rau-rau mai mam tabam refo ye. Ana mbewok mno bo weto ati ro ana nksoh rana sai.
mabo ewok reto mkyas bokyas ro Allah mkak oh. Tna fo kak sau mbam sawro ro kabes mhau to, kbe frok mama mafa msya ana mbewok. Kak ro ja mban kabes reto to matak. Tna kbe mame ana mbewok majat.
Majat tna ajat wana makus mbris mam iso mabi mam
ro Yerusalem. (Mam
mase reto to, tiwya raa mame
ro ana mbewok ja smot to, mame Ait yajat mam ara warok.) Tna raa fret bo mawe
reto to, masom Sodom msya Mesir.
Tna raa mbam raa mana aro rau-rau beta mama mmat. Ana weto mmai rana aro rau ha-hayah ye, tna mama mbam rabin wana aro sor-sor ye. Ana kbe mama mmat ajat mbewok reto. Raa mawe ajat
mabo ewok reto to, raa sama ma. Tna mawe ajat mbewok reto mhau wia re raa mama mmat. Feto to ti trion tuuf hariyah to raa sama ajat weto fefares.
mabo ewok reto tiwya ana mno bo ro samyoh aro rau mai kʼraa tna ana fo mbewok majat. Tibyo kbe raa simaut fayir tna moo bo moof mee kʼanya ye.
Ti tuuf hariyah reto ska tna Allah yoo yafos yee
mabo ewok refo tna ana mbewok mrok maam u. Raa mmat ana mbewok masen maam u to, ana mrok waa toni.
Tna

mabo ewok reto to, mari mai ro mase sau mbam sawro ro Allah mtu kʼana mawe, “Anu mbewok: Nuut nma no kʼJõ mam wefo!” Tibyo ana mbewok misbat maut mamo abyõ. Tna barmabyõ ro mboh sro-sro ana mbewok, tna masyõ ana mamoʼt sawro ro Allah. Tna raa ro byoh masu heyut mmat ana mbewok misbat maut mamo.
Ana mbewok misbat maut si to, iin ro msai frok mama msin tabam refo. Tibyo
reto majoh jaro
to rarin. Tna raa mabo trion 7000 majat ye. Tna raa ro mhau fares mrok waa toni tna mkyas Allah ro yhau mam sawro rAit mawe, “Ae,
Allah tait yase toni!”
Kair ro ewok mama mai kʼraa oh meto, tna kair ro tuuf to kine mama oh.
Tna
ro krema mfi saa rau ye. Tna jõ tari he mai mawat ro mase mam sawro ro Allah mawe:
“Raa ro mamo
oh mi ja mbo tabam reto to. Menohe mfo refo to,
ranu yesait oh mi yase yamo
ybo tabam reto ysya
ro Ait ysok ye. Kbe Ait yase yamo
ybo tabam reto mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Tna raa manes mabo trion 24 hre mam ambar
wana mam ati ro Allah yasu. Ana weto maka mbaut bi Ait
mawe:
amu nyoh asik mase kʼNyõ. Nyõ fi nase nbo bombra beta. Nyõ fi nhau yum bonyõ tinyi oh tna mfo refo nhau naam fares ye. Nyõ natak aNyõ nase niwer toni. Tna Nyõ nasen namo
nbo tabam reto oh. Tibyo amu nyoh asik mase kʼNyõ.

Tiwya raa ro smot Allah fee; ana kmo Nyõ. Tna mfo refo ayõ sboh oh. Nyõ kmo ana riryõn. Mfo refo Nyõ nros susai tna noo srah nse mai kʼraa ro tiwya mhai oh. Tna mfo refo Nyõ noo boren naren kʼsrian woNyõ ye:

woNyõ ro tiwya Nyõ nbis mamo mkyas bo woNyõ, tna msya raa woNyõ makin ye, tna msya raa ro ja hartu Nyõ to ye. Ana weto to raa ro mase tna raa ro kinyah ye. Tna ayõ sboh oh re Nyõ noo safo mana nmit kʼraa ro tiwya mno bo ro mkair.”
Tna Samu Allah ro mhau mam sawro rAit to, mato rau nkro. Tibyo raa mmat
reto. Tna ayoh mji, rir mrir mnin-nan, barmabyõ rurur tna iin frok sin, tna oom ro mnan fi
makan mais ye.
Tna jõ heyut tmat bo ro msai sau mam ayoh abyõ uu: Tmat fai sau mros abyõ mam snyi. Fai au myan ayõ mamo ratan rau. Tna mana rau sbyõ sken trion 12 mnan fi watau
Au mhaf tna kene mam wore mabe oh. Tibyo mari he au kborham tna msiah.
Tna jõ heyut tmat bo msai sau roto mam ayoh: Tmat kabes aban sau, tna masom rau to
Kabes aban to maboh toni tna marak rau to mkek. Kabes aban reto to, mana rau to trion krema tna
rau to trion nsaa. Tna abyõ mam mana wau to sbyõ watau
trion krema ye.
Tna kabes aban reto tubat sawyah rau to, tufrok sken ro mhau mam ayoh to jaro
. Tna mbeak sken weto mbtek mai mam tabam. Kabes aban reto mhau mros ste kene msya fai au ro kborham reto. Mros mawe fai au mabe ku retait btek to, kabes aban refo miya fooh.
Tna fai reto mabe ku sme sait. (Ku retait kbe yase ybo armuk ro

tna ybo raa ro tabam arin aso wofo beta to matak.) Fai au mabe ku retait tna raa mama tubor mtak ku retait afo re kabes aban reto miya ku retait ma. Raa moo ku retait makah msam mamo mo kʼAllah ro hre abyõ mam ambar
rAit.
Tna fai au reto masen msam mamoʼt yuk ro mimon sau; yuk ro Allah siwyan wea. Tna raa kmot au, misoh au mam teto ti trion 1260 muuf.
Tna mam sawro ro Allah to
sait ro yasom Mikhael yafa ysya kabes aban reto: Mikhael ysya
wait ro moof to, mafa msya kabes aban reto tna msya
wau ro mkair weto.
Menohe kabes aban msya
wau to matak fee. Tibyo kabes aban msya
wau to, raa mikyak frok mbam sawro ro Allah.
Kabes aban reto to, masom Iblis soh mfe to Kabes Yabi. Kak refo tiwya tinyi haberek mamo aban ro soo ye. Kabes Yabi ja sioh raa ro tabam refo beta. Ait ysya
wait to, raa mikyak frok mbam sawro ro Allah tna frok mamoʼt tabam.
Tna jõ tari mai ro mase sau mbam sawro ro Allah mawe, “Mfo refo Allah ranu yros yatak abyõ tna kabes yabi (Iblis) yhau mte. Feto tna riof kʼanu. Raa beta mhar mawe Allah yase yamo
tna ybo raa beta matak. Tna raa mhar mawe Allah ysok
yamo yase ybo raa. Tiwya kabes yabi ja yaun anu ro smot
to, rabu-reha. Yaun anu yawe kʼAllah yawe, ‘Raa woNyõ, mno bo mkair!’ Tna raa mbeak kabes yabi frok btek ybam sawro ro Allah yamo tabam.
Kabes yabi yaun raa ro Allah wAit yawe ana mno iro. Menohe ana mros matak smot bi Ait mhar mawe mees ro

Maku reto myon iro wana oh, tna re ana mrok mhaf moof. Tibyo Kabes yabi yhau mte. Raa ro Allah wAit weto to, wore wo raa mawe mame ana majat to, raa wAit weto mwaar Yesus yasom fee. Ana mros matak mawe ana smot Yesus fares tna msan metsu rana re raa mame ana majat. Ana mno feto tibyo Kabes yabi retait yhau mte kʼana.

Kabes yabi raa mikyak frok ybam sawro ro Allah, feto kbe anu ro nhau mam sawro rAit fares to; simaut mase oh! Menohe anu raa nsya bombra ro mhau mam tabam reto msya aya sawan bo to; kbe nmof toni: Kabes yabi yroh yamo yo kʼanu oh. Ait yhar yawe ti rau ro Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼait to, kinene oh. Tibyo ait kmo tna safo toni.”
Kabes aban mnaut mawe raa mbeak au mamo tabam, tibyo au kmo toni. Tna kabes aban masen saka fai au ro mabe ku sme retait.

Menohe raa moo ruu ro mase sau maim wau to, mee kʼfai au. Moo mee kʼfai au mtan fai au kbek rau re kbe au fru mamoʼt yuk ro mimon. Yuk reto to, Allah siwyan kʼfai au wea. Au mhau bau mam teto tna raa kmot au, misoh au
trion tuuf hariyah re kbe kabes aban reto mkai au fee.
Tna fo kabes aban reto frus aya mawat toni frok mbam masoh rau. Tna aya reto miyõ mamoʼt yuk ro fai au mhau tna mabo kait fai au reto. Kabes aban reto mawe aya mayõ fai au reto soso mamo.
Menohe tabam to masoh maa tibyo aya ro kabes aban reto frus to, beta twok mamo tabam mato. Tibyo fai au mkai riof.
Tna kabes aban reto mrok kmo fai au toni. Tibyo mamo sikowah ku wau ro mabe roto taro. Ku wau weto to: Raa ro ja mari Watum ro Allah mbo mno tna ana bito mros matak smot Yesus ysya watum rAit.
Tna kabes aban reto mamo mros mam aya sawan maam.
Tna jõ tmat kak ro ja mban kabes sau frok mbam aya sawan masuf. Kak reto metsu sau, mana rau to trion krema tna
rau to trion nsaa. Tna watau
mana mur abyõ mam
rau sau-sau. Tna mam mana sau-sau wau to, raa mkom masom kair ro mamus Allah.
Kak ro jõ tmat reto metsu rau mnan fi
ro maboh sau masom
Tna maa kbis rau to miyõ tna maan mnan fi kak sau ro masom
maa. Tna mbait rau to maan mnan fi
mbait. Tna kabes aban reto msan matak rau kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Mbis kak reto hre mam ambar
rau tna mbo raa mkah matak rau.

Kak reto mana wau trion krema. Tna hbis maboh mhau mayir mam mana rau sau. (Tiwya raa maru kak reto tibyo kene wo majat, he mfe. Tibyo hbis maboh reto mhau mayir sai fares.) Raa beta mmat kak ro ja mban kabes reto tna ana mrok ktak tibyo mari bo ro kak reto mawe.

Kabes aban reto moo matak mee kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Tibyo raa mbaut kabes aban reto tna mbaut kak ro ja mban kabes reto ye. Raa mbaut kak reto mawe, “Raa arin aso matak mnan anya mfi kak refo fee! Tna raa aro mtai mafa msya kak refo fee ye!”
Kak ro ja mban kabes reto safuk mawe au u kar, tna au mamus Allah. Allah yasu sayõ rof kak reto. Tibyo kak reto mros matak mbo raa ro mhau mam tabam refo, mamo snok snyi trion 42.
Kak reto mamus Allah yasom rAit tna mkyas kair Samu ro Allah ye, tna mkyas kair bombra beta ro mhau mam sawro rAit ye.

Tna kak ro ja mban kabes reto mafa msya raa ro Allah wAit. Raa moo matak mee tibyo kak reto mros matak tna raa ro Allah wAit matak fee. Allah yasu sayõ rof kak reto. Tna kak reto mros matak mbo raa mbam raa mana aro rau-rau beta: Ana mmai rana to aro rau ha-hayah ye. Raa weto mama mbam rabin rana aro sor-sor ye.
Yohanes ymat he raa mawat toni kbe mbaut kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Ana weto to raa mkom masom wana mam aam ro
Maku rau to fee. Raa mabo baro sai hawe mbaut kak reto. Ana weto to masom wana raa mkom mam aam
Maku rau. Aam reto mkyas raa masom ro kbe mhau hame wajin. Allah yfen tabam refo fefares to, bi Ait ynaut
Maku refo. Ynaut yawe, “Kbe raa mame
majat re kbe mees rau myon iro raa; tibyo ana mkai riof.”
Anu ro nri bokyas refo fo; nbo nno kaket!

“Allah ysok raa taro. Tna yawe meen raa mfot raa weto tna makah ana mamoʼt tabam rana. Allah yhar bo rAit. Feto to raa weto kbe raa mfot tna makah mamo tabam rana tu oh. Tna awya ro Allah yawe meen raa mame ait mkah
to, kbe bo reto mabo tu oh ye.”
Yeremia 15:2, 43:11
Meen arin ro mkair mama. Tna wore oon sboh to, kbe raa beta mkai bo. Anu raa ro Allah wAit to, kbe nkai bo ye. Jõ tawe kʼanu tawe bito smot bi Ait kaket! Susu ma!
Tna jõ tmat kak roto sau frok mbam tabam te mato maut. Kak reto
rau to trion ewok mnan fi
maku. Kak reto mkyas bo to, mmai rau mnan fi
mmai.
Kak ro ewok reto mros tis mban kak tinyi ro ja mros tis kabes reto. Kak ro tinyi reto msan matak rau kak ro ewok. Mno re raa msya bombra ro tabam refo mbaut kak ro tinyi reto.
Kak ro ewok fo mno bo ro msai toni. Kak reto matak mbero tafoh mbam ayoh mroh mama mai mam tabam refo. Tna raa masu mmat kak reto mno bo ro msai.
Kak tinyi ro ja mban kabes reto moo tak rau mee kak ro ewok reto afo re ro ewok reto mno bo ro msai. Tibyo raa mari bo ro kak ro ewok reto mkyas. Tna kak reto besruf raa; mbis ana mfen
sau ro masu mnan fi kak tinyi reto tna mse kʼana mbaut. (Kak ro tinyi reto to, tiwya raa maru mkah
tibyo mana mabet maboh menohe majat fee.)
Tna raa moo tak mee kak ro ewok reto re au mno
reto maam. Tibyo
reto mrok maam tna mmai ye. Raa taro hawe mbaut
reto. Tibyo
reto mbis raa wau mawe, “Nmo nme ana weto majat!”
Tna
reto mbis raa beta moo
mnan fi aat tna mame kʼana matem ati, soh mfe makit wana: Raa mabi msya kukek ye, ro mase msya ro kinyah, tna ro bobot msya ro sryan ye. Ana mako hawe sai, raa mikoh raa beta mame aat reto.

Menohe raa taro hawe. Tibyo kak ro ewok reto mno wa re ana weto moo boit fee, tna masim boit kʼraa fee ye. Kak reto mbis mawe raa ro mame aat reto mesait aran moo boit tna masim boit. Aat ro raa mame reto to, kak masom rau soh mfe to
rau reto.
Awya sai ro ja yhar bo to, kbe yhar bofret ro
reto: Kak reto
rau to 666. Tna aat reto merif raa sait yasom rait ye.
Tna jõ tmat
Maku sau mros abyõ mam faut ro Sion. Au mros msya raa mabo trion 144.000 su. Makit wana to raa mkom
Maku masom rau msya Allah yasom rAit ye.
Tna jõ tari mai sau mbam ayoh msun mnan fi aya mase sau ro miyi msun. Tna mnan fi ayoh ro mji ye. Mai reto mnan fi raa mai kerombi
wana.
Raa mabo trion 144.000 weto mros mam wore ambar (

) ro Allah hre. Raa wefo mros mam ati kak ro Allah wAit mana jiit weto masu wana tna msya raa manes mabo trion 24 weto ye. Raa mabo trion 144.000 weto mbaut bobaut ro tna sau. Raa roto sait bo yhar bobaut reto fee ye. Ana mesait aran mhar bobaut rana reto. Ana mabo trion 144.000 tiwya Yesus yfes.
Tibyo ana mbaut bobaut kʼbi Ait.
Tiwya wore wo ana weto mhau mam tabam reto fares to, ja ana kaket ana mamo maus bo msya fnya fee. Ana mhau mato wana mboh sai. Tna ana mhai. Tna ana mamo mhau msya
Maku. Tna woyõ-woya
reto mamo to, ana weto kro mam tis mamo ye. Yesus yoo raa ro tabam refo to, tna raa mabo trion 144.000 wefo fo mkbair ro tinyi raa msan kʼAllah msya
Maku.
Ana weto ja mhar bo sioh raa fee, tna wase mber safo ye.
Tna jõ tmat
roto sau fru abyõ mam ayoh war-war.
reto to fru mama mkyas Bokyas Moof ro mroon
Mkyas Bokyas Moof reto kʼraa mbam raa mana aro rau-rau beta: Ana mmai wana aro rau ha-hayah ye. Tna ana mama mbam rabin rana aro sor-sor ye.
Tna

reto mkyas mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Oon sboh oh! Mfo refo Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼraa. Feto to tawe anu waa tna hawyõn Ait oh! Nbaut bi Ait ro tiwya yfen ayoh msya tabam, aya sawan msya aya mato beta!”
Tna
roto sau mama.
ro ewok refo mawe,
Babel rarin oh! Raa ro mhau mam
ro mase reto to ja mno bo ro mkair. Ana mnan fi fnya ro mwyah.
Tiwya fnya weto mno re raa ro mhau mam rabin aro sor beta sorni ana tibyo msya au mwyah ye. Bo ro au mno reto to mnan fi
ro mno re raa bisir sorni ana to ye, tibyo ana mno bo ro mkair-kar.”
Tna
ro tuuf mama mtan naut. Mawe mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Masi ma raa mbaut kak msya
reto fee! Masi ma anu sayõ rof sai tna re raa mame aat ro kak reto kʼanu ntem wanu soh mfe nkit wanu to fee!
Kbe Allah kmo awya ro yno feto. Kbe Ait kmo toni. Raa fret bo mawe kmo ro Allah rAit safo toni mnan fi
maya ro safo toni. Raa ro mbaut kak soh mfe
reto kbe Allah yoo ana yko mam tafoh msya
ro mait. Kbe
wAit sor to msya
Maku reto mros horit bo ana mait.
Raa weto sikotok mam tafoh. Tna wasi mbam tafoh reto to, kbe maun mwiok mamo snok mam hame wajin. Raa ro mbaut kak msya
reto tna awya sai ro sayõ rof raa mame aat ro kak reto kʼait yetsu rait to, kbe yari mham yoyo, tna mham reto swior-was fee ye.”

Menohe jõ tawe kʼanu raa ro Allah wAit tawe: Bito nros ntak re smot Yesus matak mamo snok mam tis rau. Nri bo ro Allah ybis kʼanu tna nbo nno kaket. Nhau smot Yesus mam wore wo arin mkair tna oon sboh to!
Tna jõ tari mai sau mbam sawro ro Allah mawe kʼjõ mawe, “Nkom bo ro Jõ tkyas fo: Kbe

yno bo moof kʼraa ro mhau smot Ait mamo snok mam ati ro meen ana mhai. Raa wAit ro mhai wore arin mkair to, meen mkai riof mam sawro ro Allah rAit.” Tna Har rAit mawe, “Esre, kbe meen ana mkah bo tna mimyoh snok to u fee. Kbe ana hrowyõ u fee. Bo moof ro tiwya ana mno to, Allah ynaut fares. Feto to kbe ana fri mafer rau reto: Kbe bi Ait yaren ana tu oh.”
Tna jõ tmat barmabyõ ro mboh sau tna raa sait hre abyõ mam barmabyõ reto. Raa retait ynan fi 'Ait ro Yroh Yama Yfi Raa Sai'. Tna Ait sbyõ watau
ro
sau. Tna ybo sogi sau ro maan toni.
Tna tmat
roto sau frok mbam Samu ro Allah.

refo mawe kʼAit ro hre abyõ mam barmabyõ ro mboh reto, mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Nbo sogi anyõ reto namo tabam tna nsot bo ro manes weto. Ayõ sboh oh; bo ro tabam weto make manes oh. Feto to namo nsot!”
Tibyo Ait ro hre mam barmabyõ mboh retait yayõ sogi rAit tna yroh yamo ysot bo ro tabam weto.
Tna
roto sau frok mbam Samu ro Allah.
refo mbo sogi ro maan sau.
Tna
sau naut frok.
refo ja mhau mko tafoh abyõ mam wohat ro Allah.
refo mbam wohat reto to, mama mawe
ro mbo sogi maan reto. Tna au mawe mkah mai ro mase mawe, “Noo sogi anyõ ro maan reto nroh namo tabam reto tna nsot
make.
make weto to manes oh. Feto to, namo nsot.”
Tna
reto mayõ sogi rau tna mamo msot
make weto mbam mara ro make weto sor. Msot tna mamo mbeak mam
sau mato.
refo fo wore wo Allah sikowah raa.
reto mhau mam
reto mne rau. Raa ro
mbeak mam
mato reto to, raa mber. Mber re mees wana snok-snak. Tna mees miyi frok mbam
reto, miyi mnan fi aya. Mees reto miyi snok mamo. Miyi mamo to raa mnit miyõ rau: 300
Tna mees reto tee rau to
ewok bo feto.
Tna jõ tmat bo ro msai mam sawro ro
: Bo ro kbe sikowah tabam reto to, trion krema mhau fares. Tna fo kbe Allah kmo rAit maum oh weto. Jõ tmat

mabo krema tna ana mbo hawereh sau-sau. Kair ro mase trion krema mhau mam hawereh wana weto aro sau-sau. Allah siwyan tufrok kair ro ttis wefo; kbe kair trion krema naut sikowah raa ro tabam refo. Tna kmo rAit maum oh weto.
Tna tmat aya sawan ro ntwar toni mnan fi
Aya sawan reto to srioh tafoh mait. Tna tmat raa mawat mros mam aya sawan reto maam jaro. Ana weto to tiwya mhau mam tabam. Mhau mam tabam reto ana beswan kak ro mban kabes msya
reto. Ana hawe bo mari tna mbaut bo ewok reto fee ye. Tna tiwya ana hawe bo raa mame aat kʼana metsu rana ye. Aat reto mkom
ro merif masom kak reto. Ana hawe mno bo weto tibyo Allah yoo kerombi
yee kʼana mbo.
Tna ana mbaut bobaut sau ro tiwya Musa ybaut. Tna msya bobaut ro
Maku. (Tiwya Musa yamo sryan ro Allah to; yari bo ro bi Ait yawe.) Ana mbaut mawe:
“Nyõ fi
Allah ro nase. Nyõ namo

tna nbo bombra beta yum. Nyõ nno bo ro moof msya bo ro msai toni ye. Ati ro Nyõ ntu srah raa to, Nyõ nhar awya ro yno iro, tna nmit safo kʼait. Nyõ nsok raa sait bo fee ye. Nhaf, srau aNyõ to moof ati sai.
Awya oh mi waa Nyõ to fee? Awya oh mi ybaut Nyõ nasom aNyõ to fee? Nyõ nesait aran noof toni yum. Raa ro tabam refo beta mmat mawe Nyõ nno bo ro moof mnan si. Tibyo ana beta kbe mama mbaut Nyõ.”
Tna fo jõ tmat Samu ro Allah mam sawro rAit. Tna sbyah reto mato rau to kro.
Tna
mabo krema frok mbam Samu ro bi rAit reto to mama.
weto mbo kair trion krema ro kbe sikowah raa. Ratan wana to, raa mtin mbam hawee
ro moof toni tna kren-kran ye. Ana mbin ntkah wana mkah hawee ro
Tna kak ro Allah wAit mana trion jiit weto, sau moo hawereh
trion krema. Moo tna mee
mabo krema weto. Kmo ro Allah rAit mhau mam hawereh wana sau-sau. Allah kbe yhau yroon mamo snok hame wajin.
Tna wasi betru Samu rAit. Wasi reto mbam bo yase ro bi Ait rAit msya yatak rAit ye. Tna raa sait bo yamo twok mam Samu mato reto wia fee. Kbe
krema weto mtu kair ro mase trion krema mamo mbtek mam tabam reto. Bo ro sikowah tabam reto, kbe
weto mno mkak wia tna fo raa twok mam Samu mato reto u.
Tna jõ tari mai ro mase sau frok mbam Samu ro Allah reto mawe
mabo krema weto mawe, “Kmo ro Allah mhau mam hawereh trion krema ro anu mbo mam ntem. Nasen nmo ntu kmo rAit reto mbtek mamoʼt tabam oh!”
ro tinyi moo hawereh mkah bo ro kbe sikowah tabam reto, tna mamo mtu bo reto mam tabam. Tibyo kaus ro msai toni snok kʼraa beta ro mbaut
reto msya raa ro mame aat kak reto. Kaus weto snok kʼana beta metsu wana sor tna ana weto mari mham toni.

ro ewok moo hawereh rau mkah bo ro sikowah tabam to, tna mtu bo reto mamo mbtek mam aya sawan. Tibyo aya sawan beta haberek mnan mees mfi mees ro ajat. Mees reto mno bombra ro mhau mam aya sawan to beta mhai.
ro tuuf moo hawereh rau mkah bo ro sikowah tabam to, tna mtu bo reto mamo mbtek mam aya ro mase msya aya mato beta. Tibyo aya haberek mnan fi mees.
Tna tari
sau ro ja matak mbo aya beta to, mawe kʼAllah mawe:

“Ati ro Nyõ ntu srah raa to, Nyõ nhar awya ro yno iro, tna nmit safo kʼait. Nyõ nsok raa sait bo fee ye. Nyõ nesait aran noof toni yum. Nyõ fi naban tiwya tinyi nhau yum tna mfo refo nhau yum fares ye.
Tiwya raa weto mame raa woNyõ msya
woNyõ to majat. Tibyo mees rana snok. Mfo refo Nyõ ska bo kʼana riryõn; nno re ana mata mees ska si bo ro ana mno weto.”
Tna fo jõ tari mai sau frok mbam wohat ro Allah reto mawe kʼbi Ait mawe:
“Esre,
Allah; Nyõ to nase tna nbo bombra beta. Nyõ to nno bo ro moof ati. Ati ro Nyõ nse srah kʼraa to, nyõ nhar awya ro yno iro to, nse hayah, tna nhar awya ro yno bo ro moof to, nse hayah ye.”
ro jiit moo hawereh rau to mtu kmo ro Allah mamo mbtek mam ayõ. Tibyo ayõ mrok mbe toni tna mait raa mkah tafoh rau.
Allah yno re ayõ smoh raa. Tibyo ana mrok kmo tna mamus Allah. Bi ait oh mi yatak tna ybis kair ro mase weto mama mai ana. Menohe ana hawe bo mashana. Tna ana hawe bo bibi bo yase rAit ye.
ro maat moo hawereh rau mkah kmo ro Allah to, tna mtu bo reto mamo mbtek mam ambar
kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Tibyo rabin ro ja kak reto mamo
mbo to, mrok mamur. Tna raa ro mhau mam rabin rau reto to, mari mham toni, tibyo ana mafit hrea wana.
Ana weto mham toni tna kaus snok mam metsu wana beta. Tibyo ana mamus Allah ro yhau abyõ mam sawro rAit. Menohe ana mashana fefares. Ana mno bo ro mkair fares.
ro ntamam moo hawereh rau mkah kmo ro Allah to tna mtu bo reto mam aya mase sau ro masom Efrat. Tibyo aya reto mrok msa ngkaat. Tna raa mamo iso mam aya ngasasia rau reto. Tna
makin ro mbam ati ro tobrat msya raa sbe wana to, masen mamo kro iso reto.

Tna tmat kabes mabo tuuf ro mnan fi aah bo feto. Kabes weto to, sau frok mbam kabes aban masoh rau. Tna sau frok mbam kak ro ja mban kabes reto to, masoh rau ye. Tna sau frok mbam ait ro ja sioh raa to, yasoh rait ye. Ait ro tis tait, ja sioh yawe ait tait
ro Allah ybis yama ykyas bo wAit. He mfe, ait yama besruf raa sai.
Kabes mabo tuuf wefo ja mno bo msai. Kabes weto frok mamo mo
ro ja mbo raa ro tabam refo beta. Mamo tna mawe ana beta berur mam wo sau tna siwyan mamo mafa. Ana mhar mawe Allah tait yase ybo bombra beta. Tna ana mhar mawe kbe Ait yama yafa ysya ana. Tna
weto to mhau wea siwyan ayõ reto.

Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri oh! Meen Jõ tama tubor tfi raa ro ja msyõf bo. Feto to nhau siwyan. Raa taro mjin sai. Ana siwyan fefares tibyo meen mrok. Kbe ana hrenaut mfi raa ro mamo sroraa. Awya ro yhau siwyan yoyo to, kbe simaut. Kbe ait hrenaut fee. Kbe ait sroraa fee.”
Tna fo kabes trion tuuf weto mbis
weto mamo hre siret mam wo sau. Yuk reto mai ro Ibrani to mawe masom Harmagedon.
ro krema moo hawereh rau mkah kmo ro Allah to, tna mtu bo reto mamo mbtek mam ayoh war-war. Tna jõ tari mai sau ro mase mbam ambar
ro mhau mam samu ro Allah mato to mawe, “Bombra beta tno mkak oh!”
Tna rir mrir mnin-nan, tna ayoh mji, barmabyõ rurur, iin ro msai toni frok mama. Iin ro msai miwer mnan fi feto to, frok mam tabam refo aro fee. Iin ro msai toni reto.
Tibyo
Babel mrok ftah trion tuuf. Raa ro mhau mam
ro mase reto to, ja mno bo ro mkair yoyo. Tibyo Allah kmo. Allah kmo tibyo ybis
riwai reto moo hawereh rau to mamo mtu kmo ro Allah rAit mbtek mai raa ro Babel weto. Tna iin reto frok mno raa ro wase Allah roto sor ye, mno
wana sasyoh ye.
Tna sato beta msya atu beta marak.
Tna oom ro mnan fi
makan mais.
makan weto to maboh. Fanes wau to 50
sau-sau bo feto.
makan weto mroh mbtek mame raa. Raa mkai bo mkair ro mase feto tibyo ana mamus Allah.
Tna
mabo trion krema ro mbo hawereh mkah Allah kmo wAit weto to, sau mawe kʼjõ mawe, “Nama, kbe Allah yno bo mai kʼwyah mabi ro hre abyõ mam aya mawat. Au mwyah toni tibyo Allah kmo. Nama nmat.
Tiwya fai au reto mno re raa sorni ana, tibyo mwyah msya fai au. Bo ro au mno reto to mnan fi
maya ro mno raa re mbisir sorni ana, tibyo ana mno bo mkair-kar. Tna au mno
makin msya raa ro mhau mam rabin aro sor beta sorni ana, tibyo mwyah msya fai au ye.”
Tna Har ro
mbo jõ matak. Tibyo jõ smi tmat bo. Tmat bo

reto makah jõ mamoʼt yuk sau ro mimon. Tna tmat fai au ro mwyah reto hre abyõ mam kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Kak reto to, mawyan rau to mkek. Tna raa mame aat mawat mam kak reto metsu rau. Aat weto to mkom bokom ro mamus Allah. Kak reto mana wau trion krema tna
wau trion nsaa.
Tna fai reto to, myum ratan rau ro mkin msya mkek. Tna au fayir metsu rau mkah
mawat, msya
mawat, msya fraa ro mabyoh maut tna kren-kran aro rau mawat ye. Tna matem mbo hawereh ro
sau. Hawereh reto raa moo bombra beta ro mkair, msya bombra ro mwyah weto mfau matot.
Mam makit rau to, raa mkom som baro ro ja raa mti bomyõt fares kʼraa. Raa mkom:
Babel ro Mase’ tna ‘fai au refo fo, ku wau ja mwyah.’ tna ‘Bombra ro mkair mam tabam refo to, beta frok mbam fai au refo.’

Fai au knait raa ro Allah wAit. Tibyo raa wAit ro ja mkyas Yesus yasom to, au mbis raa mamo mame ana majat. Ana raa mame majat tna fai au mata mees wana. Tibyo bisir tna simaut mase, tna safuk. Jõ tmat fai au reto tna trok ktak.
Tibyo
reto mtu kʼjõ mawe, “Fyi re nyõ nrok ktak to? Kak ro mana wau trion krema msya
wau trion nsaa reto to, kbe jõ betoo kʼnyõ. Tna jõ betoo fai au ro hre abyõ mam kak kabes reto kʼnyõ ye re nyõ nhar:

‘Kak ro ja mban kabes ro riwai nyõ nmat reto to, tiwya mhau mam tabam refo. Mfo wefo marak oh. Tna kak reto meen frok mbam sawro ro kabes ja mhau to, tna me mama mber tabam refo u. Mhau, tna majat. Kbe raa makin mmat kak reto tna ana taro mrok ktak. Raa ro mmat kak reto mrok ktak oh mi masom wana aro raa mkom mam aam ro
rAit fee. Aam refo masom rau to: “Raa ro Kbe Mhau Hame Wajin.” (Tiwya tinyi Allah yfen tabam refo to, aam reto raa mkom oh. Aam refo mkyas raa masom ro meen mhau hame wajin.)
Raa ro mhar bo to, kbe mhar bofret reto mawe fefo: Kak reto mana wau trion krema weto to fret bo mawe atu trion krema ro fai au reto ja hre abyõ.
Kak mana wau trion krema weto to fret bo mawe
mabo trion krema ye.
mabo krema weto to, mabo maat mbtek oh. Tna mfo refo sait hre ybo raa fares. Tna sait frok yama fefares. Kbe
refi yama menohe ait yase ybo raa waor sai.
Kak ro tiwya mhau tna mfo wefo marak reto fret bo mawe
ro krentuuf oh meto. Kak refo fo
mnan fi
mabo krema roto riwai weto ye. Tna kbe majat.
trion nsaa weto to fret bo mawe
mabo nsaa roto.
mabo nsaa wefo mamo mase mbo raa fefares. Ana weto mase mbo raa kait fee. Kbe ana msya kak reto mamo
mbo raa ayõ sau sai.
weto to bonaut wana msya srau wana sau su. Ana beta mawe msan matak wana kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Ana mawe kak reto mbo raa wana ro ja ana mesait mbis.
Meen kak ro ja mban kabes reto msya
mabo nsaa weto mamo mafa msya
Maku. Tna raa taro kro ati ro
Maku reto mafa ye. Raa weto tii Allah ysok tna mmen re ana mamo raa wAit. Ana weto mur-mur smot Ait; mhaf magin fee. Ait ro ynan fi
Maku reto to,
ro yase. Ait yatak ybo
mbra taro sor. Ait tait
ro yatak ybo
taro sor. Feto to ana mamo su mafa msya raa byoh to, tna kbe ana mros matak. Tna mno raa byoh weto mbtek tu oh!’”
Tna

reto mbetoo bofret reto renti mawe, “Riwai nyõ nmat fai au ro ja mwyah to, hre mam wore aya mawat to. Aya weto fret bo mawe raa mbam kʼraa mana aro rau-rau. Ana mmai rana aro rau ha-hayah ye. Tna mama mbam rabin rana aro sor ye.
Tna riwai nyõ nmat kak ro ja mban kabes reto tna
wau trion nsaa. Kak reto msya
wau
mabo nsaa weto) to, kbe knait fai au ro mwyah reto. Ana kbe mtak bombra ro au mse msya ratan wau ro myum beta. Tibyo au sroraa. Tna kbe
weto mfot fai au, tna mabo kwiyan rau. Tna moo fai au mko mait mam tafoh.
Allah yno re
weto msan tak wana kak ro ja mban kabes reto afo re kak reto mase mbo raa wana. Kbe Allah sayõ rof kak reto masen mbo raa mamo snok ayõ ro bi Ait yawe sai. Tna bo ro
weto msya kak mno to, ana mno mamyot bo ro bi Ait saim ykyas wia.
Tna riwai nyõ nmat fai sau ro ja mwyah, ro hre abyõ mam kak ro ja mban kabes reto. Fai reto fret bo mawe
mabi sau.
mabi reto matak mbo
ro tabam reto beta ye.”
Tna fo jõ tmat
roto sau mroh mbam sawro ro Allah mama.
reto to matak toni. Au mroh tna bo mase rau mawyah toni tibyo mram tabam refo.
Mroh tna mkyas mkah mai ro mase mawe,
Babel rarin oh!
ro mase reto rarin oh! Mfo wefo kabes mawat msya ruu mbra ro mkair-kar
ja raa knait to, mamo mhau mam tore tno.
Raa ro mhau mam
ro Babel to, mnan fi fai au ro ja mwyah.
Tiwya fai au reto mno re raa sorni ana tibyo mwyah msya fai au. Au tko
makin msya raa ro mhau mam rabin aro sor beta mno iro ye. Bo ro au mno reto to mnan fi
maya ro mno re raa mbisir sorni ana to. Tibyo ana mno bo mkair-kar. Tiwya raa ro ja hre masim bo to, mamoʼt
reto re moo bo ro moof aro kʼana. Moo bo msis bia tna masim. Tibyo ana weto mamo bobot.”
Tna jõ tari mai roto sau mbam sawro ro Allah mawe, “Raa mana wojõ; snok mbam
reto fooh! Snok mbam
reto afo re anu nhau su nsya raa weto fee tna kbe nno iro nsya raa weto fee ye! Kair ro mase kbe mama mai kʼana. Snok fooh afo re kair reto mai kʼanu ye fee!
Raa weto mno iro mawat. Iro ro ana mno weto to mfaut maut mnan fi atu sau ro faut miyõ toni kene mam ayoh. Tna Allah ynaut safo ro ana mber.”
Tna Allah yawe
wAit yawe,

“Mfo refo tbis anu nmo nno bo mai kʼraa ro Babel. Nmo ska bo ro mkair tii ana mno wia. Bo ro anu nno to mnan fi boren wana ro Jõ taren. Nmo nno boska mai kʼana muhrin ewok u. Raa fret bo mawe kmo aJõ to safo toni mnan fi
maya ro safo toni. Feto kbe Jõ safo sikowah raa ro Babel.

Tiwya ana weto mno bo mkair toni: Ana masmamo tibyo mamo bobot toni tna mbibi ana mesait ai sai. Ana mawe: ‘Anu fo bnan fi fnya manes. Anu fo bnan fi semit fee! Anu fo bhar sraujin fee ye!’ Raa ro Babel bibi ana mesait ai sai tna mse bombra wana msis toni. Feto tibyo Jõ bitsre kair ro mase toni mbtek mai kʼana riryõn. Tna tbis anu nmo sikowah ana re mawyan surut ana.
Jõ fi

Allah ro tse safo mana tmit kʼraa. Jõ fi Raa ro tase. Feto oh mi mam ti sau aran sai kbe kair ro mase mbtek mai kʼraa ro Babel: Kbe ana kiyam samyoh toni, tna raa mawat mhai. Kbe raa weto sraujin toni. Tna hai sre kbe mai kʼana ye. Tna
ro ana mhau reto to, kbe raa mkah mait.”
makin tiwya ksoh bombra msis-sas ro ana mkai mam Babel tna ana mno bo ro mkair msya raa ro Babel ye. Tna ati ro raa mkah
ro Babel to, kbe
weto mros mmat wasi maun tna mawia sraujin toni.
Kbe ana mros fari mmat bo samyoh ro mai
reto to, mrok waa toni mawe,
“Ayoh! Bo mkair!
ro masom rno mait mkak! Tiwya
reto matak toni. Tna mam ayõ sau reto sai bo ro samyoh matu mai tibyo
ro Babel rarin!”
Tna raa ro ja hre masim bo to, mmat he
ro Babel rarin oh. Tibyo ana mawia sraujin. Mawia mawe kbe raa ro Babel aro moo bo ro ana masim u fee.
Tiwya raa masim
msya fraa ro kren-kran mabyoh maut aro rau, msya
hawe aro rau; ro
ro mkin, ro
msya boyan ro mkek toni tna msya bombra ro raa mfen mbam ara ro sawer sau, bombra ro raa mfen mbam
ye, bombra ro raa mfen mbam ara ro mabyoh maut mnan fi aku ye,
ye,
ye msya fraa ro moof toni sau masom
Tiwya ana masim bo weto tna raa ro Babel moo.
Tna ana masim ara
marak rau msya
roto ro mno re bo sohmaam sawer. Tna ana masim ri ro masom
ro raa mko to, wasi rau sawer mnan fi ara aku ro raa mko, msya
maya,
msya
rau. Tna ana masim
msya asya ro
mkuk, tna raa masim ku awe ye.
Tna raa mawe:
“Anu nwe nsim bombra mam Babel tna fri mafer moof to, he mfe; bo weto msaef beta oh. Tna bosatoh msya bosnyam ro tiwya anu nasmamo to, weto beta marak ye. Kbe anu nkai u fee.”
Raa ro tiwya moo bombra mam
ro Babel tna me masim kʼraa to, mamo bobot. Raa ksoh bombra weto tna moo mkah pitis mabyoh ro maut. Tibyo raa ro masim bo weto to mamo bobot. Ana mros fari mmat kair ro mai
reto, tna mrok waa tetet.
Ana ro ja masim bo to mawia mawe:
“Ayoh! Feto oh a? Bo mkair!
ro mase no mait mkak oh! Tiwya raa ro
reto myum ratan ro moof toni: Hawee ro
ro mkin, msya boyan ro mkek toni. Tiwya ana weto fayir metsu wana mkah bofayir ro
fraa ro mabyoh maut tna kren-kran, msya
ye.
Mam ayõ sau sai bosatoh ro ana mse to mait mkak!”
Tna raa mase ro mbo
beta msya raa ro mkah bo mam
sor, msya raa ro maut
beta ye, msya raa ro ja makam bo maru mam aya sawan bo, kbe ana beta mros fari mmat.
Kbe ana mmat wasi mbam
ro Babel maun mwiok maut to ana mawe, “
mabi ro hayo mnan fi
reu u?”
Raa ro mmat to sraujin toni tibyo moo bohasyaf mse abyõ mam mana wana tna mawia mawe:
“Ayoh! Feto oh a? Bo mkair!
ro mase no mait mkak oh! Tiwya
wanu masyõ bosatoh mamoʼt
ro Babel masim no. Anu bsim bo kʼraa ro Babel to mamo bobot beta. Tna mam ayõ sau sai bo ro samyoh matu mai tibyo bo satoh weto beta saef marak!”
Tna mai reto mawe kʼraa ro Allah wAit mawe, “Anu ro nhau mam sawro ro Allah to, nsya raa ro Allah wAit tna msya raabis
wAit, msya
wAit ye to: Simaut mase oh! Tiwya raa ro Babel mno bo ro mkair mai kʼanu. Feto tibyo Allah yoo safo mana ymit kʼana riryõn.”
Tna
ro matak sau tubat fraa ro maboh sau, mnan fi fraa
tna tubat fraa reto mai mamoʼt aya sawan mawe:
“Feto ye
Babel ro mase reto to, kbe Allah tubat mbeak yai mamo te mnan fi fraa refo ye. Tibyo habah, kbe raa sait bo ykai
reto u fee ye.
Tna mam
reto to, raa ro mai kerombi
aro u fee ye. Tna raa aro mji howes u fee ye. Kbe raa aro mfi oor u fee, tna raa aro mfi saa u fee ye. Kbe raa aro mkah bo wana u fee. Kbe raa aro mfen bo u fee. Tna raa aro mmuk boit mkah fraa
u fee ye.
Tna
aro mawyah mam
reto u fee ye. Tna raa aro simaut makyõ bokyõ mam
reto u fee ye. Tiwya raa ro mase masim bo mam
reto. Tna raa ro mhau mam
reto besruf raa ro mbam rabin taro beta. Raa mawat mmat bo ro mkair-kar tiwya raa ro Babel mno to. Raa taro mmat tibyo ana mawe mno feto ye.
Raa ro Babel misti tibyo raa mame raa majat to:
na msya raa ro Allah wAit taro to ye. Tna raa taro tiwya raa mame majat to, raa ro Babel masom isti reto ye.”
Tna jõ tari raa mmai msun mam sawro ro Allah mawe:
anu bbaut
! Riof ro anu bkai refo fo mbam kʼAllah ranu. Rau ro moof to, raa mbaut Ait. Ait tait Raa ro yase.
Bi Ait ja yno bo ro moof ati. Tna ati ro Ait yros susai to, Ait yhar awya ro yno iro, tna ymit safo kʼait.

Babel reto to mnan fi fai sau ro mwyah toni tna misti tibyo raa makin mbtek mam iro. Feto to Allah riwai yoo safo mana ymit fai au reto. Tiwya fai au mame raa ro Allah wAit majat to, tna bi Ait yno bo ro samyoh mbtek mai kʼau ska si bo ro au mno.”
Tna ana riwai weto me mawe u mawe,
anu bbaut
! Fai ro mwyah reto to, Allah yko mam tafoh. Tna wasi mbam tafoh reto to, kbe maun mwiok maut mamo snok mam hame wajin.”
Tna raa manes mabo trion 24 weto msya kak ro Allah wAit mana jiit weto maka mbaut Allah ro hre abyõ mam ambar
rAit reto. Mawe,
Mabo oh!
anu bbaut
Tna mai sau mbam ambar
ro Allah rAit mawe, “Anu sryan ro Allah: Nma nbaut Allah ranu! Anu beta ro ja hartu bi Ait; ro nbi nsya ro kinyah ye; nma nbaut bi Ait oh!”
Tna jõ tari raa msis-sas mmai mnin. Ana mmai msun mnan fi aya ro miyi msun, tna mnan fi ayoh ro rurur mase toni. Ana mawe,
anu bbaut
Allah ranu tait yase. Ait yamo
ro yatak ybo bombra beta oh!
Nma, anu simaut mase tna bbaut bi Ait! Ait ro yfi
Maku retait, siwyan yama oh! Ait yama yawe yoo fnya. Tna fnya ro Ait yawe yoo to siwyan oh. Au fayir au oh.
Raa moo ratan
ro mboh tna moof toni mee kʼau myum.” (Raa ro Allah wAit ja mhar mno iro fee. Ratan
ro moof reto fret bo mawe bo ro moof ana mno wore ana tiwya mhau mam tabam reto.)

reto mawe kʼjõ mawe: “Nkom bo ro jõ tawe refo: ‘Meen
Maku mmen fnya tna makyõ bokyõ rAu. Tna
yoo taah yee kʼraa taro yawe ana mamoʼt bokyõ reto. Ana ro mamo to, kbe simaut mase.’” Tna fo

masu rau, tawe tbaut
reto. Menohe

reto mawe, “Nno feto ma! Nbaut Allah yesait aran sai. Jõ fi sryan rAit sai mnan fi nyõ nsya nafoh wonyõ. Nafoh wonyõ ja mari watum ro Allah mbo mno. Tna ana mros matak mkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa taro to ye. Raa mkyas Yesus yasom kʼraa taro to, ana mkyas mkah Har ro
matak rAu mnan fi
ro tiwya mkyas soo ro Allah.”
Tna jõ tmat sawro ro Allah mato nkro. Tna tmat
ro mboh sau. Ait ro yaut hre mam

reto abyõ tait, yasom rAit ‘Ait Ro Srau Ewok Fee’, tna ‘Ait Ro Ykyas Sioh Fee’. Ati ro Ait yros susai to, Ait yhar awya ro yno iro, tna ymit safo kʼait. Ait ysok raa sait bo fee ye. Tna ati ro Ait yamo yafa ysya raa byoh ro hawe Allah to, Ait ja ysok raa sait fee ye.
Ait yasu rAit mawyah mnan fi tafoh. Tna Ait sbyõ watau
mawat. Tna raa mkom yasom sau mam yetsu rAit mnan fi raa mame aat. Som reto raa sait bo yhar fee. Ait yesait aran yhar yasom rAit reto.
Tna ratan ro Ait yyum to, raa mamruk mkah mees. Tna yasom rAit to 'Bokyas ro Allah.'
Ait yamo yafa tna raa sbe mbam sawro ro Allah kro Ait mamoʼt tabam. Raa sbe weto maut
ro mboh sor ye. Tna ana myum ratan ro raa mtin mkah hawee
ro moof tna ro mboh toni.

Raa weto matak mtu srah mari. Tna tmat raa mawat mamos wana ye. Raa wefo fo raa ro tiwya mkyas Watum ro Allah tna mkyas mawe ana smot Yesus. Tibyo raa msot ana mana wana re majat. Tiwya raa wefo mhau mam tabam refo fares to, ana mbaut kak msya
reto fee. Tna raa mame aat ro kak reto kʼana matem soh mfe makit wana to fee ye. Tna tmat raa weto mrok masen. Tna ana mamo mase tna msya
ana mbo raa mamo snok
trion 1000.
Raa wefo tiwya mbaut kak msya
reto fee. Tibyo raa mame ana majat. Raa weto oh mi raa mkbair ro meen mrok masen wia tinyi. Tna raa roto ro tiwya mhai oh to, ana weto mrok masen fefares. Mhau
trion 1000 mkak tna raa roto taro beta ro tiwya mhai to, kbe mrok masen ye.
Raa ro mrok masen wia tinyi weto to, Allah yoo ana yse kait kʼAit. Kbe ana simaut mase. Ati ro raa mhai mun trion ro ewok to, kbe ana wefo mhai u fee. Kbe ana wefo mamo

trion 1000 weto mkak tna kabes yabi raa bitsre ybam yuk ro tiwya raa mfot ait make mbu.

Tna fo ait yamo sioh raa ro mhau mam tabam refo. Ait sioh raa ro mhau mam ati ti mare, ati ti wayir, ati ti habeh, msya ati to brat ye. Tna kabes yabi yamo sioh raa ro mhau mam rabin ro Gog msya rabin ro Magog ye. Kabes yabi yamo ybis raa weto beta mberur su mwo sau tna siwyan ana bo mamo mafa. Ana ro siret to msis bia mnan fi snyik ro mhau mam aya sawan maam to.
Tibyo raa mama mbam rabin wana sor-sor hayah to mamoʼt
ro masom
ro Allah Ksoh’. Raa ro Allah wAit mhau mam
reto. Tna raa byoh mamo burut ana weto. Menohe tafoh mbam ayoh mroh mait byoh weto mkak.
Kabes yabi ja sioh raa ro mama mbam rabin wana sor-sor. Ait raa tubat mbeak yamo mait mam tafoh ro mait mwarah mkah
Tafoh reto mait mbrer mnan fi aya sawan. Tiwya kak ro ja mban kabes, ro mana rau trion krema reto msya
ro ja sioh raa tait to, raa moo ana mbewok mbeak mam tafoh reto oh. Kbe tafoh mait sikowah ana yoyo mamo snok mam hame wajin.
Tna jõ tmat bi Ait sait hre abyõ mam ambar (
) mabi ro mboh sau. Tna ayoh msya tabam refo to mrok mansyaf sai. Bo weto mtai mhau mam ati ro Ait yasu fee.
Tna jõ tmat raa ro tiwya mhai oh; ro mabi msya kinyah ye. Ana masen mros mam ati ro bi Ait yasu ro hre abyõ mam ambar (

) rAit reto. Tna raa betrat aam ro mhau mam beto sor. Aam weto sau fo masom rau ‘Raa ro Kbe Mhau Hame Wajin’. Tna aam roto sau mkyas bo ro raa sait-sait tiwya yno. Allah ymat aam weto tna ytu safo yse kʼraa ro mros weto mamyot si bo ro ana weto aro sait-sait tiwya yno.

Tna raa ro tiwya mhai msya ro majat weto to, hai msya ajat weto beta mrok masen mros: Taro mrok masen mbam aya sawan ye, taro to mrok masen mbam kayah mato ro tiwya raa sama ana ye, tna taro mrok masen mbam sawro ro hai snok. Tna raa wefo beta mamo mros mam ati ro Allah yasu. Tna Allah yse srah kʼana mamyot si bo ro ana tiwya mno sor.
Bo ro misti tibyo raa mhai to, tna msya sawro ro hai to, raa makah mamo mbeak mam tafoh ro mait warah mkah
Tafoh reto mait mbrer mnan fi aya sawan. Reto to hai ro mun ewok.
Tna awya ro yasom rait raa mkom mam aam ‘Raa ro Kbe Mhau Hame Wajin’ reto to fee, kbe ait retait raa mbeak mam tafoh reto. Aam reto mkyas raa masom wana ro kbe mhau mroon.
Tna jõ tmat ayoh ro tna msya tabam ro tna. Ayoh msya tabam msya aya sawan ro Allah yfen wia to, marak.
Tna jõ tmat
Yerusalem ro tna.
reto to
ro Allah rAit. Tna jõ tmat
reto mroh mbam sawro ro Allah rAit mama. Allah siwyan
reto to moof toni; mnan fi fnya fain ro ja fayir ana moof wer re mamo maryõt mere rau retait.
Tna jõ tari mai ro mase sau mbam ambar
rAit mawe, “Mfo refo Allah yroh yama yhau su ysya raa. Raa weto kbe mamo raa mana wAit tna bi Ait tait Allah ro ana smot. Kbe bi Ait yesait yhau yatam ana.

Kbe Ait yno re ana aro sraujin u fee. Ait kbe karu ana yukan wana. Wore weto to, raa wAit aro mhai u fee. Tna raa wAit aro mhar bo sraujin u fee. Ana aro mhar bo mawia u fee. Tna ana aro mhar bo kiyam u fee ye. Bombra weto to bose oh, marak beta.”

Tna Ait ro hre mam ambar rAit reto abyõ to yawe, “Jõ tfen bombra beta tna u. Jõ tawe kʼnyõ tawe nkom bo ro Jõ tkyas wefo beta. Bo ro Jõ tkyas fo bo ati. Bo mabo tu. Tibyo nkom beta afo re kbe raa mmat.”

Tna Ait yawe kʼjõ yawe, “Bo beta to Jõ tno mkak oh! Jõ fi Raa ro tinyi tibyo Jõ tasom aJõ ‘Alfa’. Tna Jõ fi Raa ro ttis ye tibyo Jõ tasom aJõ ‘Omega’ ye. Awya ro yhai sbit to, kbe Jõ too aya ro moof baro tee kʼait yata. Yoo mkah pitis bo aro fee ye. Yoo sai. Aya reto mno re raa mhau hame wajin.
Awya sai ro tiwya yros yatak re smot Jõ snok ttis rau to, mfo refo ait fri bo weto beta. Jõ fi Allah ro ait smot. Tna ait yamo ku aJõ ye.

Menohe raa aro smot Jõ fee: Tibyo kbe ana mhai mun ewok u. Raa weto to, raa ro ja waa tibyo smot Jõ fee. Ana taro hawe bo smot Jõ. Ana taro to mno bo ro mimara. Ana taro mame raa majat. Ana taro ja mwyah. Ana taro ja mari bo ro kabes mawe, tna mno mafot ro kabes weto. Ana taro to mbaut Jõ fee, ana mbaut bombra roto. Ana weto msya raa beta ro sioh-nat raa ye to, meen raa tubat ana beta mbeak mam tafoh ro mait mbrer mnan fi aya sawan. Reto to, hai ro mun ewok.”

mabo krema ro riwai mbo kair mase ro ttis mam hawereh wana to, sau mama mo kʼjõ mawe, “Nama nmat fnya fain ro Allah ymen mama msya
Maku.”

reto to, raa ro kbe mhau hame wajin. Ana weto mesait sai. Raa weto masom wana raa mkom mam aam sau oh. Aam refo masom “Raa ro Kbe Mhau Hame Wajin.” Aam refo fo aam ro
Maku rau.

Aya reto miyi mamo susai mam iso
Yerusalem ro tna reto to masuf. Tna aya refo maam rau ti ewok to ara mo mros. Ara weto to make kake ro mno re raa mhau hame wajin. Snyi sau-sau to make:
sau to make mun trion 12. Tna ara wefo mata wau to misoh raa ro kiyam tibyo kiyam wana marak.

wana tna mbo raa wAna. Tna sryan ro wAit ro ja mno bo rAit to, meen mhau mam beto tna mbaut Ait ye.
Kbe ana mmat bi Ait yasu. Tna yasom rAit raa mkom kʼana makit sor.

Allah yesait yram

Tna
reto mawe kʼjõ mawe: “Bokyas refo fo bo ati. Bo mabo tu. Kbe raa mari tna mse kʼana.
Allah yesait ybis Har rAit mroh mbo
wAit re ana mkyas bo. Tna ybis
rAit mama merif bo wefo kʼsrian wAit re ana mhar bo ro kbe mama fooh.”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri oh! Kene wo Jõ tama oh! Awya ro yari watum ro aam refo tna ybo yno to, kbe simaut mase.”
Jõ Yohanes oh mi tari tna tmat bo wefo beta ro kbe mama mam muktis rau. Jõ tari tna tmat bo wefo mkak. Tna jõ taka tabum te mam ati ro
masu rau tawe tbaut
reto ro merif bombra wefo kʼjõ tmat.
Menohe
reto bhah jõ wa mawe, “Nno feto ma! Nbaut Allah yesait sai. Jõ fi sryan rAit sai tnan fi nyõ. Nyõ nsya
roto sor, tna nsya raa beta ro mari watum aam refo tna mbo mno ye to, anu beta bmo sryan ro ja mno bo ro
rAit.”
Tna
reto mawe, “Nmyõt watum aam refo to ma! Oon rau kene oh!

Awya sai ro ja yber safo to, nhau rof; kbe ait yhau yber safo bait tu. Tna awya sai ro ja yno bo ro mkair to, nhau rof; kbe ait yno bo ro mkair bait tu! Tna awya sai ro ja yno bo ro moof to, kbe yhau yno bait tu. Tna awya ro ja yno bo ro Allah wAit to, kbe yhau yno bo ro Allah wAit tu!”
Tna Yesus yawe, “Nri kaket: Jõ tama fooh oh mefo! Jõ takah boren raa tama taren raa. Kbe taren raa sait-sait mamyot si bo ro raa retait tiwya yno-yno.
Jõ fi Raa ro tinyi, tibyo Jõ tasom aJõ to ‘Alfa’. Tna Jõ fi Raa ro ttis ye, tibyo Jõ tasom aJõ to ‘Omega’ ye.”
Yesus yawe, “Raa ro myon ratan wana ro mkair re mrok mboh to, kbe simaut mase. Ana weto kbe mait kake ro mno re raa mhau hame wajin to. Tna kbe ana mamo twok mam
Yerusalem ye.

Menohe raa ro ja mno bo ro mkair-kar to, kbe mhau sai mne. Ana weto to taro mari bo ro kabes mawe tna mhar mafot ro kabes weto. Tna ana taro to raa ro mwyah. Tna ana taro to raa ro mame raa majat. Tna ana taro to mbaut
tna ana taro to ksoh sioh-nat raa ye.
Jõ fi Yesus. Tna Jõ tbis
aJõ reto mama mo kʼnyõ mkyas bo wefo beta. Tna tsi bo kʼnyõ tawe nkyas bo wefo kʼraa
weto sor. Jõ tasom aJõ to ‘Kmoh Tbam Daud, Hohos aJõ’, tna ‘Sken Mor-mor Ti Tobrat’ ye.”
Tna Har ro
msya fai

ro Yesus ymen to, mbewok mawe kʼYesus mawe: “Nama oh!” Tna awya ro yari watum refo to yawe: “Esre, nama oh!” Awya ro yhai sbit to yama sai. Tna awya sai ro ksoh yama yoo aya ro moof baro yata to, yama ye. Kbe yoo mkah pitis aro fee. Yoo sai. Aya refo mno re raa mhau hame wajin.

Ro mari watum aam refo to, jõ tawe kʼanu tawe: “Kaket anu! Awya ro tkyõt aam refo maja rau baro renti to, kbe Allah kmo ait: Kbe yoo kair ro mase riwai raa mkyas mam aam refo weto beta to, bitsre mbtek mai kʼait.
Tna awya sai ro yiruru watum ro aam refo maja rau baro makus to, kbe Allah yiruru boren ro yaren raa retait ye: Kbe bi Ait yawe ait retait yamo truk mam
ro Allah rAit reto to fee ye. Tna yawe ait retait kbe yait kake ro mno re raa mhau hame wajin to fee ye. Boren raa weto to riwai raa mkyas mam aam refo.”
Yesus oh mi yawe bokyas mam aam refo beta to mabo tu. Tna yawe, “Esre, Jõ tama fooh mefo!” Tna Yohanes yawe,
Mabo oh!
Yesus; nama fooh!”
Jõ skabuk afo re
Yesus ysan boatmof rAit kʼanu raa ro Allah wAit.
: Mabo oh.
